column2: Iyan heini kes gug̵ud te kepuun ni Jesu Kristu. Kevuwazan si Jesu Kristu ni Hadì David dengan. Ne si David, kevuwazan ni Abraham.
Ne si Abraham, amey ni Isaak, ne si Isaak, amey sikandin ni Hakub. Ne si Hakub, anak din si Huda wey is menge suled din.
Ne si Huda, iyan esawa zin si Tamar, ne iyan menge anak dan si Piris wey si Sara. Ne si Piris, amey ni Isrum, ne si Isrum, amey ni Aram,
ne si Aram, amey ni Eminadab, ne si Eminadab, amey ni Nasun. Ne si Nasun, amey ni Salmun,
ne si Salmun, iyan esawa zin si Rahab, ne iyan anak dan si Buus. Ne si Buus, ne amey ni Ubid. Ne iyan iney ni Ubid si Rut. Ne si Ubid, amey ni Isai.
Ne si Isai, ne amey ni Hadì David.
Ne si David, amey ni Sulumun (iyan iney ni Sulumun kes esawa zengan ni Uriya).
Ne si Sulumun, amey ni Rubuam, ne si Rubuam, amey ni Abyas. Ne si Abyas, amey ni Asa.
Ne si Asa, amey ni Husepat. Ne si Husepat, amey ni Huram, ne si Huram, amey ni Usyas,
ne si Usyas, amey ni Hutam. Ne si Hutam, ne amey ni Akas. Ne si Akas, amey ni Isikyas.
Ne si Isikyas, ne amey ni Menasis. Ne si Menasis, ne amey ni Amun. Ne si Amun, iyan amey ni Husyas;
ne si Husyas, iyan anak din si Hikunyas wey is menge suled din. Iyan haazà timpu he mid-uwit te menge tigBebilunya is menge tig-Israyil pehendiyà te Bebilunya.
Ne hein mid-uwit en is menge tig-Israyil ziyà te Bebilunya nevuwad si Hikunyas ne iyan anak din si Selatyil. Ne amey si Selatyil ni Surubebil.
Ne si Surubebil, amey ni Abyud, ne si Abyud, ne amey ni Iliyakim. Ne si Iliyakim, amey ni Asur.
Ne si Asur, amey sikandin ni Saduk. Ne si Saduk, amey ni Akim. Ne si Akim, amey ni Ilyud,
ne si Ilyud, amey ni Iliasar. Ne si Iliasar, amey ni Matan, ne si Matan, iyan amey ni Hakub.
Ne si Hakub, iyan amey ni Jose he iyan esawa ni Maria. Ne si Maria, iyan iney ni Jesus he migeraran he Misiyas,

Sepulù wey heepat he lapis te kevuwazan ebpuun dà te kegkevuwad ni Abraham taman ki David. Ne ebpuun maan te kegkevuwad ni David taman te ked-uwita te menge tig-Israyil pehendiyà te Bebilunya, sepulù wey heepat daan he lapis. Ne puun dutun taman te ked-enaka ki Jesu Kristu, sepulù ded daan wey heepat he lapis.

Iyan heini g̵ug̵ud te keag̵i te ked-enaka ki Jesu Kristu. Nekeg̵unan is iney zin si Maria te maama he egngezanan ki Jose. Iyan, te wazè dan pa meked-esawa, netuenan ni Maria he meg̵ingey sikandin pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne si Jose, kenà sikandin edsuwey te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne tenged kayi, kenè din edleusen te ed-esawa si Maria, iyan, kenè din daan egkesuatan he meeled-eled si Maria, umba ed-isipen din he edhusayen dà heini te meeles.

Ne zutun te kemulu zin pa ed-isipa is iring kayi, mibpeteg̵einep kandin is belinsug̵uen te Nengazen. Ne ke sikandin te, “Sikew Jose, is kevuwazan ni Hadì David, kenè ka melenew he ebpengesawa ki Maria su meg̵ingey sikandin pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Maama is id-anak din ne ngezani nu ki Jesus,
Umba nehitavù heini is langun diyà te ki Maria wey si Jose su egketuman is migkag̵i zengan te Nengazen pinaag̵i te ebpeneuven din he migkag̵i te,
“Ebmeg̵ingey is rag̵a ne id-anak din is maama, ne iyan ngazan te vatà si Imanwil,” he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, nekeamur is Megbevayà kenitew.
Ne zutun nepukew si Jose. Ne midtuman din haazà is sambag kandin te velinsug̵uen te Nengazen ne mid-esawa zin si Maria.
Iyan, wazè din si Maria uvayi taman te wazè pa mekeanak. Ne hein in-anak en haazà is batà, migngezanan ni Jose ki Jesus.

Diyà si Jesus ianak te inged he Bitlihim, te prubinsya he Hudiya zutun te timpu te kedhadì te aney en he hadì he egngezanan ki Hirudis. Ne zutun te vatè pa utew si Jesus, nekeuma ziyà te Hiruselim is menge memimituen. Diyà sikandan ebpuun te meziyù he inged diyà te edsilaan.

Ne in-insè dan ke, “Hendei ianak kes midtagnà he vatà he ebpekehadì te menge etew he Hudiyu? Neehè dey is kedlepew te vituen he iyan tuus te ked-enaka kandin ne tenged kayi midhendini key su ed-ezapen dey sikandin.”
Ne hein nezineg heini ni Hadì Hirudis nesemukan is gehinawa zin wey is tivuuk he tigHiruselim.

Ne midtig̵um ni Hirudis is langun he pengulu te menge memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Ne mid-insaan din sikandan ke, “Hendei id-anak kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì sumalà is kedtegnaa zengan?”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Diyà sikandin id-anak te inged he Bitlihim, te prubinsya he Hudiya. Egketuenan ta heini su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te ebpeneuven dengan he egkag̵i te,
‘Sikiyu is menge tigBitlihim he ziyà ed-ubpà te prubinsya he Hudiya,
egkevantug daan is inged niw iring te zuma he menge inged diyan te Hudiya
su ziyà te keniyu ebpuun is edhadì te menge sakup ku
he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.’ ”
Ne si Hirudis, hein nezineg din haazà midtawag din kes nemekeuma he memimituen. Ne hein iyan dà duma zin haazà is menge memimituen, mid-insaan din ke keenu medlepew is bituen he neehè dan.

Ne hein netuenan ni Hirudis, midteleenan din te ibpeey-eyazan kandan te ebpen-ahà is batà ne ke sikandin te, “Emun egketuredu niw, ipetueni niw kediey su wey ku meturedu su ed-ezapen ku zaan.” Ne zutun, impelaus sikandan diyà te Bitlihim. Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge memimituen ne hein diyè dan en te zalan neehè dan en maan kes bituen he iyan kes bituen he neehè dan he midlepew ziyà te edsilaan. Ne nelipey zan utew hein neehè dan en maan. Ne mibpetundug kandan haazà is bituen, ne zutun medteren te renged te valey he zutun kes batà.

Ne hein midseled dan dutun te valey neehè dan haazà is batà wey is iney zin he si Maria. Ne midluhud dan su ed-ezapen dan haazà is batà. Ne zutun impelepew zan is menge kavan he zutun itagù is ketig̵eyunan dan ne mibeg̵ayan dan sikandin te vulawan wey menge mahal he mehemut he beyewà wey mira.
Ne impesavut kandan te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te teg̵einep he kenè dan en medlikù diyà te ki Hirudis. Ne tenged kayi, wazè dan en med-ikul zuen te imbayè dan dutun te ked-ulì dan.

Ne hein migenat en kes menge memimituen, mibpeteg̵einep en maan ki Jose is belinsug̵uen te Nengazen he egkag̵i te, “Enew kad, Jose. Ne uwita nu heeyan is batà wey iney zin ne pelag̵uy kew pehendiyà te Ihiptu. Ne zutun kew tag̵ad taman te kenè ku pa sikew egkeg̵iyan. Su ebpenahaan ni Hirudis heeyan is batà su edhimetayan din.”
Ne zutun mid-enew si Jose, ne mid-uwit din haazà is batà wey si Maria, ne migenat dan dutun te mezukilem pehendiyà te Ihiptu.
Ne zutun dan med-ubpà taman te minatey en si Hirudis.
Egkeulaula zan heini su egketuman kes netagnà he migkag̵i te Nengazen pinaag̵i te ebpeneuven dengan he ke sikandin te, “Mid-umew ku is Anak ku he ibpaawà puun te Ihiptu.”

Ne hein netuenan ni Hirudis he mid-akal zà kandin kes menge memimituen, nepauk utew. Ne insug̵ù din he ibpepenhimetayan is langun he menge vatà he maama he ebpenuig̵en te zezuwa he tuig wey minus pa zutun te tivuuk he inged te Bitlihim wey is menge siringan dutun he inged. Midhimu zin heini su wey mepatey si Jesus su zezuwa en he tuig is kelug̵ayad puun te kegkeahaa te menge memimituen duen te vituen.
Ne pinaag̵i zutun netuman kes netagnà dengan ni Jeremias, kes ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su migkag̵i si Jeremias te,
“Duen meg̵urub he egkezineg ta ziyà te inged he Rama.
Egkezineg ta is edsineg̵ew wey ebpemenderawit
su edlendag̵an ni Rakil is menge anak din.
Edsineg̵ew ne wazè en ebpekelangan kandin
su is menge anak din naawè en.”
Ne hein minatey en si Hirudis, mibpeuman mebpeteg̵einep ki Jose is belinsug̵uen te Nengazen he migkag̵i te,
“Enew kad, Jose, ne uwita nu heeyan is batà wey is iney zin ne ulì kew ziyà te tanà he Israyil su minatey en sikan is edhimatey pezem keniyan te vatà.”
Ne mid-enew si Jose ne miduma zin haazà is batà wey si Maria is iney te vatà ne mid-ulì dan diyà te tanà he Israyil.

Ne hein netuenan ni Jose he iyan hadì diyà te Hudiya si Ergilau he nekesunud te amey zin he si Hirudis, midlevayan dan is prubinsya he Hudiya su nahandek dan. Ne tenged te mibpeteg̵einep is Megbevayà he edsambag ki Jose, midlaus dan diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Ne ziyè dan med-ulì te inged he egngezanan te Neserit. Umba neulaula zan heini su egketuman is netagnà dengan te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su nekag̵i zan he egngezanan si Jesus he tigNeserit.

Mibpenlavey is menge tuig dutun ne zuen etew he egngezanan ki Juan Megbebewtismu. Diyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew seled te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne impesavut din te menge etew is Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ke sikandin te, “Iniyug̵i niw is memezaat he ulaula su meg̵aan en edhadì kenitew is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.”
Ne si Juan, iyan sikan is netagnà dengan ni Esaias he migkag̵i zin he,
“Duen keuzemà etew
ziyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew.
Ne zutun egkezineg sikandin
te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkag̵i te,
‘Meg̵aan ebpekeuma is Nengazen.
Hig̵ewani niw is ibayè din;
tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din,
he ke và dà egkeg̵iya,
endami niw is kebpekeuma zin.’ ”
Ne si Juan, kukumbalà te midhavel he vulvul te kemilyu ne vevakes te lundis he neg̵angu. Ne terapan dà wey teneb is keuyag̵an din.

Ne mezakel he etew is midangep kandin he ebpemuun te inged he Hiruselim wey ziyà te zuma kayi he inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Hudiya wey zuen daan mezakel pa he etew he ziyà ebpememuun te menge inged he uvey te wahig he Hurdan.
Ne haazà he menge etew, intangdù dan is menge salè dan ne mibewtismuwan din sikandan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.

Ne naahà ni Juan is mezakel he etew he menge Perisiyu wey menge Sedusiyu he edhendiyà te kandin su ebpebewtismu. Ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan te, “Iring te ulaula te uled is ulaula niw su teruen kew. Maan is edhendini kew? Kunaan niw vuwa ke ebpekeg̵awas kew te silut te Megbevayà.
Emun tutuu he mid-iniyug̵an niw en is ulaula niw he mezaat, ipeehè niw pinaag̵i te menge meupiya he vaal niw.

Ne kenè niw iyan serig̵i is kevuwazan kew ni Abraham su wazà dutun pulus diyà te Megbevayà. Su egkeg̵iyan ku sikiyu he emun iyan egkinehenglanen te Megbevayà, egkehimu he ebeelan din heini is menge vatu he kevuwazan ni Abraham.
Is ebpiley te kayu, migkayew en su ebpemilayen din en is minsan hengkey he kayu he kenà meupiya is beg̵as din su wey mevinsuli,

Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu,” ke si Juan, “he tuus te mid-iniyug̵an niw is mezaat he ulaula, iyan, duen etew he ed-ilis kediey ne iyan ibewtismu zin keniyu is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne emun kenà, ne hapuy. Lavew sikandin kedì, ne minsan is ked-uwit dà te sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he sulug̵uen din.

Geina te ibpedsivey zin te edtapid is menge metazeng wey is menge lalung he etew, iring sikandin te ebpalid te parey he id-awè din is ukap. Ne haazà is parey, ederengdengen, iyan, is ukap, edtutungen din diyà te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan,” ke si Juan.
Ne zutun te timpu te kebpemewtismu ni Juan, migenat si Jesus ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya pehendiyà te wahig he Hurdan su ebpebewtismu ki Juan.
Ne si Juan, kenà dutun egkesuat, ne ke sikandin te, “Iyan a zait he ebewtismuwan nu kenà te iyan ka ebpebewtismu kedì.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Kenà, su kinahanglan he ebeelan ta is iring kayi wey ta meveeli is langun he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.” Ne zutun human mebpezumazuma si Juan, ne mibewtismuwan din si Jesus.

Ne si Jesus, hein nebewtismuwan en, migaun dutun te wahig. Ne zutun nepuwasan is langit ne naahà ni Jesus is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he Megbevayà he iring te merepatik he edlugtanà diyà te kandin ne midlatun diyà te kandin.
Ne zutun nezineg is Megbevayà diyà te langit he egkag̵i, ke sikandin te, “Iyan heini Anak ku he utew ku minahal. Utew ku sikandin igkelipey.”
Ne zutun mid-ag̵ak si Jesus te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew wey sikandin meg̵ezami ni Setanas.
Ne hein kepatan en he andew ne wazà si Jesus mekekaan ne utew sikandin nevitil.
Ne zutun mid-uvayan ni Setanas si Jesus ne mibpenuley zin he egkag̵i te, “Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà pengelinteuwi nu he mevaluy he egkeenen heini is menge vatu.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Kenà iyan dà igkeuyag te menusiyà is egkeenen, kekenà, elin daan egkinehenglanen din is minsan hengkey he lalag he egkeg̵iyen te Megbevayà.’ ”
Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te inged he Hiruselim ne miduma zin diyà te utew metikang he limbuvungan te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà.
Ne migkeg̵iyan din te, “Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà, umpak ka su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
‘Ebpetevangan ka te Megbevayà te menge velinsug̵uen din
ne edtemukan ke zan su wey kenà egkerudruzan is minsan paa nu te vatu.’ ”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Kenè kew mebaal te paag̵i he igezam niw te g̵ehem te Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw.’ ”

Ne zutun mid-uwit en maan si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te metmetikang he vuntud ne impeehè din ki Jesus is langun he menge g̵inhedian dini te kelibutan wey ke sengemenu is kezekelà wey ketig̵eyunan te kada sevaha zutun.
Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Setanas te, “Is langun he egkeehè nu, kenikew en, su ibeg̵ey ku kenikew emun edluhuzan a wey ed-ezapen a kenikew.”

Ne mibensag̵an ni Jesus te, “Setanas, ewai a kenikew! Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Iyan niw zà ezapa is Nengazen he Megbevayè niw. Ne is duma pa he ngazan he megbevayà, kenè niw tumana is sug̵ù din.’ ”
Ne zutun mid-awà si Setanas ne nekeuma is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne imbeg̵ey zan ki Jesus is egkinehenglanen din.
Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus he nepirisu si Juan Megbebewtismu, mid-ulì diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Nekeuma sikandin diyà te Neserit ne zutun diyà med-ulì te inged he Kepirnaum he ziyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, he sakup te tanà he Sebulun wey Neptali.
Neulaula zin heini su egketuman kes netagnà dengan ni Esaias he ke sikandin te,
“Is TigSebulun wey is tigNeptali he kenà menge Hudiyu
he ziyà mekeubpà te uvey te ranew
ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan te Wahig he Hurdan,
sakup te tanà he Geliliya he ed-ubpaan te kenà menge Hudiyu.
Is langun kayi he menge etew,
henduen be te ziyà mekeubpà te merusirem
wey henduen be te ziyè dan en te Iveyaan
su g̵eine te nekesuwey zan te Megbevayà.
Iyan, diyà te huziyan he timpu
egketeyawan en sikandan
su ebpekeuma ziyà te kandan
is ebpeketayew te isip dan.”
Ne puun dutun midweliyan ni Jesus is menge etew. Ke sikandin te, “Iniyug̵i niw is memezaat he ulaula niw, su meg̵aan en edhadì keniyu is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.”

Sevaha he andew te edhipanew si Jesus diyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, neehè din is dezuwa he maama, si Simon (kes mid-umanan din ngezani ki Pedro) wey is hazi ni Simon he si Andres. Ebpenlaya sikandan diyà te ranew su menlelaya sikandan.
Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus te, “Menunug̵es kew ves te pait? Duma kew kedì ne etew mulà is egkekuwa niw wey zan mekesundan kedì.”
Ne zutundutun mid-engked dan is ebpenlaya ne miduma zan kandin.

Ne midlaus dan dutun ne neuma ni Jesus is selakew pa he zezuwa he telehazi zaan, si Santiago wey si Juan, he menge anak ni Sibidiyu. Diyà sikandan te avang duma te amey zan su ebpurungan dan is menge laya zan. Mid-umew sikandan ni Jesus ne
zutundutun mid-ewaan dan is amey zan dutun te avang ne miduma zan ki Jesus.

Ne neeneb ni Jesus is tivuuk he prubinsya he Geliliya te ebpenurù te menge etew ziyà te menge simbahan dan. Impesavut din te menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne nengeulian din is egkengesekitan te migkelingulingu he varang te zaru.

Ne nevantug si Jesus diyà te tivuuk he nasyun he Sirya. Ne tenged kayi mibpen-uwit dan diyà te kandin is langun he egkengezeruwan wey is egkengesekitan te ebarangbarang en he egezamen, iring te menge edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, menge ebevuyen, wey menge etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa, ne nengeulian ni Jesus heini is langun.

Ne tenged dutun mezakel utew he menge etew is ebpemenduma kandin. Duen dutun menge tigGeliliya, duen menge etew he ebpuun te prubinsya he Dikepulis, duen tigHiruselim, tigHudiya, wey menge etew he ziyà ebpemuun te tanà he ziyà te zapit te edsilaan te wahig he Hurdan.
Ne naahà ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew ne zutun midtekezeg sikandin te vuvungan ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is menge sumusundan din,
ne mibpenurù din sikandan.
Ne ke sikandin te, “Utew zeyzey is nengesayud he kenà sikandan ebpekeulaula te meupiya
ke kenà sikandan edtevangan te Megbevayà su iyan sikandan egkehedian te Megbevayà.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is ibmesakit te g̵ehinawa zan is mezaat he ulaula
su edlenganen sikandan te Megbevayà.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is kenà mepelevawen
su egkezawat dan kes tuvad he impenaad te Megbevayà.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is iyan dekelà te g̵ehinawa zan is kedtumana zan
te egkesuatan te Megbevayà su is Megbevayà edtavang kandan te kedtumana kayi.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is hihizuwen te menge zuma zan
su is Megbevayà egkehizu kandan.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is kenà egkezuwazuwa is gehinawa zan
te kedtumana zan te meupiya he ulaula su iyan sikandan ebpekeahà keuzemà te Megbevayà.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is ebpen-ahà te melinew he kebpekesavuk te menge etew
su ed-engkenen sikandan te Megbevayà he menge anak din.
Utew zeyzey sikandan is ed-antus te kegkepeuki kandan te menge etew tenged te edtumanen dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà
su iyan sikandan egkehedian te Megbevayà.
Su utew kew zeyzey emun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu edsulaan kew wey ebpesipelahan kew te menge etew, ne ebpenudtul zan te tarù he mezaat is menge vaal niw.
Iyan daan heini kes mid-ulaula te menge etew zengan diyà te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Medlipey kew utew su utew zekelà is idsuhul keniyu keuzemà diyà te langit.

Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, iring kew te timus he ibmeupiya te egkeenen su iyan kew ibmeupiya te tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, emun egkeawà diyà te timus is taam din wazè en paag̵i he egkehimu te kebpelikua te taam din. Ne wazè en pulus dutun te timus he wazà taam; idtimbag dà ne egketekutakan te menge etew.
Iring kew te sulù he ebpeketayew te tivuuk he menusiyà. Is inged he ziyà benguna te puntur te vuvungan, kenà ebpekeeles.
Ne wazà daan etew he edtemteman din is sulù ne ebpelengkevan din te vinevey, kekenà, idsavuk din diyà te sevukà wey meteyawi is tivuuk he seled te valey.

Ne iring din ded daan is menge ulaula niw he meupiya; kinahanglan he kenè niw ieles. Ipeehè niw te menge etew is menge ulaula niw he meupiya ne tenged kayi ebpekezalig dan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.

Kenè niw isipa he iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan is id-awè ku kes kesug̵uan he imbeg̵ey kenitew pinaag̵i ki Moises wey kes menge penurù dengan he imbeg̵ey pinaag̵i te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Umba nekehendini a su wey mepurungi te edtuman.

Su taman te kenè pa egkehanew is langit wey tanà, kenà egkehimu he id-awà is minsan sengetag̵è dà he lalag duen te kesug̵uan. Taman te kenè pa egketuman is langun, kenà daan egkeawà is kesug̵uan. Kenè niw lipati heini.

Umba ke zuen minsan hentei he edlegkawen din is minsan utew zà deisey zuen te kesug̵uan ne ibpenurù din te zuma zin he kenà tumana haazà is midlagkew zin, iyan sikandin utew minus is pid-etawan din ke edhadì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne iring din daan ke zuen etew he edtumanen din ebpurungi is kesug̵uan ne ibpenurù din diyà te zuma is kedtumana kayi, iyan sikandin lavew te langun he etew ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà.

Egkeg̵iyan ku sikiyu he wey kew zà egkehedii te Megbevayà ke edtumanen niw is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne kinahanglan daan he lavew kew pa he metinumanen kenà is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey is menge Perisiyu.
Netuenan niw kes impenurù dengan diyà te menge lukes tew he indawey is kebpememunù; su is ebunù ne edhukuman te silut.

Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: minsan sikan is egkepauk dà te zuma zin, edhukuman daan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne sikan is edsulà te zuma zin te, ‘Wazè nu pulus he etew!’ ne egkeuwit sikandin diyà te husayen. Ne sikan is edsulaan din is duma zin he egkag̵i te, ‘Tulebung ka he wazè nu pulus,’ ne zait sikandin he egkeuwit diyà te hapuy te Impirnu.
Umba ke ziyè ke en te lama te Valey te Megbevayà su ebpemuhat ka ziyà te Megbevayà ne egketenuzan nu he zuen salè nu te zuma nu,

itag̵ak nu zè pa haazà is ibpemuhat nu ne beyai nu haazà is duma nu wey kew medhusey. Ne zutun ke ebpeked-uliey kew en te meupiya he g̵ehinawa, likù ka human ne leusa nu haazà is kebpemuhat nu ziyà te Megbevayà.

Ne emun duen etew he insumbung ke zin ne egkeuwit ka ziyà te hukmanan, meupiya ke ebpekidhusey ka kandin te kenè kew pa ebpekeetuvang te huwes. Su emun ebpekeetuvang kew en te huwes kela ke ipalad ka zutun te huwes diyà te pulis ne egkepirisu ka.
Ne kenà duwazuwa he zutun ka ebpekeubpà taman te egkeg̵empusan nu is multa kenikew.
Nezineg niw kes impenurù dengan he, ‘Kenè nu selselai is esawa nu.’
Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: ke zuen minsan hentei he maama he edtengteng dà te vahi he kenè din esawa ne egkeerig̵an en dutun, ne haazà is maama, nekesalè en dutun te esawa zin.
Ne emun iyan nu igkepenulayi is kewanan he mata nu, lug̵ita nu wey itimbag! Meupiya pa ke wazè nu mata, kenà ke igkeagbur ka ziyà te hapuy he Impirnu is tivuuk he lawa nu.
Emun iyan nu igkepenulayi is kewanan he velad nu ne tempeza nu wey itimbag. Meupiya pa ke wazè nu velad, kenà ke igkeagbur te Impirnu is tivuuk he lawa nu.
Impenurù daan dengan he emun duen maama he ed-engkezan din is esawa zin ne kinahanglan he veg̵ayi zin haazà is bahi te kemetuuzan he iyan tuus te kebpesuwayè dan.

Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: emun ed-engkezan te maama is esawa zin he wazà sikandin is maama selselai zutun te esawa zin, heini he maama, ne ebpekesalà su pinaag̵i kayi ibpesavut din he nekesalà kandin is esawa zin. Ne ebpekesalà daan is maama he ebpengesawa zutun te vahi he mid-engkezan te esawa zin.
Netuenan niw zaan kes impenurù dengan diyà te menge lukes tew he emun duen ibpenaad niw ziyà te Nengazen kenà egkehimu he kenè niw edtumanen. Kinahanglan he tumana niw.

Ne iyan kedì he penurù is: emun duen ibpenaad niw ziyà te minsan hentei, kenè niw ipengeluambit he medlanggà is renged niw he langit wey tanà ke kenè niw egketuman is lalag niw su is langit, iyan pinuuwà te Megbevayà
ne is tanà, iyan nesevukan te paa zin. Ne kenè niw zaan ipengeluambit he mezeeti is inged he Hiruselim ke kenè niw egketuman is lalag niw su iyan ed-ubpaan te lavew he hadì.

Ne minsan is ulu niw, ke zuen ibpenaad niw, kenè niw keg̵iya he mebmeputì is bulvul niw ke kenè niw egketuman haazà is impenaad niw su wazè niw g̵ehem wey mehimu is minsan sevaha zà he vulvul niw he mebmeputì, ne emun kenà, ne mebmeitem.
‘Uya’ zà ne emun kenà, ne ‘Wazà’ is keg̵iya niw. Su is minsan hengkey he lalag he egemiten niw te kedheg̵eta te menge penaad niw, diyà ebpuun te ki Setanas.

Netuenan niw zaan kes penurù dengan he ke zuen etew he nezeetan din is mata te zuma zin egkehimu he edèdeetan daan is kandin he mata. Ne emun duen nekezezaat te ngipen te zuma zin, egkehimu he edèdeetan daan is kandin he ngipen.

Ne iyan kedì he penurù keniyu is: kenà egkehimu he ebelesan ta is ebpesipala kenita, kekenà, ebpurungan ta. Ne emun edtebpien din is kewanan he enaping ta, egkeg̵iyan ta he egkehimu pa ke elin din edtebpien is divaluy.
Ne emun duen ebpenukut kenita ne edluwasen din is kemising ta, su iyan din ibpevayad, elin ta ibeg̵ey kandin is kumbalè ta.
Ne ke zuen sundaru he edteg̵elen ki zin ibpeuwit te uwiten din te sengekilumitru, ed-uwiten ta te zezuwa he kilumitru.
Ke zuen ebuyù, ebeg̵ayan ta; ne ke zuen edsambey, edsembayan ta.
Netuenan ta kes penurù dengan he is menge zuma ta, ebpurungan ta. Ne is menge kuntada ta, edtebeken ta.
Ne iyan mulà kediey he penurù is: ebpurungan ta is menge kuntada ta wey ebpenubtuvazan ta te meupiya is ebpesipala kenita.

Ne emun ebeelan niw heini ebpekeiring kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Su is Megbevayà, kenà iyan dà ebpesilaan din te andew is menge metazeng he menge etew, kekenà, elin daan is menge kenà metazeng. Ne kenà iyan dà is meupiya is ulaula zin ebeg̵ayan din te uzan, kekenà, elin daan is mezaat is ulaula zin.
Kenè niw isipa he edsuhulan kew te Megbevayà ke iyan dà ebpurungan niw is ebpurung daan keniyu; su minsan is menge menunukut te vuhis he limbung is ulaula zan, ebpurungan dan daan is ebpurung kandan.
Ne emun iyan niw zà idtetepian is menge emig̵u niw, hengkey is igkezelig̵i keniyu? Wazà, su minsan is menge etew he wazà med-azap te Megbevayà, ed-ul-ulahan dan is iring kayi.
Kinahanglan he meheg̵et is kebpurungi niw te minsan hentei. Su kes Amey tew ziyà te langit, utew meheg̵et is kebpurungi zin te menusiyà.”
“Kinahanglan he kenà iyan idsimbaha niw te Megbevayà su wey mezalig kew te menge etew. Su emun iyan heini ulaula niw, kenè kew edsuhulan keuzemà te Megbevayà he Amey tew ziyà te langit.

Ne emun duen ibeg̵ey niw ziyà te egkeayuayu kinahanglan he kenà iyan id-ul-ulaha niw zutun su wey mezalig kew te menge etew. Su iyan haazà baal te menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Ed-ul-ulahan dan haazà diyà te menge simbahan wey ziyà te kersada su wey mezalig sikandan te menge etew. Kenè niw lipati he tenged te nezawat dan en is kedelig̵a kandan te menge etew, wazè en egkezawat dan he ebpuun diyà te Megbevayà.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, ke zuen idtavang niw ziyà te egkeayuayu kinahanglan he kenà egketuenan te minsan menge zuma niw.
Kenè niw petueni te menge etew haazà is kebeg̵ey niw te tavang dutun te egkeayuayu, ne is Amey tew ziyà te langit, iyan dà ebpekeahà dutun ne iyan daan edsuhul keniyu.

Ne emun ed-ampù kew kenè niw iringi is menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Egkesuatan dan he mekehitindeg dan is ed-ampù diyà te menge simbahan wey ziyà te kersada wey maahà sikandan te menge etew. Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he nezawat dan en is kedelig̵a kandan te menge etew. Ne wazè en duma pa he suhul he egkezawat dan he ebpuun te Megbevayà.

Iyan, sikiyu, ke ed-ampù kew, med-ulì is kada sevaha ziyà te valey zin, ne medlelekeb wey kenà maahà, ne zutun med-ampù te Amey tew he Megbevayà he kenà egkeahà. Ne is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà ebpekeahà kandin ne iyan edsuhul kandin keuzemà.

Emun ed-ampù kew kenè niw g̵emita is mezakel he menge lalag he wazà menge pulus su iyan heini ulaula te menge etew he wazà med-azap te tutuu he Megbevayà. Iyan diyà te g̵ehinawa zan is: ebpemineg̵en te Megbevayà is ked-ampù dan emun utew melug̵ayad.
Kenè niw iringi sikandan su netuenan he zaan te Amey tew is egkinehenglanen te uman sevaha te sikitew te wazè tew pa vuyua.
Iringi niw heini ke ed-ampù kew:
‘Amey zey ziyà te langit,
berakat he tehuza te menusiyà
is ngazan nu,
berakat he medhadì ka te menusiyà,
berakat he tumana is egkesuatan nu
zini te tanà iring
te layun edtumana ziyà te langit.
Beg̵ayi key te egkeenen he egkinehenglanen dey g̵untaan;
peseyluwa key te menge salè dey
iring te nekepesaylu key te nekesalà kenami.
Ipekeziyù key kenikew te mezesen he penuley
ne ilikey key kenikew ki Setanas.’
Su sikiyu is menge etew, ke ebpeseyluwen niw is nekesalà keniyu, ebpeseyluwen kew zaan te Amey tew he ziyà te langit.
Iyan, emun kenè kew ebpesaylu te menge zuma niw he etew, kenè kew zaan ebpeseyluwen te Amey tew he ziyà te langit.

Ne emun edsalang kew egkaan su ebpengampù kew ziyà te Megbevayà, kenè niw ipetuusi pinaag̵i te kebuvuked niw iring te menge etew he egkesuat he mezalig sikandan te menge zuma he etew. Edrig̵urig̵u zan, ne kenè dan ebpendapug wey kenè dan ebpenuwat su wey metueni te menge etew he edsalang dan egkaan. Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he nezawat dan en is kedelig̵a kandan te menge etew. Ne wazè en duma pa he suhul he egkezawat dan he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
Ne sikiyu mulà, emun edsalang kew egkaan, pendapug kew wey penuwat kew

su wey kenà metueni te zuma he edsalang kew. Iyan dà egkesayud is Amey tew he Megbevayà he wazà duen ebpekeeles. Iyan sikandin ebpekeahà te ulaula nu minsan sebsevaha nu, ne iyan daan sikandin edsuhul kenikew.
Kenè niw tipig̵i is ketig̵eyunan dini te kelibutan su zini egkeketket te ipes wey edtengisen. Ne egketakew su egkeselezan is baley niw te tekawen.
Tipig̵i niw ziyà te langit kes ketig̵eyunan he iyan kes idsuhul te Megbevayà keniyu su zutun kenà egkeketket te ipes, wey kenà edtengisen ne kenà daan egketakew.
Ne zutun ke hendei is egketeg̵uan te ketig̵eyunan niw, dutun daan is gehinawa niw.
Is mata ta, ne iring te sulù kayi te lawa ta su emun merayag is ked-ehè ta,
Iyan, emun lakap ki,

Is uripen, kenà egkehimu he zezuwa is teg̵iuripen kandin. Su emun dezuwa is ebayàbayà kandin, edtehuzen din is sevaha ne egkepeukan din is sevaha. Ne emun kenà, ne egkeepesan din is sevaha, ne ebmahalen din is sevaha. Ne iring din ded daan emun iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu is ketig̵eyunan, su kenà egkehimu he mahal zaan diyà te g̵ehinawa nu is Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he kenè kew meseeng te egkeenen wey ed-inumen he igkeuyag niw. Kenè kew zaan meseeng te ugelingen he idsun-ud te lawa niw. Su mibeg̵ayan kew te Megbevayà te g̵ehinawa niw wey lawa niw he mahal utew; ne wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebeg̵ayan kew zin daan te egkeenen wey ugelingen?

Isipa niw is menge tagbis he ebpemenlayang. Kenè dan ebpemula; kenè dan edrag̵un; kenè dan daan ederengdeng. Ne minsan pa zutun ebpengelintau is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit te egkekaan dan. Ne iyan kew pe be is etew he lavew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà is menge tagbis.
Ne minsan sengemenu is kegkenug̵uni te etew te untung din, wazà minsan hengkey he paag̵i he egkesumpatan din te minsan deisey zà.
Ne maan is egkeseeng kew te ugelingen? Ahaa niw is menge kevukazan te sagbet. Kenè dan edterebahu; kenè dan daan ebpengavel.
Ne venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he minsan pa si Hadì Sulumun dengan is sepian utew wey nevantug, ne wazà mekesusuluwan is kezagwey te menge bisti zin te kezagwey kayi te menge kevukazan.

Is sagbet, wazè din bali; egkeehè ta g̵untaan, ne kenè en utew egkeug̵et ne egkeg̵angu ne ebinsulan. Iyan, ke edhimuwen te Megbevayà he mekempet minsan heini is menge sagbet, iyan kew pe be kenè din daan meveg̵ayi te igkevisti. Maan is utew zeisek is kedsarig niw kandin.
Ne tenged kayi, kenè kew meseeng wey megkag̵i te, ‘Hengkey is egkekaan tew, ne hengkey is ed-inumen tew, ne hengkey zaan is igkevisti tew?’
Iyan heini igkeseeng te menge etew he wazà medtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà. Iyan, is Amey tew he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, netuenan din he zaan he egkinehenglanen niw is iring kayi.

Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kinahanglan he iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is kebpahadì niw kandin wey is metazeng he ulaula he ebpeveelan din keniyu ne zutun ibeg̵ey zin keniyu is langun he egkinehenglanen niw.
Kenè kew meseeng ke hengkey is menge mereg̵en he egkeulaula niw te huziyan he andew su wey niw en heeyan isipa zutun te andew he egkehitavù en. Iyan dà isipa niw is guntaan en he egkehitavù keniyu.”
“Kenè kew medsawey te zuma niw ne kenè kew zaan edsewayen te Megbevayà.
Su is idsawey niw te zuma niw ne iyan daan idsawey keniyu te Megbevayà. Is kezekelà te idsawey nu te zuma nu, iyan daan kezekelà te idsawey kenikew te Megbevayà.

Sikew is layun edsawey te zuma nu, maan is edsawey ka te salà te zuma nu he iring dà te pesek he nekeahuk diyà te mata zin? Ne sikew, duen nu salà he iring kezekelà te vatang he nekevuta te mata nu ne ebpesegdanen nu.
Ne egkeg̵iyan nu pa sikandin he id-awè nu haazà is nekepesek kandin, iyan, nepesek mulà is kenikew he mata te vatang ne ebpesegdanen nu!
Utew tarù is ulaula nu! Ihuna nu iawà is batang he nekepesek kenikew ne human ka ebpekeahà. Ne zutun melemu nu zà igkeawà haazà is nekepesek te zuma nu.”
Penigudu kew vuyù diyà te Megbevayà ne ebeg̵ayan kew zin; penigudu kew pen-ahà ne ibpeturedu zin keniyu is ebpen-ahaan niw. Penigudu kew penelehuzan ne ebpuwasan kew zin.
Su is langun he ebuyù diyà te Megbevayà ebpekezawat. Ne sikan is ebpen-ahà, ebpeketuredu; ne sikan is ebpenelehuzan, ne ebpuwasan daan te Megbevayà.
Ne sikiyu is menge g̵inikanan, ke zuen ebuyuen te anak niw he egkeenen kenà egkehimu he vatu is ibeg̵ey niw.
Ne emun ebuyù keniyu te pait, kenà daan egkehimu he uled is ibeg̵ey niw.

Ne sikiyu is menusiyà he kenà memetazeng, emun meupiya is ibeg̵ey niw ziyà te menge anak niw, iyan pe be is Amey tew he Megbevayà diyà te langit kenà meupiya is ibeg̵ey zin diyà te minsan hentei keniyu ke ebuyù ziyà te kandin.

Is egkesuatan niw he ed-ul-ulahan te menge zuma niw ziyà te keniyu, iyan niw zaan ul-ulaha ziyà te kandan. Iyan heini hustu he kedtumana te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Iyan daan heini kes impenurù dengan te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà.

Diyè kew ikul te melig̵et he pultahan he idselang pehendiyà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan su meluag mulà is pultahan wey melemu he ed-ikulen is dalan he ibpehendiyà te Impirnu, ne mezakel he etew is ed-ikul zutun.
Melig̵et mulà is pultahan wey mereg̵en he ed-ikulen is dalan he ibpehendiyà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne mezelag dà is ed-ikul kayi.
Likayi niw is menge ebpeneuven kun te Megbevayà he tarù is ibpenurù dan. Henduen be te hustu sikandan he tumutuu te Megbevayà, iyan, ebpekezezaat is ibpenurù dan.
Egketuusan niw he teruen sikandan pinaag̵i te ulaula zan su is banag, kenà ebeg̵as te paras ne is seg̵à, kenà ebeg̵as te igira.
Is kayu he wazè din erat, meupiya is beg̵as din; kenà ebpemeg̵as te mezaat. Is kayu he zuen din erat, mezaat is beg̵as din; kenà ebpemeg̵as te meupiya.
Is kayu he mezaat is beg̵as din, ne ebpilayen ne ebinsulan.
Iring din ded daan is menge ebpeneuven kun te Megbevayà he tarù is ibpenurù dan su edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne egketuusan niw he teruen sikandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he mezaat.

Su zuen menge etew he ebpengumew-umew kedì te, ‘Nengazen, he Nengazen!’ Iyan, kenà langun te sikandan ebmehimuwen he mehedii te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsilut, mezakel is ebpehizuhizu zini te kedìey he egkag̵i te, ‘He Nengazen, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem nu neketagnè key, ne nengeulian dey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne mezakel is menge egkein-inuwan he nengehimu zey.’
Ne iyan tavak ku kandan dutun is: ‘Kenè ku sikiyu egkekilala. Sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula, awà kew kayi!’
Ne minsan hentei he nekezineg kayi te langun he sambag ku ne ebpezumdumahan din, iring sikandin te etew he uluwanen, su heini is uluwanen, diyà mebevaley te zivavew te zekelà he vatu.
Ne mibegyuwan. Mid-uzan te mereg̵es ne midalem is menge wahig ne utew mevendes is keramag, iyan, wazà merundus haazà is baley su ziyà benguna te zivavew te zekelà he vatu.
Ne is minsan hentei he ebpemineg dà kayi te sambag ku ne kenè din ebpezumdumahan, iring sikandin te etew he tulebung. Heini is tulebung, ne ziyà mebevaley te pantad.
Ne mibegyuwan daan; ne midalem haazà is wahig ne mibpengeramag te mevendes ne nerundus haazà is baley zin ne nepurung mewag̵ey.”
Ne nekepasad si Jesus te ebpenurù dutun. Ne neinuinu is mezakel he nengetig̵um dutun
su is kebpenurù din, kenà iring te kebpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan su zuen gehem mulà te penurù din.
Ne midtupang si Jesus ne utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma kandin.

Ne zutun, duen it-iten he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin. Ne heini is it-iten, midluhuzan din si Jesus ne migkag̵i te, “He Zatù, emun meupiya zà te g̵ehinawa nu netuenan ku he egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku.”
Ne midampà sikandin ni Jesus te egkag̵i te, “Utew meupiya te g̵ehinawa ku. Meulii ka.” Ne zutundutun nehanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.

Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Pemineg ka, Mama, kenè nu tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei, kekenà, pehendiyè ka g̵untaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka; ne tumana nu sikan is pemuhat he insug̵ù dengan ni Moises te it-iten, su wey metueni te langun he neulian ka iyan.”
Ne zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne te kedseled din dutun te inged, duen etew he kenà Hudiyu he kepitan te nenggatus he sundaru he mid-uvey ki Jesus
he egkag̵i te, “Datù, diyà te valey ku egkezeruwan is sulug̵uen ku. Minatey is divaluy he lawa zin ne merasey utew is egezamen din.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Edhendiyan a ne ebewian ku wey sikandin meulii.”

Ne midtavak haazà is kepitan te, “Kenà, Datù, su,” ke sikandin, “tenged te lavew ka kedì, kenà a zait he ebig̵atbig̵at pa maan kenikew he edhendiyà te valey ku. Utew ka mekeg̵eg̵ehem ne minsan ke egkag̵i ke zà te, ‘Meulii sikandin,’ ne egkeulian en is sulug̵uen ku.

Netuenan ku heini su iring te zuen ebayàbayà kedì, ne zuen daan menge sundaru he ebeyveyaan ku. Ne edsug̵uen ku is sevaha he medhipanew ne edhipanew en. Ne edtewag̵en ku is sevaha he medhendini ne edhendini en; ne edsug̵uen ku zaan is sulug̵uen ku ke zuen ebpeveelan ku ne ebeelan din en. Ne iring din ded daan diyan te kenikew su is egkeg̵iyen nu ne egkehimu en.”
Ne te nezineg ni Jesus heini, ne utew neinuinu ne ke sikandin diyà te menge etew he nemenduma kandin te, “Wazè ku pa meuma is etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he iring kayi he utew mezesen is kedtuu zin.

Ne kenè niw lipati heini is egkeg̵iyen ku he mezakel he etew he kenà menge Hudiyu he ziyà ebpemuun te meziyù, diyà te zapit te edsilaan wey ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan, ne ebpekidtug̵en dan keuzemà ki Abraham wey ki Isaak wey ki Hakub diyà te ginhedian te Megbevayà.

Iyan, mezakel zaan he kevuwazan ni Israyil he midteg̵enahan pezem te Megbevayà te ginhedian din, iyan, igketimbag sikandan diyà te merusirem he utew meziyù te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà. Ne ebpemekekulahì dan is ebpemekengingitel he utew zan ebpemekedsendit.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus kes kepitan te, “Ulì ka; ne sumalà is midtuuwan nu iyan daan ed-ul-ulahan ku.” Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is sulug̵uen kayi te kepitan.
Ne midhendiyà si Jesus te valey ni Pedro ne zutun neehè din is enug̵ang he vahi ni Pedro he edetengen ne kenè en ebpekeenew.
Ne midampà ni Jesus is belad dà dutun te meritan ne zutundutun neulian. Ne mid-enew haazà is meritan ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.

Ne hein mahapun dutun duen nemenelavuk ki Jesus he mezakel he menge etew he ebpen-uwit te mezakel he ebpenlelungen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne mibpemewian ni Jesus sikandan pinaag̵i zà te lalag din ne nengeulian en sikandan. Ne mibpemewian din daan is langun he nengezeruwan ne nengeulian.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su egketuman dutun kes netagnà dengan ni Esaias he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, he egkag̵i te,
“In-awè din is menge zaru tew
ne mibewian din is menge ebpenggezamen tew.”
Ne sevaha he andew zutun naahà ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew he nengetig̵um. Ne migkeg̵iyan din is menge sumusundan din te, “Edhendiyè kiw te zehipag.”
Ne zutun mid-uvey kandin is sevaha he menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, “He Menunudlù, eduma a kenikew minsan hendei ka ebpevayà.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Is laku ne zuen surung he egkeubpaan din, ne is tagbis, duen din salag, iyan, siak is migeraran te Kakey te Menusiyà, minsan hendei e zà memekehizegà su wazà ed-ubpaan ku.”

Ne zutun duen sevaha he sumusundan ni Jesus he migkag̵i te, “Datù, ed-ulì e zè pa su kenè e pa ebpekezuma kenikew taman te kenè pa egketapus is umur te amey ku. Ne emun igkeleveng ku en ne human a eduma kenikew.”
Ne midtavak dutun si Jesus te, “Kenà, su iyan edleveng te menge minatey sikan is wazà mekezawat te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, sikew mula, duma ka kediey.”
Ne zutun, mid-untud si Jesus te zekelà he avang ne miduma kandin is menge sumusundan din.
Ne hein diyè dan en te lawed, ne midtekewtekew mebpengeramag te utew mevendes ne egkeselikuvungan en te vag̵el haazà is avang. Iyan, nekelipezeng dutun si Jesus.
Ne mid-uvayan sikandin te menge zuma zin su ebpukawen dan. “Tevangi key, Datù,” ke sikandan, “su egkelavu en heini is avang ne egkengeg̵erè kiw en.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus, “Maan is egkehandek kew? Maan is kenè kew ebpekesarig kediey?” Ne mid-enew si Jesus ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is keramag wey haazà is menge vag̵el he med-engked dan. Ne zutun mibmelinew utew.
Nengeinuinu is langun he menge zuma zin. “Hengkey he etawa heini?” ke sikandan, “su minsan is keramag wey menge vag̵el ne ebpemineg kandin!”

Ne nekezunggù dan diyà te zehipag te ranew diyà te tanà he sakup te inged he Gedara. Ne zuen midsinug̵ung ki Jesus dutun he zezuwa he etew he ziyà ebpuun te menge surung te pangpang he penlevengà. Midsuukan haazà is dezuwa te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpekekaid ne tenged kayi egkengehandek is menge etew he ebayà dutun.
Ne mibensag̵an dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, “Sikew is Anak te Megbevayà, edsilutan key ve kenikew te wazè pa meuma is midtelaan he timpu?”
Ne zutun te uvey, duen mezakel he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal.
Midhangyù ki Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ke sikandan te, “Emun edsegseg̵en key kenikew, tug̵uti key he mekesuuk key keniyà te menge vavuy.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Egkehimu.” Ne mid-awè dan ne midsuukan dan haazà is menge vavuy. Ne is langun he menge vavuy, nemelelag̵uy zan petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendig̵an ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew zutun ne nengelened dan maamin.

Ne zuen menge etew he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy, ne nemenhendiyè dan te inged is ebpemelelag̵uy ne midtudtulan dan is menge etew ke hengkey is nehitavù duen te midsuukan te mezaat he mulin-ulin wey kes menge vavuy.
Ne hein netuenan heini te menge meg̵inged mibeyaan dan si Jesus. Ne hein neuma zan, midhengyuan dan he med-awà sikandin dutun te inged dan.
Ne zutun mid-untud en maan ensi Jesus te avang ne midlikù diyà te zehipag. Ne mid-ulì diyà te inged din.

Ne nemekeuma is menge etew he ed-uwit diyà te ki Jesus te minatey is divaluy he lawa zin he ziyà ipehizeg̵à te zuyanà he ebintingen. Hein nesavut ni Jesus he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeg̵iyan din haazà is minatey is divaluy he lawa te, “Mama, mebmeupiya is gehinawa nu, su nepesaylu en is menge salè nu.”
Ne zuen dutun menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan; ne te kegkezineg̵a zan dutun, neisip dan he utew zekelà is supak ni Jesus te Megbevayà.
Ne nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan te, “Maan is ed-isip kew te mezaat he iring keniyan?
Hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen, iyan be is kebpesaylu te salè din wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kandin?

Pinaag̵i te kebewii ku g̵untaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keg̵ehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà.” Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa te, “Sikew, Mama, enew ka; kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka.”
Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is maama ne mid-ulì.
Hein naahà heini te menge etew zutun, nengehandek dan ne midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te mibeg̵ayan din is menusiyà te keg̵ehem he iring kayi.

Ne mid-ewaan sikandan ni Jesus ne zutun te ibayè din neehè din is menunukut te vuhis he egngezanan ki Mateo he zutun he timpu ebpimpinuu ziyà te upisina zin. Migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Sunud ka kedì.” Ne zutun midhitindeg si Mateo ne midsunud ki Jesus.
Ne hein egkaan si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din diyà te valey ni Mateo, mezakel is menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge etew he mesinupaken he nemekeuma ne nemengaan duma kandan.

Duen menge Perisiyu he nekeahà dutun te menge etew. Ne migkeg̵iyan dan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, “Is egalen niw, maan is egkaan wey ed-inum duma te menge limbungan he menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken?”
Nezineg haazà ni Jesus ne midtavak sikandin pinaag̵i te sempità, ke sikandin te, “Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebpevawì, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is duen din daru.

Susiya niw ke hengkey is kehulug̵an duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he egkag̵i te, ‘Kenè ku iyan egkesuatan is kebpemuhat niw, kekenà, iyan egkesuatan ku is kebpekedhihizuwè niw.’ ” Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeengked te ed-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is menge mesinupaken te Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun nekeuma ziyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu. Ne mid-insè dan te, “Is menge sumusundan nu, maan is kenè dan ebentayan is betasan tew he edsalang egkaan? Sikami mulà wey is menge Perisiyu, layun key edsalang egkaan wey zey mepurungi is ked-azap dey te Megbevayà.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Penenglitan, ke zuen eseweey kenà egkehimu he kenà edlipey is menge zuma te ebpengesawa ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa. Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawè en diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human sikandan edsalang egkaan. Iring din ded daan is menge sumusundan ku su te kemulu e pa zini te kandan, kenè dan edsalang egkaan.”

Iring din ded daan sikan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtag̵ù diyà te teleg̵uey te vinu he lundis te kambing, su kenà egkehimu he ziyà idtag̵ù te zaan he teleg̵uey su ebetu haazà is teleg̵uey ne egkeulaan is binu ne egkezeetan daan is teleg̵uey. Kinahanglan he is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, ne ziyà idtag̵ù te veg̵u he teleg̵uey. Ne zutun kenà egkezeetan haazà is binu wey haazà is teleg̵uey.”

Ne te kemulu pa zutun egkag̵ikag̵i si Jesus, duen nekeuma he sevaha he pengulu te menge Hudiyu. Ne zutun midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne midhangyù he ke sikandin te, “Minatey g̵eina is anak ku he vahi, iyan, emun ebayaan nu ne edepenetan nu te velad nu ne egkevanhew sikandin.”
Ne midhitindeg si Jesus ne miduma kandin, ne miduma zaan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus.

Ne hein diyè dan en te zalan duen mid-uvey he sevaha he vahi ziyà te iniyug̵an ni Jesus. Ne haazà is bahi, duen din daru. Sepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kegkevusbusi kandin ne kenà ed-engked. Ne egkeisip din he emun egkekevit din is minsan kumbalè dà ni Jesus, egkeulian en sikandin. Ne zutun nekevit din is sidsid te kumbalà ni Jesus.
Ne midlingì si Jesus ne neehè din haazà is bahi ne ke sikandin te, “Bayi, kenè ka mahandek; su umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì.” Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is bahi.
Ne midlaus dan is edhipanew ne midseled si Jesus diyà te valey zutun te pengulu. Ne hein neehè din is menge memumulalà wey nezineg din is meg̵urub tenged te egkengeg̵isaweg he menge etew,
ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus sikandan te, “Pemen-awè kew is langun. Wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng.” Ne mid-engitan dutun te menge etew si Jesus.
Ne hein nemen-awè en haazà is menge etew, ne midseled si Jesus dutun te rug̵u te vatà. Ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is batà.
Ne nevantug heini is neulaula ziyà te langun he menge siringan he menge inged dutun.

Ne zutun te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun, midtelukun kandin is dezuwa he lakap. Ne haazà is menge lakap, mid-umew zan ki Jesus is edhangyù te, “Kehizuwi key kenikew, su iyan ka kes kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David!”

Ne hein mid-ulì en si Jesus diyà te valey zin, nekeuma zaan haazà is dezuwa he lakap. Ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan te, “Edtuu kew ve he egkeulian ku is mata niw?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Uya, Datù, edtuu key.”
Ne zutun midampà ni Jesus is mata zan ne ke sikandin te, “Berakat he meulii kew tenged te kedtuu niw.”
Ne neulian is menge mata zan. Ne zutundutun nepuwasan is ked-ehè dan. Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan penudtula.
Iyan, te ked-awè dan dutun nasì dan mibantug si Jesus diyà te langun he menge siringan dutun he inged.
Ne zutun te wazè pa megenat haazà is menge lakap, nekeuma is menge etew he edumahan dan diyà te ki Jesus is maama he neemew su midsuukan te mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne mibewian heini ni Jesus, ne segugunà dutun nekekag̵i haazà is etew. Ne nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun, ne ke sikandan te, “Sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, sikan tew pa maahà is iring kayi!”
Iyan, migkag̵i is menge Perisiyu zutun te, “Is tekinan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, iyan mibeg̵ey kandin te g̵ehem wey zin mevewii is edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin.”

Ne neeneb ni Jesus is langun he menge inged dutun wey menge unayan. Mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun diyà te seled te menge simbahan dan wey impesavut din diyà te kandan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Nengeulian din is menge etew te minsan hengkey he zaru wey ebpenggezamen dan.

Ne kada zin egkeahà is mezakel he menge etew zutun, egkengehizuwan din sikandan su mezakel is menge seeng dan ne wazà ebpeketavang kandan. Iring sikandan te menge ayam he kerehidu he wazà ed-elima kandan.

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Mezakel pezem is edawat te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Iring sikandan te kamet he nelutuan en. Meluag heini is kamet, iyan, deisey kiw zà is ebpemenlegtey.
Iampù niw ziyà te Nengazen he sug̵ua zin pa zini te kamet din is duma pa he ebpekelegtey.”

Ne midtig̵um ni Jesus diyà te kandin is menge sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, ne mibeg̵ayan din sikandan te g̵ehem wey zan meulii is edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, wey zan daan mevewii is minsan hengkey he zaru wey ebpenggezamen te menge etew.
Iyan heini menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan he migeraran ni Jesus he epustul,
Ne zutun daan si Felipe, si Bartolomeo, si Tomas, si Mateo he iyan kes menunukut te vuhis wey si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu. Duen daan si Tediyu,
wey si Simon is sevaha he sakup te upakat he Kenenista wey si Hudas kes tigKeriyuti he iyan mibpalad ki Jesus diyà te menge Hudiyu.
Impehipanew ni Jesus heini is sepulù wey zezuwa. Ke sikandin te, “Kenè kew hendiyà te menge inged te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu wey ziyà te menge inged te Semarya.
Diyè kew zà penudtul te menge zuma tew he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Iring sikandan te menge kerehidu he nengetazin.
Ipesavut niw kandan he meg̵aan en edhadì te menusiyà is Megbevayà.

Bewii niw is egkengezeruwan, benhawa niw is ebpatey, bewii niw is menge it-iten wey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Sikan is nezawat niw he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà ne wazè din peveyazi keniyu, ne kenè niw zaan peveyazi zuen te edtevangan niw.
Kenè kew med-uwit te vulawan wey selapì wey minsan menge sintabus.
Kenè kew zaan med-uwit te sundang. Is ed-ilisan he sepatus wey kumbalà wey minsan tuked, ne kenè kew med-uwit. Su is sulug̵uen, ibeg̵ey ziyà te kandin is kinahanglan din.

Ne emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged he zekelà wey minsan deisek he inged, ne pen-ahaa niw is etew he egkesuat he edawat keniyu,” ke si Jesus. “Ne ziyè kew pemenahik te valey zin. Ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te ked-awè niw zutun te inged.
Ne emun ebpemenahik kew ziyà te sengevaley, ne penubtuvazi niw is ed-ubpà dutun te, ‘Tuvazi kew te Megbevayà,’
su wey metuvazi sikandan te Megbevayà emun edewaten kew zan. Ne emun kenè kew zan igalewg̵alew, maambe en, su kenà sikandan edleusan edtuvazi te Megbevayà.

Ne ke zuen inged he wazà dutun egalewg̵alew keniyu, wey ke wazà ebpemineg te ibpesavut niw kandan, ewai niw sikandan wey tektaka niw is menge eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he tuus diyà te kandan he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.

Kenè niw lipati heini he lavew pa is idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te inged emun egkeuma keuzemà is andew te kedsilut, kenà te silut din dengan diyà te menge lalung he etew he meg̵inged diyà te inged he Suduma wey te inged he Gumura.

Pemineg kew; edsug̵uen ku en sikiyu ziyà te menge etew he kumekaid. Iyan, sikiyu, kenè kew mulà ebpekekaid. Iring kew te menge kerehidu ne sikandan iring te menge erimaung. Kinahanglan he med-andam kew, iyan, kenè kew mebpesipala te minsan hentei.
Andam kew su edekepen kew zan, ne ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan, ne ebug̵elen kew zan diyà te menge simbahan dan.

Ebpeg̵esen kew zan he mekeetuvang te menge gubirnedur wey menge hadì tenged te kedtuu niw kedì wey niw ikewali is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te kandan wey ziyà daan te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.

Ne emun ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan, kenè niw ikeseeng ke hengkey is egkeg̵iyen niw wey ke hengkey is paag̵i te kegkag̵i niw, su wey niw en egketuenan ke ziyè kew en te etuvangan dan su zutun ibeg̵ey keniyu is hustu he egkeg̵iyen niw.

Su is egkeg̵iyen niw zutun, ne kenà menge lalag he ebpuun te keniyu he isip, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he midsug̵ù te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Ne heini is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebekà te menge vebè niw.

Su zutun he timpu zuen menge etew he ibpehimetayan dan is menge suled dan. Ne zuen daan menge amey he ibpehimetayan dan is menge anak dan. Ne zuen menge etew he egkuntedahan dan wey ibpehimetayan dan is menge lukes dan.
Egkuntedahan kew te langun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu. Iyan, sikan is edhamen te kedtuu zin kedì taman te ketepusan dutun te menge kemeresayan, ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne emun ebpesipelahan kew zan diyà te sengeinged, pelag̵uy kew pehendiyà te sevaha he inged. Ne venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he te kenè niw pa egkepasad is ebpeveelan ku keniyu ziyà te langun he menge inged te nasud he Israyil ne edlikù e en is Kakey te Menusiyà.
Sikan is ebpepenurù, kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin he edtehuzen kenà te ebpenurù kandin. Ne iring din ded is sulug̵uen su kenà sikandin egketahud he lavew te egalen din.

Umba, siak is egalen niw wey ebpenurù keniyu, kinahanglan he egkeiringan a keniyu. Su siak is egalen niw, emun egngezanan a te menge etew ki Endedaman, wey pe be kenà tuwas pa he mezaat is igngazan dan keniyu te menge sakup ku?
Iyan, kenè kew mahandek te menge etew su is ulaula zan he edtembunan dan, ebpekelepew zed su is minsan hengkey he kenè dan egkeg̵iyen, ibpemeg̵awag̵awa.
Is menge lalag ku he iyan kew zà nekezineg, ipenudtul niw ziyà te minsan hentei. Is idnaasnaas ku keniyu, isangyew niw ziyà te langun he menge etew.

Kenè kew mahandek te menge etew zà duen su iyan dà egkepatey zan is lawa niw; ne kenè dan egkepatey is gimukud niw. Iyan ikehandek niw is Megbevayà su egkepatey zin is lawa wey minsan is gimukud niw pinaag̵i te Impirnu.

Egkepemasa ta is dezuwa he zezeisey he tagbis te sengesintabus dà su utew minus is bali zan. Ne minsan pa zutun wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebpatey ne egkeulug diyà te tanà emun kenà egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Iyan, sikiyu, edlavew pa is ked-elimahi zin keniyu su minsan is menge bulvul te ulu niw, mibilang din en.
Umba kenè kew mahandek su lavew kew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin, kenà te utew mezakel he menge tagbis.
Sikan is egkag̵i ziyà te menge etew he iyan a egalen din, ed-engkenen ku zaan sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
Iyan, sikan is egkag̵i ziyà te menge etew he kenà a iyan egalen din, kenè ku zaan sikandin ed-engkenen diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
Kenè niw isipa he midhendini a te kelibutan su wey wazè en kesamuk te menusiyà. Wazà a medhendini wey zuen kelinew su tenged te kedhendini ku ebpekunkuntedahà is menusiyà.
Su tenged te kedhendini ku, egkuntedahan is maama te anak din he maama. Ne egkuntedahan is bahi te anak din he vahi. Ne egkuntedahan daan is bahi te ambey zin.
Ne iyan egkekuntada te etew is menge megeget he kezuzumahi zin.

Ke zuen etew he iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is amey zin wey iney zin kenà siak, kenà dait sikandin he egngezanan he sumusundan ku. Ne ke iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is anak din kenà siak, kenà daan sikandin dait he egngezanan he sumusundan ku.
Minsan hentei he kenà edsundan kedì ne kenè din edtiangen is krus din,

Sikan is egkenug̵unan din is untung din dini te kelibutan, nasì egkeawà diyà te kandin is untung din. Iyan, sikan is edtumanen din is menge sug̵ù ku, minsan ke iyan ibpatey zin, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà din pidtemanan.
Is etew he edawat keniyu, edawat daan kediey; ne is edawat kediey, edawat daan te Megbevayà he midsugù kedì.

Ke zuen etew he edawat te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà tenged te Megbevayà is ebpenaub dutun te midawat din, ebpekeambit haazà is etew te suhul te Megbevayà dutun te ebpeneuven din. Ne ke zuen etew he edawat te metazeng he etew tenged te metazeng is ulaula zutun te etew, ebpekeambit sikandin te suhul te Megbevayà dutun te metazeng he etew.

Ne kenè niw lipati he ke zuen etew he minsan sengetasa zà he wahig is ibpeinum din te minsan hentei he sumusundan ku, ne iyan ibpeinuma zin dutun is tenged te sumusundan ku haazà is ebpekeinum, ne kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan te Megbevayà. Ne minsan ke utew minus is pid-etawan dutun te sumusundan he ibpeinum din, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan.”

Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus heini is kedseyseya zin te menge sug̵ù din dutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, mid-awà sikandin dutun ne midhipanew su ibpenurù din wey ibpesavut din is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te menge siringan dutun he inged.
Ne ziyà te pirisuwan midtudtulan si Juan Megbebewtismu mehitenged te menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesu Kristu, ne midsug̵ù ni Juan is menge sumusundan din wey zan meinsai si Jesus.
“Keleduwi key,” egkag̵i haazà is menge sug̵ù ni Juan diyà te ki Jesus, “ke iyan ke ve kes migkag̵i ni Juan he netagnà is kebpekeuma zin dini te kelibutan wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten dey.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Likù kew en ziyà te ki Juan ne tudtula niw ziyà te kandin is nengeehè niw he mid-ulaula ku wey is nengezineg niw he egkeg̵iyen te menge etew. Iyan niw tudtula kandin he tenged kedì ebpemekeehè en is menge lakap, ne ebpemekehipanew en is menge piang, nengeulian en is menge it-iten wey ebpemekezineg en is menge vengel. Mibanhew ku is nemematey wey impesavut ku ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Utew deyzey is etew he kenà eduwazuwa he iyan a sikan is midsug̵ù te Megbevayà.”

Ne hein nekeg̵enat en haazà is menge sumusundan ni Juan, migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te mezakel he nengetig̵um he menge etew, ke sikandin te, “Hein midhilesung niw si Juan diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, hengkey is inhilesunga niw kandin? Iyan be ed-ahaan niw is etew he iring te sagbet he egkengewaleng te keramag? Kenà iyan haazà su kenà egkehalinhalin is gehinawa ni Juan.
Midhilesung niw ve is etew he utew meupiya is bisti zin? Kenà daan, su is menge etew he iring dutun, diyè dà egkaahà te turug̵an te hadì.
Ne hengkey is inhilesunga niw? Ed-ehè kew ve te etew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà? Iyan haazà tutuu he ed-ahaan niw su ebpeneuven iyan si Juan. Iyan, kenà te ebpeneuven dà

su pinaag̵i ki Juan netuman en kes netagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà su migkag̵i zutun is Megbevayà te, ‘Iyan heini kes etew he edsug̵uen ku. Ibpehuna ku sikandin kenikew wey zin mehig̵ewani is ibayè nu.’ ”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Tentenuzi niw he si Juan Megbebewtismu, wazè pa etew he nekelavew kandin, iyan, ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, is minsan hentei he etew zutun he ebpezumazuma te Megbevayà, minsan utew minus is pid-etawan din, ne lavew pa kenà si Juan guntaan.
Puun pa zutun te kebpesavut ni Juan taman en guntaan, is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, edteg̵el he mekehadì, ne edteg̵el zaan is menge etew wey zan mekepehadì kandin.
Su is kedhadì te Megbevayà, netagnà dengan te langun he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà wey netagnà daan ni Moises su egkeehè ta ziyà te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin din. Ne netagnà daan ni Juan.
Ne emun edtuu kew te impesavut dan, egketuenan niw he iyan en si Juan si Elias su midtagnè dan is kebpekelikù ni Elias.
Heini is nezineg niw, sevuta niw.
Sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, iyan ebpetug-iringan ku keniyu is menge vatà. Su is menge vatà, ne ebpememimpinuu zan diyà te tiyenggiyan is ebevaleyvaley. Ne ebpeum-umawè dan is egkag̵i te,
‘Edtemburan dey sikiyu ne kenè kew edsayew, ne edlelendag key ne kenè kew zaan edtampu.’
Su hein neehè niw si Juan is edsalang egkaan ne kenà daan ed-inum te vinu, ne migkag̵i niw he midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, wazà a medsalang megkaan ne mid-inum a mulà te vinu ne neinuinu kew ne migkag̵i niw he vuleg̵uk a wey pereinum te vinu. Ne ke sikiyu zaan he emig̵u a te menge lalung he etew iring te menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken. Iyan,” ke si Jesus, “egketuusan ta he utew metau is Megbevayà pinaag̵i te egkeveelan din.”
Ne zutun, is menge meg̵inged kayi te menge inged he mibpaahaan ni Jesus te mezakel he egkengein-inuwan, midsawey zin su wazè dan iniyug̵i is memezaat he ulaula.

Ne ke sikandin te, “Mekehizuhizu kew is menge tigKurasin! Mekehizuhizu kew zaan is menge tigBitsayda. Su is menge egkein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw te menge Hudiyu, angin ke midhimu ku heini ziyà te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he kenà menge Hudiyu is meg̵inged dutun, su nekekukumbalè dan en pezem te saku ne nepen-evuwan dan is ulu zan he tuus te ed-iniyug̵an dan en is memezaat he ulaula.
Kenè niw lipati he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is idsilut din keniyu kenà te menge etew ziyà te Tiru wey Sidun.

Ne sikiyu zaan,” ke si Jesus, “is menge tigKepirnaum, iyan egkesuatan niw pezem is delig̵a kew te minsan hentei, iyan, igketimbag kew ziyà te Impirnu. Su is egkengein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw, angin ke ingkepaahà dengan diyà te menge tigSuduma su kenà egkezezeetan te Megbevayà is inged dan, ne kemulu pa pezem guntaan.
Kenè niw lipati he keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is silut din keniyu kenà te menge tigSuduma.”

Ne zutun mid-ampù si Jesus he egkag̵i te, “Amey ku he Nengazen te langit wey tanà, dekelà is kebpeselemati ku kenikew su is in-eles nu wey kenà mesavut te menge uluwanen wey uvag en memetau, impesavut nu en diyà te menge etew he wazè dan menge hanew.
Umba ebpeselematan ku su midhimu nu heini te iring kayi tenged te iyan egkesuatan nu tenged te g̵ag̵ew nu.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, “Is minsan hengkey, insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Wazà nesayud kedì te Anak te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan dà is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne wazà daan nesayud te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan e zà is Anak din wey sikan is menge etew he mibpengelinteuwan ku he mesayud dan kandin.
Hendini kew te kediey, sikiyu is langun he nengeveley tenged te ked-uwit te menge meveg̵at he ulaula su ibpehimeley ku sikiyu.
Beeli niw is idsug̵ù ku keniyu ne pepenurù kew kedì ne ebpekehimeley kew su kenà a eengeren ne kenà a ebpenlupig te minsan hentei.
Is kedì he idsug̵ù keniyu, melemu; ne kenà mereg̵en is ebpeveelan ku keniyu.”

Ne wazà utew meug̵et dutun, ne andew he Sebadu. Ne iyan haazà he andew, insug̵ù dengan te Megbevayà te menge Hudiyu he wazà etew he ibpevaal zutun te andew su iyan Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne zutun he andew ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Ne zutun egkengevitil is menge sumusundan din ne mibpengetu zan te menge trigu ne migkaan dan is beg̵as dutun.

Ne naahà haazà te menge Perisiyu ne migkeg̵iyan dan si Jesus te, “Ahaa nu is menge sumusundan nu su edsupaken dan is insug̵ù kenitew te Megbevayà su maan is midlegtey zan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin, nengevitil zan.

Ne wazà sikandin mekesalà minsan te midseled diyà te Valey te Megbevayà ne sikandin wey is menge sakup din, migkaan dan is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne supak te kesug̵uan haazà is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat.

Kenà daan egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat ni Moises he is menge memumuhat diyà te Valey te Megbevayà, emun Andew te Kedhimeley kenè dan edhimeley, ne minsan pa zutun kenè dan ebpekesalà.
Tutuu heini is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he zuen nekeuma kayi te keniyu he lavew pa kenà is Baley te Megbevayà.

Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he egkag̵i te, ‘Kenà iyan mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku is menge pemuhat niw, kekenà, iyan is kegkehizu niw te zuma niw.’ ” Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ke hustu is kedsevuta niw kayi te ingkesurat, wazè niw g̵eina mesewayi is wazè din salà.
Su siak is migeraran he Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keg̵ehem te egkag̵i ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley.”
Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun, ne midhendiyà te sevaha he simbahan.

Ne zutun te seled te simbahan, duen etew he minatey is menge ug̵at te zivaluy he velad din. Duen daan dutun menge etew he ebpen-ahà te paag̵i he ikesumbung dan si Jesus he nekesupak te kesug̵uan. Ne mid-insaan dan sikandin te, “Emun Andew te Kedhimeley, ke ebewian ta is egkezeruwan wey meulii, ebpekesupak ki ve te kesug̵uan?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ke zuen kerehidu te minsan hentei kenitew ne egkeulug diyà te vitu te Andew te Kedhimeley, kenà egkehimu he kenè din igaun puun dutun te vitu minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.
Ne is etew, lavew pa he mahal kenà te kerehidu. Ne tenged dutun kenè ki ebpekesupak te kesug̵uan ke edtevangan ta is etew minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.”

Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he minatey is menge ug̵at te zivaluy he velad din te, “Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu.” Ne migketeng dutun te etew is belad din ne zutundutun neulian haazà he wazà pigeyanan din iring dutun te zivaluy he velad din.
Ne mid-awà dutun is menge Perisiyu ne mibpelelelag̵è dan ke hengkey is paag̵i he mehimu zan he mepatey si Jesus.
Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus is ed-isipen dutun te menge Perisiyu, mid-awà sikandin dutun, ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma kandin. Ne neulian din is langun dutun he nengezeruwan,
ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan he kenè dan tudtula te zuma haazà is mid-ulaula zin.
Umba nekag̵i zin heini su egketuman sikan is Lalag te Megbevayà he netagnà dengan ni Esaias he edhenduen te,
“Iyan heini sulug̵uen he pinilì ku.
Iyan sikandin utew ku minahal ne utew ku egkesuati is menge vaal zin.
Ebpeulinan ku sikandin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin,
ne is metazeng he kukuman ku,
edtudtulen din diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Ne kenà sikandin ebpekidlawan;
kenà daan ebpemensag;
kenà daan egkezineg sikandin he edikursu ziyà te menge kersada te inged.
Kenè din edlekaan is meluya is kedtuu zin kandin.
Su edtevangan din is minsan hentei,
minsan sikan is deisek is kedsarig din kandin.
Kenà ed-engked ebpenudtul taman te ebpekeeneb diyà te minsan hendei is metazeng he ulaula.
Ne ebpekesarig kandin is menge etew
ziyà te langun he menge nasud.”

Ne zutun duen nemekeuma he menge etew he zuen miduma zan he maama he nelakap wey neemew tenged te midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne mibewian haazà ni Jesus ne segugunà nekekag̵i wey nekeahà.
Nengeinuinu is mezakel he menge etew zutun ne ke sikandan te, “Kela ke iyan sikandin kes netagnà he kevuwazan ni Hadì David.”

Ne zuen menge Perisiyu zutun ne hein nezineg dan haazà migkag̵i zan te, “Umba zuen gehem din he ebpekeulì te edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin su iyan mibeg̵ey kandin te g̵ehem si Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.”

Iyan, nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Ke zuen hadì, ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din, meg̵aan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì. Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengevelayan ne emun kenà ne sengezetuan, ne ebpekungkuntedahà haazà is menge sakup dutun ne egkevengkag haazà is edetuan din.
Umba, ke pinaag̵i te g̵ehem ni Setanas egkezaag ku is gehem ni Setanas, egketebek din bes is menge sakup din ne egkezezeetan din is gehem din.

Emun iyan ibpenegseg ku te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is gehem he ebpuun diyà te ki Setanas ne hendei ves ebpuun is gehem te menge zuma niw he ebpenegseg te mezaat he mulin-ulin? Pinaag̵i te menge ulaula te menge sumusundan niw egketuusan he nengesayep kew.
Su heini is gehem ku te kebpemug̵ew te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ziyà ebpuun te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he Megbevayà. Ne pinaag̵i kayi egketuusan he iyan en heini sikan is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà.
Sikan is kenè ku zuma, kuntada ku; sikan is kenà edtavang kedì, edsanggen kediey.
Umba, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he egkepesaylu pa is etew te minsan hengkey he salè din wey minsan hengkey he mezaat he egkeg̵iyen din, iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, kenà egkepesaylu.
Sikan is edsumpalit kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, egkepesaylu pa; iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkepesaylu te wazè din pidtemanan.
Is kayu he wazè din erat, ne meupiya is beg̵as din. Ne is kayu he zuen din erat, ne mezaat is beg̵as din. Egkekilala is kayu pinaag̵i te veg̵as din.
Iring din ded daan kayi te keniyu. Wazà meupiya he egkekag̵i niw su memezaat is ulaula niw. Iring kew te menge uled su ebpekekaid kew! Is diyà te g̵ehinawa te etew, iyan edlepew ziyà te vèbè din.
Is etew he meupiya is ulaula zin, ne meupiya zaan is kebpemèbè din. Is etew he mezaat is ulaula zin, ne mezaat daan is kebpemèbè din.
Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi, ed-insaan te Megbevayà is minsan hentei, ke maan is nekekag̵i sikandin te wazà pulus he menge lalag.
Su pinaag̵i te menge lalag he nenggawas diyà te vèbè niw ne zutun egkeahà keuzemà ke egkesilutan kew ve wey ke kenà.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i ziyà te ki Jesus is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey menge Perisiyu te, “He Menunudlù, ipeehè key kenikew te singyal.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, utew mezaat is menge ulaula niw. Wazè en diyà te gehinawa niw is kebmahala te Megbevayà. Maan is ed-ehè kew te singyal? Iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring duen te singyal he impeulaula zuen te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Jonas.
Su nekeseled si Jonas diyà te g̵etek te zekelà he pait seled te tetelu he andew. Ne iring din ded daan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpekeseled a ziyà te zizalem te tanà seled te tetelu he andew.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, edsewayen kew is menge etew g̵untaan te menge tigNinivi zengan su hein nezineg dan is penurù ni Jonas, mid-iniyug̵an dan is memezaat he ulaula zan. Ne g̵untaan duen ebpeneuven he lavew pa kenà si Jonas dini te keniyu, ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum edsewayen kew zaan duen te singyuda zengan he ziyà ebpuun te inged he Siba su utew meziyù is midhipenawan din te kebpemineg dà te penurù ni Hadì Sulumun te utew metau. Ne g̵untaan duen ebpenurù he lavew pa kenà si Sulumun dini te keniyu ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din.
Ke ed-awà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te etew he edlelungen din, diyà ebayà te memaza he tanà su ebpen-ahà te egkeubpaan din. Ne emun wazè din egkaahà,
egkag̵i si kandin te, ‘Edlikù a nasì diyà te neubpaan ku.’ Ne edlikù ne egkeehè din haazà is neubpaan din he wazà tag̵ù ne midtines en is menge vutang dutun ne nepurung melumpiyuwi.

Ne zutun edlikù edhipanew su ebpengakat te pitu he zuma zin he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he tuwas pa he memezaat kenà sikandin. Ne ed-ahuk dan ne ed-ubpè dan dutun te etew. Ne zutun ed-iseg pa ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dutun te etew kenà te nehuna he kebpekesavuk din. Iring dutun is egkeulaula te menge etew g̵untaan su ed-iseg ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dan.”
Ne te kemulu pa ebpekidlalag si Jesus dutun te menge etew, nekeuma is iney zin wey menge hazi zin he maama. Ne edtag̵ad dan ki Jesus diyà te g̵awas su zuen egkeg̵iyen dan kandin.
Ne migkeg̵iyan si Jesus te etew zutun te, “Ahaa nu is iney nu wey menge hazi nu zutun su zuen dan kun egkeg̵iyen kenikew.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Duen ku pa ibpaahà keniyu he iney ku wey menge suled ku.”
Ne zutun intezù din is menge sumusundan din te migkag̵i te, “Heini zed is iney ku wey menge suled ku.
Su is minsan hentei he edtuman te egkesuatan te Amey tew he ziyà te langit, iyan daan iney ku, menge suled ku he maama, wey suled ku he vahi.”
Ne zutun he andew mid-awà si Jesus diyà te valey, ne midhendiyà te ranew ne mibpinuu ziyà te veyvey zutun.
Ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he midtig̵um diyà te kandin. Ne g̵eina te utew zan mezakel, mid-untud si Jesus te avang ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne is menge etew, diyè dan dà te veyvey is ebpememineg kandin.
Ne zutun mezakel is impenurù din kandan pinaag̵i te menge sempità.
Ke sikandin te, “Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula.
Ne zutun te kebpemula zin duen benì he nengeulug diyà te zalan, ne heini migkaan te menge tagbis.
Ne zuen daan benì he nengeulug ne nemekeuntud diyà te menge vatu he utew zà menipis is tanà he nekeapid dutun te menge vatu. Ne haazà petuluy zà midtuvù su menipis haazà is tanà.
Asal hein mid-andew, neg̵angu petuluy haazà is menge pinemula su mevavew zà is nesenevan te zalid dan.
Ne zuen daan benì he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zug̵iyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne mibmemelayat heini is sagbet ne mibpengulembezan dan haazà is pinemula.

Ne zuen daan benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne nemeg̵as mulà heini. Duen dutun menge pinemula he mibeg̵as te tigketluan. Ne zuen daan dutun menge pinemula he mibeg̵as te tigkeneman. Ne zuen daan dutun pinemula he mibeg̵as te tignenggatus.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.”
Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandan te, “Hengkey is ketezengan ke maan is migamit ka te menge sempità dutun te kebpenurù nu te menge etew?”
Ne midtavak kandan si Jesus te, “Sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, impesavut en keniyu te menge sumusundan ku, iyan, is duma he menge etew, id-eles heini kandan.

Su is etew he neketuu wey zuen kedsavut din, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà te kedsavut su wey mehustu is kedsavut din. Iyan, sikan is kenà edtuu, id-awà te Megbevayà diyà te kandin sikan is deisey he nesavut din.
Umba ebpenurù a kandan pinaag̵i te menge sempità. Su edtengteng dan, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeahà, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, ebpemineg dan, iyan, henduen be te wazè dan mekezineg su kenè dan edsevuten.
Netuman en diyà te kandan kes insurat ni Esaias he migkag̵i te Megbevayà su ke sikandin te,
‘Ebpurung dan ebpemineg, iyan,
kenè dan ebpekesavut.
Ebpurung dan edtengteng,
iyan kenè dan ebpekeahà.
Su heini he menge etew,
midmezesen is isip dan.
Edsebpengen dan is telinga zan,
edlipezengen dan is menge mata zan.
Su emun kenà,
ebpekeehè dan
ne ebpekezineg dan,
ne egkesavut dan
is hustu ne edsarig dan
kedì ne edlibriyen ku sikandan.’ ”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan, sikiyu mulà, dekelà utew is kelipey niw su metau kew ed-ahà wey metau kew ebpemineg.

Isipa niw heini he zengan mezakel is ebpeneuven wey menge tumutuu te Megbevayà he egkesuat pezem he meehè dan heini is egkeehè niw wey mezineg dan heini is egkezineg niw en, iyan, wazà itug̵ut kandan.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Pemineg kew wey niw mesavut is kehulug̵an kayi te sempità te keag̵i te etew he ebpemula.

Ke zuen menge etew he egkezineg dan is lalag mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè dan edsevuten, ne iring haazà te venì he ziyà mengeulug te zalan. Edlepew si Setanas ne ed-eg̵awen din haazà is lalag he nezineg dan.
Ne is benì he ziyà mengeulug te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg.
Iyan, kenà egkeheg̵et is kedtuu zan ne kenà egkeug̵et ke egkeumahan sikandan te samuk wey ke kemeresayan be tenged te kedewata zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.

Ne sikan is benì he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zug̵iyen is menge sagbet dutun, iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan nemekezineg duen is menge etew he ebpemineg, iyan, egkelipatan dan tenged te menge seeng dan kayi te kelibutan wey tenged te kegkesuat dan te selapì. Ne tenged kayi is Lalag te Megbevayà, kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan.

Ne sikan is benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, nesavut dan, ne ebpulus diyà te kandan. Is duma, ne ebpulus te zeisek diyà te kandan; ne is duma, ne ebpulus te malù dekelà; ne is duma, ebpulus te utew zekelà diyà te kandan.”
Ne impenurù daan ni Jesus is selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring te etew he zuen impemula zin he meupiya he pinemula ziyà te pemuleey zin.
Ne sengekezukileman dutun te nekelipezeng sikandin, nekeuma is kuntada zin ne midsewezan dutun te kuntada zin haazà is pemuleey zin te menge veg̵as te mezaat he pinemula ne human med-ulì.
Ne hein midtuvù haazà is meupiya he pinemula, midtuvù daan haazà is mezaat he pinemula.

Ne zutun, is menge sulug̵uen dutun te etew, midhendiyè dan te kandin ne ke sikandan te, ‘Datù, iyan tew impemula ziyà te pemuleey nu is meupiya he pinemula, ne hendei vuwa ebpuun heini is memezaat he pinemula?’
Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, ‘Iyan mibpemula zuen sikan is kuntada ku.’ Ne ke sikandan te, ‘Ebpemezuten dey ve wey ke kenà?’
Ne ke sikandin te, ‘Kenè niw zè pa, su kela ke mekeragkes sikan is memeupiya.

Ebpesegdanen tew zè pa taman te egkeuma is tirag̵un, ne human ku ibpepemazut te ebpemenlegtey is memezaat he pinemula, ne ibpepemagkes ku kandan su ebinsulan. Ne is memeupiya he pinemula, ibpezerengdeng ku mulà is beg̵as dan.’ ”
Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is selakew pa he sempità. “Is ked-iseg kebmahabet te edhedian te Megbevayà,” ke sikandin, “ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisek is lisu.

Ibpemula heini te etew ziyà te pemuleey zin ne ke edtuvù ne edekelà, egkehimu he iyan utew zekelà te langun he menge pinemula he edlumbayen. Iring kezekelà te kayu ne egkeletunan te menge tagbis ne egkeseselag̵an dan is menge subpang dutun.”

Ne impenurù ni Jesus kandan is selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Is kebmezakel te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te tapey. Su ke zuen bahi he ebaal te supas egkuwaan din is tapey ne idsahug din te sengebisin he erina. Ne edtulin haazà is erina,” ke si Jesus.
Ne heini is langun, ne impenurù ni Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew pinaag̵i te menge sempità. Minsan hengkey he impenurù din kandan, ne pinaag̵i te sempità.
Umba neveelan din heini su egketuman kes netagnà dengan te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Ibpenurù ku kandan is menge sempità.
Ibpenudtul ku kandan is in-eles dengan
puun pa te kedlimbag̵a te kelibutan
taman en guntaan.”

Ne zutun mid-ewaan ni Jesus haazà is mezakel he menge etew ne midseled sikandin diyà te valey. Ne is menge sumusundan din, midtelukun dan kandin, ne ke sikandan te, “Luwasa nu kenami ke hengkey is kehulug̵an te menge mezaat he pinemula ziyà te kamet he zuen te sempitè nu.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a sikan is etew he ebpemula te meupiya he pinemula.

Haazà is pemuleey, ne iyan heini is kelibutan; ne haazà is menge meupiya he pinemula, ne iyan heini is menge etew he ebpahadì te Megbevayà; ne sikan is menge mezaat he pinemula, ne iyan is menge sakup ni Setanas.
Ne sikan is kuntada te etew, ne iyan en si Setanas. Ne is tirag̵un, iyan is ketepusan he timpu; ne sikan is ebpemenlegtey, iyan is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is ebezuten dan he menge mezaat he pinemula he ebinsulan dan, iyan haazà egkehitavù keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu,
su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, edsug̵uen ku is menge velinsug̵uen ku ne id-awè dan puun te g̵inhedian ku is ebpemenuley wey is ebpemen-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne zutun idtimbag sikandan diyà te hapuy ne zutun ebpemekekulahì dan ne ebpemekengingitel zan tenged te utew zan ebpemekedsendit.
Ne zutun, is menge metazeng mulà, iring te andew is anlag dan diyà te g̵inhedian te Amey zan he Megbevayà. Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.

Is kedhadì te Megbevayà ne iring daan te vulawan he inggadung diyà te pemuleey. Duen etew he neketuredu zutun ne midtembunan din umani he utew sikandin nelipey ne mid-ulì ne imbelegyè din is langun he menge azen din ne midlikù dutun ne mibpemasa zin haazà is pemuleey.
Is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te etew he ebpemasa te menge utew meupiya he mahal he ebelieg̵en he egngezanan te perlas.
Ne ke egkeehè din is sevaha he perlas he utew pa mahal, ibelegyè din is langun he azen din ne ebpemesahan din haazà.
Ne is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te laya he intaan diyà te ranew wey mekeutel te minsan hengkey he kelasi te pait.

Ne emun mezakel en he menge pait is ebpekeahuk dutun, eguyuzen te menge etew haazà diyà te g̵eunan. Ne ebpinuu zan su ed-eramen dan is memeupiya zutun te pait ne id-ahuk dan diyà te menge ambung. Ne is kenà meupiya, idtimbag dan.
Ne keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu, iring kayi is egkeulaula su ebpenhipanew is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne edtepizen dan is menge lalung wey menge metazeng he etew.
Ne is menge lalung, idtimbag dan diyà te hapuy. Ne sikan is menge lalung, ne ebpekekulahì dan wey ebpemekengingitel tenged te utew zan ebpemekedsendit.”
Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, “Egkesavut niw ve heini is egkeg̵iyen ku?” “Uya, Datù, egkesavut dey,” ke sikandan.
