Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew he mebpememinuu zan diyà te tanà, ne migkuwa zin haazà is pitu he vuuk he supas ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà, ne zutun mibpenevìtevì din.
Ne zuen daan dutun pira he leg̵as he zeisek he pait ne hein nepeselematan din en insug̵ù din he ipemeg̵ey zaan haazà dutun te menge etew.
Ne pudu nengehantey haazà is menge etew he nemekekaan dutun. Ne is nesamà dutun te menge tinevì he supas wey pait, ne pitu he vinevey.
Menge heepat he libu is kezakel zutun te menge etew he nengehantey zutun.
Ne impemeulì ni Jesus sikandan. Ne zutun, si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, mid-untud dan te avang ne midhendiyè dan te tanà he Delmenuta.

Ne hein nekeuma zan en, midhendiyà te ki Jesus is menge Perisiyu ne mibpekidlewanè dan kandin. Migkeg̵iyan dan sikandin he mebpaahà sikandin te singyal he egkein-inuwan he tuus he sug̵ù sikandin te Megbevayà. Umba migkag̵i zan haazà su egezaman dan sikandin.

Ne haazà, inmesakit te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu, maan is egkinahanglan kew he mekeehè kew te egkein-inuwan he singyal ne human kew edtuu? Benar utew is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he wazà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu.”
Ne zutun mid-ewaan eni Jesus haazà is menge etew. Mid-untud dan en maan te avang su edlayun dan dutun te ranew.
Sengevuuk dà he supas is dutun te kandan su nelipat is menge sumusundan din he ed-uwit te supas he egkelutù dan.

Ne zutun duen sempità he impezineg kandan ni Jesus. Ibpesavut din he likayi zan is menge mezaat he vetasan te menge etew. Ke sikandin te, “Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Peresiyu wey is tapey te menge sakup ni Hadì Hirudis.”
Wazè dan mesavut he kenà iyan is tapey te supas egkeg̵iyen din ne mibpelelelag̵è dan te, “Iyan ingkeg̵iya zin kayi su wazè kiw mekeuwit te lutù tew he supas.”
Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is diyà te isip dan ne ke sikandin te, “Maan is egkesemukan kew te wazè kew mekeuwit te supas? Kenè kew pe bes ebpekesavut? Henduen te wazè niw isip.
Duen niw mata, iyan, henduen be te kenè kew ebpekeahà. Duen niw telinga ne henduen be te kenè kew ebpekezineg. Nengelipatan niw ve sikan is mid-ulaula ku?

Su hein mibpenevìtevì ku sikan is lelima he vuuk he supas he impekaan duen te lelima he libu he menge maama, pira he vinevey is nengepenù niw te nengesamà he menge tinevì he supas?” Ne zutun midtavak dan te, “Sepulù wey zezuwa.”

Ne mid-uman med-insà si Jesus te, “Ne hein mibpenevìtevì ku sikan is pitu he vuuk he supas he impekaan duen te heepat he libu he menge etew, pira he vinevey zutun is nengepenù niw te nengesamà he tinevì?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Pitu he vinevey.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Ne egkesavut niw human buwa he kenà supas is igkeseeng tew.”
Ne nekeuma zan diyà te inged he Bitsayda ne zuen menge etew zutun he mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus is sevaha he lakap. Ne midhengyuan dan si Jesus he zempaa zin haazà wey meulii.
Ne mid-ag̵ak ni Jesus haazà is lakap pehendiyà te g̵awas dutun te inged. Ne mid-ilevan ni Jesus is menge mata zutun te lakap ne midampè din, ne mid-insaan din ke zuen be egkeehè din.
Ne nenlangulangu haazà is lakap ne ke sikandin te, “Egkeehè ku is menge etew he henduen be te menge kayu he ebpenhiphipanew.”
Ne zutun mid-umanan dempaa ni Jesus haazà is mata zutun te lakap. Ne zutun mibpurung mebpenlangulangu haazà is lakap ne egkemelmeleg̵an din en is menge etew te ed-ahà su mibmeupiye en is mata zin.
Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he medtandang en med-ulì ne kenè en mebpenuluytuluy pa maan minsan dutun te inged.

Ne zutun, midlaus si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din su edhendiyè dan te menge inged he ziyà te uvey te inged he Sisarya Pilipus. Ne zutun te ziyè dan te zalan mid-insaan din is menge sumusundan din te, “Hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?”

Ne midtavak dan te, “Duen egkag̵i he iyan ka si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew ne zuen daan egkag̵i he iyan ka sikan is tipehuna he si Elias, ne egkag̵i is duma pa he sevaha ka zuen te menge tipehuna zengan he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun mid-insaan din sikandan te, “Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà is ked-isipa niw kediey?” Ne zutun midtavak si Pedro te, “Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà diyà te minsan hentei.

Ne zutun impesavut ni Jesus te menge sumusundan din is imbanglis kandin. Ke sikandin te, “Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mezakel is menge kemeresayan he ibpaantus kediey. Edsumpeliten a te menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge punuan he memumuhat wey te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a.”
Ne mibpurungan din seysaya is egkeulaula zin. Ne hein nezineg ni Pedro haazà, ne insivey zin si Jesus ne migkeg̵iyan din te kenà haazà egkehimu is egkeulaula ni Jesus.

Ne zutun midsineruwan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din ne migkeg̵iyan din si Pedro te, “Sikew is ed-iring ki Setanas, awè ka zini te kediey, su wazà diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te etew!”

Ne zutun impeuvey ni Jesus diyà te kandin is menge etew wey menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin te, “Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì, kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he egkesuatan he menge ulaula, ne tianga zin is krus din,

Su ke zuen etew he egkenug̵unan din is untung din, ebpatey g̵ihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he minsan ibpatey zin pa ne edsunud kedì wey edsangyew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.
Minsan ke maangken pa te etew is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Su wazà minsan hengkey he azen he igkeliwè din wey zin maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Is minsan hentei he igkeeled e zin wey igkeeled din is ibpenurù ku kayi te timpu he mezakel is menge etew he lalung wey edsumpalit te Megbevayà, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, igkeeled ku zaan sikandin keuzemà ke edlikù a he edumahan a te menge velinsug̵uen ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Tentenuzi niw heini: duen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman dutun te timpu he ibpaahà te Megbevayà is kedhadì din he utew zekelà is gehem din te kebayàbayà te menusiyà.”

Neiwas is heenem dutun he andew, ne miduma ni Jesus ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan ne midtekezeg dan te utew metikang he vuvungan he iyan dan dà. Ne zutun te kedtengtengi zan ki Jesus netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin.
Is kumbalè din ne henduen te ebpenerètà he vulan su utew meputì. Wazà meputì he pinìpian dini te kelibutan he ebpekeiring dutun.
Ne zutun netik-ew zan daan maahà si Elias wey si Moises he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pedro ziyà te ki Jesus te, “Utew meupiya te zini key. Ebeelan dey is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, wey sevaha is ki Elias,” ke sikandin.
Utew zan nengehandek umba wazà metentenuzi ni Pedro ke hengkey haazà is nekag̵i zin.
Ne neselikuvungan sikandan te g̵apun ne nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkag̵i he ebpuun dutun te g̵apun te, “Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal. Pemineg̵a niw is menge lalag din.”
Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu haazà is menge sumusundan, iyan, wazè en dutun egkaahà he zuma he etew su iyan dà si Jesus maan duma zan dutun.
Ne zutun te kedtupang dan, mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus te, “Taman te kenè e pa ebenhawen is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenè niw penudtula sikan is neulaula he neehè niw g̵eina.”
Ne midtuman dan haazà is lalag kandan ni Jesus, iyan, mibpein-inseey zan is tetelu ke hengkey is ibpesavut ni Jesus te kegkag̵i zin he ebenhawen sikandin.
Ne mid-insaan dan si Jesus te, “Maan is egkeg̵iyen te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan he edhuna edlepew si Elias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan ne human sikan is edhadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Tutuu iyan he edhuna ebpekeuma si Elias su ed-endamen din is langun, iyan, maan is netagnà dengan dutun te ingkesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mezakel is memerasey he egkeantus ku ne edsumpeliten a.
Netuman en sikan is kedlepew ni Elias, ne midrasey zan en sikandin sumalà is egkesuatan dan he ed-ul-ulahan diyà te kandin su iyan heini tagnà he egkevasa ta ziyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.”
Ne hein neumahan eni Jesus sikan is duma he menge sumusundan din, neehè dan he edlingutan te mezakel he menge etew ne ebpekidlewanà kandan is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan.
Ne hein naahà te menge etew he ebpelingguma si Jesus, utew zan nengeinuinu su wazè dan peebuta haazà is kebpekeuma ni Jesus, ne zutun migaanggaan dan medsinug̵ung diyà te kandin.
Ne nenginginsà si Jesus dutun te menge sumusundan din te, “Hengkey is egkelewenaan niw?”
Ne midtavak is sevaha zutun te menge mezakel he etew te, “Is anak ku he maama, ne kenà ebpekekag̵i su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne mid-uwit ku zini su wey mevewii.

Kada kedresaya kandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ebpekelagkut diyà te tanà ne eburvuraan is bèbè din ne ebpekekeg̵etket te menge ngipen din ne egkevidbid sikandin. Ne midhangyù ku is menge sumusundan nu he vewii zan, iyan, kenè dan egkehimu.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, wazè niw iyan kedtuu te Megbevayà. Utew ves egkeug̵et is kebpekiduma ku keniyu. Utew ves egkeug̵et is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu. Ihengkayi niw heeyan is batà.”

Ne zutun, mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is batà. Ne sikan is mezaat he mulin-ulin, hein neehè din dutun si Jesus, midhimu zin he mevidbid haazà is batà ne nekelagkut diyà te tanà ne nelilidlilid ne miburàburà is bèbè din.
Ne zutun mid-insaan ni Jesus is amey zutun te vatà te, “Sengemenu en kelug̵ayad is kegezama zin keniyan?” Ne midtavak haazà is amey zutun te vatà te, “Puun pa te zeisey pa sikandin he vatà.

Su is mezaat he mulin-ulin, layun din edhimuwa he mekeagbur ziyà te hapuy wey ziyà te wahig su edhimetayan din. Ne emun duen egkehimu nu, ne ikehizu key kenikew ne iawè nu ziyà te kandin heeyan is egezamen din.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Maan is id-insè nu ke zuen egkehimu ku? Ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey he ebuyuen te etew he zuen din kedtuu te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun, midhabet megkag̵i haazà is amey zutun te vatà te, “Edtuu a, iyan, deisek pa; heg̵eta nu pa is kedtuu ku!”

Ne naahà ni Jesus he ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge etew zutun, su zuen mezakel he ebpemelelag̵uy pehendutun, ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, “Sikew is mezaat he mulin-ulin he igkevengel wey igkeemew te menge etew, awè ka keniyan te edlelungen nu he vatà. Ne kenè ke en medlikù diyà te kandin!”

Ne zutun, haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin, impekulahì din haazà is batà ne midhimu zin he mevidvid ne mid-awè en diyà te kandin. Ne haazà is batà, ne henduen be te minatey su kenè en edwaleng, ne egkag̵i is menge etew zutun te, “Minatey en.”
Iyan, migewezan sikandin ni Jesus diyà te velad ne impeenew zin ne zutun midhitindeg haazà is batà.

Ne hein nekeulì ensi Jesus diyà te valey he midetengan dan ne wazà dutun duma he etew, kekenà, iyan dan dà, ne mid-insaan sikandin te menge sumusundan din te, “Maan is wazè dey meulii sikan is batà he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Is iring duen he mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne kenà igkepaawà ke kenà pinaag̵i zà te ked-ampù su wazà duma he paag̵i.”
Ne zutun mid-awè dan dutun ne midlaus dan ne ziyè dan mebayà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne kenà egkesuat si Jesus he metueni te menge etew ke hendei sikandin

su wey kenà sikandin mesemuki is ebpenurù te menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku ne edhimetayan e zan, iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a.”
Ne haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus, wazà mesavut dutun te menge sumusundan din, ne egkehandek dan daan he ed-insà kandin ke hengkey is ibpesavut din dutun.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te inged he Kepirnaum ne hein diyè dan en te valey, mid-insaan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, “Hengkey sikan is egkelewenaan niw g̵eina ziyà te zalan?”
Iyan, wazè dan medtavak su egkeeled dan su iyan egkelewenaan dan ke hentei is lavew kandan te menge sumusundan.

Ne zutun mibpinuu si Jesus ne impeuvey zin haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Is minsan hentei keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he isipa zin he utew minus is pid-etawan din ne ebpevayàbayà sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin.”
Ne zutun migkuwa ni Jesus is batà ne impeteliwazè din dutun te menge sumusundan din. Ne zutun midsepipi zin haazà is batà.

Ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan te, “Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì, edewaten din ne ebpurungan din is minsan hentei he vatà he iring kayi, ne nezawat e zin en daan. Ne is minsan hentei he edawat kediey, nezawat din en daan is Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kedi.”

Ne migkag̵i si Juan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Duen etew he neuma zey he ebewian din is menge etew he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne egemiten din is ngazan nu zutun te kebpemawì din. Ne midawey zey su kenà ebpekiduma kenitew.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Kenè niw zewaya is ed-ulaula te iring dutun su ke zuen etew he egkehimu zin is egkein-inuwan he vaal pinaag̵i te kegemita zin te ngazan ku, kenà sikandin leledayà egkehimu he kuntada ku.
Su is etew he kenè tew kuntada, ne edtavang kenitew.

Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he ebeg̵ayan kew zin te minsan sengetasa zà he wahig ne iyan din ibeg̵ayi keniyu is tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu te mibpilì te Megbevayà, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan te Megbevayà tenged dutun te mid-ulaula zin.

Iyan, ke zuen minsan hentei he pinaag̵i kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te minsan sevaha kayi te menge vatà he edtuu kediey, meupiya pa zutun he etew ke inhiket diyà te lieg din is zekelà he g̵elingan he vatu ne in-agbur sikandin diyà te lawed te zag̵at,

Emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is belad nu, tempaza nu heini wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan kenà te zezuwa is belad nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu he zutun kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Is menge tagkey zutun, ne wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.

Ne emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is paa nu, tempaza nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan kenà te zezuwa is paa nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu.
Is menge tagkey zutun, ne wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Ne emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is mata nu, lug̵ita nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke sevaha zà is mata nu ke edhedian ka te Megbevayà kenà te zezuwa is mata nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu.
Is menge tagkey zutun, wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su is langun, edlimusan te hapuy.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su meupiya is timus su ibmetaam te egkeenen, iyan, ke egkeawà duen te timus is taam din, wazè en paag̵i he ebpekelikù pa ebpekeuman is taam din. Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he iring te timus is menge ulaula niw

Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged he Kepirnaum ne midhendiyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zutun midrapas sikandin te wahig he Hurdan. Ne utew en maan mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin. Ne g̵eina te iyan layun ed-ul-ulahan din is kebpenurù, ne mibpenurù din daan haazà is menge etew.
Ne zutun, duen menge Perisiyu he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus su ebpengahaan dan is paag̵i te kedsumbunga kandin. Ke sikandan te, “Idtug̵ut be te kesug̵uan is ked-engkezi ta te esawa ta?”
Ne insà daan is intavak ni Jesus dutun, ke sikandin te, “Hengkey man is insug̵ù kenitew ni Moises he egkevasa ta zuen te kesug̵uan mehitenged te kebpekidsuwey?”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Intug̵ut ni Moises diyà te maama he suwayi zin is esawa zin, asal kinahanglan he ebeg̵ayan dutun te maama is esawa zin te kemetuuzan he midsuwayan din.”
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Umba intug̵ut ni Moises is kedsuwayi niw te esawa niw su g̵eina te edsumpeliten niw is penurù,
iyan, is Megbevayà, dutun te kedlimbag̵a zin te menusiyà, mibeelan din is maama wey vahi.
Umba ed-ewaan te maama is amey zin wey iney zin su ebpekidsevaha te esawa zin.
Ne sikandan is teleesawa, kuwinta kenè en maan dezuwa he etew, kekenà, nesevehe en sikandan.
Ne zutun haazà is dezuwa he etew he midsevaha te Megbevayà, kenè en egkehimu he ebpekedsuwey,” ke si Jesus.
Ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, hein diyè dan en maan te valey he midetengan dan, in-uman dan iinsà kandin is kebpekidsuwey te esawa.
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Ke zuen maama he ebpengesawa te sengevevahi su mid-engkezan din is esawa zin, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te mid-engkezan din he esawa.
Ne is bahi zaan, ke ebpekidsuwey te esawa zin ne ebpeesawa te sengememaame en, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te midsuwayan din he esawa zin.”
Ne zutun, duen menge etew he ebpen-uwit diyà te ki Jesus te menge zezeisey he vatà su ebpezepenetan dan te palad ni Jesus, iyan, midawey haazà te menge sumusundan din.

Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus haazà is mid-ulaula te menge sumusundan din, wazè din ikesuat, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà.
Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he kenà iring is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te kedsarig te zeisey he vatà, ne kenà egkehedian haazà is etew te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun midsekepu zin haazà is menge vatà ne mibpendepenetan din te palad din is menge purù dan ne midtuvazan din sikandan.

Ne zutun te edlaus en edhipanew ensi Jesus, nekesaut kandan is sevaha he maama ne midluhud haazà diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus. Ne ke sikandin te, “He Menunudlù, utew meupiya is menge ulaula nu. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Maan is egkag̵i ka he meupiya is ulaula ku te sebsevaha zà is meupiya is menge ulaula zin ne iyan is Megbevayà.

Netuenan nu en sikan is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin kenitew he iyan is: kenè ka mebunù; kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka mebpenakew; kenè ka medtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan; kenè ka medlimbung; ne tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu.”
Ne midtavak haazà is maama ziyà te ki Jesus te, “Menunudlù, is langun keniyan, mibenteyanan ku ne wazè ku mesupak puun pa te vatè e pa.”

Ne si Jesus, midtengtengan din haazà is etew su ingkehizu zin ne ke sikandin te, “Duen nu pa kurang; iyan is: ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he azen nu, ne is halin, ipemeg̵ey nu ziyà te egkengeayuayu ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan, likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey.”
Ne hein nezineg dutun te etew haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus, ne utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin ne mid-awà dutun is utew neseeng su zekelà is ketig̵eyunan din.

Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Utew mereg̵en te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin te Megbevayà,” ke sikandin.

Ne is menge sumusundan din, hein nezineg dan haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus, utew zan ingkeinuinu. Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Utew mereg̵en te etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii.
Kenè din egkehimu su melemu pa te langgam he kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te rag̵um kenà te sepian he etew te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii.”

Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge sumusundan din, mid-iseg is kegkeinuinu zan. Ne ke sikandan te, “Emun kenà egkehimu te sepian, ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”

Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandan ni Jesus te egkag̵i te, “Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew, iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he ibpaangken din is etew te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Ahaa nu man, mid-ewaan dey en is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Kenè niw lipati he is minsan hentei he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, is menge suled din he vahi wey maama, is iney zin wey amey zin, anak din, wey menge tanè din su edsunud sikandin kediey wey idsangyew zin is Meupiya he Tudtulanen,

haazà he etew, egkezawat din is kenenggatus edtekepa haazà is mid-ewaan din he menge valey, menge suled din he maama wey vahi, iney zin, menge anak din, wey menge tanà ne liyu zutun ibeg̵ey kandin keuzemà is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Asal te zini pa sikandin te kelibutan, egkeseg̵azan din is memereg̵en he pesipala kandin.

Mezakel is menge etew g̵untaan he henduen be te zekelà is pid-etawan dan, iyan, utew minus is pid-etawan dan keuzemà. Ne mezakel zaan is etew g̵untaan he utew minus is pid-etawan dan, iyan, keuzemà, dekelà is pid-etawan dan,” ke sikandin.

Si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, hein diyè dan en te zalan pehendiyà te inged he Hiruselim, midhunahuna si Jesus. Is menge sumusundan din, ne nengeinuinu ne nesemukan is gehinawa zan su maan is edhendiyà si Jesus te Hiruselim. Ne zuen daan menge etew he edtinundug ne nengehandek sikandan. Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din he medtapid dan ne impesavut din dutun ke hengkey is egkehitavù kandin.

Ke sikandin te, “Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te Hiruselim ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge punuan he menge memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Ne egkeuyun dan he ebpehimetayan a ne ibpalad e zan daan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ed-iringen e zan te velvelayen; ebpengilevan e zan, ne ebug̵elen e zan ne edhimetayan e zan ne seled te iketelu he andew zutun ebenhawen a te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is dezuwa he anak ni Sibidiyu he si Santiago wey si Juan, ne ke sikandan te, “He Menunudlù, duen dey idhangyù diyà te kenikew.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Hengkey is egkesuatan niw?”
Ne ke sikandan te, “Iyan edhengyuen dey he keuzemà ke ebpinuu ke en diyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì, ipepinuu key zaan, is sevaha ziyà te egkekewanan nu ne is sevaha ziyà te egkeg̵ivang nu.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is edhengyuen niw. Egkeantus niw ve is merasey he ibpaantus kedì? Ne egketigker niw ve is kemereg̵enan he ibpetigker kediey?”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Uya egkeantus dey.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Benar iyan he ibpaantus keniyu is iring te merasey wey is kemereg̵enan he ibpaantus daan kediey,
iyan, kenà a iyan ebpilì ke hentei is ibpepinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku wey ziyà te zapit te egkeg̵ivang ku su iyan dà ebpekepinuu zutun is etew he midteg̵enahan te Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne hein nezineg haazà dutun te sepulù he zuma zan he sumusundan, wazè dan ikesuat haazà is midhimu eni Santiago wey ni Juan.
Ne tenged dutun mid-umew ni Jesus sikandan langun ne ke sikandin te, “Netuenan ta he is menge punuan te menge inged, ne utew memevurut. Edatùdatù dà sikandan is layun ebmandar te menge etew.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenà egkehimu is iring kayi zini te keniyu. Ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he sulug̵uen sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin.
Ne emun duen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he iyan sikandin metikang te langun keniyu, kinahanglan he mebpekevavà sikandin te langun keniyu.

Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenè ku iyan inhendini te kelibutan is wey a metevangi te menusiyà, kekenà, wey a meketavang te menusiyà ne wey a zaan mebpehimatey su wey ku mevelukasi is mezakel he menge etew.”

Ne nekeuma zan diyà te inged he Hiriku, ne hein ed-awà ensi Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din dutun, utew mezakel is menge etew he nemenduma kandin. Ne zuen lakap dutun he mekelilimus he egngezanan ki Bertimeo he anak ni Timiyu. Ne ebpimpinuu haazà is mekelilimus dutun te kilid te zalan.
Ne hein nezineg din he iyan ensi Jesus he tigNeserit haazà is edsag̵ad, ne mibpekezag̵ing sikandin is ed-umew te, “He Jesus he kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!”
Ne midawey haazà is lakap te mezakel he menge etew zutun te, “Engked ka!” Iyan, nasì en ebpekezag̵ing sikandin he egkag̵i te, “He kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!”

Ne zutun te kegkezineg̵a ni Jesus kayi te ebpengumew, midteren sikandin ne migkag̵i te, “Ipehendini niw heeyan is etew.” Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan te menge etew haazà is lakap te, “Na, hitindeg kad su ibpehendiyè ke zin.”
Ne zutun midhitindeg sikandin ne midluwas din is divavew he kumbalè din ne midhendiyà te ki Jesus.
Ne mid-insaan sikandin ni Jesus te, “Hengkey is egkesuatan nu he ebeelan ku?” Ne midtavak haazà is lakap te, “Iyan egkesuatan ku is mekeahà is menge mata ku.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Is kedsarig nu kediey, iyan igkeulii te menge mata nu. Genat kad.” Ne segugunà nekeahà haazà is menge mata zutun te lakap ne miduma sikandin ki Jesus dutun te hipenawan din.

Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiruselim su ebpekeuma zan en diyà te inged he Bitpagi wey inged he Bitanya he ziyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, midsug̵ù ni Jesus is dezuwa te menge sumusundan din.
Ke sikandin te, “Hendutun kew te inged he egkeumahan tew ne emun ebpekeuma kew zutun, ne egkeehè niw is intagkes he asnu he nati he wazè pa meuntuzi; hekazi niw ne uwita niw zini.
Ne ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is egkuwaan niw haazà is asnu, keg̵iyi niw te, ‘Egkinehenglanen heini te egalen tew he si Jesus ne id-ulì dà kan.’ ”
Ne zutun migenat haazà is dezuwa, ne neehè dan haazà is nati he asnu ziyà te kilid te zalan su intagkes diyà te uvey te g̵emawan te sevaha he valey.
Ne hein edhekazan dan en, duen menge etew zutun he mid-insà kandan te, “Ebmenuwen niw heeyan? Maan is edhekazan niw?”
Ne haazà is dezuwa, midtudtul zan is impekag̵i kandan ni Jesus ne midtug̵utan sikandan dutun te menge etew.
Ne mid-uwit dan haazà is nati ziyà te ki Jesus ne mibelhenan dan te kumbalè dan ne mid-untud si Jesus.

Ne zutun, is mezakel he menge etew, tenged te zekelà is kedtahud dan ki Jesus, impendempas dan is impenamput dan diyà te ibayà ni Jesus, ne is duma, impendempas dan daan dutun is menge zehunen he rasang he mibpemadtì dan diyà te menge keyuwen.

Mezakel he menge etew is midhuna ki Jesus ne mezakel zaan is ebpemeninundug kandin he ebpemengulahì he nengelipey he egkag̵i te, “Ebpeselematan tew is Megbevayà! Delig̵a is nekeuma he midsug̵ù te Nengazen!
Delig̵a is ebpekeuma he hadì he iyan kes ed-ilis duen te hadì he kepuun tew he si David! Delig̵a is Nengazen!”

Ne hein nekeume en ensi Jesus diyà te Hiruselim midseled sikandin diyà te lavew he simbahan te menge Hudiyu he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne hein neehè din is langun dutun te seled te simbahan, mid-awà sikandin dutun. Ne g̵eina te mahapun en midhendiyà te inged he Bitanya zuma is menge sumusundan din.
Ne nepawà dutun te ziyè en ensi Jesus te zalan su edlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim he ebpuun te Bitanya, nevitil sikandin.

Ne nepantew zin dutun is kayu he zehunen he egngezanan te igira. Ne midhendutun si Jesus su ed-ahaan din ke zuen beg̵as dutun. Iyan, hein dutun en, neehè din he wazà beg̵as, kekenà, tekew he menge zahun, su haazà, kenè pa timpu te hustu he kebpemeg̵as.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Puun guntaan, kenè ke en egkekeenan te veg̵as nu.” Nezineg haazà is lalag din dutun te menge sumusundan din.

Ne zutun te nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, ne midseled en maan sikandin diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenegseg din is menge limbungan he etew zutun he ebpemelegyà wey ebpememasa. Mibpemiley zin is menge lemisahan dutun te ebpemenliwà te menge selapì wey is menge pinuuwà te ebpemelegyà te ibpemuhat he merepatik.
Ne wazè din itug̵ut te minsan hentei he ed-uwiten dan is menge g̵elemiten dan he zutun ebayà te lama te simbahan.

Ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun, ke sikandin te, “Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Is baley ku, ne egngezanan he valey he elempuanan te langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he ginhedian.’ Ne sikiyù,” ke si Jesus, “nasì niw veeli he ubpeey te ebpemenlimbung.”

Ne nezineg haazà te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan is mibeelan ni Jesus. Nengehandek dan ki Jesus su utew nengesuat is mezakel he menge etew te kebpenurù din. Ne tenged kayi ebpen-ahaan te menge punuan is paag̵i he metug̵uti sikandan he igkepehimetayan dan si Jesus.
Ne zutun te midsanlep en is andew, mid-awà ensi Jesus dutun te inged.
Ne hein nepawà, midlikù dan dutun te inged ne ziyà te ibayè dan neehè dan kes kayu he igira he nepurung en meg̵angu, minsan is dalid din.
Ne netenuzan haazà ni Pedro ne ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, “Ahaa nu man! Neg̵angu heeyan is kayu he igira he midrewakan nu.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Sarig kew te Megbevayà.

Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he minsan hentei he egkeg̵iyan din heeyan is buvungan te, ‘Awè ka keniyan ne umpak ka ziyà te zag̵at,’ ne kenà sikandin eduwazuwa, kekenà, neheg̵et diyà te g̵ehinawa zin he egketuman is migkag̵i zin, ne haazà is migkag̵i zin ne egketuman.
Umba, egkeg̵iyan ku sikiyu he minsan hengkey is ebuyuen niw ziyà te Megbevayà, heg̵eta niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw he kenè en ebperis, ne egkezawat niw haazà is ebuyuen niw.

Ne emun ed-ampù kew ziyà te Megbevayà, ke zuen egkepeukan niw he minsan hentei, peseyluwa niw, ne is Amey niw he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ebpeseyluwen kew zin daan te menge kebpekesupak niw kandin.
Su emun kenè kew ebpesaylu te zuma niw, is Amey niw he ziyà te langit, kenè kew zin daan ebpeseyluwen te menge kebpekesupak niw.”

Ne nekeuma zan en maan diyà te Hiruselim ne si Jesus, diyà edrig̵urig̵u te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà. Ne midhendiyà te kandin is menge punuan he memumuhat, wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu.
Ne mid-insè dan ki Jesus te, “Heini is langun he ed-ul-ulahan nu zini te simbahan, duen nu ve ketenged te ked-ulaula kayi, wey hentei is mibeg̵ey kenikew te ketenged wey nu meulaula?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen daan id-insè ku keniyu ne emun egketavak a keniyu, edtevaken ku zaan sikiyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te ked-ulaula ku kayi te langun.
Hentei is mibeg̵ey ki Juan Megbebewtismu te ketenged din te kebpemewtismu? Megbevayè be wey ke etew zà? Tevaka a.”
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey sikandan is egkag̵i te, “Emun egkeg̵iyen tew he Megbevayà, ne ed-insà sikandin ke maan is wazè tew tuuwi si Juan.

Ne emun egkag̵i kiw he etew zà, ne egkepeukan kiw te menge etew.” (Umba migkag̵i zan heini su nahandek dan te menge etew su midtuu is langun he menge etew he ebpeneuven si Juan Megbebewtismu te Megbevayà.)
Umba, iyan tavak dan dutun ki Jesus is: “Hanew ta.” Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Kenè ku zaan egkeg̵iyen keniyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te kebaal kayi te langun.”

Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is menge sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Duen etew he zuen din tanà he mibpemulaan din te g̵awed he paras. Mid-alad din haazà, ne mibudsiyan din te meluag is dekelà he vatu su ebeelan din he keresà te wahig dutun te veg̵as te paras. Ne midlelawig te ed-ubpaan te ebantey zutun te perasan. Ne mibpeelimahan din haazà is perasan ne zutun midhendiyà te sengeg̵inhedian.
Ne hein neume en is tirag̵un dutun, midsug̵ù din is sevaha he sulug̵uen din he ibpekuwa te kandin he vahin dutun te nerag̵un.
Iyan, hein nekeuma haazà is sulug̵uen din, migewezan dutun te impemeelima zin ne mibug̵el zan ne impeulì dan sikandin he wazà uwiten.
Ne haazà is teg̵ig̵aked te perasan, midsug̵ù en maan te sevaha pa he sulug̵uen din, iyan, haazà is sulug̵uen, mibpelian dan diyà te ulu ne mid-eled-eled dan.

Ne haazà is teg̵ig̵aked, midsug̵ù din pa zutun is selakew pa he sulug̵uen din, ne haazà is sulug̵uen, midhimetayan dan. Mezakel pa zutun is sunudsunud he midsug̵ù din, ne is duma zutun, mibpemug̵el zan, ne is duma, midhimetayan dan.
Ne te ketepusan dutun, iyan dà nesamà sikan is minahal zin he anak. Ne haazà midsug̵ù din diyà te kandan su egkeisip din is: ‘Kenà egkehimu he kenè dan edtehuzen is anak ku,’ ke sikandin.
Iyan, hein nekeuma haazà is anak dutun te teg̵ig̵aked, migkag̵i haazà is impemeelima te, ‘Na! Iyan heini anak din; kuwa kew en su edhimetayan tew wey tew maangken heini is perasan din!’
Ne zutun migewezan dan sikandin ne midhimetayan dan ne intimbag dan diyà te g̵awas te perasan.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà mid-ulaula zutun te impemeelima te perasan, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan kandan dutun te teg̵ig̵aked? Ebeyaan din haazà is menge etew ne ebpenhimetayan din ne ebpeelimahan din haazà is perasan din te selakew en maan he menge etew.”
Ne ke si Jesus en maan te, “Siguradu nevasa niw en sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
‘Sikan is batu he himan te valey he vatu,
mid-engkezan te menge pandey
su kunaan dan ke wazè din pulus.
Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan
he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey.
Ulaula heini te Nengazen ne igkeinuinu tew utew.’ ”

Ne zutun, haazà is menge punuan te menge Hudiyu, nesavut dan he iyan sikandan ebpesumbingayan ni Jesus dutun te sempità he migkag̵i zin, ne ed-isipen dan en pezem edekepa si Jesus, iyan, wazè dan mehimu haazà is ed-isipen dan su nahandek dan te mezakel he menge etew. Ne zutun nepesagdan dan si Jesus ne mid-ewaan dan.
Ne midsug̵ù dan is duma zutun te menge Perisiyu wey te menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hirudis su wey zan mepulutikahi si Jesus he meveeli zan te sumbung.

Ne hein nekeuma haazà is menge sug̵ù, migkag̵i zan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Menunudlù, netuenan dey he metazeng ka he etew. Is lalag te menge etew, kenà ebpekehalin te ibpenurù nu tenged te wazè nu ibpelavi he minsan hentei, kekenà, tutuu is ibpenurù nu he ibpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà. Umba, keg̵iyi key kenikew, ebpekesupak ki ve te kesug̵uan tew ke ebayad ki te vuhis diyà te hadì tew he ziyà te inged he Ruma?”

Ne netuenan ni Jesus he akal haazà is netag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa zan, ne ke sikandin te, “Maan is egezaman a keniyu? Ipeehè niw kediey ke memenumenu is selapì he ibayad niw te vuhis diyà te hadì he ziyà te Ruma.”
Ne impeehè dan dutun ki Jesus is sengeelad he selapì. Ne ke si Jesus te, “Hentei ki zagwey wey ngazan heini is nekesurat kayi?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Ngazan wey zagwey te hadì diyà te Ruma.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Ne emun kandin ne iyan egkesuatan din, iveg̵ey niw ziyà te kandin, ne iveg̵ey niw zaan diyà te Megbevayà is kandin he azen.” Ne utew zan ingkeinuinu haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus.
Ne zuen daan menge Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Ne is menge Sedusiyu, iyan kes menge Hudiyu he edtuu he kenà egkengevanhew keuzemà is minsan hentei.

Ne migkag̵i zan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Menunudlù, impenurù dengan ni Moises he penenglitan, ke zuen maama he zuen din esawa ne ebpatey haazà is maama ne wazà mevuwad, kinahanglan he ebpemeluwen te suled dutun te maama haazà is ipag din su wey mevuwad haazà is minatey pinaag̵i zutun te suled din.
Ne zengan duen pitu he menge maama he teltelehazi. Mibpengesawa sikan is kakey, iyan, minatey he wazà med-anak.
Ne mibpemalu zutun te ikezuwa haazà is ipag dan ne minatey zaan ne wazà mevuwad. Ne iring din ded haazà is iketelu.
Ne henduen dà duen su naamin haazà is pitu ikevalu zutun te vahi ne wazà mevuwad. Ne te huziyan dutun, minatey zaan haazà is bahi.
Ne keuzemà te kegkevanhew te menge etew, hentei is hustu he esawa zutun te vahi? Su haazà is pitu he teltelehazi, pudu zan man nemekeesawa zutun te vahi.”

Ne zutun, midtavak ni Jesus sikandan te, “Umba ves nengesayep kew su wazè niw mesavut sikan is ingkesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, ne wazè niw zaan mesavut he mekeg̵eg̵ehem sikandin te kebpemanhew te menge minatey.

Su zutun te kegkevanhew te etew he nemematey, wazè en ebpengesawa he maama ne wazè en daan bahi he ebpeesawa su egkengeiring en pudu is menge etew te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà diyà te langit ne kenè dan ebpees-eseweey.

Ne mehitenged te menge minatey he ebenhawen, wazè niw ve mevasa ziyà te libru he insurat dengan ni Moises kes egkeregreg he sagbet he zutun mibpaahà kandin is Megbevayà? Su minsan te minatey en dutun si Abraham wey si Isaak wey si Hakub, migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te ki Moises te, ‘Iyan a Megbevayà he ed-ezapen ni Abraham wey ni Isaak wey ni Hakub,’

Ne zuen dutun sevaha he menunudlù te kesug̵uan he nezineg din is kebpekidlewanè dan ki Jesus ne hein nesavut din he utew tutuu is menge tavak ni Jesus kandan, mid-insà sikandin te, “He Menunudlù, hendei zapit is edhuna zuen te langun he kesug̵uan?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan heini is edhuna: ‘Pemineg kew, sikiyu is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Is Megbevayà tew he Nengazen te langun, sebsevaha zà sikandin he Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew. Iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu, isip nu, kedsavut nu wey tivuuk he ulaula nu.’
Ne is ikezuwa, iyan heini: ‘Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he g̵ehinawa.’ Wazè en insug̵ù kenitew he ebpekelavew kayi te zezuwa.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is menunudlù te kesug̵uan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Tutuu iyan. Nevenaran a keniyan te egkeg̵iyen nu he sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà ne wazè en duma pa he Megbevayà.

Ne is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà he Nengazen diyà te g̵ehinawa ta, diyà te isip ta, diyà te kedsavut ta wey ziyà te tivuuk he ulaula ta, wey is kebmahala ta te zuma ta he iring en sikandin te keugelingen ta he g̵ehinawa, ne lavew pa heini kenà te langun he menge pemuhat he edtutungen wey menge halad.”

Ne nesavut ni Jesus he utew hustu haazà is migkag̵i zutun te menunudlù ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Benar heeyan; meseyun ka ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà.” Ne zutun wazè en maan nekeaku pa he egezam ki Jesus pinaag̵i te minsan hengkey he insè.

Ne te ebpenurù si Jesus te menge etew ziyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, mid-insà sikandin te, “Maan is egkehimu he ibpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan he is ebpeebuten he hadì, kevuwazan dà ni Hadì David?
Umba id-insè ku heini su mid-ulinan si Hadì David te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne migkag̵i, ke sikandin te,
‘Migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku te,
“Kayi ka pinuu te zapit te egkekewanan ku
taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu.” ’ ”

Ne impelaus ni Jesus haazà is egkeg̵iyen din te, “Emun migkag̵i ni David he Nengazen din is ebperetengen he ibpahadì, kenà egkehimu he kevuwazan dà duen ni Hadì David.” Ne utew nengesuat is mezakel he menge etew zutun te kebpenurù kandan ni Jesus.

Ne zutun te kebpenurù din, ke sikandin te, “Andam kew limbe wey kew kenà mekeiring te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan su iyan dà egkesuatan dan is kedhiphipanew he memelayat is kemisula he edtehuzen sikandan te menge etew emun diyè dan te mirkadu.
Ne emun diyè dan te simbahan, egkesuatan dan he iyan sikandan ibpepinuu ziyà te ebpepinuuwan te lavew he menge etew. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he utew zan metahud ke edtelavuk dan te keemuran.

Ne heini is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, edlimbungan dan is menge valu he vahi wey zan maangken is menge valey zutun te menge vahi. Ne utew melug̵ayad is ked-ampù dan he iyan idtambun dan te mezaat he vaal zan. Ne utew edekelà is silut te Megbevayà kandan keuzemà.”

Ne sevaha he timpu zutun he ziyà ebpimpinuu si Jesus te seled dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ne ziyà sikandin te uvey te teleg̵uey te halad he selapì. Ne ebantey sikandin te menge etew he edsavuk te halad dutun te teleg̵uey. Ne mezakel is menge sepian dutun he utew zekelà he selapì is insavuk dan dutun.
Ne nekeuma zutun is balu he vahi he utew egkeayuayu. Ne inhalad din is dezuwa he selapì he tumbag̵a he utew zeisey is bali zin.

Ne zutun mid-umew ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin ne ke sikandin te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he haazà is balu he vahi, sumalà is ked-isipa te Megbevayà, utew lavew is inhalad din te langun he inhalad kayi te zuma he menge etew.

Su is menge zuma he nemenhalad kayi, subra zà te ketig̵eyunan dan is inhalad dan. Iyan, heeyan is egkeayuayu he vahi, minsan pa te edlisedlised sikandin te igkeuyag din, inhalad din is namànamè en he ketig̵eyunan din.”

Ne zutun te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun te zekelà he simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà migkag̵i ziyà te kandin is sevaha te menge sumusundan din te, “Ahaa nu heini is simbahan. Utew zezekelà is menge vatu he imbevaley kayi ne utew meupiya is kegkeveeli zin.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Heeyan is dekelà he simbahan, he vatu is imbevaley zuen, wazà keuzemà minsan sevaha he vatu he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewag̵ey heeyan is langun.”
Ne hein diyè dan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, egkepantew zan sikan is dekelà he simbahan. Ne mid-insaan si Jesus eni Pedro, Santiago, Juan, wey Andres dutun te wazè dan duma,
ke sikandan te, “Keg̵iyi key ke keenu egkehitavù heini is langun wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula he tuus he iyan en timpu he egketuman sikan is langun he migkag̵i nu g̵eina.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Mebpekevantey kew wey kenè kew mekesundan te teruen he etew
su mezakel is ebpemenlepew he egamit te ngazan ku he egkag̵i is kada sevaha zutun he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne mezakel is ebpeketuu te menge tarù dan.

Ne emun egkezineg niw ziyà te uvey niw is meg̵urub tenged te gira ne egkezineg niw zaan is tudtul te menge gira ziyà te meziyù he tanà, kenè kew mahandek su kinahanglan he egkeulaula is iring kayi te kenè pa edtepusen heini is timpu.

Su ebpekidtebek is sengeinged te zuma zin he inged ne egira is sengeg̵inhedian te zuma zin he g̵inhedian. Egkehitavù is linug diyà te mezakel he menge inged ne zuen menge inged he ebitilen. Iyan, heini he egkehitavù, ne iring te ed-anak he sikan pa ebpuunà is belilit din.

Ne sikiyu, kinahanglan he purungi niw endama is gehinawa niw, su edekepen kew te menge etew ne ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan ne ebug̵elen kew ziyà te menge simbahan dan. Ebpekeetuvang kew te menge gubirnedur wey menge hadì tenged te kedtuu niw kediey wey niw ikewali is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te kandan.
Su te kenè pa egketapus haazà is timpu, kinahanglan he ihuna ipesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge etew ziyà te langun he menge g̵inhedian.

Ne zutun te kedekepa keniyu su ed-uwiten kew ziyà te hukmanan, kenè niw igkesamuk ke hengkey is egkeg̵iyen niw su emun dutun kew en, iyan niw egkekag̵i is ibpekag̵i keniyu te Megbevayà su is menge lalag he egkekag̵i niw zutun ne kenè en keniyu, kekenà, lalag he ibpekag̵i keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne zutun he timpu zuen menge etew he ibpehimetayan dan is menge suled dan. Ne zuen daan menge amey he ibpehimetayan dan is menge anak dan. Ne zuen menge etew he egkuntedahan dan wey ibpehimetayan dan is menge lukes dan.
Egkuntedahan kew te langun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu. Iyan, sikan is edhamen te kedtuu zin kedì taman te ketepusan dutun te menge kemeresayan, ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne is egngezanan te melimezang he ebpekekaid, emun egkeehè niw he ziyè en haazà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he wazà itug̵ut kandin, ne sikan is diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya, mebpelag̵uy zan pehendiyà te vuntud. (Is ebpekevasa kayi te tagnà dengan mehitenged kayi, kinahanglan he sevuta zin.)
Ne sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te g̵awas te valey zin, kenè en med-usik-usik pa te timpu te kedseled diyà te valey he egkuwa te minsan hengkey te azen din.
Sikan is etew he ziyà egkeserengà te pemuleey zin, kenè en med-ulì pa ziyà te valey zin te kegkuwa te malung din.
Ne zutun he andew, kehizu utew te menge vahi he memeg̵ingey wey ebpemenleg̵imu
Iampù niw ziyà te Megbevayà he kenà heini mekeserengà is kebpelag̵uy zutun te timpu te meg̵enew.

Su wazè en ebpekerepeng te kemeresayan he egkehitavù dutun he andew. Ne puun pa te aney en kedlimbag̵a te kelibutan wazè pa meeg̵iyi is iring dutun. Ne emun egkehitavù en haazà ne kenè en egkehitavù pa maan is iring dutun minsan keenu.

Midterinan en te Nengazen haazà is timpu te kemeresayan su emun wazà, ne egkelimas dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, tenged te hizu zin te menge pinilì din he menge etew, midterinan din haazà is timpu te kemeresayan.
Ne ke zuen egkag̵i keniyu te, ‘Ahaa niw, heini en kes hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà,’ wey ke zuen be egkag̵i te, ‘Heeyan en sikandin,’ ne kenè kew mebpemineg dutun te egkag̵i.

Su ebpenlepew is teruen he etew he egkeg̵iyen dan he iyan sikandan sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà wey ke egkeg̵iyen dan be he ebpeneuven sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne ebpemeehè dan te egkengein-inuwan wey menge singyal su ibpetuu zan pezem te menge tarù dan, ke egkehimu, is menge pinilì te Megbevayà.
Umba mebpekevantey kew su midtudtul ku en keniyu heini is langun he egkehitavù te wazè pa meulaula.
Ne emun egkeiwas haazà is timpu te kemeresayan, kenè en edsilà is andew ne kenè en daan ed-anlag is bulan.
Ne egkengeulug is menge vituen diyà te langit ne egkengehuyung is menge kedesenan diyà te hewhewanan.
Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà a ziyà te menge g̵apun is ebpekeuma he utew zekelà is gehem ku wey utew merayag is ked-anlag ku.
Ne zutun edsug̵uen ku is menge velinsug̵uen ku pehendiyà te heepat he pesag̵ì kayi te kelibutan. Ne edtig̵umen dan is menge pinilì ku he etew he ebpuun te minsan hendei kayi te lumpad te kelibutan.
Isipa niw heini is impenurù ku keniyu pinaag̵i te sempità he kayu he igira. Dini te kenita, emun ebpeneringsing en is subpang din ne ebpenlumbey en, egketuenan ta he meg̵aan en is gulavung.
Ne iring din ded daan, emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en is langun kayi te migkag̵i ku, egketuenan niw he meg̵aan a ebpekelikù.
Tenuzi niw is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu: he emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en heini kenè kew pa egkeamin ebpatey taman te kenè pa egkengetuman heini is langun.
Egkehanew is langit wey tanà, iyan, heini is migkag̵i ku, kenà mulà egkehanew te minsan keenu.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà nesayud ke keenu egketuman heini is langun. Ne g̵awas kandin wazè en nesayud te andew wey uras ke keenu heini egkehitavù. Is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà diyà te langit, wazè dan mesayud wey minsan siak is Anak te Megbevayà, wazà a zaan mesayud.
Ne tenged kayi, mebpekevantey kew ne tag̵amtag̵am kew su kenè niw heini egketuenan ke keenu.

Su iring a te sevaha he etew he midhipanew he wazè din teleena ke keenu ed-ulì. Is menge sulug̵uen din ne impevantey zin te menge azen din. Ne mibpemeg̵ayan din is kada sevaha kandan te ketengdanan he ed-ul-ulahan dan dutun te kedhipanew zin. Ne migkeg̵iyan din is etew he impevantey zin te g̵emawan he kenà sikandin medlipezeng.
Umba, purungpurung kew su wazè niw metueni ke keenu a ebpekeuma is teg̵ig̵aked te valey, ke mahapun be, ke liwazè be te kezukileman, wey ke egkepkepawè be wey ke edsilè en be is andew.
Kinahanglan he kenè ku sikiyu egkeumahan he nekelipezeng dutun te kedtekewtekew ku kedlikù.
Heini is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, egkeg̵iyen ku zaan diyà te langun he etew he mebpekevantey is kada sevaha.”

Mekezuwa pa zutun, egketuman is Pista te Kedlevayi wey Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey. Is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, ebpengahaan dan is paag̵i wey zan mezakep si Jesus he kenà egketuenan te mezakel he menge etew wey mehimetayi.
Ne ke sikandan te, “Kenè tew edekepen sikandin te timpu te pista su kela ke edsinamuk is menge etew.”

Ne sevaha he timpu zutun he ziyà si Jesus te inged he Bitanya, diyà sikandin te valey ni Simon te it-iten he neulian en. Ne zutun te egkaan dan, nekeuma is bahi he ed-uwit te pelenahan he mibeelan puun te vatu he elebastru he midteg̵uan haazà is pelenahan te mehemut he agwa he mahal utew su lunsey he nardu. Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus dutun te vahi ne midrupet din haazà is bivig dutun te pelenahan ne imbusbus din diyà te ulu ni Jesus haazà is agwa.
Ne is duma he etew he nekeahà dutun, wazè dan ikesuat haaza, ne mibpelelelag̵è dan te, “Maan is mid-us-usikan din heeyan is agwa te wazà pulus?

Mahal utew heeyan su is bali zin, ne subra he tetelu he g̵atus he elad he selapì. Meupiya pa pezem ke imbelegyà, ne is halin, igkepemeg̵ey ziyà te egkengeayuayu.” Ne midsawey zan haazà is mid-ulaula zutun te vahi.
Ne migkag̵i zutun si Jesus te, “Pesegdana niw sikandin. Maan is edsewayen niw sikandin? Utew meupiya heini is mid-ulaula zin dini te kediey.
Layun niw egketevangi is egkengeayuayu su kenè niw mulà sikandan egkesuwey, iyan, siak, meg̵aan ku en sikiyu egkesuwey.
Sumalà is egkehimu kayi te vahi ne midhimu zin en dini te kedì. Mid-egwahan e zin he zaan wey meteg̵ana is lawa ku te kedlevenga kedì.
Tenuzi niw he kenà sikandin egkelipatan. Su minsan hendei idsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, egketudtul zaan heini is mid-ulaula zin kedì.”
Ne zutun, si Hudas he tigKeriyuti, sevaha zutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din, midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat su ibpalad din si Jesus diyà te kandan.

Ne hein netuenan dutun te menge punuan ke hengkey is inhendutun din, ne utew zan nengesuat. Ne mibpesarig sikandan he ebeg̵ayan dan si Hudas te selapì. Ne puun dutun mibpengahà si Hudas te paag̵i te ked-ekali zin ki Jesus.

Ne zutun neume en is nehuna he andew te Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey. Iyan haazà andew te kedlepaa te menge Hudiyu te ibpemuhat he nati he kerehidu he egkeenen dan dutun te Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din te, “Hendei is egkesuatan nu he valey he edhilutuan dey wey zey meteg̵ana is idlavung nu te Pista te Kedlevayi?”
Ne midsug̵ù ni Jesus is dezuwa zutun te menge sumusundan din ne migkeg̵iyan din te, “Hendiyan kew te inged ne egkeuma niw is maama he ed-uwit te umuy he nepenù te wahig.

Tundug kew kandin pehendiyà te valey he edselezan din, ne keg̵iyi niw is teg̵ig̵aked dutun te valey te, ‘Ibpeinsà te zatù tew kenikew ke hendei he rug̵u sikandin egkaan duma te menge sumusundan din kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi.’
Ne zutun ibpeehè din keniyu is meluag he rug̵u ziyà te zivavew zutun he zaan en nehimani. Ne zutun niw teg̵enaha is idlavung tew.”
Ne haazà is menge sumusundan din, migenat dan pehendutun te inged ne langun duen te migkag̵i ni Jesus ne iyan en iyan neehè dan ne zutun dan teg̵enaha is idlavung te Pista te Kedlevayi.
Ne hein mezukilem dutun, si Jesus wey is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, nekeuma zan dutun te valey.
Ne te ziyè dan te lemisahan su kemulu zan pa egkaan, migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Duen egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu. Iyan is: sevaha keniyu kayi te ebpemengaan guntaan he zuma ku is ed-akal kedì wey a mehimetayi.”
Ne zutun utew nengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ne is kada sevaha zutun, mid-insè dan kandin te, “Kela ke iyan a?”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Iyan is sevaha keniyu te sepulù wey zezuwa he ebpekidtug̵en kedì kayi te edtengelan.
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpatey a sumalà te netagnà duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kehizu utew te etew he ed-akal kedì. Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke wazè en sikandin ianak.”

Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa egkaan, mid-amì si Jesus duen te supas, ne mibpeselematan din diyà te Megbevayà ne mibpenevìtevì din haazà ne impemeg̵ey zin dutun te menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin te, “Iyan heini lawa ku; keena niw.”
Ne mid-amì din dutun is tasa he midteg̵uan te vinu he paras ne mibpeselematan din daan te Megbevayà ne induwal zin diyà te kandan. Ne pudu sikandan mid-inum dutun.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan heini lengesa ku he ibpetig̵is wey mepelisi is mezakel he menge etew. Tuus heini te paag̵i te kegkelibri he midtukud te Megbevayà.”
Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he puun guntaan, ne kenà ad maan ed-inum kayi te vinu taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ed-iinumè kiw te veg̵u en he vinu emun edhadì is Megbevayà.
Ne zutun migkanta zan te kedalig te Megbevayà ne hein nepasad haazà, migawas dan ne midhendiyè dan te vuvungan dutun he egngezanan te Ulivuwan.

Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Is langun te sikiyu, edluyahan is kedsarig niw kediey su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Edhimetayan ku is ed-elima te menge kerehidu ne ebpekedsusuwey is menge kerehidu.’
Iyan,” ke si Jesus, “dutun te kegkevanhew ku, edhuna a keniyu ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pedro ziyà te kandin te, “Minsan ke edluyahan is kedsarig kenikew kayi te langun he menge zuma ku ne kenà mulà edluyahan is kedì, minsan egkemenumenu.”
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he te kenè pe kan ed-ukarà is manuk te kezezuwa g̵untaan te mezukilem ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekag̵i he kenà a kenikew egkekilala.”

Ne wazà mevenari zutun si Pedro, ke sikandin te, “Minsan pa ke edhimetayan a zuma kenikew ne kenà a egkag̵i he wazè ku sikew mekilala.” Haazà he lalag, iyan daan pesarig dutun te menge zuma zin he menge sumusundan.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te lugar he migngezanan te Gitsimeni. Migkeg̵iyan din is menge sumusundan din te, “Kayi kew zà pinuu taman te ebpekepasad a is ed-ampù.”
Ne zutun miduma zin si Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan, ne midlaus dan pa ziyà te egkehunaan dutun. Utew neseeng sikandin wey mibmesakit utew is gehinawa zin.
Ne migkag̵i sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Utew mesakit is gehinawa ku. Henduen be te egkevidtew en. Kayi kew zà ne kenè kew medlipezeng.”
Ne midlaus pa sikandin diyà te egkehunaan dutun ne midlangkeb diyà te tanà ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he ke egkehimu pa ne kenè en kandin ipeseg̵azan haazà is merasey he imbanglis kandin.

Ke sikandin dutun te ked-ampù din te, “Amey ku, egkehimu nu is minsan hengkey ne emun egkehimu zà ne kenà a kenikew ipehimetayi, iyan, kenà egkesunud is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, iyan egkesunud is kenikew.”

Ne midlikù si Jesus ne neehè din haazà is tetelu he sumusundan din he nemekelipezeng, ne migkeg̵iyan din si Pedro te, “Simon, nekelipezeng ke ve? Wazè nu ve metigker he kenè ka edlipezeng te minsan sengeuras dà?”
Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus te, “Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, ampù kew wey kew mekelikey te menge penggezam keniyu. Edsunud pezem is gehinawa niw, iyan, meluya is lawa niw.”
Ne zutun midlikù si Jesus ne mid-uman med-ampù te iyan ded gihapun sikan is in-ampù din.

Ne zutun midlikuan din haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne neehè din he nemekelipezeng dan su wazè dan maantus is kebpemetpetayi kandan te tuzug. Ne zutun wazè dan egketuenan ke hengkey is ibpengetezengan dan diyà te ki Jesus.

Ne netegteg̵aad pa zutun midlikuan din en maan sikandan te iketelu, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Kemulu kew ves nehurep he ebpemenhidhizeg̵à? Netengkaan en heeyan su iyan en heini timpu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge lalung he etew.
Enew kew su heini en sikan is etew he ed-akal kedì. Edsinug̵ungen tew.”

Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkag̵i si Jesus, nekeuma si Hudas is sevaha zuen te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul. Duma zin is menge etew he nengeg̵umeenan te ubpit wey lagkut. Menge sug̵ù haazà te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu.

Si Hudas, is giya zan diyà te ki Jesus, migkag̵i zin he zaan ke hengkey is tuus te kegketueni zan ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Is etew he edhezekan ku, ne iyan en ebpen-ahaan niw. Ne zekepa niw en ne purungi niw ventayi ke ed-uwiten niw.”
Ne zutun te kebpekeuma ni Hudas, segugunè din mid-uvayi si Jesus ne migkag̵i te, “Na! Menunudlù!” Ne midhezekan din.
Ne midakep dutun te menge etew si Jesus ne mibpekehemenan dan te egawed.
Iyan, sevaha te zaan he etew zutun, midhulavut din is sundang din ne midtibas din is sulug̵uen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te telinga ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge edakep kandin te, “Tulisan e ve? Su maan is neg̵umeenan kew te menge ubpit wey lagkut is edakep kedì?
Kada andew ne zuma a keniyu ziyà te Valey te Megbevayà is ebpenurù ne wazà a keniyu zutun dà dekepa. Iyan, egkeulaula heini su egketuman sikan is menge tagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun mid-ewaan sikandin te menge sumusundan din su mibpemelag̵uy zan.
Ne zuen dutun kenakan he ebmemalung dà is midtelukun ki Jesus. Ne edekepen pezem haazà dutun te menge etew,
iyan, midleg̵uwat ne nekepelag̵uy sikandin is wazè en seseberen din su netag̵ak haazà is malung din he neg̵ewezan dutun te menge etew.

Mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te valey ni Keyipas he iyan lavew he memumuhat, ne zutun netig̵um he zaan is menge punuan he memumuhat, menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu.

Ne si Pedro, midtinundug daan asal kenà utew ed-uvey ne ziyè dà medtaman te lama zutun te valey te lavew he memumuhat. Ne mibpinuu sikandin dutun is ed-amur ziyà te menge guwardya ne midhizazang diyà te hapuy zutun.
Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat wey is langun he nengetig̵um he ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu, ebpen-ehè dan te salà he id-ulug dan ki Jesus su wey zan mehimetayi, iyan, wazè dan egkeahà.
Mezakel is menge teruen he midsumbung te menge vaal ni Jesus, iyan, wazà mengeuyun haazà is ebpemenistig̵us dutun.
Ne zutun duen menge teruen he etew he mid-etuvang ne migkag̵i zan is sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus,

ke sikandan te, “Nezineg dey heeyan he etew he egkag̵i te, ‘Edrundusen ku heini is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he vineelan te etew ne seled te tetelu he andew ebpekevangun ad te veg̵u he kenà bineelan te etew,’ ” ke sikandan.
Iyan, haazà is ebpemenumbung, kenà daan egkeuyun haazà is kedsumbunga zan ki Jesus.
Ne zutun, midhitindeg diyà te teliwazà is lavew he memumuhat ne migkeg̵iyan din si Jesus te, “Tutuu ve heini is menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew? Hengkey is igketavak nu?”
Ne wazà si Jesus medtavak. Ne mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is lavew he memumuhat te, “Iyan ke ve kes mibpilì he ibpahadì he Anak te Megbevayà?”

Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan a, ne keuzemà, egkeahà a keniyu is Kakey te Menusiyà he ziyà ebpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà. Ne egkeahà a zaan keniyu ziyà te menge g̵apun is ebulus he ebpuun diyà te langit.”
Ne zutun, haazà is lavew he memumuhat, mibpemindas din is kumbalè din
nezineg niw en is menge lalag din he utew supak te Megbevayà. Hengkey is hukum niw?” Ne zutun migkag̵i is langun he menge zuma zin te zekelà is salà ni Jesus ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan.

Ne is menge zuma zutun, mid-ilevan dan si Jesus, ne mibedbed dan is mata zin ne midsumbag dan te egkag̵i te, “Tegnaa nu ke hentei is midsumbag kenikew!” Ne migewezan sikandin te menge sundaru zutun ne mibpenabpì dan sikandin.
Ne si Pedro, kemulu pa zutun te lama te valey ne zuen bahi he sulug̵uen te lavew he memumuhat he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin.
Ne hein neehè din si Pedro is edhizazang midtengtengan din ne migkag̵i te, “Sikew, duma ka zaan ni Jesus he tigNeserit.”

Ne si Pedro, mibarew zin haazà te, “Wazè ku hanew ke hengkey is egkeg̵iyen nu ne kenè ku zaan egkesavut ke hengkey is ibpesavut nu.” Ne migawas si Pedro zutun pehendiyà te pultahan te lama. Ne zutun mid-ukarà is manuk.
Ne neehè en maan si Pedro dutun te vahi ne mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is bahi ziyà te menge etew zutun te, “Heini he etew, duma eni Jesus.”

Iyan, hein nezineg haazà ni Pedro mibarew zin pa. Ne hein netegteg̵aad dutun, is menge etew he nerivurun dutun, migkeg̵iyan dan si Pedro te, “Tutuu iyan he zuma ke zin. Egketuusan su tigGeliliya ka zaan.”
Ne zutun, mid-amin-amin si Pedro te sapà, ke sikandin te, “Siluti a te Megbevayà ke tarù is lalag ku he kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew is egkeg̵iyen niw.”

Ne zutundutun mid-ukarà is manuk te ikezuwa ne human metenuzi ni Pedro sikan is migkag̵i kandin ni Jesus he ke sikandin te, “Te kenè pe kan ed-ukarà is manuk te kezezuwa, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekag̵i he kenà a kenikew egkekilala.” Ne zutun nekelelendag si Pedro su utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin.

Ne kegkepawè dà dutun, is menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu, wey is langun he menge menhuhusey, neuyun dan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan ki Jesus, ne zutun mibakus dan sikandin ne inhated dan diyà te gubirnedur he Rumanu he si Pilatu.
Ne si Pilatu, mid-insaan din si Jesus te, “Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyù?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Uya, iyan is migkag̵i nu.”
Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat, mezakel is menge sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus.
Ne tenged dutun mid-uman med-insà si Pilatu ki Jesus te, “Wazè nu ve igketavak kayi te mezakel he menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew?”
Iyan, wazà medtavak si Jesus te minsan hengkey he insà kandin ne tenged dutun neinuinu utew si Pilatu.
Iyan neleyaman ni Pilatu is: kada tuig emun Pista en te Kedlevayi, edlibriyen din is sevaha he pirisu he edhengyuen te menge etew.
Ne zuen dutun pirisu he egngezanan ki Berabas, ne haazà si Berabas wey is menge zuma zin, ne midsukul zan te gubirnu ne nekepatey sikandin te etew zutun te kedsinamuk dan.
Ne hein mid-uvey ziyà te ki Pilatu is menge etew su edhengyuen dan he libriya zin is sevaha he pirisu sumalà is neleyaman din,
migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Egkesuatan niw ve he edlibriyen ku keniyu is hadì te menge Hudiyu?”
Iyan ingkeg̵iya ni Pilatu zutun su netuenan din he iyan ketezengan ke maan is insumbung si Jesus te menge punuan te memumuhat su egkesina zan kandin.
Iyan, is menge punuan he memumuhat, migkeg̵iyan dan is menge etew he iyan dan hengyua he edlibriyen si Berabas. Ne iyan haazà mid-ulaula zutun te menge etew.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Ne emun iyan heeyan, ebmenmenuwen ku heeyan is etew he migeraran he hadì te menge Hudiyu?”
Ne nememensag haazà is menge etew te, “Iransang te krus!”
Ne ke si Pilatu te, “Maan? Duen be mezaat he mid-ulaula zin?” Iyan, mid-iseg is keg̵urub dutun te menge etew he ebpememensag te, “Iransang te krus!”
Ne zutun midlibri ni Pilatu si Berabas wey zin mepenunuat is gehinawa zutun te menge etew. Ne impevug̵el zin si Jesus ne insug̵ù din te menge sundaru he iransang diyà te krus.
Ne zutun impeseled si Jesus te menge sundaru zutun te turug̵an te gubirnedur. Ne midtig̵um dan is tivuuk he kumpeniya te menge sundaru.
Ne migkumbelaan dan sikandin te merig̵à he kumbalà su ebelvelayen dan sikandin he uvag kun hadì. Ne zutun mibengkulè dan te zug̵iyen he g̵awed ne insuup dan diyà te ulu zin.
Ne edtahud dan uvag kandin, ke sikandan te, “Kumusta ka is hadì te menge Hudiyu!”
Ne layun dan edlegkuta is ulu zin te tuked ne mid-ilevan dan, ne midluhuzan dan kun uvag.

Ne hein nepezè dan en he ebaleyvaley kandin, midluwasan dan duen te kumbalà he merig̵à ne insun-ud dan kandin is daan he kumbalè din. Ne zutun mid-uwit dan sikandin pehendiyà te g̵awas dutun te inged su idransang dan te krus.

Ne ziyà te zalan duen nesinug̵ung dan he etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon, he amey ni Alejandro wey ni Rufo. Heini si Simon, diyà ebpuun te unayan ne edhendiyà te inged. Ne mibpeg̵es dan ipetiang dutun te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
Ne mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te migngezanan te Gulguta, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, tulan te ulu.
Ne ibpeinum dan pezem si Jesus te vinu he mid-emutan te tambar he egngezanan te mira, iyan, wazè din dewata.
Ne zutun inransang dan sikandin diyà te krus. Mibpemahinbahin dan is menge ugelingen din ne midripa zan dutun ke hengkey is egkeangken te kada sevaha kandan.
Liwazè en ebpemenahik is andew hein inransang dan si Jesus.
Insurat dan sikan is insumbunga kandin he egkag̵i te, “Is Hadì te Menge Hudiyu.”
Ne zuen dezuwa he tulisan he inransang dan daan te krus. Is krus te sevaha, ne ziyè dan ipasek te zapit te egkekewanan ni Jesus, ne is sevaha zutun, ne ziyà te zapit te egkeg̵ivang din.
Ne pinaag̵i kayi, netuman is netagnà dengan te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Mid-isip sikandin he zuma te menge mesinupaken.”

Ne is menge etew he sumeseg̵azà dutun, ebpemenangàtangà is ed-engitan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, “Na! Kunaan nu ke egkeg̵evè nu sikan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne egkevangun nu te seled te tetelu he andew!
Libriya nu kun is keugelingen nu ne penaug ka keniyan te krus!”

Ne sikan is menge punuan te memumuhat wey sikan is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zan kandin, su mid-engitan dan daan. Ke sikandan te, “Wey zè be! Nelibri zin is duma he etew, iyan, is keugelingen din, kenè din egkelibri.
Sikew is uvag Kristu he hadì dey te menge Hudiyu, penaug ke en keniyan te krus ne edtuuwan dey sikew!” Ne sikan daan is dezuwa he inransang diyà te pesikilizè din, ne midsumpalit dan daan kandin.
Ne hein neudtu zutun is andew, midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.

Ne hein liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew zutun, ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezag̵ing he lalag he edhenduen te, “Ili, Ili, lama sebektani,” he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, “He Megbevayè ku, maan is ed-iniyug̵an a kenikew?”
Ne zutun, is duma he etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te uvey, hein nezineg dan haazà is lalag, ke sikandan te, “Pemineg kew su ebpengumawen din si Elias

Ne sevaha zutun te menge etew is migaanggaan megkuwa te ispungha ne intereb din diyà te sukà ne midtiyuk din te zeisek he kayu ne impaahuk din diyà te vèbà ni Jesus wey zin haazà mesupsup. Ne migkag̵i te, “Pesegdana niw su ed-ahaan tew ke edlepew si Elias su wey zin ikepenaug!”
Ne zutun ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaging he lalag ne nevidtawan ne minatey.
Ne is manggad he utew mekepal he ingkurtina ziyà te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, neliwazà mevindas puun te zivavew pehendiyà te zizalem.
Ne is egalen dutun te menge sundaru he edhithitindeg dutun te egkesineruwan ni Jesus, hein neehè din haazà is kegkevidtawi ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Benar he Anak heini te Megbevayà!”
Ne zutun te malù meziyù, duen daan menge vahi he ed-ahà. Ne zutun si Maria Megdelina, si Maria he iney ni Jose wey ni Santiago he zeisek. Ne elin daan dutun si Selumi.

Heini is menge vahi, layun dan ebpekiduma ki Jesus ne midtevangan dan sikandin hein diyè pa sikandin te Geliliya. Ne mezakel zaan dutun is menge vahi he nemenduma kandin te kedhendutun din te Hiruselim.

Ne hein mahapun en dutun te andew te kedteg̵ana he egkesunuzan te Andew te Kedhimeley, nekeuma si Jose he tig-Erimetiya. Sevaha sikandin he telehuzen he egalen te menge Hudiyu. Sevaha sikandin te menge etew he ebperateng te kegketuman te nengetagnà mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ne zutun, in-awè din diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is kegkehandek din ne midhendiyà te ki Pilatu ne midhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus.
Dutun neinuinu si Pilatu su maan is utew meg̵aan is kebpatey ni Jesus, ne tenged dutun mibpesug̵uan din sikan is egalen te menge sundaru ne mid-insà ke minatey en be iyan si Jesus.
Ne hein netuenan din dutun he minatey en iyan, ne intug̵ut din ki Jose te egkuwa is lawa ni Jesus.

Mibpemasa si Jose te meputì he malung ne migkuwa zin is lawa ni Jesus ne mibukusan din dutun te malung he meputì. Ne zuen surung he penlevengà he ingkalut diyà te kelendig̵an he pag̵ang. Ne zutun din iseled is lawa ni Jesus. Ne midlilizan din haazà te zekelà he vatu he idlekeb dutun te penlevengà.
Ne si Maria Megdelina wey si Maria he iney ni Jose, neehè dan haazà ke hendei isavuk is lawa ni Jesus.

Ne hein neiwas dutun is Andew te Kedhimeley, si Maria Megdelina, wey si Maria he iney ni Santiago, wey si Selumi, mibpemasa zan te pehemut su edhendiyè dan te penlevengà wey zan ikehaplas haazà is pehemut te lawa ni Jesus.
Ne te meselem dutun te iyan pa kedsilà te andew zutun te egkehuna he andew te simana, nemenhendutun dan te midlevengan ki Jesus.
Ne ebpein-inseey zan te, “Hentei is ebpekelilid kenitew zuen te zekelà he vatu he inlekeb duen te idselang te penlevengà?”
Iyan, hein midlingehè dan, neehè dan he nelilid en sikan is batu zutun he utew zekelà.
Ne mid-ahuk dan dutun te idselang te penlevengà ne neehè dan is ebpimpinuu he menguhed he etew ziyà te egkekewanan dan he kukumbalà te meputì he manggad. Ne zutun nekehuyab is gehinawa zan.
Ne migkag̵i haazà is etew te, “Kenè kew mahandek. Ebpen-ahaan niw si Jesus he tigNeserit, sikan is inransang te krus, iyan, wazè en dini su nevanhew en. Ahaa niw man kayi te midsevukan kandin.”

Ne te kegkeipus te ked-ahaa zan dutun, ke sikandin te, “Hendiyan kew en te menge sumusundan din ne keg̵iyi niw sikandan wey si Pedro he si Jesus, edhuna sikandin diyà te Geliliya ne ziyè niw sikandin egkeahà, sumalà is migkag̵i zin keniyu.”
Ne zutun nemengguwè dan dutun te penlevengà is ebpemelelag̵uy su utew zan nengeinuinu wey nengehandek. Ne tenged kayi wazè dan tudtula heini ziyà te minsan hentei su nengehandek dan.

Ne te meselem pa utew zutun te andew he Duminggu hein nevanhew en si Jesus, midhuna sikandin mebpaahà diyà te ki Maria Megdelina, sikan is bahi he mibpeg̵uwaan din dengan te pitu he mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne heini si Maria, mibeyaan din is menge sumusundan ni Jesus. Ebpemenineg̵ew he egkengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus tenged te kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
Ne hein midtudtulan sikandan ni Maria he neehè din si Jesus su nevanhew en, wazè dan tuuwi.
Ne neiwas haazà mibpaahà si Jesus is nahalin is dagwey zin diyà te zezuwa he menge sumusundan din dutun te edhendiyà haazà is dezuwa te unayan.
Ne midlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim ne mibpenudtulan dan is menge zuma zan he neehè dan si Jesus, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazà medtuu is menge zuma zan.

Ne zutun, mibpaahà daan si Jesus dutun te sepulù wey sevaha he menge sumusundan din te timpu he egkekaan sikandan. Midsawey zin sikandan tenged te kezesen te isip dan su wazè dan medtuu te menge etew he nemenudtul he nekeahà kandin he nevanhew.
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus sikandan te, “Penhipanew kew ziyà te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne ipesavut niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hentei he etew he linimbag te Megbevayà.
Ne sikan is edtuu kayi wey ebpebewtismu, ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne sikan is kenà edtuu ne edhukuman te silut.

Ne sikan is etew he edtuu kediey, duen menge singyal he egkehimu zan. Pinaag̵i te keg̵ehem te ngazan ku igkepeg̵uwè dan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew. Ne ebpekekag̵i sikandan te kineg̵iyan he kenè dan egketuenan.
Ne minsan ke ebpekeg̵awed sikandan te menge uled wey ebpekeinum sikandan te minsan hengkey he edhilu, kenà sikandan egkekeizan. Ne emun edempaan dan is egkengezeruwan, ne egkengeulian.”
Ne te kegkeipusa te Nengazen he si Jesus dutun te menge lalag din, mibatun sikandin pehendiyà te langit, ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nemenhipanew is menge sumusundan te Nengazen he si Jesus ne impesavut dan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hendei. Ne is gehem te Megbevayà, mid-ug̵up kandan su nemekehimu zan te menge egkengein-inuwan su wey memeketuu is menge etew zutun te ibpesavut dan.
Minahal he Teofilo:
Mezakel is migezam medsurat te g̵ug̵ud te langun he neulaula zini te kenami he inged mehitenged te menge vaal ni Jesus.
Insurat dan is neg̵ug̵ud kenami te menge etew he iyan nekeahà kayi te menge vaal wey iyan midsangyew te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne siak daan guntaan, geina te mibpurungan ku te ed-istudyu heini, puun pa te puunà kayi te nengeulaula, neisip ku he meupiya zaan ke ebpurungan ku kenikew te edsurat is kegug̵uza kayi te langun.
Umba idsurat ku heini su wey nu mepurung mesavut is tutuu te langun he impenurù kenikew.

Ne heini is egug̵uzen ku kenikew, ebpuun pa zutun te timpu zengan hein iyan pa hadì si Hirudis diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zuen dutun maama he egngezanan ki Zacarias. Ne heini si Zacarias, sevaha sikandin he memumuhat he kevuwazan te etew zengan he si Abyas. Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Abyas, menge memumuhat sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne si Zacarias, esawa zin is bahi he egngezanan ki Elisabet he kevuwazan te memumuhat dengan he si Arun.
Si Zacarias wey haazà is esawa zin, metazeng sikandan he etew su wazà igkesawey zutun te kebpurungi zan te edtuman te langun he menge tulumanen wey menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is teleesawa, wazè dan anak su si Elisabet ne kenà ed-anak, ne zutun he timpu ne utew zan en menge meg̵urang.
Ne neuma is timpu zutun he iyan en si Zacarias wey is menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Abyas ebpekepemuhat diyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun sumalà is imbilinbilin he vetasan te menge mememuhat, nepilì si Zacarias pinaag̵i te ripa su wey iyan sikandin mekeseled dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he ibpetutung te veyewà.
Ne te kemulu zin pa ed-ul-ulaha haazà, ne mezakel is menge etew ziyà te g̵awas he ebpemen-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun mibpaahà kandin is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne heini is belinsug̵uen, dutun edhithitindeg te egkekewanan te vangkù he tutungà te veyewà.
Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Zacarias kayi netentanan sikandin su utew nahandek.

Ne zutun migkag̵i kandin haazà is belinsug̵uen te, “Kenè ka mahandek, Zacarias, su nezineg te Megbevayà is ked-ampù nu ne edhimuwen din he meg̵ingey nu is esawa nu he si Elisabet ne ed-anak si Elisabet te maama ne iyan nu ingazan kandin si Juan.
Utew nu igkelipey heini ne utew egkengeg̵alew is mezakel he menge etew emun id-anak en heini is batà,

su utew zekelà is pid-etawan din sumalà is ked-isipa kandin te Nengazen. Kenà sikandin ed-inum te vinu wey minsan hengkey he ebpekelangut. Ne puun dà dutun te kenè pa sikandin id-anak egkepurung sikandin egkeulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Ne pinaag̵i te kebpenurù din,” egkag̵i haazà is belinsug̵uen, “mezakel is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he edlikù edtuu te Megbevayà he iyan ed-ezapen te menge g̵inikanan dan dengan.

Heini is anak nu, edsug̵uen sikandin he ibpehuna te kebpekeuma te Nengazen ne ed-ulinan sikandin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin iring te ked-ulini zengan te Megbevayà te ebpeneuven he si Elias. Ne is gehem din, ne iyan ded sikan is gehem ni Elias dengan. Ne pinaag̵i te menge penurù kayi te anak nu egkehimu zutun he ebpeked-uuliey te meupiya he g̵ehinawa is menge amey wey te menge anak dan. Is menge etew he wazà mebpezumazuma te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, pinaag̵i te penurù kayi te anak nu ebpekedsendit dan ne zutun metazeng human is ed-isipen dan. Ne pinaag̵i kandin mezakel he menge etew is ed-endaman dan is kebpekeuma te Nengazen,” lalag te velinsug̵uen.
Ne zutun midtavak si Zacarias te, “Hengkey is tuus wey ku metueni he tutuu he egketuman heini is migkag̵i nu? Su siak wey is esawa ku, utew key en meg̵urang.”

Ne midtavak haazà is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà te, “Iyan a si Gabriel, sikan is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà he layun diyà te etuvangan din. Midsug̵ù e zin dini te kenikew wey ku ikepesavut heini is tudtul te utew meupiya he egkeulaula.

Ne egkeemew ka ne kenè ke en ebpekekag̵i taman te timpu he kenè pa heini egketuman su wazè nu tuuwi heini is migkag̵i ku kenikew he kenà duwazuwa he egketuman dutun te timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà,” ke sikandin.
Ne is menge etew he edtag̵adtag̵ad diyà te g̵awas dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, nengeinuinu zan su maan is utew neug̵et si Zacarias dutun te seled.

Ne hein midlawang en sikandin dutun, ne kenè en ebpekekag̵i ziyà te kandan. Ne netuenan dan dutun he zuen impaahà kandin te Megbevayà dutun te seled te simbahan su kenè en ebpekekag̵i ne ebpenguyew-uyew zà sikandin diyà te menge etew. Ne puun dà dutun ne emew sikandin.
Ne hein neuma is timpu he zutun egkeilisan si Zacarias te menge vaal zin dutun te simbahan, mid-ulì sikandin diyà te inged din.
Ne wazà utew meug̵et dutun ne mibmeg̵ingey is esawa zin he si Elisabet. Ne taman te menge lelima he vulan dutun wazà si Elisabet megawasgawas diyà te valey.
Ne ke sikandin te, “Human guntaan ingkehizu a te Megbevayà su ebpekeanak e zed, ne is wazè ku kebpekeanak dengan ne kenè ku en igkeeled.”

Ne zutun hein menge heenem en he vulan is keg̵ingayan te esawa ni Zacarias, midsug̵ù en maan te Megbevayà is belinsug̵uen din he si Gabriel pehendiyà te inged he egngezanan te Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Iyan mibpeveyaan kandin dutun is rag̵a he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne heini si Maria, nekeg̵unan te kenakan he egngezanan ki Jose. Ne heini si Jose, ne kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David.
Ne nekeuma is belinsug̵uen diyà te ki Maria ne ke sikandin te, “He Bayi, ingkehizu ka te Megbevayà ne ed-ipaten ke zin!”
Ne hein nezineg ni Maria heini, netentanan utew sikandin ne mid-isip-isip din ke hengkey vuwa haazà is kehulug̵an dutun te lalag te velinsug̵uen.
Ne migkag̵i haazà is belinsug̵uen te, “Kenè ka, Maria, mahandek su utew zekelà is gag̵ew te Megbevayà kenikew.
Ebmeg̵ingey ka ne ebpekeanak ka te maama ne ngezani nu sikandin ki Jesus.

Utew zekelà is pid-etawan din ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Ne edhimuwen te Nengazen he Megbevayà he edhadì heini is id-anak nu iring te kedhadì dengan te kepuun din he si David.
Ne heini is anak nu, wazà pidtemanan te kedhedii zin keniyu te menge kevuwazan ni Hakub. Wazè en ketepusan te kedhadì din!”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Maria ziyà te velinsug̵uen te, “Egkemenumenu ve heini? Su rag̵e e man ne wazè e pa meuvayi te maama.”

Ne midtavak haazà is belinsug̵uen te, “Is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpengelintau kayi ziyan te kenikew ne edlig-enan ka te g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi, heini is id-anak nu, pudu metazeng is menge ulaula zin ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te Megbevayà.

Ne kenà iyan dà heini tudtul ku kenikew su is ayè nu he si Elisabet, minsan te utew en sikandin meg̵urang ne mibmeg̵ingey en sikandin. Menge heenem en he vulan guntaan is keg̵ingayan din he zengan, iyan isip te menge etew he kenà sikandin ed-anak.
Umba egkeulaula heini su egkehimu te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey.”
Ne midtavak si Maria te, “Berakat he mehitavù kediey sumalà is migkag̵i nu su mepezumdumahan a te Nengazen.” Ne zutun mid-ewaan si Maria zutun te velinsug̵uen.
Ne wazà utew zutun meug̵et mibpenines si Maria ne migaanggaan megenat su edhendiyà te sevaha he inged he vuvungan he sakup te prubinsya he Hudiya.
Ne zutun te kebpekeuma zin diyà te engki Zacarias wey Elisabet, mibpenelehuzan sikandin.
Ne hein nezineg ni Elisabet haazà is kebpenelehuzan ni Maria ne midredsà medleg̵uwat haazà is batà diyà te g̵etek ni Elisabet. Ne zutun nepurung si Elisabet meulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne si Elisabet, tenged te utew nelipey, mibpekezag̵ing is egkag̵i te, “Wazà ebpekerepeng kenikew he vahi su utew ka mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Megbevayà. Ne mahal zaan diyà te g̵ehinawa zin heeyan is id-anak nu.
Maan buwa is utew a ingkeg̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà su maan is ebpenumbelayan a kenikew te iney te mibpilì he hadì?
Umba netuenan ku heini su zutun te kegkezineg̵a ku zà kenikew, heini is dini te g̵etek ku, nekeleg̵uwat te kegkeg̵alew zin.
Umba, Maria, edtuvazan ka te Megbevayà su midtuu ka he egketuman is impesavut kenikew te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà!”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Maria te,
“Utew a ebpekezalig
te Nengazen.
Utew ku ingkelipey
is Megbevayà
he iyan menluluwas ku.
Su siak is sulug̵uen din
he utew minus is pid-etawan,
wazè e zin ded melipati.
Ne puun guntaan
egkag̵i is tivuuk he menusiyà
he iyan a vahi he utew lavew
is tuvad kandin te Megbevayà.
Egkekag̵i zan heini
tenged te menge egkein-inuwan
he mid-ulaula kediey te utew lavew
he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà.
Utew lavew is ngazan din.
Puun pa te nengehuna he menge etew zengan
taman en guntaan,
dekelà is hizu zin diyà te minsan hentei
he edtahud kandin.
Nehimu zin is menge egkein-inuwan he vaal.
Nemekepelag̵uy kandin is memepelevawen,
ne wazè dan meveeli is ed-isipen dan.
Duen menge lavew he hadì he mibpekevavè din is pid-etawan
ne zuen daan menge etew he minus is pid-etawan
he mibpeketikang din is pid-etawan.
Is menge etew he egkengeayuayu,
iyan ebeg̵ayan din te meupiya,
iyan, is menge sepian,
ibpehipanew zin he wazè dan uwiten.
Is impenaad din dengan diyà te menge kepuun tew
he si Abraham wey is menge kevuwazan din, wazè din lipati.
Midtevangan kiw zin is menge sulug̵uen din he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
Ne egkehizuwan kiw zin daan te wazà pidtemanan
is menge nepilì din he etew he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham,” ke si Maria.
Ne menge tetelu he vulan dutun is ked-ubpà ni Maria ziyà te engki Elisabet ne human med-ulì sikandin.
Ne hein neuma is andew, ne mid-anak si Elisabet ne maama haazà is anak din.
Ne hein nezineg te menge kezumahan dan wey menge siringan dan heini is utew meupiya he mid-ulaula te Megbevayà ki Elisabet, nengelipey zan daan.
