Ne zuen pa zutun sevaha he etew he egkag̵i zaan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Datù, edsundan a kenikew, iyan, ed-ulì e pa su ibpesayud ku is bevelayan ku.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun ed-eradu ka he layun ka edlilingey ne kenà heeyan meupiya. Iring din ded daan is etew he edsundan kedì wey zuen din igkelilingey ne kenà sikandin dait he edhedian te Megbevayà.”
Ne hein neipus heini, duen daan kepituwan wey zewuwa he menge maama he nepilì te Nengazen he si Jesus su ibpehuna zin ibpehipanew te tigduwazuwa ziyà te langun he menge inged he ebpemeyaan din daan.

Ne migkag̵i sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Mezakel pezem is edawat te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Iring sikandan te kamet he nelutuan en. Utew meluag is kamet, iyan, deisey kiw zà is ebpemenlegtey. Iampù niw ziyà te Nengazen he sug̵ua zin pa ziyà te kamet din is duma pa he ebpekelegtey.
Genat kew en, iyan, andam kew su edsug̵uen ku sikiyu ziyà te menge etew he kumekaid. Iring kew te menge nati he kerehidu ne sikandan ne iring te menge erimaung.
Kenè kew med-uwit te selapì, wey kempilù, wey sepatus he ed-ilisan niw. Ne kenà utew melug̵ayad is kedlelag̵i niw te etew he egkeuma niw ziyà te zalan.
Ne ke hendei is baley he ebpemenehikan niw ne penelehuzan kew. Kag̵i kew te, ‘Sikiyu is meg̵inged kayi, tuvazi kew te Megbevayà.’
Ne emun dait he edtuvazan is etew zutun dekelà is tuvad te Megbevayà kandan. Ne emun kenà, ne kenà sikandan edleusan edtuvazi te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is baley he zuen etew he egalewg̵alew keniyu, ne zutun kew pundu taman te kegenat niw. Ne zewata niw is minsan hengkey he ibpekaan dan wey ibpeinum dan keniyu su iring te suhul zan keniyu. Dait is edterebahu he edsuhulan. Kenè kew en penhalinhalin pa maan diyà te zuma pa he menge valey.
Ne emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne zuen egalewg̵alew keniyu, minsan hengkey is keenen dan he ibpekaan dan keniyu, ne keena niw.
Pemewii niw is egkengezeruwan dutun te inged. Ne keg̵iyi niw is menge etew zutun he meg̵aan en is timpu te kedhedii kandan te Megbevayà.
Iyan, emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne wazà egalewg̵alew keniyu zutun, ne peehè kew te menge etew zutun, ne ke sikiyu te,
‘Minsan is menge eliyavuk kayi te inged niw he nemendeket te menge paa zey, edtektaken dey en

Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu,” ke si Jesus, “he lavew pa is idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te inged emun egkeuma keuzemà is andew te kedsilut, kenà te silut din dengan diyà te menge lalung he etew he meg̵inged diyà te inged he Suduma.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà is menge tigKurasin! Mekehizuhizu kew zaan keuzemà is menge tigBitsayda. Su is menge egkein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw te menge Hudiyu, angin ke midhimu ku haazà diyà te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he kenà menge Hudiyu is meg̵inged dutun, su nekekukumbalè dan en pezem te saku ne nepen-evuwan dan en is ulu zan
Kenè niw lipati he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is silut din keniyu kenà te menge etew ziyà te Tiru wey Sidun.
Ne sikiyu zaan,” ke si Jesus, “is menge tigKepirnaum, iyan egkesuatan niw pezem is delig̵a kew te minsan hentei, iyan, igketimbag kew ziyà te Impirnu.”

Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan din haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Is minsan hentei he etew he ebpemineg te ibpenurù niw, ne iring te iyan e zin nepemineg. Ne sikan is etew he kenè kew zin edseg̵ipaan, ne iring te iyan a wazè din seg̵ipaa. Ne sikan is etew he kenà edseg̵ipà kedì, ne iyan wazè din seg̵ipaa is Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kedì.”

Ne nepipira pa he andew zutun hein nemekeulì sikan is kepituwan he midsug̵ù, utew zan nengelipey su ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ebpemineg̵en key zan ke ibpaawè dey sikandan pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te ngazan nu!”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus te, “Si Setanas, is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, neehè ku is kegkezaag̵a niw kandin ne utew meg̵aan su iring te kilat he ebpuun te langit.

Tentenuzi niw heini he mibeg̵ayan ku sikiyu te g̵ehem he minsan ke ebpekeg̵iek kew te uled wey venayew ne kenè kew edhereg̵en. Ne kenè kew zaan egkezaag te g̵ehem te ukag tew he si Setanas ne wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekekaid keniyu.
Iyan, kenè niw iyan ikelipey is kebpemineg̵a keniyu te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, kekenà, ikelipey niw is menge ngazan niw he impelista te Megbevayà diyà te langit.”

Ne zutun midlipey si Jesus te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, “Amey ku he Nengazen te langit wey tanà, dekelà is kebpeselemati ku kenikew su is in-eles nu su wey kenà mesavut te menge uluwanen wey uvag en memetau ne impesavut nu en diyà te menge etew he wazè dan menge hanew. Amey ku, umba ebpeselematan ku su midhimu nu heini te iring kayi su iyan egkesuatan nu tenged te g̵ag̵ew nu.”

Ne zutun mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, “Is minsan hengkey, insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Wazà nesayud kedì te Anak te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan dà is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne wazà daan nesayud te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan e zà is Anak din wey sikan is menge etew he mibpengelinteuwan ku he mesayud dan kandin.”
Ne midsineruwan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din hein iyan dan dà, ne ke sikandin te, “Deyzey kew he menge etew su nemetmetahan niw en heini is langun he edhimuwen ku.

Su tutuu is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he kenà pira zà is menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan wey menge hadì dengan he egkesuat pezem he mekeahà kayi te nengeehè niw g̵untaan, iyan, wazà ipaahà kandan. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he ebpemineg̵en heini is nengezineg niw g̵untaan, iyan, wazà ipepemineg kandan.”

Ne zutun duen sevaha he etew he menunudlù te menge kesug̵uan te menge Hudiyu he midhitindeg su egezaman din edekepa is ketezengan ni Jesus pinaag̵i te menge insà, ne ke sikandin te, “He Zatù, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Hengkey is nekag̵i te kesug̵uan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Hengkey is kedsevuta nu te nengevasa nu?”

Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew, kinahanglan he iyan tew sikandin ebmahalen dini te g̵ehinawa tew. Iyan sikandin mahal zini te g̵ehinawa tew, isip tew, kedsavut tew, wey tivuuk he ulaula tew. Ne kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan tew is duma tew; ed-isipen tew sikandin he iring en te kenitew he g̵ehinawa.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Benar is nekag̵i nu. Ne iyan ul-ulaha nu ne ebeg̵ayan ka te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Iyan, haazà is menunudlù te kesug̵uan, egkesuatan din pezem he meisip ni Jesus he hustu is menge ulaula zin, umba migkag̵i sikandin te, “Hentei is nekag̵i he zuma ku?”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Duen sevaha he etew he Hudiyu he midhipanew ebpuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim he sebsevaha zin su edtupang pehendiyà te inged he Hiriku. Ne ziyà te zalan neuma sikandin te menge tulisan ne mibug̵el zan sikandin ne midlevasan dan, ne wey zan ewai hein deisek dà is gehinawa zin.
Ne te kegkeipus dutun te menge tulisan, nekeuma zutun is Hudiyu he memumuhat te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is midruug he nekehidhizeg̵à, mid-elig̵u zin ne midlaus te hipanew zin.

Ne iring din ded daan is nekesunud he nekeuma zutun. Hudiyu zed daan he kevuwazan ni Levi he edtavangtavang te menge memumuhat diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeg̵à ne mid-elig̵u zin daan ne midlaus te hipanew zin.
Ne wazà utew meug̵et ne nekeuma zutun daan is sevaha he kenà Hudiyu su tigSemarya. Ne hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeg̵à he midruug ne utew sikandin nehizu.

Ne mid-uvayan din ne mibewian din te lana wey vinu is menge palì dutun ne mibukusan din te manggad. Ne zutun mibitbit din ne in-untud din te kudè din ne mid-uwit din diyà te valey he hulevungà te menge etew ne zutun mibpurungan din elimahi.

Ne te nepawà dutun ne mibeg̵ey te selapì dutun te teg̵ig̵aked te valey ne migkag̵i te, ‘Elimahi nu kedì heini is midruug te tulisan ne emun duen selapì nu pa he egkeg̵astu nu kandin he liyu kayi te ibeg̵ey ku, ne zutun te kedlikù ku ne ed-ilisan ku ziyan te kenikew.’ ”
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te menunudlù te, “Hentei zutun te tetelu he etew is nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan?”

Ne midtavak haazà is menunudlù te, “Iyan nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan haazà is nehizu kandin he etew ne midtavang kandin.” Ne ke si Jesus te, “Iyan haazà ul-ulaha nu is iring dutun.”
Ne hein midlaus ensi Jesus, ne nekeuma zan diyà te sevaha he inged he zuen dutun bahi he egngezanan ki Marta. Impepemenahik ni Marta si Jesus dutun te valey zin.
Ne zuen dutun hazi ni Marta he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne mibpinuu si Maria ziyà te uvey ni Jesus su ebpurung ebpemineg te menge penurù ni Jesus.

Ne si Marta, ne iyan dà sikandin diyà te avu su ebaal te egkekaan dan ne mezakel is igkesamuk din he ebeelan din. Ne zutun mid-uvey sikandin diyà te ki Jesus he ke sikandin te, “Meupiya ve te g̵ehinawa nu he iyan e zà egkeviyuviyu he ebaal te egkekaan tew? Sug̵ua nu si Maria he ug̵upi e zin.”
Iyan, migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Marta, utew mezakel is igkesemuki nu he kenà utew ebpulus.
Sevaha zà is dekelà is pulus din he iyan mibpilì ni Maria ne kenà heini igkeawà diyà te kandin.”

Sengeandew, ne ed-ampù si Jesus diyà te Megbevayà. Ne te nekeipus sikandin te ed-ampù migkag̵i is sevaha zuen te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, “Datù, penurua key te ked-ampù su si Juan Megbebewtismu, mibpenurù din is menge sumusundan din te ked-ampù.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan heini iringi niw ke ed-ampù kew; ke sikiyu te,
‘Amey zey ziyà te langit,
berakat he tehuza te menusiyà is ngazan nu.
Berakat he medhadì ka te menusiyà.
Beg̵ayi key te egkeenen
he egkinehenglanen dey
te kada andew.
Peseyluwa key te menge salè dey
su sikami, ebpeseyluwen dey
is langun he nekesalà diyà te kenami.
Ne ipekeziyù key kenikew te mezesen he penuley.’ ”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Penenglitan is sevaha keniyu, duen emig̵u zin he edhendutun te kandin te metaneb en is kezukileman ne ke sikandin te, ‘He Geli, ipesambey e pa kenikew te egkekaan.
Su zuen meg̵eliyug ku he ziyà ebpuun te meziyù ne wazè ku igkepeg̵ana kandin.’

Ne zutun, edtavak sikandin dutun te valey zin te, ‘Es! egkepeg̵ulan ad he ed-enew su midlekevan ku en heeyan is gemawan ne nemekelipezeng en heini is menge anak ku kayi te hulid ku. Ne kenè e en ebpekeenew he ebeg̵ey ziyan te kenikew te egkekaan.’

Ne haazà,” ke si Jesus, “minsan ke kenà sikandin egkesuat he ed-enew he edtavang te emig̵u zin, iyan, ke kenà ed-engked haazà is edhangyù, ebpeketeg̵el sikandin ebpekeenew ne ibeg̵ey zin kandin is langun he kinahanglan din.

Ne venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he penigudu kew vuyù diyà te Megbevayà ne ebeg̵ayan kew zin; penigudu kew pen-ahà ne ibpeturedu zin keniyu is ebpen-ahaan niw; penigudu kew penelehuzan ne ebpuwasan kew zin.
Su is langun he ebuyù diyà te Megbevayà, ebpekezawat; ne sikan is ebpen-ahà, ebpeketuredu; ne sikan is ebpenelehuzan, ebpuwasan daan te Megbevayà.
Sikiyu is menge g̵inikanan, ke zuen ebuyuen te anak niw he pait, ne kenà egkehimu he uled is ibeg̵ey niw.
Ne emun impis is ebuyuen din, kenà daan egkehimu he venayew is ibeg̵ey niw.

Ne sikiyu is menusiyà he kenà memetazeng, emun meupiya is ibeg̵ey niw ziyà te menge anak niw, iyan pe be is Amey tew he Megbevayà diyà te langit kenà mebeg̵ey keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ke ebuyuen niw.”

Ne zuen timpu he mibewian ni Jesus is maama he midhimu he emew te mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandin. Ne hein impaawà ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin ne segugunà nekekag̵i haazà is maama. Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew he nengetig̵um dutun.
Iyan, duen dutun migkag̵i te, “Iyan mibeg̵ey kandin te g̵ehem te kebpenegseg te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin si Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.”
Ne zuen pa zutun menge etew he egezaman dan si Jesus. Midhangyù dan he ibpeehè din is egkein-inuwan su ed-ahaan dan ke tutuu ve he midsug̵ù sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is seled te g̵ehinawa zan ne migkag̵i sikandin te, “Penenglitan ke zuen hadì ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din ne meg̵aan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì. Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengepemilya ne ebpekungkuntedahà is menge sakup din, ne egkevengkag haazà is pemilya.
Ne emun egketebek ni Setanas is menge sakup din egkezeetan is gehem din. Kenà egkehimu is migkag̵i niw he pinaag̵i te g̵ehem ni Endedaman egkezaag ku is menge sakup din.

Emun iyan igkesegseg̵a ku te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is gehem he ebpuun diyà te ki Setanas ne hendei ves ebpuun is gehem te menge zuma niw he ebpenegseg te mezaat he mulin-ulin? Pinaag̵i te menge ulaula te menge sumusundan niw egketuusan he nengesayep kew.
Su heini is gehem ku te kebpemug̵ew te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne pinaag̵i kayi egketuusan niw he iyan en heini sikan is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà.”

Iyan, ke zuen tuwas pa he mezesen he ebpekeuma, egkezaag din haazà is nehuna, ne ed-eg̵awan din te menge g̵umaan he iyan edserig̵an dutun te etew ne ebpeneltelazen din haazà is netavan din diyà te menge sakup din.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sikan is kenè ku zuma, ne kuntada ku; sikan is kenà edtavang kedì, ne edsanggen kediey.

Ke ed-awà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te etew he edlelungen din, diyà ebayà te memaza he tanà su ebpen-ahà te egkeubpaan din. Ne emun wazè din egkeahà, egkag̵i sikandin te, ‘Edlikù a nasì diyà te neubpaan ku.’
Ne edlikù ne egkeehè din haazà is neubpaan din he midtines en is menge vutang dutun, ne nepurung melumpiyuwi.

Ne zutun edlikù edhipanew su ebpengakat te pitu he zuma zin he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he tuwas pa he memezaat kenà sikandin. Ne ed-ahuk dan ne ed-ubpè dan dutun te etew. Ne zutun ed-iseg pa ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dutun te etew, kenà te nehuna he kebpekesavuk din.”
Ne zutun hein neipus ni Jesus haazà is migkag̵i zin ne zuen dutun bahi he midhabet megkag̵i te, “Dekelà is kelipey te vahi he mid-anak kenikew wey nekepesusu kenikew!”
Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, “Lavew pa he zekelà is kelipey te etew he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne ebpezumdumahan din!”

Ne zutun hein egkengehasekhasek en is utew mezakel he menge etew he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus, migkag̵i sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, utew mezaat is menge ulaula niw. Egkesuatan niw he meehè niw is singyal he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit he tuus he midsug̵ù e zin, iyan, iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring te impeulaula zengan duen te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Jonas.

Su si Jonas, hein nekeuma sikandin dengan diyà te inged he Ninivi, impeehè din is singyal he tuus te silut te Megbevayà diyà te menge tigNinivi. Ne iring din ded daan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkehimu is penurù ku he tuus te meg̵aan en is ed-ul-ulahan keniyu te Megbevayà.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, sikan is tipehuna he bai he ebpuun te inged he Siba, edsewayen kew zin is menge etew g̵untaan su utew meziyù is midhipenawan din te kebpemineg dà te penurù ni Hadì Sulumun te utew metau. Ne g̵untaan, duen lavew pa kenà si Sulumun dini te keniyu ne wazè niw zewata is penurù din.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, edsewayen kew is menge etew g̵untaan te menge tigNinivi zengan su hein nezineg dan is penurù ni Jonas, mid-iniyug̵an dan is memezaat he ulaula. Ne g̵untaan duen ebpeneuven he lavew pa kenà si Jonas dini te keniyu, ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Wazà etew he edtemteman din is sulù ne id-eles din, ne emun kenà, ne ebpelengkevan din te revan, kekenà, diyè din idsavuk te sevukà, ne emun duen etew he edseled ne egketeyawan.
Is mata te etew, ne iring te sulù diyà te lawa zin su emun merayag is ked-ehè din,
Iring din ded daan is sulù te isip te etew,
he ulaula zin, ne henduen be te utew merayag is egkeulaula zin iring te egketeyawan sikandin te sulù.”
Ne hein nekeipus dutun si Jesus is ebpenurù ne zuen sevaha zutun he Perisiyu he mid-umbita kandin te kegkaan diyà te valey zin. Ne midhendiyà si Jesus ne migkaan.
Ne naahà dutun te Perisiyu he migkaan si Jesus he wazè din lùlui is belad din. Ne utew sikandin neinuinu su nesupak ni Jesus is betasan te menge Perisiyu.

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, ebpurungan niw ebentayi is menge vetasan niw, iyan, diyà te isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw ne zuen keheheramham wey kelelalung. Iring kew te vasu wey pinggan he nelumpiyuwan diyà te g̵awas, iyan, meremerik is diyà te seled.

Menge wazè niw isip! Is Megbevayà he midlimbag din is gawas te lawa niw, midlimbag din daan is gehinawa wey isip niw. Ne kinahanglan he lumpiyu is gehinawa niw wey isip niw iring te g̵awas te lawa niw.
Ne sumalà is egkehimu niw, beg̵ayi niw is menge egkengeayuayu ne human egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan kew egkepurungi.

Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su ibeg̵ey niw te Megbevayà is ikepulù he vahin minsan te menge perehemut te egkeenen iring te yirbebuyna wey vawing wey is langun he menge edlumbayen, iyan, is metazeng he ulaula wey is kebmahala niw te Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa niw, ne wazè niw isipa. Kinahanglan he iveg̵ey niw is ikepulù, iyan, kenè niw zaan ipeliyu heini is menge lavew pa he sug̵ù.

Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su emun diyè kew te simbahan egkesuatan niw he ibpepinuu kew ziyà te menge pinuuwà te menge egalen. Ne emun diyè kew te tiyenggiyan, utew ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa niw ke edtehuzen kew te menge etew.
Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su iring kew te menge leveng he kenà egketuusan ne egkeg̵iekan te etew,
Ne zutun duen menunudlù te kesug̵uan dutun he migkag̵i ziyà te ki Jesus te, “Datù, heeyan is menge lalag nu, ne nesug̵at key zaan keniyan.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Sikiyu zaan is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, kehizu niw zaan su utew mezakel is mereg̵en he tulumanen he ibpetuman niw te menge etew, iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he idtavang niw kandan wey zan meketuman dutun te ibpetuman niw kandan.
Mekehizuhizu kew utew keuzemà su mideyzeyanan niw is mibpenlevengan duen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, menge kevuwazan kew te nememunù kandan.

Is menge kepuun niw, ne iyan mibunù, ne midhimasad niw haazà is mezaat he mid-ulaula zan su iyan kew midayandayan te midlevengan; mid-ulaula niw heini he tuus te egkesuatan niw is mezaat he vaal te menge kepuun niw.

Is Megbevayà he utew metau, migkag̵i sikandin dengan te, ‘Ibpehendiyan ku pa te kandan is ebpemeneuven wey is menge epustul. Ne edhimetayan dan is duma ne is duma ebpesipelahan dan.’ Umba migkag̵i heini te Megbevayà su netuenan din he sikiyu is menge Hudiyu, nesevaha is gehinawa niw te g̵ehinawa te menge kepuun niw.
Umba sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan te kebpemunua te langun he menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà he nengevunù dengan

puunè pa te kedhimetayi ki Abel pehendiyà te kedhimetayi ki Zacarias he mibunù diyà te pid-elangan te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà wey vangkù he pemuhatà. Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he sikiyu is menge etew g̵untaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan tenged kayi!

Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà sikiyu is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan su ed-elangan niw is menge etew wey zan kenà metueni is hustu he ibpevayà pehendiyà te Megbevayà. Kenè kew egkesuat he ed-ikul te hustu he ibayà, iyan, ed-eg̵enen niw is etew he egkesuat he ed-ikul zutun!”

Ne hein mid-awà si Jesus dutun te valey te Perisiyu, midreg̵enreg̵en sikandin te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Mezakel is menge insè dan kandin su edteg̵elen dan sikandin wey meketavak
su ebpengahaan dan is paag̵i wey mehimu si Jesus he igkesumbung dan.

Ne sevaha he andew, utew mezakel he menge etew is edhahasekhasek he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus. Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus, asal iyan egkeg̵iyan din is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, “Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Perisiyu, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, is tarù he kedtuu zan te Megbevayà.
Kunaan dan ke kenà egketuenan he tarù is kedtuu zan, iyan, is langun he midtembunan he ed-ul-ulahan te etew, ne egketuenan ded wey is minsan hengkey he nekeeles ne ibpeg̵awag̵awa g̵ihapun.

Is langun he ednèneesen niw te mezukilem, ne egkezineg ke maandew wey is minsan hengkey he egkegkeg̵iyen niw he meeles diyà te rug̵u niw, ne egketuenan ded te mezakel he menge etew ziyà te tiyenggiyan.
Ne sikiyu is menge emig̵u ku, iyan egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu is: kenè kew mahandek te menge etew zà duen su iyan dà egkepatey zan is lawa niw, iyan, is gimukud niw, kenè dan egkepatey.

Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu ke hentei is engayan he igkehandek niw. Iyan niw ikehandek is Megbevayà su kenè din iyan dà egkepatey is lawa niw su zuen din keg̵ehem he ebpeketimbag te g̵imukud niw ziyà te Impirnu. Uya, iyan niw sikandin ikehandek!”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Duen tagbis he egkepemasa te etew is lelima he vuuk te dezuwa zà he tumbag̵a. Ne minsan pa zutun, is Megbevayà, kenè din id-awà diyà te isip din is minsan sevaha kandan.

Ne iyan kew pe be is minsan ke edtigselimbahan te ebilang is bulvul niw ne netuenan din en is kezakel. Umba, kenè kew mahandek su lavew kew he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà te minsan utew mezakel he menge tagbis.”

“Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku,” ke si Jesus, “he sikan is etew he egkag̵i ziyà te menge etew he iyan a egalen din, ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ed-engkenen ku zaan sikandin diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsug̵uen te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Ne sikan is etew he egkag̵i ziyà te menge etew he kenà a iyan egalen din, ne kenè ku zaan sikandin ed-engkenen diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsug̵uen te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
Ne sikan is edsumpalit kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne egkepesaylu pa; iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkepesaylu.

Ne emun tenged te kedtuu niw kedì ed-uwiten kew te menge etew ziyà te menge simbahan dan su edhukuman kew zan ne emun ed-imbistigahan kew zaan diyà te etuvangan te menge hadì wey huwis, kenè kew meseeng ke hengkey is idtavak niw kandan wey ke hengkey is paag̵i niw zutun.
Su is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpenurù keniyu zutun he timpu; ne egketag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa niw is ibpekag̵i zin keniyu.”
Ne zuen sevaha he maama zutun te nengevurun he menge etew. Ke sikandin te, “Datù, iyan ka metau te kakey ku he vehini e zin te menge azen he kevilin dey te amey zey he minatey en.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Wazè ku kelavet keniyan su kenà a iyan edhusey keniyu.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, “Purungi niw ventayi is ulaula niw su wey wazà keleleg̵ed diyan te keniyu. Su is ibmeupiya te untung te etew, kenà ebpuun te mezakel he menge azen.”
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan is sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Duen etew he utew egketig̵ayun su zuen tanè din he utew uuzaran.
Ne neisip dutun te etew is, ‘Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku kayi te langun he uzar ku? Su kenà egkeamin kayi te menge budiga ku ne wazè en egketeg̵uan ku.’
Ne ke sikandin te, ‘Edrundusen ku heini is menge budiga ku ne ed-uman a ebevaley te utew zekelà su wey ku zuen meteg̵ui te langun he egkerag̵un ku wey zuma pa he menge azen ku.

Ne zutun, geina te utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku he etew, kenà ad maan edterebahu su naazen ku en is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku taman te pira pa he tuig. Ne tenged kayi ebperenggey e zà is ebpurung egkaan, ed-inum, wey edlipeylipey,’ ke sikandin.

Iyan, dutun migkag̵i ziyà te kandin is Megbevayà te, ‘Utew ka tulebung he etew! Guntaan dà te mezukilem egkeumuran ke en ne ebpatey kad, ne hentei vuwa is ebpekeangken te langun he menge azen nu he intag̵ù nu keniyan te valey nu?’ ”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew, ke sikandin te, “Iring kayi te sepian he etew is minsan hentei he edtipig te zekelà he ketig̵eyunan, iyan, wazà diyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he igkesuat te Megbevayà.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Ne tenged kayi egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he kenè kew meseeng te egkeenen he igkeuyag niw. Ne kenè kew zaan meseeng te ugelingen he idsun-ud te lawa niw.
Su mibeg̵ayan kew te Megbevayà te g̵ehinawa wey lawa he mahal utew; ne wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebeg̵ayan kew zin daan te egkeenen wey ugelingen?

Isipa niw is menge uwak; kenè dan ebpemula; kenè dan edrag̵un ne wazè dan daan lawig he ederengdengan dan. Ne minsan pa zutun ebpengelintau is Megbevayà te egkekaan dan. Ne iyan kew pe be is etew he lavew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà is menge uwak!
Ne minsan sengemenu is kegkenug̵uni te etew te untung din, wazà minsan hengkey he paag̵i he egkesumpatan din te minsan deisey zà.
Ne emun pinaag̵i te kegkeseeng niw wazè niw egkehimu te minsan kayi te utew zeisey he ebeelan, hengkey is pulus te kedseengseeng niw pa maan te zuma he ebeelan?

Ahaa niw is menge kevukazan ke hengkey is kedtuvù dan. Kenè dan edterebahu ne kenè dan daan ebpengavel. Ne minsan pa zutun, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he minsan si Hadì Sulumun dengan he utew sepian wey nevantug, ne wazà mekesusuluwan is kezagwey te menge bisti zin te kezagwey kayi te menge kevukazan.

Is sagbet, ne wazè din bali; egkeehè ta g̵untaan ne kenè en utew egkeug̵et ne egkeg̵angu en, ne ebinsulan en. Iyan, ke edhimuwen te Megbevayà he mekempet minsan heini is menge sagbet, iyan kew pe be kenè din daan meveg̵ayi te igkeuugelingen! Maan is utew zeisek is kedsarig niw kandin?
Kenè kew meseeng! Kenè niw iyan isipa ke hengkey is egkekaan niw wey egkeinum.

Su is iring keniyan, ne iyan igkengeseeng te menge etew he wazà medtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenè niw ikeseeng is iring dutun su is Amey niw he Megbevayà, netuenan din he egkinehenglanen niw heini is langun.
Iyan niw ul-ulaha is ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà he iyan edhadì keniyu ne ibeg̵ey zin diyà te keniyu is langun he egkinehenglanen niw.
Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, kenè kew mahandek. Minsan pa te zeisey kew zà, is Amey niw he Megbevayà, egkesuatan din he medhadì kew iring te edhadì daan sikandin.

Ivelegyè niw is langun he azen niw ne ipemeg̵ey niw is halin diyà te menge egkengeayuayu. Pinaag̵i kayi egkehimu he zuen ketig̵eyunan niw ziyà te langit. Is menge azen niw ziyà te langit, ne kenà egkezeetan ne kenà egketerinan su wazà ebpenakew ne wazà ipes he ebpekeketket.
Ne ke hendei is egketeg̵uan te ketig̵eyunan niw ne zutun daan is gehinawa niw.”

Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, “Andam kew he zaan su wey kenè kew metingkemed te minsan hengkey. Iringi niw is sulug̵uen he edtag̵ad te egalen dan he ebpuun te eseweey he midtelavuk din.
Su haazà is menge sulug̵uen, ne layun dan ed-andam ne kenè dan ed-evukan is sulù dan ne emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne ebpenelehuzan diyà te pultahan ne petuluy zan egkepuwasi.

Utew meupiya is kegeg̵ehinawa zutun te menge sulug̵uen emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne zaan dan neendami haazà is kebpekeuma zin. Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he haazà is egalen dan, ibpepinuu zin sikandan diyà te lemisahan ne iyan sikandin ebpekaan kandan.
Utew egkengelipey sikandan ke ebpekeuma is egalen dan he kemulu zan pa sikandin edteg̵azi minsan ke liwazè en is kezukileman wey minsan ke egkepkepawè en be.”

Ne ke si Jesus maan te, “Kenè niw heini lipati he emun egketuenan te teg̵ivaley ke keenu ebpekeuma is tekawen ne ebpekepurung sikandin ebpekevantey ne kenà ebpekeseled dutun te valey zin haazà is tekawen.
Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he mebpekevantey kew su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpekeuma a te uras he wazè niw isipa he ebpekeuma a.”
Ne zutun, mid-insà si Pedro, ke sikandin te, “Heini is sempità he migkag̵i nu, iyan key zè be kenikew ebpenuruen is menge sumusundan nu, wey ke elin be is menge etew?”

Ne midtavak is Nengazen te, “Sikan is sulug̵uen he uluwanen wey metinumanen, iyan ibpevayàbayà te egalen din te menge zuma zin he sulug̵uen. Ne iyan ebpekaan te menge zuma zin he sulug̵uen dutun te uras te kegkaan.
Emun ed-ulì haazà is egalen din, utew zekelà is kelipey zutun te sulug̵uen ke egkeahà te egalen din he midtuman din is langun he ebpeveelan kandin.
Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he is sulug̵uen he metinumanen, idsarig kandin is langun he menge azen te egalen din.

Iyan, kehizu zin ke iyan diyà te isip din is menaney pa ed-ulì haazà is egalen din ne ebpemug̵elen din is menge zuma zin he sulug̵uen he maama wey vahi ne iyan dà baal zin is egkaan wey ed-inum ne egkelangut.

Su zutun te andew he wazè din peebuta wey te uras he wazè din metueni, ebpekeulì haazà is egalen din. Ne haazà is sulug̵uen, ebeelan diyà te kandin is iring te ebeelan diyà te menge sulug̵uen he kenà egkeserig̵an ne edhimetayan sikandin te egalen din.

Ne sikan is sulug̵uen he netuenan din en is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, wazà med-andam ne wazà medtuman te ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, ne kenà sikandin ed-uraman te ebug̵el zutun te egalen din.

Ne sikan is sulug̵uen he wazè din pa metueni is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, duen mid-ulaula zin he igkepeuki kandin te egalen din, ne kenà utew sikandin ebug̵elen.” Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is etew he zekelà is insarig kandin, dekelà daan is ebperetengen diyà te kandin. Ne emun utew pa zekelà is insarig kandin ne utew en daan dekelà is ebperetengen diyà te kandin.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan ku impehendini su wey dini te kelibutan duen hapuy,
Duen ibewtismu kedì
Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan impehengkayi ku te kelibutan is wey wazè en samuk te menusiyà. Iyan kenà! Su heini is kebpekehendini ku, ne zuen kebpemekedsusuwey te g̵ehinawa te menge etew.
Puun guntaan tenged kedì emun duen lelima he etew ziyà te sengepeningaan, egkevahin sikandan. Ebpekigkuntada is tetelu te zezuwa. Ne iring din ded daan ebpekigkuntada haazà is dezuwa zutun te tetelu.

Ebpekigkuntada is maama te anak din he maama ne is anak, ne ebpekigkuntada te amey zin. Ne is bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te anak din he vahi ne is anak din, ne ebpekigkuntada zaan te iney zin. Ne ke zuen bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te ambey zin. Ne egkuntedahan daan sikandin te ambey zin.”
Ne migkag̵i med-uman si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, “Dini te kenitew ke egkeehè niw is kivel ziyà te edsenlepan ne ke sikiyu te, ‘Ed-uzan heini,’ ne ed-uzan iyan.
Ne emun ebpengeramag he ebpuun te zapit te zivavà ne ke sikiyu te, ‘Ebmeinit utew g̵untaan,’ ne ed-andew iyan.

Tarù is ulaula niw! Su emun ed-ahaan niw is langit wey tanà egketuenan niw ke hengkey is egkehitavù te timpu, iyan, kenè niw uvag egkesavut ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan guntaan te Megbevayà pinaag̵i kedì.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Deyzey ke ed-isipen niw is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan.

Penenglitan duen etew he idsumbung kew zin, ne ed-uwiten kew zin diyà te hukmanan. Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey kew kandin mebpekidhusey te kenè kew pa ebpekeetuvang te huwis. Su emun ebpekeetuvang kew en te huwis, kela ke izata kew zin diyà te pulis ne egkepirisu kew.
Ne zutun kew ebpekeubpà taman te kenè niw pa egkeg̵empusan is multa keniyu.”

Ne zutun he timpu zuen nemekeuma he menge etew ne mibpenudtul zan diyà te ki Jesus is mehitenged te menge etew he tigGeliliya he impehimetayan ni Gubirnedur Pilatu zutun te timpu te kebpelengesa zutun te menge etew te langgam diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà.

Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Kunaan niw vuwa ke lavew pa he mekesesalà haazà is menge tigGeliliya, kenà is menge zuma zan he tigGeliliya, ne tenged dutun intug̵ut te Megbevayà he edhimetayan sikandan.
Kenà heeyan iyan! Su egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyug̵an is menge ulaula niw he memezaat, ebpatey kew zaan is langun, iring kandan.

Ne isipa niw zaan is sepulù wey walu he menge etew he nemematey hein nepilayan sikandan te metikang he valey ziyà te Siluwi. Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan kandan ingkepilayi su utew lavew sikandan he mekesesalà kenà te langun he menge zuma zan he tigHiruselim.
Kenà daan. Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyug̵an is memezaat he menge ulaula niw ne ebpatey kew zaan is langun iring kandan.”
Ne zuen en maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan.

Ne migkeg̵iyan din is impeelima zin dutun te kayu, ke sikandin te, ‘Nemenu vuwa heini is kayu he kenè en ebeg̵asbeg̵as? Su tetelu en he tuig is kebperetenga ku ke ebeg̵as ne kenè en iyan ebeg̵as. Pilaya nu nasì su ebpekehenung dà kayi te zuma he pinemula.’
Iyan, migkag̵i haazà is impeelima zutun te, ‘Kenè te pa zè pa, Anggam, ebpilayen su ebpeseseg̵azen te pa seled te sengetuig. Edhig̵ewanan ku pa is pelingut ne ebukbukan ku pa te pelambù te pinemula.
Ne emun ebeg̵as te ilis he tuig ne meupiya, ne emun kenà ebeg̵as ne ebpilayen ku.’ ”
Ne sevaha he andew he Sebadu, diyà si Jesus ebpenurù te simbahan te menge Hudiyu.
Ne zuen dutun te simbahan bahi he nevekut su midlalung te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne menge sepulù en wey walu he tuig haazà is kegkevekut din ne kenè en iyan egkevulug egkeketeng te minsan deisey zà.
Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Jesus kandin, mid-umew zin ne ke sikandin te, “Ayà, egkeulian ke en keniyan te zaru nu.”
Ne midsamsam ni Jesus is peka zutun te vahi ne zutundutun ne neketeng is peka zin. Ne nekezaligdalig haazà is bahi te Megbevayà.

Ne is egalen dutun te simbahan, utew nepauk dutun te kebpemawì ni Jesus dutun te Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge etew te, “Seled te heenem he andew is kedterebahu tew te sengesimana. Emun ebpevawì kew zutun he timpu ne meupiya, iyan, kenè kew pevawì guntaan te Andew te Kedhimeley!”

Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, “Tarù is menge ulaula niw! Ke zuen baka ne emun kenà ne kudà te minsan hentei keniyu, kenà egkehimu he kenè din edhekazan haazà emun Andew te Kedhimeley, kekenà, edhekazan din ne edtuyuken din pehendiyà te wahig su ibpeinum din.
Ne heini g̵untaan is bahi he kevuwazan daan ni Abraham, ne mibakus ni Setanas te sepulù en wey walu he tuig, ne kenè niw ves ebpehekazan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley!”
Ne haazà is tavak ni Jesus, utew ingkeeled te menge kuntada zin. Ne is duma zutun he mezakel he menge etew, utew zan nengelipey te langun he menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan din.
Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is selakew en maan he sempità, ke sikandin te, “Hengkey is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?

Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisey is lisu zin. Ibpemula heini te etew ziyà te kamet din ne ke edtuvù ne edekelà ne egkehimu he iring kezekelà te kayu ne egkeletunan te menge tagbis ne egkeseselag̵an dan is menge subpang din.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Hengkey pa is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?

Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te tapey. Su ke zuen bahi he ebaal te supas, egkuwaan din haazà is tapey ne idsahug din te sengebisin he erina. Ne ed-ensak haazà is tapey zutun te erina ne edtulin haazà is erina.”
Midhipanew si Jesus pehendiyà te inged he Hiruselim ne zutun te kedhipanew zin ne mibpenuluytuluy ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged su ebpenurù te menge etew.
Ne zuen mid-insà kandin te, “Datù, deisey zè be is menge etew he ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te,

“Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw wey kew mekeseled te melig̵et he g̵emawan he idselang dutun te valey he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he mezakel is egkesuat pezem he edseled dutun, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeseled.

Su edlekevan te teg̵ivaley haazà is gemawan. Ne emun diyè kew pa te g̵awas ebpenelehuzan kew is egkag̵i te, ‘Puwasi key kenikew!’ Ne iyan dà idtavak dutun te teg̵ig̵aked is, ‘Kenè ku egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun.’
Ne zutun edtavak kew te, ‘Dengan migkaan key wey mid-inum key zuma kenikew ne mibpenurù ka ziyà te inged dey!’
Ne edtevaken kew zin te, ‘Kenè ku iyan egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun. Sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula, awè kew en dini.’

Ne zutun,” ke si Jesus, “utew zekelà he erang niw ne ebpemekengingitel kew tenged te utew ibmesakit pezem te g̵ehinawa niw su kenè kew ebpekeragkes dutun te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te seled, ne egkeehè niw is menge kepuun niw zengan, ensi Abraham wey sikan is anak din he si Isaak wey sikan is apù din he si Hakub wey elin daan dutun is langun he ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà.

Mezakel zaan dutun is menge etew he kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu he ebpemuun diyà te heepat he pesag̵i kayi te kelibutan. Ne ebpemekepinuu sikandan dutun te keemuran te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà.

Duen guntaan menge etew he kunaan niw ke egkengehuziyan su kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkehuna te langun he edhedian te Megbavayà. Ne zuen daan menge etew g̵untaan he kunaan niw ke egkengehuna, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkengehuziyan te langun.”
Ne zutun daan he andew ne zuen menge Perisiyu he midhinguma zan si Jesus, ne ke sikandan te, “Laus ke en ne kenè ke en tuluy zini te kenami su edhimetayan ke kun ni Hadì Hirudis.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Si Hirudis, haazà is utew metau he ed-akal, keg̵iyi niw sikandin he kenè e pa ed-awà dini su g̵untaan wey keeselem ebpenegseg̵en ku pa is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew, ne ebewian ku is egkengezeruwan. Ne mekezuwa pa g̵untaan ne human egkeipus heini is menge vaal ku zini.

Iyan, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he kinahanglan he ednaneynaney e zè pa edlaus guntaan wey keeselem wey te mekezuwa pa su kenà egkehimu he edhimetayan a zini su is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, ne kenà tekew en edhimetayan ke kenà diyà te seled te inged he Hiruselim.”

Ne zutun netenuzan ni Jesus is menge ulaula te menge meg̵inged te Hiruselim ne ke sikandin te, “Igkeseeng ku sikiyu is menge meg̵inged diyà te Hiruselim su ebpemunuen niw is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà ne is menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayà he ibpehendiyàn, ebpenulengen niw te vatu he edhimetayan niw. Utew zekelà is suat ku pezem he ed-uyemuwen ku sikiyu; ke và dà manuk, iring a te upa he edlekupan din is menge piyak din ne kenè kew ebpelekup.

Ne g̵untaan, utew mekevulungbulung heini is simbahan niw su mid-iniyug̵an kew en te Megbevayà. Su egkeg̵iyen ku he kenà ad maan keniyu egkeahà taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ebpekekag̵i kew te, ‘Delig̵a is nekeuma he midsug̵ù te Nengazen.’ ”

Ne sevaha maan he Andew te Kedhimeley, ne mid-umbite en maan si Jesus te sevaha he pengulu te menge Perisiyu he ziyà ibpekaan te valey zin. Ne is menge kuntada ni Jesus, mibpurungan dan sikandin bentayi ke egkesupak din is kesug̵uan.
Ne zuen dutun maama he egkezeruwan su midlevag is menge paa zin wey velad din ne mid-uvey heini ziyà te ki Jesus.

Ne si Jesus, mid-insaan din is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey is menge Perisiyu, ke sikandin te, “Sumalà is ibpenurù kenitew te insurat he kesug̵uan, ebpekesalè ki ve ke ebpemawì ki ke Andew te Kedhimeley?”
Iyan, wazè dan tevaka si Jesus, ne zutun migewezan ni Jesus haazà is egkezeruwan ne zutundutun ne neulian. Ne impeulì sikandin ni Jesus.

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge etew zutun te, “Hengkey ve is ed-ul-ulahan niw ke zuen niw anak, ne emun kenà, ne vaka niw he egkeulug diyà te mezalem he vudsi emun Andew te Kedhimeley. Siguradu, edtevangan niw minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.”
Ne zutun ne wazè dan meketavak.

Ne zuen daan dutun menge etew he mid-umbita zaan dutun te Perisiyu. Ne hein ebpememinuu zan en is egkaan ne naahà ni Jesus he ebpilien te menge etew is ebpinuuwan dan he meupiya he ebpinuuwan he zutun ibpepinuu is menge lavew he menge etew. Ne tenged kayi impezineg ni Jesus kandan is penurù din, ke sikandin te,
“Emun egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki edhuna ebpinuu ziyà te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Su kela ke zuen pa ebpekeuma he lavew is ked-etew zin kenè ki.

Ne egkeg̵iyan ki zutun te midtukud te keemuran te, ‘Ibpahalin ki su ebpepinuuwan dutun te lavew kenè ki, haazà is mibpinuuwan ta.’ Ne utew ki zutun egkeeled ke ziyè ki ibpepinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan.

Iyan, ke egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki ebpemilì te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne emun ebpinuu ki en, diyè ki ebpinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne zutun, haazà is midtukud te keemuran, ebpekekag̵i kenita te, ‘He Geli, kenè ka keniyan mebpinuu su kayi ka pinuu te meupiya he ebpinuuwan.’ Ne zutun, kenè ki egkeeled, kekenà, egketahud ki te menge etew.

Sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he lavew is pid-etawan din ne ebminusen heini te Megbevayà. Iyan, sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he minus is pid-etawan din ne ebpeketikangen te Megbevayà is pid-etawan din.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus dutun te midtukud te keemuran te, “Ne sikew zaan, Mama, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne kenè nu iyan dà umbitaha is menge kilala nu wey is menge suled nu wey menge siringan nu he sepian su sikandan, ne neezenan dan mulà ne edsembayan ke zan ed-umbitaha ke edtukud dan te keemuran ne zutun ebpekevales dan en te meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan.
Iyan, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne iyan nu umbitaha is egkengeayuayu wey is menge pigket, menge pungkul, wey is menge lakap.

Ne emun iyan heini ulaula nu ne utew zekelà is kelipey nu su kenè dan ebpekesambey he ed-umbita kenikew ne kenè dan egkevelesan is meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan, ne iyan is Megbevayà ebales kenikew te utew meupiya he egkeulaula zutun keuzemà te kegkengevanhew te menge etew he memeupiya is ulaula.”

Ne is sevaha zutun te menge maama he ebpememinuu ziyà te uvey ni Jesus, hein nezineg din haazà is penurù ni Jesus ne migkag̵i te, “Utew zekelà is kelipey te menge etew he ebpeketelavuk dutun keuzemà te keemuran he zutun ibpekaan is langun he menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà!”
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandin is sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Duen sevaha he etew he midtukud te zekelà he keemuran. Ne haazà is etew, ne mezakel is menge etew he mid-umbita zin.

Ne hein netuman en haazà is keemuran ne midsug̵ù din is sulug̵uen din he ibpetukew en is menge etew su nengelutù en is igastu. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge sulug̵uen din te, ‘Keg̵iyi niw sikandan he medhendini zan en su naandam en is langun!’

Iyan, is menge etew he mid-umbita zin, ne wazà diyà te g̵ehinawa zan haazà is keemuran. Is kada sevaha zutun ne mibpemituwà te kenà ebpeketelavuk dutun. Is duma ne egkag̵i te, ‘Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk su zuen tanà he veg̵u ku pa he nepemasa ne edleuyen ku g̵untaan.’
Ne is sevaha pa maan dutun ne migkag̵i te, ‘Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk te keemuran su zuen sepulù he vaka he sikan ku pa mepemasa ne igezam ku id-edadu!’
Ne is sevaha pa he etew zutun, ne egkag̵i te, ‘Kenà a ebpeketelavuk su sikan pa meipus is kebpeesewaa kediey ne umba kenà a ebpekehendiyan.’

Ne zutun mid-ulì haazà is midsug̵ù te edtukud te keemuran ne midtudtul zin diyà te egalen din haazà is langun he menge pituwà te menge etew he impeveyaan kandin. Ne haazà is egalen din, ne utew mibmezaat is gehinawa zin. Ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is sulug̵uen din te, ‘Hendiyè ka te inged ne ikula nu is menge kersada wey menge zalan dutun ne pendumaha nu zini is menge etew he egkengeayuayu, sikan is menge piang, menge pungkul, wey menge lakap.’ Ne zutun midhipanew haazà is sulug̵uen.
Ne hein nekeulì en haazà is midsug̵ù ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is egalen din te, ‘Nemekeume en is menge etew he impeveyaan nu, iyan, wazè pa meenget heini is baley.’

Ne midtavak haazà is egalen din te, ‘Hendiyè ka te menge unayan wey vuntud ne ikula nu is menge zalan dutun ne teg̵ela nu is menge etew zutun he medtelavuk dan kayi te keemuran ku su wey mepurung meenget te menge etew heini is baley ku.
Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he haazà is nengehuna he mid-umbita ku, ne kenè dan ebpekekaan te minsan deisey zà kayi te g̵astu ku te keemuran!’ ”
Ne sengeandew zutun te edhipanew si Jesus ne utew mezakel is menge etew he ebpemenduma kandin. Ne midsineruwan din sikandan te egkag̵i te,

“Sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is ginikanan din, esawa zin, menge anak din, menge suled din, ne emun kenà, ne iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is keugelingen din he lawa, ne kenà egkehimu he tutuu sikandin he sumusundan ku.
Ne iring din ded daan sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, kenà edtiang te krus din,

Penenglitan, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he ebevaley te utew metikang he valey, ne zutun te kenè pa sikandin ebpuun ne egkuwintahan din is selapì he egkeg̵astu zin su wey zin metueni ke egkeveleveg din be haazà is baley he ibpehitindeg din wey ke kenà.

Su emun kenè din egkuwintahan is selapì he igkeg̵astu zin ne kela ke tekew zin en ikepasek is menge tukud ne zutun dà taman. Ne is mezakel he menge etew he ebpekeahà dutun ne ebpemenggemenggemen is edsudì su haazà is baley, ne tekew en tukud he ingkepasek.
Ne ebpelelelag̵è dan te, ‘Tumù pa ke wazè en sikandin mebulug mebpasek te ebelayen su kenè din bes egkehimu.’ ”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iring din ded daan is hadì. Su is hadì he ebpekidtebek te sengehahadì ne kinahanglan he edhuna sikandin ebelansi ke ebpekezaag is sepulù he libu he menge sundaru zin te keluwaan he libu he ebpemekeuma he sundaru te kuntada zin he sengehahadì.

Ne emun egkevelansi zin he kenà ebpekesukul is menge sundaru zin, ne meupiya pa ke edsug̵uen din is menge sulug̵uen din dutun te kuntada zin te meziyù pa is menge sundaru te kuntada zin su wey zan mebpehusayà te wazè pa mekevulug mekedtebek is menge sundaru zan.

Ne iring din ded daan,” ke si Jesus, “su sikiyu is edsundan kediey, kenè kew egkehimu he tutuu he menge sumusundan ku emun kenè egkeawà diyà te g̵ehinawa niw is ked-engkezi niw te langun he egkenug̵unan niw.”
Ne wazè en iyan pulus din su kenà egkeg̵amit te minsan ebunu he pelambù te tanà ne ed-engkezan dà. Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.”
Ne zutun he timpu, duen mezakel he menge mekesesalà he etew he menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken te kesug̵uan, ne nemenhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su ebpemineg̵en dan is penurù din.

Ne utew heini ingkeepes te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan he zutun daan, ne ke sikandan te, “Heini si Jesus, ne ebpemekiduma kayi te menge etew he utew mesinupaken te kesug̵uan tew ne egkaan daan sikandin duma kandan.”
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan heini is sempità, ke sikandin te,

“Penenglitan, is sevaha keniyu ke zuen din nenggatus he ayam he kerehidu, ne netazin is sevaha zutun, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din? Siguradu egkeewaan din haazà is kesiyawan wey siyew he ebpemenabtab su ebpengahaan din haazà is sevaha he netazin taman te egketuredu zin.
Ne emun egketuredu zin ne utew sikandin egkelipey. Ne edsepipiyen din haazà su ed-ulì.
Ne ke ebpekeuma sikandin diyà te valey zin ne ebpenewag̵en din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din ne ke sikandin te, ‘Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is netazin he kerehidu ku.’ ”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he iring din ded daan, utew zekelà is kelipey ziyà te langit ke zuen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyug̵an din is memezaat he ulaula zin, kenà dutun te kesiyawan wey siyew he menge etew he kunaan dan ke memetazeng is ulaula zan wey kenà kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an dan haazà is mezaat he ulaula zan.”

Ne zuen pa maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan. Ke sikandin te, “Duen sevaha he vahi he midtipig te sepulù he elad he selapì he mahal su pudu pelata. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din ke egketezinan haazà te sengeelad? Iyan ed-ul-ulahan din is edhuna edtemtem te sulù. Ne ebpeyupasan din is baley zin, ne ebpurungan din te ebpen-ahà taman te egkeehè din.
Ne emun egkeehè din ne ebpenewag̵en din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din, ne ke sikandin te, ‘Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is selapì he netazin ku.’ ”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus med-uman te, “Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he iring kayi is kedlipey ziyà te langit te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà emun duen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyug̵an din is memezaat he ulaula zin.”
Ne impelaus ni Jesus is egkeg̵iyen din, ke sikandin te, “Duen sevaha he etew he zezuwa is anak din he pudu maama.

Ne migkag̵i is hazi ziyà te amey zin te, ‘Amà, iveg̵ey nu en kedì is kediey he vahin kayi te menge azen tew.’ Ne iyan dà haazà ne mibahin dutun te amey is menge azen din dutun te zezuwa he vuuk he anak din.

Ne wazà utew meug̵et dutun ne imbelegyè en dutun te hazi is kandin he vahin ne midhipanew is ed-uwit te selapì din. Diyà sikandin medtandang te meziyù he inged ne zutun migastu zin is selapì din te wazà pulus.
Ne zutun naamin is selapì din. Ne nekeuma is utew mepait he vitil zutun te tanà, ne sikandin, wazè din en egkekuwaan te kinahanglan din.
Ne midhangyù sikandin te terebahu ziyà te sevaha he meg̵inged dutun. Ne mibeg̵ayan sikandin te terebahu he kebpenamak te vavuy ziyà te unayan.
Egkesuatan din pezem he mahantey sikandin te minsan ukap dà he idsamak te menge vavuy, iyan, wazà dutun mibeg̵ey kandin.
Ne hein neug̵et dutun ne nekepurung sikandin mekeisip-isip. Ke sikandin te, ‘Langun te menge sulug̵uen te amey ku ne idsegkayè dan is egkeenen, iyan, siaken heini, ne egkeumes e en te vitil.
Iyan tumù ne ed-ulì e zed diyà te amey ku, ne iyan egkeg̵iyen ku ziyà te kandin is: Amà, dekelà utew is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey zini te kenikew te amey ku.
Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu, kekenà, isipe e zà kenikew he sevaha te menge sulug̵uen nu.’
Ne iyan dà haazà neisip din ne zutun midtandang sikandin med-ulì.

Ne meziyù pa sikandin ne nepantew en dutun te amey zin. Ne utew nehizu haazà is amey zin he ed-ahà kandin. Ne mibpelelag̵uy is amey zin he edsinug̵ung kandin ne migkepkepan ne midhezekan sikandin te amey zin.

‘Amà,’ egkag̵i haazà is kenakan, ‘utew zekelà is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey ziyan te kenikew te amey ku. Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu. Ne himuwe e zà he sevaha te menge sulug̵uen nu.’

Iyan, haazà is amey zin, mid-umew zin is menge sulug̵uen din dutun te valey, ne ke sikandin te, ‘Ihated niw pa zini sikan is meupiya he ugelingen, ne isun-ud niw ziyà te kandin. Sisingi niw is tezù din wey sun-uzi niw te sepatus is menge paa zin.
Ne kuwaa niw sikan is nati he vaka he impelambù ku ne lepaa niw su egkaan kiw ne edlipey kiw.
Su heini is anak ku, iring te minatey sikandin ne g̵untaan neuyag̵an. Netazin sikandin ne g̵untaan neturedu en.’ Ne zutun nebibu zan.

Ne haazà maan,” ke si Jesus, “is kakey he anak dutun te etew, diyà sikandin te unayan dan. Ne hein ebpelpelinggume en sikandin is ed-ulì ne nezineg din is edtambur wey is leletepak te paa te ebpemenayew.
Ne mid-umew zin is sevaha zutun te menge sulug̵uen te amey zin ne mid-insà te, ‘Hengkey is igkebibu te menge etew keniyan te valey?’
Ne midtavak haazà is sulug̵uen te, ‘Nekeulì sikan is hazi nu. Ne impelapà te amey nu sikan is nati he impelambù su nekeulì sikandin he wazè ded mekeizi.’
Ne zutun utew neepes haazà is kakey ne wazà mebpemenahik dutun te valey. Ne zutun mibpenaug haazà is amey zan he ednayùnayù is egkag̵i ziyà te kandin te, ‘Laus ke man dini, Mama.’

Ne midtavak haazà is anak din te, ‘Tenuzi nu, Amà, ke sengemenu is keug̵et te kedterebahu ku kayi he iring te sulug̵uen nu. Wazè nu egketenuzan he sug̵ù nu he wazè ku pemineg̵a te minsan hengkey he timpu. Ne minsan pa zutun ne wazà a kenikew veg̵ayi te minsan kambing dà duen wey a mekelipeylipey zuma te menge emig̵u ku.
Iyan, heini is anak nu he nekelaga te menge azen nu tenged te kebpengumpadi zin te menge vahi, ne iyan nu mulà midlepaan te impelambù nu he nati!’
‘Mama,’ egkag̵i haazà is amey zin, ‘sikew, dini ka mulà layun duma ku. Ne is langun he azen ku, ne kenikew. Ne iyan ka teg̵ig̵aked te langun.
Ne kenè ta egkeeg̵en is kelipey ta, su heini is hazi nu, ne iring sikandin te minatey, ne g̵untaan neuyag̵an en. Netazin sikandin, ne g̵untaan neturedu en.’ ”

Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Duen sepian he etew he impezumala zin is sevaha he sulug̵uen din te menge ketig̵eyunan din. Ne zuen daan etew he midsumbung dutun te sepian he haazà is impezumala, ne ebpenggestuwen din is selapì dutun te egalen din.

Ne hein nezineg haazà dutun te sepian, ne midtawag din haazà is sulug̵uen din ne migkeg̵iyan din te, ‘Tutuu heini is sumbung mehitenged kenikew. Iulì nu kediey is langun he insarig ku kenikew su kenè en egkehimu he iyan ka ibpezumala kayi te menge ketig̵eyunan ku.’

Ne neisip dutun te sulug̵uen is, ‘Id-awè e ves kayi te terebahu ku. Hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ku? Su siak, ne kenè e en ebpekehimu he edterebahu te meveg̵at iring te kegkalut ne egkeeled a he ebpemumuyù te limus.
A,’ ke sikandin, ‘iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ku su wey zuen duma ku he egkepeveyaan ku ke egkeawè e en kayi te terebahu ku.’
Ne zutun midtawag din te tigselimbaha is langun he nekeutang dutun te egalen din. Ne ke sikandin diyà te nehuna te, ‘Pira is kenikew he utang diyà te egalen ku?’

Ne midtavak haazà is mid-insaan te, ‘Nenggatus he lata te lana.’ Ne migkag̵i haazà is sulug̵uen te, ‘Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne is insurat nu kayi he utang nu ne ilisi nu te kelimahan dà he lata.’

Ne nekeuma is sevaha zutun. Ne mid-insaan dutun te sulug̵uen ke pira is kandin he utang, ne midtavak sikandin te nengkelibu he vinevey he trigu. Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin te sulug̵uen te, ‘Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne ilisi nu te walu he g̵atus dà he vinevey.’

Ne zutun,” ke si Jesus, “hein nezineg haazà dutun te egalen din ke hengkey is mid-ulaula zutun te sulug̵uen din, ne nekekag̵i te, ‘Hey, utew metau sikandin su ebpeneg̵ane en sikandin he zaan te keuyag̵an din keuzemà.’ ” Ne ke si Jesus te, “Is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge lalag te Megbevayà, utew metau te paag̵i te kegkezeyzey zan. Iyan, is menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenè dan bes mulà utew metau te paag̵i wey mezeyzey sikandan keuzemà diyà te langit.

Umba,” ke si Jesus, “egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he g̵emita niw is ketig̵eyunan niw zini te kelibutan wey metevangi is egkengeayuayu ne emun egkeuma haazà is timpu keuzemà he kenè niw en egkeg̵amit is menge azen niw, edsuhulan kew te Megbevayà diyà te langit.

Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he emun egkeserig̵an ka te zeisek he azen, egkeserig̵an ka zaan te zekelà he azen. Ne emun limbungan ka te minsan deisek dà, ne wey ke pe be kenà medlimbung duen te zekelè en he ebpeg̵ewezan kenikew.
Emun kenè ka egkeserig̵an he ibpeg̵awed te menge ketig̵eyunan he kayi te kelibutan, ne kenè ke en iyan ibpeg̵awed te Megbevayà te menge tutuu he ketig̵eyunan diyà te langit.
Ne emun kenè ka egkeserig̵an he ibpeg̵awed te menge azen te zuma, kenè ke en iyan ebeg̵ayan dutun te tutuu he azen he ziyà te langit.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is uripen, kenà egkehimu he zezuwa is teg̵iuripen kandin. Su emun dezuwa is ebayàbayà kandin, edtehuzen din is sevaha ne egkepeukan din is sevaha. Ne emun kenà, ne egkeepesan din is sevaha, ne ebmahalen din is sevaha. Ne iring din ded daan emun iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu is ketig̵eyunan, su kenà egkehimu he mahal zaan diyà te g̵ehinawa nu is Megbevayà.”
Ne zuen dutun menge Perisiyu he iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zan is selapì. Ne hein nezineg dan haazà is penurù ni Jesus ne midsumpalit dan sikandin.

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Iyan kew sikan is henduen be te meupiya is ulaula ke ziyà te etuvangan te menge etew, iyan, wazà mekeeles te Megbevayà ke hengkey is diyà te isip niw. Is ed-isipen te etew he utew mahal, ne wazè din bali ziyà te Megbevayà.

Is kedtumana te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin dengan ni Moises wey is kedtumana te menge lalag he insurat te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, ne impesavut heini taman dà te timpu ni Juan Megbebewtismu. Puun dutun iyan ibpesavut diyà te langun he menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i te g̵inhedian te Megbevayà. Ne edteg̵el is minsan hentei wey meg̵aan pezem sikandan mekeseled dutun te g̵inhedian.
Iyan, kenà egkehimu he edhelinen is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Egkehanew pa is langit wey tanà, iyan, is minsan deisek dà he ibpenurù te kesug̵uan ne kenà egkehalin.”

Ne elin daan migkag̵i ni Jesus is, ke sikandin te, “Ke zuen maama he ebpengesawa te sengevevahi su mid-engkezan din is esawa zin, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te mid-engkezan din he esawa. Ne ebpekesalà daan is maama he ebpengesawa zutun te vahi he mid-engkezan te esawa zin.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Duen sevaha he etew he sepian utew. Ne haazà is sepian, utew menge mahal he manggad is idsun-ud din. Ne kada andew ne iyan dà ibpekaan kandin is utew mahal wey metaam he egkeenen.

Ne zuen daan sevaha he etew he egkeayuayu he egngezanan ki Lazaro. Ne haazà si Lazaro, ne neeneb is lawa zin te vekukang. Ne kada andew zutun ne idhated sikandin te menge zuma zin dutun te vunsuzan te valey zutun te sepian

su ebperateng he ebeg̵ayan sikandin te minsan menge mumu zà he egkengeulug dutun te lemisahan te sepian wey mahantey is getek din dutun. Ne is menge asu zutun, ne ebpemendilaan dan haazà is menge vekukang ni Lazaro.

Ne wazà utew meug̵et dutun ne minatey haazà is ayuayu he si Lazaro ne mid-angey sikandin te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne insavuk dan diyà te uvey ni Abraham te kepuun te menge Hudiyu. Ne zutun daan he timpu ne minatey zaan haazà is sepian he etew ne inleveng sikandin.
Ne mid-uwit sikandin diyà te Iveyaan. Ne zutun ne utew sikandin nerasey ne hein nekelingahà, neehè din si Abraham, iyan, utew meziyù. Ne neehè din daan si Lazaro zutun te uvey ni Abraham.

Ne mid-umew sikandin diyà te ki Abraham, ke sikandin te, ‘He Apù Abraham, kehizuwi a kenikew! Ipehengkayi nu pa si Lazaro wey zin egkepetig̵isi te wahig heini is bèbè ku su utew e en nerasey kayi te hapuy!’

Iyan, midtavak ni Abraham haazà is mid-umew te, ‘Apù, tentenuzi nu he hein uuyag ke pa, ne mid-em-eminan nu en is kedlipeylipey nu. Iyan, si Lazaro mulà, ne neem-eminan din en is kemeresayan. Ne g̵untaan, si Lazaro, edlipayen; ne sikew, edresayen.
Ne ikezuwa zin daan ne kawangkawang heini is pid-eletan tew. Ne wazà ebpekelayun dini he ebpuun diyan; ne iring din ded daan dini te kenami su wazà ebpekelayun pehendiyan he ebpuun dini.’
Ne zutun mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is sepian te, ‘Ne emun iyan heeyan, Apù, ne iyan dà edhengyuen ku is ipelikù nu si Lazaro ziyà te valey te amey ku
su zuen lelima he hazi ku he maama. Ne kinahanglan he metueni zan he zaan wey zan kenà mekehendini te ubpeey te ebpenresayen.’
Ne midtavak si Abraham te, ‘Duen diyà te kandan menge surat he impesurat te Megbevayà ki Moises wey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan. Egkehimu he ebpemineg̵en haazà dutun te menge hazi nu.’
Ne midtavak haazà is sepian te, ‘Kenè dan, Apù, haazà ebpemineg̵en, iyan, emun duen minatey he egkevanhew he edhendiyà te kandan, ne ed-iniyug̵an dan is memezaat he ulaula zan.’

Ne migkag̵i zutun si Abraham te, ‘Emun kenè dan ebpemineg̵en is menge surat ni Moises wey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan, kenè dan daan ebpemineg minsan ke zuen egkevanhew he minatey he edhendiyà te kandan.’ ”

Ne zuen migkag̵i ni Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, “Kenà egkehimu he wazà igkeawà te kedsarig te etew kedì, iyan kehizu utew te etew he pinaag̵i kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te minsan hentei he midtuu kedì, su utew meveg̵at is silut kandin te Megbevayà.

Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke idhiket diyà te lieg din is dekelà he g̵elingan he vatu ne id-agbur ziyà te lawed te zag̵at, kenà is silut kandin emun pinaag̵i kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te minsan sevaha zà kayi te menge vatà.
Umba, mebpekevantey kew layun!”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus med-uman te, “Emun duen duma nu he nekesalà kenikew, ne keg̵iyi nu wey sembag̵i nu, ne emun ibmesakit haazà te g̵ehinawa zin ne ebuyù te pesaylu, ne peseyluwa nu.
Ne minsan kepipitu pa sikandin mekesalà kenikew te sengeandew, ne kepipitu zaan sikandin ebuyù te pesaylu ziyà te kenikew, ne peseyluwa nu sikandin.”
Ne migkag̵i haazà is menge epustul diyà te ki Jesus te, “Heg̵eta nu is kedtuu zey.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun duen kedtuu nu he minsan iring dà kezekelà te sengevuuk he lisu te mustasa he utew zeisek ne egkekeg̵iyan nu heini is dekelà he kayu te, ‘Awè ka keniyan ne halin ka ziyà te zag̵at.’ Ne iyan dà haazà, ne ebpezumazuma kenikew.”

Ne migkag̵i en maan si Jesus te, “Penenglitan, ke zuen sulug̵uen te sevaha keniyu ne iyan baal zin is ed-eradu ne emun kenà ne ed-elima te menge ayam nu. Ne emun sikan pa ed-ulì te mahapun, kenà egkehimu he egkeg̵iyan nu te, ‘Huna ka kaan ne human a.’
Kenà, su iyan egkeg̵iyen nu is, ‘Penlùlù ke pa ne subai a kenikew wey a mekekaan. Ne wey ka mekekaan ke egkeipus a he egkaan.’ ”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ne haazà is sulug̵uen, ne kenà igkezelig̵i kandin is kedtuman din su ketengdanan din is kedtuman te menge sug̵ù kandin te egalen din.
Ne iring kew zaan dutun. Ne emun egkepasad niw is ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà, ne itag̵ù niw ziyà te isip niw he menge sulug̵uen kew zà te Megbevayà ne midtuman niw zà is menge sug̵ù din keniyu.”
Ne zutun te kebpehendiyè en ni Jesus te inged he Hiruselim ne ziyà sikandin mebayà te pid-elangan te menge prubinsya he Semarya wey Geliliya.
Ne nekeuma sikandin diyà te sevaha he inged ne zuen dutun sepulù he maama he it-iten he nemeninug̵ung kandin. Ne tenged te it-iten sikandan wazè dan uvayi si Jesus, kekenà, diyè dan dà te meziyù.
Ne mid-umew zan ki Jesus te, “He Zatù Jesus, ikehizu key kenikew!”

Ne hein neehè din sikandan ne migkag̵i sikandin te, “Hendiyè kew en te menge memumuhat te Megbevayà wey zan maahà he nengeulian kew.” Ne nemenhipanew zan ne zutun te kegenat dan nengeulian segugunà sikandan.
Ne is sevaha zutun, hein neehè din he wazè en it-it din, midlikù diyà te ki Jesus is ebpempemensag is edalig te Megbevayà.
Ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne utew zekelà is kebpeselemati zin kandin. Ne haazà is neulian, ne kenà Hudiyu su tigSemarya he etew.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Kenè be sepulù kew man is nengeulian? Maan is wazà mekelikù is siyew he menge zuma nu?
Maan is iyan ke zà is tigSemarya midlikù he edalig te Megbevayà?”
Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Mama, hitindeg ke en ne hipanew kad. Is kedsarig nu te Megbevayà ne iyan nekelibri kenikew te silut.”

Sengeandew zutun ne zuen menge Perisiyu he mid-insà ki Jesus te, “Keenu egketuman is egkeg̵iyen nu he kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenà egkeahà te etew is kegketuman din

su kenà egkehimu he zuen etew he ebpekekag̵i te, ‘Ahaa niw su heini en!’ Ne emun kenà, ne ‘Dutun sikan is ibpahadì te Megbevayà!’ Su,” ke si Jesus, “diyè dà te g̵ehinawa te etew sikan is kedhedii kandin te Megbevayà ne kenà egkeahà te mata.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Egkeuma is andew he utew zekelà pezem diyà te g̵ehinawa niw he meg̵aan metuman is timpu te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan, kenè pa egkehitavù.
Ne emun duen egkag̵i keniyu he ziyà a is Kakey te Menusiyà te uvey wey ke ziyà a te meziyù ne kenè kew mebpemineg.
Su is kedlikù ku, ne iring te kilat he ebpeketayew te tivuuk he tanà, ne egkeahà te minsan hentei.
Iyan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kinahanglan he egkehuna pa egkeuma is kedresaya kedì, wey is kenà kedewata te menge etew te menge penurù ku.
Ne keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù ku zini te kelibutan, ebpekeiring is menge ulaula te menge etew zutun duen te menge ulaula zengan te menge etew zuen te timpu ni Noe.

Su zengan te keazen pa ni Noe, iyan dà neisip te menge etew is kegkebibu ne migkaan dan ne mid-inum dan ne mibpees-eseweey zan taman te midseled ensi Noe zuen te utew zekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka ne hein midlapey is dag̵at nengelened maamin haazà is menge etew.

Ne elin daan egkeiringan te timpu te kedlikù ku, is timpu zengan te keazen pa ni Lut. Su zutun wazà rintas te kegkebibu te menge etew te kebpemengaan wey kebpemenginum. Mibpenigudu zan he ebpememasa wey ebpememelegyà wey ebpememula wey ebpemevaley.
Ne haazà he andew te ked-awà ni Lut dutun te inged din he egngezanan te Suduma, is langun he menge etew he meg̵inged dutun, ne nelimas te hapuy wey esupri he mid-ulug te Megbevayà ebpuun te langit.
Iring ded dutun keg̵aan is kegketik-ew te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà keuzemà.

Ne zutun he andew,” ke si Jesus, “sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te g̵awas te valey zin, ne ziyè pa te seled is menge azen din ne kenè en medseled dutun te valey te kegkuwa te minsan hengkey. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te pemuleey zin; wazè en kinahanglan he medlikù sikandin diyà te valey zin.
Tentenuzi niw ke hengkey is nehitavù duen te esawa ni Lut.

Sikan is etew he egkenug̵unan din is untung din kenà is kedsundan din kedì, ne nasì kenà ebpekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne sikan is etew he kenè din egkenug̵unan is untung din tenged te kedsundan din kedì, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zutun he timpu emun egketuman is kedlikù ku te mezukilem ne ke zuen ebpehulizey he zezuwa he etew ne egkuwaan is sevaha ne is sevaha ne egketag̵ak.
Ne iring ded daan dutun su ke zuen zezuwa he vahi he ebpeug̵upà te kebpenggaling, ne egkuwaan te menge velinsug̵uen ku is sevaha ne egketag̵ak is sevaha.
Ne iring din ded daan ke zuen dezuwa he etew he ebpeug̵upey ziyà te pemuleey, su egkuwaan is sevaha ne is sevaha ne egketag̵ak.”
Ne zutun mid-insà ki Jesus is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandan te, “Hendei heini egkehitavù?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ke hendei is minatey ne zutun daan is menge tagbis he egkaan te nemahù,”
Ne zuen en maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus te menge sumusundan din. Ibpesavut din kandan dutun he kinahanglan he kenè dan bungasa te layun ked-ampù ne kenà daan med-engked he edsarig te Megbevayà.
Ne ke sikandin te, “Duen huwis diyà te sengeinged; ne haazà is huwis, ne kenà egkehandek te Megbevayà ne wazè din daan kedtahud te minsan hentei he etew.

Ne zutun te inged ne zuen daan balu he vahi he layun ebpehendutun te huwis su edhangyù he ebpetavang. Ke sikandin dutun te huwis te, ‘Tevangi a kenikew su wey kenà meileg te kuntada ku is menge azen ku.’

Ne neug̵et en haazà he kenà edseg̵ipaan dutun te huwis is hangyù dutun te vahi. Ne g̵eina te neug̵et en is layun kedlikùlikù dutun te vahi he edhangyù diyà te kandin, ne neisip dutun te huwis is, ‘Minsan wazè ku kehandek te Megbevayà ne wazè ku zaan kedtahud te minsan hentei etawa,
edtevangan ku nasì heini is bahi su wey mekeengked is ed-uringer kedì.’ ”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Isipa niw is mid-ulaula zutun te huwis he kenà pezem metazeng is kedhusey zin.
Su emun nehimu he midtevangan din haazà is bahi, iyan pe be kenà tevangi te Megbevayà sikiyu is menge nengepilì din he etew he ebpenigudu ed-ampù diyà te kandin te mezukilem wey maandew.

Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he utew meg̵aan is kedtevangi zin keniyu. Kenà ebungasen is Megbevayà he edtavang keniyu. Iyan, keuzemà emun edlikù a is Kakey te Menusiyà dini te kelibutan mezelag dà is etew zutun he neketuu kedì.”

Ne sengeandew maan dutun ne impezineg ni Jesus is sempità. Ne heini is sempità, ne iyan egkesug̵at is menge etew he kunaan dan ke iyan dan dà memeupiya is ulaula ne edsudien dan is langun he menge zuma he etew.
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Duen dezuwa he etew he midhendiyà te zekelà he simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà su ed-ampù dan. Ne is sevaha zutun, ne Perisiyu, ne is sevaha, ne menunukut te vuhis.

Ne midhitindeg haazà is Perisiyu ne mid-ampù pinaag̵i te g̵ehinawa zin, ke sikandin te, ‘Megbevayà, ebpeselamat a kenikew su kenà a iring te zuma. Kenà a leg̵ezen; kenà a ebpenlimbung; kenè ku edselselaan is esawa ku. Ebpeselamat a zaan kenikew su kenà a iring keniyà te limbungan he menunukut te vuhis.
Kezezuwa a edsalang te kegkaan te sengesimana ne ibeg̵ey ku ziyà te kenikew is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he egketig̵eyunan ku!’ ke sikandin.

Iyan, haazà is sevaha he etew he menunukut te vuhis, ne mibpekeziyù sikandin is ebpekezuzungul ne egkepenempaling din is kumeng din su utew neseeng. Ne mid-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà he egkag̵i te, ‘Megbevayà, ikehizu a utew kenikew is sevaha he etew he mekesesalà!’ ”

Ne ke si Jesus dutun te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he haazà is menunukut te vuhis, hein mid-ulì diyà te valey zin ne wazè en isipa te Megbevayà is salè din su nepesaylu en. Iyan, kenà iring dutun haazà is gelbuwen he Perisiyu su is etew he kunaan din ke utew lavew sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, ne ebminusen sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, is etew he netuenan din he utew sikandin mekesesalà, ne ibpelavew sikandin te Megbevayà.”

Ne sevaha maan he andew ne zuen menge etew he mid-uwit dan is menge anak dan he zezeisey pa ziyà te ki Jesus wey zin mezepeneti te palad din wey mepenubtuvazi. Ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, midawey zan haazà is menge etew.

Iyan, si Jesus, mid-umew zin diyà te kandin haazà is menge vatà ne ke sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà; ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà.
Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he kenà iring is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te kedsarig te zezeisey he vatà, ne kenà egkehedian haazà is etew te Megbevayà.”
Ne zuen timpu he zuen sevaha he punuan he Hudiyu he mid-insà ki Jesus te, “He Zatù, utew meupiya is menge ulaula nu. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Maan is egkag̵i ka he meupiya is ulaula ku su sebsevaha zà is meupiya is menge ulaula zin ne iyan is Megbevayà.

Netuenan nu sikan is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin kenitew he iyan is: kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka mebunù; kenè ka mebpenakew; kenè ka medtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan; ne tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu.”
Ne midtavak haazà is maama ziyà te ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Menunudlù, is langun keniyan, mibenteyanan ku ne wazè ku nesupak puun pa te vatè e pa.”

Ne hein nezineg ni Jesus haazà, migkeg̵iyan din te, “Duen nu pa kurang; iyan is: ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he azen nu, ne is halin, ipemeg̵ey nu ziyà te egkengeayuayu ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan, likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey.”
Ne hein nezineg dutun te etew is sambag ni Jesus ne utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su zekelà is ketig̵eyunan din.
Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandin ni Jesus ne ke si Jesus te, “Utew mereg̵en te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kenè din egkehimu su melemu pa te langgam he kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te rag̵um, kenà te sepian he etew te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii.”
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge etew, ke sikandan te, “Ne emun kenà egkehimu te sepian ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew, iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he meveg̵ayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Sikami, mid-ewaan dey is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he emun duen etew he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, is esawa zin, is menge suled din, is menge g̵inikanan din, wey is menge anak din su wey zin ikepesavut te menge etew is kedhedii kandan te Megbevayà,
ne utew zekelà is suhul te Megbevayà kandin te kemulu pa sikandin dini te kelibutan ne keuzemà te timpu te kedhukum te Megbevayà, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”

Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din he medtapid dan ne ke sikandin dutun te, “Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te inged he Hiruselim ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun ne sikan is langun he insurat he nengetagnà te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà mehitenged kedì, ne egkengetuman en.
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ne ibpalad a ziyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu ne haazà he menge etew, ne edsumpeliten e zan, ed-el-elezen e zan, ne ebpengilevan e zan.
Ebug̵elen e zan, ne human e zan edhimetayi. Iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun ne ebenhawen a te Megbevayà,” ke si Jesus.
Iyan, haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne wazè dan mekesavut dutun te egkeg̵iyen din. In-eles kandan haazà is kehulug̵an dutun ne wazè dan metueni ke hengkey haazà is ibpesavut kandan ni Jesus.
Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiriku ne zuen dutun lakap he ebpimpinuu ziyà te kilid te zalan ne iyan dà baal zin is edtepayà su ebpemumuyù te limus.
Ne hein nezineg dutun te lakap is dabekdabek te mezakel he menge etew he edsag̵ad ne nekeinsà ke hengkey en haazà.
Ne zuen migkag̵i ziyà te kandin te, “Iyan si Jesus he tigNeserit is edsag̵ad.”
Ne hein nezineg din haazà, ne mid-umew sikandin te, “He Jesus he kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!”

Ne haazà is menge etew he edhuhuna ki Jesus, ne midawey zan haazà is etew wey med-engked sikandin, iyan, nasì en ebpekezag̵ing sikandin he egkag̵i te, “He kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!”
Ne zutun midteren si Jesus ne migkag̵i he ipehendutun te kandin haazà is lakap. Ne hein impeetuvang dan en ki Jesus ne migkag̵i si Jesus te,
“Hengkey is egkesuatan nu he ebeelan ku?” Ne midtavak haazà is lakap te, “Iyan egkesuatan ku is: mekeahà is menge mata ku.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Mekeehè ke en; is kedsarig nu kediey, ne iyan igkeulii te menge mata nu.”
Ne segugunà nekeahà haazà is lakap. Ne zutun midumazuma en sikandin ki Jesus is utew nekezalig te Megbevayà. Ne haazà is menge etew he nemekeahà dutun, ne nemekezalig dan daan te Megbevayà.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te inged he Hiriku ne zutun dan ebayà su edlaus dan pa.
Ne zuen dutun maama he tigHiriku he egngezanan ki Sekiyu. Ne haazà si Sekiyu, ne iyan egalen te menge menunukut te vuhis dutun; ne sepian daan utew sikandin.
Egkesuat pezem sikandin he mekeahà ki Jesus, iyan, kenè din egkeahà geina te nepurung en si Jesus melinguti te menge etew ne mevavà daan he etew si Sekiyu.
Ne iyan mid-ulaula ni Sekiyu is: mibpelelag̵uy ziyà te egkehunaan ne mibpemenahik te kayu he egngezanan te sikemur he egkeseg̵azan ni Jesus su wey zin mepurungi te ed-ahà si Jesus ke edsag̵ad dutun.

Ne hein nekeuma si Jesus dutun te puun te kayu he mibpemenehikan ni Sekiyu ne midteren ne midlingahà ne ke sikandin te, “He Sekiyu, gaanggaan ke en penaug keniyan su kinahanglan he ziyan a ebpemenahik te valey nu g̵untaan.”
Ne zutun ne migaanggaan mebpenaug si Sekiyu ne midlimùlimù ki Jesus he utew egkelipey.

Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge etew is lalag ni Jesus diyà te ki Sekiyu ne wazè dan mesuati ne pesikag̵i sikandan te, “Maan is ebpemenahik si Jesus diyà te valey te etew he utew mesinupaken te Megbevayà?”

Ne si Sekiyu, hein nekeuma zan engki Jesus diyà te valey zin ne midhitindeg sikandin is egkag̵i te, “Ibeg̵ey ku is ketengà kayi te ketig̵eyunan ku ziyà te menge ayuayu. Ne minsan hentei he etew he nelimbungan ku zengan, ne id-ulì ku ziyà te kandin is keheepat egketakep haazà is nekuwa ku.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Sikew wey menge zuma nu zini te valey, edlibriyen kew g̵untaan te Megbevayà te silut tenged te menge salè niw su mid-iringan niw g̵untaan is kepuun niw he si Abraham su midtuu kew te Megbevayà.
Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan su wey ku melibri te silut is langun he nemekesuwey te hustu he ibayà.”

Ne haazà is menge etew he nemekezineg dutun te menge lalag ni Jesus, impezineg din pa kandan is sempità. Uvey zan en te inged he Hiruselim ne tenged dutun kunaan te menge etew ke ebpuunè en si Jesus edhadì.

Ne tenged dutun migkag̵i zin heini is sempità. Ke sikandin te, “Duen sevaha he prinsipi he midtawag te lavew he hadì diyà te sengeg̵inhedian su edhimuwen sikandin he hadì dutun te kandin he inged. Ne emun egketapus haazà ne human ebpekeulì.

Ne hein meg̵aan en sikandin edhipanew pehendiyà te sengeg̵inhedian, mid-umew zin is sepulù te menge sulug̵uen din ne kada sevaha zutun, mibeg̵ayan din te selapì. Ne neked-iiring is kezekelà te selapì he imbeg̵ey zin te kada sevaha. Ne migkag̵i sikandin diyà te kandan te, ‘Heini ve is selapì he ibpiyal ku keniyu, ne iyan kew en metau te ked-iseg din kedekelà taman te kenè e pa ebpekeulì dini,’ ke sikandin.

Iyan, is menge meg̵inged dutun te inged te prinsipi, ne ingkeepes dan sikandin, ne hein migenat en, duen midsug̵ù dan he ibpetelukun kandin wey zan ikepesayud is lavew he hadì dutun te ebeyaan te prinsipi he kenè dan igkesuat he iyan mekehadì kandan haazà is prinsipi.

Ne minsan pa zutun nehimu g̵ihapun he hadì haazà is prinsipi ne zutun te kebpekeulì din ne segugunè din mid-umew sikan is sepulù he impetipig din te selapì su ed-ahaan din ke sengemenu is uswag te selapì te kada sevaha.
Ne migkag̵i is nehuna te, ‘Hadì, kesepulù metakep is selapì nu.’

Ne midtavak haazà is hadì te, ‘Utew meupiya heeyan. Meg̵ied ke ves iyan. Ne g̵eina te egkeserig̵an ka te minsan deisek he selapì ne iyan suhul ku kenikew is iyan ku sikew ibpezumala te sepulù he inged.’
Ne migkag̵i haazà is ikezuwa he sulug̵uen te, ‘Hadì, kelelima metakep is selapì nu.’
Ne midtavak haazà is hadì te, ‘Iyan ku sikew ibpezumala te lelima he inged.’
Ne zutun mid-uvey haazà is iketelu he sulug̵uen ne ke sikandin te, ‘Heini zed sikan is selapì nu he impiyal nu kedì. Midtegteg̵aman ku tengesa ne intag̵ù ku
su ingkehandek ku sikew, su is egkekag̵i nu ne idteg̵el nu, ne ebperateng ka te uswag te ibpiyal nu te zuma nu. Ne iring ded daan te ibpepemula nu su ebperetengen nu is abut.’

Ne midtavak haazà is hadì te, ‘Lalung ke ves he sulug̵uen! Heeyan dà te menge lalag nu ne mibpesavut he nekesalè ke en kediey. Su netuenan nu ves he is egkekag̵i ku, ne idteg̵el ku, ne is ibpiyal ku, ne ebperetengen ku is uswag din, ne is ibpepemula ku ne ebperetengen ku is abut din. Ne utew venar heeyan.
Ne maan is wazè nu ipeutang is selapì ku wey mebpursintuwi wey medekelà is egkekuwa ku kayi te kedlikù ku?’
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is hadì diyà te menge etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te, ‘Kuwaa niw is selapì diyà te kandin ne iveg̵ey niw ziyà te nekepeuswag te kesepulù metakep!’
Ne migkag̵i zan te, ‘Duen en kandin su kesepulù metakep sikan is uswag te impetipig̵an nu kandin.’

Ne midtavak haazà is hadì te, ‘Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he sikan is egkeserig̵an te insarig kandin, ed-umanan pa. Iyan, sikan is kenà egkeserig̵an, edhewien pa ziyà te kandin minsan is deisek he insarig kandin.’
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is hadì te, ‘Ne sikan is menge etew he kenè dan egkesuat he iyan a mekehadì kandan, ne uwita niw zini ne penhimetayi niw sikandan dini te etuvangan ku.’ ”
Ne hein neipus ni Jesus te egkag̵i haazà is sempità ne midlaus dan is edhipanew petekezeg diyà te Hiruselim.

Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Bitpagi wey ziyà te inged he egngezanan te Bitanya he ebpeketekezeg dutun te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, ne midsug̵ù ni Jesus is dezuwa te menge sumusundan din.
Ke sikandin te, “Hendutun kew te inged he egkeumahan tew ne emun ebpekeuma kew zutun, ne egkeehè niw is intagkes he asnu he nati he wazè pa meuntuzi. Hekazi niw ne uwita niw zini.
Ne ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is edhekazan niw, kag̵i kew te, ‘Egkinehenglanen heini te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.’ ”
Ne haazà is midsug̵ù din, hein nekeuma zan dutun ne wazè en medhehelinà sumalà is nekag̵i ni Jesus. Ne neehè dan haazà is asnu zutun.
Ne hein edhekazan dan en haazà is asnu ne migkag̵i is menge teg̵ig̵aked dutun te, “Maan is edhekazan niw heeyan?”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Egkinehenglanen heini te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.”
Ne zutun mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is asnu. Ne mibelhenan dan haazà te menge kumbalè dan ne impeuntud dan sikandin.
Ne zutun tenged te ibpaahà te menge etew is dekelà he kedtahud dan ki Jesus, impendempas dan is menge impenamput dan diyà te ibayè din.

Ne hein edtupang dan en dutun te vuvungan he Ulivuwan su uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiruselim, ne langun dutun te menge sumusundan din he nemenduma kandin, utew zan nengelipey he edhabet edalig te Megbevayà tenged te langun he nengeehè dan he menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus.
Ke sikandan is edalig te, “Delig̵a is hadì he ebpekeuma he midsug̵ù te Nengazen! Melinew en is kedepitè tew te Megbevayà! Delig̵a is Megbevayà diyà te langit!”
Ne zutun te mezakel he menge etew he nengetig̵um dutun, duen menge Perisiyu. Ne migkag̵i zan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Dewaya nu heeyan is menge sumusundan nu.”
Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenà egkehimu su emun ed-engked dan is ebpendalig ne iyan edsambey he ebpendalig is langun keniyan te menge vatu
Ne midlaus ensi Jesus pehendutun te inged he Hiruselim ne hein neehè din en haazà is inged ne midsineg̵awan din su utew sikandin nehizu te menge meg̵inged dutun.
