Ke sikandin te, “Angin pezem ke netuenan niw zà ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan su wey zuen kelinew ziyan te inged niw, iyan, kenè niw en guntaan egketuenan!
Ne zuen andew he zutun egkeumahan kew te menge kuntada niw ne egkelingutan kew ne edtebeken kew zan ne kenè kew ebpekeg̵awas dutun.

Ne edèdeetan dan is menge valey niw wey kutè niw ne langun niw te menge etew, ne egkeg̵erà ne wazà edresik keniyu. Ne is menge vatu he imbevaley keniyan, wazà minsan sevaha he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewag̵ey is langun. Ne egkeulaula heini su wazè niw seg̵ipaa he iyan heini sikan is timpu te kegkehizu keniyu te Megbevayà.”

Ne hein nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Hiruselim ne midlaus sikandin diyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne midseled sikandin dutun ne impemeawè din is menge etew he ebpememelegyà dutun.

Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Awè kew kayi su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Is baley ku, ne egngezanan he Valey he Elempuanan.’ Ne sikiyu,” ke si Jesus, “nasì niw veeli he ubpeey te ebpemenlimbung.”

Igenat dà dutun ne kada andew ne ebpenurù si Jesus dutun te zekelà he simbahan. Ne is menge punuan dutun te menge memumuhat te Megbevayà, wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, wey is ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu, ne egkesuatan dan pezem si Jesus te edhimatey.
Iyan, kenè dan egkeg̵aanggaan te edhimatey sikandin su is langun he menge etew, ne utew zan egkengevenari he ebpememineg kandin.

Ne sevaha he andew zutun ne midlikù si Jesus diyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenurù din is menge etew, ne impesavut din kandan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne zutun mibeyaan sikandin te punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu,
ne mid-insè dan kandin te, “Heini is langun he ed-ul-ulahan nu zini te simbahan, hengkey is ketenged nu te ked-ulaula kayi, wey hentei is mibeg̵ey kenikew te ketenged wey nu meulaula?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen daan id-insè ku keniyu, ne huna kew tavak te insè ku.
Hentei is mibeg̵ey ki Juan Megbebewtismu te ketenged te kebpemewtismu. Megbevayè be wey ke etew zà?”
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey zan is egkag̵i te, “Emun egkeg̵iyen tew he impenaub ki Juan te Megbevayà ne id-insè din ke maan is wazè tew tuuwi si Juan.
Ne emun egkeg̵iyen tew he isip dà te etew, ne egkepeukan kiw te menge etew. Ne edtulengen kiw zan te vatu wey kiw zan mehimetayi su is menge etew, edtuuwan dan he ebpeneuven si Juan te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun iyan dà ingketavak dan ki Jesus is, “Kenè dey egketuenan.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Kenè ku zaan egkeg̵iyen keniyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te kebaal kayi te langun.”

Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus te menge etew is sempità su ibpesavut din kandan is keag̵i te ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà. Ke sikandin te, “Duen etew he zuen din bevesukà he mibpemulaan din te menge g̵awed he paras. Ne mibpeelimahan din te menge etew ne midhipanew ziyà te sengeg̵inhedian ne neug̵et sikandin dutun.

Ne hein tirag̵un en dutun, midsug̵ù din is sulug̵uen din diyà te impemeelima zin su wey meveg̵ayi sikandin te vahin din dutun te paras. Iyan, hein nekeuma haazà is sulug̵uen ne mibpemug̵el zutun te menge ed-elima ne impeulì dan he wazà beg̵ayi.

Ne haazà is teg̵ig̵aked, midsug̵ù en maan te sevaha pa he sulug̵uen din he impehendutun din te menge impeelima zin. Ne mibpemug̵el zan ded maan haazà, ne mid-eled-eled dan, ne impeulì dan he wazà daan beg̵ayi.
Ne mid-uman en maan medsug̵ù haazà is teg̵ig̵aked te sevaha pa maan he sulug̵uen din ne mibug̵el zan en maan haazà taman te nengepelian ne zutun midsegseg dan sikandin.
Ne migkag̵i haazà is teg̵ig̵aked te perasan te, ‘Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku? Iyan is: iyan ku en edsug̵uen is mahal ku he anak su kenè dan egkeaku te ebpesipala sikandin, kekenà, edtehuzen dan.’

Iyan, hein naahà dutun te menge impeelima te perasan haazà is anak te teg̵ig̵aked ne mibpevitbitiyereey zan te, ‘Na! Iyan en heini sikan is anak din; kuwa kew en su edhimetayan tew ne iyan kiw ebpekeangken kayi te perasan!’
Ne migewezan dan ne mid-uwit dan diyà te g̵awas te perasan ne midhimetayan dan.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i med-uman si Jesus te, “Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà mid-ulaula zutun te impemeelima te perasan, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan kandan dutun te teg̵ig̵aked?

Iyan is: ebeyaan din haazà is menge etew ne ebpenhimetayan din, ne ebpeelimahan din haazà is perasan din te selakew en maan he menge etew.” Ne hein nezineg dutun te menge etew he ebpemineg ki Jesus ne utew zan neseeng ne ke sikandan te, “Kenà heeyan ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà!”

Iyan, midtengtengan ni Jesus sikandan ne ke sikandin te, “Emun iyan egkeisip niw he kenà heini ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà hengkey is kedsevuta niw zuen te insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
‘Sikan is batu he idhiman te valey,
mid-engkezan te menge pandey su kunaan dan ke wazè din pulus,
iyan, nehimu heini g̵untaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey.’ ”
Ne impelaus ni Jesus is lalag din te,
“Ne haazà he vatu, ne emun egkeulug̵an te etew ne egkepurung egkerupet is egkeulug dutun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkeulug̵an dutun te vatu ne egkepurung egkeapug is lawa zutun te egkeulug̵an.”

Ne zutun, is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey menge punuan te menge memumuhat te Megbevayà, nesavut dan he iyan din sikandan egkeg̵iyen dutun te sempità, ne ed-isipen dan dutun pezem edekepa si Jesus, iyan, nahandek dan te mezakel he menge etew.

Umba, puun dutun ne ebpengahaan dan ke ebmenmenuwen dan te kedekepa sikandin. Duen menge sinuhulan dan he ibpepeniid dan ki Jesus. Ne zuen daan menge insà kayi te etew ki Jesus he uvag kun menge hustu he insà. Ne iyan tuyù dan is: emun ebpekesupak si Jesus te kesug̵uan dan pinaag̵i te menge tavak din ne egkehimu he ibpalad sikandin diyà te gubirnedur he Rumanu wey mehukumi sikandin.

Ne haazà is menge etew he ibpepeniid ki Jesus, migkag̵i zan diyà te kandin te, “He Zatù, netuenan dey he wazè nu ibpelavi he minsan hentei he etew ne tutuu is egkeg̵iyen nu wey hustu is kebpenurù nu te ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà.
Hengkey is isip nu? Ebpekesupak ki ve te kesug̵uan tew ke ebayad ki te vuhis diyà te hadì tew ziyà te inged he Ruma?”
Ne netuenan ni Jesus is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan dan ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te,

“Ipeehè niw kediey is selapì he ibayad niw te vuhis.” Ne hein naahà ni Jesus haazà ke sikandin te, “Hentei ki zagwey kayi wey hentei ki ngazan heini is nekesurat kayi?” Ne ke sikandan te, “Dagwey wey ngazan te hadì diyà te inged he Ruma.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Ne emun kandin, ne iyan egkesuatan din, iveg̵ey niw ziyà te kandin; ne iveg̵ey niw zaan diyà te Megbevayà is kandin he azen.”

Ne haazà is menge etew he ibpepeniid ki Jesus, wazè dan dutun te etuvangan te menge etew neg̵ewezan te intavak ni Jesus he igkehimuwa zan kandin te edakep. Umba, wazè en nekag̵i zan, ne utew zan nengeinuinu te tavak din kandan.
Ne zutun mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is menge Sedusiyu. Ne is menge Sedusiyu, iyan kes menge Hudiyu he edtuu he kenà egkengevanhew keuzemà is minsan hentei. Ne migkag̵i zan diyà te ki Jesus,

ke sikandan te, “Menunudlù, impenurù dengan ni Moises he penenglitan, ke zuen maama he zuen din esawa ne ebpatey haazà is maama he wazà mevuwad, kinahanglan he ebpemeluwen te suled dutun te maama haazà is ipag din su wey mevuwad haazà is minatey pinaag̵i kandin.
Ne zengan duen pitu he menge maama he teltelehazi. Mibpengesawa haazà is kakey, iyan, minatey he wazà med-anak.
Ne mibpemalu zutun te ikezuwa haazà is ipag dan ne minatey zaan he wazà mevuwad.
Ne iring din ded daan haazà is iketelu. Ne henduen dà duen su naamin haazà is pitu ikevalu zutun te vahi ne wazà mevuwad.
Ne te huziyan dutun minatey zaan haazà is bahi.
Ne keuzemà te kegkevanhew te menge etew, hentei is hustu he esawa zutun te vahi? Su haazà is pitu he teltelehazi, pudu zan man nekeesawa kandin.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is menge etew kayi te kelibutan, ne ebpees-eseweey,
iyan, haazà is menge etew he ed-isipen te Megbevayà he zait he ebenhawen he ibpeubpà diyà te langit, kenè dan mulà keuzemà diyà te langit ebpees-eseweey.
Iyan dan kenà ibpees-eseweey su iring dan en te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne kenè dan en ebpatey. Menge anak dan en te Megbevayà su nevanhew zan en.
Ne pinaag̵i te insurat dengan ni Moises, egkesavut ta he egkengevanhew is menge minatey
. Su is langun he menge minatey, kemulu zan pa uuyag diyà te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i is duma he menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, ke sikandan te, “Utew venar heeyan is migkag̵i nu.”
Umba nekag̵i zan heini su kenè dan en ebpekesukul pa maan he ed-insà ki Jesus.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Maan is egkehimu he ibpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan he sikan is edteg̵azan he ibpahadì, ne kevuwazan dà ni Hadì David?
Su ziyà te libru he Salmo, duen insurat ni Hadì David he edhenduen te,
‘Migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku te,
“Kayi ka pinuu te zapit te egkekewanan ku
taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew
is menge kuntada nu.” ’ ”
Ne impelaus ni Jesus haazà is lalag din, ke sikandin te, “Emun migkag̵i ni David he Nengazen din sikan is ebperetengen he ibpahadì, ne egkehimu ve he kevuwazan dà duen ni David?”
Ne zutun te kemulu pa ebpemineg te lalag ni Jesus haazà is mezakel he menge etew, ne ke sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te,

“Andam kew limbe wey kew kenà mekeiring te menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan su iyan dà egkesuatan dan is kedhiphipanew he memelayat is kemisula he edtehuzen sikandan te menge etew emun diyè dan te mirkadu. Ne emun diyè dan te simbahan egkesuatan dan he iyan sikandan ibpepinuu ziyà te ebpepinuuwan te lavew he menge etew. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he utew zan metahud ke edtelavuk dan te keemuran.

Ne heini is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, edlimbungan dan is menge valu he vahi wey zan maangken is menge valey zutun te menge vahi. Ne utew melug̵ayad is ked-ampù dan he iyan idtambun dan te mezaat he vaal zan. Utew edekelà is silut te Megbevayà kandan keuzemà.”
Naahà ni Jesus is menge sepian he etew he ed-ulug te halad dan diyà te teleg̵uey te halad he selapì.
Ne naahà daan dutun ni Jesus is sevaha he vahi he valu he utew egkeayuayu ne iyan dà in-ulug dutun te vahi is dezuwa he sintabus.

Ne migkag̵i zutun si Jesus diyà te menge zuma zin te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he heeyà is balu he vahi, ne sumalà is ked-isipa te Megbevayà, utew lavew is inhalad din te langun he inhalad kayi te zuma he menge etew,

su is menge zuma he nemenhalad kayi, subra zà te ketig̵eyunan dan is inhalad dan, iyan, heeyà is egkeayuayu he vahi, minsan pa te edlisedlised sikandin te igkeuyag-uyag din ne inhalad din is namànamè en he ketig̵eyunan din.”

Dutun te menge zuma ni Jesus duen egkag̵i ziyà te kandin he utew mekempet haazà is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà su mideyzeyanan pinaag̵i te menge mahal he menge vatu he imbevaley zutun wey pinaag̵i te utew meupiya wey mahal he menge inhalad te menge etew ziyà te Megbevayà. Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te,

“Egkeuma is andew he langun kayi te egkeehè niw ne egkezeetan. Wazà keuzemà minsan sevaha he vatu he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewag̵ey heeyan is langun he vatu; wazà egkesamà keniyan te nesevukan din su is langunlangun keniyan ne egketempag.”

Ne mid-insaan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, “Datù, keg̵iyi key ke keenu egkehitavù heini is langun wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula he tuus he iyan en timpu he egketuman heini is langun he migkag̵i nu g̵eina?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Mebpekevantey kew wey kew kenà mekesundan te teruen he etew su mezakel is ebpemenlepew he egamit te ngazan ku he egkag̵i is kada sevaha zutun he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne egkag̵i zaan te, ‘Iyan en heini timpu te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà,’ ke sikandan. Iyan, kenè niw tuuwi su tarù.

Ne emun egkezineg niw ziyà te uvey niw is meg̵urub tenged te g̵ira ne egkezineg niw zaan is tudtul te menge g̵ira ziyà te meziyù he tanà ne kenè kew mahandek su kinahanglan he egkeulaula is iring kayi, iyan, kenà iyan heini tuus he egketapus en heini is timpu.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Su ebpekidtebek is sengeinged te zuma zin he inged, ne egira is sengeg̵inhedian te zuma zin he g̵inhedian.

Egkehitavù diyà te minsan hendei is menge mezesen he linug wey mepait he vitil ne ziyà te mezakel he menge inged ebpekeeneb is daru. Ne zuen egkeehè niw he utew igkeinuinu wey mekehandekhandek he singyal he ebpuun te langit.

Iyan, kayi te kenè pa heini egketuman ne edekepen kew te menge etew ne ebpesipelahan kew zan. Ibpeetuvang kew zan te menge punuan te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu ne egkestiguwen kew zan. Ibpeetuvang kew zaan te menge hadì wey menge gubirnedur tenged te kedsundan niw kediey.
Iyan en heini paag̵i te kebpekepesavut niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Heg̵eta niw is isip niw he zaan he kenè kew mesemuki ke hengkey is idtavak niw te menge insè dan keniyu.

Su iyan e en metau te idtavak niw te menge insè dan. Ne ibeg̵ey ku zutun keniyu is ketau te ked-isip-isip wey kew meketavak. Ne zutun haazà is menge kuntada niw, kenè dan ebpeketavak te ketezengan niw ne kenè dan daan ebpekepeg̵intarù te tutuu he egkeg̵iyen niw.

Ne zutun he timpu minsan is menge g̵inikanan niw, is tempezè niw en te pused, is menge kezuzumahi niw, wey is menge emig̵u niw, ne ebpalad dan keniyu ziyà te menge hukmanan. Ne zuen duma keniyu he egkehimetayan dan.
Egkuntedahan kew te langun he menge etew tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu.
Ne minsan pa zutun, wazà egkelaga ziyà te keniyu.
Hamen kew is edsarig kediey su pinaag̵i kayi egkeangken niw is untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ne emun egkeehè niw heini is inged he Hiruselim he egkelingutan en te menge kuntada niw he sundaru ne egketuenan niw he meg̵aan en egkezeeti.

Ne zutun, sikan is menge etew he zini te prubinsya he Hudiya, ne mebpelag̵uy zan pehendiyà te menge vuntud. Ne is menge etew kayi te inged he Hiruselim, ne kinahanglan he mebpelag̵uy zan daan. Ne sikan is menge meg̵inged te menge unayan dini te uvey, ne kenè dan med-aput dini te inged.
Su iyan en haazà sikan is timpu he netagnà dengan he zutun edsilutan te Megbevayà is menge kuntada zin he etew. Ne insurat heini zuen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun he andew, kehizu utew te menge vahi he memeg̵ingey wey ebpemenleg̵imu

Su heini is menge Hudiyu, is duma kandan, ne egkepatey zutun te g̵ira, ne is samà, ne edekepen ne ed-uwiten diyà te menge meziyù he inged. Ne zutun, heini is Hiruselim he inged te menge Hudiyu, ne edtekutakan te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu taman te ebpengelinteuwan te Megbevayà he mekeengked dan.

Ne zutun duen egkeehè niw he singyal ziyà te andew, vulan, wey menge vituen. Ne zini te kelibutan ne ebpekehuyab is gehinawa te tivuuk he menusiyà su egkezineg dan dutun is utew subra he kedselenuhug te zag̵at wey ebpemeteltelukuney he menge zezekelà he vag̵el.

Ne zuen en dutun menge etew he egkengevidtawan te kegkehandek su egkengeseeng ke hengkey en is egketemanan te langun he ebpeebuten he egkengehitavù dini te kelibutan su egkengehuyung is minsan hengkey he merayag diyà te langit.
Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà a ziyà te menge g̵apun is ebpekeuma he utew zekelà is gehem ku wey utew merayag is ked-anlag ku.
Ne emun egkepuun en heini egkengetuman is langun he migkag̵i ku, ne andam kew wey keg̵alew kew su meg̵aan en is kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà.”
Ne impezineg kandan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, “Isipa niw is menge kayu, lavew en is kayu he igira
su zini te kenita emun ebpeneringsing en is subpang din ne ebpenlumbey en, egketuenan ta he meg̵aan en is gulavung.
Ne iring din ded daan, emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en is langun kayi, egketuenan niw he meg̵aan en is kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà.
Tenuzi niw is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en heini, kenè kew pa egkeamin ebpatey taman te kenè pa egkengetuman heini is langun.
Egkehanew is langit wey tanà, iyan, is migkag̵i ku, ne kenà mulà egkehanew te minsan keenu.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Uram kew wey kew kenà kayi zà egketaman te kegkebibu wey kebpemenginum wey te kedlag̵ud niw te menge kelibutanen he menge kinahanglan niw. Su emun kenè kew ed-uram ne egketik-awan kew egkesaut te andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Ne egkeiring kew te egketelebpì he rumat.
Su iring keg̵aan kayi is kegkeuma kayi te andew te tivuuk he menusiyà.

Umba, mebpekevantey kew, ne layun kew ampù, su pinaag̵i zà te ked-ampù ne edlig-enan kew te Megbevayà ne kenè kew egkekeizan kayi te langun he egkengeseg̵azan niw, ne human kenè kew zutun egkeeled ke ebpekeetuvang kew kedì,” ke si Jesus.
Ne kada andew zutun ne ebpenurù si Jesus diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà. Ne te kada mezukilem ne edhendiyà sikandin te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan su zutun sikandin edhizeg̵à.
Ne is langun he etew zutun te inged, ne edselemselem dan edhendutun te Valey te Megbevayà su ebpemineg dan te menge penurù din.
Ne meg̵aan en dutun egketuman is pista te kegkeena te supas he wazè din tapey he egngezanan te Pista te Kedlevayi.

Ne zutun, is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, ebpengahà te paag̵i te kegkehimetayi zan ki Jesus he kenà egketuenan te mezakel he menge etew su egkehandek dan te menge etew.
Ne zutun he timpu si Hudas, is sevaha zutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan ni Jesus, ne mid-ulinan sikandin ni Setanas.

Ne heini si Hudas, ne midhendiyà te menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge kepitan te menge ebantey zutun te zekelà he simbahan ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan he egkehimu he ibpalad din si Jesus diyà te kandan.
Ne utew zan dutun nengesuat ne mibpesarig dan he ebeg̵ayan dan si Hudas te selapì.
Ne mid-uyun dutun si Hudas; ne puun dutun ne mibpengahà sikandin te paag̵i wey zin meekali si Jesus wey zan mezakep he kenà egketuenan te menge mezakel he etew.

Ne neume en dutun is andew te pista te kegkeena te supas he wazè din tapey. Ne iyan haazà andew te kedlepaa te menge Hudiyu te ibpemuhat he menge nati he kerehidu he egkeenen dan dutun te Pista te Kedlevayi.
Ne zutun midsug̵ù ni Jesus si Pedro wey si Juan he ibpehuna zin sikandan ne migkeg̵iyan din te, “Huna kew en ne teg̵enaha niw en is idlavung tew kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi.”
Ne mid-insà sikandan ki Jesus te, “Hendei he valey is edhilutuan dey te idlavung te Pista te Kedlevayi?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun ebpekeuma kew en diyà te inged, egkesinug̵ung niw is maama he ed-uwit te umuy he nepenù te wahig. Tundug kew kandin diyà te valey he edselezan din.

Ne keg̵iyi niw,” ke si Jesus, “is teg̵ig̵aked dutun te valey, ke sikiyu te, ‘Ibpeinsà te zatù tew kenikew ke hendei he rug̵u sikandin egkaan duma te menge sumusundan din kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi.’ ”
Ne ke si Jesus maan te, “Ne zutun ibpeehè din keniyu is meluag he rug̵u ziyà te zivavew he zaan he nehimani. Ne zutun niw teg̵enaha is idlavung tew.”
Ne migenat dutun haazà is midsug̵ù din, ne langun dutun te migkag̵i ni Jesus, ne iyan en iyan neehè dan ne zutun dan teg̵enaha is idlavung te pista.
Ne hein iyan en uras te kedlavung ne mibpinuu si Jesus wey is menge epustul zin is ebpemengaan.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Utew zekelà dini te g̵ehinawa ku heini is kegkesevaha tew te kegkaan te idlavung kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi te kenè e pa ebpatey.
Su venar is egkeg̵iyen ku, kenà ad maan egkaan te idlavung te kedlevayi taman te timpu keuzemà ke egketuman is hustu he kehulug̵an din dutun te kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà.”
Ne zutun ne migkuwa ni Jesus is tasa he midteg̵uan te vinu ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà ne migkag̵i sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Med-inum is kada sevaha keniyu.
Ne egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he kayi zà taman is ked-inum ku kayi te vinu taman dutun keuzemà te egkeume en is kedhadì te Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun mid-amì si Jesus dutun te egkeenen dan he supas ne mibpeselematan din daan haazà te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din ne impenduwal zin kandan, ke sikandin te, “Iyan heini lawa ku he ibelukas keniyu. Emun egkeenen niw heini isipa a keniyu.”

Ne hein neipus dan dutun is egkaan ne migkuwa en maan ni Jesus is tasa ne migkag̵i te, “Heini ve is inumen, ne tuus te veg̵u en he paag̵i te kegkelibri he midtukud te Megbevayà ne egkehimu heini pinaag̵i te lengesa ku he ibpaag̵as tenged keniyu.
Sevuta niw heini,” ke si Jesus, “he sikan is etew he ebpalad kedì diyà te menge kuntada ku, ne kayi zed guntaan duma tew te ebpememimpinuu!
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpatey e zed gihapun sumalà is imbanglis kedì te Megbevayà, iyan, kehizu utew te etew he ed-akal kedì.”
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey haazà is menge sumusundan din ke hentei kandan haazà is egkeg̵iyen din he ebpalad kandin.
Ne zutun mibpelewlewanà haazà is menge sumusundan din ke hentei is lavew kandan keuzemà.

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Dini te kelibutan, is hadì te kada inged, ne iyan dà ulaula zan is edsug̵ùsug̵ù dà te menge sakup dan su tuus he zekelà is pid-etawan dan. Ne minsan pa zutun egeraran sikandan te, ‘Menenavang te menge Etew.’

Iyan, sikiyu mulà,” ke si Jesus, “ne kenà egkehimu he iring kayi is ulaula niw. Su sikan is lavew keniyu, ne isipa zin he iyan en sikandin kinevevaan; ne sikan is egalen, ne isipa zin he sulug̵uen sikandin te langun.

Ne penenglitan, hentei is lavew? Iyan be is ebpinuu su egkaan wey ke iyan be haazà is sulug̵uen he edtangel kandin? Ne siguradu iyan lavew is ebpinuu, ne minsan pa zutun, siak is egalen niw, ne iring a te edtangel keniyu.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sikiyu, iyan kew nekid-uunungen kedì te langun he menge kemereg̵enan ku.
Mibeg̵ayan a te Amey ku he Megbevayà te ketenged te kedhadì keuzemà. Ne iring din ded daan ne ebeg̵ayan ku zaan sikiyu te ketenged te kedhadì.
Keuzemà ke edhadì a ne ebpinuu kew zuma kedì su ebpetugtug̵enè kiw is egkaan wey ed-inum. Ne ibpehadì ku sikiyu te menge kevuwazan duen te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge anak ni Israyil.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te ki Simon Pedro te, “He Simon, duen egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew. Midtug̵utan si Setanas te Megbevayà he ebpenggezam keniyu te langun. Is kebpenggezam din ne iring te ked-ukap te parey su kela ke iring te ukap is kedtuu niw.
Iyan, in-ampù ku sikew, Simon, diyà te Megbevayà he kenà maawà is kedtuu nu kediey. Ne emun melig-en en is kedtuu nu kediey ne himuwa nu he mebmelig-en daan is kedtuu te menge zuma nu.”
Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Kenà a edsuwey kenikew! Su minsan ke egkepirisu ka ne eduma e en kenikew; ne ke edhimetayan ka ne ed-unung e en kenikew!”
Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, “Utew venar, Simon, is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he kengkuwan te mezukilem te kenè pa ed-ukarà is manuk ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekag̵i he kenà a kenikew egkekilala.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Hein midsug̵ù ku sikiyu zengan he indawey ku keniyu he wazà med-uwit te selapì, ne wazà med-uwit te ed-ilisan, ne wazà daan med-uwit te ed-ilisan he sepatus, ne hengkey is kurang niw zutun te kedhipanew niw?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Wazè dey kurang.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan, guntaan, emun duen selapì niw wey ed-ilisan niw ne uwita niw en. Ne sikan is wazè din ubpit ne ivelegyè din is kumbalè din wey mekepemasa te sundang.
Su kinahanglan he egketuman en dini te kedì sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Inragkes sikandin dutun te menge selaan he etew.’ ”
Ne zutun migkag̵i is menge sumusundan din te, “Ahaa nu man su zuen dey en dezuwa he sundang.” Ne ke si Jesus te, “Ne netengkaan en heeyan.”
Ne zutun migawas si Jesus puun te valey ne midhendiyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan su zutun dan layun edhizeg̵à ne nemenduma kandin is menge sumusundan din.
Ne hein nekeuma zan dutun ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Ampù kew wey kew kenà mezaag te penuley keniyu.”
Ne zutun midlaus si Jesus diyà te uvey zà ne midluhud ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.

Ke sikandin te, “Amey ku, emun iyan egkesuatan nu ne kenè nu en kediey ipeseg̵azi heini is merasey he imbanglis nu kediey, iyan, kenà egkesunud is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, iyan egkesunud is kenikew.”
Ne zutun te ked-ampù din ne nekeuma is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit su edlig-enan din is gehinawa ni Jesus.
Ne utew si Jesus dutun neseeng ne midheg̵etan din is ked-ampù din te Megbevayà ne edteg̵aktak is rimuseng din he iring te lengesa.
Ne mid-engked si Jesus is ed-ampù ne midhitindeg ne midlikuan din is menge sumusundan din. Ne langun dutun te menge sumusundan din, ne nemekelipezeng su utew zan mibmeluya tenged te kegkeseeng dan.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Maan is ebpemenlipezeng kew? Enew kew wey med-ampù wey kew kenà mezaag te penuley keniyu.”

Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkag̵i si Jesus, ne nekeume en si Hudas, is sevaha zuen te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din. Ne iyan sikandin edhuna te mezakel he menge etew. Ne mid-uvey sikandin diyà te ki Jesus su edhezekan din.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Kenè be tutuu, Hudas, he heini is kedhazek nu kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne iyan en kebpezekepa nu kedì keniyan te menge zuma nu?”

Ne hein netuenan dutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew, migkag̵i zan diyà te ki Jesus te, “Menu, Datù, egkesuatan nu ve he edsukul key su heini zed is sundang dey?”
Ne is sevaha zutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus, midtibas din is sulug̵uen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te kewanan he telinga ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, “Ereg kew!” Ne zutun inlikù ni Jesus haazà is telinga zutun te nelepungan ne henduen te wazà pig̵eyanan gihapun te telinga zin.

Ne elin daan dutun te nemenhendutun te kedakep ki Jesus is menge punuan te memumuhat wey is menge kepitan te ebantey zutun te zekelà he simbahan wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu. Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Jesus te, “Tulisan e ve? Su maan is neg̵umeenan kew te ubpit wey lagkut is edakep kedì?

Ne hein duma a keniyu kada andew ziyà te Valey te Megbevayà is ebpenurù ne wazà a keniyu zutun dà dekepa. Iyan, iyan heini g̵untaan kes timpu he imbanglis keniyu wey niw meveeli is egkesuatan ni Setanas.”
Ne zutun midakep dan si Jesus ne mid-uwit dan diyà te valey te lavew he memumuhat. Ne si Pedro, midtinundug daan asal kenà utew ed-uvey.
Ne zuen hapuy ziyà te lama zutun te valey ne zuen menge etew he ebpemenhizazang. Ne mid-uvey zutun si Pedro ne midhizazang daan.
Ne zuen dutun sulug̵uen he vahi ne neehè din si Pedro is edhidhizazang. Ne midtengtengan din si Pedro ne migkag̵i te, “Minsan heeyan is maama ne zuma keniyan te midakep dan.”
Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Bayi, kenè ku egkekilala heeyan is midakep dan.”
Ne netegteg̵aad dutun ne zuen en maan etew he nekekilala ki Pedro. Ne migkag̵i haazà te, “Sikew, duma ka zaan keniyà te midakep dan.” Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Mama, kenà a iyan duma zin.”
Ne netegteg̵aad pa maan dutun ne zuen en maan sevaha he etew he nekekilala ki Pedro he ke sikandin te, “Tutuu iyan he zuma zaan heeyan dutun te midakep su egketuusan he tigGeliliya zaan sikandin.”
Iyan, midtavak en maan si Pedro te, “Kenè ku egketuenan heeyan is migkag̵i niw.” Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkag̵i si Pedro ne mid-ukarè en is manuk.

Ne zutun midlilingey ni Jesus si Pedro ne midtengtengan din. Ne zutun human metenuzi ni Pedro sikan is migkag̵i ni Jesus kandin he, “Te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekag̵i he kenà a kenikew egkekilala.”
Ne zutun mid-awà si Pedro zutun te menge etew ne nekelelendag is edsineg̵ew.
Ne haazà is menge etew he ebantey ki Jesus, ne mid-eled-eled dan sikandin. Ne mibagkes dan is menge mata zin ne midsumbag dan sikandin, ne ke sikandan te, “Tegnaa nu ke hentei is midsumbag kenikew.”
Ne kenà iyan dà haazà su mezakel pa is memezaat he lalag dan kandin te kedsumpelita zan kandin.
Ne hein nepawà dutun, netig̵um is langun he menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu wey is menge punuan he menge memumuhat, wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, ne impeetuvang kandan si Jesus.

Ne mid-insaan dan si Jesus te, “Hengkey, iyan ke en be iyan sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Minsan ke egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he iyan a, ne kenè kew edtuu te egkeg̵iyen ku.
Ne emun id-insè ku heini keniyu ne kenè kew zaan edtavak.

Iyan, heini zà is egkekag̵i ku keniyu, ‘Meg̵aan en egketuman is andew he siaken, is netagnà he Kakey te Menusiyà, ne ebpekepinuu e en diyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà he utew mekeg̵eg̵ehem.’ ”
Ne migkag̵i zan is langun te, “Ne emun iyan heeyan lalag nu ne hentei ke ve? Anak ke ve te Megbevayà?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Uya, iyan is migkag̵i niw.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i zan te, “Wazè en kinahanglan pa he zuen pa menge edsumbung kandin su nezineg tew en is menge lalag din he utew supak te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun, haazà is langun he menge punuan he nengetig̵um dutun, ne mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te ki Gubirnedur Pilatu su wey zin mehukumi.

Ne hein nekeuma zan dutun ne impezineg dan ki Pilatu is menge sumbung dan. Ke sikandan te, “Midsusi zey heini is etew ne netuenan dey he edsinamuk kayi te inged tew su ibpeengked din is menge etew he ebayad te vuhis diyà te lavew he hadì tew ziyà te inged he Ruma. Ne kenà duen dà taman su egkeg̵iyen din he iyan sikandin si Kristu, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, hadì.”
Ne si Pilatu, mid-insaan din si Jesus te, “Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyu?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Uya, iyan is migkag̵i nu.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pilatu ziyà te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge etew te, “Wazà netuenan ku he engayan he idsiluti kayi te etew,” ke sikandin.

Iyan, nasì nememensag is menge etew zutun he egkag̵i te, “Edsinamuk is menge etew he ebpemineg te menge penurù keniyan! Mibpuunan din is kebpenurù din diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midtukid din daan is menge inged dini te prubinsya he Hudiya, Ne g̵untaan, dini en maan sikandin te Hiruselim.”
Ne hein nezineg ni Pilatu heini ne mid-insà sikandin te, “TigGeliliya ve heini is etew?”

Ne midtavak dan te, “Uya, tigGeliliya heeyan.” Ne hein netuenan din he sakup si Jesus te prubinsya he ebeyveyaan ni Hirudis ne impeuwit din si Jesus diyà te ki Hirudis. Su neserengà he zutun daan si Hirudis te Hiruselim.
Ne si Hirudis, ne utew nesuatsuat hein neehè din si Jesus su neug̵et dà he egkesuatan din si Jesus te ed-ahà. Egkesuatan din he meehè din is menge egkein-inuwan he nezineg din he ebpemeelan ni Jesus.
Ne zutun mezakel is menge insà ni Hirudis ki Jesus, iyan, wazà si Jesus medtavak.
Ne zutun, haazà is menge punuan he menge memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, ne mid-uvey zan ne utew meinit is gehinawa zan te kedsumbunga zan ki Jesus.

Ne zutun si Hirudis wey is menge sundaru zin, ne mibaleyvaley zan si Jesus ne mid-eled-eled dan sikandin. Ne midsun-uzan dan te meupiya he bisti su uvag kun hadì, ne zutun impelikù dan diyà te ki Pilatu.
Ne iyan haazà andew te kebpeked-emig̵u ni Pilatu wey si Hirudis su zutun te nengehuna he timpu ne kenà meupiya is kedepitè dan.
Ne hein diyè en maan si Jesus te ki Pilatu ne midtig̵um ni Pilatu is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu wey is menge mezakel he etew.

Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Heini is etew he in-etuvang niw kayi te kedì, migkag̵i niw he edsinamuk sikandin te inged tew, iyan, mibpurungan ku sikandin susiya kayi te etuvangan te langun te sikiyu ne wazè ku egkeahà he salè din.
Ne si Hirudis daan, wazè din egkeahà he salà kayi te etew su impelikù din kayi te kedì. Wazà iyan ulaula kayi te etew he zait he idhimetayi kandin.
Ne ibpevug̵el ku zà sikandin ne ibpeg̵awas ku en.”
Ne iyan ingkekeg̵iya kayi ni Pilatu su neleyaman te menge Hudiyu he kada egketuman haazà is Pista te Kedlevayi ne kinahanglan he ibpeg̵awas ni Pilatu is sevaha he pirisu he Hudiyu.
Ne hein nezineg te mezakel he etew haazà is migkag̵i ni Pilatu ne mibpememensag dan te, “Ipehimetayi nu heeyan he etew, ne iyan nu ipeg̵awas si Berabas!”
Ne heini si Berabas, ne iyan ingkepirisu zin su impepekidtebek din te gubirnu is menge etew ne kenà dutun dà taman su nekevunù daan sikandin te etew.
Ne si Pilatu, ne iyan din egkesuatan he iyan ibpeg̵awas si Jesus, ne mid-uman sikandin med-insà diyà te nengetig̵um he menge etew ke hengkey is egkesuatan dan,
iyan, nasì mid-iseg sikandan mebpememensag he egkag̵i te, “Iransang te krus! Iransang te krus!”
Ne migkag̵i si Pilatu te iketelu, ke sikandin te, “Maan? Duen be mezaat he mid-ulaula zin? Wazè ku man egkeahà he salà he zait he idhimetayi kandin. Ibpevug̵el ku zà ne ibpeg̵awas ku en.”
Ne zutun mid-iseg is kebpememensag dan he ibperansang dan si Jesus diyà te krus. Ne hein neug̵et kenè en ebpeketigker si Pilatu,
ne midtug̵ut sikandin he idransang si Jesus te krus.
Ne zutun midlibri ni Pilatu si Berabas he mibpirisu tenged te kedsinamuk din wey kebunua zin te etew. Ne si Jesus, insug̵ù en ni Pilatu he meulaula ziyà te kandin is egkesuatan te menge etew.

Ne zutun migkuwa zan si Jesus ne migenat dan su ed-uwiten dan pehendiyà te g̵awas dutun te inged. Ne ziyà te zalan nesinug̵ung dan is etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon. Heini si Simon, diyà ebpuun te unayan ne edhendiyà te inged. Ne mibpeg̵es dan ipetiang dutun te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
Ne zutun te ked-uwita zan ki Jesus, utew mezakel is menge etew he nemenduma. Ne zuen dutun menge vahi he ebpemenlelendag su edsineg̵awan dan si Jesus.
Ne midlilingey si Jesus diyà te kandan ne migkag̵i te, “Sikiyu is menge vahi he tigHiruselim, kenà a iyan keniyu sineg̵awi, kekenà, iyan niw sineg̵awi is egkeulaula niw wey te menge anak niw.
Su egkeuma is andew he egkehitavù kayi te keniyu is dekelà he kemeresayan. Ne zutun egkag̵i is menge etew he utew zeyzey sikan is bahi he wazè din anak wey wazà edleg̵imuwen.
Ne zutun he timpu egkeg̵iyan te menge etew is menge vuntud te, ‘Ketempag̵i key.’ Ne egkeg̵iyan dan daan is menge vuvungan te, ‘Bumbuni key.’
Su,” ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan dan kedì te iring te kayu he wazà meg̵angu
Ne zuen daan dutun dezuwa he tulisan he ed-uwiten dan su edhimetayan dan duma ki Jesus.

Ne nekeuma zan dutun te vuvungan he egngezanan te Tulan te Ulu ne zutun dan iransang si Jesus te krus ne inransang dan daan haazà is menge tulisan te zezuwa zaan he krus. Impasek dan is sevaha he krus diyà te egkekewanan ni Jesus, ne is sevaha, impasek dan diyà te egkeg̵ivang din.

Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa idransang si Jesus, ne mid-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, “Amey ku, peseyluwa nu sikandan su wazè dan metueni ke hengkey heini is ed-ul-ulahan dan.” Ne zutun, haazà is midransang kandin, midripa zan ke hentei is ebpekeangken te menge ugelingen ni Jesus.

Ne is menge etew, ne ebpemenhitindeg dan dutun he ebantey; ne is menge punuan te menge Hudiyu, ne ed-undaunda kandin, ke sikandan te, “Wey zè be! Nelibri zin is duma; ne emun tutuu he iyan sikandin sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, ed-ahaan ta ke egkelibri zin is keugelingen din.”
Ne kes menge sundaru zaan, ne ebpen-undaunda zaan kandin. Mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin su ibpeinum dan te vinu.
Ne ke sikandan te, “Emun tutuu iyan he hadì ka te menge Hudiyu ne libriya nu is keugelingen nu!”
Ne impezeket dan is surat te zivavew zin diyà te krus he edhenduen haazà is surat te, “Iyan heini sikan is Hadì te menge Hudiyu.”

Ne is sevaha zutun te zezuwa he tulisan he inransang diyà te pesikilizà ni Jesus, ne edsumpalit en daan kandin. Ke sikandin te, “Emun tutuu iyan he iyan ka sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà ne hante kun be iyan, libriya nu is lawa nu keniyan ne libriya key zaan kenikew.”
Ne haazà is sevaha, ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is duma zin te, “Maan is egkag̵i ka te iring keniyan? Wazè nu ve kegkehandek te Megbevayà? Sikitew is tetelu, ne pudu kiw ebpatey kayi,
iyan, sikita is dezuwa, ne engayan en he edhimetayan ki su id-ulì dini te kenita is kelelalung ta. Iyan, heini he etew mulà, ne wazè nehimu zin he mezaat.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan din si Jesus te, “He Jesus, kenà a kenikew lipati zutun te kedhadì nu en keuzemà.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Benar heini is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he g̵untaan dà ebpezumehè ki zutun te inged te edtulusen.”
Ne hein neudtu is andew zutun ne midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.
Ne zutun te iyan daan haazà he uras, kes utew mekepal he manggad he ingkurtina zuen te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ne netik-ew mevindas diyà te liwezaan.
Ne zutun ne migkulahì si Jesus is egkag̵i te, “Amà, ibpeg̵ewezan ku en kenikew is gimukud ku.” Ne iyan dà haazà ne naawà is gehinawa zin.
Ne zutun, sikan is kepitan te menge sundaru zutun, hein neehè din heini is neulaula ne nekezalig te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, “Tutuu ves iyan he wazà mezaat he ulaula kayi he etew!”
Ne haazà is menge etew he nengevurun dutun su ebantey zan, ne hein neehè dan haazà is neulaula, mid-ulì dan he utew memeveg̵at is gehinawa.
Ne is langun he menge emig̵u ni Jesus, ragkes is menge vahi he nemendumazuma kandin he ebpemuun te Geliliya, ne ziyè dan te malù meziyù is ebantey zutun te langun he neulaula.

Ne zuen sevaha zutun he etew he egngezanan ki Jose he meg̵inged diyà te inged he Erimetiya he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Heini si Jose, ne metazeng he etew ne telehuzen daan. Sevaha sikandin te menge Hudiyu he edtag̵ad te kedhadì te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan. Sevaha zaan sikandin te menge zatù te menge Hudiyu, iyan, wazà sikandin mekeuyun te kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
Ne heini si Jose, ne midhendiyà sikandin te ki Pilatu ne midhangyù din he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus; ne intug̵ut kandin ni Pilatu.

Ne migkuwa ni Jose haazà is lawa ni Jesus ne mibukusan din te malung he meputì. Ne zuen surung he penlevengà he ingkalut diyà te kelendig̵an he pag̵ang he wazè pa meselezi te minatey. Ne zutun iseled ni Jose is lawa ni Jesus.
Mahapun en haazà dutun te andew he Birnis ne emun edsanlep en dutun is andew ne iyan puunà te Andew te Kedhimeley.
Ne sikan is menge vahi he ebpemuun diyà te Geliliya he nemenduma ki Jesus, ne miduma zan ki Jose te edleveng dutun te lawa ni Jesus. Ne neehè dan is midsevukan ki Jesus dutun te penlevengà.
Ne zutun mid-ulì dan su ed-endamen dan is menge mehemut he sulù wey lana he idhaplas te lawa ni Jesus.
Ne zutun te Andew te Kedhimeley, wazè dan mebaal su edtumanen dan is insug̵ù dutun te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin kandan.

Ne hein neiwas is Andew te Kedhimeley te kegkepawè din dutun te andew he Duminggu, mibpehendiyè en maan haazà is menge vahi te midlevengan ki Jesus ne mid-uwit dan sikan is menge mehemut he idhaplas he mid-andam dan.
Nekeuma zan dutun ne neehè dan he in-awè en sikan is batu he inlekeb dutun te surung he penlevengà.
Ne mid-ahuk dan dutun ne ebpenlenglenguwen dan kes lawa te Nengazen he si Jesus ne wazè en dutun.
Ne zutun utew zan egkengereg̵enan he ebpen-isip-isip; ne netik-ew mebpaahà kandan is dezuwa he maama he ebpemengenamag te keputì is bisti zan.
Ne haazà is menge vahi, ne midluhud dan is edungul su utew zan nengehandek. Ne migkag̵i kandan haazà is menge maama te, “Maan is kayi niw ebpen-ahaa te edlevengan te minatey is etew he uuyag?
Su si Jesus, ne wazè en kayi su nevanhew en. Tentenuzi niw ke hengkey is migkag̵i zin keniyu hein diyè kew pa te Geliliya
su migkag̵i zin he sikandin is Kakey te Menusiyà, ne ibpalad diyà te menge lalung he etew ne idransang sikandin diyà te krus ne seled te tetelu he andew ne egkevanhew sikandin.”
Ne human metenuzi zutun te menge vahi haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus.
Ne zutun mid-ulì haazà is menge vahi ne mibpenudtulan dan sikan is sepulù wey sevaha he menge epustul ni Jesus wey is duma pa he menge etew.

Haazà is menge vahi, ne iyan si Maria Megdelina, si Juana, wey elin daan si Maria he iney ni Santiago, ne zuen pa menge zuma zan he vahi. Iyan sikandan mibpenudtul ziyà te menge epustul te nengehitavù kandan.
Iyan, sikan is menge epustul ni Jesus, kunaan dan ke kenà tutuu haazà ne wazè dan medtuu zutun te tudtul te menge vahi.

Iyan, si Pedro, hein nezineg din haazà is tudtul ne mibpelelag̵uy sikandin is ebpehendiyà te surung he penlevengà. Ne hein nekeuma zutun ne midsiniling sikandin ne iyan din dà naahà kes meputì he manggad he imbukus te lawa ni Jesus ne mid-awà dutun sikandin is mid-ulì ne utew neinuinu ke maan is wazà dutun is lawa ni Jesus.

Ne zutun daan he andew ne zuen dezuwa he sumusundan he ebpuun diyà te Hiruselim he edhendiyà te inged he egngezanan te Imawus. Ne haazà he inged, ne menge sepulù wey tetelu he kilumitru is keziyù din diyà te inged he Hiruselim.
Ne zutun te edhipanew sikandan ne iyan dan edhisgutan is mehitenged te langun he neulaula ki Jesus.
Ne zutun te kebitiyara zan dutun ne midlambag si Jesus kandan ne mibpekiduma kandan.
Neehè dan sikandin, iyan, wazà mebpekilala kandan si Jesus.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Hengkey is edhisgutan niw te edhipanew?” Ne neketeren dan dutun ne egkeahà diyà te kebuvuked dan he utew zan egkeseeng.
Ne midtavak is sevaha zutun he egngezanan ki Keliyupas, ke sikandin te, “Iyan ke zà buwa etew he nekehengkayi te inged he Hiruselim he wazà metau kayi te veg̵u pa he nehitavù.”

Ne mid-uman med-insà si Jesus kandan te, “Maan? Hengkey is nehitavù?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Iyan is nehitavù ki Jesus he tigNeserit. Ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà ne midtuuwan sikandin te langun he menge etew. Dekelà is gehem din te ebpenurù ne mekeg̵eg̵ehem daan sikandin he ebaal te menge egkengein-inuwan.

Is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen tew, ne impalad dan sikandin diyà te ki Pilatu. Ne midhukuman sikandin he edhimetayan. Ne zutun midhimetayan dan pinaag̵i te kedrensanga kandin te krus.

Ne netag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa zey he iyan en pezem sikandin kes midsug̵ù te Megbevayà he edlibri te langun he kevuwazan ni Israyil, iyan, seled en guntaan te tetelu he kezukileman is kedhimetayi kandin.
Ne g̵eina te meselem neumanan is kegkeinuinu zey su zuen menge zuma zey he menge vahi he midselem dan diyà te midlevengan kandin.

Ne nekeuma zan dutun ne wazè dan maahà sikan is lawa zin. Ne midlikù dan diyà te kenami ne mibpenudtul zan he zuen menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he mibpaahà kandan. Ne migkag̵i kun dutun te menge velinsug̵uen he nevanhew en si Jesus.
Ne zuen pa zuma zey zutun he midsuvar mebpehendutun te surung he penlevengà ne iring ded daan dutun is neehè dan te migkag̵i zutun te menge vahi, iyan, wazè dan maahà is lawa ni Jesus.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Kurang kew pe bes te ked-isip. Maan is utew mereg̵en diyan te keniyu is kebpeketuu niw te langun he netagnà dengan te menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà?
Su kinahanglan he ebpekeag̵i pa te kemeresayan sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà ne human ibeg̵ey kandin is kebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.”

Ne zutun midseysey ni Jesus kandan ke hengkey is langun he menge lalag te Megbevayà mehitenged kandin he insurat te langun he menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà igenat dà ki Moises dengan taman te huziyan he menge ebpemeneuven.
Ne hein ebpekeuma zan en dutun te ebpeveyaan dan he inged ne henduen be te edlaus pa si Jesus,
iyan, migkeg̵iyan dan sikandin te, “Kenè ke pa laus, ne zini ka hulavung su mahapun en utew.” Ne iyan dà haazà, ne mibpekiduma si Jesus kandan.
Ne hein diyè dan en te valey ne mibpinuu zan is egkaan. Ne si Jesus, migkuwa zin is egkeenen dan he supas. Ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà ne mibpenevì din ne human din ipemeg̵ey kandan.
Ne zutun, human dan mekilala si Jesus su nemelmeleg̵an dan te ed-ahà. Iyan, netekew maawà dutun si Jesus diyà te ked-ehè dan.
Ne mibpelelag̵à haazà is dezuwa he etew he egkag̵i te, “Umba ves utew ta nesuati g̵eina ziyà te zalan te ebpemineg is kedseysayi zin kenita zuen te Lalag te Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun ne midhitindeg dan ne migaanggaan dan medlikù diyà te Hiruselim. Ne hein nekeuma zan ne neumahan dan sikan is sepulù wey sevaha he menge epustul ni Jesus wey is menge zuma he sumusundan he nengetig̵um diyà te sengevaley.
Ne iyan ingketig̵um dan su ebpetudtudtulè dan he egkag̵i te, “Benar ves iyan he nevanhew is Nengazen su mibpaahà ki Pedro.”

Ne zutun, haazà is dezuwa he ebpuun te Imawus, ne mibpenudtul zan ke hengkey is nehitavù kandan diyà te zalan. Ne midtudtul zan daan he zutun dan en mekilala si Jesus hein mibpenevì din en is supas dutun te kegkaan dan.
Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa ebpetudtudtulà kayi ne netekewtekew mebpeg̵awag̵awa si Jesus diyà te teliwazè dan. Ne migkag̵i sikandin te, “Kenè kew mengeseeng.”
Ne utew zan dutun nengehandek su kunaan dan ke g̵imukud dà ni Jesus is mibpaahà kandan.
Iyan, migkag̵i zutun si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Ne maan is egkengehandek kew kedì? Maan is egkezuwazuwa kew kedì?
Ahaa niw man heini is palad ku wey paa ku su iyan e zed! Semsama a keniyu ne egketuenan niw! Su is gimukud, ne wazè din lawa, iyan, siak, ahaa niw man, duen lawa ku,” ke sikandin.
Ne impeehè din kandan is menge imbayà te ransang diyà te menge palad din wey paa zin.
Ne g̵eina te kemulu zan pa eduwazuwa, asal, utew zan nengeg̵alew, mid-insà si Jesus te, “Duen be egkeenen niw kayi?”
Ne mibeg̵ayan dan sikandin te tinuug he pait.
Ne migkuwa zin haazà is pait ne migkaan din.

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Iyan heini sikan is migkag̵i ku keniyu hein kemulu e pa zuma niw. Is langun mehitenged kedì he impesurat dengan te Megbevayà ki Moises, wey kes langun he impesurat din te zuma pa he ebpemeneuven din, wey minsan kes insurat dengan duen te libru te menge Salmo, ne kinahanglan he egketuman pinaag̵i te neulaula zini te kedì.”
Ne zutun impesavut din human kandan is langun te impemesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ke sikandin te, “Ibpesavut duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he kinahanglan he siak is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, ne edhimetayan a ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun ne ebenhawen a te Megbevayà.

Ne ibpesavut daan dutun he kinahanglan he edsug̵uen ku sikiyu te kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ebpuunan niw is kebpenudtul niw zini te Hiruselim ne ieneb niw heini ipesavut te tivuuk he kelibutan. Ipesavut niw he kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an te menge etew is memezaat he ulaula ne human dan ebpeseyluwa te Megbevayà.
Ne kinahanglan he iyan kew mebpesavut kayi te langun he impesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he netuman kayi te kedì su nengeehè niw en.

Ne edsug̵uen ku zini te keniyu is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he impesarig te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Iyan, dini kew tag̵ad te inged he Hiruselim taman te kenè kew pa egkevulusan te g̵ehem din he ebpuun te langit.”

Ne te nekepasad si Jesus dutun is egkag̵i ne mid-uwit din sikandan diyà te g̵awas te inged he Hiruselim, ne hein diyè dan en te uvey te inged he egngezanan te Bitanya, ne imbayew zin is menge velad din su ebpenubtuvazan din sikandan.
Ne zutun te kemulu pa sikandin ebpenuvadtuvad ne nevatun sikandin pehendiyà te langit.
Ne mid-azap dan sikandin ne utew zan nengelipey is mid-ulì diyà te Hiruselim.
Ne andew-andew ne layun sikandan diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà is edalig te Megbevayà.
Dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey, daan en is migeraran te Lalag te Megbevayà. Heini is Lalag te Megbevayà, daan sikandin he zuma te Megbevayà ne iyan en Megbevayà.
Dutun te kedlimbag̵a te langun, daan en sikandin he zuma te Megbevayà.
Is langun he midlimbag te Megbevayà, ne pinaag̵i kayi te Lalag, ne wazà minsan hengkey he midlimbag emun kenà pinaag̵i kandin te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne heini is Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan daan sikandin sikan is puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan, ne heini is untung, iring te kerayag su ebpeketayew te kerusireman te isip te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Neketayew haazà is kerayag te kerusireman kayi te kelibutan. Ne is kerayag, wazà mezaag kayi te kerusireman.
Duen etew he migngezanan ki Juan he midsug̵ù te Megbevayà. Umba midsug̵ù heini si Juan te Megbevayà
su wey zin ikepenurù diyà te menge etew he iyan si Jesu Kristu sikan is tutuu he kerayag, su wey meketuu is tivuuk he menusiyà pinaag̵i zutun te penurù.
Heini si Juan, kenà iyan sikandin sikan is kerayag, kekenà, iyan sikan is edseysey ke hentei is kerayag.
Ne zutun he timpu nekeuma zini te kelibutan si Kristu, sikan is tutuu he kerayag. Iyan sikandin sikan is ebpeketayew te isip te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Ne nekeuma si Kristu zini te kelibutan. Pinaag̵i kandin midlimbag is kelibutan, iyan, wazà sikandin mekilala te menusiyà.
Minsan te ziyà sikandin mekeuma te keugelingen din he menge inged, wazà utew zutun te menge zuma zin midawat kandin.
Asal is minsan hentei he nekezawat wey midtuu kandin, mibeg̵ayan din sikandan te ketenged wey zan mehimu he menge anak te Megbevayà.

Is paag̵i te kegkehimu zan he anak te Megbevayà, kenà iyan kes paag̵i te kegkevuwad dini te kelibutan su wazè dan dutun ianak pinaag̵i te kegkevuwad te kelibutanen he amey, kekenà, iyan amey zan is Megbevayà.

Ne sikan is nekag̵i he Lalag te Megbevayà, nehimu he menusiyà ne mid-amur kenitew. Utew sikandin belig̵eg̵awen wey utew tutuu is menge lalag din. Neehè dey is utew zin kebpekelavew he iyan is kebpekelavew te vudtung he Anak te Megbevayà. Ne haazà is kebpekelavew zin, imbeg̵ey kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Ne heini si Juan, impesavut din ke hentei sikandin. Midhabet si Juan megkag̵i te, “Iyan heini sikan is etew he migkag̵i ku he ke siak te, ‘Duen etew he egkehuziyan kedìey he lavew pa kenà siak, su zengan te wazè e pa ianak, daan en sikandin,’ ” ke si Juan.
Ne g̵eina te utew sikandin belig̵eg̵awen kenà egketapus is menge meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew te langun.
Ne pinaag̵i ki Moises imbulus te Megbevayà sikan is menge kesug̵uan, iyan, pinaag̵i ki Jesus imbulus te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin kenitew wey is tutuu he tuluuwen.
Wazè pa menusiyà he nekeahà te Megbevayà, iyan, sikan is Anak din he vudtung, impetuenan din kenitew is Amey zin he Megbevayà su iyan dan layun telezuma.

Duen menge memumuhat wey menge kevuwazan ni Levi he midhendiyà te ki Juan Megbebewtismu. Midsug̵ù sikandan te menge punuan te menge Hudiyu puun te Hiruselim wey zan meinsai si Juan ke hentei sikandin. Ne iyan heini migkag̵i ni Juan su wazè din ieles, ke sikandin te, “Siak, kenà a iyan kes mibpilì te Megbevayà wey mekehadì.”

Ne ke sikandan te, “Iyan ke ve kes ebpeneuven dengan he si Elias?” Ne ke si Juan te, “Kenà a zaan.” Ne ke sikandan te, “Kela ke iyan ka sikan is netagnà he mibpenaub te Megbevayà?” Ne ke si Juan te, “Kenà a zaan.”
Ne ke sikandan en maan te, “Keg̵iyi key ke hentei ka su kinahanglan he zuen idtavak dey te midsug̵ù kenami. Hengkey is egkekag̵i nu mehitenged kayi?”
Ne zutun midtavak si Juan. Is tavak din iring te insurat dengan te ebpeneuven he si Esaias. Ke si Juan te,
“Iyan a sikan is netagnà he etew
he egkezineg is kedwali zin diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà.
Ke sikandin te,
‘Tendanga niw is ibayà he ed-ikulen te Nengazen.’ ”
Heini is menge etew he ed-insà ki Juan, ne menge sug̵ù te menge Perisiyu.
Mid-insè dan en maan te, “Emun kenè ka iyan sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà wey mekehadì, ne kenè ka zaan si Elias, wey kenè ka sikan is netagnà he ebpeneuven, maan is ebpemewtismu ka te menge etew?”
Ne zutun midtavak si Juan te, “Tutuu iyan he ebpemewtismu a, iyan, pinaag̵i zà te wahig, iyan, duen duma niw he wazè niw mekilala
he ebpekeuma he huziyan kediey he utew lavew kenà siak. Siak, minsan is kebpul-ut dà te sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he sulug̵uen din,” ke si Juan.
Ne nehitavù heini is langun diyà te inged he Bitanya he ziyà layun te wahig he Hurdan he zutun ebpemewtismu si Juan.

Hein mid-ilis he andew zutun, naahà ni Juan si Jesus he edhendiyà te kandin, ne ke si Juan diyà te menge etew, “Iyan heini sikan is etew he egngezanan te ibpemuhat he Nati he Kerehidu he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i kandin egkeawà is menge memezaat he ulaula te menusiyà.
Iyan heini kes migkag̵i ku he ke siak te, ‘Duen etew he egkehuziyan kediey, iyan, lavew sikandin kediey su zaan en sikandin te wazè e pa ianak.’
Hein aney,” ke si Juan, “wazè ku metueni ke hentei sikandin, iyan, umba ebpemewtismu a su wey metueni te menge zuma tew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he meg̵aan sikandin ebpekeuma.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Juan te, “Neehè ku is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te langit he edlugtanà diyà te ki Jesus iring te merepatik ne wazè din ewai si Jesus.

Ne hein aney zutun,” ke si Juan, “wazè ku pa metueni he iyan sikandin kes netagnà he hadì, iyan, sikan is Megbevayà he iyan midsug̵ù kedì wey a mekepemewtismu pinaag̵i te wahig, migkag̵i kedì he zaan te, ‘Emun egkeehè nu is etew he edtenaan wey kenà ed-ewaan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan en etew he ibpemewtismu zin is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.’
Neehè ku en,” ke si Juan, “ne egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he iyan sikandin sikan is Anak te Megbevayà.”
Ne hein mid-ilis dutun he andew, diyè en maan si Juan duma is dezuwa he menge sumusundan din te naahaan din ki Jesus.
Ne neehè din en maan si Jesus is edsag̵ad. Ke si Juan te, “Iyan heeyan sikan is etew he iring te ibpemuhat he Nati he Kerehidu he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà!”
Ne hein nezineg heini zutun te menge sumusundan din he zezuwa, miduma zan ki Jesus.
Midteren si Jesus ne midlilingey ne neehè din he eduma sikandan ne ke sikandin te, “Hengkey is tuyù niw?” Ne ke sikandan te, “Rabi,” he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, Menunudlù, “hendei ka ed-ubpà?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duma kew kedì wey niw maahà.” Ne miduma zan ne neehè dan is ed-ubpaan din. Mahapun en dutun ne wey zan med-ulì hein mezukilem en.
Iyan si Andres sevaha zutun te zezuwa he nekezineg te migkag̵i ni Juan wey miduma ki Jesus. Telesuled si Andres wey si Simon he migeraran ki Pedro.
Ne si Andres, segugunè din mibpen-ahà is suled din he si Simon. “Neehè dey sikan is Misiyas,” ke sikandin. (Ne iyan kehulug̵an kayi te ngazan he Misiyas is Kristu,

Ne miduma zin si Simon ne midhendiyè dan te ki Jesus. Ne si Jesus, midtengtengan din si Simon. “Iyan ka si Simon he anak ni Juan. Egeraran ku sikew ki Sipas,” ke si Jesus. (Is gerar he Sipas ne iyan ded sikan is ngazan he Pedro.
Ne hein mid-ilis he andew zutun neisip ni Jesus he edhendiyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Mibeyaan din si Felipe ne ke sikandin te, “Duma ka kedì.”
TigBitsayda si Felipe, ne is inged he Bitsayda, iyan daan ed-ubpaan ni Andres wey ni Pedro.

Ne si Felipe, mibeyaan din si Natanael, ne ke sikandin te, “Neehè dey en kes etew he netagnà dengan te ebpemeneuven wey netagnà ni Moises dutun te insurat din diyà te libru he kesug̵uan. TigNeserit sikandin he si Jesus he anak ni Jose.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Natanael te, “Duen be etew he zuen din pulus he tigNeserit?” Ne ke si Felipe te, “Edhendiyè ki wey nu maahà.”
Ne hein ebpelpelingguma zan en naahà ni Jesus si Natanael, ne ke si Jesus te, “Tutuu heini he kevuwazan ni Israyil su wazè din edtembunan.”
Ne ke si Natanael te, “Maan is egkekilala a kenikew?” Ne ke si Jesus te, “Te wazè ke pa beyai ni Felipe, neehè ku sikew is diyà te sihung te kayu he igira.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Natanael te, “Datù, tutuu ves iyan he iyan ka sikan is Anak te Megbevayà; iyan ka sikan is netagnà he hadì dey te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ebpeketuu ke ve tenged dà te migkag̵i ku kenikew he neehè ku sikew ziyà te sihung te kayu he igira? Duen pa egkeehè nu keuzemà he lavew pa he egkein-inuwan.”

Ne mid-uman si Jesus megkag̵i kandin te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he egkeehè niw keuzemà is langit he egkepuwasan ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen egkengeehè niw he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpememenahik wey ebpemenaug diyà te etuvangan ku.”
Ne nekezuwa zutun duen eseweey ziyà te inged he Kana he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya, ne midtelavuk is iney ni Jesus.
Ne zutun daan si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, su neumbita zaan sikandan he medtelavuk dan.
Ne naamin is binu he igastu zutun te eseweey, umba mibeyaan si Jesus te iney zin. Ne ke sikandin te, “Wazè dan en binu.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Inà, kenè ka kedì mebayàbayà su wazè pa metuman is hustu he timpu te kebpaahaa ku te g̵ehem ku zini te menge etew.”
Ne is iney zin, migkeg̵iyan din is menge sulug̵uen te, “Tumana niw is minsan hengkey he sug̵ù din keniyu.”

Sumalà te tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu, kinahanglan he zuen wahig he ibpenlùlù te kenè dan pa egkaan. Ne tenged kayi zuen neteg̵ana zutun he heenem he umuy he vatu. Egketeg̵uan is kada sevaha zutun te menge nenggatus he litru he wahig.
Migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus is menge sulug̵uen te, “Penua niw heini te wahig.” Ne mibpemenù dan haazà is menge umuy taman te vivig.
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sekilut kew en wey uwita niw ziyà te edumala kayi te keemuran.” Ne mid-uwit dan,

ne is edumala, migezaman din haazà is wahig he mibaluy en he vinu. Wazè din metueni ke hendei ebpuun haazà is binu asal netuenan te menge sulug̵uen he midsekilut dutun. Ne haazà is edumala, mid-umew zin haazà is ebpengesawa,

ne migkeg̵iyan din te, “Sumalà te vetasan tew, ke zuen keemuran, ibpenag̵ey idhuna is utew metaam he vinu, ne emun dekelè en is egkeinum te menge etew human ebpeneg̵aya is kenà utew metaam. Iyan, sikew, guntaan nu en peneg̵aya heini is binu he utew metaam!” ke sikandin.

Iyan haazà nehuna he egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus; midhimu zin diyà te inged he Kana ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya, ne pinaag̵i zutun impeehè din is dekelà he g̵ehem din ne midtuu kandin is menge sumusundan din.
Neiwas haazà, si Jesus wey is iney zin wey menge suled din wey is menge sumusundan din, midhendiyè dan te inged he Kepirnaum ne wazè dan med-awà dutun seled te nepipira he andew.
Meg̵aan en dutun edtumana te menge Hudiyu ziyà te inged he Hiruselim is Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne tenged kayi midhendiyà ensi Jesus te Hiruselim.

Ne ziyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà neehè din is ebpemelegyà te menge ibpemuhat he vaka, wey menge kerehidu, wey menge merepatik. Ne neehè din daan is ebpemenliwà te menge selapì he ziyà te lemisahan dan.

Ne mibaal sikandin te letigu he pisì ne mid-avug din pehendiyà te g̵awas dutun te Valey te Megbevayà is menge vaka wey kerehidu. Ne mibpemiley zin is menge lemisahan te ebpemenliwà te selapì, ne is selapì dan, mid-ulaan din.
Ne migkeg̵iyan din is ebpemelegyà te merepatik te, “Iawè niw heeyan! Kenè niw himuwa he tiyenggiyan heini is Baley te Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun netenuzan te menge sumusundan din is ingkesurat dengan he tagnà he edhenduen te, “Utew zekelà is kegkenug̵uni ku te valey nu te Megbevayà umba egkehimu he ibmesakit utew te g̵ehinawa ku.”

Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge punuan te menge Hudiyu, ke sikandan te, “Duen be egkein-inuwan he igkepeehè nu wey key meketuu he mibeg̵ayan ka te Megbevayà te keg̵ehem he ibpaawè nu heini is menge etew puun kayi te valey zin?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Rundusa niw heini is baley te Megbevayà ne seled te tetelu he andew egkevangun ku en maan!”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Kepatan wey heenem he tuig is kebeeli kayi he valey ne egkevangun nu ve seled dà te tetelu he andew?”
Iyan, wazè dan mesavut he is baley he egkeg̵iyen ni Jesus iyan is lawa zin.
Ne neug̵et pa zutun hein nevanhew en si Jesus, netenuzan te menge sumusundan din heini is migkag̵i zin dutun, ne human dan dutun mesavut he tutuu is netagnà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà
Ne zutun te timpu te Pista te Kedlevayi hein diyè pa ensi Jesus te inged he Hiruselim, mezakel is nemeketuu kandin su neehè dan is menge egkein-inuwan he midhimu zin.
Iyan, wazà si Jesus mevenari te kedtuu zan kandin su netuenan din ke hengkey is diyà te g̵ehinawa te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Ne minsan te wazà edtazem kandin ke hengkey is neseled te g̵ehinawa te menge etew netuenan din en su nesayud sikandin he zaan ke hengkey is gehinawa te menusiyà.
Duen etew he egngezanan ki Nikudimu. Sevaha sikandin he sakup te upakat he egngezanan te Peresiyu. Heini si Nikudimu, ne sevaha he punuan te menge Hudiyu.

Midhendiyà sikandin te ki Jesus dutun te mezukilem ne migkeg̵iyan din si Jesus te, “Datù, netuenan dey he menunudlù ka he sug̵ù te Megbevayà su is menge egkein-inuwan he ebeelan nu, iyan dà ebpekehimu te iring kayi is etew he ebeg̵ayan te g̵ehem te Megbevayà.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he wey zà ebpekeragkes is etew ziyà te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà ke ebpaanak sikandin ebpeuman.”
Ne mid-insà si Nikudimu ke, “Ebmenmenuwen te etew he meg̵urang en is kebpaanak kebpeuman su kenè en man sikandin ebpekelikù te g̵etek te iney zin wey iuman ianak.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he wey zà ebpekeragkes is etew ziyà te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà ke id-anak sikandin pinaag̵i te wahig wey pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Is id-anak pinaag̵i te etew, ne etew zà daan, iyan, is id-anak pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, diyà ed-ubpà te kandin is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Kenè ka meinuinu te migkag̵i ku kenikew he kinahanglan he ebpaanak kew ebpeuman.

Is keramag, minsan hendei zà duen ebpevayà ne egketuusan ta su egkezineg ta is dag̵ing din, iyan, kenè ta egketuenan ke hendei ebpuun wey ke hendei ebpevayà. Iring din ded daan is gehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyà te etew he id-anak pinaag̵i te g̵ehem din su kenà heini egkesavut te etew zà duen.”
Ne zutun mid-insà si Nikudimu te, “Egkemenumenu heini?”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Punuan ka he menunudlù kayi te menge zuma tew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ne kenè nu ves egkesavut heini is egkeg̵iyen ku?
Kenè nu lipati he is egkeg̵iyen dey, kenà tarù. Netuenan dey he tutuu is ibpesavut dey su neehè dey en, iyan, kenè niw mulà edtuuwan is egkeg̵iyen dey.
Ne emun kenè kew edtuu kediey ke ibpesavut ku keniyu is egkengeulaula zini te tanà, wey kew pe be meketuu ke ibpesavut ku keniyu is ed-ul-ulahan diyà te langit?
Hentei is nekehendiyà te langit? Iyan e zà is Kakey te Menusiyà su ziyà a ebpuun te langit.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Dengan te kemulu pa ensi Moises diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew mibeelan din is uled he g̵alang ne intaud din te kayu ne imbayew zin. Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iring din ded daan is egkehitavù kedì keuzemà su idtaud a zaan te kayu ne ibayew a.
Umba egkehitavù heini su wey is langun he edtuu kediey meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Utew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà, ne tenged kayi minsan sikan is budtung he Anak din wazè din menug̵uni, kekenà, impehendini zin su wey is langun he edtuu kandin, kenà mesiluti is gimukud dan, kekenà, meveg̵ayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Is Megbevayà, wazè e zin is Anak din sug̵ua zini te kelibutan te kedsilut te menusiyà, kekenà, su wey pinaag̵i kedì melibri is menusiyà.

Is minsan hentei he edtuu kedì kenè en sikandin edsilutan te Megbevayà, iyan, is kenà edtuu kediey, netuenan en he zaan he edsilutan sikandin su siak is budtung he Anak te Megbevayà, wazè e zin tuuwi.
Umba edsilutan sikandin su hein nekeuma a is migeraran te kerayag dini te kelibutan, midtumù din is kerusireman,
Sikan is ed-ulaula te mezaat, kenè din egkesuatan is kerayag wey kenè din ed-uvayan is kerayag su kenè din egkesuatan he metueni is menge ulaula zin he mezaat.
Iyan, sikan is edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen, edhendiyà mulà te kerayag. Umba edhendiyà sikandin te kerayag su wey metueni he pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Megbevayà nehimu zin is metazeng he ulaula.”
Ne neiwas heini, midhendiyà si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zutun dan med-ubpà taman te nepipira he andew su ebpemewtismu si Jesus te menge etew.

Ne si Juan Megbebewtismu, ebpemewtismu zaan asal ziyà sikandin ebpemewtismu te inged he Inun he uvey te inged he Salim su mezakel is menge wahig dutun. Ne nemenhendutun is menge etew ne mibpebewtismu sikandan.
(Wazè pa zutun pirisuwa si Juan.)
Ne zutun duen menge sumusundan ni Juan he ebpekidlewanà te sevaha he etew he Hudiyu. Iyan edlewenaan dan is tuluuwen dan te menge Hudiyu te kebpemewtismu.

Ne midhendiyè dan te ki Juan ne ke sikandan te, “Menunudlù, sikan is etew he zuma nu hein diyè ka layun te wahig he Hurdan, sikan is migkag̵i nu, ebpemewtismu zaan sikandin ne mezakel he etew is edsundan kandin.”
Ne midtavak si Juan te, “Wazà gehem te minsan hentei ke wazà iveg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà.
Iyan kew ebpeketistig̵us he migkag̵i ku he kenà a iyan sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà wey mekehadì, kekenà, midsug̵ù a te Megbevayà wey a mehuna mekeuma, ne human sikan is hadì.

Penenglitan ke zuen mibpengesawa, ne naangken din en haazà is mid-esawa zin. Sikan is kumekag̵un dutun, utew meupiya is gehinawa zin emun egkezineg din haazà is mibpengesawa he ebpekidlalag en dutun te mid-esawa zin.

Is ebpuun diyà te langit ne lavew sikandin te minsan hentei. Is menusiyà, ne zini zà ebpuun te kelibutan ne kelibutanen dà is egkeg̵iyen din. Iyan, sikan is ebpuun te langit, lavew sikandin te langun.
Egkeg̵iyen din is neehè din wey nezineg din diyà te langit, iyan, mezelag duen ebpekezawat te egkeg̵iyen din.
Iyan, is minsan hentei he edawat kayi ebpekepenistig̵us he tutuu is egkeg̵iyen te Megbevayà.
Ne is midsug̵ù te Megbevayà, egkeg̵iyen din is ibpekag̵i kandin te Megbevayà su is Megbevayà, mibpepurungan din sikandin peulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Utew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey tew he Megbevayà is Anak din, ne insarig din kandin is kebayàbayà te langun.

Is minsan hentei he edtuu te Anak te Megbevayà, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan; is minsan hentei he kenà ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù te Anak te Megbevayà, kenà egkeveg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, kekenà, wazà pidtemanan te kegkepeuki kandin te Megbevayà.

Nezineg te menge Perisiyu is tudtul he mezakel is nengehimu ni Jesus he menge sumusundan wey mezakel is nengebewtismuwan ni Jesus kenà te ki Juan; asal wazà iyan si Jesus mebewtismu, kekenà, iyan is menge sumusundan din. Ne hein nezineg daan ni Jesus haazà he tudtul, mid-awà diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya ne mid-ulì diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Ne zutun te ked-ulì eni Jesus, kinahanglan he ziyè dan ebpekevayà te prubinsya he Semarya.
Ne nekeuma zan diyà te sevaha he inged diyà te Semarya he egngezanan te Sikar he uvey te tanà he imbeg̵ey zengan ni Hakub diyà te anak din he si Jose.

Ne zutun daan sikan is kalut he mibeelan dengan ni Hakub, ne si Jesus, geina te utew neveley te kedhipanew zin, mibpinuu zutun te uvey te kalut. Ne zutun neudtu is andew. Wazè din duma su is menge sumusundan din, midhendiyè dan te inged su ebpemasa te egkeenen. Ne zuen nekeuma zutun he vahi he tigSemarya su edsekezu ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin ni Jesus te, “Bayi, ipeinum e kun.”

Ne migkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Hudiyu ka ne siak, tigSemarya a. Maan is ebuyù ka te wahig kayi te kedì?” Umba nekag̵i zin heini su is menge Hudiyu, kenè dan ebpekidlalag te minsan hentei he tigSemarya.

Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, “Bayi, angin ke netuenan nu is ibeg̵ey kenikew te Megbevayà wey ke hentei a is ebuyù te wahig su ebpekevuyù ka pezem dini te kediey te wahig ne egkeveg̵ayan ka te wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Mama, wazè nu man sekilut ne mezalem heini is kalut. Hendei nu man egkekuwa heeyan is wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung?
Is kepuun tew zengan he si Hakub, iyan mibaal kayi te kalut. Ne kayi med-inum sikandin wey is menge anak din wey is menge ayam din. Lavew ke ve ki Hakub?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ke zuen egkemezahan he ed-inum kayi te wahig egkemezahan pa,

iyan, ke zuen ed-inum te wahig he ibeg̵ey ku kandin kenè en maan sikandin egkemezahan te minsan keenu. Su is wahig he ibeg̵ey ku kandin, egkehimu ziyà te kandin he ulu te wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey kandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne migkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Mama, beg̵ayi e kun keniyan te wahig he migkag̵i nu su wey kenà ad maan memezahi wey kenà ad daan maan ebpekesekezu zini.”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Umawa nu is esawa nu ne likù ka zini.”
Ne migkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Wazè ku esawa.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Tutuu heeyan is migkag̵i nu he wazè nu esawa,
su lelima en is nekeesawa kenikew, ne is maama he ziyà te kenikew g̵untaan, benar iyan he kenè nu esawa.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Ebpeneuven ke ves te Megbevayà?
Sikan is menge kepuun ku he tigSemarya, kayi zan te vuntud ed-ezapa is Megbevayà, iyan, sikiyu is menge Hudiyu, ibpenurù niw he kinahanglan he ziyè tew te Hiruselim ed-ezapa is Megbevayà.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Benar, Bayi, is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he egkeuma is timpu he kenè en maan dini zà te vuntud wey minsan diyà te Hiruselim ed-ezapa is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Sikiyu is menge tigSemarya, kenè niw egketuenan ke hentei is ed-ezapen niw, ne sikami is menge Hudiyu, netuenan dey mulà ke hentei is ed-ezapen dey su pinaag̵i kenami te menge Hudiyu edlibriyen te Megbevayà is menusiyà.

Duen ebperetengen he timpu ne netuman en guntaan he is menge etew he egkesuat he ed-azap te Amey tew he Megbevayà, ne kinahanglan he ezapa zan pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin wey tutuu is ked-ezapa zan kandin. Iyan heini menge etew he edewaten te Megbevayà wey zan mekeazap kandin.
Mulin-ulin is Megbevayà ne wazè din lawa; umba is langun he ed-azap kandin, kinahanglan he ezapa zan sikandin pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin wey tutuu is ked-ezapa zan kandin.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is bahi te, “Netuenan ku he ebpekeuma keuzemà is mibpilì te Megbevayà wey mekehadì, sikan is migeraran ki Kristu. Ne emun ebpekeuma en, ibpesavut din kenitew is langun.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Siak is ebpekidlalag kenikew, iyan ad sikan is migeraran ki Kristu.”

Ne zutun te kemulu pa ebpekidlalag si Jesus dutun te vahi, nekeuma is menge sumusundan din. Utew zan nengeinuinu su maan is ebpekidlalag si Jesus dutun te vahi; iyan, wazà minsan sevaha kandan he mid-insà diyà te ki Jesus ke hengkey is kinahanglan din dutun te vahi. Ne wazè dan daan insai ke maan is ebpekidlalag sikandin dutun te vahi.
Ne zutun intag̵ak te vahi is sekezu zin ne midlikù diyà te inged. Migkeg̵iyan din is menge etew, ke sikandin te,
“Hendiyè kiw en wey niw maahà is etew he neketagnà te langun he nengeveelan ku. Kela ke iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.”
Ne migenat dan su edhendiyè dan te ki Jesus.
Ne zutun te kemulu pa haazà is bahi ziyà te inged, migkeg̵iyan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din te, “Datù, kaan ka.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen egkeenen ku he wazè niw metueni.”
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey zan te, “Duen be vuwa nekeveg̵ey kandin te egkeenen?”
“Iring te egkekaan ku,” ke si Jesus, “is kedtumana ku te egkesuatan te Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kediey wey is kedhimesaza ku te impeveelan din kediey

Egkag̵i kew he heepat pa he vulan guntaan ne human is tirag̵un! Iyan, emun iyan a egkag̵i, ne tirag̵un en guntaan; su ahaa niw man heini is mezakel he menge etew. Iring sikandan te pinemula he hustu en he edreg̵unen
Ne sikan is edrag̵un,
Utew tutuu is erubasa he edhenduen te, ‘Ebpemula is sevaha ne selakew is edrag̵un.’
Imperag̵un ku sikiyu zutun te tanà he wazè niw pemulai; su selakew is midsangyew te Lalag te Megbevayà ne tenged te vaal zan iyan kew ebpekepesavut te menge etew wey zan meketuu,” ke si Jesus.
Ne mezakel is menge tigSemarya zutun he nemeketuu ki Jesus tenged te migkag̵i zutun te vahi he ke sikandin te, “Netagnè din is langun he nengeulaula ku.”
Ne hein nemekeuma haazà is menge tigSemarya ziyà te ki Jesus, midhengyuan dan sikandin he kenà petuluy medlaus te kedhipanew zin. Umba mid-ubpà ensi Jesus dutun seled te zezuwa he andew.
Ne mezakel pa is nemeketuu ki Jesus tenged te impesavut din kandan,

ne migkeg̵iyan dan sikan is bahi te, “Nemeketuu key, kenà tenged dà te migkag̵i nu, kekenà, tenged daan te nezineg dey is menge lalag din, ne netuenan dey en he tutuu iyan he iyan sikandin sikan is Menluluwas te menusiyà.”
Ne hein netapus dutun is dezuwa he andew, mid-awà ensi Jesus ne midlaus dan diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà edtehuzen te menge etew ziyà te kandin he keugelingen he inged.”

Ne minsan pa zutun, is menge tigGeliliya, hein nekeuma ensi Jesus dutun, nengeg̵alew zan su mezakel zan is nemeketelavuk te Pista te Kedlevayi ziyà te inged he Hiruselim, ne nengeehè dan is langun he nengehimu ni Jesus dutun.

Ne midlikù si Jesus diyà te inged he Kana he ziyà te Geliliya. Iyan haazà kes inged he impevaluy zin he vinu is wahig. Ne zuen dutun etew he zekelà is ketengdanan din diyà te hadì. Ne zuen anak din diyà te inged he Kepirnaum he egkezeruwan.

Ne hein nezineg din is tudtul he nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Geliliya he ebpuun te Hudiya, midhendiyà te ki Jesus ne midhengyuan din he medhendiyà te Kepirnaum su wey zin mevewii haazà is anak din su ebpatey en.
Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is etew te, “Kenè kew ves ebpeketuu kediey emun kenè kew ebpekeahà te menge egkengein-inuwan wey menge singyal.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is etew te, “Datù, duma ka kediey su wey kenà mebpatey is anak ku.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ulì ke en su neulian en is anak nu!” Ne midtuu haazà is etew kayi te migkag̵i ni Jesus ne zutun migenat.
Ne hein ed-ulì en haazà is etew midsinug̵ung sikandin te menge sulug̵uen din, ne ke sikandan te, “Neulian en is anak nu.”
In-insè din kandan ke keenu mezeyzey haazà is anak din, ne ke sikandan te, “Gevii te kegkepulid te andew midhimemasan sikandin.”
Ne zutun netenuzan te etew he iyan haazà kes timpu he migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te neulian en is anak din. Ne tenged dutun neketuu haazà is etew zuma is pemilya zin.
Iyan heini ikezuwa he egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus. Mibeelan din heini zutun te kedlikù din diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya he ebpuun sikandin te prubinsya he Hudiya.
Neiwas heini, duen pista te menge Hudiyu; ne tenged kayi midhendiyè en maan si Jesus te Hiruselim.

Ne ziyà te Hiruselim duen linew uvey te idselang te kutà he egngezanan te Idselang te Menge Ayam he Kerehidu. Ne ziyà te kilid dutun te linew, duen lelima he helungà. Ne haazà is linew, egngezanan te Bitsata te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen.
Mezakel is egkengezeruwan he zutun dan en ebpemen-ubpàubpà te menge helungà. Menge lakap, menge piang, wey menge minatey is divaluy he lawa,
Ne zuen dutun etew he neug̵et en he egkezeruwan su ketluan en wey walu he tuig is kegkezeruwi zin.
Naahà sikandin ni Jesus is dutun edhidhizeg̵à ne netuenan ni Jesus he neug̵et en haazà is daru zin. Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus te, “Mama, egkesuat ke ve he meulii ka?”
Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Datù, wazà duma ku he ebpekeagbur kedì keniyan te wahig emun egurig̵awen en ne layun a egkehunai te zuma te kenè e pa ebpekeagbur.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Enew ka, ne luluna nu heeyan is ikam nu; ne hiphipanew ka.”
Ne zutundutun dà neulian haazà is etew; midlulun din haazà is ikam din ne midhiphipanew.
Nehitavù haazà te andew he Sebadu he iyan Andew te Kedhimeley.
Umba, haazà is etew he neulian, nepeukan sikandin te menge punuan he Hudiyu; ke sikandan te, “Iyan heini Andew te Kedhimeley ne ebpekesupak ka te kesug̵uan tew ke ed-uwiten nu heeyan is ikam.”
Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Sikan is mibawì kediey, migkeg̵iyan e zin he luluna ku is ikam ku wey medhiphipanew a.”
Ne in-insè dan te, “Hentei he etew is migkag̵i kenikew he luluna nu is ikam nu wey medhiphipanew ka?”
Iyan, wazà mekilala si Jesus dutun te etew he neulian su medmezakel is nengetig̵um he menge etew zutun ne wazè en dutun si Jesus.

Ne netegteg̵aad dutun naahà sikandin ni Jesus diyà te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà, ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Meupiya su neulian ke en; iniyug̵i nu en is menge mezaat he ulaula nu su wey kenè nu meeg̵iyi is tuwas pa he mezaat.”
Ne zutun mid-awà haazà is neulian ne migkeg̵iyan din is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu he iyan si Jesus mibawì kandin.
Umba puun dutun nepeukan si Jesus te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu su utew zan ingkeepes haazà is kebewii zin te egkezeruwan dutun te andew he Sebadu.
Iyan, duen ketezengan ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, “Is Amey ku he Megbevayà, kenà sikandin edhimeley he ebaal, ne siak, ebpenigudu a zaan ebaal.”

Ne zutun mid-iseg is suat te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu te kegkehimetayi kandin su ke sikandan te, “Kenè dà taman te kedsupaka zin te Andew te Kedhimeley, kekenà, edsupaken din daan is Megbevayà su egkeg̵iyen din he Amey zin is Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, Megbevayè sikandin.”

Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he siak is Anak te Megbevayà, wazà egkehimu ku te kediey zà duen he g̵ehem; iyan dà edhimuwen ku is egkeehè ku he edhimuwen te Amey ku. Is ebeelan din, iyan daan ebeelan ku.

Siak is Anak din, utew a mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey ku, ne ibpeehè din kediey is langun he ebeelan din. Ne kenà duen dà taman su keuzemà, lavew pa he mekeg̵eg̵ehem is ibpenurù din kediey, ne ebeelan ku wey kew meinuinu.
Is Amey ku, ebenhawen din is menge minatey ne ibeg̵ey zin kandan is untung. Ne siak is anak din, untung daan is ibeg̵ey ku ziyà te minsan hentei he ebpilien ku.
Is Amey ku, kenà iyan sikandin edsusi keuzemà te nengeveelan te tivuuk he menusiyà su siak is anak din, mibeg̵ayan e zin te ketenged te kedsusi te nengeveelan te menusiyà,

su egkesuatan din he edtehuzen a te langun he menge etew iring te kedtehuza zan kandin. Ne is minsan hentei he kenè e zin edtehuzen, is kenè din kedtahud kediey, iyan daan kenè din kedtahud te Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kedì.

Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku he is minsan hentei he ebpemineg te menge lalag ku ne edtuu te Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kediey zini, iyan ebpekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Kenà sikandin keuzemà edsilutan su nekelikey en te kemetayen is gimukud din wey naangken din en is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he egkeuma is andew ne neume en guntaan he siak is Anak te Megbevayà, egkezineg te menge etew he wazè pa meveg̵ayi te untung is menge lalag ku kandan, ne haazà is ebpemineg, ebeg̵ayan ku te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Mekeg̵eg̵ehem is Amey ku ne ebpekeveg̵ey te untung, ne siak daan is anak din, tenged te mibeg̵ayan e zin te g̵ehem, ebpekeveg̵ey ad daan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne siak, tenged te migeraran a he Kakey te Menusiyà, mibeg̵ayan a te Amey ku te ketenged wey ku keuzemà mesusi is nengeveelan te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Kenà kew meinuinu kayi su egkeuma is andew keuzemà he zutun is langun he menge minatey, egkezineg dan is ked-umawa ku kandan
ne egkengevanhew zan. Ne is nemekevaal mulà te meupiya, duen dan untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne is nemekevaal te mezaat, egkengevanhew sikandan wey mesiluti.

Wazà egkehimu ku te sebsevaha ku; su is paag̵i te kedsusiya ku te nengeveelan te menusiyà, impenurù kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne metazeng mulà is kediey he kedsusi kandan su kenè ku ebpengahaan is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, is egkesuatan te Amey ku he midsug̵ù kediey.
Emun iyan e zà ebpenistig̵us te kedì he keugelingen, kenà egkeserig̵an is kediey he kebpenistig̵us.
Iyan, selakew is ebpenistig̵us te menge vaal ku. Iyan is Amey ku ebpenistig̵us kediey, ne netuenan ku he egkeserig̵an is kebpenistig̵us din.
Duen midsug̵ù niw ziyà te ki Juan Megbebewtismu, ne tutuu is kebpenistig̵us ni Juan kediey.
Kenà a egkinahanglan he zuen etew zà duen he ebpenistig̵us kediey, iyan, midhimu ku he metenuzi niw is kebpenistig̵us ni Juan su wey kew meketuu kediey ne egkeveg̵ayan kew te untung.
Su si Juan, iring sikandin te sulù he merayag is sig̵a zin, ne meg̵aan dà utew is kelipey niw te kedteyawi zin keniyu,
Iyan, duen kebpenistig̵us he lavew pa kenà is ki Juan, su is langun he mibpeveelan kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ed-ul-ulahan ku, iyan edtistig̵us he midsug̵ù a te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Iyan sikandin midsug̵ù kediey ne edtistig̵usan e zin. Wazè niw mezineg is kegkag̵i zin ne wazè niw zaan maahà is dagwey zin.
Ne netuenan ku he kenè niw edewaten is lalag din su siak is midsug̵ù din, wazà a keniyu tuuwi.
Ed-istudiyuwan niw is ingkesurat he lalag din su kunaan niw ke tenged dutun ebpekeangken kew te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Edtistig̵usan a te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà,
iyan, kenè kew edtuu kediey. Angin ke ebpeketuu kew su ebeg̵ayan kew te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Kenà ku iyan ebpengahaan is kegkezelig̵a kedì te menge etew
su nesayud a keniyu; kenà mahal is Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa niw.

Midsug̵ù a zini te Amey ku he Megbevayà, ne egemiten ku is gehem din ne minsan pa kayi kenà a keniyu edewaten. Ke zuen selakew he ebpekeuma ne kandin dà he g̵ehem is egemiten din, ne edewaten niw mulà.

Egkemenumenu is hustu he kebpeketuu niw emun ebpengahaan niw te kada sevaha is kegkezelig̵i keniyu te menge zuma niw, ne is kegkezelig̵i pezem keniyu te sebsevaha zà he Megbevayà, kenè niw egkesuatan?
