Kenè niw isipa he iyan a edsumbung keniyu keuzemà diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Su kes lukes niw he si Moises, edsarig kew te insurat he menge lalag din, ne nasì iyan sikandin edsumbung keniyu zutun he andew.
Angin ke venar is kedtuu niw kandin su ebpeketuu kew zaan kediey su insurat din dutun is keag̵i ku.
Ne tenged kayi emun kenè kew edtuu te lalag he insurat ni Moises, kenè kew zaan edtuu te kediey he lalag.”
Ne neipus heini mid-awà si Jesus dutun ne midhendiyà te tanà he ziyà layun te ranew he Geliliya, he migngezanan daan te Tibiryu.
Ne zuen utew mezakel he menge etew he ebpemenduma kandin su nengeehè dan is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan din te kebewii zin te menge egkengezeruwan.
Ne midtekezeg si Jesus wey haazà is menge sumusundan din te vuvungan ne zutun dan mebpinuu.
Egkesipeg̵an dutun is andew he edsilibrahan te menge Hudiyu is pista he egngezanan te Kedlevayi.

Ne mibpememantew si Jesus ne neehè din is utew mezakel he menge etew he ebpemehendiyà te kandin. Ne migkeg̵iyan din si Felipe te, “Hendei kiw ebpekekuwa te egkeenen he ibpekaan tew kayi te menge etew?”
(Umba migkag̵i zin heini su egezaman din si Felipe su si Jesus, netuenan din en man ke hengkey is ebeelan din dutun.)

Ne midtavak si Felipe te, “Minsan ke utew zekelà is egestuwen tew he selapì, minsan dezuwa he g̵atus he dinaryu, ne ebeg̵ayan tew is kada sevaha te minsan sengepindut dà he egkeenen, kenè pa ebpeketukid.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Andres. Si Andres, hazi ni Simon Pedro wey sevaha zutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ne ke sikandin te,
“Duen kayi vatà he midlulutù te lelima he supas he erina he sibada wey zezuwa he pait, iyan, ebmenuwen tew zè be kayi te utew medmezakel he menge etew!”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ipemepinuu is menge etew.” Ne zutun impemepinuu sikandan. Meluag haazà is perekpekan dutun ne menge lelima he libu is kezakel te menge maama zà.

Ne migkuwa ni Jesus haazà is menge supas ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà, ne impepenalad din dutun te impemepinuu he menge etew. Ne iring din ded daan sikan is menge pait, taman te nengehantey haazà is menge etew. Ne minsan pa zutun, wazà maamin haazà is supas wey pait.
Ne hein nengehantey en dutun is langun, migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Himesa niw is nengesamà he egkeenen su wey kenà mezeeti.”
Ne zutun nehimes dan is sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey he nepenù te menge tevì te lelima he supas he sibada.
Ne hein naahà te menge etew is egkein-inuwan he nehimu ni Jesus migkag̵i zan te, “Tutuu ves iyan he iyan en heini sikan is netagnà he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he ibpehendini zin te kelibutan!”
Ne si Jesus, geina te netuenan din he ebeyaan dan sikandin su edteg̵elen dan sikandin edhimuwa he hadì dan, mid-awà dutun te sebsevaha zin ne midtekezeg diyà te vuvungan.
Ne hein mahapun en dutun, midhendiyà is menge sumusundan din te veyvey te ranew,
ne mid-untud dan te avang su edrapas dan diyà te inged he Kepirnaum. Mezukilem en dutun haazà is ked-untud dan, ne wazè pa si Jesus mekelikù diyà te kandan.
Ne ebpengeramag dutun ne zezekelà is menge vag̵el zutun te wahig.
Ne hein menge lelima en he kilumitru is imbayè dan dutun te lawed te ranew, neehè dan si Jesus is edhendiyà te kandan he edhipanew zutun te wahig. Utew zan nengehandek,
iyan, migkag̵i si Jesus kandan te, “Iyan a; kenè kew mahandek.”
Ne zutun nelipey zan ne impeuntud dan sikandin. Ne zutundutun te kebpeuntuza zan ki Jesus, nekezunggù dan dutun te inged he ebeyaan dan.

Ne hein nepawà dutun, diyè pa te layun te ranew sikan is mezakel he menge etew. Netuenan dan he sevaha zà is avang dutun ne iyan kes mid-untuzan te menge sumusundan ni Jesus. Netuenan daan te menge etew he wazà sikandin med-untud dutun te kegenat te menge sumusundan din su neewaan sikandin.
Ne zutun te uvey te lugar he zutun nemekekaan sikan is menge etew te supas he mibpeselematan te Nengazen he si Jesus, duen nemekezunggù he menge avang he ziyà ebpemuun te inged he Tibiryu.
Ne hein netuenan te menge etew he wazè en dutun si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, nemen-untud dan dutun te menge avang su ebpen-ahaan dan si Jesus diyà te inged he Kepirnaum.
Ne hein nekezunggù dan neehè dan sikandin. Ne mid-insè dan te, “He Menunudlù,” ke sikandan, “keenu ka mekeuma zini?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he, umba ebpen-ahaan a keniyu kenà tenged te tutuu is kedsavut niw te menge egkein-inuwan he nengeehè niw, kekenà, tenged te nengehantey is getek niw te supas he nekaan niw g̵evii.

Kenè niw pen-ahaa is egkeenen he meg̵aan dà egkehanew, kekenà, hag̵ù kew wey niw mekuwa is egkeenen he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan heini egkeenen he igkeveg̵ey ku keniyu su impeehè en te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ingkesuat din is menge vaal ku.”
Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge etew, ke sikandan te, “Hengkey is ebeelan dey emun edtumanen dey is ebpeveelan kenami te Megbevayà?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan heini ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà: siak is midsug̵ù te Megbevayà kayi te kelibutan, tuu kew kediey.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan dan en maan te, “Hengkey is egkein-inuwan he igkepeehè nu kenami wey key meketuu kenikew?

Su zengan is menge kepuun tew, hein diyè dan te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew, mana is egkeenen he imbeg̵ey kandan te Megbevayà, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he egkag̵i te, ‘Egkeenen he ebpuun te langit is imbeg̵ey kandan ni Moises.’ ”

Ne midtavak dutun si Jesus te, “Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, kenà iyan si Moises nekeveg̵ey te egkeenen he nengeulug he ebpuun te langit, kekenà, iyan is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne is tutuu he egkeenen he ebpuun te langit, ibeg̵ey keniyu te Amey ku.
Sikan is egkeenen he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà, ebpenaug he ebpuun te langit ne iyan ebpekeveg̵ey te untung diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.”
Ne migkeg̵iyan dan si Jesus te, “Beg̵ayi key en keniyan te egkeenen he egkeg̵iyen nu ne kenà guntaan dà, kekenà, wazè en pidtemanan.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan a egkeenen he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Sikan is edsundan kediey, kenè en egkevitil wey sikan is edtuu kediey, kenè en maan egkemezahan.
Iring te migkag̵i ku en keniyu he minsan te neehè niw en is menge egkein-inuwan he nehimu ku, kenè kew edtuu kediey.
Is langun he menge etew he ibeg̵ey kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà, ebpekesundan dan kediey, ne is edsundan kediey, edewaten ku.
Iyan igkeg̵iya ku kayi keniyu su midhendini a he ebpuun te langit wey ku metuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kediey; kenè ku iyan edtumanen is kediey zà he egkesuatan.

Ne is Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kediey, iyan din egkesuatan is: edlig-enan ku is langun he menge etew he imbeg̵ey zin kediey su wey wazà minsan sevaha kandan he kenà egkeveg̵ayan te untung. Ne ebenhawen ku sikandan keuzemà dutun te ketepusan he andew.
Is langun he nesayud ke hentei a is anak din, ne edtuu kediey, egkesuatan te Amey ku he meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne ebenhawen ku keuzemà dutun te ketepusan he andew.”
Ne zutun nengepauk ki Jesus haazà is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu tenged te migkag̵i zin he ke sikandin te, “Iyan a sikan is egkeenen he ebpuun diyà te langit.”
Ne migkag̵i zan te, “Si Jesus dà duen heini. Anak sikandin ni Jose. Maan is egkeg̵iyen din he ebpuun sikandin diyà te langit he wazà mekeeles kenitew ke hentei is amey zin wey iney zin?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Maan is egkepeukan a keniyu?
Wazà minsan hentei he ebpekesundan kediey emun wazà sikandin ulini te Amey ku he iyan midsug̵ù kediey. Ne ke zuen edsundan kediey, ebenhawen ku sikandin keuzemà dutun te ketepusan he andew.

Duen netagnà he insurat dengan te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Ebpenuruen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà.’ Umba,” ke si Jesus, “is langun he ebpemineg te ibpenurù kandin te Amey ku he Megbevayà, edsundan kediey.
Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut he zuen etew he nekeahà te Megbevayà su siak is midsug̵ù dini te Amey ku he Megbevayà, iyan e zà nekeahà kandin.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku he is etew he edtuu kediey, naangken din en is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Iyan a kes egkeenen he ebpekeveg̵ey kayi te untung.
Is egkeenen he mana, migkaan te menge kepuun niw zengan, hein diyè dan pa te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan, iyan, nemematey zan gihapun,
iyan, heini is egkeenen he ebpuun te langit, emun egkeenen heini te minsan hentei, duen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Iyan a egkeenen he ebpuun te langit wey ebpekeveg̵ey te untung; ne ke zuen egkaan kediey kenè en ebpatey is gimukud din. Is egkeenen he ibeg̵ey ku, iyan is lawa ku. Ibeg̵ey ku heini su wey maangken te tivuk he menusiyà is untung he wazà pidtemanan,” ke si Jesus.
Ne zutun egkesumpakì is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu. Ke sikandan te, “Ebmenmenuwen kayi te etew is kebeg̵aya zin kenitew te lawa zin su wey tew mekaan?”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, emun kenè kew egkaan te lawa ku wey emun kenè kew ed-inum te lengesa ku, wazè niw untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Su is egkaan te lawa ku wey ed-inum te lengesa ku, nekeangken en te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne ebenhawen ku sikandin keuzemà dutun te ketepusan he andew;
su is lawa ku wey is lengesa ku, egkehimu he keuyag̵an wey inumen te wazà pidtemanan.
Is egkaan te lawa ku wey ed-inum te lengesa ku, kenà ed-awà dini te kediey ne siak, kenà a zaan ed-awà diyà te kandin.
Is Amey ku he iyan midsug̵ù kediey, duen din untung, ne tenged dutun duen ku zaan untung. Ne iring din ded daan is egkaan kediey su ebeg̵ayan ku sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Heini is egkeenen he egkeg̵iyen ku, ne ziyà ebpuun te langit. Kenà iring te egkeenen he mana he migkaan te menge kepuun tew su nemematey zan gihapun; iyan, is minsan hentei he egkaan kayi te egkeenen he egkeg̵iyen ku, kenè en ebpatey is gimukud din te minsan keenu.”
Iyan heini impenurù ni Jesus dutun te simbahan te menge Hudiyu ziyà te inged he Kepirnaum.
Ne hein nezineg te menge sumusundan din haazà is kebpenurù din, mezakel kandan is migkag̵i te, “Mereg̵en egkezawat heini is penurù din, ne hentei zà buwa is ebpekepemineg kayi?”
Ne netuenan ni Jesus he zuen menge sumusundan din he neepes te impenurù din, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Igkeepes niw ve heini is migkag̵i ku?
Hengkey vuwa is egkekag̵i niw emun siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà a keniyu is ebetunen pehendiyà te zivavew, diyà te langit he mibpuunan ku.

Iyan dà ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Wazà egkehimu te lawa zà duen. Is menge lalag he migkag̵i ku keniyu, diyà ebpuun te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Duen duma keniyu he wazà medtuu kediey,” ke si Jesus. (Umba migkag̵i zin haazà su netuenan din he zaan ke hentei is wazà medtuu, ne netuenan din daan ke hentei is ed-akal kandin.)
Ne impelaus din haazà is egkeg̵iyen din, ke sikandin te, “Tenged kayi egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he wazà minsan hentei he ebpekesundan kediey emun wazà sikandin ulini te Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne puun dutun mezakel is menge sumusundan he midsuwey kandin ne wazè en sikandan mebpekiduma kandin.
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul, ke sikandin te, “Sikiyu zaan, edsuwey kew ve kedì?”
Ne midtavak si Simon, sikan is migeraran ki Pedro, ke sikandin te, “Wazà duma he egkesundanan dey su iyan ke zà ebpenurù te paag̵i te kebpekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Edtuu key kenikew su netuenan dey he iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.”
Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Siak, mibpilì ku sikiyu is sepulù wey zezuwa, iyan, sakup ni Setanas is sevaha keniyu.”
Iyan egkeg̵iyen din si Hudas he anak ni Simon he tigKeriyuti su sevaha sikandin dutun te sepulù wey zezuwa, ne iyan si Hudas ed-akal kandin.

Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus haazà is kebpenurù midhendiyà sikandin te prubinsya he Geliliya ne zutun sikandin medrig̵urig̵u. Kenà egkesuat he edrig̵urig̵u ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya su is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu zutun, ne edhimatey pezem kandin.
Ne meg̵aan dutun edsilibraha te menge Hudiyu is pista he egngezanan te Pista te Menge Lawig.

Ne migkeg̵iyan si Jesus te menge hazi zin, ke sikandan te, “Deyzey ke ed-awè ka kayi ne telavuk ka te pista ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya su wey maahà te menge sumusundan nu ziyà is menge egkein-inuwan he ebeelan nu.
Su ke zuen etew he egkesuat he egkevantug, kenà egkehimu he id-eles din is menge vaal zin. Su emun egkehimu nu is menge egkein-inuwan, deyzey ke ibpeehè nu ziyà te langun.”
(Iyan heini menge lalag he idsumpalit dan kandin su minsan pa te menge hazi zin sikandan, wazè dan sikandin tuuwi.)
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandan te, “Wazè pa metuman is hustu he timpu wey ku ikepaahà is menge vaal ku, iyan, sikiyu, layun niw egkeveeli is egkeisip niw he ebeelan niw.
Kenè kew egkepeukan te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà, iyan, siak, egkepeukan e zan mulà su pinaag̵i te ibpenurù ku egketuenan he mezaat is menge ulaula zan.
Huna kew en diyà te pista. Kenè e pa edhendiyà su wazè pa metuman is kedì he timpu te kedhendiyà.”
Ne zutun mibpetag̵ak si Jesus diyà te Geliliya.
Ne hein migenat en haazà is menge hazi zin he ebpemenelavuk dutun te pista, midtelukun si Jesus, asal wazà mebpekiduma te mezakel he menge etew su kenè din egkesuatan he metueni.
Ne zutun te pista, ebpen-ahaan sikandin te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu. Ke sikandan te, “Hendei vuwa sikandin?”

Ne egkesumpakì is mezakel he menge etew he nengetig̵um diyà te inged he Hiruselim. Egkag̵i is duma kandan te, “Meupiya sikandin he etew.” Ne edtavak daan is duma te, “Kenà, su tarù is ibpenurù din te menge etew.”
Ne g̵eina te egkengehandek is menge etew te menge egalen dan te menge Hudiyu, kenè dan ibpezineg te zuma pa he etew haazà is menge lalag dan.
Ne zutun te egkeliwliwazè en is kebibuwan, midhendiyà si Jesus te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun.
Utew ingkeinuinu sikandin te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, ne migkag̵i zan te, “Hendei vuwa ebpuun is ketau kayi he etew su kenè man metikang is netunghaan din?”
Ne midtavak kandan si Jesus te, “Kenà kediey zà he ketau is ibpenurù ku, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te Megbevayà he iyan midsug̵ù kediey.
Is etew he egkesuat he edtuman te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà, iyan egkesayud ke ziyè be ebpuun te Megbevayà is ibpenurù ku wey ke zini zè be ebpuun te isip ku.

Su ke zuen etew he ibpenurù din is kandin dà he isip, ebpevantug dà te menge etew, iyan, is etew he ibpenurù din is kegkevantug te midsug̵ù kandin, egkeserig̵an is lalag din su kenà tarù is ibpenurù din.
Is apù tew zengan he si Moises, iyan mibeg̵ey keniyu te menge kesug̵uan. Ne netuenan ku he wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he edtuman te kesug̵uan su maan is egkeisip niw he edhimetayan a keniyu?”
Ne midtavak haazà is menge etew te, “Kela ka midsuukan ka te mezaat he mulin-ulin su wazè man egkesuat he edhimatey kenikew?”
Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Duen etew he neulian ku te zaru zin, ne pudu kew nengeinuinu su neulian ku te Andew te Kedhimeley.

Insug̵ù keniyu ni Moises dengan he medsirkunsidar kew te menge anak niw, asal kenà diyè dà ebpuun te ki Moises heini is betasan he kedsirkunsidar su zaan heini he ulaula te menge kepuun tew zengan. Ne egkehimu he edsirkunsidaren niw is etew minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.

Ne emun egkehimu he edsirkunsidaren is lawa te etew te timpu te Andew te Kedhimeley su wey kenà mesupak is insug̵ù kenitew ni Moises, maan is egkepeukan a keniyu tenged te neulian ku is tivuuk he lawa te etew zutun te timpu te Andew te Kedhimeley?
Kenè niw isipa he mezaat is ulaula te etew emun wazè niw pa mesusi, kekenà, susiya niw is ulaula zin su wey niw metueni is hustu.”

Ne is duma te menge etew zutun te inged he Hiruselim, hein nezineg dan haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus, migkag̵i sikandan te, “Kenè be iyan heini sikan is etew he ebpen-ahaan te menge punuan wey zan mehimetayi?

Ahaa niw man! Ebpenurù ded sikandin te mezakel he menge etew! Kela ke tutuu iyan he netuenan te menge punuan tew he iyan sikandin sikan is netagnà he mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì su maan is kenè dan edewayen sikandin!

Iyan, emun iyan en sikandin sikan is hadì ne maan is netuenan tew is ebpuunan din, su emun ebpekeuma haazà is ibpahadì te Megbevayà, kenà egketuenan te minsan hentei ke hendei ebpuun, iyan, heini he etew, netuenan tew ke hendei ebpuun.”

Ne nezineg ni Jesus haazà, ne zutun te kebpenurù din diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà mibpekezag̵ing is egkag̵i te, “Kunaan niw ke netuenan niw ke hentei a wey ke hendei a ebpuun, iyan, wazà, su wazà a medhendini te kediey zà he egkesuatan su impehendini a te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin sikan is tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan, wazè niw metueni ke hentei sikandin.
Netuenan ku mulà ke hentei sikandin, su ziyà a ebpuun te kandin, ne iyan midsug̵ù kedì.”
Ne edekepen dan pezem si Jesus dutun, iyan, wazà nekeaku he egawed kandin su wazè pa itug̵ut te Megbevayà.

Duen mezakel he menge etew he nemeketuu he iyan si Jesus kes netagnà he hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà. Ke sikandan te, “Iyan si Jesus sikan is hadì su wazà duma he ebpekevaal te lavew pa he menge egkein-inuwan duen te mibeelan din.”
Ne hein nezineg te menge Perisiyu heini is egkeg̵iyen te menge etew, sikandan wey is menge punuan he memumuhat, midsug̵ù dan is menge guwardya te zekelà he simbahan wey zan mezakep si Jesus.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Kenè en utew egkeug̵et ne ed-ewaan ku sikiyu su ed-ulì a ziyà te Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kedì.
Ebpen-ahaan a keniyu, iyan, kenà a keniyu egketuredu su kenè kew ebpekehendiyà te egkeubpaan ku.”

Ne zutun mibpein-inseey is menge Hudiyu, ke sikandan te, “Hendei vuwa ebpevayà sikandin he kenè tew egketuredu? Kela ke edhendiyà te menge inged te kenà menge Hudiyu he mid-ulian te menge zuma tew he Hudiyu, su ebpenurù sikandin te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu!

Su maan is migkag̵i zin he, ‘Ebpen-ahaan a keniyu, iyan, kenà a keniyu egketuredu.’ Ne migkag̵i zaan sikandin te, ‘Kenè kew ebpekehendiyà te egkeubpaan ku.’ Hengkey vuwa pezem is ibpesavut din?” ke sikandan.

Utew mahal ziyà te menge Hudiyu is ketepusan he andew te kedsilibra zan te pista. Ne hein netuman en haazà, midhitindeg si Jesus ne midhabet megkag̵i te, “Is etew he egkemezahan, medhendini te kediey ne ibpeinum ku sikandin.
Su,” ke si Jesus, “sumalà is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, ‘Ke zuen edtuu kediey, ne edtudà puun te g̵ehinawa zin is wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.’ ”

(Is wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he migkag̵i ni Jesus iyan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Egkezawat heini te minsan hentei he edtuu ki Jesus, asal zutun he timpu wazè pa iveg̵ey is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su wazè pa si Jesus med-ulì diyà te langit.)
Nezineg haazà is menge lalag ni Jesus te utew mezakel he menge etew zutun, ne migkag̵i is duma te, “Tutuu iyan he iyan heini he etew sikan is ebpeebuten tew he netagnà he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà!”

Ne migkag̵i is duma pa kandan dutun te, “Iyan en iyan heini sikandin sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà.” Iyan, migkag̵i is duma pa te, “Kenà, su kenà egkehimu he ziyà ebpuun is hadì te prubinsya he Geliliya!

Su,” ke sikandin, “impesavut te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, ne kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, ne ziyè kun id-anak te inged he Bitlihim he inged daan dengan ni Hadì David.”
Ne zutun kenà egkengeuyun is ked-isipa te menge etew mehitenged ki Jesus.
Ne is duma he etew zutun, egkesuatan dan he mezakep dan si Jesus, iyan, wazà nekeaku he egawed kandin.
Ne is menge Perisiyu wey menge punuan he menge memumuhat, hein midlikù is menge guwardya he midsug̵ù dan, mid-insaan dan ke maan is wazè dan mezakep si Jesus.
Ne midtavak is menge guwardya te, “Iyan wazè dey ikezekepa kandin su utew meupiya is kedwali zin; wazè pa etew he nekewali iring te ked-wali zin!”
Ne migkag̵i kandan is menge Perisiyu te, “Neketuu kew en bes daan te menge tarù din?
Sikami is menge egalen niw, duen be minsan sevaha kenami he neketuu kandin? Wazà! Duen be Perisiyu he neketuu kandin? Wazà daan!
Ne heini is menge mezakel he etew he edsundan kandin, wazè dan mesavut is kesug̵uan tew. Id-agbur sikandan diyà te Impirnu!” ke sikandan.
Ne zutun migkag̵i is sevaha kandan he si Nikudimu. Iyan sikandin kes etew he mibpenumbaley ziyà te ki Jesus hein mezukilem.
Ke sikandin te, “Wazà itug̵ut kenitew te kesug̵uan tew he edhukuman ta te silut is etew emun wazè te pa mesusi is menge ulaula zin, ne wazè pa sikandin mekepengetezengan.”

Ne midtavak is menge zuma zin te, “Tulebung ke ves daan he tigGeliliya? Purungi nu susiya is insurat he menge tagnà, ne egketuenan nu he wazà minsan sevaha he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he ziyà ebpuun te prubinsya he Geliliya.”
Ne zutun mibpemen-ulì is kada sevaha kandan,
ne si Jesus, midtekezeg sikandin diyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan.
Ne hein nepawà dutun, midhendiyè en maan si Jesus te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ne hein midtig̵um diyà te kandin is langun he menge etew, mibpinuu zutun ne mibpenurù din sikandan.

Ne is menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan, mid-uwit dan diyà te kandin is bahi he nesekazan dan dutun te kedselselai zin te esawa zin. Ne impeetuvang dan ki Jesus dutun te teliwazà te menge etew haazà is bahi.
Ne migkeg̵iyan dan si Jesus te, “Menunudlù, heini is bahi, nesekazan dey sikandin he edselselaan din is esawa zin.
Ne sumalà is kesug̵uan tew he insurat dengan ni Moises, kinahanglan he edhimetayan pinaag̵i te kedtulenga kandin te vatu. Ne hengkey is kenikew he kukuman kayi?”
Iyan ingkeg̵iya zan dutun su ebpen-ahaan dan si Jesus te sayep su wey zan ikesumbung sikandin. Iyan, midtikintikin si Jesus dutun, ne insurat din is tezù din diyà te tanà.
Ne g̵eina te kenè dan ed-engked he ed-insà, midhitindeg sikandin ne migkag̵i te, “Is sevaha keniyu he wazà mekevaal te mezaat te minsan keenu, iyan medhuna medtuleng kandin te vatu.”
Ne hein nekag̵i ni Jesus haazà, midtikintikin en maan, ne midsurat en maan diyà te tanà.

Ne hein nezineg te menge Perisiyu haazà is migkag̵i zin, nemen-awè dan dutun he tigseselimbaha. Midhuna is utew meg̵urang ne henduen dà duen. Ne hein naamin dan en, netag̵ak haazà is bahi ziyà te etuvangan ni Jesus.
Ne midlingahà ni Jesus haazà is bahi ne ke sikandin te, “Bayi, hendei en sikandan is midsumbung kenikew? Wazè bes ebpeketuleng kenikew te vatu?”
Ne midtavak sikan is bahi te, “Wazè en, su migenat dan en.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Siak, kenà a zaan edhukum kenikew te kemetayen. Ulì ke en ne kenè kad maan mebaal te mezaat.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge etew, ke sikandin te, “Iyan a sikan is kerayag he ebpeketayew te isip te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne is etew he edsundan kediey, kenà en sikandin egkesakup te g̵ehem te kerusireman, kekenà, egketeyawan is kedsavut din te kerayag he ebpekeveg̵ay te untung he wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge Perisiyu, migkag̵i zan te, “Kenà egkeserig̵an is kebpenistig̵us nu te keugelingen nu. Umba kenè key ebpeketuu te lalag nu su iyan ka ebpenistig̵us te keugelingen nu.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Minsan ke iyan a ebpenistig̵us te keugelingen ku, egkeserig̵an is kebpenistig̵us ku su netuenan ku ke hendei a ebpuun wey ke hendei a ebpevayà. Iyan, sikiyu, kenè niw egketuenan ke hendei a ebpuun wey ke hendei a ebpevayà.
Emun edsusi kew te ulaula te etew, kenà egkeserig̵an is kedhukum niw, su pinaag̵i te kelibutanen dà he isip is kedhukum niw. Siak, kenà a edhukum te minsan hentei.
Ne minsan ke zuen ibpezayag ku he kedhukum, egkeserig̵an mulà is kedì su kenà kediey zà he kedhukum, kekenà, hukum he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà he iyan midsug̵ù kediey.
Duen insurat diyà te kesug̵uan niw he edhenduen te, ‘Egkeserig̵an is kebpenistig̵us te zezuwa emun egkeuyun.’
Ebpenistig̵usan ku is keugelingen ku, ne is Amey ku he midsug̵ù kedì, ebpenistig̵usan e zin daan.”

Ne migkag̵i kandin is menge Perisiyu te, “Hendei is Amey nu?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Wazè niw metueni ke hentei is Amey ku, ne siak daan, kenè niw egketuenan ke hentei a. Angin ke netuenan niw ke hentei a su egketuenan niw zaan ke hentei is Amey ku.”
Heini migkag̵i ni Jesus dutun te kebpenurù din diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, diyà te rug̵u he egngezanan te Selevukà te Lugbak. Wazà midakep kandin dutun su wazè pa itug̵ut te Megbevayà.

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus diyà te menge egalen te menge Hudiyu, ke sikandin te, “Ed-ewaan ku sikiyu ne ebpen-ahaan a keniyu, iyan, ebpematey kew zà duen he kenà egkepeseylu is menge salè niw. Ne ke hendei a ebpekepevayà kenè kew ebpeketelukun.”
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey zan te, “Kela ke edhiket su maan is egkag̵i sikandin te ke hendei sikandin ebpevayà, kenè kiw ebpeketelukun?”
Ne migkag̵i en maan si Jesus te, “Meg̵inged kew zini te kelibutan; siak, meg̵inged a ziyà te langit. Dini kew ebpuun te tanà, iyan, siak, diyà a ebpuun te zivavew.
Umba migkag̵i ku keniyu he ebpematey kew he kenà egkepeseylu is menge salè niw su tutuu iyan haazà emun kenè kew edtuu he iyan a sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.”
Ne migkag̵i zan te, “Hentei ka?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan a sikan is layun ku en egkeg̵iya keniyu puun pa te puunà te kebpenurù ku kayi.

Mezakel pa pezem,” ke si Jesus, “is menge lalag ku keniyu mehitenged te menge ulaula niw wey niw mesavut he mezaat is menge vaal niw, iyan, iyan dà ibpesavut ku zè pa te menusiyà is nezineg ku ziyà te midsug̵ù kedì, ne egkeserig̵an is menge lalag din.”
Wazà dutun mesavut te menge Hudiyu ke hentei is midsug̵ù kandin he egkeg̵iyen din; wazè dan mesavut he iyan kes Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Ne tenged dutun migkag̵i en maan si Jesus te, “Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, dutun te kedrensanga niw kedì keuzemà diyà te kayu he ibpehitindeg, egketuenan niw human he iyan a sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Egketuenan niw zutun he is langun he mibeelan ku, impeveelan kedì te Amey ku he Megbevayà wey is ibpekag̵i zin kedì, iyan nekag̵i ku.
Ne is Amey ku he midsug̵ù kedì, duma ku zaan; kenè e zin ed-ewaan su kenà a ed-engked he edtuman te egkesuatan din.”
Ne zutun te kegkeg̵iya zin kayi, mezakel kandan is nemeketuu kandin.
Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus is menge Hudiyu he nemeketuu kandin, ke sikandin te, “Emun kenè niw ed-engkezan is kedtumana niw te menge penurù ku keniyu, ne human tutuu he menge sumusundan ku sikiyu.
Egketuenan niw is tutuu he tuluuwen, ne pinaag̵i kayi egkengevelukasan kew.”
Ne midtavak dutun is menge punuan te, “Iyan kepuun dey si Abraham, ne wazè key meuripen te minsan hentei; maan is migkag̵i nu he egkevelukasan key?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he is minsan hentei he ebaal te mezaat, uripen iyan sikandin te mezaat he ulaula.
Ne is uripen, egkehimu he ibpaawà sikandin dutun te valey he ed-ubpaan din, iyan, is anak te teg̵ivaley, kenà mulà ibpaawà.
Umba, ke ebelukasan kew te Anak te Megbevayà, tutuu iyan he kenè kew en maan egkeveyveyaan te zaan he teg̵iuripen keniyu.
Netuenan ku he menge kevuwazan kew ni Abraham; ne minsan pa zutun edhimetayan a pezem keniyu su kenà ed-ereg diyà te g̵ehinawa niw is ibpenurù ku keniyu.
Is impaahà kedì te Amey ku, iyan egkeg̵iyen ku, ne sikiyu, ebeelan niw mulà is nezineg niw ziyà te keniyu he amey.”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Iyan kepuun dey si Abraham.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Angin ke tutuu kew he kevuwazan ni Abraham su ebeelan niw is mibeelan dengan ni Abraham.
Siak, impenurù ku keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut kediey te Megbevayà, ne nasì a edhimetayi keniyu, iyan, wazà mid-ulaula ni Abraham he iring dutun!
Iyan ebeelan niw is mibeelan dengan te amey niw.” Ne mibensag dan te, “Wazè key ikeg̵ingey zà! Sikami, netuenan dey he sebsevaha zà is Amey zey he iyan is Megbevayà!”

Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Angin pezem ke amey niw is Megbevayà su mahal a g̵eina ziyan te g̵ehinawa niw su te kedhendini ku, diyà a ebpuun te kandin. Kenà kediey zà he suat is kedhendini ku, kekenà, midsug̵ù e zin.
Umba kenè kew ebpekesavut te egkeg̵iyen ku su kenè niw egkesuatan te edtuman is ibpenurù ku.

Iyan amey niw si Setanas, ne is egkesuatan te amey niw, iyan daan egkesuatan niw he meveeli niw. Puun pa te puunà ne memumunù en si Setanas. Ne wazè din kelavet te tutuu he tuluuwen su wazà diyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he tutuu. Emun egkag̵i sikandin, ne tarù is lalag din su tarù dà is egkeisip din. Teruen man sikandin wey ziyà te kandin ebpuun is minsan hengkey he tarù.
Tutuu mulà is kediey he lalag keniyu, ne tenged kayi kenè niw edtuuwan is egkeg̵iyen ku.
Ne hentei keniyu is ebpeketistig̵us te mezaat he mibeelan ku? Wazà! Emun tutuu is egkeg̵iyen ku, maan is kenè kew ebpeketuu?
Emun anak te Megbevayà is etew, ebpeming̵en din is menge lalag te Megbevayà. Umba kenè niw ebpemineg̵en su kenè kew menge anak din.”
Ne zutun midtavak ki Jesus is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, ke sikandan te, “Tutuu ves iyan he tigSemarya ka he memeremerik is betasan! Kela ke midsuukan ka te mezaat he mulin-ulin!”
Ne midtavak daan si Jesus te, “Wazà a suuki. Emun ebentug̵en ku is Amey ku he Megbevayà, maan is edsulaan a keniyu?
Kenà a ebpevantug te minsan hentei, iyan, egkesuatan te Megbevayà he ebentug̵en a te menusiyà. Ibpeehè din he venar is menge ketezengan ku.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he is minsan hentei he edtuman te ibpenurù ku kandin, kenè en ebpekeag̵i te kemetayen!”

Ne migkag̵i kandin is menge Hudiyu te, “Netuenan dey he tutuu iyan he edlelungen ka te mezaat he mulin-ulin! Minsan si Abraham wey is langun he menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, minatey zan en pudu, ne maan is egkag̵i ka he is minsan hentei he edtuman te ibpenurù nu kandin, kenè en ebpekeag̵i te kemetayen!
Lavew ke ve te kepuun dey zengan he si Abraham? Sikandin wey is menge ebpeneuven dengan, nemematey zan gihapun. Ne sikew, kunaan nu vuwa ke ebpekelavew ka kandan.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun ebpevantug a wazà pulus te kegkevantug kedì. Iyan ebantug kedì is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Egkeg̵iyen niw he iyan niw sikandin ed-ezapen,

iyan, wazè niw metueni ke hentei sikandin. Siak mulà, netuenan ku ke hentei sikandin. Ke migkag̵i ku he wazè ku sikandin mekilala, teruen a iring keniyu. Iyan, netuenan ku ke hentei sikandin ne edtumanen ku is menge lalag din kediey.
Sikan is kepuun niw he si Abraham, utew sikandin nelipey zengan su netuenan din he ibpehendini a te kelibutan umba nelipey sikandin su ebpeebuten e zin.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i ki Jesus haazà is menge Hudiyu te, “Wazè pa megkelimahan he tuig is penuig̵en nu, ne hengkey is kegkeseuta nu ki Abraham?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he te wazè pa ianak si Abraham daan e en.”
Ne zutun migkuwa zan te menge vatu su idtuleng kandin
Ne zutun te kedhiphipanew ni Jesus, neehè din is etew he puun pa te ked-enaka kandin ne lakap en.

Ne mid-insaan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandan te, “He Menunudlù, hentei vuwa is mid-ulaula te mezaat, iyan be heini is lakap wey ke iyan be is iney zin wey ke amey zin be su maan is te ked-enaka kandin daan en he lakap?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenà tenged te salè din is kegkelakap din wey kenà daan tenged te salà te amey zin wey iney zin, kekenà, iyan ingkelakap din su wey ikepaahà pinaag̵i kandin is gehem te Megbevayà.
Te kemulu pa maandew,
Kayi te zini e pa te kelibutan, iyan a kerayag he ebpeketayew te tivuuk he menusiyà.”
Ne te nekag̵i ni Jesus haazà, mid-ilevan din is tanà ne migkuwa zin sikan is basak he neveelan dutun te ileb din ne indazas din diyà te mata zutun te lakap.

Ke sikandin te, “Hendiyè ka te linew he egngezanan te Siluwi ne pendapug ka zutun.” (Is kehulug̵an te lalag he Siluwi, iyan is: midsug̵ù.) Ne midhendutun haazà is lakap ne mibpendapug. Ne hein midlikù ebpekeehè en.
Is menge siringan din wey is menge etew he layun ebpekeahà kandin te lilimusan he lakap, migkag̵i zan te, “Henduen be te iyan sikandin kes iyan dà baal zin is ebpimpinuu he ebpelimus.”
Ne migkag̵i is duma pa te, “Iyan iyan sikandin.” Ne migkag̵i zaan is duma te, “Kenà iyan, iyan, henduen be te iyan sikandin.” Ne midtavak haazà is neulian he lakap te, “Iyan a iyan sikan is lakap.”
Ne migkag̵i is menge etew te, “Emun iyan ka, nemenumenu is kegkeulii te mata nu?”

Ne midtavak haazà is neulian te, “Sikan is etew he egngezanan ki Jesus, mid-ilevan din is tanà ne indazas din is neveelan he vasak dini te mata ku, ne migkeg̵iyan e zin he medhendiyà a te linew he Siluwi ne mebpendapug a. Ne midhendiyà a te egkeg̵iyen din he linew ne mibpendapug a, ne puun dà dutun ebpekeahà ad.”
Ne mid-insà is menge etew te, “Hendei sikandin?” Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Wazè ku metueni.”
Ne zutun miduma zan diyà te menge Perisiyu haazà is neulian he lakap.
Andew te Kedhimeley haazà is kebeeli ni Jesus dutun te vasak he imbawì din dutun te mata te lakap.

Ne is menge Perisiyu, in-insè dan iuman dutun te etew is paag̵i te kegkeulii zutun te ked-ehè din. Ne ke sikandin te, “Indazas ni Jesus is basak dini te mata ku, ne mibpendapug a ne zutun ebpekeahà ad.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i is duma zutun te menge Perisiyu, ke sikandan te, “Heini si Jesus, kenà iyan sikandin sug̵ù te Megbevayà su edsupaken din layun is kesug̵uan mehitenged te Andew te Kedhimeley.” Iyan, migkag̵i zaan is duma pa he menge Perisiyu te, “Emun mesinupaken he etew, kenè din egkehimu is menge egkein-inuwan he iring kayi!” Ne zutun kenè dan egkengeuyun.

Ne tenged dutun mid-insaan dan en maan haazà is neulian he lakap, ke sikandan te, “Sikew, hengkey is kenikew he isip mehitenged kandin su kenikew he menge mata is mibewian din?” Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà.”
Ne is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, wazè dan dutun meketuu he lakap sikandin he neulian. Umba, impetawag dan is iney wey amey zutun te neulian he lakap,
ne mid-insaan dan sikandan. Ke sikandan te, “Anak niw ve heini? Benar ve is egkeg̵iyen he lakap sikandin he zaan puun pa te ked-enaka kandin? Nemenumenu is kegkeulii te menge mata zin?”
Ne midtavak is menge g̵inikanan dutun te neulian, ke sikandan te, “Netuenan dey he anak dey heini; ne netuenan dey zaan he lakap en sikandin puun pa te ked-enaka kandin.
Iyan, ke nemenumenu is kebpekeehè din wey ke hentei is nekevawì te menge mata zin, wazè dey metueni. Deyzey ke iyan niw sikandin insai su meg̵urang en sikandin; egkehimu he iyan sikandin edtavak.”

Umba iyan haazà tavak dutun te menge g̵inikanan din su nahandek dan te menge punuan he Hudiyu su neuyun en he zaan is menge punuan he ke zuen egkag̵i he iyan si Jesus sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, ne haazà is egkag̵i, kenè dan en ibpeseled te menge simbahan dan.
Ne tenged dutun migkag̵i haazà is menge g̵inikanan din te, “Meg̵urang en sikandin; iyan niw insai.”

Ne zutun mid-umanan dan umawa haazà is neulian he lakap ne migkeg̵iyan dan te, “Iyan nu keg̵iya is tutuu su kayi ka te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Netuenan dey he heini si Jesus, mesinupaken sikandin te sug̵ù te Megbevayà.”
Ne midtavak is etew te, “Kenè ku egketuenan ke mesinupaken be sikandin wey ke kenà. Iyan dà egketuenan ku is: hein aney, lakap a iyan, ne g̵untaan ebpekaahà ad!”
Ne mid-uman dan megkag̵i te, “Hengkey is mibeelan din kenikew? Mibmenumenu zin is kebewii zin te mata nu?”
Ne midtavak haazà is neulian te, “Nekag̵i ku en keniyu ne wazè kew mebpemineg. Maan is egkesuatan niw te ed-uman ebpemineg? Kela ke egkesuatan niw he mehimu kew zaan he menge sumusundan ni Jesus!”
Ne nepauk dan dutun ne mezaat is menge lalag dan kandin, ke sikandan te, “Iyan ka sumusundan din; sikami mulà, sumusundan key te ebpeneuven dengan he si Moises!
Netuenan dey he zengan midlelag̵an si Moises te Megbevayà, iyan, heini he etew, wazè dey hanew ke hendei sikandin ebpuun.”
Ne midtavak maan haazà is etew te, “Utew ku heini igkeinuinu! Duen gehem ni Jesus ne mibewian din is menge mata ku, ne minsan pa zutun wazè niw ves metueni ke hendei sikandin ebpuun!
Netuenan tew he is Megbevayà, kenè din edtevangan is mesinupaken he etew, iyan, ke zuen etew he ed-azap kandin wey edtuman te egkesuatan din, iyan edtevangan din.
Puun pa te kedlimbag̵a te kelibutan taman en guntaan sikan tew pa mezineg is etew he ebpekevawì wey meulii is mata te etew he zaan en he lakap puun pa te ked-enaka kandin.
Ke kenà sug̵ù si Jesus te Megbevayà wazà egkehimu zin.”

Ne midtavak dutun is menge punuan te, “Ebpenurù ke ve kenami he mesinupaken ke man utew puun pa te ked-enaka kenikew!” Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan dan sikandin he kenè dan en maan ebmehimuwen he ebpekeseled sikandin diyà te menge simbahan dan te menge Hudiyu.
Ne nezineg ni Jesus haazà is mid-ulaula te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu zutun te neulian he lakap, ne mibpen-ehè din, ne hein neehè din mid-insaan din te, “Edtuu ke ve te Kakey te Menusiyà?”
Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, “Keg̵iya nu kediey ke hentei sikandin su wey a meketuu kandin.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Neehè nu en su siak is ebpekidlalag kenikew, iyan a.”
Ne egkag̵i haazà is etew te, “Emun iyan heeyan, edtuuwan ku sikew.” Ne zutun mid-azap din si Jesus.

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te kandin te, “Umba midhendini a te kelibutan su wey mesusi is nengeulaula te menge etew. Ne is etew he netuenan din he lakap is kedsavut din, ebewian ku wey mebmeupiya is kedsavut din. Ne is etew he egkeg̵iyen din he kenà lakap is kedsavut din, utew pa ed-iseg is kegkelakap te kedsavut din.”
Ne zuen menge Perisiyu he nekezineg dutun te menge lalag din, ne ke sikandan te, “Lakap bes is kedsavut dey?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun wazè niw metueni he lakap is kedsavut niw, wazè niw g̵eina salà, iyan, geina te egkag̵i kew he meupiya is kedsavut niw te hustu, kenà egkeawà is salè niw.”

Ne impenurù ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku he ke zuen etew he edseled te tudil te menge kerehidu ne kenà diyà ebayà te g̵emawan su ziyà ebayà te selakew en he ibayà, ne haazà he etew, tekawen wey tulisan.
Ne is etew he ziyà ebayà te g̵emawan, iyan sikan is ed-elima te kerehidu.

Emun edseled sikandin, ebpuwasan te ebantey zutun te g̵emawan. Ne is menge kerehidu zin he ziyà te seled, egkekilala zan is lag̵eng din ne ed-umawen din sikandan pinaag̵i te menge ngazan dan, ne ibpeg̵uwè din sikandan.
Ne emun ibpeg̵awas en te ed-elima is kandin he menge kerehidu, iyan sikandin edhuna ne edsunud dan kandin su neleyaman dan is lag̵eng din.
Kenè dan edsunud te selakew he etew, kekenà, ebpeleg̵uyan dan su wazè dan meleyami is lag̵eng dutun te selakew he etew.”
Sempità heini he impezineg kandan ni Jesus, iyan, wazè dan mesavut ke hengkey is ibpesavut din.
Umba, migkag̵i en maan diyà te kandan te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he iring a te g̵emawan te tudil te menge kerehidu.
Duen menge ebpenurù he midhuna kediey zini, iyan, iring dan dà te menge tulisan wey tekawen; iyan, is menge kerehidu ku,
Iyan a sikan is gemawan; ke zuen minsan hentei he edseled pinaag̵i kediey edlibriyen sikandin te silut. Iring sikandin te kerehidu ku he edseled te tudil ne egawas he ebpen-ahà te egkeenen.

Umba edhendutun te tudil is tekawen su wey mekepenakew, ne wey mekehimatey, ne wey mekezezaat. Siak mulà, midhendini a te kelibutan wey meveg̵ayi is menusiyà te untung he wazà pidtemanan wey wazè en kurang dutun te untung.
Iyan a sikan is ed-elima te menge kerehidu he utew meelima. Ibelavag ku is untung ku wey kenà mekeizi is menge kerehidu ku.

Is etew he sinuhulan dà, kenà tutuu he ed-elima su kenà kandin is menge kerehidu. Ne emun egkeehè din is ebpekeuma he leew he asu he egngezanan te lubu, ed-ewaan din haazà is menge kerehidu ne ebpelag̵uy. Ne ebengaan dutun te lubu is sevaha he kerehidu ne is duma, ne ebpekedsusuwey.
Umba ebpelag̵uy haazà is sinuhulen su kenà iyan sikandin sikan is tutuu he ed-elima, ne kenà daan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin haazà is menge kerehidu.

Iyan a kes ed-elima te menge kerehidu he utew meelima. Netuenan ku ke hentei is Amey ku, ne netuenan din daan ke hentei a is anak din. Iring din ded daan is menge etew he g̵aked ku, netuenan dan ke hentei a ne egketuenan ku zaan ke hentei sikandan, ne ebpehimatey a he elili te menge etew he g̵aked ku.
Ne zuen pa menge kerehidu ku,
Umba utew a mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey ku he Megbevayà su ebpehimatey a he elili te menge g̵aked ku he etew ne ebenhawen e zin.

Wazà a teg̵ela te minsan hentei he etew su ebpehimatey a te kediey he g̵ustu. Kediey zà he ketenged is kebpehimatey ku, ne kediey zà daan he ketenged is kebenhawa kediey su insug̵ù heini kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne hein nezineg te menge Hudiyu heini he penurù ni Jesus, kenè dan en egkengeuyun.
Mezakel kandan is egkag̵i te, “Ebuneg̵en sikandin wey mid-ulinan te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Kenè tew ebpemineg̵en sikandin.”
Ne egkag̵i is duma te, “Emun mid-ulinan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin, kenà iring kayi is kebpenurù din. Is mid-ulinan te mezaat he mulin-ulin, kenà ebpekevawì te lakap!”
Ne ziyà te inged he Hiruselim iyan en haazà timpu te pista te menge Hudiyu he zutun edsilibrahan dan is kedlumpiyu zengan te simbahan dan he Valey te Megbevayà.
Tipenguzan haazà ne ziyà si Jesus edhiphipanew te Valey te Megbevayà, diyà te migngezanan te Helungà ni Hadì Sulumun.

Ne midtig̵um diyà te kandin is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, ne mid-insaan dan sikandin te, “Maan is kemulu nu pa id-eles kenami ke hentei ka? Keg̵iyi key. Iyan ke ve sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Migkag̵ì ku en keniyu ne wazè niw tuuwi. Is menge egkein-inuwan he midhimu ku he iyan insug̵ù te Amey ku he Megbevayà, iyan tuus ke hentei a.
Ne wazè niw tuuwi su kenè kew menge g̵aked ku he etew.
Su is menge g̵aked ku he etew, ebpemineg dan te menge lalag ku. Egkekilala ku sikandan ne edsundan dan kediey.
Ebeg̵ayan ku sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, ne kenè en ebpatey is gimukud dan ne wazà minsan hentei he ebpekeag̵ew kandan dini te kedì.
Is Amey ku he Megbevayà he lavew te langun, imbeg̵ey zin sikandan kediey, ne wazà minsan hentei he ebpekeag̵ew kandan diyà te kandin.
Sevaha key zà, siak wey is Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge Hudiyu mibpengamì dan en maan te menge vatu he idtuleng dan kandin su edhimetayan dan pezem.
Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandan si Jesus te, “Mezakel is impeehè ku keniyu he menge meupiya he vaal he insug̵ù kedì te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Hendei zapit kayi te menge vaal ku is idtulenga niw kediey?”

Ne midtavak diyà te kandin haazà is menge Hudiyu te, “Kenà iyan dey idtulenga kenikew is meupiya he vaal, kekenà, geina te edsupaken nu is Megbevayà su maan is egkag̵i ka he Megbevayà ka te etew ke zà duen!”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te kesug̵uan tew he edhenduen te, ‘Migkag̵i ku he menge megbevayè kew.’ ”
Ne ke si Jesus te, “Kenà egkehimu he edhelinen is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Umba, ke migngezanan din te menge megbevayà is menge kepuun tew zengan he mibeg̵ayan te lalag din,
maan is egkag̵i kew he edsupaken ku is Megbevayà emun egkag̵i a he Anak a te Megbevayà? Iyan a sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà wey a mekehendini te kelibutan.
Is menge vaal te Amey ku he Megbevayà, iyan ebeelan ku. Emun kenà, kenà a keniyu tuuwi.

Ne emun iyan ebeelan ku is ebeelan daan te Amey ku, minsan ke kenè kew edtuu te menge lalag ku, tuu kew te ibpesavut te menge vaal ku su wey niw metueni he sevaha key zà, siak wey is Amey ku, su zini sikandin te kedì ne ziyà a zaan te kandin.”
Ne edekepen dan en maan pezem si Jesus dutun, iyan, nekelikey sikandin.
Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te Hiruselim, ne midrapas te wahig he Hurdan ne midhendiyà te tanà he zutun mebpemewtismu si Juan Megbebewtismu zengan. Ne zutun med-ubpà si Jesus.
Mezakel he menge etew is midhendiyà te kandin su egkeisip dan he, “Minsan ke wazà egkein-inuwan he mibeelan dengan ni Juan, utew venar is langun he migkag̵i zin mehitenged ki Jesus.”
Ne mezakel is nemeketuu ki Jesus dutun.
Duen maama he nezeruwan. Is ngazan din si Lazaro he tigBitanya. Duen dezuwa he etevey zin he zutun daan ed-ubpà te Bitanya, si Maria wey si Marta.
Iyan si Maria kes bahi he inhaplas din is agwa ziyà te menge paa ni Jesus, ne interapu zin dutun is menge vulvul zin. Ne meemahan dutun haazà is egkezeruwan he si Lazaro.
Ne mibpesug̵uan si Jesus dutun te zezuwa he vahi ne ke sikandan te, “Datù, egkezeruwan si Lazaro, is mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu.”

Ne hein nezineg haazà ni Jesus migkag̵i te, “Kenà ibpatey ni Lazaro is daru zin, kekenà, iyan ketezengan ke maan is egkezeruwan sikandin su wey mevantug is Megbevayà ne wey e zaan mevantug is Anak te Megbevayà.”
Minsan pa te mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus ensi Marta, si Maria, wey si Lazaro,
hein nezineg din haazà is kegkezeruwi ki Lazaro, wazè pa sikandin medwaleng seled te zezuwa he andew zutun te neubpaan din.
Ne hein netapus haazà, migkeg̵iyan din is menge sumusundan din te, “Edlikù kiw ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.”
Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin te menge sumusundan din te, “Menunudlù, deyzey ke kenè ka edlikù diyà te Hudiya su wazè pa mepirai he edhimetayan ka pezem te menge Hudiyu.”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Sepulù wey zezuwa he uras is sengeandew, ne ke zuen edhipanew te maandew kenà ebpekesipà su egketeyawan sikandin te andew.
Ne ke zuen edhipanew te mezukilem, ebpekesipà su kenè en merayag.”
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Nekelipezeng en is emig̵u tew he si Lazaro. Umba edhendiyà a te kandin su wey ku sikandin mepukew.”
Ne migkag̵i haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Emun nekelipezeng en, meupiya su egkeulian en.”
Iyan ibpesavut dutun ni Jesus is: minatey en si Lazaro, iyan, kunaan te menge sumusundan din ke kedlipezeng dà duen is egkeg̵iyen din.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus kandan te, “Minatey en si Lazaro.
Ne tenged keniyu inmeupiya heini te g̵ehinawa ku te wazà a ziyà te kebpatey zin su zuen ibpeehè ku keniyu wey med-iseg is kedtuu niw kediey. Ne kuwa kiw en su edhendiyè kiw te kandin.”
Ne si Tomas, kes migeraran dan te Sereping, migkag̵i ziyà te menge zuma zin he sumusundan te, “Edhendiyè kiw en su wey kiw mebpatey zuma ki Jesus.”
Ne zutun te kebpekeuma eni Jesus diyà te Bitanya, nezineg din he heepat en he andew zutun is kedlevenga ki Lazaro.
Is inged he Bitanya, uvey zà te inged he Hiruselim su menge tetelu zà he kilumitru is elang.
Mezakel is menge Hudiyu he midhendutun te ki Marta wey ki Maria su edlangan dan kandan tenged dutun te meemahan dan he minatey.
Ne hein nezineg ni Marta he ebpekeuma en si Jesus, midtelavuk din, ne si Maria, diyè pa sikandin te valey.
Migkag̵i si Marta ziyà te ki Jesus te, “Angin ke zini ka su kenà pezem ebpatey kes meemahan ku.
Ne netuenan ku he minsan guntaan ke zuen ebuyuen nu ziyà te Megbevayà, ibeg̵ey zin kenikew.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Egkevanhew zed is kakey nu.”
Ne migkag̵i si Marta te, “Uya, netuenan ku he egkevanhew sikandin keuzemà ke ebpemenhawen is menge minatey zutun te ketepusan he andew.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan a sikan is ebpemanhew; iyan a kes ebeg̵ey te untung. Ke zuen etew he edtuu kedì, minsan ke ebpatey, uuyag gihapun is gimukud din.
Su is etew he edtuu kedì, duen din untung he wazà pidtemanan ne kenè en ebpatey is gimukud din. Bayi, edtuu ke ve kayi?”
Ne midtavak si Marta te, “Uya, edtuu a he iyan ka sikan is Anak te Megbevayà; iyan ka kes netagnà he hadì he ebperetengen dey he edhendini te kelibutan.”
Ne te nekag̵i ni Marta haazà, mibeyaan din sikan is suled din he si Maria ne midnèneesan din te, “Nekeuma en si Jesus ne ibpehendiyè ke zin.”
Ne hein nezineg ni Maria haazà, neketik-ew sikandin mekehitindeg ne midsinug̵ung ki Jesus.
Ne wazè pa si Jesus mekeuma ziyà te inged su zutun pa sikandin te nesinug̵ungan kandin ni Marta.

Ne is menge Hudiyu he edlangan kandan, diyè pa sikandan te valey he zuma ni Maria. Ne hein neehè dan si Maria is neketik-ew mekehitindeg he midlawang, midtelukun dan su kunaan dan ke edhendiyà te penlevengà su edsineg̵ew zutun.
Hein nekeuma si Maria ziyà te ki Jesus, mid-uvey ziyà te kandin ne midluhud. Ne ke sikandin te, “Angin ke zini ka pezem su kenà ebpatey kes meemahan ku.”
Ne hein naahà ni Jesus he edsineg̵ew si Maria wey is menge Hudiyu he zuma zin, utew mibmezaat is gehinawa zin su neseeng.
Ne migkag̵i sikandin te, “Hendei niw ileveng?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Ebeyaan tew.”
Ne zutun mibpenig̵is is menge luhà ni Jesus.
Umba, migkag̵i is menge Hudiyu te, “Utew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus si Lazaro.”
Iyan, duen dutun menge etew he migkag̵i te, “Maan is wazè din bewii si Lazaro wey kenà mebpatey? Su emun nevewian din is mata te lakap siguradu egkehimu zin daan heini.”
Ne zutun mid-iseg is kegkeseeng ni Jesus, ne mid-uvayan din haazà is midlevengan. Su haazà is penlevengà, surung diyà te pangpang. Duen inlekeb dutun he vatu te g̵emawan din.
“Iawè niw heini is batu!” ke si Jesus. Ne si Marta, is etevey zutun te minatey, migkag̵i sikandin te, “Memahù en su heepat en guntaan he andew is kedlevenga kandin.”
Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandin si Jesus te, “Migkag̵i ku en kenikew he ke edtuu ka, egkeehè nu is utew igkeventug̵a te Megbevayà.”
Ne in-awè dan dutun haazà is batu he inlekeb te surung. Ne midlingahà si Jesus diyà te langit ne migkag̵i te, “Amey ku, ebpeselamat a kenikew su ebpemineg̵en nu is ebuyuen ku.
Netuenan ku he layun ka ebpemineg te egkeg̵iyen ku, iyan, tenged te menge etew kayi te uvey ku ed-ampù a kenikew g̵untaan wey zan meketuu he midsug̵ù a kenikew zini te kelibutan.”
Ne te nekag̵i zin heini, midhabet megkag̵i te, “He Lazaro, gawas ka keniyan!”
Ne migawas si Lazaro he nevanhew. Nevukusan is lawa zin wey menge velad din wey paa zin te manggad. Ne is ulu zin, nevukusan te penuwilu. Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Bedbazi niw wey ipaawà.”
Ne haazà is menge Hudiyu zutun he miduma ki Maria, hein neehè dan haazà is mibeelan ni Jesus, mezakel kandan is midtuu ki Jesus.
Iyan, is duma kandan, midhendiyà te menge Perisiyu ne mibpenudtul zan is mibeelan ni Jesus.

Ne zutun midtig̵um te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge Perisiyu is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge Hudiyu. Ne hein netig̵um dan en, migkag̵i zan te, “Ebmenumenu kiw su heini si Jesus, mezakel is menge egkein-inuwan he ebeelan din.

Emun ebpesegdanen tew, edtuuwan te langun he menge etew he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne emun iyan en heini vag̵ad, ebeyaan kiw te menge sundaru te hadì tew ziyà te Ruma, ne edèdeetan dan is simbahan tew he Valey te Megbevayà wey is gubirnu tew.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i is sevaha kandan he si Keyipas. Iyan sikandin lavew he memumuhat dutun he tuig. Ke sikandin te, “Wazè niw menge isip!
Wazè niw ves mesavut he kinahanglan he zuen sevaha zà he etew he ebpatey he elili te tivuuk he kehudiyuwan su wey kenà mezeeti is kebpekesavuk tew te menge Hudiyu,” ke sikandin.
Kenà kandin dà he isip haazà is kegkeg̵iya zin dutun su g̵eina te iyan sikandin lavew he memumuhat, impinted kandin te Megbevayà. Netagnè din he ebpatey si Jesus he elili te tivuuk he kehudiyuwan.
Ne kenà tenged te menge Hudiyu zà su netagnè din daan he pinaag̵i te kebpatey ni Jesus egkesevaha is langun he menge etew he egkehimu he menge anak te Megbevayà minsan hendei he inged.
Ne puun dutun he andew, ebpengahaan te menge punuan is paag̵i wey zan mehimetayi si Jesus.

Ne tenged dutun wazè en maan si Jesus mebpeg̵awag̵awa zutun te menge inged te menge Hudiyu, kekenà, midhendiyà te inged he egngezanan te Ipraim he uvey te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew. Ne zutun sikandin med-ubpà duma te menge sumusundan din.

Meg̵aan en dutun is pista te menge Hudiyu he egngezanan te Kedlevayi, ne te wazè pa meuma haazà is pista, ne mezakel he menge etew is nemenekezeg diyà te Hiruselim he ebpemuun te menge zuma he inged su edtumanen dan is tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu te kebpelumpiyu.
Ebpen-ahaan dan si Jesus ne ebpelelelag̵è dan diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ke sikandan te, “Hengkey is isip niw; edtelavuk be si Jesus kayi te pista wey ke kenà?”
Ne insug̵ù he zaan te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge Perisiyu he ke zuen egketau ke hendei si Jesus keg̵iya zin kandan wey zan ikepezakep.
Mekeenem pa zutun is Pista te Kedlevayi, ne nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Bitanya he inged ni Lazaro, kes mibanhew ni Jesus.
Ne ziyà te Bitanya midtukud dan te keemuran su neg̵alew zan tenged te kebpekeuma eni Jesus. Iyan si Marta mengengenat kandan, ne elin si Lazaro zuma ni Jesus dutun te ebpemengaan.

Ne si Maria, migkuwa zin is sengesalmun he agwa te nardu he utew mahal, ne mid-uvayan din si Jesus ne inhaplas din diyà te menge paa ni Jesus ne interapu zin is menge vulvul zin te paa ni Jesus. Ne nekeeneb dutun te tivuuk he seled te valey is mehemut.
Ne si Hudas he tigKeriyuti, is sevaha he sumusundan ni Jesus, iyan sikandin ed-akal ki Jesus ne migkag̵i sikandin te,
“Es, Es! Pira vuwa he g̵atus is bali kayi? Deyzey ke imbelegyà heeyan is agwa wey ikeveg̵ey is halin din diyà te menge egkengeayuayu.”
Iyan ingkekeg̵iya zin dutun, kenà te hizu zin te menge egkengeayuayu, kekenà, tenged te tekawen sikandin. Iyan sikandin ibpetipig eni Jesus te selapì dan ne ebpenekawen din is duma zutun.
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Pesegdana niw si Maria. Petipig̵i kandin is samà kayi te agwa wey ikehaplas te lawa ku emun idleveng ad.
Is menge egkengeayuayu, layun niw egketevangi sikandan, iyan, siak, kenà a egkeug̵et dini te keniyu,” ke sikandin.
Nezineg te utew mezakel he menge etew he ziyà si Jesus te inged he Bitanya, ne nemenhendutun dan. Kenà iyan dan dà ed-ahaan si Jesus, kekenà, ed-ahaan dan daan si Lazaro sikan is mibanhew zin.
Ne tenged kayi neisip te menge punuan he menge memumuhat he edhimetayan dan daan si Lazaro
su tenged kandin mezakel is menge Hudiyu he midsuwey te impenurù te menge memumuhat su edsunuzen dan si Jesus.
Ne nepawà dutun te kedheplasi ki Jesus, sikan is utew mezakel he menge etew he ebpemenelavuk dutun te pista, nezineg dan he edhendiyà si Jesus te Hiruselim.

Ne migkuwa zan te menge zehunen he subpang, ne migawas dan dutun te inged su edsinug̵ungen dan si Jesus. Migkag̵i zan te, “Delig̵a is Nengazen! Delig̵a zaan heini is ebpekeuma he midsug̵ù te Nengazen! Is hadì tew te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, berakat he tuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà!”
Ne migkuwa ni Jesus is nati te kudà he asnu ne mid-untuzan din. Ne pinaag̵i zutun netuman is insurat he tagnà he migkag̵i te,
“Sikiyu is menge meg̵inged te Hiruselim,
kenè kew mahandek su ebpekeuma en
is hadì niw he ed-untud te nati he asnu.”

Ne haazà is kedseled ni Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, wazè pa mesavut te menge sumusundan din he kegketuman haazà te netagnà dengan, asal, hein midlikù en si Jesus diyà te langit, netenuzan dan is mibeelan din ne nesavut dan he neulaula heini sumalà is netagnà dengan diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Is menge etew he nekeahà ki Jesus dutun te ked-umawa zin wey kebenhawa zin ki Lazaro, midsangyew zan is neehè dan dutun.
Umba mibpemenelavuk ki Jesus is utew mezakel he menge etew su nezineg dan he mibanhew zin si Lazaro.
Ne zutun migkag̵i is menge Perisiyu te, “Utew mezakel he menge etew is edsundan kandin! Wazè tew en bes egkehimu.”
Ne zuen menge Gerisyahanen he nemenelavuk daan dutun te pista su edsimba zan te Megbevayà diyà te Hiruselim.
Ne midhendiyè dan te ki Felipe. (Ne si Felipe, tigBitsayda, diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.) Ne ke sikandan te, “Egkesuat key he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus.”
Ne si Felipe, migkag̵i zin heini ziyà te ki Andres, ne zutun mibpezumehè dan pehendiyà te ki Jesus, ne midtudtul zan kandin.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Egkesipeg̵an en utew is timpu he ibpeg̵awag̵awa ziyà te minsan hentei is utew ku kebpekelavew te langun.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he emun kenà idleveng is benì diyà te tanà, kenà egkevuwad. Ne emun igkeleveng en ne edtuvù; ne ebeg̵as te mezakel.

Is etew he egkenug̵unan din is untung din dini te kelibutan, ebpatey sikandin gihapun, iyan, is etew he tenged kediey kenè din egkenug̵unan is untung din dini te kelibutan, egkekuwa zin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ke zuen etew he egkesuat he mehimu he sulug̵uen ku, kinahanglan he edsunuzen e zin, su ke hendei a ne zutun daan is sulug̵uen ku. Ne ke zuen edtuman te menge sug̵ù ku, edelig̵en sikandin te Amey ku he Megbevayà.

Utew mesakit is gehinawa ku g̵untaan. Hengkey vuwa is egkeg̵iyen ku? Kenà egkehimu he edhengyuen ku ziyà te Amey ku he kenè din ipaantus kediey heini is ebpeebuten ku he utew merasey, su umba midhendini a te kelibutan su wey ku meseg̵azi heini is ibpaantus kedì.”

Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus is Amey zin he Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, “Amà, himuwa nu he mevantug ka te menge etew.” Ne zutun duen lalag he ebpuun te langit he egkag̵i te, “Midhimu ku en, ne ed-umanan ku edhimuwa.”
Ne zuen mezakel he menge etew zutun ne hein nezineg dan haazà, ke sikandan te, “Rug̵ung!” Ne egkag̵i is duma te, “Belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus!”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Umba mibpekidlalag is Megbevayà, kenà tenged kediey, kekenà, tenged keniyu su wey niw mezineg is egkeg̵iyen din.
Is Megbevayà, puun guntaan edhukuman din te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà he kuntada zin, ne egkezaag din en si Setanas, sikan is ebayàbayà dini te kelibutan.
Ne siak, emun ibayew ad pinaag̵i te tukud he ibpehitindeg, duen ibpekekabig ku te langun he menge etew.”
Iyan ingkekeg̵iya ni Jesus dutun su ibpesavut din is paag̵i te kedhimetayi kandin.

Ne migkag̵i zutun is menge etew te, “Duen impenurù kenami he ebpuun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he kenè en ebpatey is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne sikew, egkag̵i ka he ibayew ziyà te tukud is Kakey te Menusiyà. Hentei heini is egkeg̵iyen nu he Kakey te Menusiyà?”

Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandan si Jesus te, “Siak is kerayag he ebpeketayew te kedsavut niw, egkesipeg̵an en is ked-ewai ku keniyu. Te kemulu pa merayag, purungi niw susiya is ibayè niw su kela ke egkezukileman kew. Is edhipanew he merusirem is ibayè din, kenè din egketuenan ke hendei sikandin ebpekepevayà.
Siak is kerayag. Te kemulu e pa zini te keniyu, sarig kew kediey te kerayag su wey layun meteyawi is isip niw.”
Ne zutun te nekag̵i ni Jesus haazà, mid-ewaan din haazà is mezakel he menge etew ne mid-eles sikandin.
Minsan pa te mezakel is nengeehè dan he menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan din, wazè dan sikandin tuuwi.
Su pinaag̵i kandan netuman sikan is netagnà dengan ni Esaias, kes ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Su ke si Esaias te,
“Nengazen, wazà edtuu te ibpesavut dey.
Wazà nesayud he impeehè nu en kandan is gehem nu.”
Ne migkag̵i zaan si Esaias te,
“Is Megbevayà, midhimu zin sikandan
he lakap wey kenè dan mekeahà.
Midhimu zin daan he mezesen is gehinawa zan
wey zan kenà meketuu su kela ke ed-iniyug̵an dan
is mezaat he ulaula ne ebpetavang dan kandin.”
Umba wazè dan dutun meketuu ki Jesus.
Umba migkag̵i ni Esaias haazà is menge lalag su netuenan din dengan he utew zekelà is gehem ni Jesus, ne iyan si Jesus egkeg̵iyen din dutun.

Ne minsan pa zutun mezakel is nemeketuu ki Jesus he menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, iyan, wazè dan keg̵iya he neketuu zan kandin su nahandek dan te menge Perisiyu su kela ke ewaa is ketenged dan te kedseled te menge simbahan.
Umba wazè dan keg̵iya su iyan dan impelavi is kedelig̵a kandan te menge etew, kenà is kedelig̵a kandan te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun mibpekezag̵ing megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is edtuu kedì, kenà iyan e zà egketuuwan din, kekenà, egketuuwan din daan is Megbevayà he midsugù kedì.
Is nekeahà kediey, nekeahà daan te Megbevayà he midsug̵ù kedì.
Umba midhendini a is kerayag te kelibutan su wey ku meteyawi is isip te menge etew. Ne ke zuen edtuu kedì, kenè en egkerusireman is isip din.

Ne ke zuen etew he nezineg din heini is menge penurù ku ne kenè din edtumanen, kenè ku sikandin edhukuman te silut su wazà a medhendini te kelibutan wey ku mesiluti is menusiyà, kekenà, wey ku melibri te silut is menusiyà.
Is etew he kenà edawat kedì ne kenà edtuman te menge penurù ku, edhukuman sikandin te silut keuzemà dutun te ketepusan he andew, su iyan idsiluti kandin is menge penurù ku he wazè din dewata.
Su is menge penurù ku, kenà dini zà ebpuun te kediey zà he isip, su midsug̵ù a te Amey ku he Megbevayà ne insug̵ù din kediey is ibpenurù ku.
Netuenan ku he is insug̵ù din kediey he menge lalag, iyan ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi egkeg̵iyen ku is ibpekag̵i zin kediey.”

Sengeandew pa zutun ne egketuman en is Pista te Kedlevayi. Netuenan ni Jesus he uvey en is ked-awè din dini te kelibutan su ed-ulì en diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà. Utew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is menge sumusundan din dini te kelibutan, ne zutun ibpeehè din ke hengkey kemahal sikandan diyà te g̵ehinawa zin.
Si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, ne edlavung dan dutun. Ne si Hudas he tigKeriyuti he anak ni Simon, daan en he impeseled ni Setanas diyà te isip din is ked-ekali zin ki Jesus.
Ne si Jesus, netuenan din he insarig kandin te Amey zin is kebayàbayà te langun. Netuenan din daan he ziyà sikandin ebpuun te Megbevayà ne ziyà daan sikandin ed-ulì.
Ne zutun te edlavung dan, midhitindeg si Jesus ne midluwas din is kumbalè din ne zuen imbevakes din he tualya,
ne midsulug̵an din te wahig is pelenggana. Ne zutun mibpenlùluan din is menge paa te menge sumusundan din, ne mibpenerepuwan din dutun te tualya.
Ne hein iyan en si Simon he migeraran ki Pedro, migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Edlùluan nu ve is menge paa ku?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenè nu egkesavut is ebeelan ku g̵untaan, iyan, keuzemà egkesavut nu.”
Ne migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Kenà egkehimu he iyan ka ebpenlùlù te menge paa ku!” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun kenè ku sikew egkelùluan, kenè ku sikew sumusundan.”
Ne zutun midtavak si Pedro te, “Ne emun iyan heeyan ne kenà iyan dà is paa ku, kekenà, elin nu zaan lùlui is menge velad ku wey ulu ku!”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Sikan is nekepemezig̵ù en, iyan dà kinahanglan he edlùluan is menge paa zin su nelumpiyuwan en is lawa zin. Ne sikiyu zaan, nepurung kew en melumpiyuwi. Asal is sevaha keniyu wazà melumpiyuwi.”
Umba migkag̵i he wazà melumpiyuwi is sevaha su netuenan din ke hentei is ed-akal kandin wey mehimetayi.

Ne hein netapus din haazà is kebpenlùlui zin te menge paa zutun te menge sumusundan din, insun-ud din is kumbalè din ne mibpinuu. Migkag̵i sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Egkesavut niw ve is kehulug̵an kayi te mid-ulaula ku keniyu?
Iyan niw id-umew kedì is Menunudlù wey Egalen, ne hustu en heeyan su iyan a iyan egalen niw.
Ne siak is menunudlù wey egalen niw, emun engayan a he ebpenlùlù te menge paa niw te menge sakup ku, kinahanglan he ebpelùlùluey kew te menge paa te uman sevaha keniyu.
Umba mid-ulaula ku heini kayi te keniyu su wey niw meiringi. Kinahanglan he mebpevayàbayà is kada sevaha keniyu te zuma zin.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he is sulug̵uen, kenà lavew sikandin te egalen din, ne is sug̵ù daan, kenà sikandin lavew te midsug̵ù kandin.
Emun egkesavut niw en heini is impenurù ku keniyu, igkelipey niw utew ke edtumanen niw.

Kenè kew pudu is egkeg̵iyan ku kayi su netuenan ku ke hengkey is gehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu te menge pinilì ku. Duen sevaha keniyu he ed-ekalan e zin. Umba egkeulaula heini su wey metuman sikan is netagnà dengan diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, ‘Is duma ku he ebpekidtug̵en kediey, iyan nehimu he kuntada ku.’
Umba,” ke si Jesus, “te kenè pa heini egkehitavù, egkeg̵iyen ku en keniyu he zaan su emun egketuman en, ebpeketuu kew he iyan a sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he edewaten din is edsug̵uen ku, edewaten e zin daan, ne is edawat kediey, edewaten din daan is Amey ku he midsug̵ù kediey.”
Ne te kegkeg̵iya zutun ni Jesus, utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin ne migkeg̵iyan din is menge sumusundan din te, “Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ed-ekalan a te sevaha keniyu wey a mehimetayi.”
Ne mibpetengtengtengà haazà is menge sumusundan din su wazè dan metueni ke hentei is egkeg̵iyen din.
Ne zutun te zurug ni Jesus kes sumusundan din he pinedtayè din utew.
Ne haazà he sumusundan, mid-uyawan ni Simon he iyan kes migeraran ki Pedro. Ke si Pedro te, “Insai nu sikandin ke hentei is egkeg̵iyen din.”
Ne haazà he sumusundan, geina te uvey sikandin ni Jesus, mid-insaan din si Jesus te, “Hentei kenami is ed-akal kenikew?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun igkezehulit ku en heini is supas, ne is ebeg̵ayan ku, iyan sikandin.” Ne indehulit din haazà is supas, ne imbeg̵ey zin ki Hudas he anak ni Simon he tigKeriyuti.
Ne hein nezawat ni Hudas haazà is supas, ne mid-ehukan sikandin ni Setanas ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Gègaani nu is ebeelan nu!”
(Ne wazà minsan hentei kandan te menge sumusundan dutun he nekesavut ke maan is migkag̵i ni Jesus haazà.

Kunaan te zuma he ibpepemasa ni Jesus sikandin te egkinehenglanen dan he idsilibra te pista, ne emun kenà, duen ibpeveg̵ey ni Jesus diyà te menge egkengeayuayu. Umba iyan haazà netag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa zan su si Hudas, iyan edtipig te selapì dan.)
Ne hein nekaan ni Hudas haazà is supas, midlawang ne mezukilem en dutun.

Ne hein migenat en si Hudas, migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Meg̵aan en egkeahà ke sengemenu is kezekelà te g̵ehem ku te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne pinaag̵i kedì egkeahà daan ke sengemenu is kezekelà te g̵ehem te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Ne emun pinaag̵i kedì egkeahà guntaan is dekelà he g̵ehem te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kenà utew egkeug̵et ne ibpeehè din daan is kediey he dekelà he g̵ehem.

Sikiyu is menge minahal ku he menge sumusundan, egketegteg̵aad dà guntaan ne egkeawaan ku en sikiyu. Ebpen-ahaan a keniyu ne iring te migkag̵i ku ziyà te menge Hudiyu, egkeg̵iyen ku zaan dini te keniyu he ke hendei a ebpevayà kenè kew ebpekezuma.

Beg̵u en he sug̵ù is ibpetuman ku keniyu. Iyan is: kinahanglan he mahala ziyà te g̵ehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu is minsan hentei keniyu. Iring te mahal kew zini te g̵ehinawa ku, kinahanglan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu is minsan hentei keniyu.
Emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, egkeahà te langun he menge etew he menge sumusundan ku sikiyu.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i ki Jesus si Simon, kes migeraran ki Pedro, ke sikandin te, “Ebpehendei ka?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ke hendei a ebpevayà kenè kew pa ebpekezuma; iyan, keuzemà ebpeketelukun kew g̵ihapun.”
Ne migkag̵i med-uman si Pedro te, “Maan is kenà a ebpekezuma kenikew g̵untaan? Kenè ku sikew ed-ewaan minsan pa ke kinahanglan he ebpehimatey a tenged kenikew!”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ebpehimatey ke ve tenged kediey? Benar iyan is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekag̵i he kenà a kenikew egkekilala.”
“Kenà mebmesakit is gehinawa niw,” ke si Jesus, “kekenà, sarig kew te Megbevayà ne sarig kew zaan kediey.
Mezakel is menge egkeubpaan diyà te ed-ubpaan te Amey ku, su ke kenà tutuu heini, wazè ku g̵eina sikiyu keg̵iyi he edhendiyà a te ked-andam te egkeubpaan niw.
Ne emun ebpekehendiyà ad su ed-endaman ku sikiyu te egkeubpaan, edlikuan ku sikiyu ne ziyà ku sikiyu ed-uwita te ed-ubpaan ku. Ne zutun, ke hendei a, ne zutun kew zaan.
Ne netuenan niw en is ibayà pehendiyà te ebeyaan ku.”
Ne migkeg̵iyan si Jesus ni Tomas te, “Wazè dey metueni ke hendei ka ebpevayà. Ebmenmenuwen dey ve te kegketureduwa zey te ibayè nu?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan a sikan is ibayà; iyan a kes tutuu he edtuuwan; iyan a kes ebpuunan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Wazà ebpekehendiyà te ed-ubpaan te Amey ku emun kenà a iyan ibayè din.
Emun egketuenan niw ke hentei a, egketuenan niw zaan ke hentei is Amey ku. Puun guntaan netuenan niw en ke hentei sikandin su neehè niw en sikandin.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i ziyà te kandin si Felipe te, “Ipeehè nu kenami is Amey nu he Megbevayà ne iyan dà egkinehenglanen dey.”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Neug̵et en utew is kebpekiduma ku kenikew, Felipe, ne wazè nu ves metueni ke hentei a? Su is nekeahà kedì, ne nekeehè en daan te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Maan is egkesuat ka he ibpeehè ku kenikew is Amey ku?

Wazè ke ves medtuu he zini te kedì is Amey ku, ne ziyà a zaan te kandin su sevaha key zà? Minsan is menge lalag ku keniyu, kenè ku egkeg̵iyen te kediey zà he isip su is Amey ku he zini ed-ubpà te kediey, kandin he vaal heini.

Tuu kew te egkeg̵iyen ku he ziyà a te Amey ku ne zini sikandin te kediey. Ne emun kenè kew ebpeketuu kayi tenged dà te migkag̵i ku, tuu kew tenged te menge vaal ku su is menge vaal ku, egkeehè niw zutun he tutuu is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu.
Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen edtuu kediey, egkehimu zin is nengeveelan ku, asal lavew pa he mekeg̵eg̵ehem is egkeveelan din tenged te ed-ulì a ziyà te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Ke zuen ebuyuen niw kediey tenged te kedtuu niw kediey, ebeelan ku su wey mevantug is Amey ku tenged kediey.
Su is minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw tenged te kedtuu niw kediey, ebeelan ku.
Emun mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw, edtumanen niw is menge sug̵ù ku keniyu,
ne edhengyuan ku is Amey ku su wey zin ikeveg̵ey keniyu is Menenavang he ed-ilis kediey he kenà edsuwey keniyu te minsan keenu.

Iyan sikandin sikan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he tutuu is ibpenurù din. Kenà heini egkezawat te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà su kenè dan egkekilala sikandin ne kenè dan egkesavut ke hentei sikandin. Sikiyu mulà, nesavut niw en ke hentei sikandin su ziyà ed-ubpà te keniyu ne kenà daan ed-awà diyà te keniyu.
Ne kenè ku sikiyu ed-ewaan he iring te nengeilu su edlikuan ku zed sikiyu.

Kenè en egketegteg̵aad ne kenà ad maan egkeahà te menge kuntada ku he etew zini te kelibutan, iyan, sikiyu mulà, egkeehè e pa egkeuman keniyu. Kenà egkeawà is untung ku te minsan keenu, umba zuen niw en daan untung he kenà egkeawà te minsan keenu.
Ne zutun te andew te kedlikui ku keniyu, egketuenan niw he siak, diyà a te Amey ku wey is Amey ku, dini zaan te kediey, ne sikiyu, dini kew te kediey ne ziyà a zaan te keniyu.

Is etew he edewaten din is menge sug̵ù ku ne edtumanen din, iyan sikandin etew he utew a mahal ziyà te gehinawa zin. Ne mahal zaan sikandin dini te g̵ehinawa zey te Amey ku, ne edhimuwen ku he metueni zin he iyan a zuma zin.”

Ne zutun migkag̵i si Hudas (kenà sikan is Hudas he tigKeriyuti), ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, “Maan is edhimuwen nu he metueni zey sikew ne kenè nu edhimuwen he metueni ka te menge etew he wazà medtuu kenikew?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Ke zuen etew he mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin, edtumanen din is menge sug̵ù ku, ne zutun mahal sikandin diyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey ku. Ne siak wey is Amey ku, edhendiyè key te kandin ne ziyà key ed-ubpà te kandin.

Ke zuen etew he kenà a mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin, kenè din edtumanen is menge sugù ku. Heini is menge lalag ku, kenà dini zà te isip ku ebpuun, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te Amey ku he iyan midsug̵ù kediey.
Egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu heini is langun te kemulu e pa zini te keniyu.

Ne edsug̵uen te Amey ku zini te keniyu is Menenavang he ed-ilis kediey. Iyan sikandin sikan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne ibpenurù din keniyu is langun, ne ibpetenuzan din keniyu is langun he migkag̵i ku keniyu.

Edteg̵akan ku is isip niw te kelinew. Is kelinew he zini te isip ku, iyan idtag̵ak ku keniyu. Is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kenà edtuu, kenè dan ebpekeveg̵ey keniyu te kelinew he iring kayi. Ne kinhanglan he kenà mebmesakit is gehinawa niw ne kenè kew zaan mahandek.

Nezineg niw is migkag̵i ku he ed-ewaan ku sikiyu ne edlikù e zed dini te keniyu. Angin ke tutuu he mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw su igkelipey niw pezem heini su g̵untaan egkehimu he ed-ulì a ziyà te Amey ku he iyan lavew kenà a.
Ne te wazè pa meuma is ked-ewai ku keniyu, migkag̵i ku en keniyu heini he zaan su emun egkeulaula en, ebpeketuu kew he iyan a sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà.
Mevavè dà utew is menge lalag ku keniyu su meg̵aan en ebpekeuma si Setanas is egalen te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada ku. Wazè din keg̵ehem kediey,
iyan, is ed-ul-ulahan ku g̵untaan, ne iyan insug̵ù kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Edtumanen ku heini su wey metueni te menusiyà he mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku is Amey ku.
Ne kuwa kew en su ed-awè kiw kayi.”
“Iyan a,” ke si Jesus, “sikan is puun te pinemula he paras ne is Amey ku he Megbevayà, iyan teg̵ipinemula.
Ke zuen subpang ku he kenà ebpemeg̵as, id-awè din. Ne is langun he menge subpang ku he ebpemeg̵as, edlumpiyuwan din su wey mekesigudu mekepemeg̵as.
Nelumpiyuwan kew en pinaag̵i te kedhemeni niw te impenurù ku keniyu.
Kenè kew suwey kediey iring te kenà a zaan edsuwey keniyu. Wazà subpang he ebpekepemeg̵as ke ebpekesuwey ziyà te lawa te pinemula, ne sikiyu zaan, emun edsuwey kew kediey kenè kew ebpekepemeg̵as.

Su iyan a sikan is lawa ne iyan kew menge subpang ku. Is etew he kenà edsuwey kedì iring te kenà a zaan edsuwey kandin, iyan ebpekepenigudu ebpekepemeg̵as. Wazà egkehimu niw ke ebpekesuwey kew kediey.
Su ke zuen etew he edsuwey kediey, ed-engkezan sikandin iring te subpang he idtimbag wey meg̵angu. Ne is menge subpang he nengeg̵angu, edtig̵umen ne idtimbag diyà te hapuy wey metutung.
Ne sikiyu, emun kenè kew edsuwey kedì ne edhemenan niw is menge penurù ku, is minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw kediey, ibeg̵ey ku keniyu.
Emun ebpenigudu kew ebpemeg̵as,
Iring te mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey ku, mahal kew zaan dini te g̵ehinawa ku. Hemeni niw is kebmahala ku keniyu zini te g̵ehinawa ku.

Emun edtumanen niw is menge sug̵ù ku keniyu, ne kenè kew egkeawà te kebmahala ku keniyu zini te g̵ehinawa ku iring te midtuman ku is menge sug̵ù kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà ne kenà ad daan egkeawà te kebmahala zin kedì diyà te g̵ehinawa zin.
Umba migkag̵i ku keniyu heini is langun su wey niw ikelipey is kediey he kelipey ne wey kew utew melipey.
Iyan heini sug̵ù ku keniyu he kinahanglan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu is minsan hentei keniyu iring te mahal kew zini te g̵ehinawa ku.
Ke zuen etew he ebpehimatey wey melibri is menge emig̵u zin, tuus heini he utew mahal is menge emig̵u zin diyà te g̵ehinawa zin; wazè en kebmahal he ebpekeiring kayi.
Menge emig̵u ku sikiyu ke edtumanen niw is idsug̵ù ku keniyu.

Kenè ku en maan sikiyu egngezanan te menge sulug̵uen ku su is sulug̵uen, kenà egkeg̵iyan te egalen din ke hengkey is ebeelan te egalen din. Egngezanan ku sikiyu he menge emig̵u ku su is langun he impesavut kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà, impesavut ku zaan keniyu.

Kenè kew iyan nekepilì kediey, kekenà, iyan a nekepilì keniyu. Intezù ku sikiyu wey kew mekepemeg̵as te menge meupiya he ulaula ne wey kenà daan mahanew is beg̵as niw. Ne is minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw ziyà te Amey ku he Megbevayà tenged te kedtuu niw kediey, ibeg̵ey zin keniyu.
Iyan sug̵ù ku keniyu is: kinahanglan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu is minsan hentei keniyu.
Emun egkuntedahan kew te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenè kew meinuinu su zaan e zan he egkuntedahan.
Emun duma kew te menge kuntada te Megbevayà ebmahalen kew zan, iyan, geina te kenè kew zan duma ne egkuntedahan kew zan su mibpilì ku sikiyu wey kew mekesuwey ziyà te kandan.

Tentenuzi niw is migkag̵i ku keniyu he is sulug̵uen, kenà lavew te egalen din. Su ke mibpesipelahan e zan is egalen niw, iyan kew pe be kenè dan pesipelahi. Ke edtumanen te menge etew is kedì he penurù, edtumanen dan daan is keniyu.
Iyan, ebpesipelahan kew te menge etew tenged te kedtuu niw kediey su wazè dan mekilala is Amey ku he midsug̵ù kediey.
Angin ke wazà a mekehendini te kelibutan ne wazà a zaan mekepesavut kandan su kenà sikandan egkevesulan tenged te salè dan, iyan, guntaan wazè dan en igkepesangil.
Is egkuntada kediey, kenà iyan e zà egkuntedahan din, kekenà, egkuntedahan din daan is Amey ku he Megbevayà.

Duen mibeelan ku he neehè dan he menge egkein-inuwan he kenà egkeveelan te minsan hentei he menusiyà. Angin ke wazè dan maahà heini su kenà sikandan egkevesulan tenged te mezaat he mid-ulaula zan kedì. Iyan, neehè dan en ne minsan pa zutun, siak wey is Amey ku, egkuntedahan key zan.
Pinaag̵i kayi netuman diyà te kandan is tagnà diyà te kesug̵uan he impenurù dengan kandan he edhenduen te, ‘Minsan ke wazè dan ketezengan te igkuntedaha zan kedì, ne egkuntedahan e zan.’ ”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Is Menenavang he ebpuun te Amey ku, edsug̵uen ku zini te keniyu. Iyan sikandin sikan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ebpenurù te tutuu he edtuuwan. Ne emun ebpekeuma en dini te kelibutan, ibpesavut din ke hentei a.
Ne ebpekepesavut kew zaan kayi su puun pa te aney ku en kebpenurù, duma ku en sikiyu.”
“Umba migkag̵i ku keniyu heini is langun,” ke si Jesus, “su wey kenà mehugkà is kedtuu niw kediey te egkehitavù keniyu keuzemà.
Su id-awè dan is ketenged niw te kedseled diyà te simbahan, ne kenà iyan dà heini su keuzemà ke zuen edhimatey keniyu, kunaan din ke igkesuat te Megbevayà haazà is mibeelan din.
Umba ebeelan dan heini keniyu su siak wey is Amey ku, wazè key zan mekilala.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini keniyu he zaan su emun egkehitavù heini is kebpekeantus niw te kemereg̵enan, egketenuzan niw he inlag̵uy ku en keniyu heini he zaan.
Wazè ku sikiyu keg̵iyi kayi zengan hein beg̵u kiw pa he nekeduzuma su kemulu e pa zutun duma niw.
Iyan, guntaan ed-ulì ad diyà te Amey ku he midsug̵ù kedì. Ne wazà sevaha keniyu he ed-insà kedì ke hendei a ebpevayà,
kekenà, utew kew egkengeseeng tenged te migkag̵i ku keniyu is egkengeantus niw he kemeresayan keuzemà.

Ne minsan pa kayi, benar iyan is egkeg̵iyen ku he igkezeyzey niw is ked-ewai ku keniyu su emun kenè ku sikiyu ed-ewaan, kenà ebpekehendini te keniyu is Menenavang. Ne emun ed-awà a, edsug̵uen ku sikandin dini te keniyu.
Ne emun dini en sikandin, ibpesavut din te menusiyà he mezaat is ulaula te menusiyà wey ibpesavut din he zuen metazeng he ibayà wey ibpesavut din daan kandan he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.
Iyan ibpesevuta zin kandan he mezaat is ulaula zan su wazè dan medtuu kediey.
Ibpesavut din kandan is metazeng he ibayà su ed-ulì ad diyà te Amey ku ne kenè e en egkeahà keniyu.
Ibpesavut din is kedsiluti kandan te Megbevayà su si Setanas he egalen dan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà, midhukuman en te silut.
Mezakel pa is egkeg̵iyen ku pezem keniyu, iyan, kenè niw pa egkesavut.

Ne sikan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ebpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen, emun dini en sikandin te keniyu, ibpesavut din keniyu is langun he tutuu. Kenè din iyan ibpesavut is kandin dà he isip, kekenà, iyan ibpesavut din is nezineg din diyà te Amey ku. Ibpesavut din daan keniyu is egkeulaula keuzemà.
Ebentug̵en e zin su ibpesavut din keniyu is penurù ku wey ulaula ku.
Umba migkag̵i ku he ibpesavut din keniyu is penurù ku su is langun he egkeg̵iyen te Amey ku, iyan ku zaan egkeg̵iyen.
Nesipeg̵an en is timpu he kenà ad keniyu egkeahà ne kenà daan utew egkeug̵et dutun ne egkeahà a keniyu egkeuman.”

Ne zutun mibpein-inseey is duma he menge sumusundan din te, “Hengkey vuwa is ibpesavut din kayi te lalag din he nesipeg̵an en is timpu he kenè tew en sikandin egkeahà ne kenà daan utew egkeug̵et dutun ne egkeehè tew en maan, wey hengkey is ibpesavut din te migkag̵i zin he ed-ulì sikandin diyà te Amey zin?”
Ne ke sikandan daan te, “Hengkey vuwa is ibpesavut din te migkag̵i zin he nesipeg̵an en is timpu? Kenè tew egkesavut ke hengkey is ibpesavut din.”

Ne netuenan ni Jesus he zuen egkesuatan dan he id-insà kandin umba migkag̵i sikandin te, “Iyan buwa id-insè niw ke hengkey is ibpesavut ku te migkag̵i ku g̵eina he nesipeg̵an en is timpu he kenà ad keniyu egkeahà, ne kenà daan utew egkeug̵et dutun ne egkeahà ad maan keniyu.

Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he is menge kuntada ku, igkelipey zan utew is egkehitavù kedi, iyan, sikiyu, ebpekesineg̵ew kew su egkeseeng kew. Iyan, egkeilisan is kegkeseeng niw te zekelà he kelipey.
Emun ebeliliten is bahi, egkerasey te mesakit su ed-anak en. Ne emun edlusazan en, egkelipatan din is mesakit su igkelipey zin is beg̵u en he etew he in-anak.
Iring din ded daan, egkeseeng kew g̵untaan, iyan, dutun te kebpeked-uman tew kebpeked-aahà, utew kew zutun egkelipey, ne wazà minsan hentei he egkeawè din is kelipey niw.

Ne zutun he andew wazè en kinahanglan he zuen id-insè niw kediey. Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw ziyà te Amey ku, ibeg̵ey zin keniyu tenged te kedtuu niw kediey.
Wazè niw pa mibuyù diyà te kandin ebpuun te kedtuuwi niw kediey. Buyù kew wey kew mekezawat su wey kew utew melipey.

Migamit ku is menge sempità te kebpenurua ku keniyu, iyan, meg̵aan en egkeuma is andew he kenè en maan menge sempitè pa is egemiten ku su zutun, melemu niw en he egkesavut is egkeg̵iyen ku. Ne zutun utew niw egkekeleduwi is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu mehitenged te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Ne zutun he andew tenged te kedtuu niw kediey, iyan kew en egkag̵i te ebuyuen niw ziyà te Amey ku, ne kenè en kinahanglan he iyan e pa egkag̵i te ebuyuen niw ziyà te Amey ku
su utew kew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey ku tenged te mahal a zaan diyà te g̵ehinawa niw wey tenged daan te midtuu kew he ziyà a ebpuun te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
