Diyà a ebpuun te Amey ku ne midhendini a te kelibutan. Ne g̵untaan ed-ewaan ku heini is kelibutan ne ed-ulì ad diyà te Amey ku.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is menge sumusundan din te, “Ne utew en keladu is egkeg̵iyen nu su kenè en maan sempità.
Nesavut dey en he netuenan nu is langun su minsan is id-insà kenikew, kenè en kinahanglan he egkeg̵iyen pa su netuenan nu en he zaan, umba edtuuwan dey en he sikew, diyà ka ebpuun te Megbevayà.”
Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Human kew ves meketuu?

Egkesipeg̵an en is timpu he zutun ebpekedsusuwey kew is langun; ed-ulì is kada sevaha keniyu ziyà te ed-ubpaan din ne egkeewaan a. Ne minsan pa zutun duen ku pa zuma su iyan duma ku is Amey ku he Megbevayà.

Umba migkag̵i ku keniyu heini is langun su wey mebmelinawen layun is gehinawa niw tenged kediey. Dini te kelibutan ebpesipelahan kew te menge etew he kuntada ku, iyan, kenè kew mahandek su nezaag ku en sikan is egalen te menge kuntada ku!”

Ne hein nekepasad si Jesus dutun he egkag̵i, midlingahà diyà te langit ne ke sikandin te, “Amà, iyan en heini sikan is netagnà he timpu. Ipeehè nu en is dekelà he bentug̵an ku te Anak nu wey ku zaan ikepaahà is kezekelà te kenikew he bentug̵an.
Insarig nu kediey is kebayàbayà te tivuuk he menusiyà su wey ku meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan is langun he menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey.

Ne iyan heini paag̵i he egkezawat dan is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Kinahanglan he egkesavut dan ke hentei ka is sevaha zà he tutuu he Megbevayà wey kinahanglan he egkesavut dan daan ke hentei a is Anak nu he si Jesu Kristu.
Dini te kelibutan, impeehè ku is utew zekelà he bentug̵an nu su is menge vaal he insug̵ù nu kediey, nepasad ku en.
Ne guntaan, Amà, iulì nu kediey ziyan te etuvangan nu sikan is daan he utew ku kegkelavew he iyan kes kegkelavew ku zengan hein diyan e pa te kenikew te wazè pa limbag̵a is kelibutan.
Is menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey zini te kelibutan, impesavut ku kandan ke hentei ka. Kenikew sikandan he zaan ne imbeg̵ey nu kediey ne midtuman dan en is insug̵ù nu kandan.
Netuenan dan en human he is langun he egkehimu ku, ne ziyè dà ebpuun te kenikew
su is impepenurù nu kediey, impenurù ku en kandan ne netuenan dan he tutuu iyan he ziyan a ebpuun te kenikew. Ne midtuu zan he midsug̵ù a kenikew.

Edhengyuan ku sikew tenged kandan; kenè ku sikew edhengyuan he tevangi nu is menge etew he kenà edtuu kedì, kekenà, edhengyuan ku sikew he tevangi nu is menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey su kenikew zaan sikandan.
Ne is menge etew he g̵aked nu, kediey zaan, ne is langun he kediey, kenikew zaan. Ne pinaag̵i kandan egkeahà is bentug̵an ku.

Ne g̵untaan ed-ulì ad diyan te kenikew ne kenè e en ed-ubpà dini te kelibutan, iyan, heini is menge etew he g̵aked ta, dini zan pa te kelibutan. Wag̵as he Amey ku, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te ngazan nu, ipata nu heini is menge imbeg̵ey nu kediey he etew su wey mesevaha sikandan iring te sevaha ki zà.

Te kemulu e pa zuma zan, is menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey, midlig-enan ku sikandan pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te ngazan nu he iyan daan kes ngazan he imbeg̵ey nu kediey. Mibentayan ku sikandan ne wazà minsan sevaha he egketazin kandan. Sikan is etew he netagnà is kedsiluti kandin, egketazin sikandin su egketuman is tagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne g̵untaan ed-ulì ad diyan te kenikew ne edhengyuen ku kenikew heini te kemulu e pa zini te kelibutan su wey mepurung sikandan mengelipey te kediey he kelipey.

Sikan is lalag nu he ibpepenurù nu kediey, impenurù ku en kandan, ne migkuntada sikandan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada nu su wazè dan upakat kayi iring te wazà daan kedì he upakat te menge kuntada nu.
Kenè ku iyan edhengyuen he iawè nu zini te kelibutan heini is menge g̵aked ta he etew, kekenà, iyan edhengyuen ku kenikew he ipata nu sikandan wey kenà sikandan mekeizi ni Setanas.
Wazè dan upakat te menge etew he kuntada nu iring te wazè ku zaan upakat dutun te menge kuntada nu.
Heini is menge g̵aked ta he etew, pinaag̵i te tutuu he tuluuwen, himuwa nu sikandan he menge sulug̵uen nu. Is lalag nu, iyan tutuu he tuluuwen.
Iring te midsug̵ù a kenikew zini te kelibutan, edsug̵uen ku zaan sikandan wey zan ikepesavut is tivuuk he menusiyà.
Ne tenged kandan ibpeveyveyaan ku kenikew is gehinawa ku su wey zan daan ikepurung ikepeveyveyai kenikew is gehinawa zan.
Edhengyuan ku sikew kenà tenged dà kayi te menge g̵aked ta g̵untaan, kekenà, tenged daan te langun he edtuu kediey keuzemà pinaag̵i te kedwali zan.

Amà, idhangyù ku sikandan pudu wey mesevaha zà is isip dan iring te kegkesevaha ta. Dini ka te kedì ne ziyan a zaan te kenikew. Edhengyuen ku zaan he mesevaha sikandan dini te kenita su wey meketuu is menusiyà he midsug̵ù a kenikew.
Is kegkehimu ku he lavew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey, imbeg̵ey ku zaan kandan wey zan mesevaha te isip iring te kegkesevaha ta.

Su ziyà a te kandan ne zini ka zaan te kedì wey mehustu is kegkesevaha te isip dan su wey metueni te tivuuk he menusiyà he midsug̵ù a kenikew, ne wey metueni zaan te menusiyà he mahal sikandan diyan te g̵ehinawa nu iring daan te mahal a ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu.

Amà, is menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey, egkesuatan ku he ziyè dan mekeamur te kediey diyà te ed-ubpaan ku keuzemà wey zan maahà is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag ku he imbeg̵ey nu kediey zengan te wazè pa tukuza heini is kelibutan. Umba mibeg̵ayan a kenikew te anlag su mahal a ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu.
Wag̵as he Amey ku, is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada nu, wazè dan mesavut ke hentei ka, iyan, siak, nesavut ku; ne heini is menge etew he g̵aked ta, nesavut dan he midsug̵ù a kenikew zini.

Impesavut ku kandan ke hentei ka ne ibpenigudu ku pa ibpesavut kandan heini su wey mehimu he ziyà a te kandan ne mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te uman sevaha kandan is minsan hentei kandan iring te mahal a zaan diyan te g̵ehinawa nu.”
Ne te neketapus si Jesus dutun he ebpengumew-umew, sikandin wey is menge sumusundan din, midrapas dan te zal-ug he egngezanan te Kidrun. Ne zuen menge kayu he impemula zutun ne zutun dan mebpundu.
Ne si Hudas, sikan is ed-akal kandin wey mehimetayi, netuenan din haazà is mibpunduwan dan su si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, layun dan edtig̵um dutun.
Ne zutun nekeuma si Hudas he edumahan te sengekumpeniya he sundaru wey pulis he midsug̵ù te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge Perisiyu. Ne ebpenusulù he nengeg̵umeenan sikandan.
Ne zutun, si Jesus, geina te wazà mekeeles diyà te kandin is langun he egkehitavù kandin, midsinug̵ung din sikandan ne mid-insà te, “Hentei is ebpen-ahaan niw?”
Ne midtavak dan te, “Si Jesus he tigNeserit.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan a ebpen-ahaan niw.”
Ne zutun en daan si Hudas, kes mid-akal ki Jesus.
Ne hein migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Iyan a,” nemekepemuley-ang dan ne nengepiley zan.
Ne mid-uman med-insà si Jesus te, “Hentei is ebpen-ahaan niw?” Ne midtavak dan med-uman te, “Si Jesus he tigNeserit.”
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Migkag̵i ku en he iyan a. Emun iyan a ebpen-ahaan niw, kenè niw mulà dekepa heini is menge zuma ku.”
(Umba nekag̵i zin heini su egketuman sikan is in-ampù din he egkag̵i te, “Is minsan sevaha zà te menge etew he imbeg̵ey nu kediey, wazà netazin.”)

Duen ubpit ni Simon Pedro ne midhulavut din ne midtibas din is sulug̵uen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te kewanan he telinga ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin. Is ngazan dutun te sulug̵uen, si Malkus.
Ne midawey ni Jesus si Pedro, ke sikandin te, “Ig̵umè nu heeyan is ubpit nu su is ibpaantus kedì te Amey ku, kenè ku ve ed-entusen?”
Ne zutun, haazà is menge sundaru wey is kepitan dan wey elin daan is menge pulis te menge Hudiyu, midakep dan si Jesus ne mibakus dan.
Ne midhunaan dan uwita sikandin diyà te ki Anas su enug̵ang si Anas ni Keyipas te lavew he memumuhat dutun he tuig.
Iyan si Keyipas kes midsambag te menge Hudiyu he kinahanglan he ebpatey is sevaha he etew he elili te tivuuk he kehudiyuwan.

Si Pedro wey is sevaha pa he sumusundan, edteltelukun dan ki Jesus. Ne haazà he sumusundan, nekilala sikandin te lavew he memumuhat ne tenged dutun miduma ki Jesus ne midseled dutun te lama te valey te lavew he memumuhat.

Ne si Pedro mulà, diyè dà sikandin te g̵awas uvey te pultahan. Ne zutun midlawang is sevaha he sumusundan he kilala te lavew he memumuhat ne midlelag̵an din haazà is bahi he impevantey zutun te pultahan ne impeseled din si Pedro.
Ne haazà is bahi zutun te pultahan, mid-insaan din si Pedro te, “Sumusundan ke ve zaan keniyan te etew?” Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Kenà.”
Ne midtetavun te uring is menge pulis wey menge sulug̵uen su meg̵enew haazà, ne edhizazang dan dutun. Ne mid-amur zutun si Pedro te kandan su edhizazang.
Ne zutun in-insà ki Jesus te lavew he memumuhat is menge sumusundan din wey is penurù din.

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Wazà mekeeles is menge penurù ku ziyà te menge etew su ziyà a mebpenurù te menge simbahan wey ziyà daan te Valey te Megbevayà he egketig̵uman te tivuuk he kehudiyuwan. Wazè ku ieles is minsan hengkey he lalag ku.
Maan is iyan a ed-insaan nu? Insai niw is nemekezineg kedì su netuenan dan is migkag̵i ku kandan.”

Ne te nekag̵i ni Jesus haazà, midsumbag sikandin te sevaha he pulis he edhithitindeg dutun te uvey zin ne migkag̵i haazà is pulis te, “Maan is nekeg̵ehem ka he edtavak te iring keniyan diyà te lavew he memumuhat?”
Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, “Emun mezaat is migkag̵i ku, keg̵iya nu ke hengkey is mezaat he nekag̵i ku, ne emun ke wazà mezaat, maan is midsumbag a kenikew?”
Ne zutun impeuwit ni Anas si Jesus he mibakus diyà te ki Keyipas he iyan tutuu he lavew he memumuhat.
Ne kemulu pa si Pedro zutun is edhidhizazang. Ne zuen menge etew zutun he mid-insà kandin te, “Kenè ke ve sumusundan daan ni Jesus?” Iyan, mibarew ni Pedro. Ke sikandin te, “Kenà a iyan.”

Ne zuen daan dutun sevaha he sulug̵uen te lavew he memumuhat. Haazà he sulug̵uen, megeget duen te nelepungan ni Pedro te telinga. Ne migkeg̵iyan din si Pedro te, “Henduen be te neehè ku sikew g̵eina ziyà te midekepan ki Jesus. Duma ke zin buwa?”
Ne mibarew en maan si Pedro ne segugunà mid-ukarà is manuk.

Ne zutun mid-uwit dan en maan si Jesus puun dutun te valey ni Keyipas ne midhendiyè dan te turug̵an te gubirnedur he Rumanu. Ne meselem pa utew zutun. Ne ziyè dà is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu te g̵awas su wey kenè dan mekesupak te vetasan dan te kegkelumpiyuwi su ke edseled dan dutun wazà itug̵ut kandan is kedtampu te kegkaan te Idlavung te Kedlevayi.
Tenged dutun migawas si Gubirnedur Pilatu ziyà te kandan ne ke sikandin te, “Hengkey is idsumbunga niw kayi te etew?”
Ne midtavak is menge punuan te, “Emun kenà selaan heini, kenè dey pezem id-etuvang kenikew.”

Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, “Kuwaa niw sikandin dini su iyan kew susi kandin sumalà is ibpenurù te kesug̵uan niw.” Ne migkag̵i is menge Hudiyu te, “Wazà itug̵ut kenami te velaud niw te menge Rumanu is kedhukum te kemetayen.”
(Umba neulaula heini su egketuman is midtagnà ni Jesus he edhimetayan sikandin pinaag̵i te kedrensanga te krus.)
Ne midseled si Pilatu zutun te turug̵an ne mid-umew zin si Jesus. Ne migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyu?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Kenikew zè be he isip heini is insè nu ke hadì a wey ke ziyè be ebpuun heini te selakew en he etew?”
Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, “Hudiyu e ve! Is menge zuma nu he Hudiyu wey is menge punuan he memumuhat, iyan mid-uwit kenikew zini. Hengkey is salè nu?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Is keg̵ehem ku te kedhadì, kenà dini ebpuun te kelibutan. Su ke zini ebpuun mibpekidtebek en geina is menge sakup ku wey a kenà mezakep te menge Hudiyu, iyan, kenà dini te kelibutan ebpuun is keg̵ehem ku te kedhadì.”

Ne migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Hadì ke ves?” Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Tutuu heeyan is nekag̵i nu su hadì a. Umba midhendini a te kelibutan. Umba neetew a zini te lumpad. Midhendini a su wey ku ikepesavut ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen. Is langun he menge etew he egkesuatan dan he metueni zan is tutuu he tuluuwen, ebpemineg dan kediey.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Meupiya pezem ke zuen netau te tutuu he tuluuwen.”
Ne zutun te nekag̵i zin heini, midlawang en maan si Pilatu ziyà te menge Hudiyu ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, “Wazè ku egketuenan he salè din.
Ne zini te keniyu te menge Hudiyu, duen betasan niw he emun Pista te Kedlevayi, ibpaawà ku is sevaha he egkesuatan niw he pirisu. Egkesuatan niw ve he ibpaawè ku heini is hadì niw te menge Hudiyu?”
Ne mibpememensag dan te, “Kenà iyan sikandin, kekenà, iyan nu ipaawà si Berabas.” (Ne haazà si Berabas, tulisan.)
Ne zutun insug̵ù ni Pilatu he ipevug̵el si Jesus.

Ne hein netapus te menge sundaru haazà is kebug̵ela zan kandin, mibengkulè dan is dug̵iyen he g̵awed ne insuup dan diyà te ulu zin. Ne zutun impekukumbalè dan kandin is merig̵à he kumbalà su uvag hadì.
Ne mid-uvayan dan su ebelvelayen dan. Ke sikandan te, “Kumusta ka, sikew is hadì te menge Hudiyu!” Ne midsumbag dan sikandin.
Ne zutun midlawang en maan si Pilatu ne migkeg̵iyan din haazà is menge Hudiyu te, “Ibpelawang ku en maan sikandin dini te etuvangan niw su wey niw metueni he wazè ku naahà he salà he neveelan din.”
Ne zutun midlawang si Jesus he kemulu midsuupan is ulu zin te zug̵iyen wey midsun-uzan te merig̵à he kumbalà. Ne migkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Tengtengi niw sikandin!”

Ne is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge pulis, hein neehè dan si Jesus, mibpememensag dan te, “Himetayi, iransang te krus!” Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, “Iyan kew medransang kandin te krus su siak, wazè ku egketuenan he salè din!”

Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandin haazà is menge Hudiyu te, “Sumalà te kesug̵uan dey, kinahanglan he edhimetayan heini he etew su midsupak din is kesug̵uan su migkag̵i zin he iyan sikandin sikan is Anak te Megbevayà.”
Ne te kegkezineg̵a ni Pilatu kayi, mid-iseg is kegkehandek din,
ne midseled en maan sikandin dutun te turug̵an ne ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, “Hendei ka ebpuun?” Ne wazà dutun medtavak si Jesus.
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Pilatu te, “Maan is kenè ka egkag̵i? Wazè nu ve metueni he zekelà is keg̵ehem ku; igkepaawè ku sikew ne egkehimu zaan he idsug̵ù ku he iransang ka te krus?”

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Is keg̵ehem nu te kebayàbayà kediey, ke wazè pa iveg̵ey heini te Megbevayà diyà te kenikew, wazè nu g̵eina egkehimu. Umba sikan is midsug̵ù he uwita a zini te kenikew, iyan edhuna he zekelà is salè din, kenà sikew.”

Ne zutun, mid-iseg is gustu ni Pilatu he edlibriyen din si Jesus, iyan, mibpememensag en maan haazà is menge Hudiyu, ke sikandan te, “Emun ibpaawè nu heeyan he etew, egkuntedahan nu is hadì tew ziyà te Ruma he si Cesar su is etew he iring kayi he ebpahadì, ebpekigkuntada ki Cesar.”
Ne zutun te nezineg haazà ni Pilatu, impelawang din si Jesus ne mibpinuu zutun te pinuuwè din te hukmanan, kes migngezanan dan te Gebata te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen,
Ne neudtu en dutun. Ne haazà he andew, iyan andew te kedteg̵enahi zan te Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne zutun migkag̵i si Pilatu ziyà te menge Hudiyu te, “Heini en sikan is hadì niw!”

Ne zutun mibpememensag en maan haazà is menge Hudiyu te, “Himetayi en, iransang te krus!” Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandan si Pilatu te, “Ibperansang ku ve is hadì niw te krus?” Ne midtavak is menge punuan he memumuhat te, “Iyan dà hadì dey si Cesar!”
Ne zutun intug̵ut ni Pilatu he iransang si Jesus diyà te krus.
Ne is menge sundaru, mid-uwit dan si Jesus
ne migawas dan dutun te inged ne impetiang dan ki Jesus haazà is krus he edrensangan kandin. Midhendiyè dan te egngezanan te Tulan te Ulu. (Ne te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen egngezanan te Gulguta.)

Ne zutun inransang si Jesus te menge sundaru. Ne zuen pa zezuwa he inransang dan daan diyà te krus. Impasek dan is krus te sevaha ziyà te egkeg̵ivang, ne is sevaha, diyà te egkekewanan, ne ziyà te teliwazà si Jesus.
Duen insurat ni Gubirnedur Pilatu he impezeket dan dutun te zivavew te krus. Is menge lalag he insurat, edhenduen te, “Si Jesus he TigNeserit he Hadì te Menge Hudiyu.”

Mezakel he menge Hudiyu is nemekevasa zutun su uvey te inged he Hiruselim haazà is midrensangan ki Jesus. Tetelu he kineg̵iyan is kedsurata zutun: Linatin, kineg̵iyan he Gerisyahanen, wey kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen.

Ne zutun migkag̵i haazà is menge punuan he menge memumuhat diyà te ki Pilatu te, “Deyzey ke wazè nu pezem isurat is ‘Hadì te Menge Hudiyu.’ Iyan nu isurat is, ‘Migkag̵i heini is etew he hadì sikandin te menge Hudiyu.’ ”
Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, “Kenè en egkeilisan. Iyan en is insurat ku.”

Ne haazà is menge sundaru, hein ingkeransang dan en si Jesus diyà te krus, migkuwa zan is ugelingen din ne mibahin dan te heepat he vahin su wey zan pudu mekekuwa is menge sundaru zutun. Ne zuen kumbalè din he te kedhevela zutun wazè din pidtemuwan.

Ne tenged dutun migkag̵i is menge sundaru te, “Kenè tew ebindasen, kekenà, edripahan tew wey tew metueni ke hentei kenitew is ebpekeg̵aked.” Umba neulaula zan heini su egketuman kes netagnà dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat he edhenduen te,
“Mibahinbahin dan is ugelingen ku
ne midripahan dan is bisti ku.”
Ne neulaula haazà dutun te menge sundaru.
Ne zutun te uvey te krus ni Jesus, edhithitindeg is iney zin ne zutun daan sikan is suled he vahi te iney ni Jesus, wey si Maria kes esawa ni Kelupas, wey elin daan si Maria Megdelina.
Ne hein naahà ni Jesus is iney zin wey sikan is sumusundan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus, migkeg̵iyan din is iney zin te, “Inà, iyan en heeyan anak nu.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan din sikan is sumusundan din te, “Iyan en heeyan iney nu.” Ne puun dà dutun he andew ziyè en med-ubpà is iney ni Jesus te valey zutun te sumusundan ni Jesus.

Ne zutun netuenan ni Jesus he nepasad din en is langun he netagnà mehitenged kandin, ne migkag̵i te, “Egkemezahan a.” Ne pinaag̵i zutun netuman is netagnà dengan diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne zuen umuy zutun he nepenù te mepezes he inumen. Migkuwa zan is ispungha ne intereb dan dutun, ne midtiyuk dan haazà te zeisek he kayu he egngezanan te hisup, ne indiwalwal ziyà te vèbè ni Jesus.
Ne hein nesupsup ni Jesus haazà, migkag̵i te, “Nepasad ku en is langun.” Ne midungul ne zutun minatey.

Mahapun haazà ne iyan andew te kedteg̵anaha te Pista te Kedlevayi. Is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, midhendiyè dan te ki Pilatu ne midhangyù dan he ipepenlepui zin is menge paa zuen te impenransang te krus wey mebpematey su wey mehimu he ikeawà is menge lawa zan puun te krus te kenè pa Andew te Kedhimeley. Su haazà he Andew te Kedhimeley, utew mahal he andew ziyà te menge Hudiyu.
Ne midsug̵ù din is menge sundaru. Ne mibeyaan dan ne mibpenlepuan dan is menge paa zuen te sevaha he inransang duma ki Jesus, ne human dan sikan is sevaha pa.
Ne hein iyan en si Jesus, neehè dan he minatey en, umba, wazè dan en penlepui sikandin.
Iyan, is sevaha zutun te menge sundaru, mibpilak din te vangkew is tengkilizan ni Jesus ne zuen midtudà he ebpuun dutun he lengesa wey wahig.
Siak is midsurat kayi, edtistig̵usan ku he tutuu heini su neehè ku en. Netuenan ku he tutuu heini is insurat ku. Umba insurat ku su wey kew zaan meketuu.
Umba neulaula haazà su egketuman sikan is tagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Wazà minsan sevaha te menge tulan din he egkelepù.”
Wey zuen daan insurat he tagnà he edhenduen te, “Edtengtengan dan is etew he mibpilak dan.”

Ne hein nepasad haazà, si Jose he tig-Eremetiya, midhendiyà sikandin te ki Pilatu. (Ne haazà si Jose, sumusundan ni Jesus, iyan, meeles su egkehandek te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu.) Midhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus ne midtug̵utan ni Pilatu. Ne mibeyaan ni Jose is lawa ni Jesus ne mid-uwit din.
Ne si Nikudimu, sikan is nenumbaley ziyà te ki Jesus te sevaha he mezukilem, miduma zaan dutun. Duen mid-uwit din he kelimahan he kilu he pehemut he alus he midsehug̵an te pehemut he mira.
Ne migkuwa zan is lawa ni Jesus ne mibukusan dan te meputì he manggad ne inragkes dan dutun is menge pehemut sumalà is betasan te menge Hudiyu te kedleveng.
Ne ziyà te uvey te midrensangan ki Jesus duen lugar he mibpememulaan te kayu. Ne zuen dutun surung he penlevengà he sikan pa mepasad he wazè pa melevengi.
Ne g̵eina te egkezeg̵usu zan su iyan haazà andew te kedteg̵ana te pista, wey g̵eina te uvey zà daan dutun te midrensangan ki Jesus, ne zutun dan isavuk haazà is lawa zin.
Ne zutun te egkerkeriwaswas en te andew he Duminggu, midhendutun te surung he penlevengà si Maria Megdelina te kemulu pa merusirem. Neehè din he naawà kes batu he inlekeb dutun te g̵emawan te surung.

Ne tenged dutun, mibpelelag̵uy ne midhendiyà te ki Simon Pedro wey zuen te sevaha he sumusundan, sikan is mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus. Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan ni Maria te, “Is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, in-awè dan duen te midlevengan kandin ne wazè dey metueni ke hendei zan uwita.”
Ne migaanggaan si Pedro wey haazà is duma zin he sumusundan su edhendutun dan te surung.
Ne mibpelelag̵uy zan is dezuwa, iyan, nehunaan si Pedro zuen te zuma zin he sumusundan, ne nehuna he nekeuma zutun te surung he penlevengà.
Ne midtikintikin sikandin su edsinilingen din haazà is surung. Neehè din sikan is menge meputì he manggad he nekesavuk dutun, iyan, wazà sikandin medseled.
Ne zutun nekeuma si Simon Pedro is nehuziyan, ne midseled mulà sikandin. Neehè din daan kes menge meputì he manggad
ne elin daan neehè din kes penyuwilu he imbukus te ulu ni Jesus. Wazà heini iamur zutun te menge zuma he manggad su midlumpì ne nekesivey te nesevukan.

Ne zutun midseled daan sikan is sumusundan he nehuna he nekeuma. Neehè din daan haazà is langun, ne minsan pa te wazè dan pa metueni is menge insurat he tagnà he kinahanglan he ebenhawen si Jesus, midtuu sikandin dutun
Ne zutun mid-ulì haazà is dezuwa he sumusundan.
Ne si Maria mulà, kemulu pa sikandin dutun te g̵awas te surung is edsineg̵ew. Ne zutun te edsineg̵ew sikandin, edtikintikin is edsiniling dutun te surung.

Ne zutun neehè din is dezuwa he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he utew meputì is bisti zan. Ebpimpinuu zan dutun te nesevukan te lawa ni Jesus; haazà is sevaha, ne ziyà te egkeulunan ne is sevaha, diyà te egkesikuwayan.
Ne mid-insaan dan si Maria te, “Bayi, hengkey is idsineg̵ew nu?” Ne ke si Maria te, “Migkuwa te etew is lawa te Nengazen, ne wazè ku metueni ke hendei zan uwita!”
Ne zutun midlilingey sikandin ne neehè din si Jesus is edhithitindeg dutun, iyan, wazè din mekilala si Jesus.

Ne migkeg̵iyan ni Jesus te, “Bayi, hengkey is idsineg̵ew nu? Hentei is ebpen-ahaan nu?” Ne kunaan ni Maria ke iyan sikandin sikan is ed-elima te menge pinemula zutun, umba migkag̵i te, “Mama, ke iyan ka migkuwa te lawa zin, keg̵iya nu ke hendei nu isavuk su egkuwaan ku.”
Ne zutun migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Maria!” Ne mid-etuvang si Maria ne te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen migkeg̵iyan din si Jesus te, “Rebuni!” he ke và dà kenitew, “Menunudlù.”

Ne migkag̵i kandin si Jesus te, “Kenè ka kepkep dini su wazè e pa vetuna pehendiyà te Amey ku. Beyai nu is menge suled ku ne keg̵iya nu te, ‘Edhendiyà a te Amey ku, diyà te Megbevayè ku. Iyan daan sikandin Amey niw wey Megbevayè niw.’ ”
Ne mibeyaan ni Maria Megdelina sikan is menge sumusundan ne ke sikandin te, “Neehè ku is Nengazen tew,” ne zutun mibpenudtul zin haazà is migkag̵i ni Jesus.

Ne hein mezukilem dutun te andew he Duminggu, netig̵um haazà is menge sumusundan diyà te sevaha he valey he midlekevan dan su nahandek dan te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu. Ne netekewtekew zan te ziyà si Jesus te teliwazè dan ne ke sikandin te, “Berakat he mebmelinawen kew.”
Ne zutun impeehè din kandan is menge palì diyà te menge velad din wey ziyà te tengkilizan din. Ne utew nengelipey is menge sumusundan te kebpaahà kandan te Nengazen.
Ne mid-uman si Jesus megkag̵i ziyà te kandan te, “Mebmelinawen kew. Ne iring te midsug̵ù a te Amey tew he Megbevayà, edsug̵uen ku zaan sikiyu.”
Ne te nekag̵i zin heini midhiyupan din sikandan ne ke sikandin te, “Berakat he meulini kew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Ne tenged kayi emun ebpeseyluwen niw is minsan hentei he nekesalà, ebpeseyluwen daan te Megbevayà, ne emun kenè niw ebpeseyluwen, kenà daan ebpeseyluwen te Megbevayà.”
Ne si Tomas, he migngezanan te Sereping, sevaha sikandin dutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he mibpilì ni Jesus. Wazà sikandin dutun te mibpaahà kandan si Jesus.

Ne tenged dutun midtudtulan sikandin te menge zuma zin he sumusundan, ke sikandan te, “Mibpaahà kenami is Nengazen tew.” Iyan, migkag̵i si Tomas te, “Kenà a ebpeketuu he nevanhew sikandin emun kenè ku egkeahà is menge velad din he nepelian te ransang. Ne emun kenè ku egketiyukan te tezù ku is palì diyà te velad din wey ziyà te kilid din, kenà a ebpeketuu.”

Nekewalu pa zutun, nengetig̵um en maan haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus duen te netig̵uman dan ded he valey, ne zutun daan si Tomas. Midlekevan dan ded haazà is baley ne minsan pa zutun netekewtekew si Jesus mekehitindeg dutun te teliwazè dan. Ke sikandin te, “Berakat he mebmelinawen kew.”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan din si Tomas te, “Itiyuk nu kayi is tezù nu; is belad nu zaan, itiyuk nu kayi te kilid ku; ahaa nu is menge velad ku ne kenà ke en maan meduwazuwa, kekenà, tuu ka.”
Ne zutun midtavak si Tomas te, “Iyan ka Nengazen ku, iyan ka Megbevayè ku!”
Ne migkag̵i kandin si Jesus te, “Midtuu ke ve tenged dà te naahà a kenikew? Utew zeyzey sikandan is minsan wazà kedì mekeahà, iyan, edtuuwan e zan.”
(Duen mezakel he egkengein-inuwan he naahà te menge sumusundan ni Jesus he wazà ikesurat kayi te libru.

Ne iyan insurata ku kayi te menge egkein-inuwan su wey kew meketuu he iyan si Jesus Anak te Megbevayà wey sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, ne emun edtuu kew kandin ebeg̵ayan kew te untung he wazà pidtemanan.)
Netapus pa is nepipira he andew zutun, ne mid-uman mebpaahà si Jesus dutun te menge sumusundan din diyà te veyvey te ranew he Tibiryas. Ne iring kayi is hitavù te kebpeehè din kandan.

Dutun si Simon Pedro, wey si Tomas he migngezanan te Sereping, si Natanael he tigKana ziyà te Geliliya, wey elin daan dutun is dezuwa he anak ni Sibidiyu wey zuen daan dutun dezuwa pa he menge sumusundan ni Jesus.

Ne migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Ebpenlaya a te pait.” Ne migkag̵i haazà is menge zuma zin te, “Eduma key kenikew.” Ne mid-untud dan te avang ne mibpenlaya zan dutun te tivuuk he kezukileman, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeutel.
Ne hein egkepawè en dutun, dutun si Jesus te veyvey. Naahà sikandin te menge sumusundan, iyan, wazè dan mekilala he iyan bes si Jesus.
Ne migkag̵i ziyà te kandan si Jesus te, “He menge suled, duen be neutel niw?” Ne midtavak dan te, “Wazà.”

Ne ke si Jesus te, “Ilaya niw heeyan is laya ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ne ebpekeutel kew.” Ne in-uman dan ilaya haazà is laya ne hein mibuwat dan kenè dan egkehenat tenged te utew mezakel is neutel he pait.

Ne sikan is sumusundan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesus, migkag̵i sikandin diyà te ki Pedro te, “Iyan heeyan sikan is Nengazen tew.” Ne hein netuenan ni Pedro he iyan si Jesus haazà, insun-ud din is kumbalè din he midluwas din, ne mid-umpak diyà te wahig, ne midhendiyà te veyvey.
Ne haazà is menge zuma zin he sumusundan, midtelukun dan he ed-untud dutun te avang. Eguyuzen dan haazà is laya he nepenù te pait. Uvey zan dà te veyvey, menge kesiyawan dà he mitrus.
Ne hein nekezunggù dan, neehè dan is mid-ug-ug̵anga he menge vag̵a. Ne zuen dutun supas wey pait he intuug.
Ne migkag̵i kandan si Jesus te, “Uwita niw zini is duma he menge pait he neutel niw.”

Ne mibeyaan ni Simon Pedro haazà is avang ne miguyud din sikan is laya he nepenù te zezekelà he pait. Is kezakel zutun te pait ne nenggatus wey kelimahan wey tetelu. Ne minsan pa te utew mezakal haazà is pait, ne wazà mevindas haazà is laya.
Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Ramag kew en.” Ne wazà nekeaku kandan te menge sumusundan he ed-insà ke hentei sikandin su netuenan dan he iyan haazà kes Nengazen he si Jesus.
Ne migkuwa ni Jesus haazà is supas ne mibpenalad din kandan ne mibpenalad din daan haazà is nengelutù he pait.
Iketelu en haazà he kebpaahà ni Jesus dutun te menge sumusundan din hein nevanhew en sikandin.

Ne hein nekeramag dan en dutun, migkag̵i si Jesus diyà te ki Simon Pedro te, “Sikew Simon, he anak ni Juan, mahal e ve utew ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu, lavew te g̵ehinawa te menge zuma nu kedì?” Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Uya, netuenan nu he mahal ka zini te g̵ehinawa ku.”

Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Semaki nu is menge nati ku he kerehidu.” Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te, “Simon, anak ni Juan, mahal e ve utew ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu?” Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Uya, netuenan nu he mahal ka zini te g̵ehinawa ku.” Ne migkag̵i si Jesus te, “Bentayi nu is menge kerehidu ku.”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Jesus te iketelu te, “Simon, anak ni Juan, mahal e ve utew ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu?” Ne mibmesakit is gehinawa ni Pedro zutun te iketelu he ked-ul-uliti ni Jesus te, “Mahal e ve utew ziyan te g̵ehinawa nu?” Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Netuenan nu is langun; netuenan nu he mahal ka zini te g̵ehinawa ku.” Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin ni Jesus te, “Semaki nu is menge kerehidu ku.

Utew venar is egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew he zengan hein menguhed ke pa iyan ka mibakes te lawa nu ne sumalà ke hendei is egkesuatan nu ne zutun ka ebpevayà. Iyan, ke meg̵urang ke en ebpekererepa ka ne selakew he etew is ebagkes te lawa nu ne ed-uwiten ka zutun te kenè nu egkesuatan.”
(Umba migkag̵i ni Jesus heini su idtazem din is paag̵i te kebpatey ni Pedro he egkevantug din is Megbevayà.) Ne te nekag̵i ni Jesus heini, mid-uman megkag̵i te, “Sunud ka kediey.”

Ne zutun midlilingey si Pedro ne neehè din he edtinundug kandan sikan is sumusundan he pinedtayà ni Jesus. Iyan sikandin sikan is dutun te kedlavung dan te wazè pa mebpatey si Jesus, diyà sikandin te zurug ni Jesus. Iyan daan kes mid-insà ki Jesus te, “Hentei kenami is ed-akal kenikew?”
Ne hein naahà ni Pedro haazà he sumusundan, migkag̵i ziyà te ki Jesus te, “Haazà is duma ta, hengkey is egkeulaula kandin keuzemà?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Emun iyan ku egkesuatan he kemulu pa sikandin uuyag keuzemà dutun te kedlikù ku zini te kelibutan, wazè nu kelavet. Sunud ke zà kediey.”

Ne ziyà te langun he menge tumutuu nekeeneb is tudtul he kenà ebpatey haazà he sumusundan, iyan, wazà iyan keg̵iya ni Jesus kandin he kenè en ebpatey haazà he tumutuu su iyan migkag̵i zin is, “Emun iyan ku egkesuatan he uuyag pa keuzemà dutun te kedlikù ku, wazè nu kelavet.”
Iyan a haazà is sumusundan he egkeg̵iyen din; iyan a ebpenistig̵us he tutuu heini is langun; iyan a midsurat kayi te langun ne netuenan dey he tutuu heini is insurat ku.
Mezakel pa is mid-ulaula ni Jesus. Emun idsurat id-amin ne minsan is tivuuk he kelibutan, kenè pa ereg he egketeg̵uan te menge libru he edsuratan dutun.
Minahal he suled ku he Teofilo:
Diyà te nehuna he kegug̵uzi ku kenikew, insurat ku is langun he mibeelan wey is langun he impenurù ni Jesus egenat dà dutun te aney en sikandin mebpenurù

taman en te kebetuna kandin te Megbevayà pehendiyà te langit. Hein midhimetayan si Jesus ne nevanhew, mezakel is paag̵i te kebpaahaa zin te menge epustul te timaan he nevanhew en sikandin. Su seled te kepatan he andew zutun, layun sikandin ebpaahà kandan. Impenurù din kandan is kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ne te wazè pa sikandin betuna pehendiyà te langit, impenurù din daan pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is ebpeveelan din kandan te menge epustul he zaan he nepilì din.

Ne sengeandew te netig̵um dan, migkag̵i zin kandan he, “Kenè kew med-awà dini te inged he Hiruselim, kekenà, medtag̵ad kew taman te kenè pa ibeg̵ey keniyu kes impenaad te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Nekag̵i ku en heini keniyu he zaan.
Te timpu pa ni Juan, wahig is imbewtismu zin te menge etew. Iyan, mekepira zà guntaan iyan kebewtismuwi keniyu is: edlumunan is kada sevaha keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.”

Ne zuen timpu he nengetig̵um dan en maan. Ne mid-insaan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, “Nengazen, iyan en be heini sikan is timpu te kedtevangi nu kenami te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil su wey iulì dini te kenami he inged he Israyil kes daan he keg̵ehem dey he edhedian key te keugelingen dey he hadì?”
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, “Iyan dà is Amey tew he Megbevayà duen din keg̵ehem te kegketau ke keenu he timpu egketuman is ebeelan din, ne wazà itug̵ut keniyu is kegketueni kayi.

Iyan,” ke si Jesus, “ebeg̵ayan kew zin te g̵ehem emun egkelumunan kew en te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne is tudtul te keag̵i ku, idsangyew niw zini te Hiruselim wey id-eneb niw zini te prubinsya he Hudiya wey ziyà daan te prubinsya he Semarya wey minsan hendei zini te egketemanan te kelibutan.”

Ne te nekag̵i ni Jesus haazà, nevatun sikandin pehendiyà te langit. Ne te kemulu zan pa edlingahà su ed-ahaan dan is kegkevatun din, neelangan si Jesus te g̵apun ne naawà sikandin diyà te ked-ehè dan.
Ne te kemulu pa sikandan dutun edlingahà diyà te langit, mibpaahà kandan diyà te uvey zan is dezuwa he maama he ebpenganlag is ugelingen dan.

Ne migkag̵i heini is dezuwa te, “Sikiyu is menge tigGeliliya, maan is kemulu kew pa edlingahà diyà te langit? Heini si Jesus he neehè niw he nevatun pehendiyà te langit, keuzemè en edlikù dini te tanà, ne is kedlikù din, ne iring ded daan te kegkevatun din.”

Ne zutun mid-awà is menge epustul ziyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, ne mid-ulì dan diyà te inged he Hiruselim. (Haazà is buvungan, uvey zà te Hiruselim; sengekilumitru zà buwa is keziyù din.)

Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te Hiruselim, mid-ulì dan diyà te rug̵u he zivavew ziyà te valey he dus endanas he ubpeey zan. Iyan heini ensi Pedro, si Juan, si Santiago, si Andres, si Felipe, si Tomas, si Bartolome, si Mateo, si Santiago he anak ni Alfeo, si Simon Siluti, wey si Hudas he anak ni Santiago.
Is langun kandan, nesevaha is gehinawa zan te ked-ampù diyà te Megbevayà ne midtampu zaan is menge vahi. Elin dutun si Maria sikan is iney ni Jesus wey is menge hazi ni Jesus.
Ne nekepira zutun, nengetig̵um is menge tumutuu, menge nenggatus wey keluwaan sikandan is mibpetemtempuwà dutun; ne midhitindeg si Pedro is egkag̵i te,

“Menge suled, kenà egkehimu he kenà egketuman kes netagnà he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Dengan mid-ulinan si David te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne netagnè din si Hudas kes mibpalad ki Jesus diyà te edakep kandin.
Si Hudas, duma tew he epustul, su insarig daan diyà te kandin is ebpeveelan kenitew te Nengazen,” ke si Pedro.
(Ne si Hudas, impemasa zin te tanà kes insuhul kandin tenged te kelelalung din ne neulug sikandin ne nekelangkeb ne mibetu is getek din ne nekepeyapat is bituka zin.
Ne hein netuenan heini te menge tigHiruselim, migngezanan dan haazà is tanà te Ekildama he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, tanà he nepemasa te selapì he imbayad te kedhimetayi te etew.)
Ne ke si Pedro te, “Insurat dengan kes netagnà diyà te libru te menge Salmu he edhenduen te,
‘Ewai niw is ed-ubpaan din;
kinahanglan he wazè en ed-ubpà dutun.’
Duen daan insurat he lalag he edhenduen te,
‘Sikan is ebpeveelan kandin,
ipeveeli niw te zuma.’

Ne tenged dutun,” ke si Pedro, “kinahanglan he ebpilien is sevaha he ebpekeuman kenitew te sepulù wey sevaha he epustul. Kinahanglan he zuma tew zengan dutun te kebpekiduma tew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, puun pa te kebpemewtismu ni Juan taman en te kebetuna ki Jesus pehendiyà te langit, su kinahanglan he ebpeketampu kenitew te kebpenistig̵us te kegkevanhew ni Jesus,” ke si Pedro.
Ne mibpilian dan is dezuwa he maama, si Jose Hustu wey si Matias. (Is sevaha he ngazan kayi te si Jose ne si Bersabas.)

Ne zutun in-ampù sikandan eni Pedro ke sikandan te, “Nengazen, iyan ka nesayud ke hengkey is diyà te g̵ehinawa te minsan hentei. Ne g̵untaan ipeehè nu kenami ke hendei zapit kayi te zezuwa is nepilì nu
he mehimu he epustul he id-ilis ki Hudas. Su si Hudas, mid-engkezan din kes mibpeveelan kandin ne midhendiyè en te hustu he ed-ulian din.”
Ne hein nepasad dan te ed-ampù midripa zan haazà is dezuwa ne iyan neripahan si Matias, ne nehimu sikandin he sevaha te menge epustul iring dutun te sepulù wey sevaha.
Ne hein andew en te pista he egngezanan te Pintikusti nevurun kes langun he menge tumutuu ziyà te sevaha he valey.

Ne netekewtekew zan te zuen utew mezag̵ing he nezineg dan he ebpuun diyà te langit he henduen be te edselenuhug he utew mevendes he keramag. Ne haazà is dag̵ing, midsagkung dutun te seled te valey he nevurunan dan.
Ne zutun nengeehè dan is henduen be te menge regreg te hapuy he nekedsisiveysivey he nemekeuntud te kada sevaha kandan.
Ne mibpurungan ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is kada sevaha kandan, ne netekewtekew zan pintezi te menge kineg̵iyan he kenè dan egketuenan sumalà is gehem he imbeg̵ey kandan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Duen menge Hudiyu ziyà te Hiruselim he ziyà ebpemuun te minsan hendei he inged dini te tungkup te kelibutan ne menge metinumanen sikandan te sug̵ù te Megbevayà.

Ne hein nezineg dan haazà is mezag̵ing, nerivurun sikandan dutun. Ne utew zan nengeinuinu su is kada sevaha zutun te menge etew he nerivurun, egkezineg din is kandin he keugelingen he kineg̵iyan he egkekag̵i zutun te menge tumutuu.
Netik-awan dan ne nengeinuinu zan ne mibpein-inseey zan te, “Hengkey vuwa heini? Menge tigGeliliya is egkag̵i.
Ne maan is egkezineg ta is kegkag̵i zan he iyan egkeg̵amit dan is kineg̵iyan te kada sevaha kenitew?
Su zuen kayi te menge zuma tew menge tigPartya, menge tigMidya, wey menge tig-Ilam. Ne is duma kenitew, diyà ebpemuun te Misuputamya. Duen daan tigHudiya, tigKepedusya, tigPuntu, tig-Asya,

menge tigPrigya, menge tigPempilya, menge tig-Ihiptu wey ebpemuun te menge inged diyà te Libya he uvey te Sirini. Ne zuen daan dini minsan menge tigRuma he menge Hudiyu wey kenà menge Hudiyu he nemeketuu zaan te tinuuwan te menge Hudiyu.

Duen daan menge tigKrita wey menge tig-Erabya. Ne minsan pa te kenà ebpeked-iiring is kineg̵iyan tew, is kada sevaha kenitew, nesavut din is egkeg̵iyen su kandin he keugelingen he kineg̵iyan is egkeg̵amit kayi te menge tigGeliliya. Ne impesavut dan kenitew is utew meupiya he egkein-inuwan he vaal te Megbevayà,” ke sikandan.
Ne is langun he menge etew zutun, utew zan nengeinuinu, su wazè dan mesavut haazà is nehitavù. Ne kenà egkerintas is kebpein-inseey zan he egkag̵i te, “Hengkey vuwa heini?”
Ne is duma kandan, edsumpeliten dan haazà is menge tumutuu he egkag̵i zan te, “Egkengelangut heeyan!”

Ne zutun midhitindeg si Pedro ne midhitindeg daan haazà is menge zuma zin he sepulù wey sevaha he epustul. Ne mibpekezesen sikandin he egkag̵i te, “Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu wey langun niw te menge meg̵inged dini te Hiruselim, pemineg kew wey niw mesavut is egkeg̵iyen ku.
Kunaan niw ke egkengelangut heini is menge zuma ku. Iyan, kenà egkehimu su liwazè pa he ebpemenahik is andew.
Iyan heini kes netagnà dengan te ebpeneuven dengan he si Joel, su ke sikandin te,
‘Migkag̵i is Megbevayà te,
“Keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu, sikiyu is tivuuk he menusiyà,
ibpelumun ku keniyu is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Ne zutun ebpeneuven is menge anak niw he maama
wey is anak niw he vahi ne ibpesavut dan te menge etew is lalag ku.
Duen menge menguhed he ebpuwasan ku is id-ehè dan
wey zan maahà is kenà egkeahà te zuma.
Ne zuen menge meg̵urang
he edhimuwen ku he menge meneneg̵einep.
Su sikan is menge sulug̵uen ku,” ke sikandin,
“menge vahi se maama, ibpelumun ku kandan keuzemà is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin
ne ebpeneuven ku sikandan
ne ibpesavut dan te menge etew is lalag ku.
Ne zuen menge egkengein-inuwan he singyal he ibpeehè ku
ziyà te langit wey ziyan daan te lumpad.
Egkeahà is lengesa wey hapuy wey zekelà he evel.
Siak is Nengazen,
te kenè pa keuzemà egkeuma is nevantug he andew te kedsiluti ku te menusiyà,
ebmerusirem is andew ne ebmerig̵à is bulan he iring te lengesa.
Ne zutun he timpu,
is minsan hentei he ebpehizuhizu kediey te Nengazen,
edlibriyen ku sikandin te silut.” ’ ”

Ne mid-uman megkag̵i si Pedro te, “Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he kevuwazan ni Israyil, pemineg̵a niw is egkeg̵iyen ku. Si Jesus, kes tigNeserit, sug̵ù sikandin te Megbevayà. Impesavut kenitew te Megbevayà he sug̵ù din si Jesus pinaag̵i te g̵ehem din wey menge egkein-inuwan wey menge singyal he mibpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà. Netuenan niw en heini is egkeg̵iyen ku su neulaula heini is langun dini te inged niw.

Ne heini si Jesus, impalad te etew keniyu. Ne zaan he netuenan heini te Megbevayà su iyan imbanglis din ki Jesus. Impehimetayan niw sikandin te menge etew he kenà ed-azap te Megbevayà. Ne inransang dan te krus.
Iyan, midlibri si Jesus te Megbevayà ne mibanhew zin su kenà egkehimu he egkevakus si Jesus te kemetayen.
Netagnà dengan ni Hadì David is migkag̵i ni Jesus su ke sikandin te,
‘Layun ku egkeahà he edumahan a te Nengazen
su kenà sikandin ed-awà kayi te zapit
te egkekewanan ku,
umba kenà a egkesemukan.
Tenged kayi ne utew meupiya is gehinawa ku
ne melipayen is kegkag̵i ku.
He Nengazen, idsarig ku kenikew is lawa ku
su netuenan ku he kenè nu ebpesegdanen
is gimukud ku ziyà te Iveyaan.
Siak is metinumanen he sulug̵uen nu,
netuenan ku zaan he kenè nu idtug̵ut
he meredak is lawa ku.
Impeehè nu kediey sikan is ibayà
pehendiyà te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Emun layun ka zuma ku,
utew zekelà is kediey he kelipey.’

Ne impelaus ni Pedro haazà is egkeg̵iyen din, ke sikandin te, “Menge suled ku, netuenan tew he sikan is tipehuna he hadì tew he si David dengan, neug̵et en he minatey wey inleveng ne wazè pa mahanew is leveng din.

Ne si David, geina te mibpenaub te Megbevayà, nesavut din ke hengkey is impenaad kandin te Megbevayà su si David, iyan penaad kandin te Megbevayà is: keuzemà duen kevuwazan din he egkehimu he hadì he iring kandin.
Ne g̵eina te netuenan ni David he iyan heini ebeelan te Megbevayà, netagnè din is kebenhawa ki Kristu, sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì su ke si David te,
‘Wazà sikandin pesegdana te Megbevayà diyà te Iveyaan, ne wazà daan meredak is lawa zin.’ ”
Ne ke si Pedro te, “Iyan egkeg̵iyen din si Jesus he mibanhew te Megbevayà. Ne is langun te sikami, ebpeketistig̵us key he nevanhew su neehè en te menge mata zey.

Midtulus en si Jesus ne impepinuu en diyà te lavew he pinuuwà diyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà, ne imbeg̵ey kandin te Amey tew he Megbevayà is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he impesarig din kandin. Umba nengeehè niw wey nengezineg niw g̵untaan heini is langun he egkein-inuwan su ebpuun te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te netagnà ni David wazè din iyan keg̵iya is kandin he lawa su wazà iyan si David tulusa te Megbevayà pehendiyà te langit. Duen selakew pa he insurat he lalag ni David he ke sikandin te,
‘Migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku,
ke sikandin te,
“Dini ke zè pa pinuu
te zapit te egkekewanan ku
taman te kenè ku pa
ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew
is menge kuntada nu.’’ ’
Na,” ke si Pedro, “kinahanglan he edsevuten tew te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he si Jesus, sikan is inransang niw te krus, midhimu en te Megbevayà he Nengazen wey hadì tew te langun.”
Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge etew utew zan nekedsendit. Ne ke sikandan diyà te ki Pedro wey te menge zuma zin he epustul te, “Menge suled, ebmenumenu key?”

Ne midtavak si Pedro te, “Kada sevaha keniyu, iniyug̵i zin is mezaat he ulaula zin ne mebpebewtismu wey metueni he ebpekidsevaha sikandin ki Jesu Kristu. Ne human egkepesaylu is menge salè din ne is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ibeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà.

Su sikitew wey is menge kevuwazan tew, iyan mibpenaazan te Megbevayà te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne kenà iyan kiw zà mibpenaazan kayi, kekenà, elin daan sikan is menge etew he ziyà ed-ubpà te meziyù, is minsan hentei he edhimuwen te Nengazen tew he Megbevayà he meketuu kandin.”
Ne mezakel he menge ketezengan is insambag ni Pedro kandan, ke sikandin te, “Likayi niw is limas te Megbevayà kayi te menge etew g̵untaan he memezaat is ulaula.”
Ne zutun, mezakel is nemeketuu te impesavut kandan ni Pedro ne mibpebewtismu sikandan. Ne zutun he andew neumanan kes menge tumutuu te tetelu he libu.

Ne te kada andew ebpemineg dan te ibpenurù kandan te menge epustul. Mibpekid-upakat dan te langun he menge tumutuu ne mibeelan dan te tedeman is kebpatey ni Jesus pinaag̵i te kegkaan te supas ne layun dan ed-ampù.
Mezakel is menge egkein-inuwan wey singyal he nehimu pinaag̵i te menge epustul, umba neteg̵uan is menge etew te kegkehandek te Megbevayà.
Mezesen is kebpekid-upakat te menge tumutuu. Sikan is duen azen din, mibeg̵ayan din daan is menge zuma zin.
Imbelegyè dan is menge azen dan wey menge tanà ne is halin dutun, ne mibpenalad dan diyà te langun he menge zuma zan sumalà is kinahanglan te kada sevaha.

Ne kada andew edtig̵um is langun he menge tumutuu zuen te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne egkesevaha zan daan he utew melipayen te kegkaan dan dutun te menge valey zan wey kebpevegbeg̵ayè dan.

Ne nekezalig dan te Megbevayà ne egkengetahud sikandan te minsan hentei. Ne te kada andew zutun duen menge etew he ebpeketuu. Ne is langun dutun, edlibriyen te Megbevayà wey kenè din en sikandan mesiluti ne haazà nemekeuman te menge tumutuu.
Ne sengeandew te zutun he timpu mibpezumahà si Pedro wey si Juan is edtekezeg pehendiyà te Valey te Megbevayà su uras en te ked-ampù su liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew.

Ne zuen lilimusan dutun he puun pa te ked-enaka kandin kenè en ebpekehipanew. Kada andew ed-uwiten sikandin te menge zuma zin ne idsavuk dan diyà te uvey te pultahan te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà, sikan is pultahan he egngezanan te Mekempet. Iyan idsevuka kandin dutun su wey mekevuyù te limus diyà te menge etew he edseled dutun te simbahan.
Ne hein neehè din si Pedro wey si Juan is edseled dutun te simbahan, mibuyuan din te limus.
Ne midtengtengan sikandin ni Pedro wey ni Juan ne ke si Pedro te, “He Mama, ahaa key kenikew.”
Ne midlingehè din sikandan su kunaan din ke zuen selapì he ibeg̵ey kandin.
Ne migkag̵i si Pedro te, “Wazè ku naazen he vulawan wey selapì, iyan, is naazen ku, ibeg̵ey ku kenikew. Tenged te g̵ehem te ngazan ni Jesu Kristu he tigNeserit, ebpekehipanew ka!”
Ne zutun migewezan ni Pedro is kewanan he velad dutun te kenà ebpekehipanew ne mid-enew zin. Ne zutundutun neteg̵uan te zesen is menge paa zutun te etew.
Ne midtik-ew medhitindeg ne midhipanew ne miduma kandan te edseled dutun te simbahan he se mekelinglingketew ne se mekelangkadlangkad he edalig te Megbevayà.
Ne is langun he menge etew zutun he nekeahà kandin te edlangkadlangkad he edalig te Megbevayà,
ne nekilala zan he iyan kes lilimusan he ziyà ebpimpinuu te uvey te simbahan duen te pultahan he egngezanan te Mekempet. Ne utew zan nengeinuinu zutun te kegkeulii kandin.

Ne te kemulu pa sikandin ebpaag̵ak ki Pedro wey ki Juan, nengevurun is langun he menge etew he zutun, ne mibpelelag̵uy ne midlig̵uy kandan su nengeinuinu zan. Ne ziyà sikandan te uvey te simbahan dutun te helungà he egngezanan te Helungà ni Sulumun.

Ne hein naahà haazà ni Pedro, migkeg̵iyan din haazà is menge etew te, “Menge kezuzumahi ku he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, maan is igkeinuinu niw utew heini? Maan is edtengtengan key keniyu? Kunaan niw vuwa ke pinaag̵i te kenami en he g̵ehem wey ke tenged be te wazè dey salà, ne neulian dey heini wey mekehipanew.

Is Megbevayà he ed-ezapen te menge kepuun tew he si Abraham, si Isaak, wey si Hakub, midtulus din is sulug̵uen din he si Jesus. Ne te wazè pa sikandin tulusa, impalad niw ziyà te menge punuan ne midsumpalit niw ziyà te etuvangan ni Gubirnedur Pilatu. Ne si Pilatu, edlibriyen din pezem si Jesus,
iyan, sikiyu, wazè niw mesuati sikandin is wag̵as he wazà kandin he mezaat he ulaula. Midhangyù kew he iyan libriya ni Pilatu kes teremunù he nepirisu.
Ne sikan is puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan, midhimetayan niw, iyan, mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà. Ebpeketistig̵us key he nevanhew en si Jesus su neehè dey.

Ne iyan nekeulì kayi te kenà ebpekehipanew is gehem te ngazan ni Jesus. Heini is etew he kilala niw he neehè niw g̵untaan, tenged te kedtuu zey ki Jesus neulian heini kayi te etuvangan niw su nekesarig key te g̵ehem te ngazan ni Jesus.
Ne g̵untaan menge suled, netuenan ku he sikiyu wey is menge punuan tew, mibeelan niw is mezaat diyà te ki Jesus tenged te wazè niw mesavut ke hentei sikandin.
Impesavut dengan te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te tagnà te ebpemeneuven din he edresayen te menge etew is mibpilì din he ibpahadì. Ne midhimu zin he metuman heini pinaag̵i te mid-ulaula niw.

Ne g̵untaan kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an tew en is memezaat he ulaula. Ed-empuan tew is Nengazen ne ebpeseyluwen kiw zin te menge salè tew. Ne zutun duen timpu he ebeg̵ayan is gehinawa tew te zesen he ziyà ebpuun te kandin.
Ne edsug̵uen din dini te kenitew si Jesus he iyan kes mibpilì din he ibpahadì kenitew.
Diyè pa si Jesus ebpekeubpà te langit taman te kenè pa edhimuwen te Megbevayà he veg̵u is minsan hengkey sumalà te netagnà dengan pinaag̵i te ebpemeneuven din.

Migkag̵i si Moises dengan te, ‘Is Megbevayè tew he Nengazen te langun, edsug̵uen din dini te keniyu is ebpeneuven din iring te kedsug̵ua zin kedì. Ne haazà is edsug̵uen din, duma tew zaan he Hudiyu. Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is minsan hengkey he sug̵ù din keniyu.
Ne sikan is kenà ebpemineg kandin te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenè en sikandin idragkes te menge etew he ed-ulinan te Megbevayà,’ ke si Moises dengan.
Ne is menge zuma he ebpemeneuven dengan he ebpemenagnà,” ke si Pedro, “iring ki Samuel wey is nemekesunud kandin, netagnè dan daan is egkengeulaula g̵untaan.

Ne zuen impenaad te Megbevayà dengan pinaag̵i te ebpemeneuven din. Ne iyan kiw is menge Hudiyu sikan is mibpenaazan dengan te Megbevayà te langun he meupiya he idtuvad din. Umba ebpekeambit kiw zaan te impenaad dengan te Megbevayà diyà te menge kepuun tew, su migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham te, ‘Pinaag̵i te kevuwazan nu edtuvazan ku te meupiya is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan.’

Umba,” ke si Pedro, “hein midsug̵ù te Megbevayà is sulug̵uen din he si Jesus, impehuna zin ipehendini te kenitew te menge Hudiyu su wey kiw zin metevangi pinaag̵i te kebpeengkezi zin kenitew te memezaat he ulaula tew.”
Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkag̵i si Pedro wey si Juan diyà te menge etew, mibeyaan sikandan te menge memumuhat wey te kepitan te guwardya ziyà te simbahan wey elin daan is menge Sedusiyu.
Ne heini is menge punuan, neepesan dan is penurù eni Pedro te menge etew su impenurù ni Pedro he is kegkevanhew ni Jesus, iyan timaan he egkengevanhew keuzemà is menge etew.
Ne midakep dan si Pedro wey si Juan ne g̵eina te mahapun en utew, mibpirisu zan su idtag̵ad dan taman te egkepawà.
Ne minsan pa zutun, neketuu is mezakel he nekepemineg engki Pedro. Ne tenged dutun is kezakel te menge maama zutun te nemeketuu ki Jesus ne migawhat te lelima he libu.
Ne hein nepawà nengetig̵um diyà te inged he Hiruselim is menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey is menge ebmeg̵urangen wey is menge zuma pa he punuan he menge Hudiyu.
Ne elin daan dutun si Anas, is lavew he memumuhat wey si Keyipas wey si Juan wey si Alejandro wey menge zuma pa he mesipeg he kezuzumahi ni Anas.
Ne impeetuvang dan si Pedro wey si Juan, ne mid-insaan dan te, “Hengkey heini he g̵ehem is ingkeulii kayi te kenà ebpekehipanew, ne hentei is mibeg̵ey keniyu kayi te g̵ehem?”
Ne zutun midtavak si Pedro is nepurung ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ke sikandin te, “Sikiyu is menge punuan wey ebmeg̵urangen dey,
emun iyan niw id-insà kenami ke mibmenumenu zey is meupiya he midhimu zey kayi te kenà ebpekehipanew, ne emun iyan niw zaan id-insà ke hengkey he g̵ehem is ingkeulii kandin,

ne sikiyu wey is langun he menge zuma ku he kevuwazan ni Israyil, kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini. Su heini is etew he zini te etuvangan niw, neulian sikandin pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te ngazan ni Jesu Kristu he tigNeserit. Heini si Jesus, inransang niw te krus ne minatey, iyan, mibanhew te Megbevayà.
Iyan si Jesus kes batu he netagnà te insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
‘Sikan is batu he himan te valey,
mid-engkezan niw te menge pandey
su kunaan niw ke wazè din pulus.
Iyan, nehimu en heini g̵untaan he vatu
he iyan dà igkepurungi te valey.’
Iyan dà si Jesus ebpekelibri te silut kenitew,” ke si Pedro, “su zini te tivuuk he kelibutan wazè en duma pa he ngazan he etew he ebpemeleveg he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun, haazà is menge punuan he menge Hudiyu, hein neehè dan he kenà egkehandek si Pedro wey si Juan he egkag̵i wey hein netuenan dan he kenà metikang is netunghaan dutun te zezuwa ne kenà metikang is pid-etawan dan, ne nengeinuinu zan. Ne human dan dutun mekilala he menge zuma zengan ni Jesus si Pedro wey si Juan.
Ne edsumpeliten dan pezem haazà is egkein-inuwan he mid-ulaula eni Pedro, iyan, geina te zutun daan kes etew he neulian wazè en egkekag̵i zan.
Umba, dutun te rug̵u he netig̵uman dan migkeg̵iyan dan ensi Pedro he med-awè dan dè pa. Ne zutun mibitiyara zan, ke sikandan te,
“Ebmenmenuwen tew heini is menge etew su venar man iyan he egkein-inuwan is nehimu zan, ne nevantug en heini zini te tivuuk he inged he Hiruselim ne kenè tew egkevarew.
Edewayen tew nasì sikandan he kenè dan en maan ipenurù is kedtuu te ngazan ni Jesus diyà te minsan hentei su wey kenà mekeeneb heini is ibpenurù dan diyà te menge etew.”
Ne zutun impelikù dan ensi Pedro ne mibpelihandek dan ne migkeg̵iyan dan te, “Kenè niw en maan ipenurù is kedtuu te ngazan ni Jesus.”

Ne midtavak si Pedro wey si Juan te, “Isipa niw ke hendei zapit is egkesuatan te Megbevayà kayi te zezuwa he paag̵i: ke edtumanen dey ve is sug̵ù niw he kenè dey ibpenurù is ngazan ni Jesus, wey ke edtumanen dey is ebpeveelan kenami te Megbevayà.
Kenà egehimu he kenè dey idsangyew is nezineg dey wey is neehè dey,” ke si Pedro.

Iyan, impaawè ded sikandan ne mibeleuzan dan he kenà ipesangyew. Ne haazà is menge ebmeg̵urangen, wazè dan neisip he paag̵i te kedsiluti kandan su nahandek dan te menge etew. Is langun he menge etew, midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te egkein-inuwan he nehimu,
su kes etew he neulian, subre en he kepatan he tuig is keg̵urang din, umba nengeinuinu is menge etew.
Ne zutun hein impeg̵uwè en si Pedro wey si Juan, mid-ulì dan diyà te menge zuma zan he tumutuu. Ne mibpenudtul zan haazà is imbelaud kandan te menge punuan he menge memumuhat wey menge ebmeg̵urangen.

Ne is menge tumutuu, hein nezineg dan haazà, ne mid-amur-amur zan te ked-ampù. Ne iyan heini ked-ampù dan, ke sikandan te, “Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun, nenlimbag ka te langit wey tanà wey zag̵at wey is langun he tag̵ù kayi.
Iyan ka kes nekekag̵i zengan pinaag̵i te kepuun dey he sulug̵uen nu he si Hadì David, su mid-ulinan sikandin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne nekag̵i zin he,
‘Maan is utew nengepauk is menge etew
he kenà menge Hudiyu,
wey maan is ebpekeisip sikandan te wazè din pulus?
Su migkayew en is menge hadì dini te kelibutan
wey nengetig̵um is menge punuan
su edtebeken dan is Nengazen wey egkuntedahan dan
is mibpilì din he hadì.’

Na,” ke sikandan is ed-ampù te, “netuman en kes migkag̵i nu su zini te Hiruselim mid-uyun is menge Hudiyu wey is kenà menge Hudiyu su si Hadì Hirudis wey si Gubirnedur Pilatu, nesevaha zan he ebpekigkuntada ki Jesus he pinilì nu he sulug̵uen he ibpahadì nu.
Ne mid-uyunan dan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan diyà te kandin sumalà is imbanglis nu he meulaula zan.
Ne ahaa nu man guntaan, Nengazen, is menge pelihandek dan kenami. Iveg̵ey nu kenami g̵untaan te menge sulug̵uen nu is kevurut wey key kenà mahandek te kedsangyew te lalag nu.
Ipelepew nu is gehem nu su wey zey meulii is egkengezeruwan, wey zuen daan menge egkein-inuwan wey singyal he igkepeehè dey pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te ngazan ni Jesus he pinilì nu he sulug̵uen nu.”

Ne hein nekeampù dan, ne neg̵ezam dan he egkehuyung haazà is baley he netig̵uman dan. Ne mibpurungan ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is kada sevaha kandan, ne wazè dan ikehandek is kedsengyawa zan te Lalag te Megbevayà.

Mezesen is kebpekid-upakat te menge tumutuu su nesevaha zà is isip dan wey g̵ehinawa zan. Wazà minsan sevaha kandan he mid-isip din is menge azen din he iyan dà sikandin ebpehimulus, kekenà, mid-isip dan he sevaha zan dà te azen.
Ne is menge epustul, utew zekelà is gehem he imbeg̵ey kandan te kedtistig̵us he nevanhew is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne zekelà daan is kedtuvazi te Megbevayà te langun kandan te nemeketuu ki Jesus.
Ne is minsan hentei kandan, kenà edlised te minsan hengkey su is duma zan he zuen din tanà wey ke valey ve, ibelegyè din
ne ibeg̵ey zin is halin dutun diyà te menge epustul ne ebeg̵ayan te menge epustul is minsan hentei he edlised.

Ne zuen duma zan he tigSipru he Hudiyu zaan he kevuwazan duen te tipehuna he si Levi. Iyan ngazan din si Jose ne migeraran te menge epustul ki Bernabe he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, ebpekeveg̵ey te kezesen te kedtuu.
Ne zuen tanà ni Bernabe, ne imbelegyè din haazà. Ne imbeg̵ey zin is halin dutun diyà te menge epustul.
Ne zuen maama zutun he egngezanan ki Eneniyas. Is esawa zin, egngezanan ki Sepira. Imbelegyè din is tanè dan,
iyan, midtipig̵an din is bahin dutun te halin. Ne haazà, ingkesuat daan te esawa zin. Ne is wazè din tipig̵i, mid-uwit din ne imbeg̵ey zin te menge epustul,
Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin ni Pedro te, “Eneniyas, maan is ebpevayàbayè ka ki Setanas su edlimbungan niw is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su kenè niw id-amin is selapì.

Te wazè niw pa ivelegyà, kenè be keniyu he tanà? Ne minsan dutun te ingkevelegyè niw en, kenè be keniyu pa he vayàbayà is selapì? Ne maan is neisip niw heini is mezaat he ulaula? Kenà etew zà is edlimbungan niw, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà.”
Ne te kegkezineg̵a ni Eneniyas kayi he lalag,
Ne te menge tetelu he uras dutun nekeuma is esawa ni Eneniyas. Wazè din pa metueni is nehitavù ki Eneniyas.
Ne mid-insà si Pedro te, “He Bayi, heini is selapì, iyan dè be heini nezawat niw te kebelegyaa niw te tanè niw?” Ne midtavak haazà is bahi te, “Es, uya, iyan dà heeyan.”

Ne migkag̵i en maan si Pedro te, “Maan is mid-uyunan niw he ebpenggezaman niw is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin? Ebpekeume en maan kes menge maama he midleveng te esawa nu. Ne ed-uwiten ke zan daan su idleveng ka.”
Ne zutundutun nepiley si Sepira ne minatey. Ne hein nekeseled haazà is menge maama ne neehè dan sikandin he minatey. Ne mid-uwit dan ne inleveng dan diyà te zurug te leveng te esawa zin.
Ne tenged dutun utew en nengehandek is langun he menge tumutuu wey minsan hentei he nekezineg dutun te neulaula.
Ne is menge epustul, mezakel is menge singyal wey egkein-inuwan he impeehè dan te menge etew. Ne is langun he menge tumutuu, diyè dan layun egketig̵um te egngezanan te Helungà ni Hadì Sulumun.
Ne is kenà menge tumutuu, kenà edtampu kandan su egkengehandek, asal is langun he tigHiruselim, edtehuzen dan is menge tumutuu.
Ne layun ed-iseg is kegkeumani te menge tumutuu. Ne tenged dutun utew zan en mezakel is menge maama wey vahi he nemeketuu te Nengazen he si Jesus.

Ne tenged te menge egkein-inuwan he nehimu te menge epustul, mid-uwit te menge etew is menge egkengezeruwan ne impenavuk dan diyà te kilid te menge kersada he impemehizeg̵à diyà te menge ikam wey hizeg̵aan dan su wey melembungi sikandan te alung ni Pedro ke edsag̵ad.

Ne is menge meg̵inged te menge inged he ziyà te uvey te Hiruselim, midhendiyè dan te Hiruselim is ebpemen-uwit te menge egkengezeruwan wey ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne nengeulian is langun kandan.
Ne zutun he timpu, is lavew he memumuhat wey menge zuma zin he menge Sedusiyu, utew zan nengesina zutun te menge epustul. Ne midwaleng dan dà
ne midakep dan is menge epustul ne mibpirisu zan.
Ne zutun te mezukilem, netekewtekew puwasi te velinsug̵uen te Nengazen haazà is pirisuwan ne impaawè din dutun is menge epustul
ne migkeg̵iyan din sikandan te, “Hendiyè kew te Valey te Megbevayà ne ipenurù niw te langun he menge etew heini is beg̵u he untung.”
Ne hein nepawà dutun, midhendiyè dan te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenurù dan.

Ne nekeuma zutun te simbahan is lavew he memumuhat wey menge zuma zin, ne mibpenenawag haazà is lavew he memumuhat he medtig̵um is menge ebmeg̵urangen wey is menge punuan te menge Hudiyu, ne zuen daan midsug̵ù din diyà te pirisuwan su ebpeveyaan sikan is menge epustul.
Ne hein nekeuma ziyà te pirisuwan haazà is menge pulis, wazè dan naahà. Ne midlikù dan ne midtudtul zan ke hengkey is nehitavù, ke sikandan te,
“Hein nekeuma key ziyà te pirisuwan, neehè dey he nepurungan melekevi is gemawan ne is menge vantey, dutun dan te uvey te g̵emawan, iyan, te kebpuwas dey wazè dey naahà diyà te seled,” ke sikandan.
Ne hein nezineg haazà te kepitan te guwardya ziyà te simbahan wey te menge punuan he memumuhat, neked-iinseey zan ke hendei vuwa is menge epustul.
Ne zutun duen midseled he etew he egkag̵i te, “Sikan is mibpirisu niw, kayi zan te simbahan is ebpenurù te menge etew.”

Ne zutun mibeyaan haazà is menge epustul zutun te kepitan wey menge pulis ne mid-uwit dan sikandan diyà te menge punuan, ne wazà bug̵ela zutun te pulis haazà is menge epustul su nahandek dan te menge etew su kela ke tulenga sikandan te vatu.
Ne hein nekeuma zan en, in-etuvang dan haazà is menge epustul ziyà te menge punuan. Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan dutun te lavew he memumuhat,

ke sikandin te, “Imbelaud dey keniyu he kenè niw ipenurù is kedtuu te ngazan ni Jesus. Ne hengkey heini is mid-ulaula niw? Insangyew niw is penurù niw zini te tivuuk he Hiruselim ne kenà taman dà kayi is mid-ulaula niw, kekenà, iyan key pa keniyu ebesulan te kedhimetayi ki Jesus.”
Ne zutun midtavak si Pedro wey is duma he menge epustul te, “Kinahanglan he edtumanen dey is sug̵ù te Megbevayà kenà is menge sug̵ù he mibeelan te etew.
Mibunù niw si Jesus su inransang niw te krus, iyan, is Megbevayà he edsimbahan te menge kepuun tew, mibanhew zin si Jesus.

Ne midtulus din en ne ziyè en sikandin te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà. Sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, egalen tew sikandin wey iyan kenitew edlibri te silut. Ne ebpeiniyug̵an din kenitew is mezaat he ulaula ne ebpeseyluwen kiw zin.
Ne sikami, ebpeketistig̵us key he nengeulaula heini is langun. Ne ebpirmahan daan heini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su mibpeulinan kandin te Megbevayà is langun he edtuman te menge sug̵ù din.”
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge punuan, utew zan nengepauk ne ed-isipen dan en edhimetayi is menge epustul.

Iyan, duen duma zan he egngezanan ki Gemelil. Perisiyu sikandin he menunudlù te kesug̵uan wey telehuzen te langun he menge etew. Ne midhitindeg heini ne insug̵ù din he ed-uwiten dè pa ziyà te g̵awas haazà is menge epustul. Ne hein diyè dan en te g̵awas,
migkeg̵iyan ni Gemelil haazà is menge zuma zin te, “Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he kevuwazan ni Israyil, kenè tew edegdeg̵usuwan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan tew kayi te menge etew

Su zengan duen etew he egngezanan ki Tiyudas he mibpetuu he kenà etew zà duen sikandin. Menge heepat he g̵atus he menge maama is midsundan kandin. Iyan, dutun te kegkepetaya kandin ne nekedsusuwey is menge sumusundan din ne nahanew en haazà is ed-ul-ulahan dan.

Ne zutun nekesunud si Hudas he tigGeliliya zutun te timpu te kedsinsusa te gubirnu te tivuuk he menge etew. Ne zuen dutun nemekesundan daan kandin, asal midhimetayan daan sikandin ne nemekedsusuwey zaan haazà is menge sumusundan din.

Ne tenged dutun iyan sambag ku keniyu g̵untaan is: kenè tew en edhilevetan heini is menge etew, kekenà, ebpesegdanen tew su emun diyè dà ebpuun te etew zà duen is ebeelan dan wey ibpenurù dan, egkehanew zed gihapun.
Iyan, ke ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà, ne kenè tew egkezaag. Ne kenà dutun dà taman su egkekuntada tew is Megbevayà!” ke si Gemelil. Ne zutun mibpezumdumahan haazà te menge punuan is sambag ni Gemelil,
iyan, impeseled dan en maan haazà is menge epustul ne impevug̵el zan. Ne migkeg̵iyan dan haazà is menge epustul he kenè dan ipenurù is kedtuu te ngazan ni Jesus ne zutun impaawè dan.
Ne is menge epustul, migenat dan ne utew zan nelipey su mid-isip sikandan te Megbevayà he meinentusen te ked-el-eleza kandan tenged te kedtuu zan ki Jesus.
Ne te kada andew ziyè dan gihapun te simbahan wey ziyà te menge valey is ebpenurù te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i ni Jesus, sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.

Ne zutun he timpu ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu ki Jesus. Is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he Gerisyahanen is kineg̵iyan dan, duen ibmezaat te g̵ehinawa zan te zuma he menge tumutuu he Hudiyu. Egkag̵i haazà is menge Gerisyahanen he kenà pudu egkeveg̵ayan is kandan he menge valu he vahi ke ebpeneltelazen te kada andew is idtavang dutun te menge valu he vahi.

Ne zutun midtig̵um te menge epustul is langun he menge tumutuu ne ke sikandan te, “Kenà meupiya ke sikami is menge epustul, emun ed-engkezan dey is kebpenurù te Lalag te Megbevayà wey zey mevahinbahin is ibpenavang.

Umba, menge suled,” ke sikandan, “meupiya ke ebpilì kew te pitu he menge zuma niw he telehuzen. Kinahanglan he iyan ebpilien is menge maama he memetau he netuenan niw he nepurung sikandan ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne ibeg̵ey zey ziyà te kandan is keg̵ehem te kebahinbahin.
Ne sikami mulà, is menge epustul, egkehimu he ebpurungan dey is baal zey te ked-ampù wey kebpesavut te Lalag te Megbevayà.”

Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge tumutuu, nengesuat dan dutun te sambag te menge epustul. Ne mibpilì dan si Esteban. Ne si Esteban, utew mezesen is kedtuu zin wey nepurung sikandin ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne elin dutun te nepilì dan si Felipe, si Pukuru, si Nikenur, si Timen, si Perminas, wey si Nikulas he tig-Entiyukya. Ne haazà si Nikulas, kenà Hudiyu, iyan, neketuu zengan te tinuuwan te menge Hudiyu.
Ne impeetuvang dan diyà te menge epustul haazà is nengepilì dan ne in-ampù sikandan te menge epustul ne midepenetan sikandan dutun te menge epustul
Ne impeiseg dan is kedweliya zan te Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te mezakel he menge etew. Ne utew mahabet is menge tigHiruselim he nemeketuu ki Jesus. Ne mezakel zaan is menge memumuhat he nemeketuu.
Ne si Esteban, midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà ne zekelà is gehem din. Mezakel is menge egkein-inuwan wey menge singyal he ingkepeehè din diyà te menge etew.

Ne zuen daan menge kuntada ni Esteban. Iyan is menge Hudiyu he ziyà edsimba te egngezanan te Simbahan te menge Uripen he Nengevelukasan. Is duma kandan ne menge tigSirini, tig-Elihendriya, tigSilisya, wey tig-Asya. Ne ebpekidlewanè dan ki Esteban.
Iyan, mibeg̵ayan si Esteban te ketau te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin umba wazè dan igkelawan te ketezengan din.

Ne zutun duen menge etew he midsuhulan dan wey zan meulug̵i si Esteban te salà, ne egkag̵i haazà is menge etew te, “Nezineg dey is menge lalag din he supak te kesug̵uan ni Moises wey supak daan te Megbevayà,” ke sikandan.

Ne pinaag̵i zutun te menge etew nengepeukan si Esteban te menge etew, menge ebmeg̵urangen, wey menge menunudlù te kesug̵uan. Ne mibeyaan dan si Esteban ne midakep dan ne impeetuvang dan diyà te menge punuan.

Ne zutun duen impeseled dan he menge etew he ibpeulug dan te salà ki Esteban. Ne migkag̵i haazà te, “Heini si Esteban, kenà ed-engked he edsudì kayi te simbahan tew he Valey te Megbevayà ne edsumpeliten din is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin kenitew ni Moises.

Su nezineg dey sikandin is egkag̵i he is simbahan tew he Valey te Megbevayà, edrundusen ni Jesus he tigNeserit ne ed-ilisan daan ni Jesus is langun he menge vetasan tew he imbilinbilin kenitew zengan ni Moises.”
Ne midtengtengan si Esteban te langun he menge punuan dutun ne is paras din dutun ne henduen be te paras te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà
Ne zutun mid-insaan si Esteban te lavew he memumuhat, ke sikandin te, “Tutuu ve heini is langun he insumbung dan mehitenged kenikew?”

Ne midtavak si Esteban te, “Sikiyu is menge ebmeg̵urangen wey menge suled ku, pemineg̵a niw is menge lalag ku keniyu. Dengan, kes kepuun tew he si Abraham, mibpaahà kandin is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà te kemulu pa ziyà si Abraham ed-ubpà te tanà he Misuputamya hein wazè pa sikandin medhalin diyà te inged he Haran.
Ne migkeg̵iyan si Abraham te Megbevayà te, ‘Awè ka kayi te inged nu wey menge suled nu wey lukes nu, ne ziyè ka ubpà te ibpeehè ku kenikew he tanà.’
Ne zutun mid-awà diyà te inged he Keldiya ne midhalin diyà te inged he Haran. Ne hein minatey is amey zin impahalin en maan sikandin te Megbevayà dini te tanà he neubpaan tew g̵untaan.

Ne zutun he timpu wazè pa izata te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham is minsan deisek dà kayi te tanà, iyan, impenaad te Megbevayà he ibeg̵ey zin ki Abraham heini is tanà ne egkeazen heini ni Abraham wey te menge kevuwazan din. Ne hein impenaad heini ziyà te ki Abraham, wazè pa anak ni Abraham.

Ne migkag̵i kandin is Megbevayà te, ‘Is kevuwazan nu, diyè dan keuzemà ebpekeubpà te kenà kandan he inged. Ne egkeuripen sikandan te meg̵inged dutun ne mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan kandan. Ne emun egketapus is heepat he g̵atus he tuig,
edsilutan ku is menge teg̵iuripen kandan ne ed-ewaan dan dutun haazà is inged ne ed-ulì dan dini. Ne siak is Megbevayà, dini zan ed-azap te kediey.’ ”

Ne ke si Esteban te, “Duen daan impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham. Midsug̵ù te Megbevayà he mebpesirkunsidar is langun kandan te menge maama su iyan tuus te kebpekid-uyun dan mehitenged te impenaad te Megbevayà. Umba hein nevuwad si Abraham ki Isaak, nekewalu zutun te ked-enaka kandin midsirkunsidar ni Abraham. Ne hein nevuwad si Isaak ki Hakub, midsirkunsidar zin daan. Ne hein iyan en maan nenganak si Hakub, midsirkunsidar zin daan kes sepulù wey zezuwa he anak din he kepuun tew te menge Hudiyu.”
Ne ke si Esteban te, “Si Jose is sevaha he anak ni Hakub, nesina kandin is menge kakey zin ne imbelegyè dan sikandin ne neuwit diyà te Ihiptu. Iyan, midumahan si Jose te Megbevayà,

ne midlibri zin te langun he menge mereg̵en he nengehitavù kandin. Midtuvazan si Jose te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun ingkesuat si Jose te hadì diyà te Ihiptu su neehè din he zekelà is ketau he imbeg̵ey kandin. Ne is hadì, midhimu zin si Jose he gubirnedur te tivuuk he g̵inhedian din wey iyan ebayàbayà te langun he menge azen din.

Na,” ke si Esteban diyà te menge punuan te, “mid-ag̵i is dekelà he vitil ziyà te tivuuk he tanà he Ihiptu wey ziyà daan te Kenaan ne nereg̵enan is menge meg̵inged dutun. Ne is menge kepuun tew, wazè dan egkekuwaan te keuyag̵an dan.

Umba hein nezineg ni Hakub he zuen egkeenen diyà te Ihiptu, midsug̵ù din is menge anak din he maama, sikan is menge kepuun tew, he medhendiyè dan. Iyan heini kes nehuna he kedhendiyè dan te kedlag̵ud te egkeenen.
Ne zutun te ikezuwa en he kedhendiyè dan te Ihiptu, mibpekilala si Jose kandan te menge suled din ne human dutun metueni te hadì ke hentei is menge kezuzumahi ni Jose.

Ne intelaan ni Jose is amey zin he medhendiyà te kandin wey is langun he kezuzumahi zin. Ne zutun midhendiyà ensi Hakub te Ihiptu. Is kezakel zan dutun te midhendiyà te Ihiptu, ne kepituwan wey lelima he etew. Ne hein neug̵et, minatey si Hakub diyà te Ihiptu ne minatey zaan kes menge anak din he kepuun tew.

Ne kada is ebpatey kandan, id-ulì is lawa zin diyà te mibpuunan dan, diyà te Sikim ne zutun ileveng te surung he penlevengà he mibpemasa he zaan ni Abraham. Mibpemasa zin te selapì he pelata ziyà te menge anak ni Hamur he iyan meg̵inged dutun te Sikim.

Ne neug̵et dutun hein meg̵aan en edtumanen te Megbevayà sikan is impenaad din diyà te ki Abraham he edlibriyen is menge kevuwazan din dutun, utew en dekelà diyà te Ihiptu is menge kevuwazan te menge kepuun tew.
Ne zutun, duen midhadì diyà te Ihiptu he wazè din hanew te kedhadì dengan ni Jose.

Na,” ke si Esteban, “heini is hadì, mibpesipelahan din is menge kepuun tew wey mezaat is mid-ulaula zin kandan. Pinaag̵i te peg̵es impetimbag din te menge Hudiyu is menge anak dan he utew pa vatà diyà te meziyù wey mebpatey.
Ne iyan haazà daan timpu te ked-enaka ki Moises. Utew sikandin mekempet he vatà ne ingkesuat te Megbevayà. Seled te tetelu he vulan is ked-elimahi kandin te lukes din.
Ne hein insavuk sikandin diyà te meziyù, naahà te vahi he anak te hadì. Ne mid-anak-anak din si Moises ne ziyè en medekelà te kandin he iring te tutuu he anak din.
Ne impepenurù din diyà te ki Moises is langun he ulaula te menge tig-Ihiptu ne nevantug sikandin tenged te ketau te kebpesavut wey te menge vaal zin.
Ne hein kepatan en is penuig̵en ni Moises, neisip din he ebpenumbelayan din is menge zuma zin he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.
Ne hein nekeuma en sikandin neehè din is maama he Hudiyu he ebpesipelahan te tig-Ihiptu. Ne midtevangan haazà ni Moises is duma zin he Hudiyu ne midhimetayan din haazà is tig-Ihiptu.
Kunaan ni Moises ke nesavut en te menge zuma zin he Hudiyu he iyan sikandin nepilì te Megbevayà wey zin melibri sikandan te menge tig-Ihiptu, iyan, wazè dan mesavut.

Ne hein nepawà dutun, midlikù med-uman si Moises. Ne zuen neehè din he zezuwa he menge Hudiyu he ebpetebekà. Ne ebpelangen din pezem haazà is dezuwa su ke sikandin te, ‘He menge suled, kenè kew medtebek su teltelesuled kew.’
Iyan, haazà is nekesalà te zuma zin, kenà ebpemineg; intukù din si Moises, ne ke sikandin te, ‘Hentei is mibeg̵ey kenikew te keg̵ehem te kedatùdatù kenami?
Kela ke edhimetayan a kenikew iring te kedhimetayi nu g̵evii te tig-Ihiptu?’
Ne hein nezineg ni Moises heini, mibpelag̵uy ne ziyà med-ubpà te tanà he Madyan. Ne ziyà te Madyan ianak is dezuwa he anak din he maama.

Ne neug̵et pa zutun, menge kepatan he tuig, duen belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he mibpaahà ki Moises diyà te Siney, diyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew. Naahà ni Moises is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà diyà te merapung he zug̵iyen he sagbet he egkeregreg.
Ne hein naahà ni Moises haazà, nein-inuwan din ne mid-uvayan din su edsusiyen din. Ne hein uvey en dutun, migkag̵i is Nengazen te,
‘Iyan a Megbevayà he ed-ezapen te menge kepuun nu he si Abraham, wey si Isaak, wey si Hakub.’ Ne migkerker si Moises ne wazà mekeaku te kedtengteng dutun su nahandek.
Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandin te Nengazen te, ‘Ewaa nu is sepatus nu su mibulusan ku heini is tanà he nehitindeg̵an nu.

Neehè ku is kebpesipelahi te menge tig-Ihiptu te menge pinilì ku he menge etew ne nezineg ku is dag-es dan. Umba zini ad guntaan te tanà su edlibriyen ku sikandan. Ne g̵enat ke en su edsug̵uen ku sikew ziyà te Ihiptu.’

Ne heini si Moises,” ke si Esteban diyà te menge punuan, “daan he wazè dan dewata te menge Hudiyu is penavang din, kekenà, migkeg̵iyan dan dà te, ‘Hentei is mibeg̵ey kenikew te keg̵ehem te kedatùdatù kenami?’” Ne ke si Esteban en maan te, “Ne pinaag̵i zutun te velinsug̵uen he mibpaahà kandin dutun te egkeregreg he sagbet, midsug̵ù si Moises te Megbevayà. Ne midhimu zin si Moises he pengulu he iyan edlibri te menge Hudiyu.

Ne mid-uwit ni Moises is menge kepuun tew ne mid-awè dan diyà te Ihiptu. Ne zutun te wazè dan pa med-awà diyà te Ihiptu, duen menge egkengein-inuwan wey menge singyal he impeehè din. Ne ziyà te zag̵at he egngezanan te Merig̵à, wey ziyà daan te imbayè dan he tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, impeehè din daan is iring dutun he menge vaal. Kepatan he tuig is ked-uwita ni Moises kandan diyà te tanà he wazà dutun ed-ubpà he etew.

Ne si Moises, migkeg̵iyan din is menge kepuun tew te, ‘Keuzemà duen daan ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he ed-uwit keniyu iring kedì te ebpeneuven din. Ne heini he ebpeneuven keuzemà, duma niw zaan he Hudiyu.’

Ne hein nengetig̵um is menge kepuun tew ziyà te tanà he wazà dutun ed-ubpà he etew, pinaag̵i ki Moises nekepekidlalag dan te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà diyà te vuntud he egngezanan te Siney. Ne nezawat ni Moises dutun kes kenà egkehanew he menge Lalag te Megbevayà wey zin daan ikeveg̵ey kenitew.
Ne wazà tumana te menge kepuun tew is ibpeulaula ni Moises kandan. Ne kenè dan egkesuatan he pengulu zan sikandin. Ne neisip dan he meupiya ke edlikù dan diyà te Ihiptu.

Ne migkeg̵iyan dan si Arun, kes kakey ni Moises, te, ‘Beeli key te menge ledawan he egkehimu he menge ziwata he edsunuzen dey su heini si Moises, is mid-uwit kenitew puun diyà te Ihiptu, wazè dey en hanew ke hendei en sikandin mekepevayà.’
Ne zutun,” ke si Esteban, “mibeelan dan is ledawan he nati te vaka ne mibpelengesahan dan ne midlipey zan su nesuatan dan haazà is mibeelan dan.

Ne zutun mid-iniyug̵an is menge kepuun tew te Megbevayà ne mibpesagdan din sikandan is ed-azap te menge vituen diyà te langit. Ne zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te libru te ebpemeneuven dengan he edhenduen te,
‘He menge kevuwazan ni Israyil,
kenà a iyan sikan is mibpemuhat niw zengan
hein seled te kepatan he tuig diyà kew te tanà
he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew,
kekenà, selakew is mid-azap niw.
Iyan niw edyeyungen kes ibpeubpaan niw
zuen te ed-ezapen niw he si Muluk
wey kes ledawan he vituen
he ed-ezapen niw he si Ripan.
Menge ledawan heini he mibeelan niw ne mid-azap niw,
ne tenged dutun ibpeuwit ku sikiyu ziyà te meziyù,
diyà dapit te inged he Bebilunya.’ ”

Ne ke si Esteban te, “Dengan te kemulu pa ziyà is menge kepuun tew te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, insarig kandan sikan is lawig he manggad he iyan tuus he kenà edsuwey ziyà te kandan is Megbevayà. Midhimu zan heini sumalà is insug̵ù te Megbevayà diyà te ki Moises, sumalà is ebpeiringan te Megbevayà kandin.

Ne neug̵et dutun, is menge anak kayi te kepuun tew, hein nekebkevilin dan en haazà is lawig he ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà kenè dan haazà edsuwayen dutun te keduma zan ki Josue te kedseled dan kayi te tanè tew. Ne naangken dan heini is tanà hein impaawà te Megbevayà is menge zaan he meg̵inged kayi. Ne haazà is lawig he ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà, wazà maawà kayi taman te wazè pa medhadì si David.

Ne hein nehimu en sikandin he hadì, ingkesuat sikandin te Megbevayà ne midhangyù si David he tug̵uti sikandin te Megbevayà he iyan sikandin mekevangun te hustu he valey he simbahan he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayà he iyan sikan is ed-ezapen dengan te kepuun tew he si Hakub.
Iyan, wazà tug̵uti te Megbevayà si David su si Sulumun, iyan nekevangun te Valey te Megbevayà.”
Ne ke si Esteban te, “Ne minsan pa zutun, is lavew he Megbevayà, kenà diyè dà ed-ubpà te valey he vineelan te etew su zuen insurat te ebpeneuven he,
‘Egkag̵i is Nengazen te,
“Is langit, ne pinuuwè ku wey is tanà,
ne iyan edsevukan ku te paa ku.
Wazà baley he egkeveelan niw he ed-ereg̵an ku.
Kenè kew zaan ebpekevaal te hustu
he edhimelayan ku
su iyan a midlimbag kayi te tanà
wey is langun he tag̵ù din.” ’ ”

Ne ke si Esteban te, “Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he Hudiyu, utew memehunit is gehinawa niw. Kenè kew egkesuat he ebpemineg; ne kenè kew zaan edtuman te Lalag te Megbevayà. Kenè kew ed-engked he edsupak te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Kes mid-ulaula te menge kepuun tew, iyan daan ed-ul-ulahan niw.

Duen be minsan sevaha zà he ebpeneuven dengan he wazà resaya te menge kepuun tew? Wazà. Mibpenhimetayan dan is midsug̵ù te Megbevayà, sikan is nemeketagnà dengan te kebpekeuma te metazeng he sulug̵uen din he si Jesus. Ne sikiyu zaan guntaan su heini si Jesus, is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà, mid-ekalan niw ne mibunù niw.
Ne is kesug̵uan te Megbevayà, imbeg̵ey kenitew zengan pinaag̵i te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà, iyan, nasì wazè niw tumana,” ke si Esteban.
Ne hein nezineg te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu haazà is lalag ni Esteban, utew zan nengepauk. Ne migkeg̵etket is bag̵ang dan te kegkererengiti zan utew.

Ne si Esteban, nepurung sikandin ulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne neehè din is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag te Megbevayà. Ne elin dutun neehè din si Jesus he ziyà edhithitindeg te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.
Ne ke si Esteban te, “Ahaa niw man! Egkeehè ku en is langit he nepuwasan ne zutun is Kakey te Menusiyà he edhithitindeg te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.”
Ne zutun haazà is menge punuan, nekekulahì dan ne midsabpeng dan is telinga zan su wey kenè dan en mezineg is menge lalag ni Esteban ne midlingketawan dan.
Ne inggawas dan sikandin puun dutun te inged ne midtuleng dan te vatu. Ne sikan is nemekesumbung kandin, insavuk dan is menge kumbalè dan diyà te uvey te etew he egngezanan ki Seulu.
Ne zutun te kedtulenga zan ki Esteban, nengumew-umew sikandin te Nengazen. Ke sikandin te, “He Jesus he Nengazen ku, dewata nu is gimukud ku.”
Ne zutun nekeluhud ne mid-uman megkag̵i te, “He Nengazen, kenè nu isipa he idsilut kandan heini is salè dan.” Ne te nekag̵i zin haazà, naawà is gehinawa zin.

Ingkesuat utew ni Seulu is kedhimetayi zan ki Esteban. Ne inleveng si Esteban te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà. Utew zan ingkeseeng haazà ne midlendag̵an dan. Ne puun dutun te andew te kebpatey ni Esteban, is menge tumutuu, ebpemesipelahan en sikandan te menge punuan he menge Hudiyu ziyà te Hiruselim, ne mibpemelag̵uy zan ne nekedsusuwey zan diyà te tivuuk he prubinsya he Hudiya wey Semarya. Iyan dà wazà mekepelag̵uy is menge epustul.

Ne si Seulu, egkesuatan din he mezezeeti zin is upakat te menge tumutuu ne mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan din kandan. Midsusi zin is kada valey ne midakep din is menge tumutuu ne mibpen-uwit din is menge maama wey menge vahi ne mibpirisu zin.
