Su migkag̵i si Hadì David te,
“Utew zeyzey is etew he is menge kedsupak din,
ne nengepesaylu en wey is menge salè din,
ne nengelipatan en te Megbevayà!
Utew zeyzey is etew he is menge mezaat he ulaula zin,
kenè en ed-isipen te Megbevayà!”

Ne heini is kegkezeyzey he migkag̵i ni David, wazà heini ituvad kayi zà te kenami te menge Hudiyu, kekenà, intuvad daan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Su sumalà te nekag̵i ku en, si Abraham, midtuu sikandin te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun te kedtuu zin mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng.
Ne keenu heini meulaula? Dutun te wazè pa si Abraham mebpesirkunsidar,

Umba mibpesirkunsidar sikandin su nehimu is kedsirkunsidar he tuus diyà te lawa zin he mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng tenged te kedtuu zin dutun te wazè pa sikandin sirkunsidara. Ne nehimu si Abraham he kepuun tew,
Ne nehimu zaan si Abraham he kepuun,

Dengan dà impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham wey te menge kevuwazan din he iyan sikandan ebpekevayàbayà te tivuuk he menusiyà. Umba impenaad heini, kenà tenged te midtuman ni Abraham is kesug̵uan, kekenà, tenged te midtuuwan ni Abraham is Megbevayà, ne tenged kayi te kedtuu zin mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng.
Su emun iyan dà ebpekezawat kayi te impenaad te Megbevayà is etew he edtuman te kesug̵uan, wazè en pulus te kedtuu tew te Megbevayà, ne wazè en daan pulus te penaad te Megbevayà
Ne kenè kiw egkezeyzey pinaag̵i te kesug̵uan, su is kesug̵uan, ne iyan mulà igkepeuki kenitew te Megbevayà su kenè tew egketuman. Angin ke wazà kesug̵uan su kenà egkehimu he zuen egkesupak ta.

Umba midhimu te Megbevayà he egkezawat tew is impenaad din pinaag̵i zà te kedtuu tew su wey mehimu heini pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew zin, ne kenà pinaag̵i te ed-ul-ulahan tew. Ne tenged kayi kenè en ebperis he egkezawat tew te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham is impenaad te Megbevayà. Ne kenà iyan dà ebpekezawat is menge Hudiyu he nesakup te kesug̵uan, kekenà, elin daan is minsan hentei he zuen din kedtuu he iring ki Abraham su nehimu si Abraham he kepuun te langun he edtuu, Hudiyu se kenà Hudiyu.

Ne zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham, ke sikandin te, “Ibpenaad ku kenikew he edhimuwen ku sikew he kepuun te utew mezakel he menge kelasi te menge etew.” Ne zutun mid-isip din si Abraham he kepuun tew te langun he midtuu he iring kandin. Ne is Megbevayà he iyan edtuuwan tew, ne utew sikandin mekeg̵eg̵ehem su iyan ebpekevanhew te menge minatey, ne is minsan hengkey he wazè pa meulaula, netuenan din en he zaan iring te neulaula en.

Si Abraham, minsan te henduen be te kenè en dutun egkehimu he egketuman is penaad kandin te Megbevayà, midtuuwan din gihapun is migkag̵i te Megbevayà he egkevuwad sikandin, ne nehimu iyan sikandin he kepuun te utew mezakel he menge etew. Su migkag̵i kandin te Megbevayà he iring kezakel is menge kevuwazan din te menge vituen diyà te langit.

Ne zutun he timpu nenggatus en is penuig̵en ni Abraham, ne netuenan din he meg̵urang en utew sikandin, ne kenè en egkehimu he egkevuwad pa sikandin. Ne netuenan din daan he kenà ebpekeanak si Sara he esawa zin su kenà si Sara ed-anak. Ne minsan pa zutun, mezesen is kedtuu zin.
Ne wazà sikandin meduwazuwa te penaad te Megbevayà, kekenà, midhemenan din is kedtuu zin ne mibpeselematan din is edhimuwen te Megbevayà.
Su utew mezesen is kedsarig din he edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din.
Ne tenged dutun te kedtuu ni Abraham, insurat dengan he mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng.
Ne is insurat he lalag dengan he ebpesavut he mid-isip sikandin he metazeng, ne wazà isurat tenged dà ki Abraham,

kekenà, tenged daan kenitew wey tew mesavut he ragkes kiw zaan dutun. Sikitew, ed-isipen kiw zaan te Megbevayà he metazeng emun edtuuwan tew sikandin. Iyan sikandin sikan is mibanhew ki Jesus he Nengazen tew.

Iyan si Jesus kes midsug̵ù te Megbevayà wey mebpehimatey te silut tenged te menge kedsupak tew. Ne zutun mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà wey mehimu he metazeng is ked-isipa kenitew te Megbevayà he iring te wazè kiw keenu mekeulaula te mezaat.

Guntaan, tenged te midtuu ki en ki Jesus, mid-isip ki en te Megbevayà he metazeng he iring te wazè ki keenu mekesalà, ne tenged kayi pinaag̵i te mid-ulaula te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu melinew en is kedepitè tew te Megbevayà.
Tenged te kedtuu tew ki Jesus midhimu zin en he meg̵eg̵awi kenitew is Megbevayà. Umba zekelà is kelipey ta su egkeperateng ta he keuzemà ebpekeambit ki te utew kegkelavew te Megbevayà.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su ebelesen te kelipey is menge kemereg̵enan he nengeseg̵azan ta su netuenan ta he pinaag̵i kayi edlumbazen ki wey ki mehimu he meinentusen.
Ne emun meinentusen ki, igkesuat heini te Megbevayà, ne emun netuenan ta he igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula ta, ne kenà ebperis he zuen meupiya he egkeperateng ta.
Ne umba kenà egkehimu he kenè tew egkekuwa keuzemà is impenaad kenitew te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he imbeg̵ey zin kenitew, egketuusan ta he ingkeg̵ag̵ew ki te Megbevayà.

Isipa nu is gag̵ew kenita te Megbevayà. Su zutun te timpu he intelaan te Megbevayà, hein wazà minsan hengkey he egkeulaula ta he ebpekehimu he melibri ki te silut, mibpehimatey si Kristu he elili kenita te mesinupaken.
Mezelag dà buwa he zuen etew he ebpehimatey he elili te minsan metazeng he etew. Egkehimu vuwa he zuen etew he ebpekevurut he ebpehimatey he elili te etew he meupiya is ulaula zin.
Iyan, is Megbevayà mulà, impeehè din is gag̵ew zin kenitew su mibpehimatey si Kristu he elili kenitew zutun te timpu zengan te kemulu kiw pa ed-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne emun pinaag̵i te kedtig̵is te lengesa ni Kristu mid-isip kiw en te Megbevayà he metazeng, wey kiw pe be kenà melibri tenged ki Kristu te silut keuzemà te Megbevayà.

Su zutun te timpu zengan he kemulu ki kuntada te Megbevayà, tenged te kebpehimatey te Anak din, nehimu ki he emig̵u zin. Ne emun iyan haazà, guntaan te emig̵u ki zin en, wey ki pe be kenà mehimu he melibri keuzemà te silut tenged te nevanhew en sikandin.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su utew zekelà is kelipey ta tenged te g̵ag̵ew kenita te Megbevayà he impeehè din pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne pinaag̵i zaan kandin nehimu ki en he emig̵u te Megbevayà.

Umba nehimu is mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan su pinaag̵i te kedsupak dengan te sevaha he etew he si Adan, ne midhimu te Megbevayà he ebpatey sikandin tenged dutun te mid-ulaula zin. Ne tenged daan dutun nekeeneb dini te kelibutan is kemetayen. Ne ebpatey is minsan hentei he etew su wazà minsan hentei he kenà ed-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne minsan pa zengan te wazè pa iveg̵ey te Megbevayà is kesug̵uan, mezaat en dutun is menge ulaula te menge etew, iyan, geina te wazè pa is kesug̵uan, wazè pa isipa te Megbevayà he edsilutan sikandan.

Ne minsan pa zutun, puun pa te timpu ni Adan taman te timpu he zutun imbeg̵ey en is kesug̵uan diyà te ki Moises, egketuusan he zuen mezaat he ulaula te menge etew su mibpematey g̵ihapun is langun he menge etew. Is ulaula zan he mezaat, ne kenà iring dutun te mid-ulaula ni Adan su midsupak din is sug̵ù te Megbevayà, iyan, sikandan mulà, wazè pa kesug̵uan he egkesupak dan. Ne si Adan, nehimu sikandin he alung te etew he ebpekeuma he iyan si Kristu.

Iyan, kenè dan is dezuwa ebpeked-iring su is kedsupak dutun te sevaha, ne kenà iring te kebmetazeng he edhimuwen te Megbevayà. Sevaha zà he etew si Adan, iyan, tenged dutun te kedsupak din ebpematey is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne minsan pa zutun, lavew pa he zekelà is nehimu pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew te sevaha zà daan he etew he iyan si Jesu Kristu, imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà is ketazeng ne midhimu zin he metazeng is utew mezakel he menge etew.

Ne iring din ded daan, is nehimu ni Jesus tenged te kebmetazeng he edhimuwen te Megbevayà, ne kenè man iring te nehimu te kedsupak te sevaha he etew he si Adan. Su tenged te kedsupak ni Adan te kesevaha zà, ne midhukuman is tivuuk he menusiyà he edsilutan te kemetayen. Ne zutun te timpu he utew en mezakel is menge kedsupak te menge etew, impaahà te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin ne midhimu zin is paag̵i wey kiw zin meisip he metazeng he iring te wazè kiw mekesupak.

Ne emun tenged te kedsupak dutun te sevaha zà he etew he si Adan, ebpematey is tivuuk he menusiyà, wey pe be kenà lavew pa he mekeinuinu is nehimu te sevaha zà daan he etew he si Jesu Kristu. Su is minsan hentei he edawat te zekelà he g̵ag̵ew kandin te Megbevayà pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu, ne ed-isipen sikandin he metazeng, ne ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne ebpekehadì sikandin duma te Megbevayà.

Ne iring din ded daan, egkeehè ta he tenged te sevaha he mezaat he mid-ulaula ni Adan, nehukuman is langun he menge etew te silut, iyan, tenged te sevaha zaan he metazeng he mid-ulaula ni Jesu Kristu he iyan is kebpehimatey zin, egkehimu he ed-isipen te Megbevayà he metazeng is langun he menge etew he edtuu ne ibeg̵ey kandan is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ne tenged te kedsupak te sevaha zà he etew nehimu is mezakel he mekesesalà, iyan, tenged daan te kebmetinumanen te sevaha zà he etew he si Jesus te ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà, egkehimu he ed-isipen te Megbevayà he metazeng is mezakel he menge etew.

Ne umba imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà is kesug̵uan su wey med-iseg is kegketueni te menge etew te kezekelà te kedsupaka zan kandin. Ne zutun te mid-iseg mebmezakel is menge kedsupak, impeiseg ipezekelà te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin te menge etew.

Ne hein aney, sikitew is menusiyà, kenà egkehimu he kenè ki ebpekesalà, ne tenged kayi ebpatey ki, iyan, guntaan pinaag̵i te ked-isipa te Megbevayà kenitew he metazeng, impeehè kenitew te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin su wey kiw zin meveg̵ayi te untung he wazè din pidtemanan pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu he iyan Nengazen tew.

Tutuu iyan he ingkeg̵ag̵ew ki en te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi zuen buwa etew he ebpekekag̵i he meupiya ke kenè ta ed-engkezan is ked-ulaula te mezaat su wey mekeiseg is kebpaahaa kenita te Megbevayà te g̵ag̵ew zin pinaag̵i te kebpeseyluwa zin kenita.

Ne kenà heini egkehimu su kenà egkehimu he ebpeniguduwan ta te ed-ulaula is mezaat su wazè en kelavet kenita te mezaat he ulaula. Su iring ki te minatey he naawè en diyà te kandin is daan he untung din.

Netuenan te en is neulaula zutun te kebewtismuwi kenita. Su nebewtismuwan ki he tuus te zuen en kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesu Kristu ne pinaag̵i zutun ibpesavut daan kenita he zutun te kebpehimatey ni Jesus, henduen te iyan ki mibpatey.

Su pinaag̵i te kebewtismuwi kenita tenged te elili ta si Jesus, nehimu he iring te iyan ki minatey wey inleveng duma kandin. Ne nehimu heini su wey meveg̵ayi ki te veg̵u he untung iring te mibanhew si Kristu pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Su emun minatey ki zuma ki Kristu tenged te elili ta sikandin, kenè en ebperis he ebeg̵ayan ki zaan te veg̵u he untung iring te mibeg̵ayan daan sikandin te veg̵u he untung hein nevanhew sikandin.

Su netuenan tew he is daan he mesinupaken he kegkeetew tew, ne iring te inransang duma ki Kristu ziyà te krus su wey mebpatey. Ne tenged kayi, egkeawà is layun tew kebpekesalà ne human dutun kenè kiw en egkeuripen te ked-ulaula te mezaat.
Su is minsan hentei he minatey en, ne kenè en sikandin egkeuripen te mezaat he kebayè din.
Ne nesavut te en he zutun te kebpatey ni Kristu ne minatey ki zuma kandin su elili tew sikandin. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut ta zaan he egkevanhew ki zaan, ne zuen te en untung duma kandin.
Netuenan tew he g̵eina te nevanhew en si Kristu ne kenè en egkehimu he ebpatey pa maan sikandin su wazè en gehem te kemetayen diyà te kandin.

Kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey zin he elili te langun he menge etew, ne netengkaan en haazà ne tenged kayi naawè en diyà te kandin is kegkesemuki kandin te salè tew. Ne g̵untaan nevanhew en, ne nehimu is untung din he igkezalig te Megbevayà.

Ne iring din ded daan, tentenuzi niw he g̵eina te minatey ki en he zuma ki Kristu, naawè en daan dini te kenita is kegkesemuki kenita te salè ta, ne pinaag̵i zaan ki Jesu Kristu imbeg̵ey en kenita is beg̵u en he untung, ne kinahanglan he igkezalig daan te Megbevayà heini is beg̵u en he untung ta.

Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, kenè te en idtug̵ut he iyan ebayàbayà te menge lawa ta he melemu ebpatey, is mezaat he kebayè dan. Su emun idtug̵ut ta heini, egkepezumdumahan ta is menge mezaat he suat te lawa ta.

Kenè ta egemiten is minsan hengkey he vahin te lawa ta te ked-ulaula te mezaat, kekenà, idtug̵ut ta he iyan ebayàbayà kenita is Megbevayà su zait heini kenita te nelibri en te kemetayen ne mibeg̵ayan te veg̵u en he untung. Ne idtug̵ut ta he iyan egamit te lawa ta is Megbevayà wey ta meulaula is metazeng.

Su kenè en kinahanglan he iyan ebayàbayà kenita is mezaat he kebayè ta su kenè ta iyan edserig̵an is kedtumana te kesug̵uan, kekenà, iyan ta edserig̵an is kedtavang wey kegkeg̵eg̵awi te Megbevayà kenita.

Ne kunaan buwa te zuma ke tenged te kenè en kinahanglan he tumana te pa is kesug̵uan, wey tenged te ingkeg̵ag̵ew ki te Megbevayà, ne egkehimu he ebpeniguduwan te pa is ked-ulaula ta te mezaat, iyan, kenà iyan haazà egkehimu.

Su netuenan niw he ke ebpesakup ki te minsan hentei su wey ki zin meveyveyai, egkehimu ki en he iring te uripen din. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he ebpilien din he iring te egalen din is mezaat he kebayè din. Ne idsilut kandin is kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne is etew mulà he ebpesakup te Megbevayà ne ed-isipen te Megbevayà he metazeng sikandin.
Dengan iring te nengeuripen kew te mezaat he kebayà, iyan, guntaan utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà su mibpurungan niw te edtuman is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu.
Nevelukasan kew en te Megbevayà, ne nehimu kew en he menge sulug̵uen din he metazeng en is ed-ul-ulahan niw.

Umba insempitè ku is egkeulaula te uripen su wey melemu niw mesavut is ibpesavut ku. Su zengan iring te mibpeuripen kew te mezaat he kebayà ne ingkesuat niw he ed-ul-ulahan te lawa niw is menge meremerik wey mezaat he ulaula he layun ed-iseg he mezaat. Iyan, guntaan kinahanglan he himuwa niw is lawa niw he metazeng he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà wey niw metuman is egkesuatan din.
Ne zengan, hein kemulu kew pa nengeuripen te mezaat he kebayà, wazè niw hanew te metazeng he ulaula.

Ne wazà pulus he nekuwa niw te ked-ul-ulaha niw zengan te menge mahawag he g̵untaan utew niw en igkeeled. Su emun ebpeniguduwan te etew is iring dutun, iyan edungguan din is kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan.

Iyan, guntaan, nevelukasan ki en te Megbevayà, ne nelibri ki en te kebpekeulaula ta te mezaat. Ne tenged kayi menge sulug̵uen ki en te Megbevayà, ne utew zekelà is pulus kayi kenita su ebpeketuman ki en te egkesuatan din, ne iyan rimeg̵as kayi te mid-ulaula te Megbevayà is kegkeveg̵ayi kenita te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ke zuen etew he ebpevayàbayà te suat te mekesesalà he lawa zin ne zuen silut kandin he iyan is kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, is etew mulà he edtuuwan din si Jesu Kristu he Nengazen tew, duen ibeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà he iyan is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Menge suled, nesavut te en ke hengkey is belaud te gubirnu ne netuenan ta he zizalem ki te menge sug̵ù te velaud taman te kenè ki pa ebpatey, ne emun ebpatey ki, kenè en egkehimu he ibpetuman pa kenita is menge sug̵ù te velaud.
Penenglitan, insug̵ù te velaud he is bahi ke zuen din esawa, kenà ebpekepeuman ebpekepeesawa emun uuyag pa haazà is esawa zin. Ne emun ebpatey haazà is esawa zin, egkehimu ke ebpeuman ebpeesawa.

Iyan, emun wazè pa mebpatey haazà is esawa zin ne ebpekiduma wey ebpekidhulid te sengememaame en, ne nesupak din is belaud su neselselaan din haazà is esawa zin. Ne emun ebpatey is esawa zin, ebpekepeesawa ne kenè en ebpekesalà sikandin su nelibri sikandin dutun te velaud mehitenged te telteleesawa.

Ne iring din ded daan, menge suled, heini is nehitavù kenitew su zutun te kebpatey ni Kristu he elili kenitew, ne mibpatey ki zaan, ne tenged kayi kenè en egkehimu he ibpetuman kenita te minatey en is menge sug̵ù he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Ne umba nehimu heini su wey kiw mesakup ni Kristu he nevanhew en ne wey tew metuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su zengan hein kemulu tew pa edtumana is kenitew he kebayà, duen menge ulaula he indawey te kesug̵uan, ne tenged te indawey heini, ne nasì nehimu he iyan daan heini utew tew egkesuatan te ed-ulaula. Ne tenged te mid-ulaula tew is iring dutun, iyan dà egkepaabut tew zengan is kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne hein nemeketuu kiw ki Jesus, nelibri kiw te Megbevayà ne wazè en kinahanglan he iyan tew pa edserig̵an is kedtuman te kesug̵uan, su zutun te kebpatey ni Jesus minatey kiw zaan ne nevelukasan kiw te kegkeuripen kenitew te salà. Ne g̵untaan beg̵u en is paag̵i te ked-ul-ulaha tew te egkesuatan te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i heini te kedtavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne kenè en pinaag̵i te zaan he paag̵i he iyan is kenitew he kedtumana te insurat he kesug̵uan.

Ne kunaan te zuma ke zutun ebpuun te kesug̵uan is menge mezaat he ulaula! Iyan, kenà dutun ebpuun su zaan is ulaula he mezaat dini te kenita. Is kesug̵uan, ne iyan ebpesavut kenita ke hengkey is mezaat he ulaula. Su emun wazà izawey ziyà te kesug̵uan is kegkeima, ne wazè ku g̵eina metueni he mezaat bes is kegkeima he zaan dini te g̵ehinawa ku.

Daan dini te kedì is kebpekesalà, ne hein impesavut kediey pinaag̵i te kesug̵uan he salà is kegkeima, mid-iseg is kegkeima ku ne mid-iseg daan is kebpekesalè ku. Su emun wazà kesug̵uan he egkesupak ta, wazà daan egketuenan ta he salà.

Hein aney, wazè ku metueni ke hengkey is kesug̵uan, ne zutun, henduen be te wazè ku salà. Ne hein impenurù kedì is kesug̵uan, netuenan ku he mezaat bes is menge ulaula ku. Ne tenged kayi nesavut ku he ziyè e ves ebpekezunggù te kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan!

Umba nehimu is kesug̵uan he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà su wey mekeangken is menge etew te untung he wazè din pidtemanan emun kenè dan edsupaken. Iyan, nehimu en he iyan idsiluti kedì is kesug̵uan su nesupak ku.
Henduen be te mid-ekalan a te mezaat he ulaula su pinaag̵i te mezaat he ulaula ku he supak te kesug̵uan, human ku mesavut he nehukuman ed bes te kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan.
Is kesug̵uan, diyà ebpuun te Megbevayà, ne is langun he menge sug̵ù dutun, menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, ne kenà haazà mezaat, kekenà, meupiya wey metazeng.
Ne emun meupiya is kesug̵uan, kela ke ebpekekag̵i ki he tenged te meupiya,

Netuenan tew he meupiya is kesug̵uan su imbeg̵ey te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Iyan, siak, geina te edtumanen ku is menge mezaat he suat te lawa ku ne nehimu a he iring te uripen te menge mezaat he kebayà.

Ne kenè ku egkesavut ke maan is ed-ul-ulahan ku is iring kayi su is meupiya he egkesuatan ku he meulaula ku, kenè ku egkeulaula. Ne is menge mezaat he ulaula he utew ku igkeepes, ne iyan ed-ul-ulahan ku.
Ne emun nekesupak a te kesug̵uan, iyan, kenè ku pezem egkesuatan he mesupak ku, ne heini is kenè ku kegkesuat, ne iyan tuus he zini te isip ku meupiya is kesug̵uan.
Ne emun iyan haazà, ne kenà a iyan ed-ulaula zutun te mezaat, kekenà, iyan is daan he menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa ku ed-ulaula zutun.
Netuenan ku he wazà minsan hengkey he meupiya he zini ebpuun te mezaat he kebayà te lawa ku, su minsan ke egkesuatan ku te ed-ulaula is meupiya, kenè ku egkeulaula.
Su is ed-ul-ulahan ku, ne kenà iyan sikan is meupiya he egkesuatan ku, kekenà, iyan is mezaat he igkeepes ku he ed-ul-ulahan ku.
Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan ku is kenè ku pezem ed-ul-ulahan, ne kenà a iyan ed-ulaula kayi, kekenà, iyan is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ku he iyan ebpuunan dutun te mezaat he ulaula.
Ne layun iring kayi is egkehitavù dini te kedì, ne emun ed-ulaula a pezem te meupiya, egkeeg̵en a te mezaat he kebayà he zini te lawa ku.
Ne sumalà is egkesuatan te g̵ehinawa ku, utew ku pezem egkesuati is kedtumana te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Iyan, dini te lawa ku, selakew is ebayàbayà kedì su edsug̵uen a te menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa ku he supaka ku is hustu he ulaula he egkesuatan te g̵ehinawa ku. Uripen a te mezaat he kebayè ku, ne ebpeketuman a te suat te lawa ku.
Utew merasey is egkeulaula ku! Hentei is ebpekevelukas kedì kayi te kegkeuripena kedì kayi te mekesesalà he lawa ku he midhukuman en te kemetayen?
Ne utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu nevelukasan e en!
Ne egkesavut niw en is egkeulaula ku. Su sakup is gehinawa ku te Megbevayà, ne is lawa ku, ne sakup mulà te mezaat he kebayè din.
Ne sikita is nekidsevaha ki Jesu Kristu, kenè ki en egkehukuman te silut.

Su pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesu Kristu imbeg̵ey kenita te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is beg̵u en he untung ne tenged kayi nelibri ki en te kebpekesalè ta he iyan edungguan din is kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan.

Wazà tavang he egkekuwà ta pinaag̵i te kedtumana ta te kesug̵uan geina te wazè ta mehimu te edtuman, iyan, is Megbevayà mulà, ne iyan neketavang kenita. Su midsug̵ù din sikan is Anak din he si Jesus he nehimu he etew. Ne si Jesus, duen lawa zin he iring te lawa ta su wey zin meseg̵azi ziyà te lawa zin is silut te Megbevayà tenged te menge salè tew. Ne pinaag̵i te kedsiluti zin ki Jesus, in-awè din is gehem te mezaat he kebayè ta.

Umba mid-ulaula heini te Megbevayà su wey ki meketuman te hustu sumalà is insug̵ù te kesug̵uan. Ne egkehimu heini su wazè en kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is mezaat he suat te lawa ta, kekenà, ebpeketuman ki te hustu su edtevangan ki te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Su is minsan hentei he iyan ebayàbayà kandin is mezaat he suat din, iyan din dà egkeisip is egkesuatan te menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zin. Ne is minsan hentei mulà he iyan ebayàbayà kandin is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is egkesuatan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne emun iyan ebayàbayà te isip te etew is menge mezaat he suat te lawa zin, edsilutan sikandin te kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, emun iyan mulà ebayàbayà te isip din is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, wazà pidtemanan te untung din, ne melinew en is kedepitè dan te Megbevayà.

Emun ebeyveyaan is isip te etew te menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zin, kuntada sikandin te Megbevayà su kenè din edtumanen is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà. Ne kenà duen dà taman su kenà egkehimu he egketuman din.
Is etew he ebeyveyaan te mezaat he suat te lawa zin, wazà ulaula zin he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Ne sikita mulà, kenè ki en ebeyveyaan te mezaat he suat te lawa ta su emun dini ed-ubpà te kenita is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ebeyveyaan ki te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne ke zuen etew he wazà diyà te kandin is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he midsug̵ù ni Kristu, kenà sikandin sakup ni Kristu.
Iyan, emun diyà te keniyu si Kristu, minsan pa te ebpatey zed is lawa niw tenged te salà, duen niw en gihapun beg̵u he untung tenged te mid-isip kew en te Megbevayà he metazeng.
Is Megbevayà, ne iyan mibanhew ki Jesu Kristu. Ne emun dini ed-ubpà te kenita is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he midsug̵ù din, ne ebenhawen ki zin daan pinaag̵i te Mulin-ulin he zini ed-ubpà te kenita.
Umba, menge suled, utew kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne kenè te en ebpezumdumahan is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta.

Su emun kenè niw iyan ed-iniyug̵an is menge suat te lawa niw, edsilutan kew te kemetayen he wazè din pidtemanan, iyan, ke pinaag̵i te kedtavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin egkeiniyug̵an niw is menge mezaat he ulaula niw, ebeg̵ayan kew te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Su emun ed-eg̵aken is minsan hentei te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin tutuu en he anak sikandin te Megbevayà.

Su is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he imbeg̵ey kenitew te Megbevayà, ne wazè kiw zin himuwa he menge uripen he utew egkengehandek te Megbevayà, kekenà, midhimu kiw zin he menge anak te Megbevayà. Ne pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin egkehimu en he egkeamey tew is Megbevayà.
Iyan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is ebpesavut kenitew he menge anak kiw iyan te Megbevayà.

Ne g̵eina te anak ki zin, keuzemà egkezawat ta is langun he meupiya he impenaad din kenita, ne kenà duen dà taman, su is minsan hengkey he ibeg̵ey zin ki Kristu, ibeg̵ey zin daan kenita. Iyan, wey ki zà ebpekeambit te utew meupiya he kebpekesavuk ni Kristu ke ed-entusen ta is menge kemereg̵enan tenged te kedtuu ta, iring te si Jesu Kristu, nekeantus daan te kemereg̵enan.
Ne netuenan ku he is kemereg̵enan he egkeseg̵azan ta g̵untaan dini te kelibutan, ne wazà mekesusuluwan te utew kegkelavew he ibeg̵ey kenita keuzemà.
Ne utew meheg̵et is kebperetenga te langun he menge linimbag te timpu keuzemà he zutun ibpaahà te Megbevayà is menge anak din he edtulusen.
Su is tivuuk he linimbag, tenged te iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà, midhimu zengan te Megbevayà he maawà is hustu he pulus din. Iyan, ebperetengen ta is timpu keuzemà
he edhimuwen te Megbevayà he wazè en kegkeredak kayi te tivuuk he linimbag, ne egkeveg̵u is langun iring te egkeveg̵u zaan is menge anak te Megbevayà he edtulusen.

Ne netuenan ta he is tivuuk he linimbag, ne iring te vahi he ebeliliten he utew edlised su puun pa zengan taman en guntaan ne utew edlised is tivuuk he linimbag tenged te meheg̵et is kebperetenga zan te timpu he id-awà te Megbevayà is kegkezeeti zan wey kegkeredak dan.

Ne kenà duen dà taman, su sikita zaan is nekezawat te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he iyan tuus he zuen pa keuzemà ibeg̵ey kenita te Megbevayà, utew egkeheg̵et is kebperetenga ta kayi. Su utew ta egkesuati he meume en haazà is timpu he zutun edhimesazen te Megbevayà is ked-anak-anak din kenita wey edtumanen din is kedtulusa zin te lawa ta.

Daan en he nelibri ki te silut, iyan, edteg̵azan te pa is kedtumana te Megbevayà kayi. Ne emun egkag̵i ki he zuen edteg̵azan ta, ibpesavut ta he wazè pa meulaula heini is edteg̵azan. Su wazà etew he edteg̵azan din is daan he nehitavù.
Iyan, emun wazè pa meulaula haazà is edteg̵azan ta, kinahanglan he edtigker ki is edtag̵ad.

Ne elin daan baal te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is: sikita is kenà metau, edtevangan ki zin su kenè ta egketuenan is hustu he id-ampù, iyan, is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne iyan sikandin ebpengeetuvang te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedhangyù he kenà egkehimu te kineg̵iyan te etew.

Ne is Amey tew he Megbevayà he nesayud te menge isip tew, netuenan din ke hengkey is diyà te isip te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne haazà is idhangyù te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin tenged kenitew te menge anak te Megbevayà, iyan daan egkesuatan te Megbevayà te ebeg̵ey kenitew.

Sikitew is langun he mahal is Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin, sikitew is midhimu zin he meketuu sumalà is tuyù diyà te isip din, netuenan tew he pinaag̵i te minsan hengkey he egkehitavù kenitew, edtuvazan kiw zin gihapun te meupiya.

Su zengan te puunè pa te minsan hengkey, netuenan te Megbevayà ke hentei is egkehimu he menge anak din ne migkag̵i zin he edhimuwen din sikandan he iring te Anak din he si Jesus. Ne zutun, egkehimu si Jesus he kakey tew te utew mezakel he menge hazi zin.

Ne zutun, sikitew is langun he mibpilì din wey mehimu he menge anak din, impetuu kiw zin daan. Ne kenà duen dà taman, su mid-isip kiw zin daan he metazeng he iring te wazè kiw mekesalà. Ne impenaad din daan he zuen timpu keuzemà he edtulusen kiw zin.
Ne emun ed-isipen ta is langun kayi, egketuenan ta he tutuu iyan he iyan duma ta is Megbevayà ne wazà minsan hentei he ebpekekaid kenita.

Su minsan is Anak din he si Jesus, wazè din menug̵uni, kekenà, midsug̵ù din wey mekepehimatey he elili kenita. Ne emun iyan haazà gag̵ew zin kenita, kenà egkehimu he kenè din daan ibeg̵ey kenita is langun he impenaad din kenita.
Ne wazà ebpekesumbung kenita te mibpilì te Megbevayà su is Megbevayà, mid-isip ki zin en he metazeng.

Ne wazà daan ebpekekag̵i he zait ki he edsilutan su edtevangan ki ni Jesu Kristu. Minatey sikandin he elili kenita ne kenà duen dà taman, su nevanhew en daan. Ne g̵untaan utew sikandin lavew su ziyà sikandin ebpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà ne edtevangan ki zin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Ne emun iyan haazà ne wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekepesuwey kenita ziyà te ki Kristu. Minsan ke egkerasey ki te kemereg̵enan wey samuk wey pesipala; minsan ke egkereg̵enan ki te vitil ne wazè ta ugelingen; minsan ke egkekeizan ki ne edhimetayan ki; ne kenà egkeawà is kebmahal ta ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Kristu.
Su zuen insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Tenged te midtuuwan dey sikew,
layun key hapit edhimetayi te menge etew.
Iring key te ayam he kerehidu he in-andam te kedlepaa
su ebpespesesag̵ad key zà ke keenu key edhimetayi.”
Ne minsan pa ke egkerasey ki kenè ki ebpetalew su ebpekeveg̵ey kenita te kelipey is ked-entusa ta kayi, ne pinaag̵i te g̵ehem ni Kristu, iyan ki ebpekezaag su utew zekelà is gag̵ew zin kenita.

Ne netuenan ku he wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekepesuwey kenita ziyà te zekelà he g̵ag̵ew kenita he impaahà te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su minsan kayi te uuyag ki pa wey ke ebpatey ki en be, ne kenà egkeawà is gag̵ew zin kenita. Kenà egkeawà te menge velinsug̵uen din wey te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Kenà egkeawà te minsan hengkey he egkeulaula g̵untaan wey egkeulaula keuzemà. Kenà daan egkeawà te minsan hengkey he kedesenan. Is menge kedesenan he ziyà te utew metikang wey is menge kedesenan he ziyà te utew mezalem, wey is minsan hengkey he linimbag, ne kenè dan ebpekepesuwey kenita ziyà te g̵ag̵ew kenita te Megbevayà he ibpeehè din kenita pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu he iyan Nengazen tew.
Duen egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu ne kenà tarù heini su sumusundan a ni Kristu. Ne netuenan ku zaan he kenà tarù heini su iyan ed-uwit te isip ku is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Iyan is: utew a egkeseeng ne kenà egkeawà is kesakit te g̵ehinawa ku tenged te menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu he kenà edtuu ki Kristu.
Ne ke egkehimu, egkesuatan ku pezem he iyan a edsilutan he ilis kandan ne ewaa is kebpekidsevaha ku ki Kristu su wey iyan sikandan melibri te silut.

Su menge kevuwazan daan sikandan ni Israyil; mid-anak-anak sikandan dengan te Megbevayà. Ne impeehè din kandan is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag din, ne zuen menge midtukud din he paag̵i te kedtuvazi zin kandan, ne imbeg̵ey zin kandan is kesug̵uan, ne impenurù din kandan is paag̵i te ked-ezapa kandin. Ne mezakel pa is meupiya he penaad din kandan.

Mibpilì din dengan is menge kepuun dan. Ne hein mibpeetew si Kristu he iyan Megbevayà he ebayàbayà te langun, in-anak sikandin he zuma zan he Hudiyu. Berakat he zelig̵a sikandin te wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne kenè ku iyan egkeg̵iyen he wazà tumana te Megbevayà is penaad din kandan, kekenà, iyan egkeg̵iyen ku he zuen duma te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he kenà sikandan tutuu he menge sakup te Megbevayà.
Is langun he egngezanan he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham, kenà daan langun te sikandan ed-isipen te Megbevayà he tutuu he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham,

Ne ibpesavut kenita kayi he iring te in-anak si Isaak tenged te kedtuu ni Abraham te penaad te Megbevayà, ne egkehimu ki he tutuu he anak te Megbevayà, kenà pinaag̵i te kegkevuwad ni Abraham, kekenà, pinaag̵i te kedsarig ta te penaad te Megbevayà. Emun edsarig ki te penaad te Megbevayà egkehimu ki he tutuu he kevuwazan ni Abraham.
Su migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham te, “Sengetuig pa g̵untaan edlikuan ku sikiyu ne ed-anak dutun si Sara te maama.”
Ne kenà duen dà taman su haazà is anak din he si Isaak, hein meg̵urang en ne nevuwad pinaag̵i te esawa zin he si Rebecca te zezuwa he anak he maama he sereping he si Hakub wey si Esau.

Ne si Rebecca, hein meg̵aan en ed-anak, migkeg̵iyan sikandin te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, “Sulug̵uen is kakey te hazi zin.” Migkag̵i zin heini te wazè pa ianak haazà is sereping, ne wazè pa ulaula zan he mezaat wey meupiya. Ne umba neulaula heini su ibpesavut te Megbevayà he is kebpilia zin te menge etew, ne kenà tenged te menge meupiya he ulaula he nehimu zan, kekenà, tenged dà te iyan egkesuatan din.
Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku si Hakub, kenà si Esau.”
Ne egkehimu he zuen egkag̵i he kenè bes metazeng is paag̵i te Megbevayà su zuen ibpelavi zin. Iyan, kenà iyan haazà ibpesavut ku.
Su migkag̵i zengan is Megbevayà diyà te ki Moises te, “Iyan a ebayàbayà ke hentei is egkehizuwan ku wey ke hentei is ebmahalen ku zini te g̵ehinawa ku,” ke sikandin.
Ne egkesavut ta zutun he is tuvad te Megbevayà te menusiyà, ne kenà pinaag̵i te kebayà te menusiyà, wey menge meupiya he ulaula te menusiyà, kekenà, pinaag̵i zà te hizu te Megbevayà.

Iyan, emun iyan egkesuatan din egkehimu he kenè din egkehizuwan is etew, su penenglitan kes hadì dengan diyà te Ihiptu, wazà sikandin mehizuwi te Megbevayà su migkeg̵iyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, “Umba midhimu ku sikew he hadì su wey pinaag̵i te kegkezaag̵a ku kenikew ibpeehè ku is dekelà he g̵ehem ku ne wey mevantug a zini te tivuuk he kelibutan.”

Ne egketuenan ta zutun he is Megbevayà, ne iyan ebayàbayà ke hentei is igkehizu zin sumalà is egkesuatan din te minsan hentei. Ne iyan daan sikandin ebayàbayà ke hentei is idtug̵ut din he kenà ebpezumazuma kandin sumalà is egkesuatan din te minsan hentei.
Ne siguradu zuen egkag̵i he emun iyan haazà ulaula te Megbevayà ne maan is egkepeukan din is menge etew tenged te menge salè dan te ebpekepezumazuma zè man sikandan te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Ne iyan egkekag̵i ku kayi is: ebpeketavak ki ve te Megbevayà is linimbag din dà? Egkehimu ve he ebpekeinsè ki is mibeelan te mibaal kenita te, “Maan is mibeelan a kenikew he iring kayi?”

Iring te ebpendiyun su ke ediyunen din is dezuwa he kuzen, iyan sikandin ebayàbayà ke hendei zapit dutun te zezuwa is edhimuwen din he utew mekempet he ed-ehaan su edeyzeyanan din, wey ke hendei zapit is edhimuwen din he kenà utew mekempet su kuzen dà duen.

Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula te Megbevayà su zutun te ibpelepew zin en is rerangit din wey is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he silut din, mid-isip din he edtigkeren din dè pà is pauk din dutun te menge etew he kinahanglan he edsilutan din.
Ne iyan heini mid-ulaula zin su wey sikita is egkehizuwan din, ikepesavut din kenita ke hengkey is utew meupiya he kebpekesavuk din su midteg̵enahan ki zin wey ki zin keuzemà metulus.
Iyan ki impetuu zin, iyan, is menge etew he impetuu zin, ne kenà menge Hudiyu zà, kekenà, elin daan is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Su ziyà te libru he insurat ni Oseas duen Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Is menge etew he kenè ku menge sakup,
edhimuwen ku he menge sakup ku.
Ne sikandan is kenà mahal zengan dini te g̵ehinawa ku,
ebmahalen ku en guntaan.”
Ne zuen daan Lalag te Megbevayà, he edhenduen te,
“Ne heini is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu,
egkehimu he zutun te inged he migkeg̵iyan ku sikandan he kenè dan menge sakup ku,
egngezanan ku sikandan gihapun he menge anak ku te wazè din kemetayen
he Megbevayà.”
Ne zuen daan lalag ni Esaias dengan mehitenged te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil, he ke sikandin te,
“Utew zan mezakel, ne kenè en sikandan egkevilang
su iring te menge pantad diyà te veyvey te zag̵at,
ne minsan pa zutun,
deisey zà kandan is egkelibri te silut te Megbevayà.
Su kenà duwazuwa he egkeuma haazà is andew
he segugunà edtumanen te Megbevayà is kedlimasa zin te tivuuk he menusiyà.”
Ne iring heini te zaan he netagnà he migkag̵i ni Esaias he edhenduen te,
“Angin ke wazè kiw is menge Hudiyu
mehizuwi te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà su wazà
minsan deisey zà he egkesamà kenitew
su midlimas kiw zin en pezem iring te menge meg̵inged
dutun te menge inged
he Suduma wey Gumura.”

Ne iyan ibpesavut ku kayi is: is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, minsan pa te wazà metag̵ù diyà te isip dan he egkehimu he meisip sikandan he metazeng te Megbevayà, duen menge zuma kandan he pinaag̵i te kedtuu zan mid-isip sikandan gihapun he metazeng.
Iyan, is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, kunaan dan ke egkehimu sikandan he metazeng pinaag̵i te kedserig̵i zan te kedtumana te kesug̵uan, ne nasì wazà heini mehimu.

Ne maan is wazà heini mehimu? Su iyan dan midserig̵an is keugelingen dan he menge ulaula he meupiya ne wazè dan medtuu ki Jesu Kristu. Ne tenged kayi nehimu sikandan he iring te menge etew he nekesipà te zekelà he vatu ziyà te zalan.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Duen idsavuk ku he vatu ziyà te inged te menge Hudiyu he Siyun.
Egkesipà heini te menge etew ne ebpekeurambak dan,
iyan, ke zuen edsarig kayi te vatu,
kenè en ebkepeel-elezan.”
Menge suled, utew ad egkesuat ke egkengelibri te silut te Megbevayà is menge zuma ku he Hudiyu ne iyan heini id-ampù ku layun te Megbevayà.
Netuenan ku he utew mezesen is kedtumana zan te tuluuwen dan he kunaan dan ke egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan, wazè dan metueni is hustu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su wazè dan dewata is paag̵i te Megbevayà te kebpeketerenga zin kandan. Ne iyan dan migamit is keugelingen dan he paag̵i he iyan is kedtumana te kesug̵uan ne wazè dan medsunud te paag̵i te Megbevayà te kebpeketerenga zin kandan.
Su midhimu ni Kristu he wazè en pulus te kedsarig te kedtuman te kesug̵uan su wey is minsan hentei, pinaag̵i zà te kedtuu ki Kristu, ebpeketezengen sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, duen insurat he lalag ni Moises mehitenged te kebpeketezenga te etew pinaag̵i te kedtumana te kesug̵uan he edhenduen te, “Is etew he iyan edserig̵an din is kedtumana zin te kesug̵uan, ne egkeveg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan emun wazà minsan hengkey he sayep dutun te kebpurungi zin kedtumana te minsan hengkey he insug̵ù dutun te kesug̵uan,” ke si Moises.

Iyan, mehitenged te kebpeketezenga te etew he egkehimu pinaag̵i te kedtuu, duen daan insurat he lalag he edhenduen te, “Kenè niw isipa he wey ki zà ed-isipa te Megbevayà he metazeng ke zuen edhendiyà te langit wey meveyai si Kristu,
ne kenè niw zaan isipa he kinahanglan he zuen edhendiyà te Iveyaan su ebenhawen si Kristu.”

Su zuen duma pa he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ebpesavut kenita he utew melemu is kebpeketuu ta te Lalag te Megbevayà su is Lalag te Megbevayà, daan dini te kenita, ne egkehimu he ibpenudtul ta te zuma. Ne heini is Lalag te Megbevayà mehitenged te kedtuu ki Kristu, ne iyan daan edtudtulen dey.
Ne emun edtudtulen niw ziyà te zuma he iyan en Nengazen si Jesus, ne emun hustu is kedtuuwi niw he mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà, egkelibri kew te silut te Megbevayà.
Su pinaag̵i te isip ta ke edtuu ki ed-isipen ki te Megbevayà he metazeng, ne zutun ebpenudtulen ta ziyà te zuma is kedtuu ta ne human egkeheg̵et is kedlibriya kenita te silut.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is minsan hentei he edsarig kandin, utew meupiya is edungguan din.”

Su is Nengazen, wazè din ibpelavi te minsan hentei he etew, minsan ke Hudiyu wey ke kenà be Hudiyu, ne umba wazè din ibpelavi kayi su Nengazen sikandin te minsan hentei ne edtevangan din is minsan hentei he etew he ebpetavang kandin.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is minsan hentei he ebpetavang te Nengazen, edlibriyen sikandin te silut te Megbevayà.”

Iyan, kenà egkehimu he ebpetavang te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu is menge etew he wazà meketuu kandin. Ne kenà daan egkehimu he edtuu te Nengazen is menge etew he wazè pa metudtuli mehitenged kandin. Ne kenà sikandan egkeumahan te tudtul ke wazà ebpenudtul ziyà te kandan.

Ne wey zà egkehimu is ebpenudtul ke edsug̵uen sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne zuen iyan midsug̵ù te Megbevayà su iring te migkag̵i ziyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he “Utew igkeg̵alew is kebpekeuma te menge etew he edsangyew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.”

Iyan, dutun te kebpesevuta te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, mezelag dà is Hudiyu he edtuu su zuen menge lalag dengan ni Esaias diyà te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “He Nengazen, henduen be te wazà edtuu te impesavut dey,” ke sikandin.
Ne wey zà ebpeketuu is etew emun egkezineg din is kebpesevuta te tutuu he tuluuwen, ne is tutuu he tuluuwen, ne iyan is kebpesavut mehitenged ki Kristu.

Ne siguradu zuen egkag̵i he umba ves wazà meketuu is menge Hudiyu su wazè dan mezineg heini is kebpesavut, iyan, kenà egkehimu he wazè dan mezineg, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Heini is lalag, ne nekeeneb is kebpenudtula kayi
te tivuuk he menusiyà ne wazà taman te kedsengyawa kayi,” ke sikandin.

Ne kela ke kunaan ta ke wazà mesavut te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil is impenudtul kandan, iyan, nesavut dan en he zaan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà dengan diyà te kandan pinaag̵i te lalag ni Moises he edhenduen te,
“Edhimuwen ku keuzemà he egkeima kew is menge Hudiyu te kedtevangi ku te menge etew he kenà menge pinilì ku.
Ne edhimuwen ku he egkepauk kew tenged te kegkehizuwi ku te menge etew he zengan wazè dan metueni ke hentei a,” ke sikandin.
Ne keladu pa utew is Lalag te Megbevayà he impenudtul zengan ni Esaias su edhenduen te,
“Neturedu a te menge etew he kenà ebpen-ahà kedì,
ne minsan ke wazè e zan iinsà,
impesavut ku kandan ke hentei a,” ke sikandin.

Ne zuen daan egkeg̵iyen te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te menge lalag ni Esaias mehitenged te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he edhenduen te, “Utew mezesen is gehinawa zan he menge etew wey utew zan mesinupaken su layun ku sikandan edhengyui he medtuu zan kedì, iyan, kenè dan ebpemineg.”

Ne kenè tew ed-isipen he tenged te wazà medtuu is menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil, mid-engkezan en te Megbevayà is tivuuk he kehudiyuwan su siak, Hudiyu a zaan iring kandan; kepuun ku si Abraham su kevuwazan a he ebpuun duen te sevaha he kevuwazan din he si Benjamin.

Is Megbevayà, ne kenà egkehimu he ed-engkezan din is menge etew he nepilì din dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey. Egkesavut ta heini ziyà te insurat dengan mehitenged ki Elias su hein mid-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula te menge zuma zin he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ke sikandin diyà te Megbevayà te,
“He Nengazen, midhimetayan dan is menge ebpeneuven nu, ne midrundus dan is menge pemuhatà he zutun ka ed-ezapa, ne iyan e zà nesamà he ed-azap kenikew ne egkesuatan e zan daan te edhimatey.”

Ne midtavak kandin is Megbevayà te, “Duen pitu pa he libu he menge etew he zuma nu he kevuwazan ni Israyil he wazè dan ezapa si Baal, is kenà tutuu he megbevayà.” Iyan heini Lalag te Megbevayà ki Elias.
Ne iring din ded daan guntaan su zuen pa kenà utew mezakel he menge Hudiyu he nemeketuu su iyan sikandan sikan is nengepilì te Megbevayà tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin kandan.

Umba mibpilì din sikandan su tenged dà te g̵ag̵ew zin kandan ne kenà tenged te mid-ulaula zan te egkesuatan din. Ne emun suhul kandan haazà is kebpilia zin kandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he meupiya, ne kenà egkehimu he tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin dà mibpilì din sikandan.

Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà, egkesavut ta he is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ebpurungan dan pezem ebpenahaa is kegkehimu kandan he metazeng, iyan, wazà mebpulus heini ziyà te kandan. Ne minsan pa zutun, duen kenà utew mezakel he menge zuma zan he nepilì te Megbevayà ne heini mulà, midhimu en sikandan he metazeng. Ne is kezekelan, migkubalan is gehinawa zan, ne kenà ed-utengan te Lalag te Megbevayà.

Su zuen insurat dengan he edhenduen te, “Midhimu te Megbevayà he mevevened is isip dan su wey zan kenà mekesavut. Ne taman en guntaan kenè dan egketuenan ke hengkey is tutuu, ne kenè dan egkesavut is hustu.”
Ne tenged te kenà kedtuu te menge Hudiyu, duen daan migkag̵i zengan ni David he edhenduen te,
“Berakat he tenged te menge meupiya he intuvad kandan te Megbevayà meisip dan he wazè dan salà,
ne berakat he pinaag̵i kayi edsilutan sikandan.
Berakat he lekapa is mata zan su wey zan mekeurambak,
ne verakat daan he wazà pidtemanan te kegkeveg̵ati zan te menge seeng dan.”

Ne nekeurambak is menge zuma ku he Hudiyu pinaag̵i te kenè dan kedtuu ki Kristu, iyan, kenè niw isipa he kenà egkehimu te Megbevayà he mekelikù dan te kedtuu. Tenged te kenè dan kebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà nehimu he nengelibri te silut is menge kenà Hudiyu su wey meima is menge Hudiyu. Ne umba nehimu heini su wey likui te menge Hudiyu is kedtuu zan ke egkeehè dan he nengelibri en is kenà menge Hudiyu.

Ne pinaag̵i te supak te menge Hudiyu he iyan is kenè dan kedtuu, midtuvazan te Megbevayà te utew meupiya is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne pinaag̵i zaan te naawà diyà te menge Hudiyu is kedtuvazi kandan te Megbevayà, utew zekelà is kebpaahaa te Megbevayà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu te g̵ag̵ew zin. Ne emun iyan heini, wey pe be kenà utew pa zekelà is meupiya he egkezawat te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu zutun te timpu keuzemà ke edlikuan te menge Hudiyu is kedtuu zan.

Ne sikiyu is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, duen egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu. Siak, epustul a he mibpilì te Megbevayà wey ku ikesangyew ziyan te keniyu is lalag din. Ne umba ebpurungan ku te edtuman is ebpeveelan din kediey,
su egkesuatan ku he meima is menge zuma ku he Hudiyu pinaag̵i te kedtevangi ku keniyu. Su kela ke pinaag̵i zutun duen duma kandan he edtuu ne egkelibri te idsilut te Megbevayà.

Su emun dutun te kedsuwayi te Megbevayà te menge Hudiyu, nehimu he nekidsevaha is Megbevayà te menge kenà Hudiyu, ne wey pe be kenà lavew pa he utew meupiya is idtuvad dutun te menge kenà Hudiyu ke ebpekid-uliey en maan is Megbevayà diyà te menge Hudiyu. Utew meupiya is egkeulaula zutun su zutun he timpu iring is tivuuk he menusiyà te minatey he nevanhew en!

Ne g̵eina te neg̵aked te Megbevayà si Abraham, si Isaak, wey si Hakub, is menge kepuun te menge Hudiyu, kenà egkehimu he kenà daan gaked te Megbevayà is menge kevuwazan dan. Emun gaked te Megbevayà is dalid te kayu, kinahanglan he g̵aked din daan is lawa.

Is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ne iring sikandan te kayu he ulivu he ed-elimahan te Megbevayà. Ne zuen menge subpang dutun te kayu he midtamped te Megbevayà. Ne sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, ne iring kew te menge subpang te wazà ipemula he ulivu he in-ilis te Megbevayà he impetuvù din dutun te midtempezan din te subpang. Ne iring ded daan guntaan utew meupiya is kedtuvazi keniyu te Megbevayà, iring te meupiya zaan is kedtuvazi zin dengan te menge Hudiyu.

Ne kinahanglan he kenè niw isipa he lavew kew kenà is menge Hudiyu su menge subpang kew zà daan ne is sustansya te subpang, ne ziyà ebpuun te lawa te kayu ne kenà ebpuun diyà te menge subpang is sustansya te lawa.
Ne egkehimu he zuen egkag̵i te, “Sikami is kenà menge Hudiyu, iyan key lavew su iyan key in-ilis te Megbavayà te menge Hudiyu.”

Ne venar iyan he iyan kew in-ilis, iyan, umba in-awà is menge Hudiyu te Megbevayà su wazè dan medtuu. Ne umba in-ilis kew kandan su midtuu kew mulà. Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, kenè niw isipa he iyan kew lavew, kekenà, tegteg̵ami niw is menge ulaula niw.
Su emun midtamped te Megbevayà is menge tutuu he menge subpang,

Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkesavut ta is gag̵ew te Megbevayà wey ke maan is edsilut sikandin. Midsilutan din is wazà mebpemineg, iyan, igkehizu kew zin ke edhemenan niw is gag̵ew zin, su emun kenà, ne id-awè kew zin daan.
Ne is menge Hudiyu, emun ed-engkezan dan is kenè dan kedtuu kandin, idlikù sikandan te Megbevayà duen te zaan he ebpuunan dan dutun te puun te kayu su egkehimu zin is kedlikua zin kandan.

Ne sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, kenè kew tutuu he menge subpang dutun te kayu su ziyè kew ebpuun te kayu he kenà pinemula, ne midhimu kew zin he subpang dutun te kayu he ed-elimahan din. Ne emun egkehimu heini keniyu te ebpuun te kayu he kenà pinemula, wey pe be kenè din egkehimu he idlikù din sikan is tutuu he menge subpang dutun te zaan he ebpuunan dan.

Egkesuatan ku, menge suled, he mesavut niw is ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà he zengan wazà mesavut te menusiyà. Umba ibpesavut ku heini keniyu su wey kenè niw isipa he iyan kew lavew kenà is menge Hudiyu. Ne minsan pa te intug̵ut te Megbevayà te zuma he menge Hudiyu is kenè dan kedtuu, duen timpu keuzemà he ed-engkezan dan is kenè dan kedtuu te Megbevayà su taman dà heini zutun te timpu he egkeamin ebpeketuu is langun he kenà menge Hudiyu he imbanglis te Megbevayà kandan is kebpeketuu zan.
Ne zutun egkeamin egkelibri te silut is langun he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Duen Menluluwas he ziyà ebpuun te menge Hudiyu
ne pinaag̵i kandin ed-engkezan te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Hakub is kenè dan ked-azap kediey te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te ked-ewaa ku
te menge ulaula zan he mezaat,
human egketuman is penaad ku zengan kandan,” ke sikandin.

Ne is duma he menge Hudiyu, ne nehimu sikandan he menge kuntada te Megbevayà tenged te wazè dan medtuu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne tenged dutun nehimu he iyan kew is kenà menge Hudiyu, nelibri te silut. Ne minsan pa zutun, kemulu pa mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Megbevayà is menge Hudiyu tenged te pinilì din sikandan wey tenged te menge penaad din dengan diyà te menge kepuun dan.
Su kenà egkehalinhalin is ed-isipen te Megbevayà, kekenà, is ebpilien din he menge etew, ne iyan daan edtuvazan din te meupiya.
Ne sikiyu zaan is kenà menge Hudiyu, dengan wazè kew mebpemineg te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan nehizuwan kew zin tenged te kenà guntaan kebpemineg te menge Hudiyu.
Ne iring din ded daan diyà te kandan, su minsan pa te kenè dan guntaan ebpemineg, egkehimu he iring te kegkehizuwi wey kebpeseyluwa keniyu te Megbevayà, egkehizuwan din daan sikandan keuzemà.
Su is Megbevayà, ne impeehè din he mesinupaken wey zait he edsilutan is minsan hentei he menusiyà. Impeehè din heini su wey, pinaag̵i kayi, mehimu zaan he egkehizuwan din sikandan is langun.
Utew zekelà is gag̵ew te Megbevayà; kenà egketegkad is ketau zin wey kedsavut din. Kenà egkesavut te etew is menge ulaula zin ne kenà egkeseysey te minsan hentei is ed-ul-ulahan din.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Wazà ebpeketegkad te ed-isipen te Megbevayà ne kenà daan kinahanglan he zuen edsambag kandin.
Wazà kurang din te minsan hengkey, ne kenà egkehimu he zuen ibeg̵ey tew kandin he egkehimu he egkeutang din kenitew.”

Iyan sikandin sikan is nenlimbag te minsan hengkey; ne iyan sikandin ed-uwit te minsan hengkey he linimbag, ne pinaag̵i zaan te minsan hengkey he linimbag edelig̵en sikandin. Berakat he zelig̵a is Megbevayà te wazè pidtemanan.

Na, menge suled, tenged te utew zekelà he hizu kenitew te Megbevayà, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ipeveyveyai niw kandin is lawa niw wey g̵ehinawa niw. Iyan heini ibpemuhat he kenà edhimetayan, ne kinahanglan he wazà igkesawey zuen su wey mesuati te Megbevayà. Ne iyan heini hustu he ked-ezapa niw kandin.

Kenè niw iringi is menge ulaula te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà, kekenà, itug̵ut niw he helina kew te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kebeg̵uwa zin te isip niw. Ne zutun egkesavut niw human is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, egkesavut niw ke hengkey is menge ulaula he metazeng he egkesuatan he kenà egkesewayan te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged te imbeg̵ey kedì te Megbevayà is keg̵ehem te kedsengyawa te lalag din, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu te langun he kinahanglan he kenè niw isipa he lavew kew te menge zuma niw, kekenà, kinahanglan he hustu is ked-isipa niw te ketau niw sumalà is kedtuu he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà diyà te kada sevaha keniyu.
Su is kada sevaha kenitew ne zuen din lawa, ne is menge parti kayi, ne kenà ed-iiring-iring is baal te kada sevaha.
Ne iring din ded daan, sikitew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu, ne nehimu kiw he iring te lawa zin, ne iyan kiw menge parti zutun. Neubpu is kada sevaha he parti te menge zuma zin he parti.

Ne zuen ketau he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà diyà te kada sevaha he parti, asal, kenà ebpeked-iiring haazà is ketau te kada sevaha. Kinahanglan he egemiten ta is ketau he imbeg̵ey kenita. Ne penenglitan ke imbeg̵ey ziyà te sevaha is ketau te kebpesevuta te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kinahanglan he mekeikul heini te tuluuwen he midtuuwan ta.

Ne emun iyan imbeg̵ey kenita is ketau te kedtavang te menge zuma ta, kinahanglan he ebpeniguduwan ta is kedtavang. Ne emun duen ketau ta te kebpenurù te Lalag te Megbevayà, ne ebpurungan ta is kebpenurù ta.

Ne emun iyan imbeg̵ey kenita is ketau te kedheg̵eta te kedtuu te menge zuma ta ne iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ta. Ne emun iyan imbeg̵ey kenita is ketulanged ta te kedtavang te menge etew he egkengeayuayu, ne kinahanglan he edtulanged ki te kedtavang kandan. Ne emun iyan imbeg̵ey kenita is kedumelaha te menge tumutuu ne kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta is kedumala ta. Ne emun iyan imbeg̵ey kenita is kedtavang te menge etew he edlised ne kinahanglan he kenà pinaag̵i te ked-usur is ked-ul-ulaha ta kayi.
Kinahanglan he kenà tarù is kegkeg̵eg̵awi ta te menge zuma ta. Kinahanglan he utew ta igkeepes is mezaat he ulaula. Edhemenan ta is meupiya he ulaula.
Sikitew is midsusuled pinaag̵i ki Kristu, ibpeehè tew he mahal zini te g̵ehinawa tew is kada sevaha kenitew, ne ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa tew is kedtahud tew te menge zuma tew.
Kenè kiw ebpepepeg̵ul, kekenà, edheg̵eten tew ziyà te g̵ehinawa tew is kedtumana tew te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he layun kiw edlipey su zuen utew meupiya he egkezawat tew keuzemà. Ed-entusen tew is menge kemereg̵enan ne layun kiw ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Ebeg̵ayan tew te tavang is menge suled tew he egkengeayuayu. Ne ibpepemenahik ta ziyà te valey ta is etew he humuhulevungà.
Is ebpesipala kenita, id-ampù ta ziyà te Megbevayà he tuvazi zin. Ne kenè ta iyan id-ampù he siluti zin.
Ke zuen etew he zuen din igkelipey, melipey kew zaan tenged dutun te kelipey zin. Ne ke zuen etew he zuen igkeseeng din, keseeng kew zaan tenged dutun te igkeseeng din.
Kinahanglan he mesevaha is gehinawa niw te menge tumutuu. Kenè kew mebmepelevawen, kekenà, mebpekiduma kew te menge etew he minus is pid-etawan dan. Ne kenè niw isipa he uluwanen kew kenà sikandan.
Ke zuen ebpesipala keniyu kenè kew mebales. Peniguduwi niw te ed-ulaula is menge ulaula he kenà egkesewayan te minsan hentei.
Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey melinawen is kebpekesavuk niw, ne wazà igkepeuki keniyu te minsan hentei.

Kenè niw, menge minahal ku he suled, velesi is etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat diyà te keniyu, kekenà, pesegdana niw he iyan edsilut is Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Iyan a ebales; iyan a edsilut.”

Iyan ed-ul-ulahan ta is sambag te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Emun egkevitil is kuntada nu, ipekaan nu. Emun egkemezahan, ipeinum. Su emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan nu, utew sikandin egkeeled tenged te pesipala zin kenikew.”

Minsan ke utew mezaat is pesipala kenita kenè ta ebelesan te mezaat su emun ebelesan ta, egkezaag ki su egkeuwit ki te mezaat. Iyan ed-ul-ulahan ta is meupiya he vales ne tenged kayi iyan egkezaag is kuntada ta su egkeuwit sikandin te meupiya.
Ne kinahanglan he edtuman kiw te velaud te gubirnu is minsan hentei kenitew. Su wazà ebpemunuan te inged he wazà itug̵ut te Megbevayà he mekepemunuan wey wazà gubirnu he wazà tukuza te Megbevayà.
Ne is menge etew he edsukul te gubirnu, ne iyan edsukulan dan is midtukud te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.

Su wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek ki te ebpemunuan kenita ke meupiya is menge ulaula ta; wey ki zà egkehandek ke ebaal ki te mezaat. Emun egkesuat kew he kenè kew mahandek te menge ebpemunuan ne ul-ulaha niw is meupiya he ulaula ne edelig̵en kew zan.

Ne haazà is etew he ed-uwit te velaud, ne sulug̵uen sikandin te Megbevayà su wey mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk tew. Ne emun mezaat is ulaula tew ne hustu iyan he igkehandek tew su egkehimu he meveg̵at is idsilut din. Sulug̵uen sikandin te Megbevayà ne edtumanen din is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ke edsilutan din is menge mesinupaken.
Tumana niw is menge sug̵ù te gubirnu, kenà tenged dà te egkehandek kew te silut te Megbevayà, kekenà, tenged te netuenan niw he iyan heini hustu he ed-ul-ulahan.
Ne iyan daan heini ketezengan ke maan is ebayad ki te vuhis, su is menge upisyal, ne iring te iyan egalen dan is Megbevayà ke hustu is kedtumana zan te ebpeveelan kandan.

Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebeyazan ta is buhis wey is duma pa he ebpeveyazan kenita te gubirnu. Ne edtehuzen ta zaan is menge etew te gubirnu, ne ibpeehè ta is dekelà he kedtehuza ta te pid-etawan dan.

Kenè niw pekelug̵eyaza is kebeyazi niw te menge utang niw ziyà te minsan hentei, kekenà, iyan niw pekelug̵eyaza te wazè din en taman is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te menge zuma niw, su is etew he ebmahalen din is menge zuma zin, ne netuman din en is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà.

Su zuen insurat dutun te kesug̵uan he edhenduen te, “Kenè niw selselai is esawa niw; ne kenè kew pemumunù; ne kenè kew penakew; ne kenè niw isipa he egkesuatan niw is azen te zuma he etew.” Ne heini is menge sug̵ù wey is duma pa, ne egketuman ta heini is langun ke edtumanen ta is sug̵ù he edhenduen te, “Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu; irepeng nu sikandin te kenikew he g̵ehinawa.”
Su emun ebmahalen ta is duma ta ne kenà egkehimu he ebpesipelahan ta sikandin, ne netuman te en heini is tivuuk he kesug̵uan.

Kinahanglan he iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ta su netuenan ta ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan kayi te timpu. Su puun guntaan, is timpu keuzemà he zutun edhimesazen te Megbevayà is kedlibriya zin kenitew, uvey en kenà dutun te timpu zengan he neketuu kiw. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he kenè kiw iring te etew he nekelipezeng, kekenà, iring te etew he ed-andam.

Su zini te kelibutan, iring te utew merusirem tenged te mezaat he ulaula, iyan, meg̵aan en egketapus is kezukileman su meg̵aan en egkepawà, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, meg̵aan en edlikù si Kristu. Ne tenged kayi, ed-engkezan tew en is menge mezaat he ulaula he zait te kezukileman ne idsun-ud tew is limbutung he iyan is kerayag, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, ed-ul-ulahan tew is meupiya he ulaula.

Ed-ul-ulahan tew is hustu su iyan heini ulaula he zait te menge etew he neteyawan te Megbevayà. Kenè ki en edtampu te ketig̵uman te ebpemelelangut ne kenè ta egkevuten is kenè ta esawa. Kenè ki ebpekid-eg̵et wey kenè ki egkesina.
Ne idsun-ud ta is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu,

Ne ke zuen duma niw he edtuu ki Kristu, iyan, kenè pa meheg̵et is kedtuu zin, dewata niw sikandin, iyan, kenè kew mebpekidlewanà kandin ke is ulaula zin tenged te kedtuu zin, ne kenà utew ebpekeiring te keniyu.

Is etew he meheg̵et en is kedtuu zin, ne iyan ed-isipen din is: egkehimu ke egkeenen ta is minsan hengkey he egkeenen, iyan, is etew he kenè pa meheg̵et is kandin he kedtuu, ne kunaan din ke wazà itug̵ut kenitew is kegkaan te minsan hengkey he usa, ne menge lumbey zà is idsezè din.

Ne is etew he egkeenen din is minsan hengkey, kinahanglan he kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin te etew he menge lumbey zà is idsezè din. Ne iring din ded daan su is etew he menge lumbey zà is idsezè din, ne kinahanglan he kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin te etew he egkaan te minsan hengkey, su midawat sikandan pudu te Megbevayà.

Kenà egkehimu he edsusiyen ta is menge ulaula te sulug̵uen te sengeeetew en su haazà is egalen din, iyan edsusi kandin ke netuman din en be is ebpeveelan kandin wey ke wazà. Ne iring din ded daan, kenà egkehimu he edsusiyen ta is menge ulaula te zuma ta he tumutuu su iyan edsusi kandin is Megbevayà. Siguradu he egketuman din is ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà su edtavang kandin is Megbevayà.

Ne iring din ded daan, ed-isipen te sevaha he etew he zuen menge andew he utew mahal ziyà te Megbevayà, ne ed-isipen daan te sevaha pa maan he wazà ibpelavi te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he andew. Kinahanglan he mevenari is kada sevaha he is egkeisip din wey ed-ul-ulahan din, ne iyan hustu he ed-ul-ulahan.

Su is etew he egkeisip din he utew mahal is sevaha he andew, ne umba egkeisip din is iring dutun su wey mesuat is Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he egkaan te minsan hengkey, umba egkeenen din su egkeisip din he iyan haazà egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne egkepeselematan din haazà te Megbevayà. Ne is etew he menge lumbey zà is idsezè din, ne umba iyan dà haazà idsezè din su egkeisip din he iyan haazà egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne egkepeselematan din daan haazà te Megbevayà.
Su wazà minsan sevaha kenitew te menge tumutuu he kenà layun gaked te Megbevayà ke zini ki pa te kelibutan wey ke minatey ki en be.
Su emun uuyag ki pa ne sakup ki te Megbevayà, ne emun ebpatey ki ne iring din ded daan. Ne umba, ke uuyag ki pa wey ke minatey ki en be, gaked ki g̵ihapun te Megbevayà.
Su umba mibpehimatey si Kristu wey nevanhew sikandin su wey mekevayàbayà sikandin te menge tumutuu kandin he uuyag pa wey minatey en.

Ne g̵eina te iyan heini, kenà meupiya ke iyan ki edsawey te menge ulaula te menge suled ta te kedtuu wey ke egkeminusan ki kandan su keuzemà sikitew is langun, ebpekeetuvang te Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin edsusi kenitew te langun.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, ne zutun migkag̵i is Nengazen te,
“Iyan a wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà
ne tenged kayi tutuu iyan he edluhuzan a te tivuuk he menusiyà,
ne ebpekeazap kediey is langun.”
Ne zutun diyè kiw ebpekeetuvang te Megbevayà su edsusiyen kiw zin ne egkekag̵i ta kandin is langun he mid-ulaula ta zini te kelibutan.

Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, ed-engkezan te en is kedsawey ta te menge ulaula te menge zuma ta he tumutuu. Su kinahanglan he ed-ahaan ta is kenita he menge ulaula su wey wazà minsan hengkey he ulaula ta he ibpekesalà te menge zuma ta.

Tenged te kebpekidsevaha ku te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, impesavut kedì he wazà minsan hengkey he egkeenen he idawey te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke zuen etew he edtuuwan din he indawey te Megbevayà is sevaha he egkeenen ne kenà meupiya ke egkeenen din.

Ne emun egkeenen niw haazà is kunaan din ke indawey, utew ibmesakit haazà te g̵ehinawa zin ne iring te wazè kew megeg̵awi. Ne kenà meupiya, emun egkepenulayan haazà is etew pinaag̵i te kegkaan niw zutun su zuma niw man he tumutuu ne mibpehimatey si Kristu he elili zaan kandin.

Ne ke zuen ulaula he egkeisip te zuma he tumutuu he indawey te Megbevayà, iyan, netuenan niw he wazà izawey te Megbevayà haazà is ulaula, kenè niw ul-ulaha su wey kenà ebpekekag̵i is minsan hentei he mezaat is mid-ulaula niw.

Su is kedhedii kenita te Megbevayà, ne kenà pinaag̵i te kedtumana ta te menge sug̵ù mehitenged te menge keenen wey inumen he idawey, kekenà, pinaag̵i te kebpeketezenga kenita te Megbevayà he metazeng wey pinaag̵i te melinawen he kebpekidepitè ta te menge zuma ta, wey pinaag̵i zaan te kelipey he ibeg̵ey te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Ne ke pinaag̵i kayi edsundanan ta si Kristu, igkesuat ki utew te Megbevayà, ne egkesuatan daan te menge etew is menge ulaula ta.
Umba ebpurungan ta is menge ulaula ta su wey kenà maawà is melinawen he kebpekidepitè ta te menge zuma ta ne wey zaan meheg̵et is kedtuu te kada sevaha kenitew.

Ne kenè niw zèdeeti is ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kegkaan niw te egkeenen he kunaan te zuma ke indawey kenita. Egkehimu ke egkaan ki te minsan hengkey he egkeenen, iyan, emun iyan ibpekesalà te zuma is kegkaan ta ne kenà haazà meupiya.

Ne iyan meupiya he ulaula is kenè ki egkaan te egkeenen he kunaan te zuma ke indawey, ne kenè ki ed-inum te vinu, wey kenè ta ed-ul-ulahan is minsan hengkey emun pinaag̵i zutun egkepenulayan is minsan hentei.

Ne ke minsan hendei zapit is edtuuwan niw mehitenged kayi kenè niw petueni te menge zuma niw su iyan ebayàbayà keniyu is Megbevayà. Utew zeyzey is etew he kenà egkesewayan te g̵ehinawa zin is menge ulaula zin.

Ne ke zuen etew he egkevahinbahin is gehinawa zin su wazè din metueni ke supak is kegkaan din wey ke kenà, ne emun egkeenen din haazà is kunaan din ke indawey ne ebpekesalà sikandin te Megbevayà su edsupaken din is netag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa zin. Emun ed-ul-ulahan ta is midtuuwan ta he kenà meupiya, ne ebpekesalè ki.

Ne sikitew is meheg̵et is kedtuu te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ed-entusen ta is kenè ta ked-ul-ulaha te ulaula he ibpekesalà te menge zuma ta he kenè pa meheg̵et is kedtuu zan. Ne kenè ta iyan idteg̵el is kenita he egkesuatan,
kekenà, iyan ta ebpen-ahaan is igkesuat te zuma ta su wey meheg̵et is kedtuu zin.

Su si Kristu, wazè din isipa is kandin he egkesuatan su insurat dengan is midtagnà he menge lalag din diyà te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is menge mezaat he lalag te menge etew he insulè dan kenikew, ne iyan daan kedsulaa zan kediey.”

Su is minsan hengkey he insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà, ne umba impesurat din su wey kiw mepenurù. Su pinaag̵i te Lalag te Megbevayà ibpenurù kenitew is kebmeinentusen te kemereg̵enan wey edsembag̵an kiw su wey kenà maawà is kebpeebuta tew te meupiya he egkeulaula keuzemà.
Is Megbevayà, ne iyan edsambag kenitew wey ebeg̵ey kenitew te kebmeinentusen te kemeresayan. Berakat he himuwa zin he mesevaha is gehinawa niw wey isip niw kayi te kedsundani niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Ne emun iyan haazà ne human egkesevaha is kedalig niw te Megbevayà tew wey Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Is menge zuma niw he tumutuu, ne zewata niw he iring te menge tempezè niw en te pused niw su midawat kew zaan ni Kristu he iring te tempezè din en te pused. Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini egkezalig is Megbevayà.

Benar is egkeg̵iyen ku he si Kristu, nehimu sikandin he iring te sulug̵uen te menge Hudiyu su wey zin ikepaahà kandan he tutuu iyan he edtumanen te Megbevayà is menge penaad din dengan diyà te menge kepuun dan.

Ne elin daan ketezengan ke maan is neulaula heini su wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, mehizuwi kew zaan te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi ebpekezalig kew zaan kandin. Su zuen insurat he lalag ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Siak wey is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu,
utew zekelà is kebpeselemati zey kenikew ne egkentahan ku is kedalig kenikew.”
Ne zuen pa egkeehè ta ziyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Sikiyu is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu,
tampu kew te kelipey su iring kew en te menge Hudiyu,
sikan is daan he nengepilì te Megbevayà.”
Ne zuen pa zaan edhenduen te,
“Sikiyu is langun he menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu,
delig̵a niw is Nengazen;
ne sikiyu is tivuuk he menusiyà,
delig̵a niw sikandin.”
Ne zuen pa migkag̵i zengan ni Esaias he egkevasa ta, ke sikandin te,
“Duen ebpekeuma he kevuwazan ni Isai
ne iyan sikandin edhadì te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne iyan sikandin edserig̵an dan,” ke sikandin.

Is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te langun he meupiya he ebpeebuten tew, berakat he veg̵ayi kew zin te utew zekelà he kelipey wey melinawen he kebpekesavuk tenged te kedtuu niw kandin su wey pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin meheg̵et is kebpeebuta niw te langun he meupiya he egkezawat niw keuzemà.
Menge suled, netuenan ku en he layun meupiya is menge ulaula niw, ne netuenan ku zaan he nepurung niw en mesavut is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne egkehimu en he ebpekepenurù kew te zuma.

Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, kayi te surat ku kenà a egkelenew he edsambag keniyu su zuen mezakel he impenurù keniyu he kenè ku egkesuatan he melipati niw. Umba kenà a egkelenew su mibeg̵ayan a te Megbevayà te keg̵ehem

wey a mehimu he sug̵ù ni Jesu Kristu ziyan te keniyu te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Henduen te memumuhat a su ke pinaag̵i kedì ebpeketuu is menge etew; egkehimu zan he iring te pemuhat ku he pinaag̵i te kedlumpiyuwi kandan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin edewaten te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged te kedtevangi kediey ni Jesu Kristu kenà a egkeeled te kebpenudtul kayi te langun he nehimu ku te sulug̵uen te Megbevayà.

Asal iyan dà igkepenudtul ku is nehimu ni Kristu pinaag̵i kediey. Su pinaag̵i kedì duen menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu he edtumanen dan en is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà. Nehimu heini pinaag̵i te impepenudtul kedì, pinaag̵i te impeulaula kedì,

pinaag̵i te menge singyal wey egkein-inuwan wey pinaag̵i zaan te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Midhipanew a puun diyà te inged he Hiruselim pehendiyà te inged he Iliriku ne mibpurungan ku te ebpesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i ni Kristu.

Ne egkesuatan ku layun he mepenudtul ku is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge inged he wazè pa zutun mezineg is ngazan ni Kristu. Umba ed-ul-ulahan ku heini su wey ku kenà mesublì te ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen is menge etew he netudtulan en te zuma.
Su netuman ku is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Haazà is wazè pa mekezineg te ngazan din, egketuenan dan gihapun ke hentei sikandin. Ne is wazè pa metudtuli, duen timpu he human dan ebpekesavut.”
Ne tenged kayi te langun he menge vaal ku te ebpenudtul zutun te menge inged, nesanggen a is edhendiyan te keniyu.
Ne g̵untaan te netapus ku en is baal ku kayi te menge inged, wey g̵eina te neug̵et en utew is ked-isipa ku he edhendiyan a,

egkeisip ku he g̵untaan human e en ebpekehendiyan te keniyu. Egkesuatan ku he mekehendiyà a te Ispanya, iyan, edtuluy a ziyan te keniyu. Ne emun egkeipus haazà is mevavà he kebpekiduma ku keniyu he igkelangan ku, ne egketevangan a keniyu zutun te kedhipanew ku.
Ne g̵untaan egenat ad su edhendiyà a zè pa te inged he Hiruselim su zuen idtavang he ibpehated kedì diyà te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyà.
Su is menge tumutuu zini te prubinsya he Mesidunya, wey te prubinsya he Gerisya, neisip dan he meupiya ke ebeg̵ey zan te tavang diyà te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu ziyà te inged he Hiruselim.

Utew meupiya ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan is kebeg̵aya zan kayi te tavang, ne utew hustu zaan heini su zekelà is utang dan diyà te menge tumutuu he Hudiyu ziyà te Hiruselim su pinaag̵i te menge Hudiyu neuwit dini te kandan te kenà menge Hudiyu is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne tenged kayi hustu zaan ke zuen selapì he igketavang dan diyà te menge Hudiyu he egkengeayuayu.
Ne emun egketapus en heini is baal ku igkehated ku en heini is selapì he idtavang kandan, ne zutun edhipanew ad maan pehendiyà te Ispanya ne edtuluy a ziyan te keniyu.
Ne netuenan ku he ke ebpekeuma a ziyan, utew zekelà is kedtuvazi kenitew ni Kristu pinaag̵i kayi te kebpehendiyan ku.

Menge suled, tenged te mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey tenged te kebpekedhihizuwè tew he ibeg̵ey kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he peniguduwi a keniyu iampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Iampù niw he kenà a mekeizi te menge etew he kenà tumutuu ziyà te inged he Hiruselim. Iampù niw zaan he ikelipey te menge tumutuu ziyà te Hiruselim heini is selapì he idhated ku kandan.

Ne emun egketapus heini, wey ke egkesuatan te Megbevayà, ebpekehendiyan a te keniyu he utew zekelà is kelipey ku ne egkehimu he ebmelinawen is ked-isip-isip ku pinaag̵i te kebpenumbaley ku ziyan te keniyu.
Is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te kelinew, berakat he ulini kew zin.
Pinaag̵i kayi te surat ibpekilala ku keniyu si Febe is suled tew he vahi tenged kayi te kedtuu tew, ne edtavang sikandin te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Singkriya.

Gelg̵elawa niw sikandin tenged te kedtuu zin te Nengazen tew su iyan heini ulaula he zait te menge tumutuu. Ne ke zuen menge keel-elangan din, ne tevangi niw sikandin su utew mezakel is midtevangan din daan he menge tumutuu ne midtevangan e zin daan.
Ipengemusta a ki Priscila wey si Ekilu. Menge timbang ku sikandan te kedtumana ku te ebpeveelan kedì ni Jesu Kristu.

Tenged te kedtevangi zan kediey wazè dan isepayan ke ebpatey zan, ne tenged kayi utew zekelà is peselamat ku kandan. Ne kenà duen dà taman, su zekelà daan is peselamat kandan te langun he menge tumutuu zini he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ipengemusta a zaan te menge tumutuu he ziyà dà edtig̵umtig̵um te valey zan te ked-azap dan te Megbevayà.
Ipengemusta a zaan ki Ipinitu he utew ku emig̵u. Nehuna sikandin he maama he neketuu ki Kristu ziyà te prubinsya he Asya.
Ipengemusta a zaan ki Maria; utew zekelà is baal zin wey kew zin metevangi.
Ipengemusta a zaan ki Andruniku wey si Hunias. Menge zuma ku sikandan he Hudiyu he mibpirisu zuma kedì. Telehuzen sikandan te menge epustul, ne nehuna sikandan neketuu ki Kristu, ne human a.
Ipengemusta a ki Empliyatu; utew ku sikandin emig̵u tenged te kedtuu zin te Nengazen.
Ipengemusta a zaan ki Urbano te zuma ku he sulug̵uen ni Kristu wey si Istakis he utew ku zaan emig̵u.
Ipengemusta a ki Epilis. Netuenan te langun he metinumanen sikandin te menge sug̵ù ni Kristu. Ipengemusta a te pemilya ni Eristubulu.
Ipengemusta a ki Hirudyun te zuma ku he Hudiyu wey ipengemusta a zaan te menge tumutuu he ziyà te valey ni Narciso.

Ipengemusta a ki Tripina wey si Tripusa he menge meg̵ied he sulug̵uen te Nengazen. Ipengemusta a zaan ki Persida he utew ku emig̵u. Utew zekelà is nehimu zin te kedtumana zin te ebpeveelan kandin te Nengazen.
Ipengemusta a zaan ki Rufo. Nevantug en is kedtuu zin te Nengazen. Ipengemusta a zaan te iney zin he impeiring din is ked-isipa zin kedì te tuney en he anak din.
Ipengemusta a ki Asinkritu, si Pligunti, si Hirmis, si Petrubas, si Hirmas wey is langun he menge maama he suled tew zaan he menge zuma zan.
Ipengemusta a ki Pilulugu, wey ki Julia, ki Nereo, wey te etevey zin, wey ki Ulimpas, wey te menge sakup te Megbevayà he zuma zan.
Ne sikiyu is langun diyan, emun edtig̵um kew pelimlimuey kew te uman sevaha keniyu. Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged dini.

Menge suled, edhengyuen ku keniyu he mebantey kew, ne likayi niw is menge etew he edsamuk te kebpekidsevaha niw wey kedtuu niw te menge tumutuu su edsupaken dan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu.

Su is menge etew he ed-ulaula te iring kayi, kenè dan edtumanen is sug̵ù te Nengazen tew he si Kristu, kekenà, iyan dan edtumanen is kandan he menge suat. Pinaag̵i te ketau zan te kegkag̵i wey pinaag̵i te mekempet he egkeg̵iyen dan, egkeekalan dan is isip te menge paglung he etew.

Nevantug en is tudtul te kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, ne utew ku heini igkelipey. Egkesuatan ku he zekelà is ketau niw te ked-ulaula te meupiya ne egkesuatan ku zaan he kenè kew metau te ked-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne emun iyan heini egkehitavù, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te kelinew, meg̵aan din en edhimuwa he mepurung niw mezaag si Setanas.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Is duma ku te edsangyew te Lalag te Megbevayà, si Timoteo, ebpengemusta keniyu ne henduen ded daan si Lucio, si Jason wey si Susipatru, is menge zuma ku he Hudiyu.
(Siak, si Tiriku, iyan a impesurat kayi ni Pablo te surat din; ebpengemusta a zaan keniyu tenged te pudu kiw menge tumutuu ki Kristu.)

Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Gayu. Siak si Pablo, kayi a ed-ubpà te valey zin ne zini edsimba is menge tumutuu kayi te inged. Is Trisuriru kayi te inged he si Irastu wey is suled tew te kedtuu he si Kuwartu, ebpengemusta zan keniyu.
Sikiyu is langun, berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Edelig̵en tew is Megbevayà! Pinaag̵i te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpenudtul ku he iyan is mehitenged ki Jesu Kristu, wey pinaag̵i te tuluuwen he neug̵et he timpu is ked-elesa zuen te Megbevayà, egkehimu he edheg̵eten din is kedtuu niw.

Ne haazà is tuluuwen he in-eles dengan, impezayag en te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te menge surat dengan te menge ebpeneuven din. Ne g̵eina te iyan sug̵ù te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà, idsangyew en heini is tuluuwen diyà te menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei su wey meketuu is langun ne ebpeketuman te menge sug̵ù din.
Is sebsevaha zà he Megbevayà he iyan dà nesayud te minsan hengkey, berakat he wazà pidtemanan te kedelig̵a kandin pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu.

Siak si Pablo is midtezù te Megbevayà he epustul ni Jesu Kristu su iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Siak wey si Sustinis is sevaha he suled tew pinaag̵i te kedtuu, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kurintu. Midhimu kew en he menge g̵aked te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kegkesevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu. Mibpilì kew te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi menge zuma kew en te langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he nemeketuu te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su iyan si Jesus edlingahaan tew te langun he ed-azap kandin.
Ikeg̵agew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu ne veg̵ayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Layun dekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin keniyu pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Su pinaagi kandin utew zekelà is kedtuvazi keniyu te Megbevayà ne zekelè en is kedsavut niw, ne metau kew en he ebpenurù.
Ne utew en midmezesen is kedtuu niw te impesavut dey keniyu mehitenged ki Kristu.
Ne tenged kayi imbeg̵ey en daan keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is minsan hengkey he ketau he egkinehenglanen niw kayi te kedtag̵ad niw te ked-uman kebulus te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Iyan sikandin edlig-en keniyu taman te ketepusan he timpu su wey wazà igkesewayi keniyu zutun te andew keuzemà te kedlikù din.
Is Megbevayà, egkeserig̵an tew is lalag din, ne iyan sikandin mibpetuu kenitew wey kiw mebpekid-upakat ki Jesu Kristu he iyan Anak din wey iyan Nengazen tew.

Menge suled ku tenged te kedtuu, duen idhangyù ku keniyu pinaag̵i te kebayàbayà kenitew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus; iyan is: kinahanglan he kenè kew mevahinbahin, kekenà, uyun-uyun kew su wey mesevaha is isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini, menge suled, su zuen menge zuma ni Keluwi he midtudtul kedì he egkengetebektebek kew ziyan.

Iyan ibpesavut ku is: selakew kun is edtindeg̵an te uman sevaha te sikiyu su egkag̵i kun is sevaha he iyan a si Pablo is edsundanan din. Ne egkag̵i is sevaha he si Epulus mulà is edsundanan din. Ne egkag̵i is sevaha he iyan kandin he edsundanan si Pedro. Ne egkag̵i is sevaha he si Kristu mulà is kandin.

Utew mezaat heeyan! Nevahinbahin bes si Kristu ziyan te keniyu? Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan a si Pablo kes inransang te krus wey kew melibri. Kunaan niw vuwa ke nebewtismuwan kew su wey kew mekesundan kedì.
Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà su iyan ku zà nebewtismuwan diyan si Crispo wey si Gayu.
Ne tenged kayi wazà minsan hentei keniyu he ebpekekag̵i he nebewtismuwan sikandin su wey sikandin mekesundan kedì.
Duen pe bes nebewtismuwan ku ziyan he iyan ensi Istipenas. Ne g̵awas dutun wazè ku en egketenuzan ke zuen pa nebewtismuwan ku ziyan te keniyu.

Su si Kristu, wazè e zin sug̵ua wey a mekebewtismu, kekenà, iyan insug̵ua zin kedì su wey ku ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne impesavut din kedì he kinahanglan he kenè ku egemiten is kelibutanen he ketau te kegkag̵i su kela ke egkevenaran is menge etew tenged te ketau ku ne egketembunan is gehem ni Kristu te kedlibriya kandan pinaag̵i te kebpatey zin duen te krus.

Ne emun ibpesavut ta ziyà te menge etew is kebpatey ni Kristu zuen te krus, sikan is menge etew he kenà egkelibri te silut, kunaan dan ke wazà pulus te ibpesavut ta. Iyan, sikita is nelibri en te silut, netuenan ta he pinaag̵i te kebpesevuta te kebpatey ni Kristu, ibpaahà te Megbevayà is gehem din te kedlibriya te menusiyà.
Ne mehitenged kayi zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Is ketau te menge uluwanen,
edhimuwen ku he wazè din pulus,
ne is kedsavut te nemeketunghà,
ibpeehè ku he tarù,” ke sikandin.

Ne egkesavut ta kayi he wazè en pulus te ketau te menge uluwanen, ne wazà daan pulus te kedsavut te nemeketunghà wey te menge metau he egkag̵i zini te kelibutan. Su impesavut en te Megbevayà he is ketau he zini zà ebpuun te kelibutan, wazè en pulus diyà te kandin.

Utew metau is Megbevayà; midhimu zin he kenà egketuenan te menge etew ke hentei sikandin pinaag̵i te kandan dà he ketau su midhimu zin he egkelibri sikandan pinaag̵i zà te kedtuu zan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpenurù ta he kunaan dan ke tarù he wazè din pulus.
Is menge etew he Hudiyu, kenè dan edtuu ke kenè dan egkeahà is menge egkengein-inuwan he tuus te g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Is menge etew he Gerisyahanen, iyan edserig̵an dan is metau he ed-isip.
Ne sikitew mulà, ibpenurù tew is mehitenged ki Kristu he inransang te krus. Is menge Hudiyu, igkeepes dan utew heini ne is menge Gerisyahanen ne kunaan dan ke tarù ne wazè din pulus.

Iyan, is minsan hentei, Hudiyu se Gerisyahanen, emun ebpemineg dan te Megbevayà dutun te kebpetuuwa zin kandan, netuenan dan he pinaag̵i te kedrensanga ki Kristu impezayag te Megbevayà is gehem din wey ketau zin.

Su heini is kedrensanga ki Kristu he ibpesavut tew he kunaan te menge etew ke utew tinulebung, ne pinaag̵i kayi ibpaahà te Megbevayà is ketau zin he lavew utew kenà te ketau te menge etew. Kunaan dan ke wazà gehem te Megbevayà, iyan, lavew is gehem din te g̵ehem he ziyà ebpuun te isip te etew.

Kenè niw, menge suled, lipati ke hengkey kew zengan hein wazè kew pa ipetuu te Megbevayà. Su ziyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu, mezelag is etew he egkekag̵i te menge etew he utew metau; mezelag is lavew is pid-etawan din; mezelag daan is sepian.

Ne minsan pa zutun mibpilì kew te Megbevayà wey kew melibri. Su is menge etew he kunaan te kezekelan ke kenà memetau, iyan mibpilì te Megbevayà su wey mengeeled is uvag memetau. Ne haazà is menge etew he kunaan te kezekelan ke wazà utew egkehimu, mibpilì din daan su wey mengeeled is menge zuen dan uvag gehem.
