Ne zutun, sikitew is duen din kemetayen, ne kenè kiw en human ebpatey ne egketuman en haazà is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Nepurung en maawà is gehem te kemetayen.”
“Wazè en kegkehandek tew te kemetayen su wazè en ebpatey.
Wazè en kegkeseeng tew
tenged te kemetayen
su neilisan en te untung
he wazà pidtemanan.”

Umba egkehandek is menge etew te kemetayen su netuenan dan he emun ebpatey zan edsilutan sikandan tenged te mekesesalà sikandan. Ne maan is mekesesalà sikandan? Su g̵eina te nekesupak dan te kesug̵uan te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan pa zutun egkehimu he edelig̵en tew is Megbevayà su tenged te mid-ulaula zin, nezaag tew en is kemetayen pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu!

Na, menge mahal ku he menge suled, geina te iyan heini, heg̵eta niw is kedsarig niw te Megbevayà su wey wazà ebpekezezaat te kedtuu niw. Peniguduwi niw tumana is ebpeveelan keniyu te Nengazen; hag̵ù kew te taman te egkehimu niw su netuenan niw he emun iyan edtumanen niw is ebpeveelan te Nengazen, kenà egkehimu he wazà pulus te vaal niw.

Ne zuen pa id-sug̵ù ku keniyu mehitenged te ked-emutè niw te selapì he idtavang niw te egkengeayuayu he menge zuma tew he tumutuu. Insug̵ù ku en daan heini te menge zuma tew ziyà te prubinsya he Gelasya.

Ne kada Duminggu ne kinahanglan he teg̵enaha te kada sevaha keniyu is ibeg̵ey zin diyà te Megbevayà. Sumalà is netig̵eyunan niw ne kinahanglan he iteg̵eley niw is bahin te Megbevayà. Ne tipig̵i niw heini su wey emun ebpekeuma ad diyan ne wazè en kinahanglan he ed-emutè kew pa su zaan en he naandam.

Ne emun ebpekeuma a ziyan edsug̵uen ku ziyà te inged he Hiruselim sikan is ebpilien niw he menge etew wey zan meuwit is ibeg̵ey niw. Ne ibpeuwit ku zaan is menge surat su wey metueni te ebeg̵ayan ke hengkey is tuyù dan te ed-uwit.
Ne emun kinahanglan dutun he edhendiyà a zaan te Hiruselim, ebpekezuma zan kediey.
Edhendiyan a te Kurintu emun egketapus ku is tuyù ku ziyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya su egkeisip ku he ziyà a ebayà te Mesidunya.

Ne malù a egkeug̵et ke ziyan e en te keniyu. Kenà a vuwa ed-awà diyan taman te kenè pa egketapus is tipenguzan. Ne zutun te kedlaus ku, meupiya ke edtevangan a keniyu zutun te kedhipanew ku ke hendei a ebpevayà.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he meg̵aan dà is kebpenumbaley ku ziyan, kekenà, iyan netag̵ù te g̵ehinawa ku is egketegteg̵aad a ziyan ke edtug̵ut is Megbevayà.
Egkeisip ku he kayi e pa ed-ubpà te inged he Ipisu taman te Pista te Pintikusti ne human a egenat.
Su mezakel pa zini is egkesuat he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne zekelà is pulus te ked-ubpè ku kayi, asal, mezakel zaan dini is menge kuntada te Megbevayà.
Ne emun ebpekeuma ziyan si Timoteo ne purungi niw sikandin su sulug̵uen daan sikandin te Nengazen he iring kediey.

Kinahanglan he edtehuzen niw sikandin, ne emun edlaus te hipenawan din ne tevangi niw sikandin, ne ipeehè niw is gag̵ew niw kandin su wey mekelikù sikandin dini te kedì, su ebpeebuten ku sikandin wey is menge zuma zin he menge suled tew te kedtuu.

Ne si Epulus he suled tew zaan tenged te kedtuu, kepipira ku en sikandin keg̵iyi he meupiya ke ebisitahan kew zin duma zuen te menge suled tew he mibisita ziyan. Iyan, egkag̵i sikandin te wazè pa meseled te g̵ehinawa zin is kedhendiyan din. Iyan, edhendiyan sikandin ke wazà ebpekesamuk kandin.
Layun kew, menge suled, med-andam; hemeni niw te edtuu si Jesu Kristu; kenè niw ikeeled is kedtuu niw, kekenà, ipeehè niw is kelig-en te kedtuu niw.
Ne minsan hengkey is ebeelan niw, layun niw ipaahà is kebmahala niw te menge zuma niw.
Netuenan niw, menge suled, he iyan nehuna he nemeketuu ziyan te prubinsya he Gerisya ensi Istipenas. Ne wazè dan meduwazuwa te kedtevangi zan te menge zuma zan he tumutuu.

Ne tenged dutun, edhengyuen ku keniyu he pemineg̵a niw is sambag te menge etew he iring engki Istipenas wey is minsan hentei he menge zuma tew he ebpurung edtuman te ebpeveelan kandan te Nengazen tew.
Utew ad neg̵alew hein nekeuma si Istipenas, si Fortunato wey si Ekeyiku su henduen be te netembaran is utew ku kebulunga keniyu.
Inmeupiya sikandan te g̵ehinawa ku iring te inmeupiya zaan sikandan te g̵ehinawa niw. Tehuza niw is menge iring kayi he etew.

Ebpengemusta keniyu is langun he menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged dini te prubinsya he Asya. Utew zaan meheg̵et is kebpengemustaha keniyu ni Ekilu wey si Priscila wey elin daan is menge tumutuu he edtig̵um diyà te valey zan dini te Ipisu.
Is langun he menge tumutuu he menge zuma ku kayi, ne ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu. Ne sikiyu zaan diyan, ne mebpelimlimuey kew.
Te kedtepusa ku kayi te surat, egkeg̵ien ku he iyan e en si Pablo is midsurat kayi. Ebpengemusta a keniyu te langun.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he wazà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin si Jesus, ne verakat he siluti sikandin te Megbevayà. “Maran ata,” he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, meg̵aan ka, Jesus, medlikù.
Tuvazi kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Utew kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku tenged te kedtuu tew ki Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.

Siak si Pablo. Migeraran a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu tenged te iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Siak wey si Timoteo he suled tew, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is langun he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kurintu wey is langun daan he menge etew he neg̵aked te Megbevayà seled te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gerisya.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu ne tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Edelig̵en tew is Megbevayà he iyan Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu; iyan sikandin hihizuwen he Amey tew wey puunà te minsan hengkey he tavang kenitew.

Edtevangan kiw zin te langun he menge seeng tew ne tenged kayi ebpeketavang kiw zaan te zuma he etew he zuen din minsan hengkey he seeng. Is idtavang tew kayi, ne iyan ded is intavang kenitew te Megbevayà.
Minsan pa te zekelà is kemeresayan he egkeantus tew tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu, dekelà daan is tavang kenitew te Megbevayà tenged daan ki Kristu.

Emun idtug̵ut te Megbevayà he mekeantus key te merasey, umba ibpaantus key zin su wey kew mezeyzey ne wey kew zaan meveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne iring din ded daan emun edtevangan key te Megbevayà ne egkehimu heini he tavang din daan keniyu. Ne pinaag̵i kayi edlig-enan din is kedtuu niw wey niw zaan maantus is merasey he iring te ibpaantus kenami.

Umba kenà duwazuwa is kedsarig dey keniyu su netuenan dey he emun ed-entusen niw is merasey he iring te naantus dey zaan, ne iring din ded daan, edtevangan kew te Megbevayà iring te edtevangan key zin daan.
Su egkesuatan dey, menge suled, he metueni niw is dekelà he samuk dey hein diyè key te prubinsya he Asya. Utew merasey is penggezam kenami he kenè dey pezem egkeantus umba kunaan dey ke ibpatey zey.

Henduen be te iyan en haazà ketepusan te untung dey, iyan, umba nehitavù heini zini te kenami su wey key kenà mekesarig te kenami zà he ketau, kekenà, wey key mekesarig te Megbevayà he iyan ebpemanhew te menge minatey.

Ne midtevangan key te Megbevayà ne midlig-enan key zin, umba nelibri key ne wazè key mehimetayi. Ne netuenan dey he ebpenigudu sikandin he edtavang kenami. Dekelà is kedsarig dey he kenè key zin ed-engkezan te edtavang.
Ne kinahanglan he edtevangan key zaan keniyu pinaag̵i te ked-ampù. Ne human egkehimu he mezakel is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin kenami tenged te ked-ampù te mezakel he menge etew.

Duen, menge suled, idantal zey ne netuenan dey he tutuu heini, ne iyan is: layun meupiya is ulaula zey ziyà te minsan hentei he etew, lavew en diyan te keniyu. Su layun key edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne utew hustu is tuyù dey. Wazè dey g̵emita is ketau zey te etew zà duen, kekenà, iyan igkehimuwa zey te langun is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he tavang te Megbevayà.
Iyan dey zà idtag̵ù te surat emun ebpeuwitan dey sikiyu te surat is egkevasa niw wey egkesavut niw. Ne egkesuatan ku he egkepurung niw egkesavut
haazà is wazè niw pa maamin mesavut mehitenged te ed-ul-ulahan dey su wey zutun te andew te kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, mehimu he igkelipey key keniyu iring te igkelipey zey zaan sikiyu.
Ne g̵eina te netuenan ku he siguradu nesavut niw en heini, neisip ku he edhuna a ebpenumbaley ziyan te keniyu su wey kezezuwa ku sikiyu metevangi

su iyan pezem dini te isip ku is: edtuluy a ziyan ke edhendiyà a te Mesidunya ne emun ed-ulì a ne edtuluy e zed maan diyan te keniyu su wey a zaan metevangi keniyu zutun te kedhendiyè ku te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Ne g̵eina te wazè ku heini metuman kunaan niw vuwa ke layun edhalinhalin is isip ku. Kunaan niw vuwa zaan ke iring is menge isip ku te isip te etew he iyan ebayàbayà kandin is kandin dà he mezaat he suat. Kunaan niw ke zutun te kegkag̵i ku he ebpehendiyan a ne iyan bes neseled dini te g̵ehinawa ku is kenà a ebpehendiyan.
Emun tutuu is egkeg̵iyen te Megbevayà, ne tutuu zaan heini is egkeg̵iyen ku. Su is neseled diyà te g̵ehinawa ku ne kinahanglan he edtumanen ku.

Sikami engki Silas wey si Timoteo, impenudtul zey ziyan te keniyu kes Anak te Megbevayà he iyan si Jesu Kristu. Ne netuenan niw he metinumanen sikandin te lalag din ne kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad din.
Su pinaag̵i kandin edtumanen is langun he menge penaad te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi ebpekekag̵i kiw he venar iyan he metinumanen sikandin ne tenged kayi egkezalig is Megbevayà.
Su is Megbevayà, ne iyan edheg̵et te kedtuu tew ki Jesu Kristu ne iyan sikandin mibpilì kenitew
ne mibeg̵ayan kiw zin te g̵ehem he tuus he menge g̵aked kiw zin, ne midhimu zin he ulini kiw te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he iyan tuus he edtumanen din is minsan hengkey he penaad din kenitew.

Siluti a te Megbevayà emun kenà tutuu is egkeg̵iyen ku. Netuenan din he iyan ketezengan ke maan is wazà a mekepenumbaley ziyan te Kurintu su wey kenè kew meseeng pinaag̵i te kedsusiya ku te menge ulaula niw.

Kenè dey egkesuatan he ebayàbayè key ke hengkey is edtuuwan niw su netuenan dey he meheg̵et en is kedtuu niw. Egkesuatan dey zà he mehimu key he timbang niw te ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà su wey kew melipey.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, neisip ku he kenà ad ed-uman ebpenumbaley ziyan emun iring ded dutun te nehuna he kedhendiyan ku, su zutun ingkeseeng niw is kebpenumbaley ku.
Su emun igkeseeng a keniyu ne hentei is edlipey kedì? Wazà, su egkeseeng kew man kediey.

Umba, menge suled, iyan mibeelan ku zutun is mibpeuwitan ku zà sikiyu te surat. Su kenè ku zutun egkesuatan he ebpenumbaley a ziyan su netuenan ku he sikiyu is menge etew he kinahanglan pezem he iyan igkelipey ku, ne igkeseeng ku zutun. Ne netuenan ku zaan he emun egkelipey a, egkelipey kew zaan.

Dutun te kebpeuwiti ku keniyu te surat, utew ad neseeng. Mibmesakit is gehinawa ku ne mibpenig̵is is luhè ku. Iyan, kenè ku pezem dutun tuyù is wey kew meseeng, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he utew kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku.
Ne haazà is etew he nekesalà diyan, kenà a iyan neselaan din, kekenà, iyan kew, ne emun kenà, ne iyan is duma keniyu. Kenè ku egkesuatan he utew mesekiti is gehinawa zin pinaag̵i te menge lalag ku.
Netengkaan en, menge suled, is kedsiluti niw kandin.
Ne g̵untaan kinahanglan he peseyluwa niw sikandin. Sembag̵i niw su kela ke maawà is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te utew subra he kegkeseeng din.
Edhengyuen ku keniyu he ipeehè niw kandin he tutuu iyan is gag̵ew niw kandin.
Umba mibpeuwitan ku sikiyu te surat ku su wey ku maahà ke metinumanen kew ve te langun he menge sug̵ù ku.

Ne ke zuen etew he ebpeseyluwen niw, ebpeseyluwen ku zaan. Su penenglitan ke zuen nekesalà diyan wey ebpeseyluwen ku, netuenan ni Kristu he iyan ketezengan ke maan is ebpeseyluwen ku su wey mebmelinew is kedezepitè niw.
Ne umba ed-ul-ulahan ku heini su wey kenè kiw meekali ni Setanas. Netuenan tew ke hengkey is mezaat he edhimuwen din pezem dini te kenitew.
Menge suled, hein midhendiyà a te inged he Truwas te kedsangyew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, neehè ku he midhimu en te Nengazen is paag̵i wey ku ikepelaus is ebpeveelan din kedì.
Iyan, utew zutun nesemuki is gehinawa ku su kenè ku egketuredu is suled tew he si Tito. Ne tenged kayi, mid-ewaan ku is menge tumutuu he meg̵inged dutun ne midlaus a ziyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya.

Ne minsan pa zutun utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà su tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, iring kiw te menge vihag ni Kristu he ibpeehè din diyà te minsan hentei. Ne pinaag̵i kenitew ibpesavut din diyà te menge etew ke hentei sikandin diyà te minsan hendei.

Ne g̵eina te nehimu key he menge sug̵ù ni Kristu, iring key te veyawà he ibegey ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà. Is ngazeg kayi, ne ziyà mekeeneb te menge etew he egkelibri te silut wey ziyà daan te kenà egkengelibri.

Ne haazà is menge etew he kenà ebpelibri, is ibpesavut dey kandan ne henduen be te utew memahù su nesavut dan he neangken dan en is kemetayen. Ne haazà mulà is menge etew he ebpelibri ki Kristu, is ibpesavut dey kandan, ne henduen be te utew mehemut su nesavut dan he neangken dan en is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Hentei vuwa is dait te kedsengyawa kayi te tudtul?

Iyan, sikami, kenè dey ed-iringan is ulaula te mezakel he ebpenurù su ziyà te kandan henduen be te ibpenapì dan is Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne tenged te midsugù key te Megbevayà, ne tenged daan te edsusiyen key layun te Megbevayà, tutuu is tuyù dey wey egkeg̵iyen dey su nekidsevaha key ki Kristu.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke idantal zey en maan heini. Kenè key iring te zuma he ebpenurù su kenè niw sikandan egkezawat emun wazà surat he igkepeehè dan he ibpesavut dutun he wazà mezaat he ulaula zan. Ne iring din ded daan kenà sikandan egkezawat te zuma he etew emun wazè dan surat he iring dutun he ziyan ebpuun te keniyu.
Sikami mulà, kenè key egkinahanglan te iring dutun. Netuenan dey he iyan kew surat dey su pinaag̵i te ulaula niw he meupiya egketuenan te minsan hentei he meupiya zaan is kenami he ulaula.

Su iring is kedtuu niw te surat he ibpesavut dutun he hustu is ulaula zey. Ne iyan mibaal kayi te surat si Kristu su midsug̵ù key zin diyan wey kew meketuu. Ne zeyzey heini is surat su wazà isurat pinaag̵i te kintà ne wazà daan isurat diyà te menge edsuratan he vatu iring te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kekenà, pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin insurat te Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa niw te menge etew.
Umba egkekag̵i zey he iyan kew surat dey su pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha zey ki Kristu dekelà is kedsarig dey te Megbevayà.
Kenè dey egkekag̵i he pinaag̵i te kenami he ketau egkehimu zey is minsan hengkey, kekenà, netuenan dey he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is kegkehimuwa zey te langun.

Su iyan sikandin ebeg̵ey kenami te ketau wey zey ikepenurù is beg̵u he paag̵i he midtukud din te kebpekidsevaha zin te menusiyà. Ne wazà heini is beg̵u he paag̵i iveg̵ey pinaag̵i te insurat he kesug̵uan, kekenà, imbeg̵ey zin heini kenitew pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Su emun iyan ta edserig̵an is kedtumana ta te kesug̵uan, ne kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan is ebperetengen ta. Iyan, ke ibeg̵ey kenitew is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne untung he wazà pidtemanan is ebperetengen ta.

Dutun te kedsurata zengan te Megbevayà te kesug̵uan, duen te menge edsuratan he vatu, neselikuvungan si Moises te ed-anlag he g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun nenganlag is paras ni Moises tenged te g̵ehem te Megbevayà ne nekesirang te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne minsan pa zutun te utew merayag haazà, naawà gihapun haazà is gehem. Iyan ibpesavut kenita pinaag̵i te kesug̵uan is: ebpatey is gimukud te menusiyà. Ne minsan pa zutun utew zekelà is gehem he impaahà te Megbevayà dutun te kedsurata zin kayi.
Emun dekelà is gehem he impaahà dutun te kebeg̵aya zin te kesug̵uan, iyan pe be kenà tuwas pa he mekeg̵eg̵ehem is kebeg̵aya zin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Emun dekelà is gehem te kesug̵uan he iyan idsiluti te menusiyà, iyan pe be kenà dekelà pa utew is gehem te paag̵i he iyan ebpekehimu he mebmetazeng is menusiyà.
Ne haazà is kesug̵uan he zekelà dengan is gehem din, nehimu en guntaan he wazè din gehem su mid-ilisan en te veg̵u he paag̵i he utew pa zekelà is gehem.
Su ke zuen gehem te zaan wey naawè en haazà is daan he zuen din gehem, iyan pe be kenà dekelè pa utew is gehem te veg̵u he kenà mulà egkeawà.
Ne g̵eina te ebpekesarig key he kenà heini egkeawà te minsan keenu kenè key egkehandek te kedsengyawa zey te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne kenè key iring ki Moises su wazè dey id-eles. Su si Moises, mid-elangan din is buked din wey kenà maahà te menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil kes ed-anlag he g̵ehem he egkenaney en egkeawà.

Su zutun neelangan daan is menge kedsavut dan. Ne wazà daan mahalin heini g̵untaan su kemulu pa neelangan is kedsavut te menge Hudiyu. Ne emun ebasa zan mehitenged te zaan he paag̵i kenè dan egkesavut. Ne emun duen kandan edtuu ki Kristu, id-awà te Megbevayà is ebpekealang te isip din ne human sikandin ebpekesavut.
Ne kemulu pa g̵untaan is kenè dan kebpekesavut su emun ebesahan te menge Hudiyu is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kenè dan egkesavut su neelangan pa is isip dan.
Iyan, id-awà is ebpekealang te kedsavut te etew emun edtuuwan din is Nengazen.
Ne heini is egkeg̵iyen he Nengazen, ne iyan kes Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne emun ed-ulinan is etew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin nevelukasan en sikandin te kegkeuripena kandin te kesug̵uan.

Ne, menge suled, sikitew is langun, nesavut tew en he utew lavew is gehem te Nengazen tew, ne wazà ebpekealang te kedsevuta tew kayi. Ne pinaag̵i kayi te g̵ehem he ebpuun te Nengazen he iyan kes Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, edhimuwen kiw zin he iring te kandin ne layun ed-iseg heini is gehem.
Nehizuwan key te Megbevayà ne midtezù key zin wey zey metuman is ebpeveelan din kenami mehitenged te kedsengyawa te veg̵u he paag̵i ne tenged dutun kenà egkeawà is gustu zey te kedtumana kayi.

Sikan is menge mahawag he ulaula he meeles he ebeelan te zuma, kenè dey mulà ebeelan. Kenè key edtarùtarù ne kenè dey edhelinen is Lalag te Megbevayà, kekenà, hustu is kedsengyawa zey su wey mesavut te minsan hentei he kenà tarù is ebeelan dey. Iyan edsusi kayi is Megbevayà.
Ne is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpesavut dey, emun in-eles heini, iyan dà neelesan kayi is menge etew he kenà edawat te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Kenè dan edtuu su mid-elangan is isip dan ni Setanas he iyan ed-ezapen te menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Tenged kayi kenà egketeyawan is isip dan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew kegkelavew ni Kristu. Pinaag̵i ki Kristu egkesayud ki ke hentei is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin dagwey te Megbevayà.

Kenà iyan dey ibpenurù su wey key mevantug te menge etew, kekenà, iyan dey ibpenurù su wey mevantug si Jesu Kristu he iyan Nengazen te langun. Sikami, edtevangan dey en sikiyu su wey zey metuman is sug̵ù ni Jesus.

Su zutun te kedlimbag̵a te Megbevayà te langun migkag̵i sikandin te, “Maawà is kerusireman ne mehimu is kerayag.” Ne iyan daan sikandin kes midtayew te isip dey su wey zey mesavut ke hengkey is gehem te Megbevayà he impezayag pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu.

Ne sikami, iring key zà te kuzen he ziniyun he neteg̵uan te utew mahal. Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkesavut te menge etew he is utew zekelà he gehem he egemiten dey te utew meg̵uyà is lawa, ne in-ulin kenami te Megbevayà ne kenà dini ebpuun te kenami.
Layun key ebpekeag̵i te kemereg̵enan, iyan, kenà egkeawà is kedsarig dey. Henduen be te wazè dey en layun paag̵i, iyan, edsarig key g̵ihapun te tavang te Megbevayà.
Ebpesipelahan key te menge kuntada zey, iyan, kenè key ed-ewaan te Megbevayà. Mibug̵el key te menge kuntada zey, iyan, wazè key zan mepatey.

Iring ki Jesus dengan, egkuntedahan key layun te menge etew, ne egkesuatan key zan te edhimatey. Umba egkeulaula heini is langun su wey metueni pinaag̵i kenami he uuyag en maan si Jesus su layun key zin edtevangan.

Su minsan keenu he timpu kenà egkeawà dini te kenami is kebpemiligru zey te menge etew he egkesuat he edhimatey kenami tenged te kedsengyawa zey te ngazan ni Jesus. Umba egkeulaula zini te kenami heini su wey metueni he uuyag en maan si Jesus su layun key zin edtevangan su wey key kenà mehimetayi.

Umba kenà egkeawà dini te kenami is kebpemiligru zey te kemetayen su edsangyew key te Meupiya he Tudtulanan, iyan, maambe en su pinaag̵i kayi egkehimu ziyan te keniyu is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Duen ingkesurat he lalag te etew he edhenduen te, “Midtuu a te Megbevayà ne ebpenudtulen ku is impeketuu ku.” Ne iring ded dutun heini is ed-ul-ulahan dey su tenged te kedtuu zey te Megbevayà ibpesavut dey is impeketuu zey.

Su netuenan dey he is Megbevayà he mibanhew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ebenhawen key zin daan keuzemà tenged te kebpekidsevaha zey ki Jesus ne edtulusen key zin wey key meketampu keniyu ne egkehimu kiw pudu he menge zuma zin diyà te langit.

Ne umba ed-entusen dey is langun he mereg̵en su wey kew iyan mezeyzey, su emun egketukid en is mezakel he etew te g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà, ne zutun ed-iseg he ebmezakel is ebpekepeselamat te Megbevayà ne egkevantug is Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi kenà egkeawà is pulus te kedhag̵ù dey. Kada andew ne ed-iseg is kebmeg̵urang wey kebmeg̵uyà te lawa zey. Ne minsan pa zutun kada andew zaan ne ibpeiseg te Megbevayà is kedlig-eni zin te kedtuu zey.

Ne heini is menge kemeresayan he egkeantus dey g̵untaan, ne meg̵aan dà utew, iyan, tenged te ked-antus dey kayi zuen egkeperateng dey he utew zekelà he kegkelavew he ibeg̵ey kenitew keuzemà. Ne kenà ebpekesusuluwan is kemeresayan he egkeantus dey kayi te utew zekelà he wazè din pidtemanan he kegkelavew.

Su iyan netag̵ù mepurung dini te g̵ehinawa zey, kenà is menge vutang he egkeehè ta zini te kelibutan, kekenà, iyan is menge vutang he kenè te pa egkeahà he ziyà te langit. Su is menge vutang he egkeehè ta zini te kelibutan, ne meg̵aan dà egkehanew, iyan, sikan is kenè pa egkeahà he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà, ne kenà mulà egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan.
Is lawa ta, ne iring te valey he egkeubpaan ta. Ne netuenan ta he ke egkerundus heini is baley, duen baley he egkeubpaan ta ziyà te langit
Ne g̵eina te utew ki edlised te zini ki pa te kelibutan, utew ta igkesuat he iveg̵ey en pezem kenita haazà is beg̵u he lawa ta he ziyà te langit.
Su zutun te kebenhawa kenita keuzemà, kinahanglan he zuen lawa ta.

Su sikita is tumutuu he uuyag pa zini te kelibutan, edlised ki su neveg̵atan ki kayi te menge kemereg̵enan he egkeantus kayi te kelibutanen he lawa ta, asal kenè ta iyan egkesuatan he meewai ta heini is lawa ta, kekenà, iyan egkesuatan ta is wey meveg̵ayi ki en pezem guntaan dutun te veg̵u he lawa he ebpuun diyà te langit, ne zutun egkeilisan is lawa he zuen din kemetayen te lawa he zuen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Is Megbevayà, daan ki zin he mid-andam su wey meulaula heini kenita keuzemà, ne mibeg̵ayan ki zin daan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he iyan tuus he edtumanen din heini.
Tenged dutun, layun meheg̵et is kedsarig dey te Nengazen. Netuenan ta he te kemulu ki pa kayi te kelibutanen he lawa, kenè ki pa ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Nengazen.
Su ibpeikul ta is ibayè ta zini te kelibutan pinaag̵i te kedsarig dà te Megbevayà su kenè te pa egkeahà is edungguan ta ziyà te langit.
Layun mezesen is kedsarig ta te Nengazen ne egkesuatan ta pezem he meewai ta heini is kelibutanen he lawa su wey ki mekeulì diyà te Nengazen.
Iyan, ke minsan hendei ki, ke zini ki te kelibutan wey ke ziyè ki ve te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà, iyan utew ta egkesuati is kedtumana ta te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su is minsan hentei kenitew, kinahanglan he ziyà ed-etuvang keuzemà te ki Kristu su edsusiyen din is menge ulaula tew su wey mezawat te kada sevaha kenitew is suhul he zait te langun he mid-ulaula zin dini te kelibutan ke meupiya ve wey ke wazè din menge pulus.

Ne g̵eina te netuenan dey he utew mekehandekhandek keuzemà haazà is kedsusiya te Nengazen te menge ulaula te menusiyà, edhimuwen dey pezem is taman te egkehimu zey wey meketuu is menge etew. Netuenan te Megbavayà he kenà mezaat is tuyù dey, ne egkesuatan ku he metueni niw zaan heini.

Heini is menge lalag ku, kenà iyan tuyù ku kayi is wey key keniyu mezelig̵i, kekenà, egkesuatan dey he metueni niw he hustu is tuyù dey su wey zuen ketezengan he igketavak niw zutun te menge etew he iyan dan ed-ahaan is paras te etew ne kenà is meupiya he ulaula zin.

Kunaan te zuma ke ebuneg̵en key, iyan, umba henduen key te ebuneg̵en su utew mezesen is kedtumana zey te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke ed-isipen niw he kenè key ebuneg̵en, netuenan niw he iyan ibpenigudu zey su wey kew mezeyzey.

Ne umba edhag̵ù key su netuenan dey he mahal key ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Kristu. Netuenan dey he midhimetayan sikandin is sebsevaha he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà ne tenged kayi henduen be te pudu en nekeag̵i te kemetayen is tivuuk he menusiyà.

Minatey sikandin he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà su wey sikandan is menge etew he uuyag pa, kenè dan en maan med-ulaula te kandan he egkesuatan, kekenà, med-tuman dan en te egkesuatan ni Kristu he iyan midhimetayan wey nevanhew su wey melibri sikandan te silut.

Is paag̵i zey te ked-isipa te minsan hentei he etew, ne kenà iyan is paag̵i he egemiten te menge etew he wazà medtuu. Dengan, iyan heini migamit dey he paag̵i su mid-isip dey he etew zà duen si Kristu, iyan, guntaan netuenan dey he kenà etew zà duen sikandin.
Ne sikan is etew he nekidsevaha en ki Kristu, beg̵u en sikandin he linimbag. Nahanew en diyà te kandin is daan he netag̵ù te isip din ne mid-ilisan en heini te veg̵u.
Iyan midhimu kayi is Megbevayà su pinaag̵i ki Kristu midhimu kiw zin he menge emig̵u zin. Ne mibpeveelan din daan kenami is kedhimuwa te zuma he etew he meemig̵u zin.

Iyan ibpesavut dey is: pinaag̵i ki Kristu egkehimu he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà he menge emig̵u zin. Ne id-awè din diyà te isip din is menge mezaat he ulaula zan. Ne sikami, insarig din kenami is kedtudtula he egkehimu en he ebpekid-emig̵u te Megbevayà is menusiyà.
Umba midsug̵ù key ni Kristu su wey pinaag̵i kenami ebpekehangyù keniyu is Megbevayà. Ne tenged ki Kristu edhengyuan dey zaan sikiyu he itug̵ut niw he himuwa kew te Megbevayà he menge emig̵u zin.

Wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu, iyan, midhimu te Megbevayà he iyan sikandin midsilutan tenged te salè tew su wey pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng te Megbevayà.
Ne g̵eina te nehimu key en he menge timbang te Megbevayà, edhengyuan dey sikiyu he himuwa niw he mebpulus is gag̵ew zin keniyu.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Dutun te timpu he egkesuatan ku,
mibpemineg a te ked-ampù nu;
ne zutun te hustu he timpu te kedlibriya ku te menusiyà,
midtevangan ku sikew.”
Ne iyan lalag ku keniyu is: iyan en heini timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà te kedtavang keniyu; iyan en heini timpu te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
Egkesuatan dey he wazà igkesawey te minsan hentei te ulaula zey su wey wazà igkesudì dan te kedsengyawa zey te Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne umba ebpurungan dey is ulaula zey su wey zey ikepaahà he menge sulug̵uen key te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he paag̵i. Ne tenged kayi ed-antus key te minsan hengkey he kemereg̵enan, kemeresayan, wey menge samuk.
Mibug̵el key, mibpirisu key, mibpesipelahan key te edsinamuk. Duen timpu he utew subra is terebahu zey ne nepurang key ne nevitil key zaan.

Ne midlikayan dey is meremerik he ulaula. Hustu is kedsevuta zey te Lalag te Megbevayà; mepeseyluwen key ne metinevangen key te minsan hentei. Ed-ulinan key te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin; ibpeehè dey is gag̵ew zey ziyà te langun;

ibpenurù dey is tutuu he Lalag te Megbevayà ne edtevangan key te g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Pinaag̵i kayi te langun egketuusan he menge sulug̵uen key te Megbevayà. Iyan kelasag dey wey lembitan dey is metazeng he ulaula.
Duen edtahud kenami ne zuen daan menge etew he kenè key zan edtehuzen. Duen edalig kenami ne zuen daan ed-ituk kenami. Duen egkag̵i he teruen key, iyan, kenà tarù is egkeg̵iyen dey.

Duen egkag̵i he utew minus is pid-etawan dey, iyan, nasì dekelà is bentug̵an dey. Layun key ed-ed-edisi te kemetayen, iyan, idtug̵ut pa te Megbevayà he kenè key pa mebpatey. Edsilutan key te Megbevayà wey key mepenurù, iyan, kenè key zin edhimetayan.

Mezakel is menge seeng dey, iyan, layun key egkelipey. Henduen be te utew key egkeayuayu, iyan, pinaag̵i kenami, edsepian te wazà pidtemanan is mezakel he menge etew. Henduen be te wazè dey azen, iyan, naangken dey is langun he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà.
Sikiyu is menge suled ku ziyan te Kurintu, wazè dey ieles keniyu is isip dey. Layun kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa zey.
Kenè iyan minus is gehinawa zey keniyu, kekenà, iyan kew minus is gehinawa niw kenami.
Edlelag̵an ku en sikiyu he iring te menge anak ku. Kinahanglan he mahala key zaan diyan te g̵ehinawa niw.
Kenè kew, menge suled, mebpekidsevaha te menge etew he kenà tumutuu su kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is meupiya wey mezaat. Ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebpeked-amur is kerayag wey is merusirem.
Kenà daan egkeuyun si Kristu wey si Setanas ne kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is tumutuu wey is kenà edtuu.

Ne is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he zutun ed-ezapa sikandin, kenà egkehimu he zutun daan ed-ezapa is menge tarù he ed-ezapen. Ne iring din ded daan sikitew is tumutuu su iyan kiw iring te valey he ed-ubpaan te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Su migkag̵i is Megbevayà te,
“Edlumunan ku sikandan
ne ebpekiduma a kandan
ne egkehimu he iyan a edsimbahan dan he Megbevayà
ne iyan sikandan menge g̵aked ku he etew.”
Ne tenged kayi migkag̵i zaan is Megbevayà te,
“Suwayi niw is ebpemen-azap
te kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen
ne sivey kew kandan.
Engkezi niw is minsan hengkey he
meremerik he ulaula ne edewaten ku sikiyu.
Ne egkehimu a he Amey niw ne sikiyu,
menge vahi wey maama,
egkehimu kew he menge anak ku.
Lalag heini te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen te langun.”

Ne g̵eina te iyan heini impenaad kenita te Megbevayà, ne edlumpiyuwen ta is menge ulaula ta su wey wazà minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula te lawa ta wey meremerik he isip ta. Ne ebpurungan ta is ulaula ta su wey meheg̵eti is kebmetazeng ta pinaag̵i te layun ta kedtehuza kandin.
Mahala key keniyu ziyan te g̵ehinawa niw su wazè dey salà te minsan hentei ziyan; wazà minsan hentei ziyan he nezeetan dey is kedtuu zin. Wazà minsan hentei ziyan he midlimbungan dey.

Kenà iyan igkeg̵iya ku kayi su zuen igkesewayi ku keniyu. Nekag̵i ku he zaan he utew kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa zey. Te uuyag key pa wey minsan ke ebpatey key en ne kenè kew g̵ihapun egkeawà dini te g̵ehinawa zey.

Utew zekelà is kedsarig ku keniyu; dekelà layun is kebpekezalig ku keniyu. Ne tenged kayi minsan pa te mezakel is menge seeng dey, meupiya g̵ihapun is g̵ehinawa ku; utew zekelà is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.

Ne hein nekeuma key en dini te prubinsya he Mesidunya, wazè key g̵ihapun meewai te menge seeng dey. Su nereg̵enan key te mezakel he samuk. Mibpekidtebek kenami is menge kuntada zey ne ingkeipeng dey is menge tumutuu.
Iyan, is Megbevayà he metau he edlipey te egkengeseeng, midhimu zin he meupiya is gehinawa zey pinaag̵i te kebpekeuma ni Tito.

Ne kenà iyan dà ingkelipey zey is keg̵alew zey ki Tito, kekenà, elin daan is tudtul zin he utew sikandin nelipey mehitenged keniyu. Netudtul zin he egkesuatan niw utew he mekepenumbaley a ziyan. Netudtul zin daan he ebuyù kew te pesaylu zini te kediey. Ne elin daan tudtul zin is: dekelà te g̵ehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te egkesuatan ku. Ne tenged kayi utew zekelà is kelipey ku.

Su minsan ke pinaag̵i zutun te surat ku ne neseeng kew, neisip ku he meupiya utew te neveelan ku haazà. Hein aney, nekedsendit a su maan is neveelan ku is nehimu he ingkeseeng niw, iyan, petuluy zà naawà haazà is kegkeseeng niw.

Ne g̵untaan nelipey ad, kenà tenged te neseeng kew, kekenà, tenged te mibpurungan niw is menge ulaula niw pinaag̵i zutun te kegkeseeng niw. Ne haazà is kegkeseeng niw, himan te Megbevayà umba inmeupiya niw haazà is surat dey.

Su is kegkeseeng he egemiten te Megbevayà, egkehimu he igkehalin te g̵ehinawa te etew su wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne kenà heini engayan he ibpekedsendit ta, iyan, is kegkeseeng te menge etew he kenà edsundan te Megbevayà, kenà igkehalin te g̵ehinawa zan ne tenged kayi kenà sikandan egkeveg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Iyan, sikiyu, susiya niw is meupiya he nehimu te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kegkeseeng niw. Su pinaag̵i kayi mid-iseg en is kebpurungi niw te ulaula niw. Dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa niw he metueni te menge etew he wazè dey igkesawey te menge ulaula niw. Utew niw ingkeepes haazà is mid-ulaula zuen te nekesalà. Utew niw ingkehandek haazà su kela ke mekeragkes kew ke edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne utew kew zaan mibulung kediey, ne mid-iseg is kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù ku keniyu. Ne kenà dutun dà taman su segugunè niw midsiluti sikan is etew he mid-ulaula te mezaat. Ne ingkepeehè niw he wazà keniyu he salà dutun te neulaula zin.

Kenà iyan dà impesurati ku keniyu is mehitenged duen te etew he nekesalà wey kes neselaan din, kekenà, ebpeketistig̵us is Megbevayà he umba mibpesuratan ku sikiyu su wey niw meisipisip ke sengemenu key kemahal diyan te g̵ehinawa niw.
Ne tenged kayi utew key nelipey.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su nelipey key zaan tenged te nelipey si Tito. Ne iyan ingkelipey ni Tito is: pinaag̵i te menge ulaula niw he meupiya ne naawà is menge samuk diyà te isip din.
Indantal ku sikiyu ziyà te ki Tito ne wazà mebperis is kedentala ku keniyu. Layun tutuu is egkeg̵iyen dey keniyu ne iring din ded daan, benar is migkag̵i ku ziyà te ki Tito mehitenged keniyu.

Umba ed-iseg kew ebmahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin su egketenuzan din is kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù ku wey is kegkeg̵alew niw kandin asal utew niw zutun ingkelenew kes kebpekeuma zin su nahandek kew ke zuen wazè niw metuman.
Ne tenged kayi, utew ad egkelipey su netuenan ku he ebpekepurung ad ebpekesarig keniyu.
Egkesuatan dey, menge suled, he metueni niw ke hengkey is nehimu tenged te g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te Mesidunya.

Minsan dutun te nekeantus dan te utew mepait he kemeresayan, ingkelipey zan utew g̵ihapun ne tenged kayi minsan pa te utew zan egkengeayuayu, utew zekelà is ingkeveg̵ey zan he tavang te menge zuma zan he tumutuu.
Ebpeketistig̵us a he midhimu zan is taman te egkehimu zan, ne subra pa te egkehimu zan is imbeg̵ey zan he ebpuun te keputian te atey zan.
Su midhengyuan key zan he tug̵uti zey sikandan he mekeug̵up kenami te kebeg̵ey te tavang diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Wazè dey peebuta he egkehimu zan is iring dutun. Inhuna zan iveg̵ey is tivuuk he lawa zan wey g̵ehinawa zan diyà te Megbevayà, ne zutun, tenged te edtumanen dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, mibpevayàbayè dan daan kenami.

Ne g̵eina te iyan si Tito nemuunà te vaal ziyan te keniyu te kebpenguwaa te idtavang niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya, midsembag̵an dey sikandin he ipelaus din en su wey kew zin metevangi te kedhimesaza kayi te ulaula mehitenged te g̵ag̵ew niw.

Netuenan ku he wazà kurang niw te langun he menge ketau wey ulaula he meupiya. Dekelà is kedtuu niw; metau kew he ebpenurù; nesavut niw is tutuu he tuluuwen; ebpetebtevangè kew layun; ne zekelà is gag̵ew niw kenami. Tenged kayi egkesuatan dey he wazè niw zaan kurang kayi te kebpaahaa niw te g̵ag̵ew niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya.

Kenà heini kesug̵uan ku keniyu, kekenà, ibpesayud ku keniyu is dekelà he g̵ustu te zuma he menge tumutuu te kedtavang te menge zuma zan. Umba ibpesayud ku heini su wey niw meiringi. Ne pinaag̵i kayi egketuenan ku ke tutuu ve is keniyu he g̵ag̵ew.

Netuenan ta ke hengkey is kezekelà te g̵ag̵ew kenita te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te hizu zin kenita, minsan te utew sikandin sepian diyà te langit, midhimu zin he utew sikandin ayuayu pinaag̵i te kebpeetew zin wey kebpehimatey zin. Ne tenged kayi te kegkeayuayu zin egkehimu ki he utew sepian.

Iyan sambag ku keniyu is: himesaza niw haazà is kedtig̵uma niw te selapì he mibpuunan niw zutun te nehuna he tuig. Iyan kew nehuna te kedtig̵um te selapì wey metevangi is menge tigHudiya, ne kenà duen dà taman su heini he isip te kedtavang kandan, ne ziyan ebpuun te keniyu.
Ne tenged kayi peniguduwi niw wey niw mepasad sumalà is egkehimu niw. Kinahanglan he zekelà is gustu niw te kedhimesaza kayi te vaal iring te zekelà is gustu niw hein aney te kebpuuni kayi.

Su emun dekelà is gustu niw te kebeg̵aya te tavang sumalà is egkehimu niw, iyan heini igkesuat te Megbevayà su kenè din ebuyuen kenita is kenè ta igkeveg̵ey, kekenà, iyan ebuyuen din haazà is egkehimu ta he ibeg̵ey kandin.

Kenà iyan dini te isip ku is merasey kew su wey metevangi is duma he edlised, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he metevangi niw is menge tumutuu he edlised guntaan geina te sepian kew g̵untaan. Ne keuzemà, emun iyan kew edlised ne iyan sikandan sepian, egkehimu he edtevangan kew zan daan. Pinaag̵i kayi ebpeked-iiring kew ne wazà edlised he tumutuu.
Iring heini te insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà su edhenduen heini te,
“Haazà is etew he nekekuwa te zekelà,
wazà gihapun mesubrahi is nekuwa zin.
Ne haazà is etew he zeisek is nekuwa zin,
wazè din daan kurang.”
Dekelà is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà su imbeg̵ey zin ki Tito is dekelà he g̵ustu te kedtavang keniyu iring te kenami zaan he g̵ustu.

Ne hein mid-insaan dey sikandin ke egkesuatan din he edtavang keniyu utew sikandin nesuat. Ne kenà duen dà taman su zaan sikandin egkesuat he edtavang keniyu. Ne tenged kayi te suat din ed-isip edlikù diyan te keniyu.
Ibpezuma zey kandin is sevaha kayi te menge suled tew he tenged te kedhag̵ù din te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, utew sikandin telehuzen te menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su nepilì sikandin te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu zini he iyan eduma kenami zutun te kedhated dey kayi te idtavang diyà te egkengeayuayu. Umba iyan key edhated su wey mevantug is Nengazen ne wey zaan metueni he utew key egkesuat he edtavang.
Umba egkesuatan dey he eduma heini is suled tew su wey key kenà medudahi su kela ke zuen egkag̵i he ebpenggemiten dey heini is dekelà he selapì he idhated dey.
Su egkesuatan dey he hustu is ebeelan dey sumalà is ked-isipa kenami te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman, kekenà, maahà daan te menge etew he metazeng is menge vaal zey.

Ne zuen pa suled tew he ibpezuma zey engki Tito. Mibpurungan ku sikandin susiya ne utew zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang te menge tumutuu, iyan, tuwas pa zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang keniyu g̵eina te zekelà is kedsarig din keniyu.

Si Tito, iyan timbang ku te kedhimuwa ku te kedtavang keniyu. Ne heini is menge suled tew he zezuwa he eduma kandin pehendiyan, menge sug̵ù sikandan te menge g̵urupu te tumutuu zini. Pinaag̵i kandan egkevantug layun si Kristu ziyà te menge etew.

Ipeehè niw kandan is gag̵ew niw su wey metueni te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei he inged he tutuu iyan is gag̵ew niw te menge zuma niw, ne zutun egketuenan dan he tutuu is migkag̵i zey he metinevangen kew.
Wazà kinahanglan he idsurat ku keniyu ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan niw te kedtavang te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu

su netuenan ku he zekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkeg̵iyan ku is menge tumutuu he tigMesidunya he layun dekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkag̵i ku kandan he puun pa zutun te nehuna he tuig daan naandam is gehinawa niw te menge tigGerisya te kebeg̵ey. Ne is kezekelan kandan, hein nezineg dan heini, mid-iseg is gustu zan te kedtavang daan.

Ne g̵untaan edsug̵uen ku ziyan heini is menge suled tew su wey kew zan metevangi te kedtumana te migkag̵i ku mehitenged keniyu su kela ke mehimu he lalag dà duen ne zutun dà taman. Iyan, netuenan ku he edtumanen niw g̵ihapun ne edteg̵enahan niw is idtavang niw sumalà is migkag̵i ku.

Su emun kenè niw edtumanen ne emun eduma kediey pehendiyan is menge tigMesidunya ne egkeehè dan he wazè niw teg̵enaha is idtavang niw, ne egkeeled key ne egkeeled kew zaan tenged te migkag̵i ku he naandam kew en.

Ne tenged kayi neisip ku he kinahanglan he ed-insaan ku heini is tetelu he menge suled tew ke egkehimu he edhuna zan kediey pehendiyan su wey kew zan metevangi te kedteg̵enaha he zaan te idtavang he impenaad niw. Ne zutun egkehimu he egketeg̵ane en haazà dutun te kebpekeuma ku ne egketuenan te langun he umba ebeg̵ey kew, kenà tenged te ebpeg̵esen kew, kekenà, tenged te ebpuun diyà te keputian te atey niw is kebeg̵ey niw.
Kenè niw lipati heini is sempità he emun deisek is ibpemula ta, deisek daan is egkerag̵un ta, ne emun dekelà is ibpemula ta, dekelà daan is egkerag̵un ta.

Kinahanglan he ed-isipen te kada sevaha ke hengkey is egkesuatan din he ibeg̵ey ne iyan ibeg̵ey zin. Kenè ta ibeg̵ey is kenè ta egkesuatan he ibeg̵ey, ne kenè ta zaan ibeg̵ey emun egkeisip ta he integ̵el kenita is kebeg̵aya ta, su emun ebeg̵ey ki, kinahanglan he ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kebeg̵aya ta zutun ne iyan haazà utew egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Ne egkehimu te Megbevayà he ibeg̵ey zin kenita is subra pa zutun te egkinehenglanen ta, su wey ta layun maazen is langun he menge kinahanglan ta wey zuen ta zaan subra he igketavang ta te zuma.
Ne zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Layun dekelà is ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà
diyà te egkengeayuayu ne kenà egkelipatan
te wazà pidtemanan is ketulanged din.”
Ne is Megbevayà, iyan ebeg̵ey te venì diyà te ebpemula su wey zuen egkeenen.
Su edhimuwen din layun he kenè ki maalang-alang te selapì su wey ta meveg̵ayi is edlised. Ne umba, menge suled, mezakel is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged te tavang he ibpeuwit niw kenami.
Ne heini is ibeg̵ey niw, kenà iyan dà pulus din is kegketavangi te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà, kekenà, pinaag̵i kayi utew mezakel he etew is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà.

Ne emun egketuenan te menge etew he utew kew metulanged, ebentug̵en dan is Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù din wey tenged te mezesen he kedtuu niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su midtevangan niw sikandan ne midtevangan niw zaan is duma.
Ne zutun id-ampù kew zan, ne egkehimu he utew kew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan tenged te zekelà he g̵agew niw kandan he imbeg̵ey keniyu te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged kayi ebpeselematan ta is Megbevayà tenged te kebeg̵aya zin kenita te Anak din he wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekerepeng te kemahal zin.

Duen egkag̵i he siak, si Pablo, telawen a emun diyan a te keniyu, iyan, memeg̵arang kun is menge lalag ku keniyu emun edlelag̵an ku sikiyu pinaag̵i te surat. Iyan, guntaan, kenà meg̵arang is menge lalag ku, kekenà, edhangyù a keniyu pinaag̵i te menayù he menge lalag iring te menayù wey velig̵eg̵awen si Kristu.
Idhangyù ku keniyu he purungi niw is ulaula niw su wey kenà kinahanglan he mebmeg̵arang is menge lalag ku emun diyan a te keniyu. Duen duma keniyu he egkag̵i he iring a te etew zà duen
Tutuu iyan he etew key zà duen, iyan, is paag̵i te kedsukuli zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te isip te etew zà duen.

Su is menge ketezengan, he ke và dà gumaan, he idsukul zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te etew, kekenà, mekeg̵eg̵ehem utew su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne heini is menge ketezengan, kenà egkesukulan te minsan hengkey he tarù he ketezengan he igkuntada te Megbavayà minsan ke utew melig-en.

Ne iyan heini egemiten dey te kedeeg̵a te menge tarù he ketezengan te menge mepedelig̵en he etew he kenà egkesuat he edtuu te ibpesavut te Megbevayà. Ne minsan is ked-isipa zan te tarù, egkehimu he ed-ilisan dey su wey zan human meisip is tutuu ne pinaag̵i kayi ebpemineg̵en dan is menge sug̵ù ni Kristu.
Ne emun ibpeehè niw en he metinumanen kew te menge sug̵ù ni Kristu, ne zutun edsilutan dey is minsan hentei pa he tumutuu ziyan he kenè pa egkesuat he ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù din.

Purungi niw isipa is nesavut niw en su zuen menge zuma niw he kunaan dan ke iyan dan dà menge hustu he sulug̵uen ni Kristu. Kinahanglan he mesavut dan he sikami, hustu key zaan he menge sulug̵uen ni Kristu.

Kenè en buwa kinahanglan he egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he zuen kebayàbayà ku keniyu he imbeg̵ey kedì te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke henduen be te utew subra is idantal ku, kenè ku igkeeled heini su wazè din iyan iveg̵aya kayi te kebayàbayà dini te kediey su wey ku mezezeeti is kedtuu niw, kekenà, imbeg̵ey zin kediey su wey ku melig-eni is kedtuu niw.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he ibpelihandek ku keniyu is menge surat ku,
iyan, duen egkag̵i he siak si Pablo, utew a mevurut he edawey keniyu emun ebpekidlalag a keniyu pinaag̵i te surat, iyan, emun diyan a te keniyu, telawen e kun ne kenè e kun metau he egkag̵i.
Is etew he egkag̵i te iring kayi, kinahanglan he sevuta zin he is egkeg̵iyen dey pinaag̵i te surat emun kenè key ziyan te keniyu, ne iyan ded ed-ul-ulahan dey emun ebpekeuma key ziyan.

Telawen key iyan te ked-iring te menge ulaula te menge zuma he etew ziyan he menge mepedelig̵en. Kunaan dan ke iyan sikandan metau egkag̵i ke hengkey is meupiya he ulaula. Utew zan tulebung! Su emun ed-iringan te menge etew is kandan he ulaula egkeg̵iyen dan he utew meupiya. Iyan, ke kenà sikandan ed-iringan te menge etew egkeg̵iyen dan he sayep haazà is kenà ed-iring.
Ne sikami, kenà subra is kedantal zey su iyan dey zà idantal haazà is nehimu zey te edtuman he insug̵ù kenami te Megbevayà. Ne ragkes kayi is menge vaal zey hein diyan key te keniyu.

Kenà egkehimu he subra is kegemita zey te keg̵ehem dey emun edsembag̵an dey sikiyu. Kenè dey sikiyu pezem egkeveyveyaan ke wazè dey sikiyu mepenudtuli zengan, iyan, iyan key nehuna he nekeuma ziyan he ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.

Kenè dey idantal is menge vaal te zuma he etew ziyà te menge inged he zutun wazè key sug̵ua te Megbevayà. Iyan, geina te neragkes kew kayi te mibpeveelan kenami te Megbevayà, egkesuatan dey he emun ed-iseg en is kedtuu niw ne edtevangan key keniyu zutun te menge vaal zey ziyan te inged niw.

Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkehimu he idsangyew zey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen ziyà te menge meziyù he inged he ziyan dapit te keniyu. Su kenè dey egkesuatan he idantal zey is mibeelan te zuma he etew zutun te menge inged he wazè key zutun sug̵ua te Megbevayà.
Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Ke zuen etew he egkesuat he edantal, kinahanglan he iyan dà idantal zin is nengehimu te Nengazen.”
Su emun edelig̵en ta is kenita he menge vaal, kenà heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan, emun duen igkezelig̵i kenita te Megbevayà iyan heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Pekelalaglalag kew he entusa niw is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu minsan ke henduen be te tulebung a.

Su insavuk te Megbevayà kayi te kediey is dekelà he suat he kenè kew medsuwey te Nengazen. Iring kew te rag̵a he nekeg̵unan, iyan, iyan si Kristu ingkag̵un ku keniyu. Ne egkesuatan ku he wazà duma he ebpekeesawa keniyu.

Egkeipeng a keniyu su kela ke meengkezi niw is kebpurungi niw kedtumana te menge sug̵ù ni Kristu su kela ke mesahug is kedtuu niw te selakew he edtuuwen. Kela ke meiringi niw si Ibà dengan su mid-akalan sikandin te teruen he uled he iyan si Setanas.

Umba egkeipeng a su ke zuen ebpekeuma ziyan he selakew is ibpesavut dan mehitenged ki Jesus, ne selakew is mulin-ulin he ibpenurù dan, ne kenè dan iyan ibpesavut is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey, kekenà, selakew is ibpenurù dan, ne ed-entusen niw mulà is kandan he kebpenurù ne kenà duen dà taman su utew niw egkesuati te ebpemineg.
Ne heini is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kunaan dan ke utew zan lavew, iyan, netuenan ku he wazè e zan melevawi
su minsan ke kenà a metau he egkag̵i netuenan ku mulà ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne iyan heini impesavut dey keniyu zengan te minsan keenu he timpu wey te minsan hengkey he paag̵i.

Hein impesavut ku ziyan te keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, wazà a mebpesuhul keniyu te minsan sengesintabus dà. Ne iyan benar is: mibpekeminus ku en is pid-etawan ku su wey ku sikiyu ikepelavew. Sayep ku ve heeyan?
Dutun te kebpenurua ku keniyu ne iyan midsuhul kedì is menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged. Henduen be te midtekawan ku sikandan wey ku sikiyu iyan metevangi.

Ne hein diyan a te keniyu ke zuen kinahanglan ku he selapì, wazè ku vuyua ziyan te keniyu su is menge suled tew he ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya, imbeg̵ey zan kedì is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku. Sikiyu is tigGerisya, wazè ku pa sikiyu vuyui te igkeuyag ku, ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebuyù a ziyan te keniyu te minsan keenu he timpu.

Ne heini is idantal ku, kenà egkehimu he egkehalin te minsan keenu he timpu su kenà a edawat te selapì te minsan hentei he ziyan te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gerisya. Tutuu heini iring te netuenan ku he tutuu is impesavut ni Kristu.
Kunaan niw vuwa ke umba egkeg̵iyen ku he kenà a ebuyù diyan te keniyu su wazà gehinawa ku keniyu, iyan, utew kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku. Netuenan te Megbevayà he mahal kew zini te g̵ehinawa ku.
Kenè ku edlekaan heini is lalag ku he kenè ku kebuyù diyan su wey haazà is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kenè dan mekekag̵i he iring te kenami is menge paag̵i zan te kebaal.

Kenà sikandan tutuu he menge epustul ni Kristu, kekenà, tarù sikandan he menge sulug̵uen ni Kristu. Edterteruan kew zan pinaag̵i te menge vaal zan ne egkeg̵iyen dan he tutuu sikandan he menge epustul ni Kristu.
Ne kenè ku heini igkeinuinu su minsan si Setanas, egkehimu zin is dagwey zin he iring te utew merayag he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit.
Umba, kenè ki egkeinuinu ke egkehimu zaan is menge sulug̵uen ni Setanas he iring te menge metazeng he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà. Iyan, keuzemà edsilutan sikandan sumalà is menge mezaat he vaal zan.

Edsublien ku te egkag̵i he kinahanglan he kenà isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he tulebung a tenged te menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan, minsan ke ed-isipen niw he tulebung a, entusa niw te ebpemineg su wey a mekezantal te kenà utew egkeug̵et.
Heini is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, ne kenà iyan ibpekag̵i kedì te Nengazen, su iring a te tulebung is edantal.
Ne g̵eina te zuen mezakel he idantal zan is menge ulaula zan dini te kelibutan egkehimu vuwa taman te meg̵aan dà ke idantal ku zaan is kedì.
Ne g̵eina te menge uluwanen kew he etew, utew kew metau he ed-antus te menge lalag te tulebung diyà te keniyu.
Su ke zuen minsan hentei he ebmandarmandar keniyu wey ke zuen ed-ag̵ew te menge azen niw wey ke zuen edlimbung keniyu wey ke edlupig̵en kew zan wey ke ebug̵elen kew zan ne ed-entusen niw.

Utew zan mevurut, iyan, sikami, telawen key ne egkeeled a su haazà is menge ulaula zan keniyu he kunaan niw ke utew meupiya, wazè dey meulaula ziyan te keniyu. Ne g̵eina te wazè dan en kegkehandek te edantal ne kenà a zaan egkehandek he edantal minsan ke ebpekeiring a te tulebung.

Haazà he menge etew, egkeg̵iyen dan he menge pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà su menge Hudiyu zan, menge kevuwazan ni Israyil wey menge kevuwazan te kepuun ni Israyil he si Abraham. Ne siak daan, Hudiyu a he kevuwazan daan ni Israyil wey ni Abraham.

Netuenan ku he henduen a te ebuneg̵en kayi te menge lalag ku, iyan, kenà egkesabpeng is bèbè ku kayi te egkeg̵iyen ku. Egkeg̵iyen dan he menge sulug̵uen sikandan ni Kristu. Siak, lavew e pa he metinumanen he sulug̵uen ni Kristu. Utew memereg̵en is ebpeveelan din kediey. Lelayun ad egkepirisu ne sikandan, kenà layun. Lelayun ad ebug̵ela te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenà te sikandan. Mezakel en is nengeeg̵iyan ku he edhimetayan a pezem, kenà te sikandan.
Kelelima e en bug̵ela te menge Hudiyu te menge ketluan wey siyew he lagkut.

Ketetelu ad bug̵ela pinaag̵i te menge tuked. Midtuleng a te vatu te menge etew su edhimetayan e zan pezem. Ketetelu en daan melavu is barku he mid-untuzan ku ne zuen timpu he sengekezukileman wey sengeandew ziyà a te lawed te zag̵at is nekeg̵eg̵entungan dà.

Ne zutun te menge kedhipanew ku ne nengeeg̵iyan ku is mezakel he menge kemereg̵enan tenged te kedalem te wahig, wey tenged te menge tulisan, wey tenged te menge kuntada ku he menge zuma ku he Hudiyu wey menge kenà Hudiyu. Mezakel is menge hitavù kediey ziyà te menge inged wey ziyà te wazà meg̵inged wey ziyà te zag̵at wey pinaag̵i te menge tarù he tumutuu.
Midhag̵ù a is edterebahu; layun a egkepurang; layun a egkevitil; ne layun a egkemezahi. Layun a kurang te egkeenen wey layun a egkealang-alang te egkeubpaan wey ugelingen.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su andew-andew egkereg̵enan a te kedumelaha ku te langun he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei.
Su ke zuen tumutuu he edlised su ebmeg̵uyà is kedtuu zin, ne edlised a zaan su egkeipeng a kandin. Ke zuen nepenulayan ne nekesalà, ne haazà is etew he nekepenuley kandin, utew ku igkeepes.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he edantal a, iyan, emun kinahanglan he ibpezantal a, idantal ku is menge kemeresayan he nengeeg̵iyan ku su pinaag̵i kayi egketuenan niw he zekelà is kurang ku te ketau.
Is Megbevayà wey Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, delig̵a sikandin te wazà pidtemanan. Netuenan din he kenà tarù heini is egkeg̵iyen ku.

Dengan, hein diyà a te inged he Demasku, is gubirnedur he intezù ni Hadì Eritas, midsug̵ù din is menge sundaru he ventayi zan is pultahan he idselang dutun te kutà te inged su wey e zan mezakep ke egawas a zutun.
Iyan, duen menge etew he midtavang kediey ne in-ahuk e zan te zekelà he vinevey ne midhelug̵an e zan diyà te sulawà he liyu te metikang he elavat he kutà dutun te inged ne nekeg̵awas a zutun.
Minsan pa te wazà pulus te kedantal ku, edantal e zed gihapun. Ne g̵untaan egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu is impezayag wey is impaahà kedì te Nengazen.

Dengan, duen tumutuu he nekilala ku he mibpengelinteuwan he mekepenumbaley sikandin diyà te utew metikang he langit he ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà. Sepulù en wey heepat he tuig heini is kegkehitavù kayi. Wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dè be heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te teg̵einep; iyan dà nesayud kayi is Megbevayà.

Iyan dà netuenan ku is: diyà sikandin mekeseled te utew mekempet he inged te Megbevayà ne edsublien ku te egkag̵i he wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dà heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te teg̵einep; iyan dà nesayud is Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te kebpenumbaley zin diyà te langit duen nezineg din he kenà egkekag̵i pinaag̵i te kelibutanen he lalag ne kenà daan idtug̵ut he egkeg̵iyen te etew zà duen.
Ne egkehimu he idantal ku heini is nehitavù kandin, iyan, kenè ku iyan idantal is menge ketau ku, kekenà, iyan ku idantal haazà is ebpekepaahà te kurang ku te ketau.

Ne penenglitan ke egkesuatan ku he edantal a, kenà egkehimu he egkeg̵iyen niw he wazà pulus te zantal ku su tutuu is idantal ku, iyan, kenà a edantal su kenè ku egkesuatan he isipa a te menge etew he utew lavew. Meupiya ke zutun dà ebpuun is ked-isipa zan kedì te menge ulaula ku he neehè dan wey menge penurù ku he nezineg dan.

Mibeg̵ayan a te Megbevayà te utew merasey he zaru su wey ku kenà ikezantal is utew meupiya he nengeehè ku ziyà te langit. Ne heini is daru, ne egemiten ni Setanas he idrasey kedì, ne pinaag̵i kayi kenà a ebpekepelavew.
Ketetelu ku en iampù diyà te Megbevayà he iawè din,

iyan, iyan tavak din kediey is, “Edtevangan ku sikew wey nu maantus ne hustu en. Su zekelà is egkehimu te g̵ehem ku ziyan te kenikew emun wazè nu en egkehimu,” ke sikandin. Ne tenged kayi utew ku egkesuati he idantal ku is kurang ku te ketau su wey a melig-eni te g̵ehem ni Kristu.

Ne meupiya en utew te g̵ehinawa ku is kurang ku te ketau, is kedsumpelita wey is pesipala kediey te menge etew, wey is menge kemereg̵enan wey is kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Su netuenan ku he emun wazè en kediey he ketau, dekelà is ibeg̵ey kediey ni Kristu he ketau.

Henduen a te tulebung he etew su edantal a, iyan, neteg̵el a keniyu su iyan kew pezem ebeg̵ey te menge ketezengan ku he idtavak keniyan te menge uvag kun epustul ni Kristu. Ne minsan pa te wazà kediey he ketau wazà a g̵ihapun melevawi kayi te uvag menge utew lavew he kenà tutuu he epustul ni Kristu.

Ne hein diyan a te keniyu impeehè ku keniyu he tutuu a he epustul ni Kristu su minsan nereg̵enan a, mid-antus a su wey ku ikepaahà is menge singyal wey menge egkengein-inuwan he iyan tuus te tutuu he epustul.

Is kedtavang ku keniyu ne iring ded te kedtavang ku te menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma he menge inged. Asal kela ke kunaan niw ke kenè ku idtavang keniyu is kenè ku keniyu kebuyui te selapì. Emun nekesalà a keniyu pinaag̵i kayi peseyluwa a keniyu.

Ed-endaman ku en is kedhendiyan ku ne iketelu en heini is kebpenumbaley ku ziyan te keniyu. Ne iring ded te nehuna, kenà egkehimu he ebuyù a keniyu te selapì. Kenè ku egkesuatan is selapì niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he mahala a keniyu ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw. Nehimu a he amey niw su pinaag̵i kedì neketuu kew te Megbevayà. Ne kenà egkehimu he ebuyuan is menge vatà te amey zan, kekenà, iyan ebuyù is menge vatà.
Egkelipey a utew ke igkeveg̵ey ku is menge azen ku wey is desen ku wey ku sikiyu metevangi. Iyan, minsan pa te mahal kew zini te g̵ehinawa ku henduen be te kenà a mulà mahal ziyan te g̵ehinawa niw.
Duen duma keniyu he ke sikandan te, “Tutuu iyan he wazà si Pablo mebuyù te selapì, iyan, duen paag̵i zin he meeles wey kiw zin melimbungi.”
Ne emun iyan heeyan egkeisip niw, ipetueni niw kedì ke hengkey he paag̵i is kegkelimbungi ku keniyu. Duen be nekuwa ku zutun te kedsug̵ua ku te menge zuma ku ziyan te keniyu? Nelimbungan kew zan be?

Midhengyuan ku si Tito he medhendiyan te keniyu, ne impezuma ku zaan kandin is sevaha he menge suled tew. Midlimbungan kew zan be? Wazè niw egkekag̵i he iring kayi, su si Tito wey siak ne neked-iring is paag̵i zey wey ed-ul-ulahan dey su pudu memetazeng.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke pinaag̵i kayi te egkeg̵iyen ku ibpesavut ku keniyu he wazè dey menge sayep, iyan, kenà iyan heeyan tuyù ku. Su ebpeketistig̵us is Megbevayà he heini is migkag̵i ku keniyu, ne iyan hustu he egkeg̵iyen tenged te kebpekidsevaha ku ki Kristu. Ne, minahal ku he menge suled, insurat ku heini is langun, su wey meheg̵et is kedtuu niw.

Egkesamuk is gehinawa ku su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne iyan ku egkeahà diyan te keniyu is menge ulaula he kenè ku egkesuatan. Ne emun iyan haazà ne zuen ed-ul-ulahan ku zutun he kenè niw zaan egkesuatan su kinahanglan he edsewayen ku is keniyu he ulaula. Su kela ke zuen ebpekigkuntada ziyan te menge zuma zin, kela ke zuen egkesina, duen petuluy egkepauk, wey leg̵ezen, kela ke zuen diyan ebpenemperasà wey edsulà te zuma zin, kela ke zuen bereituk. Kela ke zuen diyan te keniyu gelbuwen, wey kela ke wazè niw kebpekid-uyun te menge tumutuu.

Egkesemukan a su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne igkeeled ku sikiyu ziyà te Megbevayà ne kela ke utew a egkeseeng tenged te mezakel he netuenan ku zengan he nekevaal te mezaat ne wazè dan pa engkezi is menge mahawag he ulaula zan iring te kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa wey is kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan.

Iketelu en heini te kebpenumbaley ku ziyan. Ke zuen etew he ebpehusey kedì ne zuen idsumbunga zin te zuma zin he tumutuu, kinahanglan he ebentayan ta is sug̵ù diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Ke zuen idsumbunga niw te zuma niw kinahanglan he edtistig̵usan te menge tetelu ne emun kenà ne menge zezuwa he etew.”

Dutun te ikezuwa he kebpenumbelayi ku keniyu, sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula zengan, migkag̵i ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-engkezan haazà is memezaat he ulaula niw ne edsilutan ku sikiyu emun ebpekelikù a. Ne ed-umanan ku egkeg̵iya g̵untaan diyan te keniyu wey ziyà te minsan hentei pa he ed-ulaula te mezaat. Ke ebpekeuma a, wazà minsan hentei he ed-ulaula te mezaat he ebpekelikey te kedsiluti ku kandin.

Dutun, ne egkevenaran kew human he is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, iyan is impekag̵i kediey ni Kristu. Ne kenà sikandin telawen, kekenà, emun duen ed-ul-ulahan din keniyu dekelà is gehem din he ibpeehè din keniyu.

Su minsan ke henduen be te wazà egkehimu ni Kristu zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus, nevanhew zed sikandin ne zuen din en beg̵u en he untung pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Ne sikami zaan, henduen be te wazè dey egkehimu su layun key zaan ebpekeantus te kemeresayan, iyan, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Megbevayà he edtavang kenami, duen dey zaan beg̵u en he untung ne ebpeketavang key pa keniyu.
Susiya niw is gehinawa niw wey niw metueni ke tutuu ve is kedtuu niw ki Kristu. Wazè niw ve metueni he midlumunan kew ni Kristu? Ne emun wazà, ne tarù is kedtuu niw ne wazè kew mezawat ni Kristu.
Egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he tutuu key iyan he menge epustul ni Kristu.

Id-ampù dey ziyà te Megbevayà he wazà ulaula niw he mezaat. Ne kenè dey iyan id-empua keniyu su wey metueni te menge etew he edtumanen niw is impenurù dey keniyu su maambe ke kenè niw ed-isipen he epustul key ni Kristu, asal, ed-ul-ulahan niw is hustu.
Su emun hustu is ed-ul-ulahan niw, sikami is epustul, kenà egkehimu he ibpeehè dey is keg̵ehem dey keniyu su wey zey zà ibpaahà is keg̵ehem dey ke edsupaken niw is hustu he ulaula.
Egkelipey ad emun wazè niw supak, minsan ke henduen te wazè dey keg̵ehem. Ne kenà duen dà taman su id-ampù dey he mepurung meheg̵et is ked-ul-ulaha niw te hustu.

Umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te zini e pa te meziyù su ke ebpekeuma a ziyan kenè en kinahanglan he meg̵amit ku is keg̵ehem ku te epustul te kedsilut. Imbeg̵ey kedì te Megbevayà heini is keg̵ehem. Kenà iyan imbeg̵aya zin kayi te keg̵ehem su wey maawà is upakat niw te tumutuu, kekenà, wey meheg̵et is upakat niw.

Menge suled, iyan dà heini menge lalag ku keniyu; berakat he mebmelipayen kew. Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw; tumana niw is menge sambag ku keniyu. Kinahanglan he mesevaha is gehinawa niw ne mebmelinawen is ked-ubpè niw. Su emun ebeelan niw heini, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te g̵ag̵ew wey kelinew, layun eduma keniyu.
Mebpelimlimuey kew he iyan tuus he teltelesuled kew tenged te kedtuu niw.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is langun he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà dini.

Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey verakat he ipeehè keniyu te Megbevayà he mahal kew ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin wey verakat daan he meheg̵et is upakat niw te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Iyan a si Pablo.

Siak si Pablo is midsurat kayi. Ibpeuwit ku heini ziyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ziyan te menge inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gelasya. Siak wey is langun he menge tumutuu he menge zuma ku zini, ebpengemusta keniyu. Epustul a, iyan, wazà a g̵erari he epustul te etew zà duen, ne kenà daan pinaag̵i te etew zà duen is kedsug̵ua kedì, kekenà, migeraran a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu wey te Amey tew he Megbevayà he mibanhew ki Jesus, ne iyan sikandan midsug̵ù kedì.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey veg̵ayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Si Kristu, imbelavag din is untung din su wey mepalis is menge salè tew su wey kiw melibri, ne kenè tew meiringi is menge etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat te g̵untaan he timpu kayi te kelibutan. Umba mibeelan heini ni Kristu su edtumanen din is egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Berakat he zelig̵a is Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan.

Utew ku sikiyu igkeinuinu su wazè en utew meug̵et ne henduen be te nahalin en is kedtuu niw, ne is Megbevayà he iyan mibpetuu keniyu pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew ni Kristu, ed-iniyug̵an niw ne edtuuwan niw is selakew he tuluuwen he egngezanan daan te menge etew he Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Iyan, kenà egkehimu he zuen selakew pa he tuluuwen he egngezanan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Egkeg̵iyen ku heini su zuen menge etew ziyan he ebpenurù te tarù, ne pinaag̵i kayi egkesemukan is isip niw su edhelinen dan te tarù is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.

Iyan, egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan ke sikami, wey minsan ke velinsug̵uen he ebpuun te langit, ne zuen ibpesavut din keniyu he egkeg̵iyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, selakew, ne kenà iyan heini is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.

Daan dey en keniyu heini migkag̵i, iyan, ed-umanan ku egkeg̵iya g̵untaan he ke zuen ibpesavut te minsan hentei he egkeg̵iyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, kenà iyan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan netag̵ù te g̵ehinawa ku is: egkesuat a he zelig̵a a te menge etew. Iyan, kenà iyan heini netag̵ù te g̵ehinawa ku, kekenà, iyan is kebpenunuata ku te Megbevayà. Kunaan niw vuwa zaan ke egkesuatan ku he ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa te menge etew is menge ulaula ku, iyan, kenà daan iyan egkesuatan ku su emun iyan egkesuatan ku, kenà egkehimu he sulug̵uen a ni Kristu.
Egkesuatan ku, menge suled, he mesavut niw he heini is migngezanan he Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut ku keniyu ne kenà ebpuun te etew zà duen
su wazà keg̵iya kediey te minsan hentei he etew ne wazà daan ipenurù kediey te etew, kekenà, impinted kediey ni Jesu Kristu.

Nezineg niw is daan he menge ulaula ku zengan te kemulu ku pa kebenteyani te tuluuwen te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu. Is langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesus, mibpesipelahan ku su ebpeg̵esen ku pezem sikandan he meengkezi zan is kedtuu zan.

Is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu he serenganè ku te penuig̵en, wazà nekerepeng kedì te kebenteyani ku te menge tuluuwen dey te menge Hudiyu. Ne wazà kandan kedì nekerepeng te kebenteyani te imbilinbilin he menge vetasan te g̵inepuan dey.
Ne minsan pa zutun, ingkeg̵ag̵ew a te Megbevayà ne mibpilì e zin he sulug̵uen din te wazè e pa ianak ne nehimu zin he meketuu a kandin.
Ne hein neisip din he ibpekilala zin en kediey is Anak din he si Jesus su wey ku ikepenudtul is keag̵i ni Jesus diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, wazà a mebpepenurù te minsan hentei he etew;
ne wazà a zaan medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim su wey ku mesampit kes nengehuna he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, kekenà, midhendiyà a te prubinsya he Erabya ne zutun, midlikù a ziyà te inged he Demasku.
Ne tetelu pa zutun he tuig ne human a medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim wey a mekepenumbaley ziyà te ki Pedro ne ziyà a te kandin taman dà te zezuwa he simana.
Ne neehè ku zaan dutun si Santiago, sikan is hazi te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne wazà duma he epustul he neehè ku zutun, iyan dà sikandan is dezuwa.
Tutuu heini is edtudtulen ku keniyu. Netuenan te Megbevayà he kenà tarù.
Ne zutun mibeyaan ku is prubinsya he Sirya wey Silisya.
Ne wazè e pa zutun mekilala te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ki Jesus he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Netudtulan dà sikandan te menge etew he siak is ebpendakep te menge tumutuu ki Jesus dutun te nengehuna he andew, ne g̵untaan idsangyew ku en is tinuuwan he iyan ibpendekepa ku kandan su wey zan meewai.
Ne tenged dutun midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te neketuu a ki Jesus.
Ne sepulù wey heepat pa he tuig dutun ne human a medlikù diyà te Hiruselim. Mibpezumehè key ki Bernabe ne miduma ku zaan si Tito.

Umba midhendiyà a su impinted kedì te Megbevayà haazà is kedhendiyè ku. Ne kebpekeuma zey zutun ne midtig̵um is menge egalen te menge tumutuu he iyan dan dà ne impesavut ku kandan ke hengkey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpenurù ku ziyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Egkesuatan ku zutun he kenà maawà is pulus te nengeveelan ku en wey is kemulu ku pa ebeeli.
Iyan, nesuatan dan ded is baal ku su si Tito, is duma ku, minsan te kenà sikandin Hudiyu, wazè dan iteg̵el is kedsirkunsidar kandin sumalà is insug̵ù ni Moises.

Iyan, duen menge etew he kenà tutuu he menge tumutuu te tutuu he tuluuwen he midtampu kenami. Egkesuatan dan dutun he sirkunsidara si Tito. Umba midtampu zan he id-eles dan he kenè dan tutuu he tumutuu su wey zan maahà ke edtumanen tew is menge sug̵ù he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Su egkesuatan dan he meiring kiw te uripen pinaag̵i te kedtuman te kesug̵uan minsan te nelibri kiw en ni Jesu Kristu ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebenteyanan tew pa is kesug̵uan.
Ne wazè dey itug̵ut he meveyveyai key zan te minsan hengkey he paag̵i su wey kenà meumani te tarù is tutuu he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne kenà egkezeetan is kedtuu niw.

Ne zutun, minsan sikan is menge etew ziyà te Hiruselim he henduen be te menge egalen te tumutuu, wazè dan ingkepenurù kediey he idheg̵et te ibpenurù ku. Umba egkeg̵iyen ku he henduen dan te menge egalen su wazà bali ziyà te Megbevayà te igerar kenita te menge etew. Wazà id-uman dan te kediey he ibpenurù, kekenà, nesavut dan dutun he insarig kediey te Megbevayà is kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu iring te insarig din daan ki Pedro is kedsengyawa kayi ziyà te menge Hudiyu.

Su is Megbevayà, mid-ulinan din si Pedro wey mehimu sikandin he epustul he iyan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu, ne iring din ded, mid-ulinan e zin daan wey a mehimu he epustul he iyan sug̵ù din diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.

Ne si Santiago, si Pedro, wey si Juan, haazà is menge egalen dutun, hein nesavut dan he insarig kediey te Megbevayà heini is baal ku, mibpekigkumusta zan kenami ki Bernabe he tuus te teltelezuma key pudu is edtuman te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà. Neuyunan dey he iyan key ebpenudtul ziyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne iyan dan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu.
Iyan dan dà intelaan kenami is kedtevangi zey te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu ziyà te Hiruselim, iyan, daan ku en heini midheg̵et dini te g̵ehinawa ku.

Ne malù pa neug̵et dutun nekeuma si Pedro ziyà te kenami, te ziyè key te inged he Entiyukya. Ne hein aney sikandin mekeuma, hustu is mid-ulaula zin su mid-amur he egkaan te menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu. Iyan, hein nekeuma is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he midsug̵ù ni Santiago, midlikayan din he mekekaan duma te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne midsawey ku sikandin su utew keladu he kenà hustu is ed-ul-ulahan din. Umba midlikayan din su nahandek sikandin su kela ke ikesewayi kandin haazà is ulaula zin dutun te menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he egkag̵i he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne iring din ded daan dutun is mid-ulaula te zuma he menge tumutuu he Hudiyu su midlikey zan daan, ne minsan si Bernabe, ne neuwit daan dutun.

Ne hein nesavut ku he ed-ul-ulahan dan is supak te tutuu he impenurù te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, migkeg̵iyan ku si Pedro ziyà te etuvangan te langun kandan, ke siak te, “Sikew, Pedro, sikan is menge tumutuu he kenè tew zuma he Hudiyu, maan is ibpetuman nu kandan is kesug̵uan tew te menge Hudiyu? Su minsan Hudiyu ka, mid-engkezan nu en is kedtumana nu kayi he kesug̵uan,” ke siak.
Ne impelaus ku haazà is lalag ku te, “Sikita is etew he in-anak he Hudiyu, ne kenè ki iring te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu he egngezanan ta he ‘menge mesinupaken’.

Ne minsan pa zutun, netuenan ta he kenè ki egkeisip he metazeng te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtumana ta te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kekenà, pinaag̵i zà te kedsarig ta ki Jesu Kristu. Sikita is Hudiyu, nekesarig ki zaan ki Jesu Kristu su wey pinaag̵i te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu meisip ki zaan te Megbevayà he metazeng. Netuenan ta he kenà heini egkehimu pinaag̵i te kedtumana te kesug̵uan. Su wazà minsan hentei he ed-isipen he metazeng te Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana zin te kesug̵uan.

Guntaan, egkesuatan ta he isipa ki te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaag̵i ki Kristu. Ne pinaag̵i te kedtuu ta kandin ibpesavut kenita he mesinupaken ki ves daan he iring te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne emun iyan heini, ne sikita is Hudiyu, egkehimu ve he ebpekekag̵i ki he pinaag̵i ki Kristu nehimu ki en he mesinupaken? Kenà daan egkehimu!
Su emun edlikuan ku ne egkeg̵iyen ku he hustu he paag̵i haazà is kesug̵uan he mid-engkezan ku, igkepeehè ku pinaag̵i kayi he venar iyan he mekesesalà a su nesupak ku is kesug̵uan.

Siak, nesavut ku en he kenà a egkeveg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan pinaag̵i te kedtumana ku te kesug̵uan, ne tenged dutun mid-engkezan ku is kedsarig ku te kedtumana ku te kesug̵uan su wey ku iyan metuman is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà.

Tenged te kedsarig ku ki Kristu, inransang a te krus duma kandin su elili ku sikandin. Minatey a, iyan, uuyag a g̵ihapun su zini ed-ubpà te kediey si Kristu ne heini is kebpengungubpaan ku zini te kelibutan, pinaag̵i zà te kedsarig ku kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin ne mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kediey su wey a melibri.
Kenà egkehimu he kenè ku edewaten is gag̵ew te Megbevayà kedì su ke egkehimu he ed-isipen ki zin he metazeng pinaag̵i te kedtumana ta te kesug̵uan, wazè bes pulus te kebpehimatey ni Kristu!”

Sikiyu is menge tigGelasya, henduen be te kenè kew metau he ed-isip-isip! Utew a egkeinuinu keniyu! Maan is ebpemineg̵en niw is menge etew he ebpetuman keniyu te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Utew keladu is kebpenurua ku keniyu te nehimu ni Jesu Kristu kenitew pinaag̵i te kebpatey zin diyà te krus.

Duen id-insè ku keniyu. Hengkey is paag̵i te kegkezewata niw te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin? Nezawat niw ve is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin tenged te kedtumana niw te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Wazà, su netuenan niw he imbeg̵ey keniyu te Megbevayà is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is tudtul mehitenged te nehimu ni Jesus.

Menge tulebung kew ves! Dutun te aney niw en kedsundan ki Jesus, midserig̵an niw is kedtavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iyan, guntaan, kunaan niw vuwa ke egkepurungan is kedsundan niw pinaag̵i te keniyu za he ketau!
Wazè bes pulus te menge meupiya he tuvad keniyu tenged te kebpeketuu niw! Kenà egkehimu he wazà pulus.

Is Megbevayà, hein imbeg̵ey zin keniyu is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne impeehè din diyan te keniyu is menge egkein-inuwan, wazè din iyan iveeli zutun is tenged te edtumanen niw is kesug̵uan, kekenà, tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Iring din ded daan is nehitavù ki Abraham he kepuun tew zengan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Midtuu sikandin te migkag̵i te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi, is Megbevayà, midawat din si Abraham ne mid-isip din sikandin he metazeng.”
Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he sevuta niw he iyan ded heini g̵untaan kayi te kenitew su ke zuen etew he edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne nehimu en sikandin he kevuwazan ni Abraham,

Daan he migkag̵i is Megbevayà diyà te insurat he lalag din he minsan is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ne ed-isipen din sikandan he metazeng emun edtuuwan dan sikandin. Impesavut din he zaan ki Abraham is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ke sikandin te, “Tenged te midtuu ka te migkag̵i ku, midtuvazan ku sikew. Ne pinaag̵i zaan kayi te kedtuu nu edtuvazan ku is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan.”

Ne midtuu si Abraham dutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà; ne iring din ded daan ke edtuu is minsan hentei te Lalag te Megbevayà, edtuvazan daan sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, is minsan hentei mulà he edsarig te kedtumana te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, nesug̵at en te rawak te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megvevayà he edhenduen te, “Is minsan hentei he kenà din egkepurung egketuman is minsan hengkey he sug̵ù he insurat dutun te kesug̵uan, ne nesug̵at en sikandin te rawak te Megbevayà.”

Ne emun iyan haazà, ne egkesavut ta he wazà minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtumana te kesug̵uan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtuu zin te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan sikandin ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan,” ke sikandin.

Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he sug̵ù dutun te kesug̵uan, kenè en kinahanglan he edtuu pa sikandin wey meveg̵ayi te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he sug̵ù dutun te kesug̵uan, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.”

Minsan pa te nesupak te en is kesug̵uan, nelibri ki ni Jesus te silut su midrewakan en si Jesus he elili kenitew zutun te kedrensanga kandin te krus, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Ke zuen etew he edhimetayan ne idtaud te impasek he kayu ne tuus heini te rawak kandin te Megbevayà.”

Ne umba mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu te iring dutun su wey pinaag̵i kandin ikeveg̵ey zaan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu is ketazeng he intuvad te Megbevayà ki Abraham. Ne pinaag̵i zutun sikitew is langun he edtuu ki Jesus, ebeg̵ayan kiw zin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he impenaad dengan te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, duen penenglitan he ibpesavut ku keniyu. Su ke zuen ibpenaad te sevaha he etew he insurat diyà te dukumintu he mibpirmahan din ne mibpirmahan daan te menge tistig̵us, ne kenà egkehimu he edhelinan wey ed-umanan haazà te minsan hentei su nelig-enan.

Ne iring din ded daan su zuen impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham wey ziyà te kevuwazan ni Abraham he egkeug̵et pa zutun id-anak. Wazè din iyan keg̵iya he zuen penaad din diyà te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham su kenà mezakel is egkeg̵iyen din, kekenà, ke sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, “diyà te kevuwazan nu.” Umba migkag̵i zin heini su sebsevaha zà he etew zutun te kevuwazan ni Abraham is ibpesavut din he iyan si Kristu.

Iyan ibpesavut ku kayi is: duen untung he wazè pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din su midlig-enan din. Daan en heini is penaad te wazè pa is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su neug̵et pa zutun si Moises su menge heepat pa he g̵atus wey ketluan he tuig. Ne kenà egkehimu he egkeawà is penaad te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Kenà egkehimu he kenè edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din.

Si Abraham, imbeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged dà te impenaad heini kandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, emun egkehimu he ibeg̵ey kenita is untung pinaag̵i te kedtumana ta te kesug̵uan, kenà daan egkehimu he ibeg̵ey heini kenita tenged dà te impenaad heini te Megbevayà.

Ne emun iyan heini, ne hengkey is pulus te kesug̵uan? Ibpesavut ku keniyu is pulus din. In-uman te Megbevayà is kesug̵uan su wey zin ipesavut kenita ke hengkey is mezaat he ulaula ta; ne egkesuatan din he zutun dà taman is kedserig̵i te kesug̵uan te kebpekeuma te kevuwazan ni Abraham he iyan si Kristu he iyan mibpenaazan te Megbevayà. Midsug̵ù te Megbevayà is menge velinsug̵uen din he ebpuun diyà te langit wey zan ikeveg̵ey is kesug̵uan diyà te ki Moises. Ne si Moises, nehimu sikandin he zatù te pid-elangan su imbeg̵ey zin daan is kesug̵uan diyà te menge etew.
Iyan, dutun te kebpenaazi te Megbevayà ki Abraham wazà kinahanglan he zuen datù te pid-elangan su sebsevaha zà dutun is nekepenaad he iyan is Megbevayà.

Ne kunaan niw vuwa ke kenà egkeuyun is kesug̵uan wey is menge penaad dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà heini egkeuyun. Su ke zuen kesug̵uan he pinaag̵i kayi egkeveg̵ayan kiw te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne siguradu egkehimu kiw he metazeng pinaag̵i zaan kayi te kesug̵uan.

Iyan, impesavut kenitew te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he sikitew is tivuuk he menusiyà, sakup kiw en pudu te mezaat he kebayè tew. Ne tenged kayi, wey zà edtumana te Megbevayà is menge penaad din kenita ke edsarig kiw kandin. Wey kiw zà egkeveg̵ayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan ke zuen tew kedtuu.

Ne te wazè pa ipezayag kenitew he egkekuwa tew is untung pinaag̵i te kedtuu ki Jesus, iring te nepirisu kiw te kesug̵uan. Nehimu is kesug̵uan he iring te guwardya he ebantey kenitew wey kiw kenà mekeawà taman te kenè pa ibpezayag kenitew is paag̵i he iyan is kedtuuwi ki Jesu Kristu.

Nehimu zaan is kesug̵uan he iring te ed-uyamu he iyan ebayàbayà kenitew te iring te menge vatà taman dà te kebpekeuma ni Kristu su wey, ke ebpekeuma si Kristu, meisip kiw te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaag̵i te kedtuu tew kandin.
Ne g̵untaan, te impezayag en kenitew is paag̵i he iyan is kedtuu, kenè kiw en egkeveyveyaan te kesug̵uan.
Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà, nehimu kew en pudu he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged dà te kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Su midtuuwan niw si Jesu Kristu, ne nebewtismuwan kew he tuus te sumusundan kew zin, ne tenged dutun insun-ud niw si Kristu,

Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè niw isipa he ibpelavi te Megbevayà is menge Hudiyu, ne emun kenà, ne iyan is kenà menge Hudiyu, su ziyà te kandin neked-iiring is langun he menge etew, uripen se kenà uripen, maama se vahi, ne sikiyu zaan, neked-iiring kew ziyà te Megbevayà su neked-iiring kew he edtuu ki Jesu Kristu.
Ne g̵eina te sakup kew ni Kristu, nehimu kew en he iring te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham ne egkezawat niw zaan is impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham.

Penenglitan duen anak he minatey is amey zin te vatè pa utew sikandin. Ne minsan pa te sumusunud sikandin te langun he azen te amey zin he minatey, ne zutun te vatè pa sikandin, iring sikandin te sulug̵uen dà su zuen pa ebayàbayà kandin.
