Duen ed-uyamu kandin he ebantey zaan dutun te menge azen din taman te kenè pa egketuman is timpu he midtelaan te amey zin, ne human sikandin ebpekezawat te keg̵ehem te kebayàbayà te menge azen din.
Ne iring kiw zaan dutun su neveyveyaan kiw zengan te menge kenè pa hustu he tuluuwen dini te kelibutan su iring kiw pa te menge vatà is ebantey te langun dutun.

Ne hein netuman en is hustu he timpu he netagnà dengan, is Megbevayà, midsug̵ù din dini te kelibutan is Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, nehimu he etew pinaag̵i te ked-enaka kandin te vahi. Ne pinaag̵i kayi nehimu zaan sikandin he nezizalem te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises,
su wey kiw zin melibri is langun he zizalem te kesug̵uan ne wey kiw zaan mehimu he menge anak te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun wey ta metueni he anak ki iyan te Megbevayà, midsug̵ù te Megbevayà he ibpeubpà dini te kenita is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ziyà te ki Jesus, ne ibpinted din kenita he mekekag̵i ki te, “Amey ku he Megbevayà.”
Ne g̵untaan kenè ki en iring te menge sulug̵uen dà, kekenà, anak ki en te Megbevayà. Ne g̵eina te iyan heini, egkezawat ta is minsan hengkey he ibeg̵ey zin diyà te anak din.
Dengan te wazè niw pa tuuwi is tutuu he Megbevayà, neuripen kew te menge edtuuwan he kenà hustu he megbevayà.

Iyan, guntaan te nekilala niw en is Megbevayà iring te kegkekilelaa zin keniyu, maan is edlikuan niw is wazà pulus he menge tuluuwen he kenà ebpekelibri keniyu te silut? Maan is egkesuatan niw he meuripen kew en maan kayi?
Maan is ebenteyanan niw is menge andew, menge vulan, wey menge tuig he ibpetuman te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises?
Utew ku sikiyu igkeipeng su kela ke kenà ebpulus is langun he impenurù ku keniyu.

Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ul-ulaha niw is mid-ulaula ku su siak is Hudiyu, mid-engkezan ku en is kedserig̵i te kesug̵uan te menge Hudiyu. Nehimu a he iring keniyu zengan te kenà menge Hudiyu. Tutuu iyan he wazà a keniyu meselai, kekenà, mibpurungan a keniyu.
Netuenan niw he umba nehimu is aney ku en kebpenudtuli keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su nezeruwan a.

Ne minsan te zuen ku mezaat he zaru ne wazà a keniyu ikeremerik minsan ke heini is daru ku ne nekesamuk keniyu, iyan, midawat a keniyu iring te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit. Impeiring niw is kedewata niw kedì te kedewata niw ki Jesu Kristu.

Utew a zengan keniyu ingkeg̵alew, su ke egkehimu zà ne egkeluten niw is mata niw ne ibeg̵ey niw kedì. Iyan e en mismu ebpekekag̵i kayi mehitenged keniyu. Ne g̵untaan, maan is nahalin en is gehinawa niw?
Maan is egkepeukan a keniyu g̵untaan? Kela ke nehimu kew en he kuntada ku tenged dà te migkag̵i ku keniyu ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen.

Haazà is menge etew he kenà tutuu is ibpenurù dan keniyu, ebpurungan kew zan, iyan, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan diyan te keniyu. Egkesuatan dan he maawà is upakat niw kediey su wey iyan niw zà sikandan mepurungi.
Utew meupiya ke ebpekid-emig̵u zan keniyu emun kenà mezaat is tuyù dan. Egkesuatan ku he kenà iyan e zà ebpekid-emig̵u keniyu. Emun kenà a ziyan, meupiya ke zuen pa ebpekid-emig̵u keniyu.

Henduen be te menge anak ku en sikiyu su minahal ku sikiyu. Iring te edlised is bahi ke ed-anak, egkereg̵enan a zaan te ked-isipa ku keniyu su egkesuatan ku he meg̵aan niw itug̵ut he iyan ebayàbayà keniyu si Kristu.
Angin ke ziyan a te keniyu su wey ku sikiyu melelag̵i; kenè ku egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he idsurat ku he ibpeuwit ku ziyan su egkeipeng a keniyu.
Sikiyu is egkesuat he ebpezizalem te kedtuman te kesug̵uan, ibpesavut ku keniyu ke hengkey is kehulug̵an kayi.

Su migug̵ud dutun te kesug̵uan he zuen dezuwa he anak he maama ni Abraham. In-anak haazà is sevaha ni Hagar, kes esawa zin he uripen, ne in-anak haazà is sevaha te esawa zin he kenà uripen he iyan si Sara.

Is ked-enaka te anak te vahi he uripen, ne iring ded te ked-enaka te minsan hengkey he vatà, iyan, kes ked-enaka zutun te sevaha he in-anak te vahi he kenà uripen, ne kenà egkehimu emun wazà ipenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.

Ne sempità heini is dezuwa he vahi. Iyan kehulug̵an din is dezuwa he paag̵i he midtukud te Megbevayà te kebpekidsevaha zin te menusiyà. Si Hagar is bahi he uripen, ne iyan alung te paag̵i he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà ki Moises diyà te vuntud he Siney. Iyan heini kes kesug̵uan. Su is menge anak ni Hagar,
Diyà haazà is buntud he Siney te tanà he egngezanan te Erabya. Ne alung heini is buntud he Siney ki Hagar. Ne iyan kehulug̵an ni Hagar is inged he Hiruselim su neuripen is langun he meg̵inged dutun
Ne si Sara, haazà is esawa ni Abraham he kenà uripen, ne iyan kiw alung te kandin he menge anak su kenè kiw menge uripen te kesug̵uan.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Sikew is bahi he kenà ed-anak,
lipey ka. Minsan ke wazè ka belilita,
derag-ey ka te kegkelipey
su minsan ke mid-ewaan ka te esawa nu,
ed-ulian ke zin ne mezakel is menge kevuwazan nu
kenà te vahi he zuen din esawa.”

Na, menge suled, iring din ded daan, nehimu kiw en he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged te netuman din is penaad din. Iring heini zuen te ked-enaka ki Isaak ni Sara tenged te netuman is pesarig te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.

Ne zutun he timpu zengan, haazà is anak ni Abraham he in-anak pinaag̵i zà te kelibutanen he paag̵i te kegkevuwad, midhimu zin he mereg̵eni is hazi zin he in-anak pinaag̵i te tavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne iring din guntaan edregreg̵enen kiw te menge etew he neuripen te kedtumana te kesug̵uan.

Ne hengkey is sambag te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà? Duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, “Ipaawè nu is bahi he uripen wey is anak din su is anak te uripen, kenà egkehimu he ebeg̵ayan sikandin te menge azen te amey zin. Iyan dà ebpekeangken kayi is anak te vahi he kenà uripen.”
Umba, menge suled, sikitew, iring kiw te anak te vahi he kenà uripen, kenè kiw iring te anak te uripen.
Pinaag̵i te kebelukasi kenitew ni Kristu, nelibri kiw en te kedtumana te kesug̵uan. Umba, kinahanglan he edsukul kiw is mibelukasan su wey kenè kiw en maan meuripen.
Utew tutuu heini is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he ke iyan niw edserig̵an is kedsirkunsidara keniyu wey kew meluwas, ne kenè kew egketevangan ni Kristu.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su tutuu iyan he ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke ebpulus kandin is kebpesirkunsidar, kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan din te edtuman is minsan hengkey he sug̵ù dutun te tivuuk he kesug̵uan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu he kunaan din ke pinaag̵i te kedtumana te kesug̵uan is kebpeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà, nekesuwey en sikandin ki Kristu. Neewaan din en is gag̵ew te Megbevayà kandin.
Iyan, sikami mulà, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin wey tenged te kedtuu zey kandin, iyan ebpeebuten dey is kedhimuwa kenami he metazeng te Megbevayà.

Su emun tumutuu ki en ki Jesu Kristu, neked-iiring kiw en diyà te Megbevayà is nengesirkunsidar wey is wazà mesirkunsidar. Iyan dà duen din pulus diyà te Megbevayà is kedtuu ta kandin he egketuusan heini pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew ta te zuma ta.
Mibpurungan niw zengan te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà. Maan is idtug̵ut niw he zuen ed-eg̵en keniyu wey niw kenè en metuuwi is tutuu he tuluuwen?
Kenà heini vaal te Megbevayà is kebpekesuwey niw su iyan mid-umbita keniyu wey kew meketuu.
Haazà is tarù he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu, ne iring te tapey emun ebaal ki te supas su minsan deisek dà is id-amut dutun te zekelà he midhames he erina, egketepayan gihapun is tivuuk he supas.

Ne minsan pa zutun, dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen he pinaag̵i te kedtavang din keniyu, ebpemineg̵en niw zed is hustu he impenurù ku keniyu. Iyan, haazà is etew he nekesamuk te isip niw pinaag̵i te penurù din he tarù, siguradu he edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, duen egkag̵i he wazè ku pa engkezi is penurù he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar ki, iyan, emun tutuu heini, maan is kenà a ed-engkezan te ebpesipala te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu? Su emun ibpenurù ku he kinahanglan is kebpesirkunsidar, ne kenè dan egkepauk kediey minsan ke elin ku pa ibpenurù is kebpehimatey ni Jesus he elili kenitew.
Ne sikan is menge etew he edsamuk keniyu pinaag̵i te tarù he penurù dan, egkesuatan ku pezem he kenà iyan dà is kebpesirkunsidar edtumanen dan, kekenà, elin daan ul-ulaha zan is kebpekapun!

Na, menge suled, tutuu iyan he impetuu ki te Megbevayà wey ki zin melibri ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebpeuripen ki te kesug̵uan. Ne minsan pa zutun wazè ki melibri su wey iyan mebayàbayà kenita is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta. Kinahanglan he tenged te zekelà is gag̵ew tew te menge zuma tew ne medtitinevangà is kada sevaha kenitew te menge tumutuu.

Is tivuuk he kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne egkepurung egketuman pinaag̵i te sevaha zà he sug̵ù he iyan heini: “Kinahanglan he purungi nu is duma nu. Isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he g̵ehinawa.”
Iyan, emun iyan niw zà ed-ul-ulahan is kebpepespesipelehey wey kebpeeg-eg̵età, ne egkepurung egkezeeti is upakat niw te menge tumutuu ki Kristu.
Iyan heini sug̵ù ku keniyu: pevayàbayè kew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, kenà egkehimu he egketuman niw is mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.
Kenà egkeuyun is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta wey is egkesuatan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su telekuntada heini is dezuwa, ne tenged dutun kenè ta layun egkeveelan is meupiya he egkesuatan ta.
Iyan, ke ebpesakup ki te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, kenè ki egkesakup te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
Egketuusan ta is menge mezaat he ulaula he egkehimu pinaag̵i te mezaat he kebayà te lawa su iyan is kedhilavet te kenè ta esawa, is meremerik wey mahawag he vaal,

is ked-ezapa te kenà hustu he ed-ezapen, wey is kegemita te g̵ehem he ibeg̵ey ni Setanas. Ebpekigkuntada is menge etew; ebpekidtebek dan; egkesina zan; egkengepauk dan; iyan dà ed-isipen dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Ne ed-engkezan dan is kebpekidsevaha zan te menge zuma zan.

Egkeimahan dan is menge azen te menge zuma zan. Egkengelangut dan, ne kenè dan ed-eg̵enen is menge kebayè dan he mezaat, kekenà, edtumanen dan, wey mezakel pa is ed-ul-ulahan dan he iring kayi. Ed-umanan ku te egkag̵i is migkag̵i ku he zaan he is etew he ed-ul-ulahan din is menge iring kayi, kenà sikandin ebpekeragkes te egkehedian te Megbevayà keuzemà.

Egketuusan ta zaan is menge ulaula he egkehimu pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Su emun ed-uwiten ki te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ta is menge zuma ta, layun ki egkelipey, melinawen layun is gehinawa ta, mepelevayen ki, belig̵eg̵awen ki, metulanged ki, metinumanen ki,
kenè ki mevurut, wey egkeeg̵en ta is kebayà te lawa ta. Ne emun iyan heini menge ulaula ta, kenè ta egkesupak is menge sug̵ù kenita te Megbevayà.

Ne is minsan hentei he migaked en ni Jesu Kristu, ne iring te inransang din en te krus is mekesesalà he lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, mid-engkezan din en is menge mezaat he kebayè din wey egkesuatan din.
Ne is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, geina te mibeg̵ayan ki zin te veg̵u en he untung, kinahanglan he ebpevayàbayè ki zaan kandin.
Kinahanglan he kenè ki ebpelavew, kenè ki zaan ebpekidtebek te menge zuma he etew, kenè ki zaan egkesina te zuma ta.

Menge suled, ke zuen duma niw he tumutuu he netuenan niw he nesupak din is Megbevayà, sikiyu is mid-ulinan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, tevangi niw sikandin su wey zin kenà meengkezi is kedtumana zin te egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Asal, kinahanglan he utew kew mepelevayen is edtavang kandin. Mebpekevantey kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan ni Setanas.
Layun kew mebpetebtevangà te uman sevaha keniyu su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini egketuman niw is insug̵ù kenitew ni Kristu.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke wazà kurang te menge ulaula zin su pudu meupiya, nelimbungan din is gehinawa zin.
Deyzey ke ebpurungan edsusiya te uman sevaha is menge ulaula zin. Ne emun meupiya, egkehimu he ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa zin. Iyan, kenè din isukud is menge ulaula te zuma zin te kandin he ulaula.
Su kinahanglan he bevaa te kada sevaha is kandin he keugelingen he bevaan.
Ne sikan is etew he ebpepenurù te Lalag te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he veg̵ayi zin is ebpenurù kandin te menge meupiya he nezawat din.

Kenè kew pelimbung te ulaula niw su kenè ta egkeelesan is Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he ulaula. Is ibpemula te etew, iyan daan egkerag̵un din. Ne iring din ded daan is menge ulaula te etew, su ed-ahaan heini te Megbevayà ne edsuhulan din is etew keuzemà sumalà is neulaula te uman sevaha.

Emun edtumanen te etew is kandin he egkesuatan, iyan egkezawat din is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Emun edtumanen din is egkengesuatan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ibeg̵ey kandin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Umba kenè ki ebpepepeg̵ul te ked-ulaula te meupiya su emun ebpeniguduwan ta heini, egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he zuen idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà he utew meupiya.
Ebpurungan ta layun is minsan hentei he etew, lavew en is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ki Kristu.
Kayi te ketepusan te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan, siak si Pablo is midsurat. Egketuusan niw su egkeehè niw he utew zezekelà is kedsurat ku.

Ne sikan is menge etew he egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew, egkesuatan dan he zelig̵a zan te menge zuma zan. Egkehandek dan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu su kenè dan egkesuat he pesipelahi sikandan tenged te kedsarig dan te kebpehimatey ni Kristu.

Haazà is menge etew, ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he mebpesirkunsidar kew sumalà is penurù te kesug̵uan, ne minsan pa zutun kenè dan ebpurungan edtumana is kesug̵uan. Umba egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew su wey mezalig sikandan tenged te nehimu kew he menge kabig dan.

Siak mulà, iyan ku zà ibpezalig is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he mibpehimatey he elili kenitew. Ne tenged te kebpehimatey zin, wazè e en meuripen te menge kelibutanen he kebayà, ne wazè en kayi g̵ehem te kebayàbayà kediey.
Kenà ebpulus is kebpesirkunsidar ne kenà daan ebpulus is kenà kebpesirkunsidar. Iyan dekelà is pulus din is kegkehimu kenita he veg̵u en he linimbag.

Is minsan hentei he ed-ikul kayi te ibayà he impenurù ku pinaag̵i kayi te surat, berakat he mehizuwi te Megbevayà wey veg̵ayi te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, ne kenà iyan dà sikandin, kekenà, elin daan is langun he menge tutuu he tumutuu te Megbevayà.

Puun dà guntaan, kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he megkag̵i he wazà iveg̵ey kediey ni Jesus is keg̵ehem te kebpenurù. Egketuusan kayi te lawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge sug̵ù ni Jesus. Mezakel is menge tulak te menge palì ku he nehimu te menge kuntada ni Jesus.
Menge suled, berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.
Iyan a si Pablo is teg̵isurat kayi. Nehimu a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu,
Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew zan wey tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, intuvad din kenitew ziyà te langit is minsan hengkey he meupiya pinaag̵i te ked-ulini kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is kelibutan, mibpilì kiw en te Megbevayà. Iyan impilia zin kenitew su wey kiw mehimu he menge sakup din he wazà igkesewayi zuen.
Ne tenged te utew zekelà is gag̵ew zin kenitew, dengan te wazè pa is kelibutan, mid-isip din he pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu edhimuwen kiw zin he menge anak din su iyan egkesuatan din wey tuyù din.
Edelig̵en tew is Megbevayà tenged te utew zekelà he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he g̵ag̵ew zin he intuvad din kenitew pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew te mahal he Anak din he si Jesus.
Su tenged te utew zekelà is gag̵ew zin kenitew, midlibri kiw zin te silut pinaag̵i te kedtig̵is te lengesa zutun te kebpehimatey ni Kristu, ne mibpesaylu zin is menge salè tew.
Kenà pinaag̵i te sukud is kegkeg̵eg̵awi zin kenitew, kekenà, utew subra is gag̵ew zin kenita. Ne imbeg̵ey zin daan kenita is kedsavut wey ketau su wey tew metueni ke hengkey is paag̵i zin.
Ne impesavut din kenitew is daan he in-eles he edhimuwen din su iyan tuyù wey egkesuatan din. Ne mid-isip din he zaan he pinaag̵i ki Kristu
edhimuwen din heini zutun te hustu he timpu. Su mid-isip te Megbevayà he zutun edhimuwen din he sebsevaha zà si Kristu he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey he linimbag diyà te langit wey zini te tanà.

Is langun he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kedtumana te tuyù din wey egkesuatan din. Ne tenged te iyan tuyù din, mibpilì key zin is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu wey key mehimu he menge sakup din he ebpekidsevaha ki Kristu. Iyan heini tuyù din he zaan he mid-isip din. Ne sikami is menge Hudiyu he nengehuna he nemeketuu ki Kristu, umba mibpilì key zin su iyan egkesuatan din he pinaag̵i kenami edelig̵en sikandin he utew mekeg̵eg̵ehem.

Ne iring din ded daan diyan te keniyu su hein impesavut keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan kes Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kedlibriya kenitew te silut, nemeketuu kew ki Kristu, ne midhimu kew zaan te Megbevayà he menge sakup din pinaag̵i te kebeg̵aya zin keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he zaan he impenaad din.

Is ked-ulini kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne iyan tuus kenitew he keuzemà ibeg̵ey zin kenitew te menge sakup din is langun he impenaad din kenitew. Ne pinaagi kayi egketuenan tew he keuzemà edhimesazen din is kedlibriya kenitew te kebpekesalè tew. Edelig̵en tew sikandin is mekeg̵eg̵ehem!
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, geina te netudtulan a he mezesen is kedtuu niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey zekelà is gag̵ew niw te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin,
kenà egkeamin is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Layun ku sikiyu id-ampù.

Is Megbevayà te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan daan Amey tew he zait he ebentug̵en, edhengyuan ku layun sikandin he pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne iveg̵ey zin keniyu is ketau wey ipeg̵awag̵awa zin keniyu is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula zin.

Id-ampù ku he iveg̵ey zin daan keniyu is kebpurung kedsavut su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is langun he meupiya he egkeperateng tew keuzemà tenged te midhimu kiw en he menge tumutuu zin, ne wey niw zaan metueni he utew mezakel zutun is menge meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew.

Ne id-ampù ku zaan he ipesavut din keniyu ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he utew lavew he zekelà he g̵ehem te Megbevayà he zini edterebahu te kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin. Ne iyan heini sikan is utew zekelà he g̵ehem
he migamit te Megbevayà dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu wey is kebpepinuuwa zin kandin diyà te egkekewanan din diyà te langit.

Ne zutun utew lavew si Kristu kenà is minsan hentei he hadì, wey egalen, wey minsan hentei he zuen din keg̵ehem wey kebayàbayà. Lavew pa is inggerar ki Kristu te minsan hengkey he g̵erar te minsan hentei g̵untaan wey te wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne is Megbevayà, midhimu zin he sakup ni Kristu is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Umba midhimu zin si Kristu he egalen te minsan hengkey su wey kiw metevangi is langun he menge tumutuu.

Sikitew is edsarig ki Kristu, ne iring kiw te lawa zin ne iyan sikandin ulu tew. Ne sikitew is lawa zin, ne wazà kurang te ked-ulini zin kenitew su ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbag̵an.
Dengan, henduen kew te minatey su wazè niw pa untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged te kenè kew pa zutun ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà wey tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula niw.

Dutun he timpu mid-ikul niw is mezaat he ibayà he iyan ed-ikulen te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà. Midtuman kew te menge sug̵ù ni Setanas. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge zuen din gehem diyà te hewhewanan. Iyan daan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he kenà ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà.

Ne sikitew zaan, elin kiw zengan ebpen-ulaula te mezaat sumalà is mezaat he kebayà te lawa tew, wey is mezaat he isip tew. Ne tenged kayi neragkes kiw pa zutun te silut iring te zuma he menusiyà he kenà sakup te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan pa te iyan en haazà, utew zekelà is hizu te Megbevayà kenitew ne utew kiw mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin.

Ne minsan pa te iring kiw te minatey tenged te kenè tew kebpemineg te menge sug̵ù din, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, inragkes kiw zin daan su wey tew maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Midlibri kiw zin te silut tenged dà te g̵ag̵ew zin kenitew.
Ne is Megbevayà, tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, mibanhew kiw zin daan wey kiw mekehadì duma ki Kristu ziyà te langit.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey ikepeehè din kenitew is utew lavew he kezekelà te g̵ag̵ew zin wey kedtavang din kenitew pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu te wazè din pidtemanan.
Su tenged dà te g̵ag̵ew zin kenita, midlibri ki zin te silut dutun te kebpeketuu ta. Wazè ki melibri pinaag̵i te kenita he vaal,

kekenà, imbeg̵ey zà kenita is untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne tenged dutun, wazà etew he igkezantal zin is kedlibriya kandin te silut su kenà iyan is kandin he ked-ul-ulaha te meupiya ingkelibri zin.
Su is kedlimbag̵a kenita he veg̵u, ne iyan baal te Megbevayà. Pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesus midlimbag ki zin su wey ta meulaula is meupiya he midteg̵ana zin en he zaan wey ta meveeli.

Sikiyu is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, isipa niw is daan he kebpekesavuk niw. Is menge Hudiyu, ne ebpesirkunsidar sikandan, ne egngezanan kew zan te menge etew he kenà ebpesirkunsidar, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kenè niw ebpetuusan is lawa niw sumalà is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.

Netuenan niw he zengan wazè niw upakat ki Kristu ne wazè kew iragkes te menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà. Wazè kew zaan mekeambit duen te menge meupiya he impenaad te Megbevayà kandan. Wazà egkepaabut niw he tavang te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman su wazè niw metueni ke hentei is tutuu he Megbevayà dini te kelibutan.

Iyan, guntaan, tenged te nekidsevaha kew en ki Jesus, sikiyu is menge etew he utew meziyù te Megbevayà dengan, impeuvey kew zin en tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus dutun te kebpehimatey zin.

Sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, midhimu ni Kristu he melinawen en is kedepitè tew su midhimu kiw zin en he teltelezuma. Pinaag̵i te kebpehimatey zin duen te krus in-awè din is kegkekuntada tew he iring te elavat he nekepetug-elang kenitew.

Pinaag̵i te kebpehimatey zin, in-awè din is kebpetumana tew te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises ragkes is menge tulumanen su wey sikitew is dezuwa he kelasi te etew, mehimu zin he veg̵u en he kelasi te etew pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, ne tenged kayi naawè en is kegkekuntada tew.

Pinaag̵i te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus in-awè din is kebpekunkuntedehè tew te Hudiyu wey te kenà Hudiyu, ne midhimu kiw zin he sevaha he kelasi te etew su wey tew melikui is ked-ezapa te tutuu he Megbevayà.

Midhendini si Kristu te kelibutan ne impesavut din kenitew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew. Sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu wey sikami is menge Hudiyu, impesavut din kenitew is kelinew te kedepitè tew ziyà te Megbevayà.
Tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, ebpekeuvey kiw en ziyà te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne sikiyu is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu, minsan pa te zengan wazè kew isipa he menge sakup te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan nehimu kew en he zuma te menge pinilì din he etew. Nehimu kew en he menge anak te Megbevayà iring te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin.

Ne sikitew is menge tumutuu, iring kiw te valey he ibpehitindeg te Megbevayà diyà te vatu. Iyan si Kristu kes batu he edtukuzan kayi te valey. Is menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, ne iyan menge tukud. Ne iyan kew menge zuma he himan kayi te valey.
Ne pinaag̵i ki Kristu nevig̵eran is kebeeli kayi te valey ne egkehimu heini he valey te Nengazen he zutun sikandin ed-ezapa.
Ne sikiyu zaan is kenà menge Hudiyu, ragkes kew kayi, ne nehimu kew en daan he menge himan kayi te valey he zutun ed-ubpà is Megbevayà pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak si Pablo, is pirisu tenged te kedsundan ku ki Jesu Kristu, layun ku sikiyu id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà. Umba nepirisu a su insangyew ku is Lalag te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu.
Is Megbevayà, tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin keniyu, duen insarig din kediey he terebahu he iyan igkezeyzey niw. Netuenan ku he nezineg niw heini.
In-eles dengan heini, iyan, impesavut din kediey. Mehitenged kayi, duen ingkepesavut ku en keniyu pinaag̵i te surat.
Ne emun ebesahan niw heini, egketuenan niw is nesavut ku mehitenged te in-eles dengan mehitenged ki Kristu.
Dengan wazà heini ipezayag diyà te minsan hentei he menusiyà, iyan, guntaan, pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, impezayag en te Megbevayà diyà te menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven din.

Ibpesavut ku keniyu heini is in-eles dengan he sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, pinaag̵i te kedtuuwi niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, edtuvazan kew zaan te Megbevayà te langun he meupiya he idtuvad din te menge Hudiyu. Ne idragkes kew zaan dutun te lawa ni Kristu. Ne egkezawat niw is menge penaad te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Nehimu a he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Tenged dà te g̵ag̵ew zin kediey wey pinaag̵i te g̵ehem din imbeg̵ey zin kediey heini is ketengdanan.

Siak, lavew kediey is minsan hentei he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà. Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, midtuvazan a te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedsug̵ua zin kediey te kebpenudtul ziyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew lavew he zekelà he kenà egketegkad he meupiya he igketuvad kenitew ni Kristu.

Ne elin daan insug̵ua zin kediey su wey ku ikepesavut diyà te minsan hentei he etew ke hengkey is kedtumana zin te zaan he mid-isip din he ebeelan. Ne wazà dengan heini ipezayag su in-eles te Megbevayà he nenlimbag te minsan hengkey.

Umba wazà heini zengan ipezayag su wey g̵untaan pinaag̵i zà te menge tumutuu ki Jesus, ibpaahà te Megbevayà diyà te menge kedesenan wey menge egalen diyà te langit ke hengkey kezekelà is ketau zin he wazè med-iring-iring.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su edtumanen din is mid-isip din dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey. Ne nehimu zin en heini g̵untaan pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne g̵untaan tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesus wey pinaag̵i te kedsarig tew kandin, egkehimu en he ebpekeetuvang kiw te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te ked-ampù ne wazè en igkeeled tew kandin.
Ne tenged kayi te langun, kinahanglan, menge suled, he kenà igkeawà te kedsarig niw heini is kemereg̵enan he egkeantus ku tenged keniyu, kekenà, lipey kew su iyan ibmeupiya niw.
Ne tenged kayi te langun he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà, edluhuzan ku te ed-ampù is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Is langun he menge tumutuu he zini pa te lumpad wey ke ziyè en be te langit, ne migngezanan din sikandan he pemilya zin.
Ne edhengyuan ku sikandin he puun te utew zekelà he g̵ehem din, beg̵ayi kew zin te utew melig-en he kedtuu pinaag̵i te ked-ulini keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin,
su wey, pinaag̵i te kedtuu niw, melumuni is gehinawa niw ni Jesu Kristu. Ne idhangyù ku zaan he heg̵eti zin wey lig-eni zin is kebmahala niw te minsan hentei. Umba idhangyù ku heini su wey sikiyu,
wey is minsan hentei kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà, iveg̵ey kenitew is kedsavut ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he kebmahala kenitew ni Kristu ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin.

Berakat he mesavut niw is gag̵ew zin keniyu, minsan pa te kenà heini egkepurung egkesavut te minsan hentei. Egkesuatan ku heini su wey metuman diyan te keniyu is wazè din kurang he kegkeulini keniyu te Megbevayà.

Edelig̵en tew is Megbevayà su, pinaag̵i te zekelà he g̵ehem din he impelumun din dini te kenitew, utew zekelà is egkehimu zin su lavew pa is egkehimu zin, kenà te minsan hengkey he egkeisip ta he ebuyuen.
Berakat he zelig̵a sikandin pinaag̵i kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu zin wey pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu g̵untaan he timpu wey te wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak is pirisu tenged te midtuman ku is menge sugù te Nengazen, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he g̵eina te midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu zin, ul-ulaha niw is ulaula he zait he ed-ul-ulahan te tumutuu.
Kinahanglan he kenè kew pegalbu, kekenà, peketulanged kew wey mebmeinentusen kew. Ipeehè niw is gag̵ew niw ziyà te kada sevaha keniyu pinaag̵i te kebmepelevayen niw.
Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kenà maawà is kegkeupakat niw he imbeg̵ey keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su pinaag̵i kayi te upakat egkesevaha is gehinawa niw.

Su sikitew is langun he menge tumutuu, sevaha kiw zà he lawa, ne sevaha zà is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ed-ulin kenitew, ne sevaha zà daan is ebperetengen tew he ketulusan tenged te midhimu kiw he menge tumutuu.
Sevaha zà is Nengazen tew he iyan si Jesus; iyan dà sikandin edtuuwan tew; sevaha zà daan is imbewtismuwi kenitew.

Sevaha zà daan is Megbevayà he Amey te minsan hentei. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne ziyà sikandin te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne edterebahu pinaag̵i te minsan hentei he tumutuu.
Sikitew is langun, mibeg̵ayan is kada sevaha kenitew te ketau sumalà is egkesuatan ni Kristu he ibeg̵ey kenitew.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Dutun te kebetuna kandin pehendiyà te langit mezakel is menge vihag din he mid-uwit din.
Ne zuen daan menge ketau he impemeg̵ey zin diyà te menge sakup din.”
Ne pinaag̵i kayi te migkag̵i he nevatun sikandin, ibpesavut kenitew te Lalag te Megbevayà he midlugtanà sikandin he zaan dini te lumpad te kelibutan.

Ne haazà is midhendini te tanà he iyan si Kristu, iyan daan sikandin nevatun pehendiyà te langit wey minsan diyà dapit te utew metikang he langit. Ne umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbag̵an.

Iyan menge ketau he imbeg̵ey zin kenitew is: is duma, midhimu zin he epustul; ne is duma, midhimu zin sikandan he peneuva te Megbevayà; ne is duma, ne imbeg̵ey zin kandan is ketau wey zan ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen; ne is duma pa, ne imbeg̵ey zin kandan is ketau wey zan meuwit wey mepenurù is menge tumutuu.
Umba imbeg̵ey zin heini is menge ketau su wey kiw mehimani ne wey tew meulaula is ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melig-eni is kedtuu tew te menge tumutuu he iyan lawa ni Kristu.

Pinaag̵i kayi egkehimu human he egkesevaha kiw te kedtuu tew wey kegketueni tew te menge ulaula te Anak te Megbevayà. Ne zutun egkepurung egkeheg̵et is kedtuu tew ki Jesus ne zutun wazà kurang te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà daan kurang te menge ulaula ni Kristu.

Dutun ne egkehimu he kenè kiw en ebpekeiring te vatà su is etew he iring dutun ne egkehalinhalin is kedtuu zin su melemu ebpeketuu te minsan hengkey he tuluuwen he ibpenurù kandin te menge teruen he etew he metau he edlimbung.

Ne sikitew mulà, kinahanglan he tutuu is ibpesavut tew ziyà te menge zuma tew tenged te mahal sikandan dini te g̵ehinawa tew. Ne pinaag̵i kayi ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te minsan hengkey he ulaula ni Kristu.

Su iring kiw te lawa, ne sikandin iyan ulu. Ne sikitew is lawa, ne ebpekesarig kiw kandin te ulu. Ne is minsan hengkey he parti kayi te lawa, ne ebpekesarig daan te menge zuma zin he parti. Ne emun hustu is baal zutun te kada sevaha he parti, edtulin haazà is tivuuk he lawa pinaag̵i te kebpekedtetevangà te minsan hendei he parti zin. Ne sikitew zaan, ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te ulaula ni Kristu pinaag̵i te kebpurungi te kada sevaha te zuma zin.
Tenged te sug̵ù a te Nengazen, ebpeketelteleenan ku sikiyu he engkezi niw en is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew he kenà edtuu te Nengazen wey wazà pulus te ed-isipen dan.
Wazè dan hanew te hustu he ibayà ne wazè dan untung he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà, geina te nengepaglung sikandan tenged te kezesen te g̵ehinawa zan.
Kenè dan en igkeeled is minsan hengkey he ulaula zan he mezaat. Ne kenè dan daan ed-eg̵enen is mahawag he kebayà te lawa zan, kekenà, utew zan en egkesuati is meremerik he ulaula.
Ne sikiyu mulà, dutun te kebpeketuu niw ki Kristu, kenà iyan heini sikan is impenurù keniyu.
Tutuu iyan he impesavut keniyu is keag̵i ni Kristu ne impesavut daan keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù din.
Tenged kayi engkezi niw is menge isip te zaan he kegkeetew niw su nesakup heini te zaan he menge mezaat he ulaula niw. Ebpekezezaat keniyu heini pinaag̵i te ebpemekelimbung he kebayè din.
Kinahanglan he egkepurung egkeveg̵u is isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw.

Kinahanglan he edhimuwen kew he veg̵u en he etew he iyan sikan is beg̵u en he linimbag pinaag̵i te zagwey te Megbevayà. Egketuusan heini is beg̵u he etew pinaag̵i te menge tutuu wey metazeng he ulaula he ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà.
Umba, menge suled, engkezi niw is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he tutuu is egkeg̵iyen niw ziyà te menge zuma niw. Su nesevaha kiw he pudu parti te lawa ni Kristu.
Emun duen igkepauk niw tigkera niw is gehinawa niw su kela ke ibpekesalè niw. Ne kinahanglan he te kenè pa edsanlep is andew iawè niw en is pauk te isip niw.
Kenè niw itug̵ut he pinaag̵i te pauk niw, ne mevintahai kew ni Setanas.
Is tekawen, engkezi zin is kebpenakew ne medterebahu su wey hustu he paag̵i is kegkuwaa zin te igkeuyag din ne wey metevangi zin is egkengeayuayu.

Kinahanglan he kenà ebpekezezaat is kebpemèbè niw, kekenà, iyan keg̵iya niw is menge lalag he ebpekeveg̵ey he tavang te kedtuu te menge zuma niw su wey zekelà is pulus diyà te ebpemineg sumalà is egkinehenglanen dan.

Ne kenè niw ul-ulaha is minsan hengkey he kenà egkesuatan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin su iyan sikandin tuus diyan te keniyu he g̵aked kew te Megbevayà, wey tuus daan he keuzemà egkeuma is andew he zutun edhimesaza te Megbevayà is langun he nepuunan din en he vaal te kedlibriya zin keniyu te kebpekesalà.

Engkezi niw is kebpekunkuntedehè niw. Kenè kew meepes wey mepauk te zuma niw. Kenè kew pekid-eg̵et; kenè kew ituk; kenè niw itug̵ut he ibmezaat te g̵ehinawa niw is minsan hengkey he ulaula te zuma niw,
kekenà, mebpepurpurungè kew te kada sevaha keniyu. Mebpehidhizuwè kew, mebpepespeseyluwè kew iring te mibpesaylu kew te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu.
Ne g̵eina te pinelanggè kew he menge anak te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he mekeiring kew kandin.

Kinahanglan he ipeehè niw layun he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is menge zuma niw iring te mahal kiw ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Kristu. Mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri. Nehimu heini he pemuhat he utew mehemut,

Ne g̵eina te menge sakup kew te Megbevayà kinahanglan he kenè niw ul-ulaha is keleleg̵ed wey is minsan hengkey he ulaula he meremerik. Kenè niw hileveti is kenè niw esawa. Minsan is ked-isipa wey kegkeg̵iya kayi ne kenè niw ul-ulaha.
Kenè niw g̵emita is menge meremerik, mahawag, wey wazè din pulus he menge lalag, kekenà, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà.

Su ibpesavut ku keniyu is utew tutuu. Is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke edhilavet te kenè din esawa, ne kenà sikandin egkehedian ni Kristu wey te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan is leg̵ezen he etew su is menge vutang he igkeleg̵ezi zin, egkehimu he menge megbevayè din.

Su tenged kayi he menge ulaula, utew egkepeuki te Megbevayà keuzemà is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù din. Ne tenged dutun, kenè niw itug̵ut he meketuu kew te tarù he penurù te minsan hentei he etew pinaag̵i te menge ketezengan dan he kenà tutuu.
Kenè kew mebpekid-upakat te minsan hentei he iring kayi.

Su zengan utew merusirem is ibayè niw, iyan, guntaan neteyawan is ibayè niw su nehimu kew en he menge sakup te Nengazen. Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he zait is ulaula niw te ked-ikula niw te merayag he ibayà.
Su emun neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip niw, egkeulaula niw is langun he hustu wey metazeng he vaal he ibpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Purungi niw istudyuwi ke hengkey is menge ulaula he egkesuatan te Nengazen.
Is menge etew he kemulu pa ziyà te kerusireman, kenè kew medtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te menge vaal he wazè din pulus, kekenà, ipeehè niw he mezaat is menge vaal zan.
Su is menge vaal he id-eles dan, utew mekeeled-eled minsan is kebenteeni zà kayi.
Ne pinaag̵i te kerayag,
Ne mehitenged kayi zuen erubasa he edhenduen te,
“Sikew is edlipezeng, gimerat kad;
sikew is minatey, ne mevanhew kad
ne egketeyawan ka ni Jesu Kristu.”
Umba, menge suled, pekeventayi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kew mehimu he menge metau, ne kenà menge paglung.
Te minsan keenu, ke zuen meupiya he egkeveelan niw, beeli niw en su g̵untaan he timpu mezelag is ebaal te meupiya.
Kenè niw ul-ulaha is wazè din pulus he ulaula, kekenà, purungi niw sevuta ke hengkey is ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà.
Kenè kew mebpelelangut te vinu su ebpekezezaat heini keniyu, kekenà, kinahanglan he egkepurung kew egkeulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Emun ebpelelelag̵è kew, gemita niw is menge lalag diyà te menge Salmo wey menge kentahan he idalig te Megbevayà, wey menge kentahan he ibpinted keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Kentahi niw is Megbevayà ne pinaag̵i kayi te menge kentahan wey te menge Salmo, medlipey kew is edalig te Megbevayà.
Peselemati niw layun te Amey tew he Megbevayà is langun he tuvad din keniyu tenged te kedsundan niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Mebpetetehuzè kew te kada sevaha tenged te kedtahud niw ki Kristu.
Sikiyu is menge vahi, pesakup kew te menge esawa niw iring te nesakup kew en te Nengazen.

Su is maama, duen din keg̵ehem te kebayàbayà te esawa zin, iring te si Kristu, duen keg̵ehem din te kebayàbayà kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu he iyan lawa zin. Midlibri kiw zin te silut is lawa zin.
Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he mebpesakup mebpurung is bahi te esawa zin iring te ebpesakup kiw ki Kristu is menge tumutuu zin.

Sikiyu is menge maama, kinahanglan he mahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is esawa niw iring te mahal kiw is menge tumutuu ziyà te g̵ehinawa ni Kristu. Egketuenan tew heini su mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri te silut,
ne wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà. Midhimu zin heini pinaag̵i te kedlumpiyuwi zin kenitew pinaag̵i te kebewtismu wey pinaag̵i te lalag din.
Elin daan idhimuwa zin kayi su wey kiw zin mezawat he esawa zin. Ne wazè en igkesawey zin kayi te kenitew su nepurung kiw en melumpiyuwi ne utew kiw mekempet diyà te kandin.

Ne iring din ded daan is maama, ne kinahanglan he mahala zin diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is esawa zin iring te kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Su is kebmahala zin te esawa zin ne iyan ded daan kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa, su is teleesawa, sevaha zà sikandan he lawa.
Wazà etew he kenè din ebmahalen is keugelingen din he lawa, kekenà, ibpekaan din ne ebpurungan din iring te kebpurungi ni Kristu te keugelingen din he lawa.
Ne iyan kiw is menge tumutuu, lawa ni Kristu.
Tenged kayi, duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Ed-ewaan te maama is iney zin wey amey zin ne ebpengesawa, ne sikandan is dezuwa, is maama wey haazà is bahi, ne egkesevaha zà.”
Duen impezayag te Megbevayà kenitew kayi he utew tutuu, ne sumalà is kedsevuta ku kayi ne iyan ibpesavut din si Kristu wey sikitew is menge tumutuu.
Iyan, kenà duen dà taman su egkehimu zaan he elin egkeg̵iyen din is teleesawa. Kinahanglan he mahala te maama is esawa zin ne kinahanglan daan he tehuza te vahi is kandin he esawa.
Sikiyu is menge vatà, kinahanglan he tumana niw layun is menge sug̵ù te menge g̵inikanan niw su ke tumutuu ki te Nengazen he si Jesus, iyan heini hustu he ulaula.
Duen insug̵ù kenitew te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw.” Ne heini he sug̵ù, ne iyan nehuna he sug̵ù he midsumpulan din te penaad su
ke sikandin daan te, “Emun edtumanen niw heini ne edtuvazan ku sikiyu te meupiya ne ebmelug̵ayad is untung niw zini te kelibutan.”

Ne sikiyu is menge g̵inikanan, kinahanglan he kenà igkepauk te menge anak niw is paag̵i niw te kebpenurù kandan, kekenà, ipenurù niw kandan is menge ulaula he zait te menge tumutuu, ne iyan niw isambag kandan is sambag he ebpuun te Nengazen tew.

Sikiyu is menge sulug̵uen, purungi niw tumana is menge sug̵ù keniyu te menge egalen niw zini te kelibutan. Tehuza niw sikandan ne kinahanglan he ebpuun te meupiya he g̵ehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù dan iring te iyan si Kristu edsug̵ù keniyu.

Kinahanglan he layun meupiya is baal niw ne kenà dutun dà te ebentayan kew te egalen niw su kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà ebpekezalig te vaal niw is etew, kekenà, elin daan is Megbevayà su menge sulug̵uen kiw zaan ni Kristu ne kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is ebpeveelan kenita te Megbevayà tenged te ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kedtumana ta kayi. Kinahanglan he meupiya is gehinawa ta zutun te vaal ta iring te iyan ebayàbayà kenita is Megbevayà ne kenà iyan dà is egalen ta zini te kelibutan.
Su minsan ke sulug̵uen ki, wey ke kenà, netuenan ta he ke meupiya is baal ta, ne meupiya zaan is idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà.

Ne sikiyu is menge egalen, iring din ded daan kayi is ul-ulaha niw ziyà te menge sulug̵uen niw. Kenè kew mebpelihandek kandan su netuenan niw he sikitew is langun, ke sulug̵uen ki wey ke egalen ki ve, ne zuen gihapun egalen ta ziyà te langit he iyan is Megbevayà ne wazè din ibpelavi te minsan hentei.
Menge suled, ketepusan heini he menge lalag ku keniyu: kinahanglan he lig-eni niw is kedsarig niw te Nengazen wey te lavew he zekelà he gehem din.
Gemita niw is langun he menge himan te kebpekidtebek he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà su wey kew mekesukul ki Setanas emun egemiten din is ketau zin te kegkeiza zin keniyu.

Su kenà iyan edtebeken tew is menge etew zà duen, kekenà, iyan edtebeken tew is menge mezaat he kedesenan he ziyà ed-ubpà te langit wey is menge kenà egkeahà he hadì, wey menge egalen, wey menge ebayàbayà te langun he menge mezaat he etew he nesakup te kerusireman guntaan dini te kelibutan.

Umba, menge suled, gemita niw en is menge himan te kebpekidtebek he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà. Su zutun emun egkeuma haazà is timpu he zutun utew mereg̵en is kedtebeka te menge mezaat, ne egkesukulan niw is menge kuntada niw ne emun egketapus en haazà is tebek ne wazè kew meewai te zesen.
Ne tenged kayi, andam kew en. Layun tutuu is egkeg̵iyen niw wey ed-isipen niw ne iyan heini bakes niw. Ul-ulaha niw layun is metazeng he ulaula ne iyan heini limbutung niw.
Andam kew layun te kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà, ne iyan heini sepatus niw.
Ne iyan utew kinahanglan is: layun kew sarig te Megbevayà ne iyan heini kelasag niw ne pinaag̵i kayi kenè kew egkesug̵at te menge egkeregreg he panà ni Setanas he iyan is menge penuley zin keniyu.
Ne zewata niw is kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà su iyan heini kalù niw he putew. Ne g̵emita niw layun daan is Lalag te Megbevayà su iyan heini sundang he ibeg̵ey keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Pekezesen kew ampù te minsan hengkey he timpu sumalà is ked-uwita keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Buyù kew te tavang te Megbevayà ne layun kew andam ne peniguduwi niw layun te ked-ampù is langun he menge tumutuu.

Ne iampù a zaan keniyu he iveg̵ey kediey te Megbevayà is ketau te kebpenudtul te lalag din. Ne iampù niw zaan he kenà a mahandek, kekenà, iveg̵ey kediey is hustu he egkeg̵iyen wey ku ikepesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he in-eles dengan.

Umba nehimu a he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà su wey ku ikepenudtul heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne tenged daan kayi te kebpenudtul ku, nehimu a he pirisu. Umba, menge suled, iampù a su wey kenà a mahandek te kebpenudtul su iyan heini ketengdanan he imbeg̵ey kediey te Megbevayà.
Si Tikiku is minahal tew he suled wey metinumanen he sulug̵uen te Nengazen tew, iyan ebpeketudtul keniyu mehitenged te kebpekesavuk ku wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula ku kayi.
Umba edsug̵uen ku sikandin diyan su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk dey zini su wey meheg̵et is kebpekesarig niw te Megbevayà.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, berakat he sikiyu is menge suled dey, tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, wey ipeehè dan keniyu is kebmahala zan keniyu ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan wey heg̵eta zan is kedtuu niw kandan.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenà egkeawà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is kebmahala zin te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Surat heini ni Pablo wey ni Timoteo te menge sulug̵uen ni Jesu Kristu. Ibpeuwit heini is surat diyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu he menge meg̵inged diyan te inged he Pilipus wey te menge ebmeg̵urangen niw wey menge diyekunu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne veg̵ayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tew tenged keniyu emun egkeisip ku sikiyu.
Ne emun id-ampù ku sikiyu utew a egkelipey
su egketenuzan ku is kedtevangi niw kediey te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpeketuu niw taman en guntaan.

Dutun he timpu mibpuunan te Megbevayà is meupiya he vaal zin he edhimuwen din diyan te keniyu. Ne netuenan ku he ebpeniguduwan din pa heini edhimuwa taman te egkepasad din keuzemà te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu.

Hustu iyan is ked-isipa ku keniyu te iring kayi su minsan ke pinirisu a wey ke kenà a pinirisu wey ke edsangyew a te Meupiya he Tudtulanen wey ke edtevaken ku is menge kuntada te Lalag te Megbevayà, mahal kew layun dini te g̵ehinawa ku su pudu kiw ingkeg̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà.
Ebpeketistig̵us is Megbevayà he utew zekelà is kebulunga ku keniyu su is kezekelà te g̵ehinawa ku keniyu, ne iring te kezekelà te g̵ehinawa ni Jesu Kristu keniyu.
Ne id-ampù ku he med-iseg is kebpepurpurungè niw, is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà, wey is ketau niw te ked-isip
su wey niw layun metueni ke hengkey is hustu ne wey niw layun heini meulaula. Ne zutun wazà keuzemà igkesawey ziyan te keniyu su egkehimu kew he wag̵as dutun te kedlikù ni Kristu.
Ne zutun egkeveelan niw is minsan hengkey he metazeng he ulaula tenged te g̵ehem he ibeg̵ey ni Jesu Kristu su wey mezalig wey mevantug is Megbevayà.
Menge suled, egkesuatan ku he mesavut niw he is langun he mereg̵en he nehitavù kediey, ne kenà mezaat, kekenà, meupiya, su neketavang kedì te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Su is langun he menge sundaru he guwardya zini te turug̵an te hadì wey is minsan hentei pa kayi, ne netuenan dan he mibpirisu a tenged dà te sulug̵uen a ni Kristu.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su is kezekelan te menge zuma tew he tumutuu, ingkeheg̵et te kedsarig dan te Nengazen heini is kebpirisuwa kedì. Ne tenged kayi ed-iseg is sigudu zan te kedsengyawa te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè dan en egkehandek.

Is duma, ne iyan idsengyawa zan te impenurù ni Kristu is: tenged te nesina zan kediey ne wey e zan melevawi. Iyan, duen duma he iyan idsengyawa zan te menge penurù ni Kristu su igkesuat dan heini te ebpenudtul.
Ebpenudtul zan tenged te mahal a ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan su netuenan dan he mibpilì a te Megbevayà wey ku metavak is menge kuntada te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Iyan, is menge zuma, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan te kebentug̵a zan ki Kristu. Egkesuatan dan he melevawi e zan ne kunaan dan ke pinaag̵i kayi egkeumanan is menge samuk ku zini te pirisuwan.
Iyan, nasì ku igkelipey heini is menge vaal zan su ke hustu is tuyù dan wey minsan ke mezaat, maambe en, asal mevantug dan si Kristu.
Kenà egkeawà is kelipey ku su netuenan ku he ibpaawà a kayi te pirisuwan tenged te ked-empua niw kedì wey tenged te tavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he midtevangan din daan si Jesu Kristu.

Ne utew ku egkesuati, wey idsarig ku ziyà te Megbevayà he layun ku metuman is ebpeveelan din kedì su wey a kenà meeled te minsan keenu he timpu lavew en guntaan. Egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu tenged kedì pinaag̵i te kebpaawaa kedì kayi te pirisuwan ne emun kenà, ne mezalig si Kristu pinaag̵i te kebpatey ku.

Ne tenged te egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu, egkesuatan ku he mebmelug̵ayad pa is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan su wey mevantug ku pa si Kristu, iyan, ke ebpatey a ne lavew pa he ibmeupiya ku.

Kenè ku egketuenan ke hendei zapit is meupiya he ebpilien ku, su egkesuatan ku he metapus en is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidume en ki Kristu su meupiya pa utew haazà. Iyan, ke zuen pa ebpeveelan kedì he ebpulus, meupiya zaan.
Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè e pa ebpatey wey ku sikiyu metevangi.

Ne tenged te iyan heini netag̵ù dini te g̵ehinawa ku, netuenan ku he kenè pa egketapus is untung ku kayi te kelibutan ne ebpekiduma e pa keniyu wey ku mepurungi te edheg̵et is kelipey niw tenged te kedtuu niw.
Ne zutun, ke ebpekelikù ad diyan te keniyu egkehimu he iyan a igkeventug̵a niw ki Jesu Kristu.

Menge suled, ke minsan hengkey is egkehitavù kediey, utew kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne kenà ebpekesuwey te impenurù ni Kristu pinaag̵i te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Su emun kenè kew edsuwey kayi, minsan ke kenà a ebpekelikù diyan, egketudtulan a he nesevaha is gehinawa niw wey tuyù niw te kedhag̵ù su wey metuuwi te mezakel he menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Ne egketudtulan a zaan he kenè kew egkehandek te menge kuntada niw. Su emun kenè kew egkehandek kandan egkesavut dan he iyan sikandan edsilutan ne iyan kew ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan su ibpesavut kandan heini te Megbevayà.
Su is mibpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan dà is kedtuuwi niw ki Kristu, kekenà, elin daan is ked-entusa niw te kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu niw kandin.
Nekedreragkes kiw en is ed-antus te kemeresayan tenged te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne heini is menge kemeresayan he nehitavù kediey zengan, ne kemulu g̵untaan kenè ku egkesuwey, sumalà is nezineg niw.

Menge suled, netuenan ku he ingkeheg̵et te kedtuu niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, ne netuenan ku zaan he naawà is menge keseengan niw mehitenged te hizu zin keniyu. Ne netuenan ku zaan he neupakat kew pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne ebpekedhihizuwè kew wey ebpelimlimuey kew is menge tumutuu.

Ne tenged kayi te langun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he tug̵uti niw he mepurung mesevaha is isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw, ne heg̵eta niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te menge zuma niw. Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini human egkeheg̵et is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.
Kinahanglan he kenà kew mebpekidlawan ne kenè kew mebpelavew, kekenà, isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he minus is pid-etawan din kenà te zuma zin.
Kenè niw iyan dà isipa is keniyu he egkinehenglanen, kekenà, isipa niw zaan is egkinehenglanen te menge zuma niw.
Kinahanglan he iring is isip niw te isip ni Jesu Kristu.
Su minsan ke kenà egkeawà diyà te kandin is kegkemegbevayè din wazè din
isipa he kenè din ed-ewaan is kebpekesavuk din te zekelà is keg̵ehem din he Megbevayà,
kekenà, mid-ewaan din ne mibpaanak te etew, ne nehimu he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te etew en sikandin wazà sikandin mebpelavew,
kekenà, mibpezumazuma sikandin te menge sug̵ù kandin te Amey zin
he Megbevayà minsan pa te pinaag̵i kayi inransang sikandin te krus ne zutun mibpatey.
Ne tenged kayi midhimu en sikandin te Megbevayà he utew lavew,
ne migeraran din sikandin te g̵erar he lavew pa te minsan hengkey he g̵erar te minsan hentei.
Ne umba mid-ulaula heini te Megbevayà su ke egkezineg is gerar ni Jesus,
ed-ezapen si Jesus te minsan hentei he linimbag he ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà,
wey minsan diyà te Iveyaan. Ebpekeluhud dan kandin,
ne ebpekekag̵i zan he iyan si Jesu Kristu Nengazen te minsan hengkey.
Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkevantug dan daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Ne umba, menge suled, iring te layun kew ebpememineg te menge sug̵ù ku, ne kenà dutun dà te kebpekiduma ku keniyu, kekenà, minsan te wazà a ziyan te keniyu, ne iring din ded daan guntaan kinahanglan is uman sevaha keniyu, ne himuwa zin is taman te egkehimu zin he edumahan te kegkehandek te Megbevayà su wey mepasad haazà is nepuunan en te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
Su layun edtavang keniyu is Megbevayà wey niw mesuati ne wey niw mehimu is kedtumana te tuyù din diyan te keniyu.
Is langun he ebpeveelan din keniyu, tumana niw te wazà kebpeneremudtemud wey kebelivad.

Ne zutun, wazà mezaat diyan te keniyu su meupiya is ulaula niw su menge anak kew te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi zin keniyu, minsan te zini kew pa mekeubpà te kelibutan te teliwazà te lalung he menge etew he kenà memetazeng is menge ulaula. Iring kew te menge sulù

he edtayew kandan su ibpesavut niw kandan is lalag he ebpekeveg̵ey kandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan niw, utew ebmeupiya is g̵ehinawa ku keuzemà dutun te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu su egketuenan ku zutun he zekelà is pulus te kedhag̵ù ku ziyan te keniyu.

Is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà, ne iring te pemuhat he edewaten din. Ne emun egkesuatan din pa he id-uman is kebpatey ku kayi te pemuhat, igkelipey ku pa. Ne igkelipey ku zaan is kedtuu niw iring te nelipey kew.
Ne iring din ded daan, kinahanglan he igkelipey niw zaan is kebpatey ku emun egkehitavù kediey.

Dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he meg̵aan ku en egkesug̵ù diyan te keniyu si Timoteo. Ne emun ebpekelikù en dini, egketuenan ku ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk niw. Ne utew heini ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa ku.
Iyan dà sikandin duma ku kayi he utew zekelà is gehinawa zin keniyu.
Is duma, ne iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan, ne kenà iyan is egkesuatan ni Jesu Kristu.
Si Timoteo, netuenan niw he hustu is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te tutuu he anak ku te kedtevangi zin kedì te kedsengyawa kayi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Umba, emun egketuenan ku en ke hengkey is egkehitavù kedì kayi, egkesuatan ku he segugunè ku sikandin mesug̵ù diyan.
Ne zekelà daan is kedsarig ku te Megbevayà he meg̵aan a zaan ebpeketelukun kandin.

Ne elin daan kayi te isip ku he kinahanglan he ibpehendiyan ku is suled tew he si Ipepruditu, kes midsug̵ù niw pehendini wey e zin metevangi. Iyan sikandin duma ku wey timbang ku kayi te ebpeveelan kedì te Megbevayà.
Umba ibpehendiyan ku su utew sikandin ebulunga keniyu ne utew inmezaat te g̵ehinawa zin is nezineg niw he tudtul he nezeruwan sikandin.

Netigbak iyan sikandin is midaru umba kunaan ku ke ibpatey zin en, iyan, nehizuwan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne nehizuwan a zaan te Megbevayà su ke mibpatey sikandin, neumanan en geina is menge seeng ku.
Umba utew ku egkesuati heini is ked-ulì din diyan su wey kew melipey te kebpekeuma zin ne pinaag̵i kayi egkeawà daan is kedì he kegkeseeng.
Umba, kinahanglan he meg̵alew kew te kebpekeuma zin su suled tew sikandin tenged te kedtuu zin te Nengazen. Is langun he iring kayi he etew, tehuza niw
su hapit sikandin ebpatey wey zin metuman is ebpeveelan kandin ni Kristu. Inserakan din is untung din wey e zin metevangi su zutun he timpu kenà a keniyu egketevangan.

Na, menge suled, ketepusan heini he sambag ku keniyu. Lipey kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen. Maambe ke idsublì ku keniyu is daan he sambag ku su melemu zà heini, ne kela ke egkehimu he pinaag̵i kayi egkelig-enan is isip niw.
Likayi niw is menge kuntada te Megbevayà he mezaat is ulaula zan he iyan is menge Hudiyu he ebpenurù he iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà is kebpelii niw te lawa niw.

Iyan kiw kes tutuu he menge sakup te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan sikandan, su pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ed-azap kiw te Megbevayà ne edlipey kiw tenged te upakat tew ki Jesu Kristu. Ne kenè tew iyan edserig̵an is kelibutanen he ulaula iring te kebpesirkunsidar.

Iyan, ke egkehimu he egkeserig̵an is iring dutun, egkeserig̵an is nengeulaula ku zengan su ke zuen etew he kunaan din ke egkeserig̵an din is kedtumana zin te menge kelibutanen he tulumanen, ne egkelevawan ku pa sikandin te kedtumana kayi.

Su hein walu en he andew is ked-enaka kedì, ne midsirkunsidar a. Is menge g̵inikanan ku, ne kevuwazan sikandan ni Benjamin he anak te kepuun dey he si Israyil. Ne tudalis a he Hudiyu. Mibpurungan ku te edtuman is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su Perisiyu a.

Ne tuus te utew meheg̵et dini te g̵ehinawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge tulumanen dey te menge Hudiyu, su mibpemesipelahan ku is menge tumutuu ki Jesus. Ne sumalà te kedtumana ku te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises wazè ku netuenan he supak ku te Megbevayà.
Iyan, is langun he iring dutun he kunaan ku ke egkeserig̵an ku wey a melibri te silut, mid-engkezan ku en wey ku maangken si Kristu.

Ne kenà dutun dà taman is mid-engkezan ku, kekenà, mid-eminan ku engkezi is minsan hengkey he zekelà dini te g̵ehinawa ku su wey ku mekuwa is utew pa lavew he mahal he iyan is kebpekidsevaha ku ki Jesu Kristu te Nengazen ku. Tenged kandin mid-engkezan ku is langun ne mid-isip ku heini he abper zà dini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidsevaha ki Kristu,

su wey a zaan meisip te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged ki Kristu. Wazà a meisip he metazeng pinaag̵i te kediey zà he ulaula te kedtumana te kesug̵uan, su mibpeketazeng a te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Heini is kebmetazeng, ne idtuvad kenita te Megbevayà emun edtuu ki ki Kristu.

Iyan dà guntaan ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa ku is kegketueni ku te menge ulaula ni Kristu wey is kebulusi kedì te g̵ehem he iyan sikan is gehem he ingkevanhew zin. Egkesuatan ku he mekeambit a zaan duen te kemeresayan he mid-antus din he iyan is ked-engkezi ku te kediey he egkesuatan iring te kandin he kebelevag̵a te untung din.
Umba egkesuatan ku heini su wey mehimu he mevanhew a keuzemà.

Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut kayi he netuman en dini te kedì heini is langun wey ke nehimu e en he etew he wazè en duen igkesawey, kekenà, ebpenigudu a wey heini metuman su iyan heini tuyù ni Jesu Kristu zutun te kedhimuwa zin kedì he sakup din.

Netuenan ku, menge suled, he wazè pa heini metuman dini te kedì, iyan, mid-awè ku ziyà te isip ku is nengehuna he nengetuman ku en, ne edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku wey ku mekuwa is langun he egkesuatan te Megbevayà he mekuwa ku keuzemà.
Ebpenigudu e pa wey ku mekuwa is suhul te Megbevayà su iyan heini ketezengan ke maan is mid-umew kiw zin te ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesu Kristu.
Ne is langun te sikitew he meg̵urang en te kedtuu, kinahanglan he iring kayi zaan is isip tew wey g̵ehinawa tew. Iyan, emun kenè kew egkengeuyun ibpetuenan keniyu te Megbevayà is benar.
Iyan, kinahanglan guntaan he edtumanen tew is daan he impenurù kenitew te Megbevayà.
Is langun te sikiyu, menge suled, purungi niw te ed-iring heini is menge ulaula ku. Iyan niw zaan iringi haazà is menge etew he iring is menge ulaula zan te kenami he ulaula.

Dengan ku zà heini layun egkeg̵iya, iyan, guntaan ed-umanan ku egkeg̵iya zuma is menge luhè ku he ebpenig̵is, tenged te mezakel he menge etew he egkeg̵iyen dan he sakup sikandan ni Kristu, iyan, egketuusan pinaag̵i te ulaula zan he kuntada sikandan te kebpesevuta mehitenged te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus.

Siguradu egkeimpirnu sikandan su iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zan. Ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa zan is menge mezaat he ulaula, iyan, meupiya pezem ke igkeeled dan; ne iyan dan dà egkeisip is menge vutang he zini te kelibutan.
Ne sikitew mulà, ne iyan hustu he inged tew is diyà te langit ne utew zekelà is perateng tew te kedlikù te Menluluwas tew he ebpuun diyà te langit he iyan is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Ne zutun te andew, ne edhelinen din en is memeg̵uyà he menge lawa tew ne edhimuwen din he iring te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he lawa zin. Ne kayi te kedhelina zin kenitew, egemiten din is dekelà he g̵ehem din he iyan ingkehimu zin he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.
Umba menge minahal ku he menge suled, heg̵eta niw is kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù te Nengazen. Utew a mibulung keniyu. Igkelipey ku sikiyu wey ibmeupiya kew te g̵ehinawa ku.
Edhengyuan ku sikiyu, Ibudya wey Sintiki, he melinew is kebpekid-upakat niw su telesuled kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen.

Ne sikew zaan is timbang ku ziyan, egkesuatan ku he tevangi nu heini is menge vahi wey zan heini metuman su mibpenigudu zan te kedtavang kedì te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne elin daan si Clemente wey zuen pa menge zuma niw he midtavang kedì. Is menge ngazan dan te langun, ne nekesurat en diyà te libru te Megbevayà he zutun inlista zin is mibeg̵ayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Egkeg̵iyan ku sikiyu he sigudu kew lipey tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw te Nengazen, su meupiya ke zekelà layun is kelipey niw.
Kinahanglan he peketulanged kew te minsan hentei su meg̵aan en edlikù is Nengazen.
Kenè niw ikeseeng is minsan hengkey he egkeulaula niw, kekenà, emun ed-ampù kew buyua niw ziyà te Megbevayà is egkinehenglanen niw ne emun ebuyù kew, ne kinahanglan he peselemati niw en he zaan.

Ne zutun wazà samuk diyà te isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw su pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu ibeg̵ey keniyu te Megbevayà is melinawen he g̵ehinawa he kenà egkesavut te minsan hentei he etew.

Ketepusan heini, menge suled, he menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan niw itag̵ù diyà te isip niw is meupiya, is dait he igkezelig̵i, is tutuu he tuluuwen, is metazeng wey hustu wey mekempet he ulaula, wey is minsan hengkey he igkehimu te minsan hentei he egketahud.

Pen-ul-ulaha niw heini is langun he impenurù ku, wey impesavut ku keniyu pinaag̵i te menge lalag ku wey pinaag̵i zaan te menge ulaula ku. Ne zutun, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te kelinew tew te wazè din pidtemanan, iyan ed-ulin keniyu.

Utew zekelà is kelipey ku wey is kebpeselemati ku te Nengazen su nehimu en maan he ingkepeehè niw is gag̵ew niw pinaag̵i kayi te impeuwit niw kedì. Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut keniyu he wazè niw gag̵ew kedì dutun te nengehuna he timpu, kekenà, wazè niw pa zutun paag̵i wey niw ikepaahà is gag̵ew niw.

Kenà iyan igkeg̵iya ku kayi is tenged te zuen kurang ku te menge egkinehenglanen ku, su minsan ke kenà utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku, impenurù kedì te Megbevayà he kinahanglan he mebmeupiya g̵ihapun is gehinawa ku.

Neseg̵azan ku en is kegkealang-alang wey is neezenan te langun he egkinehenglanen ku. Ne neleyaman ku en heini he egkeulaula te minsan hendei wey te minsan keenu, se zuen keuyag̵an ku se wazè ku keuyag̵an, ke neeezenan a wey ke egkealang-alang a.
Egkehimu ku is minsan hengkey he ibpeulaula kedì tenged te tavang ni Kristu he iyan edlig-en kedì.
Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, utew kew metulanged su midtevangan a keniyu kayi te menge seeng ku he mezakel.

Sikiyu is menge tigPilipus, netuenan niw he zutun te kedhipanew ku puun diyan te prubinsya he Mesidunya hein aney ku en ipenudtul ziyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan kew zà menge tumutuu he midtavang kedì. Wazà duma he gurupu te menge tumutuu he nehimu he menge timbang ku su iyan kew zà nekeveg̵ey kedì te selapì.
Ne hein diyè e pa te Mesidunya, diyà te inged he Tiselunika, ne layun kew ebpeuwit te tavang niw kedì.
Kenè ku iyan igkekeg̵iya kayi su wey a layun mekezawat te ibeg̵ey niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he zekelà is suhul keniyu te Megbevayà.

Nezawat ku en is impeuwit niw ne utew subra is imbeg̵ey niw. Ne kenà ad egkealang-alang su inhated en ni Ipepruditu zini is idtavang niw kedì. Iring heini te pemuhat he utew mehemut, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, utew igkesuat te Megbevayà.
Ne is Megbevayà, iyan daan ebeg̵ey keniyu te langun he kinahanglan niw tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu su utew zekelà is ketig̵eyunan din.
Berakat he zelig̵a is Amey tew he Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan.
Ebpengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu ziyan. Is menge suled tew he zuma ku kayi, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
Ne is langun he menge zuma ku he tumutuu kayi te inged, lavew en is menge suled tew he zini ed-ubpà te valey te hadì, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.
Siak si Pablo wey heini is suled tew he si Timoteo, ebpengemusta key keniyu ziyan. Epustul a; midsug̵ù a ni Jesu Kristu su iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is menge g̵aked te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kulusas he menge metinumanen te lalag ni Kristu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey veg̵ayi kew zin te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Sikami, emun id-ampù dey sikiyu, layun key ebpeselemat diyà te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus tenged keniyu,
su nezineg dey is tudtul he mezesen is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu wey zekelà layun is gag̵ew niw te minsan hentei he etew he g̵aked te Megbevayà.

Umba mezesen is kedtuu niw wey zekelà is gag̵ew niw su kenà egkeawà is perateng niw te langun diyà te langit he integ̵ana keniyu te Megbevayà. Nezineg niw heini zutun te kebpesevuta keniyu te tutuu he penurù he iyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Heini is migkag̵i he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, pinaag̵i te kedtuu kayi, mezakel en he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he inged is mibmeupiya is menge ulaula zan. Ne kenà duen dà taman su ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu pinaag̵i te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iring te layun daan ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu ziyan te keniyu puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg niw is tudtul te g̵ag̵ew kenitew te Megbevayà wey netuenan niw he venar iyan.
Impenurù keniyu heini ni Ipapras he minahal he zuma zey he sulug̵uen ni Kristu. Metinumanen sikandin te menge sug̵ù ni Kristu pinaag̵i te kedtavang din kenami.
Midtudtul zin kenami he zekelà is gag̵ew niw te menge zuma tew he tumutuu tenged te mid-ulinan kew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne tenged kayi ibpenigudu zey sikiyu id-ampù puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg dey is tudtul mehitenged te kedtuu niw. Layun dey id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he veg̵ayi kew zin te kegkesayud te langun he ulaula he ebpeveelan din keniyu, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, mehimu kew zin he mebmetau ne pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, iveg̵ey zin keniyu is kegketuusi te meupiya wey mezaat.

Su emun ebeelan din is iring kayi, ne human egkehimu is menge ulaula niw he zait he menge ulaula te menge etew he neg̵aked te Nengazen tew, ne egkehimu zaan he layun niw egkeveeli is egkesuatan din; layun niw egkeulaula is minsan hengkey he menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne layun daan ed-iseg is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà.
Ne ibeg̵ey zin keniyu is dekelà he g̵ehem he ebpuun te zekelà he g̵ehem din, ne tenged kayi te g̵ehem layun niw egkeantus is kemereg̵enan he zekelà is kelipey niw.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su zekelà dutun is kebpeselemat niw te Amey tew he Megbevayà tenged te kedhimuwa zin keniyu he zait he mekeambit kew zutun te langun he ibeg̵ey zin diyà te keniyu te menge g̵aked din he midteyawan is isip dan.
Midtevangan kiw te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne tenged kayi wazè kiw en maan meveyveyai te kerusireman,
Ne pinaag̵i kayi te Anak din, nevelukasan kiw zin te kegkeuripen kenitew ni Setanas ne mibpesaylu kiw zin te menge ulaula tew he mezaat.
Heini is Anak te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpeg̵awag̵awa te kenà egkeahà he Megbevayà. Is Anak, ne lavew sikandin te minsan hengkey he linimbag din

su pinaag̵i kandin te Anak te Megbevayà midlimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà, sikan is egkeahà te etew wey is kenà egkengeahà he kedesenan he zuen dan keg̵ehem, wey kebayàbayà, wey kedhadì. Is Anak, mibpeveelan kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà is minsan hengkey su wey zin meg̵amit heini is minsan hengkey he linimbag din.

Ne elin daan ketezengan ke maan is lavew is Anak te Megbevayà su tenged te zaan en sikandin te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey, wey pinaag̵i kandin is hustu he kebpekesavuk wey egkengeulaula te langun he linimbag.

Wey tenged te iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, is langun he menge tumutuu kandin, wey tenged daan te iyan sikandin ebeg̵ey te untung diyà te langun he menge tumutuu su iyan sikandin lavew te langun he egkengevanhew ne tenged kayi iyan sikandin lavew te minsan hengkey.
Ne egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ke hengkey sikandin, iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din.

Ne egkesuatan din daan he pinaag̵i te Anak din meked-uliey te meupiya he kedepità sikandin wey is minsan hentei zini te tanà wey ziyà te langit. Ne pinaag̵i te kedtig̵is duen te lengesa te Anak din diyà te krus egkehimu he menge emig̵u zin is minsan hentei.
Kenè kew zengan menge emig̵u te Megbevayà, kekenà, menge kuntada kew zin su layun mezaat is menge isip niw wey ulaula niw.

Ne minsan pa te iyan haazà, midhimu kew g̵untaan te Megbevayà he menge emig̵u zin pinaag̵i te kebpatey ni Kristu. Umba mibpehimatey si Kristu su wey kew mehimu he menge etew he wazà mezaat he ulaula ne wazà igkesumbunga keniyu keuzemà emun ibpeetuvang kew zin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè niw engkezi is kedtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, lig-eni niw is kedtuu niw ne kenè kew medarà is ebpaabut te langun he impenaad te Megbevayà he nezineg niw zengan hein impenurù keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Heini is nekag̵i he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne insangyew ziyà te menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei. Siak si Pablo, midsug̵ù a wey ku ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Maambe ke ebpekeantus a g̵untaan te merasey su iyan igkezeyzey niw. Igkelipey ku heini su iring te kegkerasey ni Kristu edhimesazan ku en is langun he mereg̵en he ibpaantus din kediey su wey mezeyzey is lawa ni Kristu, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, is menge tumutuu kandin.
Nehimu a he sulug̵uen wey a meketavang te menge tumutuu. Ne umba mibpilì a te Megbevayà su wey ku sikiyu metevangi is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne wey ku ikepurung ikepenudtul is Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne zengan, heini is Lalag, ne in-eles te Megbevayà ne wazà ipezayag diyà te menge etew, iyan, guntaan ibpezayag din en kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin

su egkesuatan din he sikitew is menge g̵aked din, ne egkesayud kiw ke hengkey is utew lavew he meupiya he edhimuwen din diyà te langun he menge etew. Ibpesayud din en kenitew he edlumunan kiw ni Kristu ne tenged kayi egketuenan tew he edtulusen kiw keuzemà.

Sikami, idsangyew zey si Kristu; edleg̵uyan dey is minsan hentei, wey ebpenurù key kandan ebpurung sumalà is egkehimu zey he ketau su wey meketuu is langun ki Kristu, ne wey sikandan keuzemà ikepeetuvang diyà te Megbevayà he wazà kurang te kedtuu zan.
Siak, ebpenigudu a ebaal he edlig-enan te zekelà he zesen ni Kristu su wey metuman heini.

Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su egkesuatan ku he metueni niw ke maan is ebpenigudu a edhag̵ù tenged keniyu wey tenged daan te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya wey is minsan hentei he tumutuu ziyan he iring keniyu wazè pa mekekilala kedì.

Iyan idhag̵ù ku su wey melig-eni is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kegkeupakat niw wey pinaag̵i te kebmahala niw te uman sevaha keniyu. Egkesuatan ku he meheg̵et is kegkesavut niw te impenurù keniyu he iyan kes impezayag te Megbevayà keniyu mehitenged ki Kristu.
Su iyan dà sikandin ebpekeveg̵ey te minsan hengkey he tutuu he ketau wey tutuu he kedsavut.
Egkeg̵iyen ku heini su wey wazà mekekabig keniyu he minsan hentei pinaag̵i te menge ketezengan he henduen be te hustu, iyan, tarù.

Su minsan te wazà a g̵untaan diyan te keniyu, layun ku sikiyu ed-isipa. Igkelipey ku sikiyu su netuenan ku he mibpurungan niw te ed-ulaula is meupiya he ulaula wey melig-en daan is kedtuu niw ki Kristu.
Ne g̵eina te midawat niw si Jesu Kristu he Nengazen niw kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne zait te upakat niw kandin.

Purung kew pendalid diyà te kandin; purungi niw istudyuwi is menge ulaula zin; purungi niw tuuwi sikan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu. Ne kinahanglan he layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin keniyu.
Andam kew su kela ke zuen egkabig keniyu pinaag̵i te kebpenurù te tuluuwen he tarù ne wazè din pulus su imbilinbilin dà te menge etew. Kenà haazà hustu he tuluuwen su kenà ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su si Kristu, nehimu sikandin he etew. Duen din lawa, iyan, minsan pa kayi is minsan hengkey he ziyà te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin.

Ne sikiyu zaan, pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, nekepurung kew en mekeazen te untung he imbeg̵ey keniyu ni Kristu. Ne iyan si Kristu sikan is edhadì te minsan hentei he kedesenan he zuen din keg̵ehem wey kebayàbayà.

Ne tenged kayi, minsan kenè kew menge Hudiyu, is midhimu keniyu te Megbevayà, ne iring duen te kedsirkunsidara zengan te menge Hudiyu su nehimu kew en he menge g̵aked te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu. Iyan, selakew heini, su kenà pinaag̵i te kebpelii te lawa zà duen, kekenà, in-awà ni Kristu is gehem te mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.

Ne tenged kayi inleveng kew zuma kandin dutun te kebewtismuwi keniyu, ne nevanhew kew zaan duma kandin su nekidsevaha kew kandin tenged te midtuuwan niw he mekeg̵eg̵ehem is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin sikan is mibanhew ki Kristu.

Ne sikiyu, wazè niw pa zengan untung he wazè din pidtemanan tenged te memezaat is menge ulaula niw te kenà menge Hudiyu wey tenged te midtuman niw is memezaat he kebayà te lawa niw. Ne minsan pa zutun, mibeg̵ayan kew te Megbevayà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne nevanhew kew en duma ki Kristu. Mibpesaylu kiw te Megbevayà te langun he menge salè tew.
Ne minsan pa te wazè kiw medtuman te insurat he kesug̵uan din, pinaag̵i te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, in-awè din is kesug̵uan ne tenged kayi wazè en igkesiluti zin kenitew.

Ne haazà is menge kedesenan he mezaat he mulin-ulin he zuen dan keg̵ehem te kebayàbayà, in-awà te Megbevayà is keg̵ehem dan, ne pinaag̵i te kedsulituwa zin kandan pinaag̵i te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, impeehè din he wazè dan en kebpekesukul.

Umba, menge suled, kenè niw itetenged is edsudì keniyu emun kenè niw ebpezumdumahan is egkesuatan dan he ibpeulaula keniyu mehitenged te kegkaan wey ked-inum, wey mehitenged daan te kedsilibra te menge mahal he menge andew wey kedsilibra te intrada te hayag wey menge andew te kedhimeley.
Su is menge iring dutun, ne nehimu zengan he alung dà. Ne ziyè pa te huziyan is teg̵ialung dutun he iyan si Kristu.

Duen daan menge etew he egkag̵i he lavew sikandan tenged te zuen kun menge egkein-inuwan he impaahà kandan wey tenged te kenè dan mepelevawen. Ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he ebpekeazap ki te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit. Kenè niw, menge suled, itetenged is kedsudì dan keniyu su is iring dutun he etew, ne ebpezalig dà, iyan, wazà hustu he ketezengan te kebpezalig dan su iyan ebayàbayà te isip dan is kelibutanen he kebayè dan.

Ne wazè dan en upakat ki Kristu he iyan ed-uwit kenitew. Iyan si Kristu puunà te zesen te kedtuu tew ne pinaag̵i kandin ed-iseg is kezesen te upakat tew te langun he tumutuu sumalà is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iring te lawa tew, ne ed-iseg daan is desen din ne kenè ebpekedsusuwey pinaag̵i te kegkevagkes kayi zutun te menge ug̵at din.

Na, menge suled, geina te iring te minatey ki en duma ki Kristu, wey kenè ki en maan egkeveyveyaan te menge kenà hustu he tuluuwen, kinahanglan he kenè kew en maan mebpemineg te menge sug̵ù te menge etew he menge kuntada te Megbevayà. Menge sug̵ù heini te menge etew zà duen. Egkag̵i zan he zuen menge egkeenen he kenà ibpekaan kenitew te Megbevayà, ne minsan is kegezami wey is kegewezi zà kayi ne wazè din kun itug̵ut kenitew. Kenè niw, menge suled, pemineg̵a is iring dutun su wazà pulus te idawey zan su emun egkeenen tew is egkeenen ne egkeawà heini.

Haazà is menge etew, henduen be te hustu is ibpenurù dan. Egkag̵i zan he kinahanglan he ed-ezapen ta is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà, wey kinahanglan he ebminusen ta is pid-etawan ta wey kinahanglan daan he edresayen ta is lawa ta. Ne minsan pa kayi, kenà hustu heini is ibpenurù dan su is menge sug̵ù he iring kayi, ne kenà heini ebpeketavang kenita te kedsukul te mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta.

Ne, menge suled, nevanhew si Kristu ne iring te nevanhew kiw zaan duma kandin su zuen tew en untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta layun ed-isipa is ibpeisip-isip kenita te Megbevayà diyà te langit he zutun edhadì si Kristu he ebpinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.
Ed-isipen ta layun heini ne kenè te en ed-isipen is menge mezaat he ulaula zini te tanà.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su sikita is tumutuu, minatey ki en duma ki Kristu ne is tutuu he untung ta pinaag̵i kandin, wazè pa heini ipezayag te Megbevayà.

Umba, menge suled, emun edlikù dini si Kristu he iyan puunà te veg̵u he untung ta, ibpeg̵awag̵awa is kekempet din ne ibpeg̵awag̵awa zaan dutun is kekempet te kenita he veg̵u he untung su zutun duma ki kandin.

Umba, menge suled, kenè niw en itug̵ut he tumana niw is mezaat he kebayè niw; kenè niw ul-ulaha is mahawag wey meremerik he ulaula ne kenè niw mehimuwa he zuen suat niw te kenè niw esawa; engkezi niw is mezaat he ulaula wey is keleleg̵ed su emun leg̵ezen ki te menge azen, henduen be te egkeilisan dini te g̵ehinawa ta is tutuu he Megbevayà te menge azen.
Ne siguradu edsilutan te Megbevayà is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg su layun dan ed-ulaula te menge iring kayi.
Ne iring kayi zaan is mid-ulaula niw zengan su zutun layun mezaat is menge ulaula niw.
Ne g̵untaan, kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an ta is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula iring te kegkepauk wey kebpekigkuntada te zuma he etew, is kebpesipala, is ked-ituk wey is meremerik he kegkag̵i.
Kenè ki edtarùtarù su nelibri ki en te zaan he kegkeetew ta wey te menge mezaat he vaal he mid-ulaula ta zengan te kedtumana ta te menge zaan he suat ta.
Ne g̵untaan midhimu ki en te Megbevayà he veg̵u en he etew he edhimuwen din he iring te kandin. Umba midhimu ki zin he veg̵u su wey ta mepurung mesavut ke hentei sikandin.

Ne tenged kayi, sikita is midhimu zin he veg̵u he etew, wazè ta zapit ibpelavi te etew he Hudiyu wey te etew he kenà Hudiyu su neked-iiring diyà te Megbevayà is nesirkunsidar wey is wazà mesirkunsidar; neked-iiring daan diyà te kandin is neketunghà wey is wazà meketunghà, is sulug̵uen wey is egalen. Dini te kenitew te menge veg̵u he etew, iyan dà lavew si Kristu ne midlumunan ni Kristu is kada sevaha kenitew.

Ne, menge suled, geina te mibpilì kiw te Megbevayà, ne midhimu kiw zin he menge g̵aked din, wey g̵eina te mahal kiw ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin, kinahanglan he zekelà is hizu ta wey g̵ag̵ew ta ziyà te minsan hentei. Ebpurungan ta is menge zuma ta ne kenè ki ebpelavew. Kinahanglan he mepelevayen ki layun.
Ed-entusen ta, ne ebpeseyluwen ta is menge zuma ta he ebpekesupak kenita. Kinahanglan he iring te mibpesaylu kiw te Nengazen tew ebpepespeseyluwè kiw zaan.

Kinahanglan he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te kada sevaha is minsan hentei he zuma zin. Iyan heini lavew te langun he sambag ku keniyu su emun egketuman niw heini egkehimu niw zaan is langun kayi te menge meupiya he ulaula.

Ne kinahanglan daan, he iyan niw ipelavi ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is kelinew he ibeg̵ey ni Kristu su umba midhimu kiw he tumutuu te Megbevayà su wey kiw mebmelinawen su nesevaha kiw is menge tumutuu. Ne layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin keniyu.

Menge suled, layun niw zewata is impesavut ni Kristu. Pepempenuruey kew wey mebpesemsembag̵è kew sumalà is ketau te kada sevaha. Kanta kew te menge idalig te Megbevayà, wey menge Salmo, wey elin daan is menge kentahan he ibpinted keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Kentahi niw is Megbevayà he utew zekelà is kebpeselemati niw kandin.

Ne minsan hengkey he egkeg̵iyen niw wey ed-ul-ulahan niw, kinahanglan he zait heini he ulaula te sulug̵uen te Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Ne kinahanglan daan he layun dekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesus.
Sikiyu is menge vahi, pevayàbayà kew te esawa niw su iyan heini hustu he ulaula te vahi he tumutuu te Nengazen.
Ne sikiyu zaan is menge maama, mahala niw is esawa niw; kenè niw sikandan henghenggeri.
Sikiyu is menge vatà he tumutuu te Nengazen, pemineg̵a niw layun is menge sug̵ù te g̵inikanan niw su utew heini egkesuati te Megbevayà.
Ne sikiyu zaan is menge g̵inikanan, kinahanglan he kenà utew subra is kedsewaya niw te menge anak niw su kela ke maawà diyà te kandan is gustu zan te ked-ulaula te hustu.

Ne sikiyu is sulug̵uen, layun niw pemineg̵a is sug̵ù te egalen niw te minsan keenu he timpu, ne kenà dutun dà te timpu he ebentayan kew zin. Ne kenè niw iyan dà ibpemineg̵a kandin su wey meupiya is isip din keniyu, kekenà, kinahanglan he iyan ketezengan ke maan is ebpurungan niw is baal niw su g̵eina te zekelà is kedtahud niw te Nengazen tew.
Ne minsan hengkey is ebpeveelan keniyu, ne purungi niw su iyan edsusi keniyu is Nengazen ne kenà iyan dà haazà is kelibutanen he egalen niw,
su netuenan niw en he edsuhulan kew keuzemà te Nengazen. Ne ibeg̵ey zin keniyu haazà is suhul he impenaad din su is tutuu he egalen niw ne iyan si Kristu.
Su sikan is etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat, ne edsilutan sikandin sumalà is keveg̵at te salè din su wazà ibpelavi te Megbevayà te minsan hentei.
