Ne sikiyu zaan is duen din uripen, purungi niw is kedumala niw te menge uripen niw ne iveg̵ey niw kandan is metazeng wey hustu he ibeg̵ey ne kenè niw lipati he zuen daan teg̵iuripen keniyu ziyà te langit.
Ne sikiyu is langun, pekehamen kew ampù ne purungi niw is ked-isip niw ke ed-ampù kew wey layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin keniyu.

Ne emun ed-ampù kew, iampù key zaan keniyu. Ampù kew he himuwa te Megbevayà is paag̵i wey key mekesangyew te in-eles dengan he lalag din mehitenged ki Kristu. Umba zini a g̵untaan te pirisuwan su insangyew ku heini is lalag.
Ampù kew zaan he metevangi a te Megbevayà wey ku ikepesavut heini is lalag te hustu he paag̵i.
Purungi niw, menge suled, te minsan keenu he timpu is ulaula niw ziyà te menge etew he wazè pa medtuu ki Kristu su wey meketuu sikandan te Lalag te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he layun ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa te menge etew is menge lalag niw kandan ne kinahanglan daan he iyan niw keg̵iya kandan is menge lalag he zuen din pulus ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, ne egketuenan niw ke hengkey is hustu he ketezengan he idtavak diyà te kada sevaha he etew.

Is langun he nengehitavù kedì dini, ne egketuenan niw ziyà te ki Tikiku te sevaha he suled tew he utew minahal. Duma zey sikandin he sulug̵uen te Nengazen he utew metinumanen te ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà.
Edsug̵uen ku sikandin diyan te keniyu su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk dey ne wey zaan maawà is ebpekesamuk te g̵ehinawa niw tenged kenami.

Iyan duma ni Tikiku, si Unisimu, is sevaha zaan he suled tew he metinumanen daan te menge sug̵ù te Nengazen. Minahal zey zaan sikandin. Duma niw si Unisimu he tigKulusas. Edtudtulan kew zan te langun he neulaula zini.

Ebpengemusta keniyu si Eristarku he zuma ku he pirisu. Si Marcos, is id-ag̵ew ni Bernabe, ne ebpengemusta zaan keniyu. Gelg̵elawa niw sikandin emun ebpekeuma ziyan. Netuenan niw en is intelaan ku keniyu mehitenged kandin.

Ne elin daan ebpengemusta keniyu si Jesus he egngezanan daan ki Hustu. Heini is tetelu, si Eristarku, si Marcos wey si Hustu, ne iyan dà sikandan menge Hudiyu he zuma ku kayi te kedsengyawa ku te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ingkelipey sikandan te g̵ehinawa ku.

Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Ipapras. Duma niw zaan he tigKulusas he sulug̵uen ni Jesu Kristu. Layun kew zin id-ampù. Ed-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà he mebmelig-en wey meheg̵et is kedtuu niw ne wey meheg̵et daan is kedtumana niw te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Iyan igkekeg̵iya ku kayi ziyan te keniyu su egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he zekelà is kedhag̵ù ni Ipapras wey kew mezeyzey ne kenà iyan kew zà, kekenà, ragkes daan is menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya wey ziyà te inged he Hirepulis.
Si Lucas, is minahal tew he duktur, ne ebpengemusta zaan keniyu wey si Dimas.
Ipengemusta key zaan te menge suled tew ziyà te inged he Leudisiya. Si Nimpa zaan wey is menge tumutuu he ziyà edsimba te valey zin, ebpengemusta key zaan kandan.

Emun egkepasad niw is kebasa kayi ziyà te menge tumutuu ziyan, ne ipevasa niw zaan heini ziyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te Leudisiya. Ne sikan daan is surat ku ziyà te menge tigLeudisiya, sembayi niw ziyà te kandan wey niw mevasa.
Keg̵iya niw ki Erkipu he purungi zin beeli is ebpeveelan kandin te Nengazen su sulug̵uen sikandin te Megbevayà.
Siak si Pablo, ebpengemusta a keniyu. Tuus heini is kedsurata ku te ngazan ku he kediey he surat heini. Kenè niw lipati he pirisu a ne iampù a keniyu. Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Megbevayà.
Sikami si Pablo, si Silas, wey si Timoteo, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is menge tumutuu he menge tigTiselunika he g̵aked te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey g̵aked te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Megbevayà ne veg̵ayi kew zin te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Dekelà layun is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu ne layun dey sikiyu id-ampù.

Su emun ed-ampù key te Megbevayà he Amey tew kenè dey egkelipatan is kedtuu niw, wey is kebmahala niw, wey is kebperateng niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su egketuusan is kedtuu niw kandin pinaag̵i te ulaula niw, ne pinaag̵i te kedhag̵ù niw egketuusan daan is kebmahala niw kandin diyà te g̵ehinawa niw. Ne egketuusan daan is kebperateng niw kandin pinaag̵i te kebmeinentusen niw.
Ne menge suled he minahal te Megbevayà, netuenan dey he pinilì kew zin

su impesavut dey keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, kenà pinaag̵i te lalag dey zà, kekenà, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Midheg̵et te Megbevayà dutun is kedsevuta zey kayi. Ne netuenan niw zaan ke hengkey is menge ulaula zey he meupiya wey kew mezeyzey hein diyan key te keniyu.

Ne sikiyu zaan, mid-iringan niw is mid-ulaula zey wey is mid-ulaula zengan te Nengazen tew he si Jesus su midawat niw is Lalag te Megbevayà minsan nekeag̵i kew te kemeresayan tenged te kedawat niw. Ne minsan pa te nerasey kew, nelipey kew zed tenged te ked-ulini keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Tenged kayi iyan kew ed-iringan te langun he menge zuma he tumutuu ziyan te prubinsya he Mesidunya wey ziyà daan te prubinsya he Gerisya.

Ebpuun diyan nekeeneb is Lalag te Nengazen, kenà diyan dà te prubinsya he Mesidunya wey ziyà te prubinsya he Gerisya, kekenà, is menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei, nezineg dan is tudtul mehitenged te kedtuu niw te Megbevayà. Wazè en kinahanglan he ibpenudtul zey pa ziyà te menge etew is kedtuu niw.

Nezineg dan en ne iyan sikandan ebpenudtul mehitenged te kegelg̵elawa niw kenami. Ebpenudtul zan he mid-engkezan niw kes ked-azap te menge kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen. Mid-engkezan niw kun wey kew mekeazap te tutuu he Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen.

Su edteg̵azan niw kun is kedlikù te Anak din he ebpuun te langit. Iyan si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà he mibanhew zin. Iyan si Jesus he midlibri kenitew te silut wey kiw mekeliyu te ebpekeuma he kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà.
Menge suled, netuenan niw en he mibpulus is kedhendiyan dey te inged niw.

Su wazè niw melipati is nehitavù kenami ziyà te inged he Pilipus hein wazè key pa mekeuma ziyan te Tiselunika. Wazè key zan urami te kebpemug̵el wey te kebpeelimungawi. Ne minsan pa zutun, tenged te kedtavang te Megbevayà wazè key mahandek he ebpenudtul ziyan te keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun diyà te kandin, iyan, nereg̵enan key utew.
Is kedwali zey ziyà te menge etew, ne kenà ebpuun te sayep wey te meremerik he tuyù. Kenè key edtarùtarù te minsan hentei.

Nezawat key te Megbevayà ne insarig din kenami is kebpesavut te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne tenged kayi ebpenudtul key. Kenè dey iyan tuyù is kebpenunuata te menge etew su iyan tuyù dey is kebpenunuata te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin metau he ebpenggezam kenitew wey metueni he hustu is tuyù dey.
Netuenan niw he kes menge lalag dey, kenà kedigdig dà. Kenà ibpenapì kes mid-ulaula zey ziyan. Is Megbevayà, iyan ebpeketistig̵us kayi.
Wazè key mebpezalig keniyu; wazè key zaan mebpezalig te zuma. Geina te menge epustul key ni Kristu, egkehimu he edsug̵ùsug̵ù key zaan keniyu, iyan, wazè dey heini ul-ulaha.
Mibpurungan dey sikiyu; iring key te iney he metulanged te menge anak din.

Utew kew mahal kayi te g̵ehinawa zey, umba kenà iyan dey zà egkesuatan is kedweliyi zey keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà, kekenà, ebpekid-uunungen key en daan keniyu su utew zey sikiyu minahal.

Menge suled, kenè niw vuwa egkelipatan is kedhag̵ù dey ziyan te kebaal. Su hein impesavut dey keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà, mibpenigudu key zaan medhag̵ù te maandew se mezukilem wey key mekekuwa te keuyag̵an dey wey key kenà mekesamuk keniyu.

Ebpeketistig̵us kew, ne ebpeketistig̵us daan is Megbevayà he hein diyan key te keniyu te nemeketuu wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula zey, kekenà, metazeng key wey metinumanen key te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Netuenan niw he is mid-ulaula zey ziyà te kada sevaha keniyu, ne meupiya su iring te ed-ul-ulahan te amey ziyà te menge anak din.

Midsembag̵an dey sikiyu; iyan key midlangan te g̵ehinawa niw ne midhengyuan dey sikiyu he med-ulaula kew te sungkad te egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin midhimu keniyu he tumutuu wey kew zin mehedii wey kew tulusa.

Ne elin daan layun dey ibpeselemati te Megbevayà is: hein impesavut dey keniyu is Lalag te Megbevayà, midawat niw su nesavut niw he Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenà lalag te etew zà duen. Su pinaag̵i te lalag din egkelig-enan is kedtuu tew te nemeketuu kandin.

Kes menge g̵aked te Megbevayà he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu, neiringan niw sikandan. Su iring te kedresaya kandan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu, midrasey kew zaan te menge zuma niw he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Is menge Hudiyu, iyan kes midhimatey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan wey te Nengazen tew zaan he si Jesus. Ne mid-avug key zan daan. Utew supak is menge ulaula zan te egkesuatan te Megbevayà,

ne iring te egkuntedahan dan is tivuuk he menusiyà, su edsemuken key zan wey zey kenà ikesangyew is Lalag te Megbevayà he igkelibri te silut te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne ebpeniguduwan dan te ebaal is taman te egkehimu zan he salà. Ne g̵untaan in-andam en is silut kandan te Megbevayà.
Ne sikami, menge suled, hein neewaan dey sikiyu seled te meg̵aan dà, wazè dey sikiyu melipati, kekenà, utew key ebulunga keniyu ne layun key pezem egkesuat he ebpenumbaley ziyan.
Ne tenged kayi layun dey egkeisip he edlikù key pezem diyan te Tiselunika. Siak si Pablo, layun ku egkeisip is iring dutun, iyan, mibangen key ni Setanas, umba wazè key mekelaus.

Umba egkesuatan ku he ed-uman a ebpenumbaley ziyan su tenged keniyu utew meheg̵et is kebperetenga zey te kedlikù ni Jesus su iyan kew igkelipey zey. Tenged keniyu kenè key egkeeled keuzemà, kekenà, igkezantal zey is kedtuu niw emun ed-etuvang kiw ki Jesus dutun te kedlikù din.
Uya, iyan kew iyan igkezantal zey; iyan kew igkelipey zey.
Ne hein kenè dey en egkeantus is kebulunga zey keniyu, sikami is tetelu, mid-isip dey he meupiya ke ebpetag̵ak is dezuwa kenami ziyà te inged he Etinas.

Ne zutun midsug̵ù dey ziyan si Timoteo he suled tew wey sulug̵uen daan te Megbevayà te kegkesengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu. Iyan insug̵ua zey kandin su wey zin meheg̵eti is kedtuu niw ne wey kew zin mesembag̵i
su wey kenà meliveg is minsan hentei keniyu tenged te kebpesipelahi keniyu te menge etew. Netuenan niw en he sikitew is tumutuu, imbanglis kenitew te Megbevayà is kemeresayan.
Hein diyan key pa te keniyu migkeg̵iyan dey sikiyu he zuen timpu he egkeumahan kiw te kemeresayan, ne netuenan niw g̵untaan he netuman en.

Ne tenged kayi hein kenè ku en egkeantus is kegkeipeng ku keniyu, midsug̵ù ku ziyan si Timoteo wey ku metueni ke nemenumenu en is kedtuu niw. Nahandek a su kela ke nepenulayan kew ni Setanas ne naawà is pulus te kedhag̵ù dey ziyan te keniyu.

Ne iyan pa kebpekeuma ni Timoteo he ebpuun diyan te Tiselunika. Ne meupiya is tudtul zin he mezesen ded is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà wey ebmahalen niw zaan diyà te g̵ehinawa niw is menge zuma niw. Ne iyan daan tudtul zin is: utew meupiya is gehinawa niw kenami, ne ebulungen kew kenami iring te kebulunga zey zaan keniyu.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, minsan neseeng key wey nemereg̵enan key, utew key nelipey tenged keniyu wey tenged te kedtuu niw.
Ne g̵untaan mibmeupiya en utew is kebpekesavuk dey su netuenan dey en he mezesen ded bes is kedtuu niw te Nengazen.
Kenè pa hustu is kebpenigudu zey kebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged keniyu, su utew zey sikiyu ingkelipey. Iyan ebpeketistig̵us kayi is Megbevayà.
Su maandew wey mezukilem ebpenigudu key ed-ampù he itug̵ut din he memeked-uuma kiw en maan wey zey meheg̵et is kedtuu niw ke zuen din kurang.
Berekati te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he meg̵aan key mekehendiyan te keniyu.
Berekati te Nengazen he med-iseg is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te uman sevaha keniyu wey is langun he etew, iring te utew mezesen is kebmahala zey keniyu.

Berekati zin daan he mebmelig-en kew te kedtuu niw su wey wazà igkesewayi keniyu te menge g̵aked te Megbevayà emun diyè kew ed-etuvang te Amey tew he Megbevayà dutun te kebpekeuma te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he edumahan te langun he tumutuu kandin.

Ne g̵untaan, menge suled, tenged te kegkesevaha tew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, duen ebuyuen dey wey edhengyuen dey ziyan te keniyu. Impenurù dey keniyu is ed-ul-ulahan he egkesuatan te Megbevayà, ne mid-ulaula niw en. Iyan, edhengyuen dey keniyu he ipeiseg niw pa is ked-ul-ulaha niw kayi.
Netuenan niw is insug̵ù dey keniyu he ebpuun te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà is: kinahanglan he zait is menge ulaula niw te etew he g̵aked din. Kinahanglan he kenè niw hileveti is kenè niw esawa.
Kinahanglan he is uman sevaha keniyu te menge maama, ne mebpengesawa te paag̵i he meupiya wey kenà meremerik,
ne kenà tenged te egkeveyveyaan sikandin te suat te lawa zin, su iyan heeyan egkeulaula te menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he ebpekesalà wey ed-akal te zuma zin pinaag̵i te menge ulaula he iring kayi. Su edsilutan te Megbevayà is ed-ulaula te iring dutun. Heini impurung dey ipenurù keniyu.
Su nehimu kiw te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu kandin su wey mehimu is menge ulaula tew he zait te etew he g̵aked din. Kenà iyan din egkesuatan he meremerik is menge ulaula tew.

Emun ebpesegdanen niw heini is penurù ku keniyu, kenè niw iyan dà egkepesagdan is penurù te etew, kekenà, iyan niw egkepesagdan is penurù te Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin kes mibeg̵ey kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Ne wazè en kinahanglan he ibpenurù ku pa keniyu he mahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is menge zuma niw he tumutuu su impenurù en heini keniyu te Megbevayà.

Netuenan ku he ebmahalen niw en is menge tumutuu ziyà te tivuuk he prubinsya he Mesidunya. Ne edhengyuan dey pa sikiyu, menge suled, he ipeiseg niw pa is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te langun.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su iyan layun pen-ahaa niw is melinew he kebpekesavuk. Tegteg̵ami te uman sevaha is kandin dà he vaal. Medhag̵ù sikandin wey zin mekuwa is igkeuyag din. Daan heini he insug̵ù dey keniyu.
Ne emun ebeelan niw heini edtehuzen kew te menge etew he kenè pa tumutuu, ne zutun kenè en daan kinahanglan he ebpekevuyù kew te igkeuyag niw ziyà te minsan hentei.

Menge suled, egkesuatan dey he metueni niw is egkeulaula te menge tumutuu he minatey en su wey kew kenà meseeng iring te kegkeseeng te zuma he menge etew he kenè dan egkeperateng he egkevanhew sikandan.
Midtuu kiw he mibpatey si Jesus ne nevanhew ne edlikù keuzemà. Iring din daan kes menge tumutuu he minatey en su ebenhawen ne ibpezuma sikandan te Megbevayà ki Jesus keuzemà te kedlikù din.
Lalag en te Nengazen heini is egkeg̵iyen dey keniyu ne iyan is: sikitew is uuyag pa keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù te Nengazen, kenè kiw egkehuna te menge tumutuu he minatey en.

Su ebpuun te langit ebpenaug is Nengazen he edtawag kenitew, ne egkezineg tew is ked-umew te lavew he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà wey is budyung he ibpezag̵ing te Megbevayà. Ne egkehuna egkevanhew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu he nemematey en.
Ne human kiw is menge uuyag pa, ebpekezuma kiw zaan kandan diyà te menge g̵apun su edtelavuk kiw te Nengazen diyà te zivavew. Ne zutun kenè kiw en ebpekesuwey te Nengazen te wazà pidtemanan.
Umba ipedlilipayè niw heini is egkeg̵iyen ku.
Menge suled, kenè en kinahanglan he edseysayen dey pa keniyu kayi te surat is menge andew wey menge timpu te kegketuman kayi te menge midtagnà.
Su netuenan niw en he iring te tekawen he ebpekeuma ke mezukilem is kegketuman te andew te kedlimas te Nengazen, su egketingkemed is menusiyà.

Ne egkehitavù te timpu he kunaan te menge etew ke melinew is langun wey nelig-enan sikandan. Ne segugunà dutun egkeg̵erà sikandan. Utew meg̵aan; iring te kedlepew te velilit diyà te ed-anak. Ne wazà edresik dutun he minsan sevaha.
Ne sikiyu, menge suled, wazè kew mulà diyà te merusirem. Kenè kew mulà egkengetingkemed te andew te kedlimas te Nengazen iring te egkengetingkemed is menge etew te tekawen. Kenè kew iyan iring dutun.
Su sakup kew mulà te merayag wey te maandew,
Umba kinahanglan he kenà iring te kedlipezeng is ulaula tew su iring kayi is ulaula te zuma he etew he wazà meketuu. Kinahanglan he ed-andam kiw ne ed-eg̵enen tew is menge mezaat he suat tew.
Sikan is edlipezeng, edlipezeng te mezukilem, ne sikan is egkelangut, egkelangut daan te mezukilem.

Iyan, sikitew mulà is nesakup te maandew, kinahanglan he ed-eg̵enen tew is menge mezaat he suat tew. Idsun-ud tew is limbutung he iyan is kedtuu tew te Megbevayà wey is kebmahala tew zini te g̵ehinawa tew te menge zuma tew. Ne iring te kalù tew te sundaru is kedhemeni tew te kebperateng tew te kedlibriya te Megbevayà kenitew te silut.
Su is Megbevayà, wazè din ivanglis kenitew is silut, kekenà, midluwas kiw zin pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne minsan ke uuyag kiw pa wey ke minatey kiw en be zutun te kedlikù ni Kristu, duen tew en gihapun untung he wazà pidtemanan duma kandin su iyan heini ketezengan ke maan is mibpehimatey sikandin.
Ne g̵eina te netuenan niw en heini peliplipayè kew ne lig-eni niw is kedtuu te uman sevaha keniyu, iring te neveelan niw en.
Ne menge suled, sikan is edhag̵ù te ked-uwit dan keniyu, kes menge eg̵alen niw he mibpilì te Nengazen wey sikandan is ebpenurù keniyu, edhengyuan dey sikiyu he tehuza niw sikandan.
Kinahanglan he utew niw sikandan tehuza wey mahala tenged te menge vaal zan diyan te keniyu. Ne kinahanglan he melinew is kedepitè niw te kada sevaha.

Ne iyan daan idhangyù dey keniyu, menge suled, is: keg̵iyi niw is menge peg̵ulen he medterebahu zan. Sembag̵i niw is egkengehandek, lig-eni niw is menge meg̵uyà is kedtuu, ne kinahanglan he mebmepelevayen kew te langun kandan.
Kenè niw itug̵ut he zuen minsan hentei keniyu he ebales te mezaat, kekenà, mebpepurpurungè kew layun. Purungi niw zaan is minsan hentei he etew.
Ne g̵eina te nekidsevaha kew ki Jesu Kristu, iyan ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà is: layun kew medlipey, layun kew med-ampù, wey layun kew mebpeselamat te Megbevayà minsan hengkey is egkeulaula niw.
Kenè niw verawa is menge sug̵ù keniyu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Kenè niw pesegdana is menge lalag te mid-ulinan,
kekenà, gezami niw is langun ne tipig̵i niw is meupiya.
Likayi niw is minsan hengkey he mezaat.

Is Megbevayà, ne iyan ebeg̵ey te kelinew, berakat he purungi zin lumpiyuwi is ulaula niw. Lig-eni zin is tivuuk he g̵ehinawa niw, isip niw, wey lawa niw su para wazà igkesewayi keniyu keuzemà te kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Ne edhimuwen heini te Megbevayà su iyan sikandin midhimu keniyu he menge tumutuu kandin ne egkeserig̵an sikandin.
Menge suled, iampù key zaan keniyu.
Pengemustaha niw te limù is langun he menge suled tew ziyan.
Ibeg̵ey ku keniyu is sug̵ù te Megbevayà he vesaha niw heini is surat diyà te langun he menge suled tew ziyan.
Ikeg̵eg̵awi kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Sikami, si Pablo, si Silas, wey si Timoteo, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is menge tigTiselunika he g̵aked te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey g̵aked te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne veg̵ayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Menge suled, kinahanglan he layun dekelà is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Ne hustu heini su layun dekelà is ked-uswag te kedtuu niw wey layun daan ed-iseg is kebmahala niw te uman sevaha he menge zuma niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw.

Ne tenged kayi emun ebpenumbelayan dey is menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyà te minsan hendei he inged, ebentug̵en dey sikiyu tenged te kedsarig niw te Megbevayà wey tenged te kebmeinentusen niw te menge kemeresayan wey kemereg̵enan he egkeseg̵azan niw.

Heini is kedsarig niw wey ked-antus niw, ne iyan tuus he metazeng is kukuman te Megbevayà su pinaag̵i te memerasey he egkeantus niw, ibpeehè din he zait kew he idragkes dutun te menge etew he edhedian din.
Metazeng is menge ulaula te Megbevayà ne edresayen din keuzemà is menge etew he midrasey keniyu g̵untaan.
Ke ibpeg̵awag̵awa keuzemà is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he ebpuun te langit, id-awè din diyan te keniyu wey zini zaan te kenami is kemeresayan he egkeantus tew g̵untaan.
Egkukumbalà sikandin te iring te regreg wey edumahan te menge mekeg̵eg̵ehem he menge velinsug̵uen din.
Dutun, edsilutan din sikandan is wazà medtetenged te Megbevayà wey wazà mebpemineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Iyan silut din kandan is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Egkesuwey zan is Nengazen wey is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag din.

Egkehitavù heini keuzemà dutun te andew te kedlikù din. Iyan idlikù din dini te kelibutan su wey mezalig sikandin te menge etew he mibpesakup kandin. Dutun, ne ebentug̵en sikandin te langun he menge tumutuu kandin wey sikiyu zaan su neketuu kew te impesavut dey keniyu.

Tenged kayi layun dey sikiyu id-ampù. Ed-ampù key he himuwa te Megbevayà is menge ulaula niw he zait te kedtuu niw kandin. Ed-ampù key he pinaag̵i te g̵ehem din himuwa zin he tumana niw is minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula he iyan en tuyù niw tenged te midtuu kew kandin.
Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkezalig niw is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne edelig̵en kew zin daan. Egkehimu heini pinaag̵i zà te g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayè tew wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne g̵untaan, menge suled, ibpesavut dey keniyu is kedlikù keuzemà te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey is kedtulusa zin kenitew.

Edhengyuan dey sikiyu he kenè kew petuluy meliveg wey mahandek emun egkezineg niw is tudtul he neuma en is andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Kenè kew meliveg kayi minsan ke lalag he ibpinted kun, wey ke tudtul zey kun be, wey minsan surat he zini kun ebpuun te kenami.

Kinahanglan he kenè niw tuuwi is minsan hengkey he lalag te minsan hentei he teruen he etew. Su haazà is andew, ne kenè pa egketuman emun wazè pa mehitavù is kedsukul te menge etew ziyà te Megbevayà. Ne zutun ibpeg̵awag̵awa sikan is etew he lavew he mesinupaken. Iyan imbanglis kandin is kegkeimpirnu.

Edsukulan din wey edlevawan din pezem is minsan hengkey he mid-isip te menge etew he megbevayà wey is minsan hengkey he ed-ezapen dan. Ne ebpinuu sikandin minsan diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà su egkeg̵iyen din he iyan sikandin Megbevayà.
Wazè niw pa vuwa melipati he migkag̵i ku en heini is langun hein diyan e pa te keniyu.
Netuenan niw ke hengkey is ed-eg̵en dutun te utew mesinupaken he etew su wey kenè pa sikandin mekepeg̵awag̵awa te kenè pa hustu he timpu.
Su is gehem dutun te utew mesinupaken, egemiten din en guntaan he meeles. Ne ebpekeeles-eles pa sikandin taman te kenè pa id-awà sikan is ed-eg̵en kandin.

Ne zutun, human ebpeg̵awag̵awa sikan is utew mesinupaken he etew. Iyan, dutun te kebpekeuma ni Jesus edhimetayan sikandin ni Jesus pinaag̵i te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag din; edhiyupen din dà ne segugunà ebpatey, ne egkeawà is gehem din.
Emun ebpeg̵awag̵awa keuzemà sikan is mesinupaken he etew egemiten din is gehem ni Setanas ne ibpeehè din is gehem din pinaag̵i te minsan hengkey he tarù he menge singyal wey egkein-inuwan.

Edterteruan din te minsan hengkey he kelelalung he paag̵i sikan is menge etew he kenà ebpekelikey te silut. Umba kenè dan ebpekelikey te silut su wazè dan medawat te tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan ebpekeveg̵ey kandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne tenged dutun idtug̵ut te Megbevayà he meekali sikandan pinaag̵i te ketetarù he ebpekeakal su wey zan metuuwi is kenà tutuu.
Ne tenged dutun, edsilutan te Megbevayà is langun he kenà edtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, su iyan igkesuat dan is mezaat he ulaula.

Menge suled he minahal te Nengazen, kenà egkehimu he kenà dekelà layun is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Su zengan hein midlimbag din is langun, mibpilì kew zin wey kew zin melibri te silut pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he iyan ingkehimu niw he menge g̵aked din, wey pinaag̵i te kedtuu niw te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Midhimu kew zin he menge tumutuu kandin pinaag̵i te kebpesevuta zey keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su wey kew mekeambit te utew kegkelavew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, pekezesen kew te kedtuu niw, ne hemeni niw is langun he impenurù dey keniyu pinaag̵i te kedwali zey hein diyan key wey pinaag̵i zaan te kebpesurati zey keniyu.

Berakat he lipaya kew wey lig-eni kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey te Amey tew he Megbevayà su wey meupiya is langun he menge vaal niw wey is langun he menge lalag niw. Mahal kiw layun diyà te g̵ehinawa zin ne pinaag̵i te g̵ag̵ew zin kenitew zuen tew igkelipey he wazè din pidtemanan wey zuen tew zaan utew meupiya he ebperetengen.
Ne g̵untaan, menge suled, iampù key keniyu wey meg̵aan mekeeneb ne mezawat diyà te minsan hendei is kebpesevuta zey te Lalag te Nengazen iring te kegkezewata niw kayi ziyan te keniyu.
Iampù key zaan wey key mekeliyu te pesipala te menge kenà metazeng wey lalung he menge etew su mezakel is kenà edtuman te lalag din.
Iyan, metinumanen mulà is Nengazen te lalag din, ne iyan sikandin ebantey wey edlig-en keniyu wey kew kenà mekeizi ni Setanas.
Tenged te kedsarig dey te Nengazen, netuenan dey he ebpenigudu kew pa edtuman te menge sug̵ù dey keniyu.
Berakat he ipesavut keniyu te Nengazen ke sengemenu kew zin kemahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Megbevayà wey himuwa zin he veg̵ayi kew ni Kristu te kelig-en wey niw maantus is kemereg̵enan.

Menge suled, tenged te keg̵ehem te ngazan te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he imbeg̵ey kenami, duen menge idsug̵ù dey keniyu. Iyan is: kenè kew mebpekiduma te tumutuu he tepulen he kenà edsunud te impenurù dey keniyu.
Netuenan niw en is egkeveelan niw wey kew mekeiring te ebeelan dey. Su hein diyan key te keniyu kenè key tepulen.
Wazè key mekevuyù te egkeenen dey ziyà te minsan hentei, kekenà, mibeyazan dey. Maandew wey mezukilem midhag̵ù key mebaal su wey kew kenà medlised tenged kenami.
Duen dey ketenged te kebpesuhul keniyu, iyan, wazè key mebpesuhul, kekenà, midterebahu key su wey zuen ulaula zey he egkeiringan niw.
Hein diyan key pa iyan penurù dey keniyu is: sikan is kenà edterebahu, kenà ipekaan.
Impenudtul kenami he zuen diyan menge zuma niw he menge tepulen. Kenè dan kun edterebahu, kekenà, edsemuken dan is terebahu te menge zuma zan.
Tenged te keg̵ehem te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, idsug̵ù dey wey idhangyù dey kandan he kinahanglan he medterebahu zan ne kenè dan medsamuk su wey zan meketig̵ayun te igkeuyag dan.
Ne sikiyu zaan, menge suled, kenè kew meevek te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he tumutuu he kenà ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù he insurat dey kayi te surat, kilelaa niw ne kenè kew mebpekiduma kandin su wey meeled sikandin,
iyan, kenè niw isipa he kuntada niw, kekenà, penurua niw he iring te suled niw.
Berakat he iveg̵ey keniyu te Nengazen is melinawen he g̵ehinawa te minsan keenu he timpu wey te minsan hengkey is kebpekesavuk niw. Iyan sikandin ebeg̵ey te kelinew. Dumahi kew is langun te Nengazen.
Iyan a si Pablo; impirma ku kayi is ngazan ku. Iyan heini tuus he idsavuk ku te langun he menge surat ku, wey iyan heini paag̵i te kedsurat ku.
Sikiyu is langun, ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Sikew, Timoteo he iring te tutuu he anak ku tenged te kedtuu nu ki Kristu, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iyan a si Pablo he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, sulug̵uen e zin. Nehimu a he epustul mehitenged te sug̵ù te Megbevayà he iyan midlibri kenitew te silut wey mehitenged te sug̵ù ni Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin egkeserig̵an ta.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew ka wey kehizuwi ka te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veg̵ayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Ed-umanan ku egkeg̵iya kenikew is sambag ku hein mid-awà a ziyan pehendiyà te Mesidunya. Iyan is: kenè ka med-awà diyan te Ipisu. Iyan idsembag̵i ku kenikew su zuen menge etew ziyan he kinahanglan he zewaya nu. Dewaya nu he med-engked dan te kebpenurù te menge sayep he tuluuwen

wey med-engked dan te ked-istudyu te menge sayep he menge g̵ug̵ud, wey te menge melug̵ayad he g̵ug̵ud te kepuun te menge etew. Su emun iyan heini ed-istudyuwan dan ebpekidlewanè dan dà ke hengkey is hustu. Kenà egkehimu he pinaag̵i kayi egketuenan ta is ibpesavut te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kedtuu.

Ne kinahanglan he iyan ketezengan ke maan is idsug̵ù nu kandan heini su wey zan mahala is menge zuma zan diyà te g̵ehinawa zan. Ne kenà egkehimu he hustu is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta emun wazè ki melumpiyuwi te Megbevayà duen te menge salè ta. Kinahanglan he iyan dà ed-ul-ulahan ta is netuenan ta he hustu ne kinahanglan daan he tutuu is kedtuu ta te tutuu he tuluuwen ne zutun human hustu is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta.
Duen diyan menge etew he wazè dan meseg̵ipà heini. Iyan dan impelavi is kebpekidlewanà mehitenged te wazè din pulus.

Su minsan pa te egkesuatan dan pezem he menge menunudlù sikandan te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises wazè dan hanew te egkeg̵iyen dan wey wazè dan mesavut is tuluuwen dan he idteg̵el zan diyà te zuma he menge etew.
Netuenan ta he meupiya is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises ke hustu is kegemita ta kayi.

Iyan, wazà isug̵ù heini su wey mezawey is menge metazeng he etew, kekenà, insug̵ù heini su wey mezawey is menge mesinupaken, menge kenà metinumanen, menge kenà edtuu te Megbevayà, menge selaan, menge lalung wey menge kenà edtahud te Megbevayà, menge ebunù te amey wey iney zan, menge teremunù,

menge egkevut te kenè dan esawa, menge maama he egkeerig̵an te iring dan he maama, menge menggeg̵ebpà, menge teruen, menge ebpen-ulug te kewsa wey is minsan hentei he ebpekesupak is ulaula zin te hustu he tuluuwen.

Ne heini is hustu he tuluuwen, ne ebpuun te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew zekelà he g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Is Megbevayà he iyan dait he edelig̵en, insarig din kedì heini is tudtulanen wey ku mesangyew.

Ebpeselematan ku is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su mibeg̵ayan e zin te zesen wey ku metuman heini is ebpeveelan din kedì. Mid-isip e zin he metinumanen ne tenged kayi intezù e zin he sulug̵uen din.

Dengan, mezaat is menge lalag ku mehitenged kandin; midrasey ku is menge sumusundan din ne midsumpalit ku sikandin. Ne minsan pa zutun, nehizuwan e zin su nehimu ku is menge mezaat he vaal ku tenged te wazè ku pa metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen wey wazè ku pa sikandin tuuwi.
Ne kenà dutun dà taman su utew ad ingkeg̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà ne g̵untaan neketuu ad ki Jesu Kristu ne utew en sikandin mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku.

Duen erubasa he utew tutuu ne kinahanglan he tuuwi te minsan hentei; ne iyan is: “Midhendini si Jesu Kristu te kelibutan wey zin libriya te silut is menge mekesesalà.” Ne siak, iyan a tuwas he lalung te langun kandan.

Ne minsan pa zutun, nehizuwan a g̵ihapun te Megbevayà su wey pinaag̵i te kebpelevaya zin kedì te utew lalung, ikepezayag ni Jesu Kristu he utew mepelevayen sikandin. Impezayag din heini su wey mesavut heini te langun he menge etew he edtuu kandin keuzemà ne ebeg̵ayan din te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Kes sebsevaha zà he Megbevayà, kenà egkeahà. Iyan sikandin hadì te minsan hengkey ne wazè din kemetayen; berakat he tehuza wey zelig̵a sikandin te wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne sikew, Timoteo he anak ku, edteleenan ku sikew he ipenurù nu te menge etew heini is migkag̵i ku. Sungkad heini te netagnà dengan mehitenged kenikew. Ne idtelaan ku zaan he sumalà haazà is netagnà, pekezesen ka te kedsundaru nu tenged ki Jesu Kristu.

Iyan gumaan nu is kedtuu nu te tutuu he tuluuwen wey is kedtumana nu te langun he netuenan nu he hustu. Duen menge etew he wazè dan tumana is netuenan dan he hustu ne tenged kayi nezeetan en is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà.
Duma kayi si Himinyu wey si Alejandro. Impevayàbayè ku si Setanas kandan wey ikepenurù kandan he kenè dan sumpelita is Megbevayà.

Ne iyan idhuna ku idhangyù is: kinahanglan he vuyua te menge tumutuu is egkinehenglanen dan diyà te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he iampù dan is langun he menge etew wey peselemati zan te Megbevayà is gag̵ew zin kandan.
Iampù dan daan is menge hadì wey is minsan hentei he zuen din keg̵ehem su wey mebmelinew is ked-ubpè tew wey wazà samuk te kebpurungi tew kedtumana te egkesuatan te Megbevayà wey te hustu he ulaula.
Umba idhangyù ku heini su meupiya is ked-ampù he iring kayi. Iyan heini igkesuat te Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew
su iyan din egkesuatan is wey melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà ne wey zan daan metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen.
Sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà, ne sebsevaha zà daan is datù diyà te teliwazà te Megbevayà wey menge etew, ne iyan datù tew is etew he si Jesu Kristu.

Imbelavag din is untung din ne mibpehimatey su wey zin mevelukasi is langun he menge etew. Ne pinaag̵i kayi, dutun te hustu he timpu, impeehè din he egkesuatan te Megbevayà he melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà.

Ne tenged kayi intezù e zin he epustul ne midsug̵ù e zin wey ku ipenurù heini. Kenà tarù heini is egkeg̵iyen ku, kekenà, tutuu. Midtezù e zin wey ku mepenurù is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu su wey zan meketuu te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Ne tenged kayi, is menge maama ziyà te langun he menge inged he meheg̵et is ked-engkezi zan te mezaat he ulaula, egkesuatan ku he med-ampù dan diyà te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he wazà pauk dan te menge zuma zan wey wazè dan keduwazuwa.

Ne is menge vahi zaan, kinahanglan he hustu is kegemita zan te ugelingen dan. Kenè dan ipezalig, kekenà, kinahanglan he metau sikandan he egkeeled. Kenà utew subra is kebmekempeta zan te ulu zan pinaag̵i te vulvul zan. Kenè dan megamit te menge mahal iring te vulawan wey menge velieg he pirlas wey menge mahal he ugelingen,
kekenà, kinahanglan he iyan idelig̵a kandan is menge meupiya he ulaula. Iyan heini zait he ed-ul-ulahan te vahi he egkag̵i he ed-azap sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan is menge vahi he mebpurung dan mebpemineg te penurù kandan he kenè dan megkag̵ikag̵i wey kinahanglan he layun mebpezumazuma sikandan te menge egalen dan.
Kenè ku idtug̵ut he iyan ebpenurù is bahi. Kenè ku zaan idtug̵ut he ebayàbayà is bahi te maama. Mebpemineg dà sikandin,
su iyan nehuna he nelimbag si Adan ne human si Ibà.
Ne kenà iyan si Adan neekalan ni Setanas, kekenà, iyan si Ibà neekalan ne tenged dutun nekesupak sikandin te intelaan kandan.

Ne minsan pa te iyan haazà, egkelibri g̵ihapun is menge vahi te silut pinaag̵i te ked-anak te vatà ke kenè dan edlekaan is kedtuu zan, wey is kebmahala zan te menge zuma zan wey is menge ulaula zan he igkesuat te Megbevayà wey is ked-erengana zan te langun he ed-ul-ulahan dan.
Utew tutuu is erubasa he edhenduen te: Is maama he egkesuat he iyan sikandin ed-uwit te menge tumutuu, utew meupiya haazà is terebahu he egkesuatan din.

Iyan, is ed-uwit te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi kandin. Sevaha zà is esawa zin ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan he egketengkaan layun is ed-ul-ulahan din; metau sikandin he ed-isip te hustu wey telehuzen sikandin. Kinahanglan he meelima sikandin te menge meg̵eliyug din. Kinahanglan daan he metau he ebpenurù.
Kenà sikandin lelenguten; kenà sikandin ebpemeg̵espeg̵es, kekenà, metulanged sikandin. Edlikayan din is samuk ne kenà susuaten te selapì.
Kinahanglan he meupiya is ked-uwita zin te esawa zin wey menge anak din. Kinahanglan he menge mepeveyveyaan wey metinehuzan layun is menge anak din kandin.
Su is maama he kenà metau he ed-uwit te esawa zin wey menge anak din, ebmenumenu sikandin he ed-uwit te menge etew he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà?
Ne kinahanglan daan he kenà sikandin beg̵u pa he tumutuu, su kela ke mehimu he mepelevawen ne egkesilutan te Megbevayà iring te midsilutan si Setanas.
Kinahanglan he meupiya layun is menge ulaula zin su wey mehimu he telehuzen sikandin te menge etew he kenà tumutuu ki Kristu, su emun kenà, kela ke ituka zan ne egkeseleizan sikandin ni Setanas.
Ne iring din ded daan is menge diyekunu,
Kinahanglan he edhemenan dan te edtuu he kenà duwazuwa is menge tuluuwen he imbugnà kenitew te Megbevayà.
Ke zuen etew he ebpilien niw he diyekunu, kinahanglan he edsusiyen pa is menge ulaula zin. Ne emun wazà netuenan he mezaat he ulaula zin, egkehimu he ebpilien sikandin he diyekunu.

Iring din ded daan is bahi he esawa te diyekunu su kinahanglan he telehuzen sikandin. Kenà menge vereituk, kekenà, egketengkaan is ked-isipa zin te langun wey egkengeserig̵an te minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula.
Is diyekunu, ne kinahanglan he sevaha zà is esawa zin ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan daan he meupiya is ked-uwita zin te esawa zin wey menge anak din

su is diyekunu he meupiya is menge vaal zin te kedtavang din te menge tumutuu, telehuzen sikandin utew te menge etew ne egkehimu he kenè din igkehandek is kebpenurù din mehitenged te kedtuu zin ki Jesu Kristu.
Kayi te kedsurat ku, ebperetengen ku he meg̵aan e en ebpekepenumbaley ziyan te kenikew.
Umba ebpesuratan ku sikew su kela ke mesanggen a. Ne emun egkesanggen a egketuenan nu g̵ihapun ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan he zait tew te menge anak te Megbevayà. Iyan kiw iglisya,
Ne netuenan tew te langun he lavew pa te langun is imbugnà he tuluuwen he midtuuwan tew.
Mibpeetew si Kristu;
midtistig̵usan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he metazeng sikandin;
naahà sikandin te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà;
insangyew sikandin diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu;
duen menge tumutuu kandin dini te tivuuk he kelibutan;
midtulus sikandin pehendiyà te langit.

Utew keladu is impesavut te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu zuen menge etew he kenè en edtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, iyan ebpemineg̵en dan is impinted te menge teruen he menge mulin-ulin. Ebpemineg̵en dan is impenurù kandan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin
pinaag̵i te menge tarù te menge uvag kun tumutuu he kenè en ibmezaat te g̵ehinawa zan is menge mezaat he ulaula zan.

Ibpenurù dan he indawey te Megbevayà is kebpengesawa ne egkeg̵iyen dan he zuen menge egkeenen he indawey zaan. Iyan, heini is menge egkeenen, midlimbag te Megbevayà he egkeenen tew te menge tumutuu he nekesavut te tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne kinahanglan he ebpeselematan tew te Megbevayà emun egkeenen tew.
Meupiya is minsan hengkey he egkeenen he midlimbag te Megbevayà ne kinahanglan he kenè tew egkeg̵iyen he mezaat is minsan hengkey, kekenà, edewaten tew wey ebpeselematan tew.
Netuenan ta he meupiya is kegkeena ta kayi tenged te iyan migkag̵i te Megbevayà wey tenged te ebpeselematan tew.

Emun ibpenurù nu heini ziyà te menge zuma he tumutuu egkehimu ka he metinumanen he sulug̵uen ni Jesu Kristu. Ne egkeheg̵et is kedtuu nu pinaag̵i te ked-istudyu nu te tuluuwen tew wey pinaag̵i te kedhamen nu te hustu he impenurù kenikew.
Iyan, likayi nu is menge penurù he menge tarù he g̵ug̵ud he kenà dait te Megbevayà. Purungi nu tumana is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Duen deisek he pulus te kedlumbaza te lawa, iyan, utew zekelà is pulus te kedlumbaza te kedtuu ta su iyan ibmeupiya te kebpekesavuk tew minsan guntaan wey lavew en keuzemà ke ziyà ki en te langit.
Erubasa heini he utew tutuu ne kinahanglan he tuuwi te langun.

Tenged kayi ebpenigudu ki edhag̵ù wey metuuwi heini te langun he menge etew su nekesarig ki en te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin Menluluwas te langun he menge etew, lavew en is menge tumutuu kandin.
Heini is menge sug̵ù ku wey penurù ku kenikew, isug̵ù nu wey ipenurù nu zaan diyà te menge zuma nu.

Minsan pa te menguhed ke pa, kinahanglan he mezait ka he edtehuzen te minsan hentei; kinahanglan he iyan ka ed-iringan te menge tumutuu ki Kristu, ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he tegteg̵ami nu is kegkag̵ikag̵i nu, is ulaula nu, is kebmahala nu te langun, is kedsarig nu te Megbevayà, wey is kedlikayi nu te meremerik he ulaula.
Taman te kenè e pa ebpekeuma ziyan, iyan beeli nu is: besaha nu is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te menge etew. Sembag̵i nu wey penurua nu sikandan.
Kenè nu lipati haazà is ketau he imbeg̵ey zengan kenikew te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te kebpenuvadtuvad te ebpeneuven wey pinaag̵i te kedempaa kenikew te menge ebmeg̵urangen.
Hemeni nu wey purungi nu is kedtumana nu kayi te langun su wey metueni te langun is layun ked-iseg te kebpeketuman nu te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Purungi nu susiya is kenikew he ulaula wey is kebpenurù nu. Su emun edhemenan nu heini kenà iyan ke zà is egkelibri te silut, kekenà, pinaag̵i kenikew egkehimu he egkelibri zaan is menge etew he ebpememineg te ibpenurù nu.
Kenè nu bensag̵i is meg̵urang, kekenà, sembag̵i nu he iring te amey nu en. Sembag̵i nu zaan is menge menguhed he maama he iring te menge suled nu en.

Is menge vahi he meg̵urang en, sembag̵i nu zaan he iring te iney nu en wey is menge menguhed he vahi, sembag̵i nu sikandan he iring te menge etevey nu en. Ne kinahanglan he utew hustu is ked-isipa nu kayi ziyà te kandan.
Purungi niw is menge valu he vahi he wazè dan egkeserig̵an te keuyag̵an dan.
Ke zuen balu he vahi he zuen din menge anak wey menge apù, ipenurù nu kandan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan wey zan metahud is ginikanan dan wey zan meverasi. Iyan heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Ne sikan is balu he vahi he wazè din egkeserig̵an te keuyag̵an din, iyan din dà egkeserig̵an is Megbevayà, ne maandew wey mezukilem ed-ampù wey ebuyù te tavang diyà te Megbevayà.
Iyan, haazà is balu he vahi he iyan dà mulà egkesuatan din is menge kelibutanen he kelipey, minsan ke uuyag pa, iring sikandin te minatey en.
Heini is impenurù ku, ipurung nu isug̵ù diyà te menge tumutuu ziyan su wey wazà igkesewayi kandan.

Su ke zuen tumutuu he kenè din ed-elimahan is menge edsarig kandin, lavew en sikandan he ziyà ed-ubpà te valey zin, mid-engkezan din en is kedtumana zin te tuluuwen tew. Meupiya pa sikan is wazà meketuu kenà sikandin.
Kenè niw ilista is balu he vahi he minus pa te keneman is penuig̵an din. Kinahanglan he wazè din selselai is esawa zin.

Ne kinahanglan daan he nevantug sikandin tenged te menge vaal zin he meupiya iring te ked-elimahi te menge vatà, ked-elimahi te menge meg̵eliyug; nekelùlù sikandin te paa te menge tumutuu, midtavang sikandin te nengeseeng wey mibeelan din is minsan hengkey he menge meupiya.
Kenè niw ilista is menge menguhed he menge valu he vahi su zuen timpu he pinaag̵i te suat te lawa zan, egkesuat dan pa he ebpeesawa ebpeuman.
Ne pinaag̵i zutun ebpekesalè dan su kenè dan edtumanen is pesarig dan ki Kristu.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su melemu zan ebpetetapul ne layun dan ebpenumbaley ziyà te menge valey, ne kenà iyan dà haazà su egkehimu zan daan he vereituk, ne ebpekekevut dan te wazè dan kelavet duen ne ebenteenan dan is kenà meupiya he ebenteenan.
Ne tenged kayi egkesuatan ku he mebpeuman mebpeesawa is menge menguhed he valu he vahi su wey mekeanak sikandan ne med-elima te pemilya zan. Ne zutun wazà igkesewayi kandan te menge kuntada tew.
Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su zuen menge valu he vahi he mid-engkezan dan is kedsunud dan ki Kristu ne ebpezumdumahan dan si Setanas.

Ke zuen tumutuu he vahi he zuen menge keg̵apì din he valu he vahi, kinahanglan he elimahi zin. Kenè din serig̵i is duma he tumutuu he iyan ed-elima su wey kenà mesemuki is menge tumutuu he ed-elima te zuma he menge valu he vahi he wazà egkeserig̵an.

Is menge ebmeg̵urangen he meupiya is ked-uwita zan te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he isipa niw sikandan he zait he edtekepen is suhul kandan, lavew en sikandan is dekelà is baal zan te kedwali wey kebpenurù.

Iring sikandan te vaka he ibpeg̵unas su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is ibpeg̵unas he vaka, kinahanglan he kenè niw ebusalan,” ne heini zaan, “Is etew he edterebahu, dait sikandin he edsuhulan.”
Kenè niw pemineg̵a is edsumbung te ebmeg̵urangen te menge tumutuu ke wazà dezuwa wey ke tetelu ve he ebpeketistig̵us te idsumbung.
Is ebmeg̵urangen he layun ebpekesalà, sewaya nu ziyà te etuvangan te menge tumutuu su wey mahandek is menge zuma he ebmeg̵urangen.

Edteleenan ku sikew he purungi nu tumana heini is insug̵ù ku kenikew. Iyan ebpeketistig̵us kayi is Megbevayà, si Jesu Kristu, wey is menge pinilì din he velinsug̵uen. Kinahanglan he te minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan nu wazè nu zepig̵i he minsan hentei. Ke edhusey ka kinahanglan he iyan nu pemineg̵a kes ebpekevenar.
Kinahanglan he kenè nu zegdeg̵usuwi is kebpilì nu te ed-uwit te menge tumutuu su ke ebpekesalà sikandin iyan ka egkevesulan. Ne kinahanglan he wazà igkevesuli kenikew he iring kayi.
Ne elin daan sambag ku kenikew is: kenè nu iyan dà inuma is wahig, kekenà, inum ka zaan te zeisey he vinu su wey mevewii is getek nu wey is mezakel he zaru nu.

Duen menge etew he kenè en ebpekeeles is menge mezaat he vaal zan ne netuenan te langun te wazè pa sikandan imbistigaha. Ne zuen daan menge etew he nekeeles is menge mezaat he vaal zan ne wey zà heini egketueni ke ed-imbistigahan.

Ne iring din ded daan duen menge etew he kenà ebpekeeles is menge vaal zan he meupiya ne zuen daan menge etew he kenà egketuenan is menge vaal zan he meupiya, iyan, duen timpu he egketuenan ded daan heini.

Is menge sulug̵uen he tumutuu, kinahanglan he isipa zan is menge egalen dan he zait he edtehuzen dan te minsan keenu he timpu. Su pinaag̵i kayi wazà ebpekezezaat te zengeg te Megbevayà wey wazà ebpekesudì te kebpenurù dey.

Ke tumutuu ki Kristu is egalen, kinahanglan he kenà maawà is kedtahud kandin te sulug̵uen din he tumutuu tenged te telesuled dan pinaag̵i ki Kristu. Kinahanglan he tuwas pa he meupiya is baal te sulug̵uen din tenged te tumutuu wey minahal te Megbevayà sikan is egketevangan dan pinaag̵i te vaal zan. Iyan heini ipenurù nu wey ipesavut nu ziyà te menge tumutuu.
Ke zuen ebpenurù te selakew he tuluuwen ne kenè din edewaten is hustu he kebpenurù te Nengazen tew he si Kristu wey is tuluuwen mehitenged te kedtumana tew te egkesuatan te Megbevayà,

paglung sikandin he mepedeligen. Utew subra is kegkesuat din te menge winalì he kebpekidlawan mehitenged te menge lalag dà. Kayi ebpuun is kegkesina, is kebpekid-eg̵et, is kedsulà, is kedhaled he wazè din kepesikazan,
wey is kebpekidsemukà. Ulaula heini te menge etew he nelalung en is isip dan wey kenè dan en edewaten is tutuu he tuluuwen. Kunaan dan ke petig̵ayun is kebpesakup te Megbevayà.
Tutuu iyan he zekelà utew is pulus te kebpesakup te Megbevayà, iyan, dutun dà te etew he ibmeupiya en te g̵ehinawa zin is minsan deisey he egketig̵eyunan din.
Su te ked-enaka kenita wazè ta uwiten, wazè ta zaan egkeuwit emun ebpatey ki.
Ke zuen ta egkekaan wey ke zuen ta igkebisti, meupiya en is gehinawa ta.

Is menge etew he egkesuat he medsepian, melemu sikandan egkepenulayi wey egkeseleizi. Mezakel is menge suat dan he wazà pulus ne ebpekezezaat heini. Ebpekezezaat heini kandan wey egkehimu zaan he ibpatey zan heini.

Su ke zuen etew he susuaten te selapì ne egkehimu he egkeulaula kandin is minsan hengkey he mezaat. Pinaag̵i kayi neiniyug̵an te zuma is tuluuwen tew ne tenged kayi nehimu he utew mezakel is menge keseengan dan.

Ne sikew mulà, sulug̵uen ka te Megbevayà; likayi nu is langun he iring kayi he menge ulaula. Hemeni nu is metazeng he ulaula, is kedtumana te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, is kedsarig kandin, is kegkeg̵eg̵awi nu te menge zuma nu, is kebmeinentusen te menge supak dan, wey is kelinew te ulaula nu.
Penigudu ka he meupiya is kedlumbè nu,

Ebpeketistig̵us is Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu he ebpeketelteleenan ku sikew he purungi nu tumana he wazà sayep is insug̵ù ku kenikew taman te kenè pa edlikù is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Is Megbevayà, iyan ebpengelintau he meuyag is langun he menge linimbag din; ne si Jesus, iyan nekepenistig̵us mehitenged te tutuu he tuluuwen diyà te etuvangan ni Punsyu Pilatu.

Ibpelikù si Jesus te Megbevayà ke egketuman en is hustu he timpu. Iyan dà ebayàbayà te langun is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin kes meupiya is kebpekesavuk din. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te minsan hentei he hadì wey zatù.

Iyan sikandin wazà kemetayen. Diyà sikandin ed-ubpà te kerayag he kenà egkeuvayan. Wazà etew he nekeahà kandin ne kenà sikandin egkeahà te minsan hentei he etew. Berakat he zelig̵a sikandin wey medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.

Is menge tumutuu he mezakel is menge azen dan, keg̵iyi nu he kenè dan mebpelavew wey kenè dan medsarig te menge azen dan su kenè ta egketuenan ke keenu ki egkeewai te menge azen ta. Keg̵iyi nu he iyan dan serig̵i is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin metulanged. Is minsan hengkey he naazen ta, imbeg̵ey zin kenita wey mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk ta.
Keg̵iyi nu is menge sepian he tumutuu he hemeni zan ul-ulaha is meupiya su iyan heini hustu he ketig̵eyunan. Mebmetulanged dan wey mebmetinevangen.
Pinaag̵i kayi egkekuwa zan is hustu he ketig̵eyunan he kenè dan egkesuwey keuzemà. Ne ebpekeangken dan te untung he iyan tutuu he untung.
Sikew Timoteo, purungi nu tumana is tuluuwen he insarig kenikew. Likayi nu is menge etew he supak te Megbevayà is kegkag̵ikag̵i zan. Likayi nu zaan is kunaan te zuma ke tutuu en he ketau.
Duen duma he menge etew he nekekuwa en kun kayi te ketau, iyan, pinaag̵i kayi neengkezan dan en is tutuu he tuluuwen he midtuuwan tew.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew is langun te Megbevayà.
Sikew, Timoteo he iring te anak ku su utew ku minahal, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iyan a si Pablo he epustul ni Jesu Kristu,
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew ka wey kehizuwi ka te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veg̵ayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Iring te nengeulaula te menge kepuun ku hustu is tuyù ku te ked-ezapa ku te Megbevayà, ne utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku kandin dutun te layun ku kenikew ked-empua ziyà te kandin te maandew wey mezukilem.
Ne emun egketenuzan ku is kedtig̵is te luhè nu zutun te ked-ewai ku kenikew, utew a kenikew ebulunga ne utew a egkesuat he meked-uman ki meked-uma wey a utew melipey.
Kenè ku egkelipatan he utew meheg̵et is kedtuu nu he iring te meheg̵et daan is kedtuu te apù nu he si Luwida wey is iney nu he si Eunisi. Ne netuenan ku he utew hustu zaan is kenikew he kedtuu.
Ne tenged dutun kenè nu lipati he kinahanglan he g̵emita nu is ketau nu he imbeg̵ey zengan kenikew te Megbevayà dutun te kedlilai ku kenikew pinaag̵i te kedempaa ku te purù nu.

Su is Mulin-ulin he impeulin kenita te Megbevayà, kenè ta igketalew, kekenà, edlig-enan ki zin wey ebeg̵ayan ki zin te zesen su wey mehimu he ebmahalen ta is menge zuma ta wey edtengkaan ta is langun he ed-ul-ulahan ta.

Ne tenged dutun kenè nu ikeeled is kebpenurù nu mehitenged te Nengazen tew ne kenà a zaan kenikew ikeeled is gaked din wey nepirisu tenged te kedsengyawa kandin, kekenà, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Megbevayà he idtavang kenikew, ambit ka zaan kayi te ked-entusa ku te kemeresayan tenged te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Is Megbevayà, ne iyan midlibri kenita te silut ne midhimu ki zin he g̵aked din. Umba mid-ulaula zin heini, kenà tenged te meupiya is menge ulaula ta, kekenà, tenged dà te iyan tuyù din wey tenged te utew zekelà is gag̵ew zin kenita. Dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey mid-isip din he ibpeehè din is gag̵ew zin kenita pinaag̵i te kebeg̵aya zin kenita ki Jesu Kristu.

Ne g̵untaan impeehè en kenita haazà is gag̵ew zin su mibpeetew si Jesu Kristu he iyan Menluluwas tew. Ne si Jesus, in-awè din is gehem te kemetayen ne pinaag̵i te Meupiya he Tudtulanen impesavut din kenita he egkeveg̵ayan ki te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne siak, midtezù a te Megbevayà wey a mehimu he epustul ne wey ku ikesangyew wey ipenurù haazà is Meupiya he Tudtulanen,

ne tenged kayi egkeantus ku g̵untaan heini is kemeresayan. Ne minsan pa zutun, netuenan ku ke hentei sikandin is midserig̵an ku, ne netuenan ku zaan he taman te andew keuzemà he edsusiyen din is nengeulaula te menusiyà, metau sikandin he ebantey te langun he insarig din kediey.

Is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ku kenikew, kinahanglan he iyan layun edsunuzen nu. Hemeni nu is kedtuu nu te Megbevayà wey is kebmahala nu te menge zuma nu su iyan heini tuus te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesu Kristu.
Pinaag̵i te kedtavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he zini ed-ubpà te kenita, bentayi nu he kenà mahalin haazà is tutuu he tuluuwen he insarig kenikew te Megbevayà.
Netuenan nu en he is langun he menge tumutuu zini he ebpuun te prubinsya he Asya, wazè e zan tevangi. Elin dutun si Pihilu wey si Hirmuhinis.
Iyan, berakat he mehizuwi te Nengazen si Unisipuru wey pemilya zin. Su layun e zin edtevangi kayi te menge keseengan ku. Wazè din ikeeled is kebpenumbaley zin kedì te pinirisu,
kekenà, dutun dà te kebpekeuma zin dini te Ruma, mibpeniguduwan e zin pen-ahaa taman te neturedu e zin.
Id-ampù ku layun he mehizuwi sikandin te Nengazen keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Nengazen te langun. Ne netuenan nu en daan he zekelà is kedtevangi zin kedì diyan te Ipisu.
Sikew, Timoteo, is iring te tutuu he anak ku, heg̵eta nu is kedtuu nu su zekelà is tavang te Megbevayà kenita tenged te nekidsevaha ki ki Jesu Kristu.
Nezineg nu is kebpenurua ku te tutuu he tuluuwen diyà te mezakel he menge tumutuu; ne kinahanglan he ipenurù nu zaan heini diyà te menge etew he egkeserig̵an nu su wey mekepenurù dan daan te zuma.
Ambit ka zaan kayi te ked-entusa ku te kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu su wey ka mehimu he sulug̵uen ni Jesu Kristu he iring te metinumanen he sundaru.
Sikan is mibpesundaru, ne kenà egkehimu he ed-ul-ulahan din is ed-ul-ulahan te kenà sundaru, su kinahanglan he layun sikandin andam te kebpenunuat te egalen din.
Is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà, ne iring te ibanggà. Ne is ibanggà, kenà ebpekezaag ne kenà ebeg̵ayan te suhul emun kenè din edsunuzen is belaud te kebpekibanggà.
Ne iring daan is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà te ebasuk. Is etew he midhag̵ù mebasuk, ne iyan sikandin egkehuna he ebpekezawat te vahin te sebpet din.
Isipa nu heini is impesavut ku kenikew ne edtevangan ka te Nengazen wey nu mepurung heini mesavut.
Kenè nu lipati he si Jesu Kristu, mibpeetew he kevuwazan ni Hadì David ne mibpehimatey ne nevanhew. Iyan heini ibpesavut ku emun ebpenudtul a te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Ne tenged kayi te kebpenudtul ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen midrasey a te menge kuntada te Megbevayà ne neeg̵en a te kedina he iring te mesinupaken, iyan, kenà mulà egkeeg̵en is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi ed-entusen ku is minsan hengkey he merasey wey ku metevangi is menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà. Egkesuatan ku he melibri sikandan te silut pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha zan ki Jesu Kristu ne mekezawat dan te ketulusan he wazà pidtemanan.
Utew tutuu is penurù he edhenduen te,
“Ke pinaag̵i te kedhimuwa kandin he elili kenita minatey ki en duma kandin,
duen te en daan untung duma kandin.
Ke ed-antus ki te kemeresayan ebpekehadì ki keuzemà duma kandin.
Iyan, ke egkag̵i ki he kenè ki g̵aked din egkag̵i zaan sikandin keuzemà he kenè ki iyan gaked din.
Minsan ke kenè ki metinumanen te lalag din kenita,
metinumanen mulà sikandin te lalag din su kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is lalag din.”

Keg̵iyi nu is menge tumutuu he kenè dan melipati heini is langun. Iyan nu itelaan kandan he ibpetistig̵us is Megbevayà he likayi zan is kebpekidlawan he winalì mehitenged te kehulug̵an te menge lalag su wazè din pulus ne ebpekezezaat te kedtuu te ebpekezineg duen.
Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu su wey mesuati te Megbevayà ne wey kenè nu ikeeled is baal nu. Kinahanglan he utew hustu is kebpenurua nu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Likayi nu is winalì he kebpenurù he kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà, su pinaag̵i zutun ed-iseg is kenà kedtahud kandin te menge etew.
Is menge etew he iring kayi is kebpenurù dan, ne iring te it-it is penurù dan su ebpekeeneb ne ebpekezezaat. Is kebpenurù ni Himinyu wey ni Pilitu, ne iring kayi.
Midsuwayan dan en is kebpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen ne pinaag̵i zutun nehugkà is kedtuu te zuma he menge tumutuu. Egkeg̵iyen dan he nepasad en is kebenhawa kenita.

Ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkehalin kes tuluuwen he midtukud te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Egketuenan te Nengazen ke hentei is menge etew he g̵aked din,” wey zuen pa zaan lalag he edhenduen te, “Is minsan hentei he egkag̵i he g̵aked sikandin te Nengazen, ne kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an din is mezaat he ulaula.”

Diyà te minsan hendei he zekelà he valey zuen menge g̵elemiten he vulawan wey pelata ne zuen daan dutun menge g̵elemiten he kayu wey diniyun. Wey zà egemita is menge g̵elemiten he vulawan wey pelata ke zuen keemuran, iyan, is duma, andew-andew mulà is kegemita zuen.

Ne sikan is etew he egkesuat he mahala wey meteg̵eley te Megbevayà he iring te utew mahal he g̵elemiten, kinahanglan he ed-iniyug̵an din is langun he mezaat he ulaula. Ne human sikandin dait he egemiten te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula.

Iniyug̵i nu is menge mezaat he kebayà te menge menguhed. Hemeni nu is metazeng he ulaula; layun ka sarig te Megbevayà; mahala nu ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu is minsan hentei he tumutuu; peniguduwi nu he melinew is kedepitè niw te menge zuma nu su iyan heini menge ulaula te langun he menge etew he ebpetavang te Megbevayà tenged te iyan dà egkesuatan dan is kedtumana zan te menge sug̵ù din.
Iyan, kenè ka penlavetlavet dutun te menge winalì wey pinaglung he ed-istudyuwan. Netuenan nu en he iyan haazà puunà te kebpekid-eg̵et.
Ne netuenan nu zaan he kinahanglan he kenà mebpekid-eg̵et is sulug̵uen te Nengazen, kekenà, purungi zin layun is minsan hentei he etew. Kinahanglan he metau he ebpenurù ne mepelevayen daan sikandin.
Emun menayù is kebpenurua zin te menge kuntada zin, kela ke mahalin te Megbevayà is gehinawa zan wey zan mesavut is tutuu he tuluuwen.
Ne pinaag̵i zutun human ebmetandang is ked-isipa zan te langun, ne human dan egkepeleg̵uyi is gehem ni Setanas su iyan si Setanas nekezakep kandan wey zan metuman is egkesuatan din.
Kinahanglan he sevuta nu he timpu te kemereg̵enan haazà is ketepusan he timpu keuzemà te kenè pa edlimasen is menusiyà.

Su zutun he timpu leg̵ezen is menge etew wey iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan is selapì. Ebmepelevawen wey ebmepedeligen dan. Edsulaan dan is menge zuma zan; kenè dan ebpemineg̵en is menge lukes dan; ne kenè dan ebpeselamat. Utew lalung sikandan.

Kenè dan ebmahalen is menge zuma zan; kenà egkeawà is pauk dan. Bereituk sikandan; kenè dan egkeeg̵en is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zan. Utew zan mevurut ne wazà minsan hengkey he meupiya he ulaula he kenè dan egkeepesan.

Menge men-aakal sikandan; kenè dan ed-isipen ke hengkey is egkeulaula tenged te kelelalung dan. Menge gelbuwen sikandan. Iyan dan ibpelavi is kelibutanen he kelipey kenà is kebmahala zan te Megbevayà.
Uvag sikandan ed-azap te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè dan edtuu he zuen gehem din. Likayi nu is menge etew he iring dutun.

Iyan duma zutun is menge maama he edseled te menge valey wey zan mepenurù wey meveyveyai is menge vahi he wazà menge pulus. Is menge vahi he iring kayi, egkehandek dan tenged te mezakel he neveelan dan he salà, iyan, mezakel zaan is menge mezaat he egkesuatan dan.
Layun sikandan ebpepenurù, iyan, kenè dan edsevuten is tutuu he tuluuwen.

Haazà is menge maama zaan, edsumpalit dan te tutuu he tuluuwen. Netazin en utew is isip dan ne uvag dà is kedtuu zan te Nengazen. Iring sikandan ki Hanis wey ki Hembiris he midsumpalit dengan ki Moises.
Kenà ebpekeuswag is ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew he iring kayi su egkeahà te langun he engey sikandan iring ki Hanis wey ki Hembiris.

Ne sikew mulà, Timoteo, nepurung nu en metueni is langun he impenurù ku, is menge vetasan ku wey is egkesuatan ku he meulaula ku. Netuenan nu zaan is kedtuu ku te Megbevayà, is kebmepelevayen ku, is kebmahala ku te minsan hentei, wey is ked-antus ku te kemereg̵enan.

Netuenan nu zaan is menge kemeresayan wey menge keseengan he nengeantus ku. Netuenan nu zaan is langun he neeg̵iyan ku ziyà te menge inged he Entiyukya, wey Ikunya, wey Listera wey is langun he utew merasey he naantus ku. Is Megbevayà, ne midlibri e zin kayi te langun.
Ne is langun he tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu he egkesuatan dan he pinaag̵i kandin metuman dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, edresayen sikandan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà.
Iyan, is menge lalung he etew, wey is menge uvag kun tumutuu, ed-iseg mulà ebmezaat is menge ulaula zan. Edtezinen dan is isip te menge etew, iyan, egketazin daan is kandan he isip.
Ne sikew mulà, hemeni nu is tuluuwen he impenurù kenikew he netuenan nu he tutuu. Netuenan nu ke hentei is nemekepenurù kenikew

ne egketenuzan nu he zengan te vatè ke pa nesavut nu en is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Dutun te lalag din ebpuun is kedsavut he iyan paag̵i te kedlibriya kenita te silut emun edtuu ki ki Jesu Kristu.

Impinted te Megbevayà is kedsurata te langun he insurat he menge lalag din, ne zekelà is tavang kenita kayi te lalag emun ebpenurù ki, emun edawey ki, wey ke edsambag ki te menge tumutuu wey emun ibpenurù ta is metazeng he ulaula.
Pinaag̵i te ked-istudyuwi kayi te lalag ebmetau ki is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà ne egkehimu ta is minsan hengkey he meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan.

Duen idtelaan ku kenikew, ne is Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu, iyan ebpeketistig̵us kayi te menge lalag ku. Netuenan ta he edlikù si Jesus su iyan sikandin hadì ne iyan sikandin edsusi keuzemà te nengeulaula te minsan hentei, se uuyag pa wey is nemematey en.

Ne tenged kayi iyan idtelaan ku kenikew is: ipesavut nu is Lalag te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he layun ka andam te kebpesevuta te lalag din te minsan keenu he timpu ke zuen egkesuat he ebpemineg wey ke wazà. Dewaya nu is menge etew, sembag̵i nu he med-iniyug dan te mezaat he ulaula. Hengyui nu sikandan. Kinahanglan he layun ka mepelevayen is ebpenurù kandan.

Umba idtelaan ku heini kenikew su egkeuma keuzemà is timpu he kenà edewaten te menge etew is tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, iyan dan edsunuzen is menge mezaat he kebayè dan. Ebpemepenurù dan te mezakel he menge menenudlù. Ne iyan ibpenurù kayi is tuluuwen he utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg.
Kenè dan ebpemineg̵en is tutuu, kekenà, iyan dan edtuuwan is menge tarù he g̵ug̵ud.

Iyan, sikew mulà, tengkai nu is ed-ul-ulahan nu te minsan keenu he timpu. Entusa nu is kemereg̵enan. Peniguduwi nu te edsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Purungi nu tumana is langun he ebpeveelan kenikew te Megbevayà.
Siak mulà, meg̵aan en egkeepus is umur ku; meg̵aan en egkeuma is kebpatey ku.
Nepasad ku en is kebenggaa kedì te Megbevayà; nekeuma ad te edungguan te edlumbà. Hustu is ked-ikula ku te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Ne g̵untaan integ̵ana en kedì te Nengazen is suhul he iyan ibeg̵ey zin diyà te langun he memetazeng he etew. Ibeg̵ey zin heini keuzemà te andew te kedsusiya zin te nengeulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan sikandin kes metazeng is kedsusi zin. Ne kenà iyan e zà midteg̵enahan din te suhul, kekenà, midteg̵enahan din daan is langun he utew egkeg̵alew ke ebpekelikù sikandin.
Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu wey ka meg̵aan mekehendini

su mid-ewaan a ni Dimas tenged te iyan egkenug̵unan din is untung din dini te kelibutan. Midhendiyà sikandin te Tiselunika. Ne si Krisinti, midhendiyà te Gelasya, ne si Tito zaan, midhendiyà te Delmasya.
Iyan dà duma ku kayi, si Lucas. Tuluya nu si Marcos ne zumaha nu zini su zekelà is tavang din kedì te langun he ed-ul-ulahan ku kayi.
Midsug̵ù ku si Tikiku ziyà te inged he Ipisu.
Sikan is kumbalè ku he intag̵ak ku ziyà te ki Karpu he ziyà te Truwas, meupiya ke ed-uwiten nu zini. Uwita nu zaan sikan is midlulun he menge libru, lavew en sikan is diyà isurat te lundis.
Utew mezaat is mid-ulaula kedì ni Alejandro, sikan is pandey te tumbag̵a. Iyan ebales kandin is Nengazen.
Endami nu sikandin su utew mezesen is kedsumpelita zin te tuluuwen he ibpenurù ta.
Dutun te nehuna he ked-imbistiga kedì wazà minsan hentei he midtavang mebpenistig̵us kediey su mid-ewaan a zuen te langun. Id-ampù ku he mepesaylu sikandan te Megbevayà.

Minsan pa zutun midtevangan a te Nengazen ne midlig-enan e zin ne tenged dutun nepurungan ku te edsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te langun he menge etew zutun he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne tenged dutun nelibri a ne wazà a mehimetayi.

Ne kenà dutun dà taman su edlibriyen e pa te Nengazen te minsan hengkey he ebpekekaid kedì ne edlig-enan e zin taman te ed-uwiten e zin dutun te g̵inhedian din diyà te langit. Berakat he zelig̵a sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.
Ipengemusta a ki Priscila, ki Ekilu, wey ki Unisipuru wey is pemilya zin.
Mibpetag̵ak si Irastu ziyà te Kurintu ne intag̵ak ku si Trupimu ziyà te Militu su nezeruwan.
Gaanggaan ka hendini te kenè pa tipenguzan.
Ebpengemusta kenikew ensi Yubulu, si Pudinti, si Linu, si Claudia, wey is langun he menge tumutuu zini.
Berakat he zumahi kew te Nengazen. Ikeg̵ag̵ew kew zin is langun. Iyan a si Pablo.

Sikew, Tito, ebpesuratan ku sikew. Iring ka te tutuu he anak ku su is kedtuu nu te Nengazen, ne iring daan te kedì he kedtuu kandin. Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew ka te Megbevayà wey te Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veg̵ayi ke zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Iyan a si Pablo is sulug̵uen te Megbevayà wey is epustul, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, sug̵ù ni Jesu Kristu. Iyan insug̵ua zin kedì su wey ku meheg̵et is kedtuu te menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà, ne wey ku zaan meheg̵et is kedsavut dan te tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan edtuuwan ta. Elin daan insug̵ua zin kedì is wey zan mesavut he ebpekeperateng dan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey, migkag̵i te Megbevayà he ibeg̵ey zin kenitew heini is untung ne netuenan ta he kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is egkeg̵iyen din. Ne g̵untaan iyan en timpu te kebpetueni zin kayi te untung pinaag̵i te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne heini he tudtulanen, insarig kediey te Megbevayà he menluluwas tew.

Iyan integ̵aka ku kenikew ziyan te Krita is wey nu mehimasad is menge vaal he wazè ta mepasad, ne wey nu zaan mepilì diyà te kada inged is menge ebmeg̵urangen he egkeserig̵an te menge tumutuu. Emun ebpilien nu is menge ebmeg̵urangen, ul-ulaha nu is intelaan ku kenikew.

Is ebmeg̵urangen, kinahanglan he wazà supak din, sevaha zà is esawa zin, ne kenè din selselai. Kinahanglan he menge tumutuu is menge anak din, ne kenà sikandan ed-isipen te menge etew he iyan dan dà ebpen-ahaan is kelibutanen he kelipey. Kinahanglan he metinumanen sikandan te menge idsug̵ù kandan.

Ne g̵eina te insarig kandin te Megbevayà is kedumala te menge tumutuu, kinahanglan he wazà supak din. Kenà sikandin mebmandarmandar zà; kenà sikandin eengeren. Kinahanglan he kenà sikandin lelenguten, kenà sikandin ebpemeg̵espeg̵es ne kenà iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is selapì.

Kinahanglan he meelima sikandin te menge meg̵eliyug din ne kinahanglan daan he iyan utew zin egkesuati is kedtevangi zin te menge etew. Metau sikandin he ed-isip te hustu. Metazeng sikandin he etew wey igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin. Metau zaan sikandin he ed-eg̵en te menge suat te lawa zin.

Kinahanglan he zutun te kebpenurù din, kenè din suwayi is tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan impenurù ta. Su emun iyan ibpenurù din is tutuu he tuluuwen, egkeheg̵et is kedtuu te ebpememineg kandin ne igkepesavut din he utew nengesayep is edsumpalit te penurù din.

Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su zuen mezakel he menge zuma niyu ziyan he edsumpalit te hustu he penurù. Iyan is menge Hudiyu he tumutuu en ki Kristu. Wazà pulus te egkeg̵iyen dan wey tarù is ibpenurù dan.

Kinahanglan he ibpeengkezan nu kandan is kebpenurù dan su ke zuen sevaha he egketazin is isip din pinaag̵i te kedtuuwi zin kayi he penurù egkesemukan is kebpekid-upakat din te menge zuma zin dutun te pemilya zin. Iyan dà ibpenurua zan dutun te kenà hustu he ibpenurù is wey zan mekepenapì.
Duen nevantug he menenagnà he zuma zan he tigKrita he migkag̵i te, “Teruen wey utew lalung is menge etew zini te Krita. Utew zan egkeepesi is kedterebahu, iyan, utew zan egkesuati is kegkaan.”
Ne utew venar is migkag̵i zin. Tenged dutun kinahanglan he pekezeseni nu sikandan te edawey wey mehustu is kedtuu zan
ne wey zan meengkezi is kedtuu zan te menge tetezemen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge kelibutanen dà he sug̵ù he mibeelan te menge etew he edsumpalit te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Ke zuen etew he nelumpiyuwan te Megbevayà, wazà minsan hengkey he ibmeremerik din. Iyan, ke zuen etew he wazà melumpiyuwi te Megbevayà, wazà minsan hengkey pa he paag̵i he igkelumpiyu kandin su kenè sikandin edtuu ne nelalung utew is isip din wey g̵ehinawa zin.

Duen menge etew he egkeg̵iyen dan he emig̵u sikandan te Megbevayà, iyan, pinaag̵i te menge ulaula zan egketuusan ta he kuntada sikandan te Megbevayà. Utew zin sikandan egkeepesi su kenè dan ebpememineg te tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne tenged dutun kenè dan dait he ibpeulaula zin te minsan hengkey he meupiya.
Ne sikew mulà, kinahanglan he kenà ebpekesuwey is ibpenurù nu zuen te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Is menge meg̵urang en he maama, ne iyan ipenurù nu kandan is: kinahanglan he metau sikandan he ed-eg̵en te menge suat te lawa zan; kinahanglan he zait sikandan he edtehuzen tenged te menge ulaula zan he meupiya; kinahanglan he metau zan he ed-isip te hustu. Meheg̵et is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà, ebmahalen dan diyà te g̵ehinawa zan is menge zuma zan, wey meinentusen sikandan.

Ne iring ded daan dutun is penurù nu ziyà te menge meg̵urang en he vahi. Kinahanglan he layun igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zan. Kenà sikandan pereituk, kenà sikandan pereinum te vinu. Kinahanglan he layun dan ipenurù is meupiya he ulaula
su wey zan ikepenurù diyà te menge menguhed he vahi is kebmahala zan te menge esawa zan wey menge anak dan,

ne wey zan daan ikepenurù kandan is ked-isip te hustu, is kedlikayi te meremerik he ulaula, wey is kebpurungi zan te menge vaal zan. Kinahanglan he ebpemineg̵en dan is sug̵ù te esawa zan. Ne emun iring dutun is menge ulaula te menge vahi wazà minsan hentei he ebpekekag̵i he mezaat is ibpenurù ta zutun te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne iring din daan dutun is penurù nu ziyà te menge menguhed he maama. Kinahanglan he ipenurù nu kandan he purungi zan tengkai is menge ulaula zan.

Sikew zaan, kinahanglan he layun meupiya is kenikew he ulaula su wey iyan ka meiringi te menge zuma nu. Ne emun ebpenurù ka, kinahanglan he hustu is tuyù nu wey sungkad te Lalag te Megbevayà is paag̵i nu te kebpenurù.
Is minsan hengkey he ibpenurù nu, ne kinahanglan he zutun ebpuun te hustu he tuluuwen su wey kenà egkekag̵i he sayep ne zutun wazà igkesudii kenita te menge kuntada ta, kekenà, egkeeled dan.
Penurua nu is menge tumutuu he sulug̵uen he pemineg̵a zan is sug̵ù te menge egalen dan su wey ikesuat te menge egalen is menge vaal zan. Kinahanglan he kenè dan medsukul,

ne kenè dan mebpenakew, kekenà, ipeehè dan he egkeserig̵an sikandan te egalen dan. Emun iyan haazà ulaula te menge sulug̵uen he tumutuu egkesavut te menge etew he utew tutuu is tuluuwen he ibpenurù ta mehitenged te Megbevayà he iyan menluluwas tew.
Impeg̵awag̵awa en guntaan is gag̵ew te Megbevayà su wey mehimu he melibri te silut is tivuuk he menusiyà.

Ne pinaag̵i zutun te g̵ag̵ew egkesavut ta he kinahanglan he meengkezi ta is menge ulaula he kenà igkesuat te Megbevayà wey is kedtumana ta te menge suat te lawa ta zini te kelibutan. Kinahanglan he ed-eg̵enen ta is menge kebayà ta he mezaat. Kinahanglan daan he metazeng wey igkesuat te Megbevayà is menge ulaula ta te zini ki pa ed-ubpà te kelibutan.
Su zuen edteg̵azan ta he andew he zutun ibpeg̵awag̵awa is lavew he Megbevayà he iyan Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu he utew zekelà is gehem din. Iyan sikandin ebperetengen ta.

Mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri te kebpekeulaula tew te mezaat ne wey kiw zin daan mehimu he menge g̵aked din he etew he nelumpiyuwan he utew en egkengesuat he ed-ulaula te meupiya.

Ne heini is langun he migkag̵i ku, ipenurù nu ziyà te menge etew ziyan. Gemita nu is keg̵ehem nu te kebayàbayà kandan. Sembag̵i nu wey dewaya nu sikandan. Kinahanglan he kenè ka lulupig̵an te minsan hentei.

Keg̵iyi nu is menge tumutuu ziyan he kinahanglan he mebpesakup dan te velaud te gubirnu wey te menge upisyal ziyan. Medtuman dan te menge sug̵ù dan kandan ne medtavang dan ke zuen meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan te gubirnu.
Keg̵iya nu kandan he kenè dan med-ituk te minsan hentei, kekenà, melinawen is kedepitè dan te langun, mebpekid-emig̵u zan te langun, wey kenè dan mepelevawen.

Su sikita zaan is tumutuu, engey ki zengan wey mesinupaken ki te Megbevayà su wazè ta meturedu is tutuu he ibayà. Nengeuripen ki te menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta wey te menge kelipey he kenà meupiya. Neteg̵eb dengan is isip ta te kelelalung wey kesina. Nepeukan ki te menge etew ne nepeukan ta zaan sikandan.
Ne is Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew, hein neuma is timpu te kebpaahaa zin kenita te gag̵ew zin wey ketulanged din,

midlibri ki zin te silut. Iyan ingkelibriya zin kenita is: kenà tenged te menge metazeng he ulaula he nehimu ta, kekenà, tenged dà te hizu zin kenita. Midlibri ki zin pinaag̵i te kedlumpiyuwi kenita he iyan is kebpeuman ta kebpaanak pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he nekeveg̵ey kenita te veg̵u he untung.
Midhimu te Megbevayà he mepurung ki meulini te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin pinaag̵i te kebpehimatey ni Jesu Kristu he Menluluwas tew.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey tenged te g̵ag̵ew zin kenita meisip ki zin he metazeng ne maangken ta is untung he wazà pidtemanan he iyan ebperetengen ta.
Utew tutuu heini is impesavut ku kenikew.

Egkesuatan ku he ipurung nu ipenurù heini ziyan su utew hustu wey zekelà is pulus kayi ziyà te minsan hentei. Ne emun nesavut en heini te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zan is ked-ul-ulaha zan te meupiya.

Iyan, likayi nu is winalì he kebpekidlewanà te menge etew. Likayi nu zaan is ked-istudyu te menge g̵ug̵ud te menge ngazan te menge kepuun te etew he iyan baal zan. Ne elin nu zaan likayi is kebpekid-eg̵et dan mehitenged te kedtumana te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Wazà pulus te langun kayi su ebpekezezaat.
Ke zuen duma niw he edsemuken din is upakat te menge tumutuu, dewaya nu, ne emun kenà ebpemineg, umani nu zewaya. Ne emun kenè pa zutun ebpemineg engkezi nu sikandin.
Su egketuenan nu zutun he is etew he iring kayi, nekesuwey is isip din te hustu he ulaula. Minsan pa te netuenan din he mezaat is ulaula zin, ebpeniguduwan din gihapun.
Emun ebpeveyaan ku sikew ki Ertimas ne emun kenà, si Tikiku, gaanggaan ka telavuk kediey ziyà te Nikupulis su ziyà a ed-ubpà ke egkeuma is tipenguzan.
Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu wey nu metevangi is ebugadu he si Sinas wey si Epulus ke edhipanew zan. Susiya nu sikandan su wey wazà kurang dan.

Ipenurù nu ziyà te menge zuma nu he tumutuu ziyan he kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zan is ked-ulaula zan te meupiya wey zan metevangi is menge edlised. Kenà meupiya ke zuen tumutuu he peg̵ulen su wazà pulus dutun.
Ebpepengemusta kenikew is langun he menge zuma ku kayi. Ipengemusta key zaan te langun he menge emig̵u zey he tumutuu ziyan.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Megbevayà is langun.

Minahal he emig̵u zey wey timbang dey he si Pilimun. Siak si Pablo is nepirisu tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesu Kristu wey si Timoteo he suled tew, ebpesuratan dey sikew, wey si Epiya he etevey tew tenged te kedtuu, wey si Erkipu he zuma tew he sundaru ni Kristu wey elin daan ebpesuratan dey is menge tumutuu he ziyan edsimba te valey nu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veg̵ayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Sikew, suled, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged kenikew te kada ku ked-ampù;
su nezineg ku is tudtul mehitenged te mezesen he kedtuu nu te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey mehitenged te kebmahala nu ziyà te g̵ehinawa nu te langun he menge tumutuu kandin.
Ne id-ampù ku zaan he pinaag̵i te kebpekid-upakat nu kenami tenged te kedtuu tew, med-iseg is kedsavut tew te langun he meupiya he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu.
Utew ku ingkelipey, Geli, is kebmahala nu te menge zuma tew he tumutuu. Ingkeheg̵et heini te kedtuu ku su pinaag̵i kenikew nengelipey is gehinawa te menge etew ziyan he g̵aked te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged kayi te langun duen idhangyù ku kenikew. Netuenan ku he tenged te keg̵ehem he imbeg̵ey kedì ni Kristu egkehimu he edsug̵ù a kenikew he himuwa nu is hustu,
iyan, tenged te utew ka mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku, edhangyù e zà kenikew. Siak, si Pablo, is meg̵urang wey g̵untaan pinirisu a zaan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu,
edhengyuan ku sikew he peseyluwa nu si Unisimu. Tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu iring sikandin te tutuu en he anak ku su pinaag̵i kedì nehimu sikandin he tumutuu zini te pirisuwan.
Dengan wazè nu pulus ki Unisimu, iyan, guntaan edekelà utew is pulus tew kandin.
Ibpeulì ku en diyan te kenikew si Unisimu he utew ku pezem minahal.
Neisip ku he meupiya pezem ke iyan sikandin duma ku kayi su wey mehimu sikandin he iyan tavang nu kedì te kemulu e pa nepirisu zini tenged te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Iyan, kenè ku pa heini ebeelan te wazè nu pa itug̵ut kediey. Kenà a ebpeg̵es he ikehizu a kenikew. Su iyan meupiya is ebpuun te meliwanag he g̵ehinawa is kedhimuwa nu kayi.
Kela ke iyan tuyù te Megbevayà te kedsuwaya ni Unisimu kenikew is: impaawà sikandin diyan te kenikew te wazà utew meug̵et su wey mehimu he meg̵aked nu en te wazà pidtemanan.

Ne g̵untaan kenà sikandin uripen nu zà duen, kekenà, utew pa mahal kenà is uripen su suled nu en daan tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu. Utew sikandin mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku ne mahal pa zaan diyan te kenikew, kenà tenged dà te uripen nu, kekenà, tenged daan te suled nu en tenged te Nengazen.
Ne emun ed-isipen a kenikew he timbang nu, ig̵alewg̵alew nu si Unisimu iring te kegelg̵elawa nu kediey.
Ke zuen salè din diyan te kenikew wey ke zuen utang din diyà te kenikew, isipa nu he kediey.
Ahaa nu is kedsurata ku kayi: Iyan a si Pablo ebayad. Asal netuenan nu he zekelà daan is utang nu kedì su pinaag̵i kediey nekeangken ka te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne tenged kayi, Geli, edhengyuan ku sikew he ikehizu a kenikew su telesuled ki pinaag̵i te kedtuu ta te Nengazen. Himuwa nu heini wey a melipey su telesuled ki pinaag̵i ki Kristu.
Dekelà is kedsarig ku kayi te kebpesurati ku kenikew su netuenan ku he ebpemineg̵en a kenikew. Netuenan ku he zekelà is edhimuwen nu, kenà te idhangyù ku.
Ne zuen pa idhangyù ku he iyan is: endami a zaan te edhizeg̵aan ku ziyan, su zekelà is kedsarig ku he pinaag̵i te ked-ampù niw, idtug̵ut te Megbevayà he mekehendiyan a te keniyu.
Si Ipapras, is duma ku he pinirisu tenged te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu, ebpengemusta keniyu.
Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu ensi Marcos, si Eristarku, si Dimas, wey si Lucas. Menge timbang ku sikandan kayi te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Dengan duen impesavut te Megbevayà diyà te menge g̵in-epuan tew pinaag̵i te menge etew he ebpeneuven din. Mezakel is menge paag̵i te kebpeneuva kandan ne mezakel zaan is impesavut din pinaag̵i kandan.

Iyan, guntaan, duen impesavut te Megbevayà kenitew pinaag̵i te Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, pinaag̵i kandin ne nelimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey; ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he Nengazen te minsan hengkey.

Pinaag̵i kayi te Anak din ibpezayag is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag te Megbevayà su neked-iring dan. Ke hengkey is Megbevayà ne iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din. Ne pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te kegkag̵i kayi te Anak ebeyveyaan din is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Ne hein nepasad din en is ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, mid-ulì diyà te langit ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
Impaahà kenita te Megbevayà he utew lavew is Anak din, kenà is menge velinsug̵uen din diyà te langit, ne iring din ded daan, lavew is inggerar zin te Anak din, kenà is inggerar zin kandan.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te Anak din he edhenduen te,
“Iyan ka Anak ku ne egkeg̵iyen ku kenikew
he g̵untaan ibpeehè ku
he Amey a kenikew.”
Iyan, wazà belinsug̵uen din he migkeg̵iyan din te iring dutun te minsan keenu he timpu. Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Egkehimu he iyan a Amey zin
ne iyan sikandin Anak ku.”
Ne kenà iyan is belinsug̵uen egkeg̵iyen din dutun.
Ne migkag̵i zaan is Megbevayà mehitenged te kakey he Anak din dutun te timpu te kedsug̵ua zin kandin dini te kelibutan, ke sikandin te,
“Kinahanglan he ed-ezapen sikandin te langun he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà.”
Ne iyan mulà migkag̵i te Megbevayà mehitenged te menge velinsug̵uen din is:
“Menge sug̵ù ku zà sikandan,
ne egkehimu ke edhimuwen ku
sikandan he iring te keramag,
ne emun kenà, ne iring te hapuy
ke iyan egkesuatan ku.”
Ne iyan lalag din diyà te Anak din is:
“Iyan ka Megbevayà ne wazà pidtemanan te kedhadì nu.
Metazeng is kedumala nu te g̵inhedian nu.
Iyan egkesuatan nu
is metazeng he ulaula ne igkeepes nu is mezaat he ulaula.
Tenged kayi, siak is Megbevayà nu,
midhimu ku sikew he lavew te menge zuma nu ne imbeg̵ey ku kenikew
is utew zekelà he kelipey.”
