Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edlelag̵an din is Anak din he edhenduen te,
“Sikew is Nengazen,
iyan ka nenlimbag te tanà,
ne kenikew he velad is mibaal te langit.
Ne minsan pa te egkehanew keuzemà is langit wey tanà,
kenè ka mulà egkehanew.
Iring dan te manggad he egkezeetan.
Iring te kedlumpia te kumbalà,
edlumpien nu is langit wey tanà ne ed-ilisan nu.
Iyan, sikew,
kenè ka mulà egkehalin;
is untung nu ne wazè din pidtemanan.”
Wazà belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he migkeg̵iyan din te,
“Dini ke zè pa pinuu te egkekewanan ku
taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud
diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu.”
Iyan, is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà, menge sulug̵uen dà sikandan te Megbevayà. Kenè tew egkeahà, iyan, edsug̵uen din sikandan wey kiw zan metevangi is menge etew he edtulusen keuzemà.
Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he edhemenan tew ebpurungi is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew wey tew kenà melekai su kela ke mekesuwey kiw te tutuu he ibayà.
Su is kesug̵uan he imbeg̵ey zengan te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te menge velinsug̵uen din, netuenan tew he is minsan hentei he nekesupak kayi, midsilutan te Megbevayà sumalà is supak din.

Ne iring din ded daan, sikitew is menusiyà, kenè kiw zaan ebpekelikey te silut te Megbevayà emun ebey-anan tew, ne kenè tew edtumanen is impenurù kenitew mehitenged te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he kedlibriya zin kenitew te silut. Is nehuna he nekepenudtul kayi, ne iyan en is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Ne is menge etew he nemekezineg kandin, edtistig̵usan dan dini te kenitew he tutuu heini.

Ne is Megbevayà, midtistig̵usan din daan haazà is impenurù dan su mibeg̵ayan din sikandan te g̵ehem wey zan ikepaahà is menge singyal, wey menge egkein-inuwan he kenà ed-iring-iring. Ne zuen daan menge ketau he imbeg̵ey zin diyà te menge tumutuu pinaag̵i te ked-ulini kandan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin sumalà is egkesuatan din he ebeg̵ayan.
Ne ibpesavut ku keniyu is kelibutan keuzemà he id-ilis te Megbevayà kayi te kelibutan tew g̵untaan. Ne wazà pilia te Megbevayà is menge velinsug̵uen din he ebayàbayà dutun keuzemà he kelibutan,
kekenà, iyan mibpilì din is menge etew. Su zuen insurat he lalag he egkeehè ta kayi te menge surat dengan he edhenduen te,
“Sikew, Megbevayà,
maan is kenè nu egkelipatan is menusiyà?
Etew zà duen, ne maan is ebpurungan nu?
Midhimu nu he lavew kandin is menge velinsug̵uen nu,
iyan, taman te mevavè dà he timpu
su migkag̵i nu he zuen timpu keuzemà he kinahanglan
he edtulusen wey edtehuzen is menusiyà.
Ne migkag̵i nu zaan he kinahanglan
he keuzemà edhimuwen nu he mekevayàbayà sikandin te minsan hengkey.”

Iyan haazà insurat dengan. Ne g̵eina te migkag̵i zutun he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is menusiyà he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey, egkesavut ta zutun he zuen timpu keuzemà he wazà minsan hengkey he linimbag he kenà egkeveyveyaan te menusiyà. Ne g̵untaan netuenan ta he kenè pa ebpekevayàbayà is menusiyà te iring dutun.

Ne minsan pa zutun, mibpeetew si Jesus ne pinaag̵i kayi midhimu he lavew kandin is menge velinsug̵uen taman te mevavè dà he timpu su wey tenged te zekelà he g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà, mebpehimatey sikandin he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne tenged kayi te kebpehimatey zin, ne nehimu en sikandin guntaan he utew telehuzen wey utew belentug̵en ne imbeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà is kebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.

Is Megbevayà he nenlimbag te langun su wey mehimu is langun he igkezelig̵i kandin, ne utew hustu is kedtug̵uta zin he mekeantus si Jesus te merasey su pinaag̵i kayi impeehè din he wazà igkesawey ziyà te ki Jesus, ne egkehimu he mezakel kiw is edhimuwen din he menge anak te Megbevayà su wey kiw metulus iring te kedtulusa kandin. Nehimu si Jesus he ibayà wey kiw melibri te silut.

Si Jesus, mibpalis din en is menge salè tew. Ne g̵untaan sikitew is nepelisan te salà wey sikandin is mibpalis te salà, sebsevaha zà is Amey tew he iyan is Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kenè kiw igkeeled ni Jesus, kekenà, egngezanan kiw zin te menge hazi zin.
Su zuen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te,
“Sikew is Megbevayà, edtudtulan ku is menge hazi ku mehitenged kenikew.
Egkentahan ku is kedalig ku kenikew ziyà te etuvangan te langun he ed-azap kenikew.”
Ne g̵eina te menusiyà daan sikandin migkag̵i sikandin te,
“Edserig̵an ku is Megbevayà.”
Ne ke sikandin daan te,
“Heini e zed he edumahan te menge zuma ku he menge anak te Megbevayà he insarig din kedì.”

Ne sikitew is menge anak te Megbevayà, menge etew kiw zà duen he zuen din kemetayen. Ne tenged kayi mibpeetew zaan si Jesus wey mehimu sikandin he iring tew. Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ebpehimatey sikandin ne wey pinaag̵i te kebpatey zin mezaag din si Setanas he iyan mibayàbayà te kemetayen,

ne wey pinaag̵i kayi metevangi kiw zin ne libriya kiw zin te kemetayen. Su zengan te wazè kiw pa libriya, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew is kegkehandek te kemetayen ne iring te menge uripen kiw zutun te kegkehandek.
Ne kenà iyan is menge velinsug̵uen din midtevangan din, kekenà, iyan kiw zin midtevangan is menge kevuwazan ni Abraham.

Umba kinahanglan he ebpeetew sikandin su wey mehimu sikandin he iring kenitew te menge suled din te minsan hengkey he paag̵i. Ne mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà he iring te lavew he memumuhat tew he utew hihizuwen wey metinumanen su wey zin mepalis is menge salè tew.
Ne egkehimu en he egketevangan din is ebpenulayen ni Setanas su neseg̵azan din en is kemereg̵enan tenged te kebpenulaya kandin.

Ne tenged kayi, menge suled ku te kedtuu, mid-umbita kew zaan te Megbevayà wey kew mekeubpà keuzemà diyà te langit. Purungi niw isipa si Jesus. Iyan sikandin kes midsug̵ù te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan wey sikandin mehimu he lavew he memumuhat he edtavang kenitew kayi te kebpesakup tew te Megbevayà.

Su si Jesus, ne mibpurung medtuman te langun he ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà, iring te si Moises, nepurungan din daan te edtuman is langun he mibpeveelan kandin dutun te kebeyveyai zin te valey te Megbevayà,
Iyan, si Jesus, ed-isipen sikandin te Megbevayà he utew pa lavew kenà si Moises, iring te lavew is ebevaley kenà te valey.
Netuenan ta he ke zuen baley ne zuen daan mibaal zutun te valey, ne is mibaal te minsan hengkey ne iyan is Megbevayà.
Ne si Moises, sulug̵uen sikandin he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey te Megbevayà ne nehimu is menge vaal zin he alung te ibpaahà te Megbevayà te egkeug̵et pa zutun he timpu egketuman.

Ne si Jesus mulà, Anak sikandin te Megbevayà he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey. Ne iyan kiw valey zin emun edhemenan tew is kedsundan tew kandin wey is melipayen he kedteg̵azi tew te langun he impenaad kenitew ni Kristu.
Su zuen insurat he lalag te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he edhenduen te,
“Guntaan emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà,
kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw
iring te g̵ehinawa niw zengan
hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà dutun te timpu he migezaman niw is ked-antus din keniyu
zutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.”
Su migkag̵i is Megbevayà te,
“Minsan pa te seled te kepatan he tuig nengeehè dan is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ku,
ne migezaman dan pa ke hendei taman is kebpelevaya ku te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
Umba, utew a zutun
nepauk kandan, ne ke siak te,
‘Layun egkesayep is ed-isipen dan ne kenè dan egkesuat he edtuman te menge sug̵ù ku.’
Ne utew a nepauk ne migkag̵i ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled
dutun te integ̵ana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.”

Umba, menge suled, susiya niw is gehinawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he mezaat is ed-isipen din nè wazè din kedtuu, su pinaag̵i kayi egkeengkezan din is wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.

Ne g̵untaan te kemulu pa egkehimu he egkekuwa is keluwasan he imbeg̵ey kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ebpesemsembag̵è kiw su wey kiw kenà melimbungi pinaag̵i te salà he iyan is kenà kedtuu ne wey kenà mebmezesen is gehinawa tew.
Su sikitew, emun edhemenan tew is daan he kedsarig tew ki Kristu, duen tew pudu upakat kandin.
Su iring te Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat ku en he edhenduen te,
“Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà,
kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw iring te g̵ehinawa niw zengan hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà.”

Ne hentei heini is menge etew he minsan nezineg dan is Lalag te Megbevayà midsukulan dan gihapun sikandin? Iyan sikandan sikan is menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he mid-uwit ni Moises puun diyà te tanà he Ihiptu.

Ne hentei is menge etew he nepeukan dengan te Megbevayà seled te kepatan he tuig? Iyan ded heini is menge zuma te kevuwazan ni Israyil he mibaal te salà diyà te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi midsilutan din sikandan ne minatey sikandan dutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.

Iyan ded sikandan kes menge etew he mehitenged kandan migkag̵i is Megbevayà te, “Kenè dan ebpekeseled dutun te midteg̵ana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.” Umba migkag̵i zin heini su wazè dan mebpemineg te lalag din.
Ne netuenan tew he wazè dan mekeseled dutun su wazè dan tuuwi is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne minsan pa zutun, wazà iawà te Megbevayà is daan he penaad din he zuen menge etew he ebpekeseled dutun te inged din wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpekeandam kiw su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà edtug̵utan te Megbevayà he mekeseled dutun.

Su sikitew, nezineg tew zaan is kebpenudtula te Meupiya he Tudtulanen iring te menge g̵in-epuan tew zengan. Iyan, minsan te nezineg dan is impesavut kandan te Megbevayà, wazà pulus kayi ziyà te kandan su zutun te kegkezineg̵a zan kayi, wazè dan tuuwi.
Ne sikitew mulà is nemeketuu, idtug̵ut kenitew is kedseled dutun wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà. Iyan, wazà itug̵ut te kenà edtuu su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Ne utew a nepauk ne migkag̵i ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled dutun te integ̵ana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey!”
Wazà iyan ikeg̵iya zin kayi is wazè pa meteg̵ana haazà is kedhimeley su zaan en he nepasad din en heini puun pa te kedlimbag̵a zin te minsan hengkey.
Su zuen insurat he lalag mehitenged te ikepitu he andew he edhenduen te, “Midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew su netapus din en is langun he ebeelan din.”
Ne migkag̵i en maan is Megbevayà mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley te, “Kenè dan en ebpekeseled wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.”

Tenged kayi, netuenan ta he haazà is menge etew zengan he nehuna he nemekezineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley, wazà sikandan mehimuwa te Megbevayà he mekeseled dan wey zan mekehimeley tenged te wazè dan kebpemineg. Iyan, netuenan tew zaan he zuen menge zuma pa he ebmehimuwen mulà te Megbevayà he mekeseled sikandan wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin.

Umba egketuenan ta heini su zuen pa andew he midtelaan te Megbevayà he zutun ebpekeseled is menge etew zutun te kedhimeley he midteg̵ana zin. Su neug̵et pa zutun te timpu te menge tipehuna he etew he wazà medtuu, impinted te Megbevayà is lalag din diyà te ki Hadì David. Ne ke si David te,
“Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà,
kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw.”

Haazà is menge tipehuna he etew, angin ke mid-uwit sikandan ni Josue ne impeseled din sikandan dengan dutun te hustu en he kedhimeley he midteg̵ana te Megbevayà su kenè en kinahanglan he ibpesavut pa maan te Megbevayà is duma pa he andew he zutun ibpeseled pa maan is menge etew.

Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is menge sakup te Megbevayà guntaan, nesavut tew en he egkehimu kiw he ebpekeseled wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew.
Ne is minsan hentei he ibpehimeley te Megbevayà, ed-engkezan din en is kandin he vaal iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te kegkepesaza zin te vaal zin te kedlimbag.

Umba, sikitew zaan, ebeelan tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey kiw zaan mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan he midteg̵ana te Megbevayà. Kenè tew ed-iringan haazà is menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà ebmehimuwen he mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan.

Uuyag is Lalag te Megbevayà ne zekelà is gehem din. Iring te sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meg̵arang, iyan, meg̵arang pa is Lalag te Megbevayà kenà haazà is sundang su edlembasan din minsan is isip ta, gehinawa ta, wey tuyù ta ne igkepetuenan din kenita ke hengkey is ked-isipa kenita te Megbevayà.
Is Megbevayà, kenà sikandin egkeelesan te minsan hengkey. Egkeehè din layun is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan ta. Ne ke minsan hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ta, iyan sikandin edsusi.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, edhemenan tew is kedtuu he impenurù kenitew. Su zuen utew lavew he memumuhat he iyan datù tew he nekid-etuvang en te Megbevayà. Iyan heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà.

Ne heini si Jesus is lavew he memumuhat tew, nesavut din is keg̵uyè tew tenged te kememenusiyai tew su neseg̵azan din he mibpenulayan sikandin dengan ni Setanas te minsan hengkey he paag̵i iring te ebpenulayan kiw zaan, iyan, wazà mulà sikandin mepenulayi.

Ne tenged kandin, wazà igkelenew te isip tew te ked-uvey zutun te etuvangan te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà pinaag̵i te ked-ampù su utew velig̵eg̵awen is Megbevayà. Ingkehizu kiw zin ne edtevangan kiw zin dutun te timpu te menge kemereg̵enan.

Su ke zuen etew he ebpilien he lavew he memumuhat, idsarig kandin is ked-etuvang te Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin datù te menge etew. Ne idsarig daan kandin is menge ibeg̵ey ziyà te Megbevayà wey is kebpemuhat wey mepelisi is menge etew te menge mezaat he ulaula.
Ne tenged te etew zà duen sikandin he layun egkesayep, egkehimu he mepelevayen sikandin te menge zuma zin he etew he egkengesayep daan tenged te kenè dan ebpekesavut.

Ne tenged te zuen daan kandin he menge sayep, kinahanglan he zuen ibpemuhat din tenged te kandin he menge mezaat he ulaula iring te zuen daan ibpemuhat din tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula te menge zuma zin he etew.

Utew telehuzen is lavew he memumuhat, iyan, wazà minsan hentei he ebpekehimu he ebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat su iyan ebpilì kandin is Megbevayà iring te mibpilì din dengan si Arun.
Ne iring din ded daan wazà iyan si Kristu mebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he lavew he memumuhat tew, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà su migkag̵i kandin is Megbevayà te,
“Iyan ka Anak ku.
Ne egkeg̵iyen ku he g̵untaan ibpeehè ku
he Amey a kenikew.”
Ne zuen pa insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te,
“Iring ka ki Milkisidik he memumuhat dengan,
su wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu.”

Ne hein kemulu pa si Jesus dini te kelibutan, ne mibpenig̵is is luhè din ne nekelelendag sikandin tenged te utew meheg̵et is kebuyù din wey ked-ampù din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekelibri kandin te kemetayen. Ne tenged te zekelà is kedtahud din wey kedtumana zin te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, midineg is ked-ampù din te Megbevayà.
Su minsan pa te Anak sikandin te Megbevayà, ingkepenurù gihapun kandin is kebpeketuman te sug̵ù te Megbevayà pinaag̵i te menge kemereg̵enan he nengeeg̵iyan din.
Ne hein nepasad din en is langun he impetuman kandin te Megbevayà, nehimu sikandin he Menluluwas te langun he ebpemineg kandin su wey meveg̵ayi sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne zutun, is Megbevayà, midlilaan din sikandin he lavew he memumuhat iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.
Dekelè pa is ibpesavut ku pezem keniyu mehitenged te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik wey ni Jesus, iyan, mereg̵en he edseysayen su kenè niw en egkesavut. Henduen be te kenè en ed-uteng diyà te isip niw.

Neug̵et en is kebpeketuu niw ki Jesus, ne engayan kew en pezem he menge menunudlù, iyan, kenà egkehimu su kinahanglan he ebpekepepenurù kew pa ebpekepeuman wey niw mesavut is menge melemu zà he tuluuwen he ebpuun te Lalag te Megbevayà. Henduen te kemulu kew pa edsusu su kenè niw pa egkelutang te egkaan is mezesen he egkeenen,
Emun deisek ki pa he vatà ne iyan dà egkezawat ta is gatas, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kenè te pa egketuenan is penurù mehitenged te metazeng he ulaula.
Ne emun meg̵urang ki en ne egkesepè te en is mehunit he egkeenen,

Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, netengkaan en is ked-istudyuwi tew zuen te menge nehuna he melemu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew mehitenged ki Kristu. Kinahanglan he edlaus kiw en dutun te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan. Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan te ed-istudyu is menge nehuna he impenurù kenitew iring te ked-engkezi te kedsarig te menge ulaula he wazà pulus, wey is kedtuu te Megbevayà.
Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan is ked-istudyu te kebpemewtismu, wey is kedewata te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, is kegkevenhawa kenita keuzemà, wey is kedsusiya te Megbevayà keuzemà te tivuuk he menusiyà,
kekenà, emun idtug̵ut te Megbevayà, edlaus kiw en te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan.

Su penenglitan duen menge etew he neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip dan. Nesavut dan en ke hengkey is ibeg̵ey kenitew ziyà te langit, ne nekeambit dan en te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, ne netuenan dan en is meupiya he impesavut te Megbevayà, ne neehè dan daan is egkehimu te g̵ehem he ibpaahà te Megbevayà keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu. Ne emun ed-iniyug̵an dan heini kenè en egkehimu he ibpelikù dan ibpeuman wey zan meiniyug̵i is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Henduen be te in-uman dan iransang diyà te krus is Anak te Megbevayà ne edhimuwen dan he sumpelita sikandin te menge etew.

Su sikitew is menusiyà, ne iring kiw te tanà. Ne is tanà he layun ed-uzani ne memelambeg is menge pinemula zuen, ne zekelà is pulus kayi ziyà te teg̵itanà. Ne is etew he iring dutun te tanà, edtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, ke zuen tanà he iyan dà ebpeketuvù duen is menge zug̵iyen he sagbet wey menge hilemunen, ne wazè din pulus, ne ed-engkezan, ne ebinsulan te teg̵itanà. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he iring kayi te tanà su edsilutan te Megbevayà.

Na, menge minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iring kayi is menge lalag ku keniyu, netuenan ku he meupiya pa mulà is egkezungguan niw su netuenan ku he zekelà is pulus te kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà.

Su kenà egkehimu he kenà metazeng is kedsusiya keniyu te Megbevayà; su kenà egkehimu he egkelipatan din is langun he meupiya he mid-ulaula niw tenged te mahal sikandin diyà te g̵ehinawa niw su midtevangan niw is menge zuma tew he tumutuu ne minsan guntaan wazè niw engkezi is kedtevangi niw kandan.

Ne is kada sevaha keniyu, egkesuatan dey he kenè niw zaan engkezi is kedhag̵ù niw taman te kedlikù ni Jesus dutun te ketepusan he timpu keuzemà su wey zutun metuman diyan te keniyu is langun he meupiya he ebpeebuten tew.
Kinahanglan he kenè kew mebpetetapul, kekenà, iringi niw is menge etew he meinentusen he edtuu te Megbevayà su tenged kayi egkezawat dan is impenaad te Megbevayà.

Isipa niw si Abraham. Dutun te kebpenaazi kandin te Megbevayà, is Megbevayà, ne wazà duma he ngazan he neg̵amit din te kedlig-eni zin te penaad din, kekenà, migamit din is kandin he keugelingen he ngazan su wazà lavew kandin.
Ne pinaag̵i te kandin he ngazan migkag̵i sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, “Kenè en ebperis he edtuvazan ku sikew te meupiya ne ebmezakel utew is menge kevuwazan nu.”
Ne si Abraham, utew sikandin meinentusen he edsarig te Megbevayà taman te netuman te Megbevayà is penaad din kandin.

Ne emun duen penaad te etew zà duen, iyan idlig-en din te penaad din is: duen lavew kandin he ibpepirma zin zutun te penaad din. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan din dutun te husayen, ebpeketuu te lalag din is ebpemineg dutun te penaad din.
Ne egkesuatan dengan te Megbevayà he mesavut te menge etew he mibpenaazan din he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din is penaad din kandan, ne tenged kayi midlig-enan din is penaad din.

Ne zuen dezuwa he ulaula te Megbevayà he kenà egkehalin te minsan hentei. Is sevaha, ne iyan is penaad din, ne is sevaha, ne iyan is kedlig-eni zin te penaad din. Ne pinaag̵i kayi te zezuwa egkesavut ta he kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad din. Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is nemekeaput diyà te kandin, utew meheg̵et is kedsarig tew kandin ne tenged kayi edhemenan tew is kebpeebuta tew te langun he meupiya he impenaad din kenitew.

Ne utew mezesen wey nelig-enan heini is kebpeebuta tew he edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din su iyan edserig̵an tew is Megbevayà. Ne si Jesus, ne nehimu en sikandin he zatù tew ne ziyè en sikandin te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne nehimu en si Jesus he lavew he memumuhat tew he wazè din pidtemanan he iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.

Su heini si Milkisidik, ne hadì sikandin dengan te inged he Selim, wey memumuhat sikandin he ed-azap te lavew he Megbevayà. Ne zuen timpu zutun he si Abraham, mibpekidtebek te menge hadì he kuntada zin ne mibpenhimetayan din. Ne zutun te ked-ulì ni Abraham, midsinug̵ung sikandin ni Milkisidik, ne migkag̵i ni Milkisidik pinaag̵i te kebpenuvadtuvad he edtuvazan si Abraham te Megbevayà te meupiya he tuvad.

Ne si Abraham, imbeg̵ey zin diyà te ki Milkisidik is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he nengetavan din. Ne heini is ngazan he Milkisidik, dezuwa is kehulug̵an din. Is egkehuna ne “hadì he ebpekeveg̵ey te ketazeng.” Ne tenged te hadì sikandin te inged he Selim, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kelinew, elin daan kehulug̵an din is “hadì he ebpekeveg̵ey te kelinew.”

Ne kenà duen dà taman su wazà gug̵ud ke hentei is amey zin wey iney zin wey menge kepuun din, ne wazà daan gug̵uza is kegkeetew zin wey is keag̵i te kemetayen din. Umba heini si Milkisidik, ebpekeiring sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà su iring te wazè din puunà, ne wazè din ketepusan, ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat din.
Isipa niw he utew lavew si Milkisidik su is kepuun tew he si Abraham, imbeg̵ey zin kandin is ikesepulù he vahin te netavan din dutun te kebpekezaag din te menge hadì.

Ne is menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, ne menge kevuwazan daan sikandan ni Abraham. Ne insug̵ù kandan te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises he kuwaa zan is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he ketig̵eyunan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu minsan pa te menge kevuwazan daan heini ni Abraham.

Iyan, si Milkisidik, kenà mulà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi ne minsan pa zutun midawat din is ikesepulù he imbeg̵ey kandin ni Abraham ne zutun, si Abraham, is mibpenaazan te Megbevayà, mibpenubtuvazan ni Milkisidik.
Ne netuenan te minsan hentei he is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din is sengeeetew en, ne lavew sikandin kenà haazà is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din.

Ne is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi, ne edewaten dan is ikesepulù ne ebpatey zan gihapun, iyan, si Milkisidik he mibeg̵ayan dengan ni Abraham te ikesepulù, sumalà is kedsevuta ta zutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, iring te kemulu pa sikandin uuyag.

Ne si Levi, iyan kepuun te langun he menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne egkesavut ta zaan he zutun te kebeg̵aya ni Abraham te ikesepulù diyà te ki Milkisidik, nekeveg̵ey zaan si Levi ziyà te ki Milkisidik.
Su zutun te kebpeked-uma ni Abraham wey si Milkisidik wazè pa zutun ianak si Levi, kekenà, diyè pa sikandin te lawa ni Abraham he apù din.

Ne netuenan ta he zutun te kebeg̵aya te Megbevayà te kesug̵uan diyà te menge Hudiyu, midtendek din is menge memumuhat he iyan is menge kevuwazan ni Levi he iyan ed-uwit te kesug̵uan. Ne emun egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menusiyà pinaag̵i te kandan he menge vaal, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa maan memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik. Iyan, duen en mibpilì te Megbevayà he selakew en he memumuhat. Ne heini, ne kenà iring ki Arun he kevuwazan ni Levi, kekenà, iring sikandin ki Milkisidik.
Ne emun ed-ilisan is menge memumuhat, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan daan is kesug̵uan he mibenteyanan dan.

Ne is Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan memumuhat he nekeilis te zaan he menge memumuhat, kenà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi su kevuwazan ni Huda. Ne te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Huda, iyan dà sikandin nehimu he memumuhat. Ne wazà ipesavut ni Moises dengan he zuen kevuwazan ni Huda he egkehimu he memumuhat.
Ne keladu en utew he emun mid-ilisan en is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi ne mid-ilisan daan is kesug̵uan su zuen selakew en he memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik.
Ne wazà heini is beg̵u himuwa he kelibutanen he memumuhat pinaag̵i te menge kelibutanen he kesug̵uan, kekenà, midhimu sikandin he memumuhat tenged te mekeg̵eg̵ehem sikandin su wazè din kemetayen.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he zutun migkeg̵iyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, “Memumuhat ka he wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu iring te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik.”
Ibpesavut kenitew kayi he is daan he kesug̵uan, in-awè en te Megbevayà su wazè din pulus ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew te menusiyà,

su kenà egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng pinaag̵i te kedtumana kayi. Ne tenged kayi, imbeg̵ey en kenitew te Megbevayà is meupiya pa he egkeserig̵an he paag̵i. Ne pinaag̵i kayi, egkehimu he pinaag̵i te ked-azap tew ebpekeetuvang kiw en te Megbevayà.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su utew zeyzey heini is beg̵u he paag̵i su zutun te kedhimuwa te Megbevayà ki Jesus he memumuhat, mibpenaazan sikandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, hein nehimu zengan he memumuhat is menge kevuwazan ni Levi, wazà sikandan penaazi te Megbevayà.
Iyan, si Jesus mulà, mibpenaazan te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Siak is Megbevayà,
impenaad ku
he egkehimu ka he memumuhat ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu,
ne kenè en heini ebperis.”
Ne tenged kayi te penaad te Megbevayà, pinaag̵i ki Jesus egkesiguru tew he utew pa meupiya heini is beg̵u he paag̵i he midtukud te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin kenitew kenà is daan.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su haazà is menge memumuhat dengan he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, kinahanglan he utew zan mezakel su emun ebpatey is duma kandan, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan dutun te zuma.
Iyan, si Jesus, wazà pidtemanan mulà te kandin he untung ne kenà sikandin egkeilisan he memumuhat.

Ne tenged kayi, egkehimu te minsan keenu he timpu he edlibriyen din te silut is minsan hentei he menge etew emun pinaag̵i kandin ed-aput sikandan diyà te Megbevayà su wazà pidtemanan te untung din, ne layun din egkehimu te edtavang sikandan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Iyan si Jesus lavew he memumuhat he egkinehenglanen tew su wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula zin, wazè din salà, ne wazè din sayep. Ne kenà sikandin iring te menge mekesesalà he menusiyà, ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he lavew te minsan hentei ziyà te langit.

Kenà sikandin iring te menge zaan he lavew he memumuhat su wazà kinahanglan he ebpemuhat sikandin andew-andew iring kandan. Su andew-andew ebpemuhat dan. Edhuna zan ebpemuhat tenged te kandan he keugelingen he salà, ne human dan ebpemuhat tenged te menge salà te menge etew. Iyan, si Jesus mulà, kesevaha zà is kandin he kebpemuhat ne wazè din en umani. Midhimu zin heini zutun te kebpehimatey zin diyà te krus.

Haazà is nengehimu he menge lavew he memumuhat pinaag̵i te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne layun duen igkesewayi kandan. Iyan, neug̵et pa zutun nehimu is Anak te Megbevayà he memumuhat tenged te kebpilia kandin te Megbevayà wey tenged te penaad te Megbevayà he nekeilis te zaan he kesug̵uan. Ne heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi kandin, nehimu en sikandin he memumuhat he wazà pidtemanan is kegkememumuhat din.

Ne iyan kehulug̵an te langun he impesavut ku en keniyu is: duen tew en lavew he memumuhat he iring kayi ne iyan si Jesus. Impepinuu en sikandin diyà te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà diyà te langit.
Edtumanen din is kegkememumuhat din diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, diyà te tutuu he valey he ed-ezapan he wazà beeli te etew, kekenà, mibeelan te Megbevayà su ziyà te langit.

Is lavew he memumuhat dini te kelibutan, insug̵ù kandin is kebpemuhata te menge ibpelengesa wey is kebeg̵aya te menge halad diyà te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he zuen daan ibpemuhat te kenitew he lavew he memumuhat.

Iyan, dutun te kemulu pa sikandin dini te kelibutan, kenà egkehimu he memumuhat sikandin su puun pa te zengan dà taman guntaan duen menge memumuhat he ebpemuhat sumalà is insug̵ù kandan dutun te kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.

Alung dà is kandan he vaal su ed-iringan dan dà haazà is tutuu he ebpeiringan kandan he ziyà te langit. Netuenan ta heini su zutun te kebeeli ni Moises te simbahan he terapal he iyan dengan baley te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, migkeg̵iyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, “Purungi nu te ed-iring is simbahan diyà te langit he impeehè ku kenikew ziyà te vuntud.

Ne is baal ni Jesus te memumuhat, ne lavew pa utew he meupiya, kenà is baal te menge memumuhat dini te kelibutan. Ne iring din ded daan, meupiya pa utew is beg̵u he paag̵i he ed-ikulen din wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà, kenà is daan he paag̵i. Su heini is beg̵u, ne nevig̵eran te tuwas pa he meupiya he penaad te Megbevayà.
Haazà is nehuna he paag̵i, ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew. Su ke neketavang haazà is nehuna kenè en kinahanglan he ed-ilisan pa maan te veg̵u.
Iyan, wazà mesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula te menge etew he nekesundan duen te nehuna he paag̵i su zuen insurat he Lalag te Nengazen he edhenduen te,
“Duen timpu keuzemà he zutun edhimuwen ku is beg̵u en he paag̵i wey ku mezawat is langun he menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
Ne heini is beg̵u he paag̵i, ne kenà iring te nehuna he paag̵i he imbeg̵ey ku ziyà te menge lukes dan dengan te ked-eg̵aka ku kandan dutun te kebpeewaa ku kandan dutun te tanà he Ihiptu.
Wazè dan tumana is menge sug̵ù ku zutun te nehuna he paag̵i ne tenged kayi mid-iniyug̵an ku sikandan,” ke sikandin.
Ne mid-uman megkag̵i is Nengazen te,
“Is beg̵u he paag̵i he edtukuzen ku wey ku mezawat is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil,
ne iyan heini: is menge sug̵ù ku,
ne idsurat ku ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan ne egkesuatan dan human te edtuman heini.
Ne human a egkehimu he Megbevayà dan ne egkehimu sikandan he menge g̵aked ku.
Ne tenged kayi, dutun he timpu keuzemà kenè en kinahanglan te minsan hentei he ebpepenurù te zuma zin mehitenged kedì,
ne kenè en daan kinahanglan dutun he zuen pa maan etew he edseysey ziyà te zuma zin ke hentei a is Megbevayà su zutun egketuenan te minsan hentei,
lavew se kenà lavew, ke hentei a.
Ne egkehizuwan ku sikandan,
ne ebpeseyluwen ku sikandan te mezaat he mid-ulaula zan,
ne edlipatan ku en is menge salè dan,”
ke sikandin.

Ne g̵eina te migkag̵i te Megbevayà he zuen beg̵u en he paag̵i, egkesavut tew he kenè en ebpulus haazà is daan. Ne ke zuen minsan hengkey he zaan en he kenè en egkeg̵amit ne ed-engkezan en su ed-ilisan te veg̵u.
Ne zutun te nehuna he paag̵i te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà, impenurù te Megbevayà is paag̵i te ked-ezapa zan kandin wey ke ebmenmenuwen is kebeeli te simbahan dini te kelibutan.

Impehitindeg dan is simbahan he valey he terapal ne zezuwa is rug̵u zutun. Is sevaha, ne iyan kes egngezanan te mahal he rug̵u. Ne zutun dan isavuk is sulù, wey is lemisahan he zutun isavuk is supas he ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà.

Duen kurtina zutun te idselang te valey he terapal ne zuen daan kurtina he intaltal zutun te mid-elangan te zezuwa he rug̵u. Ne heini is ikezuwa he rug̵u ne iyan kes egngezanan te utew mahal he rug̵u.

Ne is seled kayi, insavuk dan dutun kes pemuhatà he vulawan he zutun edtutunga is beyewà. Ne zutun daan isavuk kes kavan he mid-epizan te vulawan. Tuus heini is kavan te zaan he paag̵i he midtukud te Megbevayà. Diyà te seled dutun te kavan ne egkeahà is bulawan he umuy he zutun itag̵ù kes keuyag̵an he mana. Ne zutun daan te seled te kavan egkeahà kes tuked ni Arun he mibpeneringsing wey kes dezuwa he melumpipi he vatu he zutun isurat te Megbevayà kes kesug̵uan.

Ne insihung haazà is kavan dutun te zezuwa he ledawan te menge mekeg̵eg̵ehem he kedesenan he iyan tuus he zutun is Megbevayà. Mibekar zan is pakpak dan ne intezung dan dutun te vulawan he vangkù he zutun ebpelisa te Megbevayà is menge salà te menge etew. Ne kayi zà taman heini su kenè en egkehimu he id-amin ku te edseysey is langun kayi.
Ne hein naandam dan en is langun kayi ne kada andew edseled is menge memumuhat dutun te nehuna he rug̵u he egngezanan te mahal he rug̵u su edtumanen dan is ebpeveelan kandan.

Iyan, haazà is sevaha he rug̵u he egngezanan te utew mahal he rug̵u, iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is lavew he memumuhat. Ne kesevaha zà sikandin edseled dutun te sengetuig. Ne emun ed-ahuk sikandin dutun, kinahanglan he ed-uwiten din is lengesa he ibpemuhat wey mepalis is menge salè din wey is menge salà he wazà tuyua te langun he menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Iyan heini ulaula te menge memumuhat dutun te simbahan, ne pinaag̵i kayi ibpesavut kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he te kemulu pa kinahanglan he egemiten haazà is egkehuna he rug̵u he egngezanan te mahal he rug̵u, kenè pa ebpekeseled is menge etew zà duen dutun te utew mahal he rug̵u.

Ne alung heini he ibpesavut kenita he is menge ibpemuhat dutun he menge langgam wey is menge halad, kenà heini ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew he ed-azap dutun su nesavut dan he pinaag̵i kayi wazè dan pa himuwa he metazeng.

Su heini he paag̵i te ked-ezapa te Megbevayà, ne pinaag̵i zà te menge sug̵ù mehitenged te vetasan te kegkaan, ked-inum, kebpenlùlù, wey kedhemesa te lawa he paag̵i he insug̵ù te Megbevayà. Menge sug̵ù heini he edtumanen te menge etew pinaag̵i zà te lawa wey tenged dà te insug̵ù ne kenà tenged te iyan diyà te g̵ehinawa zan. Ne is pulus kayi te paag̵i, ne taman dà heini kayi te timpu g̵untaan te ked-ilisi te Megbevayà kayi te veg̵u he paag̵i.

Ne g̵untaan nekeuma en si Kristu, ne nehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat mehitenged kayi te veg̵u he paag̵i he meupiya kenà kes daan. Ne midseled sikandin diyà te meupiya pa wey lavew pa he simbahan he wazà beeli te etew zà duen su kenà dini te kelibutan.

Ne kesevaha zà is kedseled din dutun te utew mahal he rug̵u te simbahan he ziyà te langit ne kenè en ed-uman. Ne wazà sikandin mekeseled dutun tenged te kebpelengesa zin te lengesa te menge ayam dà duen, iring te menge kambing wey menge nati he vaka, kekenà, nekeseled dutun tenged te impelengesa zin is kandin he lengesa. Ne tenged kayi te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, midhimu zin he wazà pidtemanan te kedlibriya zin kenita te silut.

Dengan, sumalà is impenurù te kesug̵uan, ke zuen etew he mibmeremerik tenged te mid-uvayan din is minatey, kinahanglan he ebpetig̵isan sikandin te lengesa te ibpemuhat he vaka wey kambing, wey igmuk te edtutungen he nati he vaka. Ne pinaag̵i kayi egkepelisan sikandin dutun te kegkeremeriki te lawa zin.

Ne emun egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan haazà pinaag̵i zà te lengesa te menge vaka wey kambing, iyan pe be kenà utew pa lavew is egkelumpiyuwan pinaag̵i te lengesa ni Kristu. Su pinaag̵i te tavang te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he wazè din pidtemanan, impemuhat ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà is kandin he lawa; ne wazà igkesewayi kandin. Ne pinaag̵i te kebpelisi kenita te lengesa zin, in-awè din is menge salè ta wey is kebpekesarig ta te menge ulaula he wazè dan pulus. Ne tenged kayi ebpekeazap ki en te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi zaan nehimu en si Kristu he zatù tew su wey zin metukud is beg̵u en he paag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne pinaag̵i kayi, is langun he midhimu te Megbevayà he meketuu, egkezawat dan is langun he meupiya he wazè din pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Umba egkehimu heini su pinaag̵i te kebpatey ni Kristu nengepalis is langun he menge mezaat he ulaula he nehimu te menge etew zutun te timpu he nengesakup sikandan te nehuna he paag̵i.

Ne penenglitan, duen etew he mibaal te dukumintu ne migkag̵i zin dutun te dukumintu he emun ebpatey sikandin duen menge azen din he ibpepengevilin din te menge zuma zin. Ne zutun te kebpatey zin kinahanglan he zuen ebpeketistig̵us he tutuu iyan he minatey en haazà is etew, ne human ebpekezawat dutun te menge azen din haazà is migkag̵i zutun te dukumintu.
Emun kemulu pa uuyag haazà is teg̵iazen, ne kenè pa edtumanen haazà is migkag̵i zutun te dukumintu. Iyan, emun ebpatey en, human edtumana haazà.
Ne iring din ded daan haazà is nehuna he paag̵i he midtukud te Megbevayà su kinahanglan dutun he zuen lengesa he tuus te edhimetayan he langgam ne human egketuman haazà is paag̵i.

Ne tenged kayi, hein aney ipenurù ni Moises diyà te langun he menge etew is langun he ibpetuman kandan te Megbevayà dutun te kesug̵uan, migkuwa zin is lengesa te menge nati he vaka he impemuhat, ne mid-emutan din te wahig. Midhames din dutun is bulvul te kerehidu he midtinà te merig̵à wey is subpang te kayu he egngezanan te hisup. Ne mibpirikan din dutun is libru he zutun isurat is kesug̵uan wey mibpirikan din daan is langun he menge etew.

Ne migkeg̵iyan din dutun is menge etew te, “Tuus heini is lengesa te paag̵i he midtukud te Megbevayà wey kiw zin mezawat, ne kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew te edtuman heini su insug̵ù te Megbevayà,” ke sikandin.
Ne iring din ded daan mibpirikan ni Moises is simbahan he valey he terapal wey is langun he tag̵ù dutun he egemiten dan te ked-ezapa zan te Megbevayà.

Impenurù te kesug̵uan he kinahanglan he ebpelisan te lengesa is hapit minsan hengkey he egemiten dan te ked-azap. Ne iring din ded daan wey zà egkepesaylu is menge salà te menge etew ke zuen ibpelengesa.

Ne haazà is simbahan te menge Hudiyu zini te kelibutan wey is menge g̵elemiten dan te ked-azap, ne menge alung dà te tutuu he simbahan diyà te langit. Ne egkepelengesahan is kelibutanen he simbahan pinaag̵i te kelibutanen he pemuhat, iyan, haazà is diyà te langit, ne kinahanglan he lavew pa he meupiya is ibpemuhat dutun.

Dutun te kebpemuhat ni Kristu, wazè sikandin medseled diyà te utew mahal he rug̵u te simbahan he zini te kelibutan su alung dà heini te tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit. Iyan midselezan din kes tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit ne g̵untaan iyan sikandin datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Ne is lavew he memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne kada tuig edseled sikandin dutun te utew mahal he rug̵u zutun te simbahan dini te kelibutan su ibpemuhat din is lengesa te langgam. Iyan, si Kristu mulà, wazà melelayun is kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin

su emun iyan haazà egkinehenglanen, puun pa te kedlimbag̵a te kelibutan, ne utew mezakel is kebpekeantus din te kebpehimatey. Iyan, wazà iyan haazà kinehenglana su iyan mid-ulaula zin kayi te timpu he meg̵aan en egketapus is kelibutan is: midlepew sikandin wey zin maawà is salè tew pinaag̵i te kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Ne kesevaha zà is kedhimuwa zin kayi.
Imbanglis te Megbevayà diyà te menusiyà is kebpatey te kesevaha, ne egkeipus dutun te kebpatey zin ne edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin.

Ne si Kristu zaan, kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey zin he iyan kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin wey zin maawà is menge salà te utew mezakel he menge etew. Ne ed-uman pa ebulus si Jesus dini te kelibutan, kenà te ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, kekenà, edhimesazen din is kedlibriya zin te langun he utew zekelà is perateng dan kandin.

Ne egkesavut te en he is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne alung dà; ne is langun he meupiya he egkehimu pinaag̵i ki Kristu, ne iyan hustu he impaalung dutun te kesug̵uan. Su insug̵ù dutun te kesug̵uan he kinahanglan kada tuig, ne layun edhimuwa is menge kebpemuhat. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut ta zaan he pinaag̵i kayi te kebpemuhat kenà egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menge etew.

Su emun pinaag̵i zutun he paag̵i nelumpiyuwan is menge ulaula te menge ed-azap, ne wazè en kinahanglan he ed-uman dan pa ebpemuhat su nengepesaylu en pezem is menge salè dan ne egkesavut dan dutun he kenè en sikandan edsilutan tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
Ne g̵eina te kada tuig dutun, kinahanglan gihapun he ed-uman dan ebpemuhat ne netuenan dan he wazè bes maawà is menge salè dan.
Su kenà egkehimu te minsan hengkey he paag̵i he igkeawà te menge salè tew is lengesa te menge vaka wey menge kambing.
Ne egketuenan ta heini su zutun te timpu zengan he nekeuma si Kristu zini te kelibutan, migkag̵i sikandin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà te,
“Kena iyan is menge ibpemuhat he ayam egkesuatan nu, kekenà,
midlimbag nu is lawa he egkeg̵amit ku,
ne iyan heini egkesuatan nu he ibpemuhat.
Su kenè nu iyan egkesuatan is kebpemuhata zan te menge ayam he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te menge salè dan.
Ne tenged kayi migkag̵i si Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà te,
‘Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu sumalà is insurat he tagnà mehitenged kedì dutun te insurat he lalag nu,’ ” ke sikandin.

Midhunaan din te egkag̵i he kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge halad wey menge kebpemuhat he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te salà. Ne migkag̵i zin heini minsan pa te intelaan heini te kesug̵uan.

Ne mid-umanan din te egkag̵i te, “Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu.” Ne tenged kayi egkesavut tew he mid-ilisan te Megbevayà is daan he paag̵i te kebpemuhat ne iyan in-ilis dutun is kebpemuhata te lawa ni Kristu.
Ne g̵eina te midtuman ni Jesu Kristu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, nengepalis is menge salè tew pinaag̵i te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa.

Ne zutun te zaan he paag̵i te ked-azap, is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu, ne andew-andew ziyè dan te simbahan edhithitindeg is edterebahu su edtumanen dan is baal zan te kebpemuhat. Ne heini is menge kebpemuhat dan, ne kenà gihapun ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew.

Iyan, si Kristu mulà, kesevaha zà sikandin mebpemuhat, ne naawà dutun is menge salè tew ne kenè en heini kinahanglan he ed-umanan pa maan te minsan keenu. Ne tuus te netapus din en heini is terebahu zin su mibpinuu sikandin diyà te lavew he pinuuwà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
Ne kemulu pa sikandin dutun guntaan su edteg̵azan din is timpu keuzemà he zutun egkevakus te Megbevayà is langun he menge kuntada zin wey sikandin mekehadì.
Ne tenged kayi te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhat din diyà te Megbevayà, sikitew is mibpelisan din te salà, midhimu kiw zin he metazeng te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zuen daan ibpenurù kenitew te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin dutun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Siak is Nengazen,
iyan heini veg̵u en he paag̵i
he edtukuzen ku zutun te menge sakup ku keuzemà wey ku sikandan mezawat.
Idsurat ku is menge sug̵ù ku ziyà te g̵ehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan,” ke sikandin.
Ne mid-uman sikandin megkag̵i te, “Is menge salè dan wey is menge mezaat he ulaula zan, edlipatan ku, ne kenè ku en maan ed-isipen.”
Ne zutun, geina te nengepesaylu zin en heini is langun, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa ibpemuhat he id-awà te menge salè ta.
Ne, menge suled, tenged te mibpehimatey si Jesus ne impetig̵is is lengesa zin, wazè en kegkelenew ta te kedseled pinaag̵i te ked-ampù dutun te utew mahal he rug̵u he seled te kurtina.
Su si Jesus, midhimu zin is ibayè ta pinaag̵i te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, ne heini is ibayà, ne ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su zuen te en utew lavew he memumuhat he ebayàbayà kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi, ed-etuvang ki en te Megbevayà, ne kenà tarù is ked-ezapa ta kandin. Edheg̵eten ta is kedtuu ta ne kenè ki eduwazuwa. Su netuenan ta he nepelisan ki en te lengesa ni Jesus ne netuenan ta zaan he in-awà kayi is menge salè ta. Nengebewtismuwan kiw en he tuus te kedlumpiyuwi kenitew te Megbevayà.
Edhemenan tew is meheg̵et he kebperateng te kedtulusa kenitew keuzemà te wazà duwazuwa su netuenan tew he metinumanen is Megbevayà ne edhimuwen din is impenaad din kenitew.
Kenà tew ed-ewaan dini te g̵ehinawa tew is kebpepurpurungè tew su wey layun mahal zini te g̵ehinawa tew is minsan hentei, ne wey layun mehimu te uman sevaha kenitew is menge meupiya he ulaula.

Kenè tew ed-engkezan is kedtig̵um tew te ked-azap te Megbevayà; kenè tew ed-iringan is duma he menge tumutuu he mid-engkezan dan en is kedsimba, kekenà, edtig̵um kiw su wey kiw mekepesemsembag̵à. Utew heini kinahanglan, lavew en emun egketuusan ta he meg̵aan en is kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Ne emun nesavut te en is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan, edtuyuen te pa maan is layun ked-ulaula te mezaat he ulaula, wazè en minsan hengkey he kebpemuhat he edewaten te Megbevayà wey maawà is salè ta.
Is etew he iyan heini ulaula zin, ne iyan egkepengkusan din is mekelimlimezang he hukum kandin wey is utew meinit he hapuy he iyan idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te langun he edsukul kandin.

Su is minsan hentei zengan he wazè din tehuza is kesug̵uan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, emun edtistig̵usan heini te minsan tetelu wey ke zezuwa ve he tistig̵us, ne kenà egkehizuwan, kekenà, edhimetayan sikandin.

Ne emun iyan haazà, wey pe be kenà utew meveg̵at is idsilut dutun te etew g̵untaan he edsumpeliten din is hizu kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Utew meveg̵at is idsilut kandin su igkepesavut din pinaag̵i zutun te mid-ulaula zin he wazà pulus dutun te lengesa ni Jesus he ibpalis pezem kandin he iyan tuus te veg̵u en he paag̵i te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Meveg̵at is silut kandin su edsumpeliten din is belig̵eg̵awen he Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Su netuenan tew he migkag̵i is Megbevayà te, “Iyan a ebales, iyan a edsilut kandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he mezaat.” Ne zuen daan insurat he lalag he edhenduen te, “Edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula te menge sakup din.”
Ne emun iyan edsilut is Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen, ne utew mekehandekhandek haazà is idsilut din!
Isipa niw is timpu zengan hein sikan kew pa meteyawi te tutuu he tuluuwen ne midtuuwan niw. Utew mezakel is kemereg̵enan he nengeeg̵iyan niw, iyan, nekeantus kew ne wazà haazà ikeawà te kedtuu niw.
Mibpesipelahan kew ne midlupig̵an kew ziyà te etuvangan te mezakel he menge etew, ne zuen timpu he mid-unungan niw is menge zuma niw te menge pesipala kandan su nehizuwan niw.

Ne nehizuwan niw, ne midtevangan niw is menge tumutuu he nengepirisu. Ne minsan pa te mibpen-ileg te menge etew is langun he menge azen niw, midlipey kew gihapun su netuenan niw he zuen azen niw he utew pa meupiya ziyà te langit he kenà egkeileg diyà te keniyu te wazè din pidtemanan.
Umba, menge suled, kenè niw engkezi is kedsarig niw su emun meheg̵et is kedsarig niw te Megbevayà, egkezawat niw is suhul zin he utew meupiya.
Kinahanglan he meinentusen kew wey niw metuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne human niw egkezawat is impenaad din keniyu.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Meg̵aan en is kebpekeuma te edteg̵azan niw ne kenà egkehimu he ebpekelimpas sikandin.
Ne haazà is menge sakup ku he nengehimu en he metazeng tenged te kedtuu zan kedì,
ebeg̵ayan ku sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Iyan, ke zuen minsan hentei kandan he edsuwey tenged te kegkehandek, utew ku igkeepes,” ke sikandin.
Iyan, sikitew, menge suled, kenè kiw iring te menge etew he edsuwey ne edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà su mezesen mulà is kedtuu tew ne pinaag̵i kayi nelibri kiw en te silut.

Emun duen kedtuu ta te Megbevayà, egketuenan ta he egkezawat ta is meupiya he ebperetengen ta. Pinaag̵i te kedtuu ta, egketag̵ù dini te g̵ehinawa ta is kedewata ta keuzemà te menge vutang he wazè te pa maahà.
Is menge tipehuna he etew, nezelig̵an sikandan te Megbevayà tenged te midtuuwan dan sikandin.
Netuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà he midlimbag te Megbevayà, ne nehimu pinaag̵i zà te lalag din. Ne tenged kayi egketuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà ne ziyà ebpuun te kenà egkeahà.

Si Abel zengan, tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà ne nehimu zin is utew pa meupiya he pemuhat kenà te impemuhat te kakey zin he si Kain. Ne tenged kayi te kedtuu ni Abel mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng su midawat te Megbevayà is impemuhat din. Ne minsan pa te zengan dà minatey si Abel zuen ketudluanan din kenitew tenged te mezesen is kedtuu zin.

Ne si Inuk daan. Tenged te kedtuu zin wazà sikandin mebpatey su midtulus sikandin te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkeahà dini te kelibutan su ziyè en sikandin te Megbevayà. Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ibpesavut he te wazè pa tulusa si Inuk, nesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula zin.

Is etew he wazè din kedtuu te Megbevayà, kenà egkehimu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin. Su is etew he ebpetavang te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtuuwen din he zuen Megbevayà, ne kinahanglan daan he edtuuwen din he edtuvazan te Megbevayà te meupiya is minsan hentei he edhag̵ù he ebpen-ahà te paag̵i wey sikandin mekepekid-emig̵u te Megbevayà.

Ne zuen daan kedtuu ni Noe su hein midleg̵uyan sikandin te Megbevayà te limas he egkehitavù, midtuuwan din, minsan te wazè din pa maahà haazà is limas. Ne mibeelan din is dekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka ne hein midlapey is dag̵at, nelibri sikandin wey is pemilya zin ne wazè dan melened. Ne pinaag̵i zutun te kedtuu zin, impesavut din he zait he edlimasen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he mekesesalà he menusiyà. Ne zutun mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged te midtuuwan din is migkag̵i te Megbevayà.

Ne si Abraham daan, duen kandin he kedtuu. Su neketuu sikandin te Lalag te Megbevayà he ewai zin is inged din ne medhendiyà te selakew en he tanà he impenaad te Megbevayà he ibeg̵ey ziyà te kandin wey ziyà te menge kevuwazan din. Ne zutun mid-ewaan din is kandin he inged minsan pa te wazè din hanew zutun te tanà he impenaad kandin.

Ne hein nekeuma sikandin dutun te tanà, midtuuwan din he egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he idata kandin te Megbevayà haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun, is ed-ubpaan din dutun, ne menge lawig dà he mid-etepan te terapal he henduen te kenà sikandin meg̵inged dutun te tanà. Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zutun te anak din he si Isaak wey is apù din he si Hakub, minsan pa te impenaad daan kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà.
Su si Abraham, ne iyan hustu he ebperetengen din he inged sikan is inged diyà te langit he kenà egkezeetan te wazè din pidtemanan. Ne iyan mibpelanu wey mibaal kayi is Megbevayà.

Ne si Sara zaan is esawa ni Abraham, duen kandin he kedtuu su minsan te wazà sikandin mekeanak wey utew en sikandin meg̵urang, mibmeg̵ingey g̵ihapun tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà. Umba mibmeg̵ingey sikandin su midtuuwan din is penaad kandin te Megbevayà he egkeuma is timpu he ed-anak sikandin.

Ne is esawa zin he si Abraham he utew en meg̵urang daan he kenè en pezem egkehimu he ebmeg̵ingey si Sara pinaag̵i kandin, nevuwad gihapun ne nehimu sikandin he kepuun te utew mezakel he menge etew. Iring sikandan te pantad diyà te zag̵at wey te menge vituen diyà te langit su kenè en egkengevilang.

Ne heini sikandan he neketuu te Megbevayà, pudu zan minatey te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad te Megbevayà, wazè dan engkezi is kedtuu zan su netuenan dan he egkeug̵et pa zutun egkezawat dan is ebperetengen dan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Ne ingkepesavut dan he kenà sikandan hustu he meg̵inged dini te kelibutan su iyan hustu he inged dan is langit.
Ne is menge etew he iring kayi g̵untaan, kenè dan ed-isipen he iyan hustu he inged dan heini is kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen dan he zuen selakew he inged he iyan hustu he inged dan.
Ensi Abraham, wazè dan daan isipa he iyan hustu he inged dan haazà is mid-ewaan dan su emun iyan haazà, egkehimu he ed-ulì dan dutun.

Su ebpen-ahaan dan is inged he utew pa meupiya, kenà haazà is mid-ewaan dan su iyan ebperetengen dan is egkeubpaan dan he inged diyà te langit. Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà, ne mid-angken sikandan te Megbevayà ne netuenan ta he kenè din igkeeled is kegngezani zan kandin he Megbevayà dan su mid-andam din en is inged he egkeubpaan dan.

Netuenan ta he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he pinaag̵i te anak din he si Isaak egkehimu he utew mezakel is kevuwazan din. Ne hein migezaman te Megbevayà is kedtuu ni Abraham, migkeg̵iyan din si Abraham he ipemuhat din si Isaak. Iyan, utew zekelà is kedtuu ni Abraham te penaad te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun wazè din isipa he kenà egkehimu he kenè din ibpemuhat si Isaak.
Su neisip ni Abraham he ke ebpatey si Isaak, egkehimu he ebenhawen te Megbevayà. Ne henduen be te nevanhew iyan si Isaak dutun su neisip ni Abraham he kenè en ebperis he ebpatey sikandin.
Ne si Isaak daan, midtuu sikandin te penaad kandin te Megbevayà su mibpenubtuvazan din is menge anak din si Hakub wey si Esau.

Ne si Hakub, midtuu zaan sikandin te Megbevayà su zutun te meg̵aan din en kebpatey, mibpenubtuvazan din is menge apù din he menge anak ni Jose ne zutun mid-usazey ziyà te tuked din ne mid-azap din is Megbevayà.

Ne si Jose zaan tenged te kedtuu zin, dutun te meg̵aan din en kebpatey, netagnè din is ked-awà te langun he menge kevuwazan te lukes din he si Israyil ziyà te tanà te Ihiptu. Ne intelaan din daan dutun he ke egenat dan en, uwita zan daan is lawa zin te minatey.

Ne sikan daan is menge g̵inikanan ni Moises, ne zekelà is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà. Su minsan pa te insug̵ù te hadì he edhimatayan is langun he menge vatà he maama te menge Hudiyu, wazè dan mahandek ne zutun te ked-enaka ki Moises in-eles dan sikandin seled te tetelu he vulan su wey kenà sikandin mehimetayi su neehè dan he utew mekempet sikandin he vatà.

Ne si Moises, duen daan kedtuu zin te Megbevayà, su hein meg̵urang en sikandin, mid-ewaan din is meupiya he kebpekesavuk din diyà te valey te anak te hadì te Ihiptu, ne wazà sikandin mesuat he ed-umawen he anak te anak he vahi te hadì.
Su iyan din midtumù he merasey sikandin duma te menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenà te kedlipey pinaag̵i te menge salà dini te kelibutan he egkehitavù te mevavè dà he timpu.

Neisip din he tuwas pa he meupiya is ked-entusa zin te kedlupig̵i kandin tenged te kedsarig din te mibpilì he hadì he ibpevulus te Megbevayà keuzemà, kenà is dekelà he ketig̵eyunan he egkekuwa zin diyà te Ihiptu. Su iyan hustu he edteg̵azan din is langun he meupiya he ibeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà keuzemà.

Ne tenged te kedtuu zin mid-awà sikandin dutun te Ihiptu su wazè din ikehandek is kepauk te hadì te Ihiptu. Ne minsan pa te utew mereg̵en is egkengeseg̵azan din wazà sikandin medlikù su henduen be te egkeehè din he eduma kandin is Megbevayà he kenà egkeahà.

Ne tenged te kedtuu zin midtuman din is Pista te Kedlevayi ne insug̵ù din he ebpelisan te lengesa te nati he kerehidu is gemawan te menge valey te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Umba midhimu zin heini su wey kenà mehimetayi is menge penganey he anak dan te velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ibpepenhimatey te langun he menge penganey he anak te menge etew ziyà te Ihiptu.

Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, pinaag̵i te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà, nekerapas dan te zag̵at he egngezanan te Merig̵à he impedsuwey te Megbevayà, ne neiring te tanà he memazà haazà is imbayè dan. Iyan, is menge tig-Ihiptu he edal-as kandan, ne nengelened dan pudu su imped-uliey te Megbevayà haazà is dag̵at he impedsuwey zin.

Ne zuen daan kedtuu te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, su hein nemekeuma zan dutun te ingkutà te inged he Hiriku ne kada andew seled te pitu he andew ed-elingkus dan dutun te kutà, ne zutun migevà te Megbevayà haazà is kutà.

Duen dutun te inged he Hiriku bahi he meremerik is ulaula zin he egngezanan ki Rahab. Ne minsan pa zutun, hein nekeuma is ed-eles-eles he menge sug̵ù ni Moises he edsusi te kelig-en dutun te inged, midtuu si Rahab te Megbevayà ne midtevangan din haazà is menge etew. Ne neug̵et pa zutun hein migerà is menge zuma zin he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà, wazà sikandin iragkes tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.

Kayi ku zà edtemana heini is gug̵ud su emun ibpelaus ku pa kenè en egkampet is timpu emun egug̵uzen ku pa keniyu is kedtuu te menge zuma pa he menge etew iring ki Gidyun, si Barak, si Samsun, si Hipti, si David, si Samuel wey is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà.

Su pinaag̵i te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà nengezaag te zuma kandan is menge sundaru te menge zekelà he inged. Ne is menge zuma pa, metazeng is kedhedii zan te menge sakup dan, ne is duma pa, nezawat dan is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà, ne is duma, nezaag dan is ebpekekaid he erimaung ne wazè dan mekag̵at.

Ne is duma pa, tenged te kedtuu zan, wazè dan metutung te utew meinit he hapuy, ne is duma pa, wazà sikandan mehimetayi te menge kuntada zan. Ne is duma he utew meg̵uyà, nehimu sikandan he utew mezesen pinaag̵i te kedtuu zan. Nehimu zan he utew mevurut te kebpekidtebek ne nengezaag dan is menge sundaru te menge kuntada zan.
Ne zuen daan menge vahi zengan he zekelà is kedtuu zan ne pinaag̵i kayi nevanhew is menge anak dan he minatey en.

Ne zuen pa zaan menge tumutuu zengan te Megbevayà he midakep, ne minsan pa te midrasey sikandan taman te kebpatey, wazè dan medlekà te kedtuu zan su wey sikandan keuzemà egkevanhew zutun te tuwas pa he meupiya he untung.
Duen pa tumutuu zengan he utew mid-eled-eled ne mibug̵el, ne is duma pa ne midhiketan ne mibpirisu.

Duen daan mibpenhimetayan pinaag̵i te kedtulenga te vatu. Ne zuen pa zaan midliwazà tempeza, ne zuen pa zaan mibpenhimetayan pinaag̵i te tibas. Ne is duma pa, ne tenged te kenè dan ked-engkezi te kedtuu zan, ne iyan dà ugelingen dan is lundis te kerehidu wey kambing. Utew zan nengeayuayu. Mibpemesipelahan wey midlupig̵an sikandan te menge etew.

Is menge mezaat he etew zini te kelibutan, kenè dan dait he ebpekiduma kayi te menge utew metazeng he etew! Ne is duma kayi te menge etew he tumutuu, ne nengeewaan dan is baley zan ne ziyè dan mengetazintazin te tanà he wazà ubpai te etew, wey ziyà te menge vuntud. Ne ziyè dan mekeubpà te menge surung diyà te menge pangpang wey te menge vudsi te tanà.
Ne utew igkelipey te Megbevayà is menge etew he iring kayi, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazè dan pa zutun mezawat is penaad kandan te Megbevayà.
Su zuen meupiya pa utew he paag̵i he mid-isip te Megbevayà su mid-isip din he wey zin edtumana haazà is menge penaad din kandan ke ebpekeragkes kiw zutun te menge etew he edawat te menge penaad din.

Ne sikitew zaan, menge suled, kayi te kedtuu tew te Megbevayà, ne iring kiw te ebpelumlumbeey. Ne g̵eina te utew mezakel is menge tumutuu zengan he nekepaahà kenitew he metinumanen is Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ed-engkezan tew en is minsan hengkey he ebpekesanggen kenitew te edlumbà wey is kenà hustu he ulaula he henduen be te layun tew egkeulaula, ne ebpekezesen kiw te ebpelelag̵uy taman te ebpekeuma kiw ziyà te edungguan tew.

Edhemenan ta is kedsarig ta ki Jesus su iyan sikandin puunà te kedtuu ta ne pinaag̵i zaan kandin egkeheg̵et is kedtuu ta. Mid-antus din is kedrensanga kandin dutun te krus. Ne wazè din ikeeled haazà is kedhimetayi kandin, kekenà, mid-isip din he utew zin igkelipey is egkeulaula zin emun egkeipus haazà is ked-antus din. Ne g̵untaan mibpinuu en sikandin dutun te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.

Ne si Jesus, ne utew merasey is impeseg̵azan kandin tenged te kebpesipelahi kandin te menge lalung he etew. Tenged kayi isipa niw layun sikandin su wey kenà maawà is kedhamen niw te kedsarig niw, ne kenè kew edtepulen te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
Su netuenan niw he zutun te kedsukuli niw te mezaat he ulaula, wazà minsan hentei keniyu he midhimetayan tenged te kedtuu zin.
Kela ke nelipatan niw en is sambag te Megbevayà diyà te keniyu te menge anak din su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Sikew, anak ku, emun edsewayen ku sikew,
purungi nu susiya is menge ulaula nu.
Ne emun ebmensuwen ku sikew kinahanglan he kenà heini igkeawà te kedhamen nu kedsarig kediey.
Su is minsan hentei he mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku, edsewayen ku,
ne is minsan hentei he ed-engkenen ku he anak ku,
ebpenuruen ku pinaag̵i te merasey wey sikandin memansu,” ke sikandin.
Umba, ke minsan hengkey is mereg̵en he egkeulaula niw g̵untaan, entusa niw, su pinaag̵i kayi ebpenuruen kew te Megbevayà su menge anak kew zin. Ne wazà anak he kenà ebmensuwen te amey zin.
Emun kenè kew ebmensuwen te Megbevayà kenè kew tutuu he menge anak din, kekenà, iring kew te ingkeg̵ingey zà.

Su minsan is amey ta zini te kelibutan, emun ebmensuwen ki zin ne ebpekepevayàbayè ki g̵ihapun kandin, wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebpekepevayàbayè ki zaan te Amey ta ziyà te langit? Su pinaag̵i kayi egkeangken ta is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Is amey ta zini te kelibutan, ne seled te mevavè dà he timpu is kebmensuwa zin kenita sumalà is neisip din he meupiya. Ne, is Amey ta ziyà te langit, iyan ibmensuwa zin kenita su wey ki metevangi ne wey ki zaan mehimu he mebmetazeng he iring kandin.

Ne emun ebmensuwen ki te Megbevayà, kenè ta egkesuatan su merasey is egkeulaula ta. Iyan, emun egkepasad haazà is kebmensuwa zin kenita, ne pinaag̵i kayi nemansu ki en te Megbevayà, ne metazeng en is menge ulaula ta, ne zutun utew melinew is kebpekesavuk ta.
Umba, menge suled, heg̵eta niw is kedsarig niw, ne hemeni niw en is kedtuu niw.
Peniguduwi niw te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà su wey kenà luyahi is menge zuma niw he mehugkà is kedtuu zan, kekenà, melig-eni is kedtuu zan.
Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey melinew is kebpekidepitè niw te minsan hentei ne wey niw metuman is metazeng he ulaula su emun kenè ki metazeng kenè ta is Megbevayà egkeahà keuzemà.

Bantey kew su kela ke zuen duma keniyu he kenà edawat te g̵ag̵ew te Megbevayà. Su is iring kayi he etew, ne ebpekeiring te sagbet he ebpemeg̵as te mepait he ebpekehilu. Ebpekesamuk sikandin te menge tumutuu ne mezakel he etew is ebpekeiring kandin te ed-ulaula te mezaat.

Bantey kew su wey wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke ed-iniyug̵an din be is Megbevayà su iring kayi si Esau zengan. Is ketenged din te kegkekakey he anak, inliwè din te keenen he sengepegkaan dà.

Ne neug̵et dutun neisip din he meupiya ke iyan sikandin is kakey penubtuvazi te amey zin wey metuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, wazà mehimu su kenè en egkehimu he edhewien din pa maan is inliwè din en, minsan pa te nekesineg̵ew sikandin is edhangyù.

Is paag̵i te ked-uvey ziyà te Megvevayà he impenurù kenitew, ne kenè en iring te paag̵i te menge kevuwazan dengan ni Israyil. Su iyan mid-uvayan dan is egkeehè dan su ziyà te vuntud he Siney he utew meregreg. Merusirem dutun tenged te kivel ne utew mevendes is keramag.
Egkezineg dan is budyung wey is mezag̵ing he lag̵eng te Megbevayà. Ne hein nezineg te menge etew haazà is lag̵eng, midhangyù dan he med-engked haazà is egkag̵i su utew mekehandekhandek.
Su utew zan ingkehandek is migkag̵i zin he ke sikandin te, “Ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan is ayam niw he ed-uvey pa kayi te vuntud, ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan pinaag̵i te kedtulenga te vatu.”
Ne haazà is neehè dan dutun, ne utew mekehandekhandek ne minsan si Moises, nekag̵i zin he migkerker sikandin tenged te kegkehandek din.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, kenà iring dutun is ked-uvey tew te Megbevayà su iring te ed-uvayan tew is buntud he Siyun he zutun is inged te Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Iyan haazà kes inged he Hiruselim diyà te langit he zutun nengetig̵um is egkengelipey he edliblibuwen he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà.

Iring te mid-uvayan tew en is pengenayan he menge anak te Megbevayà he inlista is menge ngazan dan diyà te langit. Ne mid-uvayan tew en is Megbevayà he iyan edsusi te menge ulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Mid-uvayan tew zaan is gimukud te langun he menge etew he menge metazeng he minatey en he netapus en is kedlibriya kandan te mezaat he ulaula.

Mid-uvayan tew zaan si Jesus he iyan datù tew he midhimu te veg̵u en he paag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Pinaag̵i te lengesa zin nengepelisan is menge salè tew. Tuus is lengesa zin te g̵ag̵ew kenitew te Megbevayà he utew haazà meupiya kenà te lengesa ni Abel zengan

Umba, purung kew pemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè kew sukul. Su is menge etew zengan he wazè dan pemineg̵a is Lalag te Megbevayà he insug̵ù kandan ni Moises dini te kelibutan, emun wazà sikandan mekelikey te silut te Megbevayà, iyan kew pe be mekelikey te silut emun kenè niw ebpemineg̵en is egkeg̵iyen din te ebpuun te langit.
Dengan, migkerker is tanà tenged te utew mezag̵ing he lag̵eng te Megbevayà; iyan, migkag̵i zin he zuen timpu keuzemà he ed-umanan din ibpekerker, kenà iyan dà is tanà, kekenà, ragkes is langit.
Ne iyan kehulug̵an kayi te menge lalag he edhenduen te, “ed-umanan din ibpekerker” is: id-awè din is minsan hengkey he egkewaleng su wey iyan dà metag̵ak is minsan hengkey he kenà egkewaleng.

Umba, kinahanglan he zekelà is kebpeselemati tew kandin su iyan kiw menge sakup te g̵inhedian din he kenà egkehanew te wazè din pidtemanan. Kinahanglan he ed-azap kiw kandin te paag̵i he iyan egkesuatan din. Ne edtehuzan tew sikandin duma is kegkehandek;
su is Megbevayè tew, iring te utew meinit he hapuy is kedsilut din.
Kinahanglan he peniguduwi niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu.

Kenè niw lipati he kinahanglan he ibpeehè niw is gag̵ew niw ziyà te menge etew he kenè niw kilala. Gelg̵elawa niw ziyà te valey niw su zuen dengan menge etew he zuen menge meg̵eliyug dan, iyan, wazè dan metueni he menge velinsug̵uen bes haazà te Megbevayà he ebpuun diyà te langit.

Kenè niw lipati is kedtavang niw te menge tumutuu he pirisu. Purungi niw sikandan he iring te iyan kew nepirisu. Tevangi niw zaan is menge tumutuu he ebpesipelahan he iring te iyan is keugelingen niw he lawa nepesipelahan.

Kinahanglan he tehuza niw te langun is ked-es-esawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he edselselaan din is esawa zin. Edsilutan te Megbevayà is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey is etew he edselselaan din is esawa zin.

Bantey kew su kela ke utew subra is suat niw te selapì. Kinahanglan he imeupiye en te g̵ehinawa niw is naazen niw, su migkag̵i is Megbevayà te, “Kenè ku sikiyu ed-ewaan ne kenè ku sikiyu ed-engkezan.”
Umba, menge suled, dekelà is kedsarig ta te Megbevayà ne ebpekekag̵i ki te,
“Iyan edtavang kedì is Megbevayà,
umba kenà a egkehandek te minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te etew zà duen dini te kediey.”

Kenè niw lipati is menge egalen niw te nengehuna he timpu he nekepenurù keniyu te Lalag te Megbevayà. Isipa niw is meupiya he nehimu pinaag̵i te menge ulaula zan ne iring kandan hemeni niw is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Su si Jesu Kristu, ne kenà egkehalin. Iyan ded sikandin gihapun dengan, wey g̵untaan, wey keuzemà te wazè din pidtemanan.

Umba, kenè niw tuuwi is menge selakew he tuluuwen he kenà iyan kes tutuu he impenurù keniyu. Iyan hustu he ibmelig-en te kedtuu tew is kedtevangi kenitew te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan is kedlikayi te menge egkeenen he indawey te kesug̵uan su wazà heini ikezeyzey te menge etew he ebantey kayi.
Sikitew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu, duen tew en ingkepemuhat, iyan, haazà is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu he ziyà ebpemuhat te simbahan he ziyà te Hiruselim, wazè dan ketenged te kegkaan kayi.

Netuenan niw he emun duen ibpemuhat te menge Hudiyu su ebpelisan dan is menge salè dan, ne is lengesa te ibpemuhat, ed-uwiten te lavew he memumuhat diyà te seled te utew mahal he rug̵u zutun te simbahan, iyan, is lawa te ibpemuhat ne ed-uwiten dan pehendiyà te g̵awas te inged ne zutun dan edtutunga.
Iring din ded daan is neulaula ki Jesus su midhimetayan sikandin diyà te g̵awas te inged ne nehimu is lengesa zin he ibpalis te menge salè tew te menusiyà.
Umba, menge suled, egawas kiw zaan te inged ne edhendiyè kiw en te kandin,
Su kenà ebpedayun is kebpekeubpè tew kayi te kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen tew pa is tutuu he inged tew keuzemà he iyan ed-ubpaan tew te wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he pinaag̵i ki Jesus he memumuhat tew, iyan tew layun ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà is kedelig̵a tew kandin. Layun tew ibpaahà diyà te Megbevayà is kebpeselamati tew kandin.
Kenè niw lipati is kebpurung niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw, ne mebpetebtevangè kew su is ulaula he iring kayi, ne iring te pemuhat he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Tumana niw is sug̵ù te menge egalen niw te menge tumutuu ne ipeehè niw is kedtehuza niw kandan su iyan sikandan ed-elima keniyu te edtuu, ne zuen timpu keuzemà he edsusiyen te Megbevayà ke metinumanen dan be is ed-elima keniyu. Emun ebpemineg̵en niw is sug̵ù dan, utew ibmeupiya te g̵ehinawa zan is baal zan. Ne emun kenè kew ebpemineg, utew mereg̵en is baal zan ne egkehimu zaan heini he idlised niw.
Menge suled, iampù key layun keniyu. Netuenan dey he wazà igkesawey te menge ulaula zey su iyan dà egkesuatan dey he meveeli zey is layun meupiya.
Ne iampù a zaan keniyu wey a meg̵aan ipeulì te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu.

Is Megbevayà, mibanhew zin is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Midtig̵is is lengesa zin he iyan tuus te veg̵u wey wazà pidtemanan he paag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun nehimu si Jesus he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he ed-elima kenitew te menge kerehidu zin.

Berakat he pinaag̵i ki Jesu Kristu, is Megbevayà he ebeg̵ey te kelinew, beg̵ayi kew zin te minsan hengkey he tavang wey niw tumana is egkesuatan din. Berakat daan he himuwa kiw zin he menge etew he utew zin egkesuati is menge ulaula. Edelig̵en tew si Jesu Kristu te wazà pidtemanan.
Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he entusa niw is kebpemineg kayi te langun he menge lalag ku keniyu su kenà utew melug̵ayad heini is insurat ku.
Iyan daan tudtul ku keniyu is: impeg̵awas en te pirisuwan is suled tew he si Timoteo. Emun petuluy ebpekeuma sikandin dini edumahan ku ke ebpekehendiyan a.
Ipengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge egalen niw wey te langun he menge sakup te Megbevayà diyan. Is menge suled tew zini te Italya, ne ebpengemusta zaan sikandan keniyu.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew is langun te Megbevayà.
Iyan a si Santiago is teg̵isurat kayi. Sulug̵uen a te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Kemusta kew is langun he menge g̵aked te Megbevayà he nekedsusuwey zini te tungkup te kelibutan.
Menge suled, mebmelipayen kew emun merasey is egkeulaula niw tenged te idtug̵ut te Megbevayà he zuen ebarangbarang he penggezam te kedtuu niw kandin.
Su nesavut niw en he emun egkeantus niw is penggezam, egkevig̵eran is ked-antus niw.
Ne utew zaan kinahanglan he kenà mehugkà is kebpurung niw ked-antus su emun ebpurung ki ed-antus te merasey egkehimu ki he metau wey wazà igkesewayi kenita wey wazà kurang te kedtuu ta te Megbevayà.

Ne ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkereg̵enan su kenè din egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he paag̵i, mebuyù te ketau ziyà te Megbevayà, ne ebeg̵ayan sikandin su metulanged sikandin ne kenè ki zin edewayen ke ebuyù ki.

Ne emun ebuyù kew te ketau ziyà te kandin kinahanglan he edtuu kew he egkezawat niw te wazà duwazuwa. Su is etew he eduwazuwa, egkehalinhalin layun is isip din. Iring sikandin te vag̵el ziyà te zag̵at he minsan hendei zà duen hiyupa te keramag.
Is etew he iring kayi, kinahanglan he kenè din isipa he ibeg̵ey kandin te Megbevayà is ebuyuen din
su zuwazuwa is ed-isipen din; kenè din edserig̵an is Megbevayà, ne kenà daan egkeserig̵an is minsan hengkey he ulaula zin.
Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen is egkeayuayu he tumutuu emun ibpelavew sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen daan is sepian he tumutuu emun ibpekevavà sikandin te Megbevayà; su is sepian, egkeawà daan sikandin keuzemà iring te kevukad te sagbet.

Edsilaan is sagbet te andew he utew meinit, ne egkelay-ub, ne egkeg̵angu is kevukad din, ne kenè en maan dutun meupiya he ed-ahaan. Ne iring din ded daan is sepian he etew su egketik-ew sikandin ebpatey ne egkeengkezan din is kebpen-ehè din te ketig̵eyunan.

Utew zeyzey is etew he ebpurung ed-antus te penggezam kandin su emun egkeahà he hustu is kedtuu zin, ebeg̵ayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan he iyan impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te g̵ehinawa zan.
Emun egkepenulayan is minsan hentei kenitew, kenè tew ed-isipen he iyan nekepenuley kenitew is Megbevayà, su kenà egkepenulayan is Megbevayà, ne kenè din daan ebpenulayen is minsan hentei.
Egkepenulayan is etew emun ed-eg̵aken sikandin te mezaat he kebayè din.
Ne emun edtumanen din is suat din, ebpekesalà sikandin. Ne iyan dutun pangkus te etew ke ebpeniguduwan din is ked-ulaula te mezaat is kemetayen.
Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw tuuwi is kenà tutuu. Kenà ebpenuley is Megbevayà.

Is minsan hengkey he ibeg̵ey kenitew he meupiya he wazè din kurang, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà he iyan nenlimbag te langun he edsig̵a ziyà te langit. Egkengehalinhalin heini, iyan, is Megbevayà, kenà mulà sikandin edhalin, ne kenà egkehalin te minsan hengkey.

Tenged te iyan egkesuatan din midhimu kiw zin he menge anak din pinaag̵i te kebpesevuta zin kenitew te tutuu he tuluuwen. Egkesuatan din he iyan kiw edhimuwen din he lavew te langun he menge linimbag.

Kenè niw lipati, menge minahal ku he suled, he is minsan hentei kenitew, kinahanglan he layun andam he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè ta ipetuwas is kenita zà he lalag ne kenè ki zaan melemu he egkepauk.
Su emun egkepauk ki kenè ta zutun egketuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Engkezi niw en is minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula wey is kelelalung. Pesakup kew te Megbevayà; hemeni niw is lalag din he impesavut en keniyu su iyan ebpekelibri keniyu te silut.
Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is Lalag te Megbevayà. Emun ebpemineg̵en niw zà is lalag din ne kenè niw edtumanen, henduen be te edterteruen niw is gehinawa niw.
Su ke zuen minsan hentei he taman dà te kebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtumanen, iring sikandin te etew he ed-alung diyà te peg̵elungan.
Egkeehè din is dagwey zin, iyan, meg̵aan dà. Ne egkelipatan din dutun ke hengkey is neehè din.

Iyan, ke zuen etew he ebpurungan din ed-istudyuwi is kesug̵uan he wazè din kurang he iyan ebpekelibri kenitew, ne kenè din edlipatan, kekenà, edtumanen din, edtuvazan te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan din.
Emun iyan isip te etew is hustu is ked-ezapa zin te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtengkaan is kegkag̵ikag̵i zin, wazà pulus te ked-azap din su neterteruan din dà is gehinawa zin.

Is etew he hustu is ked-azap din te Megbevayà, edlikayan din is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà. Meupiya mulà is ulaula zin. Ebpurungan din is menge edlised he menge ilu he vatà wey menge valu he vahi. Iyan heini egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he paag̵i te ked-ezapa tew kandin.
Menge suled, geina te menge tumutuu ki ki Jesu Kristu, is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen, kinahanglan he pedrerepenga ta is kedtehuza ta te langun he menge etew.
Penenglitan duen edseled diyà te simbahan niw he sepian he edsisising te vulawan ne utew mahal is bisti zin. Ne zuen daan edtampu he egkeayuayu ne nenggeremisey is kandin he bisti.

Ne edtehuzan niw heeyan is meupiya is bisti zin ne ke sikiyu te, “Kayi ka te meupiya he vangkù.” Iyan, haazà mulà is egkeayuayu, egkeg̵iyan niw zà te, “Kayi ka hitindeg,” wey ke, “Dini ka pinuu te saag uvey te kedì he vangkù.”
Kenè be mezaat heeyan he ulaula su kenè niw ebpedrerepengen is kedtahud niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu su kunaan niw ke hustu ke ebmahalen ta is sepian ne kenà is egkeayuayu.

Pemineg̵a niw, menge minahal ku he suled, is ibpesavut ku keniyu. Duen mibpilì te Megbevayà he egkengeayuayu. Ne minsan deisek is ketig̵eyunan dan midhimu te Megbevayà he zekelà mulà is kedsarig dan kandin ne iyan sikandan edtuvazan din pinaag̵i te kedhadì din sumalà is penaad din diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te g̵ehinawa zan.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, wazè niw kedtahud dutun te egkengeayuayu. Hentei is ebpenlupig keniyu? Iyan is menge sepian. Ne hentei is edsumbung keniyu ziyà te etuvangan te huwis?
Hentei is edsumpalit te mahal he ngazan ni Jesus he iyan teg̵ig̵aked kenitew? Iyan is menge sepian.

Utew meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw emun edtumanen niw is lavew he sug̵ù te Nengazen he egkevasa niw ziyà te insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, “Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he g̵ehinawa.”
Iyan, emun duen niw ibpelavi, ebpekesalè kew. Ne sumalà is impenurù dutun te kesug̵uan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises, mesinupaken kew.
Su minsan ke sevaha zà duen te menge sug̵ù te kesug̵uan is egkesupak te etew, ed-isipen gihapun te Megbevayà he mesinupaken sikandin he iring te nesupak din is langun he menge sug̵ù.

Su is migkag̵i te, “Kenè nu selselai is esawa nu,” ne iyan daan migkag̵i te, “Kenè ka pemumunù.” Ne minsan wazè nu selselai is esawa nu, ke nekevunù ka nesupak nu en is tivuuk he kesug̵uan su sebsevaha zà is teg̵isug̵ù dutun te langun he menge sug̵ù.

Duen selakew en he kesug̵uan he ebpekelibri kenita wey ki kenà mekesalà ne iyan heini kesug̵uan he idhukum kenita keuzemà te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta is menge lalag ta wey ulaula ta su wey kenè ta mesupak haazà is kesug̵uan.
Su is Megbevayà, kenè din keuzemà egkehizuwan is etew he wazè din hizu te zuma zin. Iyan, is etew mulà he hihizuwen, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin su kenà sikandin edsilutan te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, wazà pulus te kedtuu te minsan hentei ziyà te Megbevayà emun kenà egketuusan is kedtuu zin pinaag̵i te menge ulaula he meupiya. Is kedtuu he iring dutun, ne kenà tutuu, ne kenà din igkelibri te silut.
Su penenglitan duen menge suled tew he tumutuu ne edlised sikandan tenged te wazè dan igkekuwa te bisti wey egkekaan.
Ne emun egkeg̵iyan tew zà sikandan te, “Ehè kew zà. Berakat he mekekuwa kew te egkeenen niw wey igkebisti niw,” iyan, kenè tew sikandan edtevangan, wazà pulus te migkag̵i tew.
Iring din ded daan is etew he egkeg̵iyen din he edtuu sikandin, iyan, kenà meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Egkesavut ta zutun he kenè bes tutuu is kedtuu zin.

Ne ke zuen egkag̵i te, “Edtuu zà is sevaha te Megbevayà wey melibri sikandin te silut ne is duma, ne ed-ulaula te meupiya wey sikandin melibri, ne pudu hustu.” Iyan, iyan tavak ku zutun te zezuwa is: kinahanglan he edtuu ki, iyan, kenà egkehimu he tutuu is kedtuu ta te Megbevayà ke kenà egketuusan haazà is kedtuu ta pinaag̵i te menge ulaula ta he meupiya. Kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kedtuu ta pinaag̵i te menge ulaula ta.

Emun midtuu ki he sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà utew meupiya heeyan, iyan, kenè pa hustu su minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midtuu zan daan te iring keniyan, iyan, egkerkeren dan te kegkehandek su netuenan dan he edsilutan sikandan keuzemà.
Utew kenà metau he ed-isip is etew he iring dutun. Ebpenuruen ku sikiyu he is kedtuu ta, emun kenà egketuusan pinaag̵i te menge ulaula ta he meupiya, ne kenà ebpekelibri kenita te silut.

Hengkey is paag̵i he impetimaan te kepuun tew he si Abraham he iyan impeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà? Iyan is menge ulaula zin dutun te kedtumana zin te insug̵ù kandin te Megbevayà te kebpemuhata zin pezem te anak din he si Isaak.
Netuenan ta he pinaag̵i te kedtuu zin, midtuman din is insug̵ù kandin ne pinaag̵i zaan te kedtumana zin kayi, neheg̵et is kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he utew tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Midtuu si Abraham te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun te kedtuu zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng.” Ne migeraran sikandin he Emig̵u te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he ed-isipen ki he metazeng te Megbevayà ke zuen menge ulaula ta he meupiya he tuus te kedtuu ta ne kenà tenged te kedtuu zà he wazè din tuus.

Ne iring dutun daan is kedtuu ni Rahab, is bahi zengan he mezaat is dengeg din. Umba mid-isip sikandin he metazeng te Megbevayà su zuen meupiya he mid-ulaula zin su impeseled din te valey zin is menge sug̵ù ni Josue, ne midtevangan din sikandan wey zan mekepelag̵uy pinaag̵i te selakew en he ibayà.

Is lawa te etew, emun wazè din en gehinawa, egketuusan ta he minatey en ne wazè din en pulus. Ne iring din ded daan is kedtuu te minsan hentei su emun kenè egkezumahan haazà is kedtuu te menge ulaula he meupiya, wazà daan pulus dutun te kedtuu zin.
Menge suled, deyzey ke kenà mezakel keniyu is egkesuat he ebpenurù, su sikami is ebpenurù, utew meheg̵et keuzemà is kedsusiya kenami te Megbevayà, kenà te ebpepenurù kenami.

Sikitew is menusiyà, layun kiw egkesayep te mezakel he paag̵i. Ne ke zuen etew he kenà egkesayep pinaag̵i te kegkag̵i zin, wazè en igkesewayi kandin. Egkeveyveyaan din is tivuuk he lawa zin wey kenà mekeulaula te mezaat.
Egkekangan ta is kudà su wey ta meveyveyai ke hendei ta ibpepevayà.
Ne minsan is utew zekelà he barku he egkeuwit te mevendes he keramag, egketandang ta is ibayè din pinaag̵i te utew zeisek he pengawid din.
Ne iring din ded daan is dilà te etew su minsan pa te utew zeisey egkeg̵amit gihapun te kedentala te zekelà he ibpezalig.
