Ne iring daan dutun is ketelunan su minsan pa te utew meluag egkevinsulan gihapun te zeisek he hapuy.

Ne iring daan te hapuy is dilà te etew su ebpekezezaat ne iyan puunà te minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula. Pinaag̵i te zilà egkeeneb te mezaat is tivuuk he isip ta wey g̵ehinawa ta. Iyan ebpekerasey kenita te tivuuk he untung ta; iring te hapuy he ziyà ebpuun te Impirnu.
Netuenan ta he egkeveyveyaan te etew is minsan hengkey he linimbag su zuen nelayam he menge langgam, menge tagbis, menge pait, wey minsan menge uled.
Iyan, wazè pa etew he nekevayàbayà te zilè din. Utew lalung is dilè ta ne kenà egkeeg̵en. Iring te hilu su ebpekezezaat.
Egemiten ta is dilè ta emun ebpeselematan ta is Amey tew he Nengazen, ne nasì ta zaan egemita ke ebpenrewakan ta is menge zuma ta he midlimbag te Megbevayà he iring te zagwey zin.
Utew heini igkeinuinu su sebsevaha zà is puunà te kedrawak wey kebpeselamat! Menge suled, kenà heini meupiya.
Emun penenglitan duen kalut, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he meupiya wey is wahig he mepait.

Menge suled, emun ebeg̵as is kayu he igira kenà egkehimu he ulivu is beg̵as din. Ne emun ebeg̵as is gawed he paras kenà egkehimu he igira is beg̵as din. Ke zuen kalut he zutun ebpuun is wahig he mepait, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he kenà mepait.

Is minsan hentei keniyu he metau wey zekelà is selevutan, ipeehè din pinaag̵i te meupiya he ulaula zin. Kinahanglan he kenà sikandin mepelevawen dutun te kebpaahaa zin te ketau zin pinaag̵i te menge meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan din.
Iyan, emun egkesina sikandin wey mepelevawen, kinahanglan he kenè din izantal is ketau zin wey is meupiya he ulaula zin su tarù is ketau he iring dutun ne ebpekesupak te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Kenà haazà sikan is ketau he ebpuun te Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan. Kenà iyan is ketau he ibeg̵ey te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, kekenà, ebpuun te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ke zuen menge etew he egkesina wey mepelevawen, utew zan egkesemuki ne ed-ul-ulahan dan is minsan hengkey he mezaat.

Is etew he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is ketau zin, wazà igkesewayi kandin. Melinew is kedepitè din te zuma he etew, ebpurungan din is menge zuma zin; kenà sikandin mevurut, kekenà, mepezumdumahan. Hihizuwen wey metulanged sikandin; wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei ne kenà uvag dà is kedtuu zin.
Iring te venì is kelinew. Ibpemula te menge menhuhusey ne iyan egkerag̵un dutun is metazeng he menge ulaula.
Hengkey is puunà te menge kesevaan wey tebek diyan te keniyu? Iyan is menge mezaat he kebayè niw he ebpekigkuntada te meupiya he ulaula.

Duen egkesuatan niw he kenè niw egkekuwa ne tenged dutun ebpekeisip kew te kebpemumunù. Duen egkeimahan niw, iyan, kenè niw egkeangken ne tenged dutun ebpekidsavè kew wey ebpekidtebek kew. Umba kenè niw egkekuwa is egkesuatan niw su kenè niw ebuyuen diyà te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan ke ebuyuen niw ziyà te kandin, kenè din ibeg̵ey su mezaat is tuyù niw te kebuyua niw kayi. Iyan ketezengan te kebuyù niw is wey niw metuman is mezaat he kebayè niw.

Kenè kew metinumanen te pesarig niw ziyà te Megbevayà. Wazè niw ves metueni he emun iyan niw egkesuatan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ne menge kuntada kew zaan te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he iyan egkesuatan din is mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, mibpekigkuntada sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kenè niw isipa he kenà tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Is gehinawa he imbeg̵ey kenita te Megbevayà, nehimu he mezesen is kegkesuati zin te mezaat he ulaula,

iyan, mezesen pa utew is tavang kenita te Megbevayà.” Ne tenged dutun duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, “Egkuntedahan te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, edtevangan din mulà is ebpesakup kandin.”
Ne tenged dutun, pesakup kew te Megbevayà. Sukuli niw si Setanas ne ebpelag̵uy keniyu.

Aput kew ziyà te Megbevayà ne ed-uvayan kew zin. Sikiyu is mekesesalà, engkezi niw is menge ulaula niw he mezaat. Sikiyu is uvag dà is kedtuu zan, pelumpiyuwi niw te Megbevayà is isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw.
Meseeng kew tenged te menge ulaula niw he mezaat; medlug̵ib kew wey medsineg̵ew kew; kenè kew engit, kekenà, erang kew; kenè kew medlipey, kekenà, mebmezaat is gehinawa niw.
Pesakup kew te Megbevayà, ne ibpelavew kew zin.

Menge suled, kenè kew mebpesudsudiey wey mebpesewsewayà su is edsudì wey edsawey te zuma zin he tumutuu, ne iring te edsudien din wey edsewayen din is lavew he sug̵ù. Ne emun edsewayen ta haazà is sug̵ù, kenè ta edtumanen, kekenà, edsumpeliten ta.

Sebsevaha zà is ebpuunan te kesug̵uan he iyan is Megbevayà ne sebsevaha zà daan is duen din keg̵ehem te kedhukum te menge ulaula te menusiyà ne iyan ded daan is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin edsilut ne iyan daan ebpekelibri te silut. Iyan, sikita mulà, wazè ta keg̵ehem te kedhukum te minsan hentei.
Pemineg kew, sikiyu is egkag̵i te, “Guntaan ne emun kenà ne keeselem, edhendiyè ki te sevaha he inged. Ne zutun ki ebpetig̵ayun taman te sengetuig wey ki mekemanggad.”
Turebung kew su minsan is keeselem dà he hitavù, kenè ta egketuenan. Is untung ta zini te kelibutan, ne utew mevavà ne iring te menipis he g̵apun he egketik-ew egkeahà ne egketik-ew zaan egkeawà.
Meupiya pa ke egkag̵i ki te, “Emun idtug̵ut kenita te Nengazen he kenè ki pa ebpatey, ebeelan ta is iring dutun.”
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, memepedelig̵en su idantal niw is ed-ul-ulahan niw, ne mezaat is iring dutun.
Tentenuzi niw he ke netuenan te minsan hentei kenitew ke hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ne kenè din ed-ul-ulahan, nekesalà sikandin diyà te Megbevayà.
Pemineg kew zaan, sikiyu is sepian. Sineg̵ew kew; erang kew, su utew merasey is egkeulaula niw keuzemà.
Egkeredak en is menge ketig̵eyunan niw. Egketketen te ipes is manggad niw.
Midtangis is menge selapì niw wey vulawan

Is selapì he wazè niw isuhul te edterebahu ziyà te menge tanè niw, ne iyan idsumbunga zan keniyu ziyà te Megbevayà. Is sumbung keniyu te nemenlegtey ziyà te menge luti niw, nezineg en te utew mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen.
Dini te kelibutan utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk niw ne edlipey kew layun, iyan, iring kew g̵untaan te nati he ibpelambù he edlepaan su kunaan niw ke kenè kew egkesaut te andew te kedsilut.
Su impesilutan niw wey mibunù niw is menge metazeng he etew, minsan pa te wazè dan medsukul keniyu.

Ne sikiyu is menge zuma ku he tumutuu, kinahanglan he meinentusen kew taman te kedlikù te Nengazen. Su is ebasuk, ebpekeantus te kedtag̵ad din taman te edsebpet en is impemula zin diyà te tanè din. Edteg̵azan din is uzan he ebpetuvù te pinemula zin wey is ebpeketesan te pinemula zin.
Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he ed-entusen tew is kebpeketag̵ad tew. Edheg̵eten tew is kedsarig tew su meg̵aan en is andew te kedlikù te Nengazen.
Kenè kew, menge suled, meked-eepesà su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà. Meg̵aan en ebpekeuma is edsusi te menge ulaula ta; iring te ziyè en te g̵emawan.
Menge suled, ed-iringan ta is kebmeinentusen te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà su zutun te kebpesevuta zan te Lalag te Nengazen nekeantus dan te kemeresayan.

Netuenan ta he utew sikandan deyzey su nekeantus dan te merasey. Netuenan niw en is kebmeinentusen dengan ni Hob wey is kedtuvazi kandin te Megbevayà dutun te nepasad en is penggezam kandin. Hihizuwen wey velig̵eg̵awen is Nengazen.

Menge suled, ebeleuzan ku sikiyu he emun duen ibpesarig niw kenè niw heg̵eta pinaag̵i te kebpengulivet wey kedsesapà. Kenè kew medsesapà pinaag̵i te kegemita niw te minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà te kebenara niw te menge lalag niw. Uya zà wey wazà is gemita niw su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà.
Ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkeseeng, kinahanglan he med-ampù. Ke zuen egkelipey, megkanta sikandin te kedalig te Megbevayà.
Ke zuen egkezeruwan, kinahanglan he tewag̵a zin is menge ebmeg̵urangen te menge tumutuu wey zan ikeampù wey meitisi sikandin te lana he ebpengumawen dan is ngazan te Nengazen.
Is ked-ampù dan, emun hustu is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà, ne iyan igkeulii te egkezeruwan su ebewian sikandin te Nengazen, ne egkepesaylu sikandin te menge salè din.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he petudtudtulè kew te menge salè niw su wey iampù te kada sevaha is duma zin ne wey meulii is egkengezeruwan. Utew mekeg̵eg̵ehem is ked-ampù te metazeng he etew.
Si Elias dengan, etew zà sikandin he iring kenitew. Ne minsan pa zutun mezesen is ked-ampù din he kenà med-uzan ne wazà iyan mekeuzan taman te tetelu he tuig wey tengà.
Ne mid-ampù en maan, ne mid-uzan te mereg̵es ne human meketuvù is menge pinemula.
Menge suled, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuwey zin wey egkelipatan din is tutuu he tuluuwen ne zuen ebpeketavang kandin wey mekelikù,
tentenuzi niw he is neketavang kandin, nehimu en he paag̵i wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne pinaag̵i zutun egkepesaylu is utew mezakel he menge salà dutun he etew.
Iyan a si Pedro is teg̵isurat kayi. Epustul a ni Jesu Kristu,

Nengaaram kew te Megbevayà he Amey tew sumalà is kebayè din dengan he iyan is: edhimuwen kew zin he metazeng pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin wey kew mehimu he menge sakup ni Jesu Kristu ne wey kew zaan mepesaylu tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus.
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew zin wey mebmelinawen kew utew.

Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he iyan Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te zekelà is hizu zin kenitew, mibeg̵ayan kiw zin te veg̵u en he untung. Ne g̵untaan ebpekeperateng kiw he egkevanhew kiw keuzemà su mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.
Ne elin daan egkeperateng tew is utew meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew. Integ̵ana zin en heini ziyà te langit ne zutun kenà egkeredak, kenà egkezeetan, ne kenà daan egkehanew.
Kenitew en haazà is integ̵ana zin. Tenged te nekesarig kiw kandin, nelig-enan kiw te g̵ehem te Megbevayà te kemulu kiw pa edtag̵ad te kedtulusa zin kenitew keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu.
Ne tenged dutun ebpekelipey kew en minsan pa te egkeseeng kew zè pa g̵untaan tenged te mezakel he menge kemeresayan he egkeantus niw.

Is kedtuu niw, ne iring te vulawan su egezaman is bulawan pinaag̵i te hapuy su wey ikepaahà ke tutuu ve. Umba idtug̵ut te Megbevayà he mekeantus kew te merasey su wey pinaag̵i te kemeresayan meg̵ezami is kedtuu niw ke tutuu ve wey ke kenà. Mahal pa is kedtuu niw kenà is bulawan su melemu egkezeeti is bulawan. Ne emun tutuu is kedtuu niw, edelig̵en kew, ebentug̵en kew, wey edtehuzen kew keuzemà emun ibpeg̵awag̵awa en si Jesu Kristu.
Utew mahal sikandin diyan te g̵ehinawa niw minsan wazè niw pa maahà. Ne edsarig kew kandin minsan pa te kenè niw en sikandin egkeahà guntaan. Ne utew man dekelà is kelipey niw he kenà igkeseysey
su egkezawat niw en guntaan is kedlibriya keniyu te silut he iyan ebperetengan niw tenged te midtuu kew kandin.
Is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, mibpurungan dan istudyuwi is kedlibriya zin kenita te silut wey netagnè dan heini is kedtuvazi zin kenita.

Mid-istudyuwan dan ke keenu wey ke egkemenumenu is kegketuman kayi, su in-ulin heini kandan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu. Impesavut din kandan he zuen menge kemeresayan he egkeantus ni Kristu zini te kelibutan ne emun egketapus haazà edhimuwen sikandin he utew lavew.

Impezayag kandan te Megbevayà he kenà kandan he ibmeupiya haazà is netagnè dan dutun, kekenà, kenitew g̵untaan. Ne g̵untaan impesavut en keniyu is tutuu mehitenged dutun te netagnè dan. Duen menge etew he midsug̵ù te Megbevayà su wey zan metudtul keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Mid-ulinan sikandan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he midsug̵ù te Megbevayà. Ne heini is impesavut dan keniyu, minsan is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit, egkesuatan dan he mesavut dan heini.

Ne g̵eina te iyan haazà, kinahanglan he ed-andam ki wey ki mekepurung mekeisip-isip su wey ta layun mepurungi is kedsunud ta te Nengazen. Kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa ta is kebperateng ta te utew meupiya he ibeg̵ey te Megbevayà kenita keuzemà dutun te andew te kebpeg̵awag̵awa ni Jesu Kristu.

Geina te menge anak ki te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is menge sug̵ù din; kenè ta iyan ebpezumdumahan is mezaat he kebayè ta he edtumanen ta layun dengan hein wazè te pa metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen.
Ne g̵untaan kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula te Megbevayà he iyan nengelintau wey kiw meketuu.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula niw su wazà igkesewayi te kedì he menge ulaula.”

Ne g̵eina te mibpetavang ki te Amey ta he Megbevayà kinahanglan he utew meheg̵et is kedtehuza ta kandin te zini ki pa ed-ubpà te kelibutan. Iyan sikandin edsusi te menge ulaula te menusiyà sumalà is mid-ulaula te kada sevaha ne wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei.

Netuenan ta he utew mahal is imbelukas din kenita. Su nengeuripen ki zengan te menge ulaula he wazà pulus he imbilinbilin kenita te menge kepuun ta. Sikan is imbelukas din kenita, ne kenà iring te selapì wey vulawan he egkeawà is bali zin.
Iyan imbelukas din si Kristu he impelengesa he utew mevali. Iring sikandin te nati he kerehidu he wazà igkesawey zuen he impemuhat.
Te wazè pa limbag̵a is kelibutan, daan en si Kristu he intezù te Megbevayà wey mehimu he Menluluwas tew. Ne kayi te timpu g̵untaan, impezayag sikandin wey kiw mevelukasi.

Pinaag̵i kandin neketuu kiw te Megbevayà. Mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà ne midhimu zin sikandin he utew lavew. Ne tenged kayi iyan edserig̵an tew g̵untaan is Megbevayà ne ebpekeperateng kiw he edhimuwen kiw zin daan he utew lavew.

Ne g̵eina te nemeketuu kew en te tutuu he tuluuwen nengelumpiyuwan kew en te mezaat he ulaula ne kenà tarù is kebmahala niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu. Minsan pa zutun, heg̵eta niw pa is kebmahala niw ziyan te g̵ehinawa niw te kada sevaha te menge zuma niw.
Su mid-umanan ki limbag̵a te Megbevayà ne veg̵u ki en maan he etew pinaag̵i te wazà pidtemanan he Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekeveg̵ey te untung.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Is menusiyà, geina te mevavè dà utew is untung din, iring sikandin te sagbet.
Su is kempet din, ne iring te kevukad te sagbet.
Meg̵aan egkeg̵angu is sagbet, ne egkengeulug is kevukazan din.
Iyan, is Lalag te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne iyan impesavut keniyu.

Ne g̵eina te veg̵u ki en he etew, ed-iniyug̵an te en is minsan hengkey he kebpesipala wey is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he kenà tarù is kedsundan ta te Megbevayà; kenè ki egkesina ne kenè ki ebpemenulà.

Ed-iring ki zuen te vatà he kemulu pa edsusu he layun egkesuat te g̵atas. Kinahanglan he layun ki ed-inum te g̵atas he iyan is wag̵as he Lalag te Megbevayà su wey layun mebmezesen is kedtuu ta taman te timpu keuzemà he edtulusen ki te Megbevayà.
Su neg̵ezaman niw en he utew velig̵eg̵awen keniyu is Nengazen tew.

Pevayàbayè kew en te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan ebeg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iring sikandin te vatu he pengawid te valey he kenà edewaten te menge pandey. Wazà sikandin dewata te menge etew, iyan, iyan sikandin mibpilì te Megbevayà su utew sikandin mahal.

Ne sikitew zaan is mibeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, ebpevayàbayè kiw kandin wey kiw zaan mehimu he iring te menge vatu he pengawid te valey he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayà. Ne zutun te valey zin edhimuwen kiw zin en he menge memumuhat he mibpilì din. Ne zutun, pinaag̵i te kedtavang ni Jesu Kristu, ebpekepemuhat kiw ne iyan pemuhat he egkesuatan din is: ed-ezapen tew sikandin pinaag̵i te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Duen mibpilì ku he hadì he iring sikandin te vatu he mahal utew.
Idsavuk ku sikandin diyà te inged he Siyun.
Iring sikandin te melig-en he vatu he ebpeuntuzan te valey.
Is minsan hentei he edsarig kandin, kenè en egkeanggà,
su iyan sikandin sikan is tutuu he edserig̵an.”
Iyan heini insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne heini is hadì he iring te vatu, mahal utew sikandin dini te kenita te nekesarig en kandin, iyan, is langun he kenà edtuu, netuman pinaag̵i kandan is insurat he tagnà he edhenduen te,
“Sikan is batu he himan te valey,
mid-engkezan te menge pandey.
Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey.”
Ne zuen daan tagnà he netuman he edhenduen te,
“Iyan haazà sikan is batu he nesipà te menge etew; iyan haazà nekeseligkat kandan.”
Wazè dan medtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun, sumalà is netagnà, nekeurambak sikandan su iyan imbanglis te Megbevayà dutun te kenà edtuu.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, pinilì kiw zin. Menge memumuhat kiw te mibpilì he hadì he iyan si Kristu. Iyan kiw menge sakup din; iyan kiw menge g̵aked din he etew. Umba mibpilì kiw zin su wey tew mesangyew is tudtul te utew egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin. Iyan sikandin nengelintau wey kiw meketuu wey kiw maawà dutun te kerusireman. Ne g̵untaan edteyawan kiw zin,
Su zengan kenè kiw menge sakup te Megbevayà ne g̵untaan menge sakup kiw zin en. Dengan wazè tew hanew zutun te hizu te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan impezayag din en kenitew.

Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè en hustu he inged tew heini is kelibutan su menge humuhulevungà kiw zà dini. Ne tenged dutun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he kenè niw pezumdumahi is menge mezaat he kebayè niw su ebpekesanggen heini te kedsundan niw te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he utew metazeng is menge ulaula niw su wey maahà te menge etew he kenà tumutuu. Su minsan ke egkeg̵iyen dan he mezaat is ulaula niw, egketuenan dan gihapun he meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw ne ebpekezalig dan te Megbevayà keuzemà te andew te kebulusi zin te menusiyà.
Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is midtukud he velaud diyan te inged niw su iyan heini egkesuatan te Nengazen. Ebpesakup ki te lavew he hadì su iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun.
Ebpesakup ki zaan te gubirnedur su iyan midsug̵ù te lavew he hadì wey zin siluti is menge mesinupaken ne wey zin daan delig̵a is menge metazeng.
Umba edhengyuen ku heini su egkesuatan te Megbevayà he is menge mepedeligen he wazà mekesavut te hustu, meehè dan is menge metazeng he ulaula tew. Ne pinaag̵i kayi ebpekeengked dan is edsudì kenitew.

Ne g̵eina te nelibri kiw en te Megbevayà, egkehimu he iyan kiw en ebayàbayà te ed-ul-ulahan tew, iyan, kinahanglan he kenè tew edhimuwen is kelibriyanan tew he pesangil wey kiw mekeulaula te mezaat. Su minsan pa te nelibri kiw en, kinahanglan he menge sulug̵uen kiw g̵ihapun te Megbevayà.
Edtehuzen tew is langun he menge etew; ebmahalen tew is langun he menge suled tew te kedtuu. Igkehandek ta is ked-ulaula te kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà; edtehuzen ta is keg̵ehem te lavew he hadì.

Sikita is sulug̵uen, ebpesakup ki te egalen ta ne hustu is kedtehuza ta kandin. Kenè ta iyan dà ebpezumdumahan is egalen he metulanged wey meupiya is ulaula zin, kekenà, ebpezumdumahan ta zaan is melemu he egkepauk.
Su edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà emun tenged te kedtumana ta te egkesuatan din, egkeantus ta is kedresaya kenita te egalen ta minsan pa te wazè ki mekesalà.

Iyan, kenè ki zait he edtuvazan te meupiya emun iyan igkeentusa ta te kedsiluti kenita is mezaat he ulaula ta. Iyan, ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey te wazà mezaat he mid-ulaula ta, edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà.
Nekeantus si Kristu te merasey wey ki melibri te silut. Ne nehimu sikandin he petug-iringan he kinahanglan he edsunuzen ta. Umba mibpetuu kenitew is Megbevayà su wey tew si Kristu meiringi.
Wazà minsan hengkey he salà he neveelan ni Kristu. Wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he migkag̵i zin.

Hein edsumpeliten sikandin duen te kedrensanga kandin wazà sikandin medtavak te mezaat; wazà sikandin mebpenrawak. Is kebelesi zutun te edrasey kandin, insarig din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan kes metazeng is kedhukum din.

Iyan si Kristu midsilutan tenged te menge salè tew zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus. Umba iyan sikandin midsilutan su wey tew meengkezi is menge mezaat he ulaula ne wey tew iyan meulaula is metazeng. Is menge palì din dutun, ne iyan nekevawì kenitew.
Iring kiw zengan te menge ayam he kerehidu he nengetazin, iyan, guntaan impeulì kiw en diyà te Megbevayà he iyan bekidu he metau he ebantey kenitew.

Sikiyu zaan is menge vahi, kinahanglan he pesakup kew te esawa niw ne zutun minsan ke kenè dan edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà kela ke ebpeketuu zan ded ke egkeehè dan is menge ulaula niw he memeupiya. Su iyan heini egkehimu he wali niw kandan.
Su egkeehè dan is kedtahud niw te Megbevayà wey is ulaula niw he wazà igkesewayi zuen.

Sikiyu is menge vahi, kenè niw isipa he iyan ibmekempet niw is pinaag̵i te utew subra he kedeyzeyani niw te vulvul niw wey te kedsul-uva niw te menge mahal he vutang iring te vulawan wey mahal he bisti.

Su kinahanglan he iyan ibmekempet niw is meupiya he ulaula he ebpuun te g̵ehinawa niw he iring te menayù he kegkag̵i, wey is melinawen he ulaula su is kekempet he iring kayi, ne kenà mulà egkeawà, ne utew mahal ziyà te Megbevayà.
Is menge vahi zengan he midsarig te Megbevayà, iyan heini kandan he inmekempet. Mibpesakup sikandan te menge esawa zan

he iring ki Sara he mibpesakup daan te esawa zin he si Abraham. Neisip din he egalen din si Abraham. Ne sikiyu is menge vahi g̵untaan, egkehimu kew he iring te menge anak ni Sara emun ed-iringan niw is ulaula zin he metazeng wey ke kenè niw idtug̵ut he egkesamuk is isip niw te kegkehandek.

Sikita zaan is maama, kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta wey edtehuzen ta is esawa ta. Su minsan pa te meluya is lawa zan kenà is kenita, iring sikandan kenita su imbeg̵ey zaan kandan te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he edtehuzen ta sikandan su wey pemineg̵a te Megbevayà is kebpengampù ta.

Duen pa egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu te langun ne iyan is: kinahanglan he mesevaha is isip niw wey g̵ehinawa niw. Mebpepurpurungè kew wey megig̵ineg̵awè kew su iring kew en te teltelesuled. Kinahanglan he memetulanged kew wey kenè kew menge mepelevawen.
Ke zuen ebpesipala keniyu kenè niw velesi te mezaat. Ke zuen edrawak keniyu kenè niw zaan penrewaki, kekenà, belesi niw te meupiya.
Su umba midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu su wey kew zin metuvazi te meupiya.
Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Sikan is egkesuat he meupiya is ked-ubpè din dini te kelibutan wey layun melipey,
kinahanglan he kenà mezaat is kebpemèbè din ne kenà edtarùtarù.
Engkezi zin en is memezaat he ulaula ne layun meupiya is menge ulaula zin.
Layun din pen-ahaa is melinawen he kedepitè dan te menge zuma zin.
Su iyan ebentayan te Megbevayà is memetazeng he etew;
ebpemineg̵en din is ked-ampù dan.
Iyan, egkuntedahan din mulà is ed-ulaula te mezaat.”
Wazà edhilavet keniyu ke edhamen kew te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
Iyan, minsan ke ebpekeantus kew te kebpesipala tenged te metazeng is ed-ul-ulahan niw, medlipey kew. Kenè kew mahandek te etew zà duen ne kenè kew meseeng.
Layun niw isipa he iyan egalen niw si Kristu. Layun niw endama is tavak ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is ebpekesarig kew te Megbevayà.

Mebmetinehuzen kew is edtavak wey menayù is kegkag̵i niw. Kinahanglan he wazà salà he netag̵ù diyà te g̵ehinawa niw te menge sumusundan ni Kristu su emun wazà ulaula niw he mezaat egkeeled is edsudì keniyu tenged te egkeg̵iyen dan.
Deyzey ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te metazeng is ulaula ta, ke iyan intuvad kenita te Megbevayà, kenà ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te mezaat is ulaula ta.

Kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey ni Kristu wey mepesaylu is menge salè tew. Mibpehimatey su wey mehimu sikandin is metazeng he elili tew te kenà memetazeng wey kiw mehimu he menge g̵aked te Megbevayà. Nepatey is lawa zin, iyan, nevanhew sikandin
ne mibeyaan din minsan is nengepirisu he g̵imukud te nemematey zengan ne midweliyan din sikandan.

Iyan heini menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Megbevayà dutun te timpu zengan hein ebpelevayen din dà is memezaat he ulaula zan taman te nepasad ni Noe is kebeeli zin te arka. Walu zà he etew is nekeseled dutun te arka wey zan melibri te wahig.

Ne iyan teg̵ialung kayi te wahig is kebewtismu he ebpekelibri kenitew te silut. Ne haazà is kebewtismu, ne kenà iyan is kedlumpiyuwi te lawa tew ziyà te wahig, kekenà, iyan is kedhengyui tew te Megbevayà he maawè din is menge salè tew. Egkehimu heini tenged te mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.

Diyà si Jesus med-ulì te langit ne g̵untaan diyà sikandin ebpimpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà tuus te utew lavew sikandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà wey te menge kedesenan wey te minsan hentei ziyà te langit he zuen din gehem.

Ne netuenan ta he si Kristu, hein dini pa te kelibutan, nekeantus sikandin te merasey. Tenged dutun kinahanglan he andam kew zaan te ked-antus te merasey su is etew he ebpekeantus te merasey, egkeawè en diyà te kandin is suat din te ked-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne tenged kayi, puun dutun taman te kebpatey zin egkehimu he kenè din en human edtumanen is mezaat he kebayà te lawa zin, kekenà, iyan din edtumanen is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su kinahanglan he kenè niw en maan ul-ulaha sikan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan he egkesuatan te menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà. Su zengan meremerik is ulaula niw; mezaat is egkesuatan te lawa niw; lelenguten kew ne mezaat is kelenganan he ibpelepew niw ziyà te menge keemuran he zutun kew ebpenginum. Utew kew egkeepesi te Megbevayà su kenà tutuu he megbevayà is ed-ezapen niw.
Iyan, guntaan, is menge etew he kenà edtuu te Megbevayà, utew zan egkeinuinu su maan is kenè kew en edtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te utew memezaat wey memahawag ne tenged dutun edsumpeliten kew zan.
Keuzemà ke ziyà sikandan ibpeetuvang te Megbevayà ed-insaan din sikandan ke maan is mid-ulaula zan te mezaat. Andam en sikandin te kedsusi te nengeulaula te nemematey en wey te menge uuyag pa.

Sikan is menge etew he nemematey en, impesavut en kandan dengan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun diyà te Megbevayà su wey meveg̵ayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan minsan pa te kenè dan egkelikayan is kebpatey te lawa zan su iyan silut te Megbevayà diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.

Kenè en utew egkeug̵et is ketepusan te kelibutan. Ne tenged dutun, kinahanglan he hustu is ked-isip-isip niw. Kinahanglan daan he purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey mehustu is ked-ampù niw ziyà te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he iyan lavew he edhemenan niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw he tumutuu su emun ebmahalen ta is menge zuma ta melemu ki zà ebpekepesaylu te menge salè dan kenita.
Kinahanglan he utew kew metulanged is ebpepemenahik te menge humehulevungà diyan te valey niw.

Is minsan hengkey he ketau he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà diyà te kada sevaha keniyu, kinahanglan he g̵emita zin wey metevangi is menge zuma zin he tumutuu su wey hustu is kegemita niw te minsan hengkey he intavang keniyu te Megbevayà.

Sikita is edwali, kinahanglan he is kedwali ta, ne utew hustu he iring te iyan en edwali is Megbevayà. Sikita is edtavang, ne kinahanglan he kenè ta edlipatan he is idtavang ta, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà su wey pinaag̵i te g̵ehem ni Jesu Kristu iyan mevantug is Megbevayà te minsan keenu su iyan dait he edelig̵en wey zait he ebayàbayà te wazà pidtemanan.
Minahal ku he menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu tenged te utew merasey he penggezam he egkeantus niw en tenged te kedtuu niw. Su emun tumutuu ki, ebpekeantus ki layun te merasey.

Kenè kew meinuinu, kekenà, lipey kew utew su pinaag̵i kayi ebpekeambit kew te menge kemeresayan he naantus ni Kristu ne tenged dutun utew kew zaan egkelipey keuzemà ke ibpezayag din kenitew haazà is bulawan he ed-ulian.
Utew kew zeyzey ke edsudien kew tenged te menge sumusundan kew ni Kristu su tuus heini he mid-ulinan kew te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Mulin-ulin he iyan is Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he kenè niw iyan igkerasey is kedsiluti keniyu tenged te kebpemumunù, kebpemenakew, ked-ulaula te minsan hengkey he mezaat, wey te kebpenhilavet dutun te wazè niw ketenged.
Iyan, ke iyan niw ibpekeantus te merasey is tenged te neketuu kew ki Kristu, kenè niw haazà ikeeled, kekenà, utew zekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà su neg̵aked kew ni Kristu.

Iyan heini, menge suled, timpu he pinaag̵i te merasey he egkeulaula ebpuunan te Megbevayà is kedsusiya zin te menge ulaula te menusiyà. Edhunaan din edsusiya is menge sakup din. Ne emun iyan kiw zin is menge tumutuu edhunaan din, utew pa merasey is egketemanan te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut kandan te Megbevayà.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,
“Emun mereg̵en he edlibriyen te silut is menge metazeng he etew,
iyan pe be melibri sikan is menge etew he edsukul te Megbevayà wey memezaat is ulaula!”

Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, ke ebpekeantus kew en te merasey su iyan intuvad keniyu te Megbevayà, isarig niw is gehinawa niw ziyà te kandin he iyan metinumanen he nenlimbag wey hemeni niw is memeupiya he ulaula.

Sikiyu is ebmeg̵urangen te menge tumutuu, duen idhangyù ku keniyu su ebmeg̵urangen a zaan. Nekevantey a te kedresaya zengan ki Kristu ne iring keniyu, ebpekeseled a zaan te vulawan he ed-ulian he ibpeg̵awag̵awa keuzemà.

Ne iyan idhangyù ku keniyu is: purungi niw elimahi is menge tumutuu he insarig keniyu te Megbevayà. Iring sikandan te menge kerehidu zin. Iyan kew edumala kandan, kenà iring te ebpeg̵esen kew, kekenà, kinahanglan he ebpuun te meliwanag he g̵ehinawa niw su iyan haazà egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà id-elimahi niw kandan is tenged te edsuhulan kew zan, kekenà, tenged te egkesuat kew he edtavang kandan.
Kenè kew medhadìhadì kandan te insarig keniyu, kekenà, eg̵aka niw sikandan su wey iyan kew zan edsunuzen te menge meupiya he ulaula.
Ne emun edlikù si Jesus, sikan is lavew he ed-elima te menge kerehidu te Megbevayà, duen idsuhul zin keniyu he iyan is kebpekeambit niw te utew zin kegkelavew he kenà egkehanew.

Sikiyu menge menguhed, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he pevayàbayè kew te menge ebmeg̵urangen. Kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, mebpetebtevangè kew su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, “Kuntada te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, igkehizu zin is kenà ebpelavew.”
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, pevayàbayè kew te Megbevayà he mekeg̵eg̵ehem ne edhimuwen kew zin he utew lavew keuzemà te hustu he timpu.
Isarig niw ziyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he seeng niw su iyan sikandin ed-elima keniyu.
Med-andam kew, mebantey kew su is kuntada tew he si Setanas, edrig̵urig̵u en he iring te erimaung he edhinig̵er su ebpen-ahà te edewiyen din.
Sukuli niw sikandin, ne hamen kew sarig te Megbevayà su netuenan niw he is menge zuma niw he tumutuu zini te tivuuk he kelibutan, ebpekeantus dan daan te merasey he iring te egkeantus niw.

Mevavè dà is ked-antus niw ne edheg̵eten te Megbevayà is kedsarig niw kandin. Ebig̵eran kew zin, edlig-enan kew zin wey ebeg̵ayan kew zin te zesen. Iyan sikandin puunà te minsan hengkey he tavang kenitew. Midhimu kiw zin he tumutuu su wey pinaag̵i te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu mekeambit kiw te wazà pidtemanan he utew kegkelavew zin.
Berakat he zelig̵a sikandin te wazà pidtemanan su iyan sikandin mekeg̵eg̵ehem.

Mid-ug̵upan a ni Silvanu te edsurat kayi. Suled tew sikandin he utew egkeserig̵i. Iyan insurati ku keniyu kayi su wey ku meheg̵et is kedtuu niw. Ibpesavut ku keniyu he impenurù ku en keniyu he tutuu is gag̵ew te Megbevayà keniyu. Ne kenè niw heini lipati.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge tumutuu zini te inged he Bebilunya. Pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà iring te pinilì kew zin daan. Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Marcos he iyan iring te tutuu he anak ku.
Mebpelimlimuey kew.
Mebmelinawen is gehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu he nekidsevaha ki Kristu.
Iyan a si Simon Pedro is teg̵isurat kayi. Sulug̵uen a ni Jesu Kristu wey epustul zin,
Berakat he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew utew te Megbevayà wey mebmelinawen is gehinawa niw pinaag̵i te kegkesevuta niw te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.

Pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Megbevayà edtevangan kiw zin te mezakel he paag̵i wey kiw meketuman te menge sug̵ù din kayi te ked-ubpè tew zini te kelibutan. Umba egkehimu heini su impekilala en kenitew si Jesu Kristu he iyan mibpetuu kenitew wey kiw mekeambit te ketazeng din wey te utew zin kegkelavew.

Iyan heini kedtumana zin te penaad din he utew zekelà wey mahal is idtuvad din kenitew. Umba impenaad din heini su wey mekeiring is menge ulaula tew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà ne mekelikey kiw zini te kelibutan te kedtumana te menge mezaat he kebayè tew su ebpekezezaat heini kenitew.

Ne g̵eina te iyan heini intavang din kenitew kinahanglan he edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meheg̵eti is kedtuu ta kandin te menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne is menge meupiya he ulaula, kinahanglan he edheg̵etan ta te kegkesevuta te hustu.
Ne is kedsavut, edheg̵etan ta te edtengkaan he ed-ul-ulahan. Ne haazà daan, edheg̵etan ta te kebmeinentusen. Ne is kebmeinentusen, edheg̵etan ta te kebpevayàbayè ta te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà daan, edheg̵etan ta te kegig̵ineg̵awè tew ne is kegig̵ineg̵awè tew, edheg̵etan ta zaan te kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta.
Ne emun ed-iseg layun is ked-ul-ulaha niw kayi te langun, kenà egkehimu he kenà utew zekelà is pulus te kedtuuwi niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Iyan, ke zuen tumutuu he kenà ed-ulaula kayi, henduen be te nelakap is isip din su kenè din egkesavut is hustu. Nelipatan din en buwa he nepelisan en sikandin te menge zaan he ulaula zin he mezaat.

Menge suled, geina te mibpilì kiw ne midhimu kiw te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu kandin, edhimuwen tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey maahà he tutuu iyan is kebpilia zin kenitew wey is kedhimuwa zin kenitew he menge tumutuu zin. Su emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan tew kenè kiw ebpekesuwey te hustu he ibayà,
ne zekelà is kelipey tew keuzemà su egkeg̵alew is Megbevayà kenitew zutun te kebpeseleza zin kenitew zutun te wazà pidtemanan he g̵inhedian te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan Menluluwas tew.
Minsan pa te nesavut niw en heini is langun wey meheg̵et en is kedtuu niw te tutuu he tuluuwen, kinahanglan he layun ku heini ibpezineg keniyu.
Su taman te kemulu e pa zini te kelibutan meupiya ke igkepezineg ku keniyu heini su wey kenè niw melipati.
Netuenan ku he meg̵aan e en egkeumuri sumalà is impesavut kedì te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne tenged kayi edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku su wey kenè niw melipati is impenurù ku.

Sikan is impenurù dey keniyu mehitenged te egkeulaula keuzemà ke edlikù is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he utew zekelà is gehem din, ne kenà heini tetezemen dà he midhimu te etew zà duen. Netuenan dey su nemesahan dey en is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag din.

Duma key zin dengan hein impaahà te Amey tew he Megbevayà is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag din wey is utew zin kegkelavew. Nezineg dey is lalag te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà he migkag̵i te, “Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal; ingkesuat ku utew sikandin,” ke sikandin.
Nezineg dey is lag̵eng te Megbevayà he ziyà ebpuun te langit hein miduma key zengan ni Jesus pehendiyà te vuntud he mibulusan te Megbevayà.

Ne utew zutun neheg̵et is kedtuu zey te nengetagnà dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà mehitenged ki Jesus ne kinahanglan he purungi niw zaan tuuwi. Su is impenurù dan, ne iring te sulù he ebpenganlag diyà te merusirem taman te kenè pa egkeriwaswas. Ne emun egkeriwaswas en, egketeyawan kiw te mekevugwas,
Ne kinahanglan utew he sevuta niw he wazà etew he hustu is kedseysey zin te penurù he insurat te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà emun wazà ipesavut kandin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Su heini is penurù, wazà diyà dà mebpuun te isip te etew zà duen, kekenà, impinted te Megbevayà. Mid-ulinan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin is ebpemeneuven dengan, ne is menge lalag dan, iyan impekag̵i kandan te Megbevayà.

Duen dengan menge teruen he etew he uvag kun ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ne iring din ded daan, duen menge etew he edlepew g̵untaan he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Sayep is ibpenurù dan te meeles ne ebpekezezaat heini te upakat niw te menge tumutuu. Ibpenurù dan he kenà Nengazen tew si Jesus he iyan pezem mibelukas kandan ne tenged dutun egketik-awan sikandan ke edsilutan dan.
Ne minsan pa zutun mezakel is edsunud te meremerik he menge ulaula zan, ne pinaag̵i zutun egkesawey kiw is edsunud te tutuu he tuluuwen su kunaan te menge etew ke zuma tew sikandan.
Tenged te suat dan te selapì, ebpenepian kew zan pinaag̵i te penurù dan he tarù. Daan en he midteg̵ana is silut kandan; andam en is Megbevayà te kedsilut kandan.

Su wazà pesegdana te Megbevayà minsan is menge velinsug̵uen din dengan he nekesalà, kekenà, intimbag din diyà te Iveyaan. Ne ziyè dan pa te utew merusirem he mibakus te kedina su idtag̵ad sikandan taman te andew te kedsilut.

Wazà daan pesegdana te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dengan su impelapey zin is dag̵at ne nengelened is langun he wazè dan kedtahud kandin. Iyan dà midlibri zin si Noe he nekepenurù te metazeng he ulaula wey zuen pa pitu he etew he midlibri zin daan.
Elin daan midsilutan dengan te Megbevayà is menge etew ziyà te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura.

Iyan dà meg̵inged dutun he midlibri zin ensi Lut su metazeng mulà si Lut. Nerasey si Lut he ed-isip-isip te meremerik he ulaula te menge mesinupaken he zuma zin. Andew-andew utew mezaat he ulaula is egkengezineg din wey egkengeehè din ne zutun utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin. Ne tenged dutun te utew menge lalung mibinsulan te Megbevayà is inged dan su wey mesavut te minsan hentei ke hengkey is kedsiluti zin keuzemà dutun te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge sug̵ù din.

Iyan, is menge etew mulà he ed-azap te Nengazen, metau sikandin he edtavang kandan wey kenè dan mekesalà ke ebpenulayen sikandan. Metau zaan sikandin he ebakus te menge nemematey he lalung su wey itag̵ad sikandan taman te andew te kedsiluti zin kandan.
Utew meveg̵at keuzemà is kedsiluti zin dutun te menge etew he ebpeniguduwan dan te edtuman is menge meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan wey edsumpeliten dan is minsan hentei he zuen din keg̵ehem.
Ne heini is migkag̵i ku he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, utew zan memevurut wey memepelevawen. Kenè dan edtehuzen is menge kedesenan diyà te langit, kekenà, edsumpeliten dan.

Ne minsan is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he lavew pa is gehem dan kenà dutun te menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan mulà ebpekeaku he edsudì te menge kedesenan emun idsumbung dan is menge kedesenan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Iyan, heini is menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan egkeisip he igkehandek heini su zaan he ulaula zan is kedsudì. Iring sikandan te menge langgam he wazà keeled he iyan intuvad kandan is kedekepa wey kedhimetayi kandan. Edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Ne iyan egkezungguan dan is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.

Utew merasey is silut he egkeantus dan keuzemà iring te merasey zaan is ibpeantus dan te menge etew. Iyan kelenganan he egkesuatan dan is kedtumana zan te minsan maandew pa te minsan hengkey he meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan. Igkeeled niw wey igkesudii sikandan keniyu su minsan ke ebpekidtug̵en dan keniyu ziyà te menge keemuran niw utew zan egkesuati is kedtarùtarù keniyu.

Egkeerig̵an dan te minsan hentei he vahi; kenà egkepenù is suat dan te mezaat he ulaula. Ebpeeyatan dan is menge etew he kenè pa ebpekesavut te hustu. Utew zan leg̵ezen, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandan egkesilutan te Megbevayà.

Nengetazin en is isip dan su midsuwey zan en te tutuu he ibayà. Iyan ibayà he ed-ikulen dan is mezaat he paag̵i zengan ni Belaam he anak ni Busur. Iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa ni Belaam is selapì he idsuhul kandin ke mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan din.
Duen kudè din he asnu he kenà pezem ebpekekag̵i, iyan, impekag̵i te Megbevayà ne indawey zin ki Belaam haazà is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan ne tenged dutun wazà melaus ni Belaam is ketuturebungi zin.

Ne haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, iring sikandan te kalut he nemezahan. Iring sikandan te g̵apun he ebpegwisen te keramag su wazè dan menge pulus. Integ̵ana te Megbevayà is egkeubpaan dan diyà te Impirnu he utew merusirem.

Uvag mezalem is menge lalag dan, iyan, wazà pulus te egkeg̵iyen dan. Duen menge etew he ed-engkezan dan pezem is menge zaan he zuma zan he ed-ulaula te sayep, iyan, ebpenulayen sikandan dutun te menge menunudlù pinaag̵i te meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan.

Egkeg̵iyen dutun te menge menunudlù he egkelibri ki pinaag̵i te kedsunuza kandan su idtug̵ut kun kenita is minsan hengkey he ulaula, iyan, nasì nengeuripen pa sikandan te menge ulaula he ebpekezezaat su netuenan ta he uripen is etew te minsan hengkey he ebpekevayàbayà kandin.

Ke zuen menge etew he nekesavut en mehitenged te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, egkelibri zan en pezem te mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan he ebpekezezaat kandan. Iyan, ke egkepenulayan sikandan ne edlikuan dan en maan haazà is daan he kegkeuripena kandan te mezaat he ulaula, tuwas pa he merasey is egketemanan dan.
Meupiya pa ke wazè dan meturedu is paag̵i te kegkehimu kandan he metazeng, kenà te neturedu zan ne mid-iniyug̵an dan ne wazè dan medtuman te sug̵ù kandan te Megbevayà he impesavut kandan.
Netuman en pinaag̵i kandan sikan is erubasa he edhenduen te, “Migkaan te asu is in-utè din ne sikan is nezig̵ù he vavuy, midtunè en maan.”
Minahal he menge suled ku, ikezuwa en heini te kebpesurati ku keniyu. Iyan tuyù ku kayi te kezezuwa ku kebpesurati keniyu is: wey kew mekeisip te hustu pinaag̵i kayi te menge sambag ku keniyu.
Egkesuatan ku he meisip-isip niw is menge lalag he insurat dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà wey is sug̵ù te Nengazen tew he Menluluwas tew he imbeg̵ey zin kenitew pinaag̵i kenami te menge epustul.
Idhuna ku keniyu ibpesavut he keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu duen ebpemenlepew he menge etew he iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayè dan. Edsumpeliten kew zan he egkag̵i te,

“Hendei vuwa si Kristu su impenaad din dengan he edlikù dini te kelibutan, iyan, kenè key ebpeketuu te iring dutun su puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpatey te menge tipehuna he kepuun tew taman en guntaan, wazà mahalin is minsan hengkey; iyan ded gihapun genat dà te kedtukuza te kelibutan taman en guntaan.”

Is egkag̵i te iring kayi, iyan edlipatan dan is: dengan midlimbag te Megbevayà is langit pinaag̵i zà te lalag din, ne is tanà daan, midlimbag din pinaag̵i te wahig ne impelepew zin is tanà puun dutun te wahig.
Ne pinaag̵i zaan te wahig, midlimas dengan te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te lumpad.

Ne haazà is Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan inlimbag din dengan, pinaag̵i zutun midteg̵enahan din en is langit wey tanà su wey melimas din te hapuy keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin wey kedsiluti zin te menge etew he wazè dan kedtahud kandin.
Minahal ku he menge suled, tentenuzi niw he ziyà te Megbevayà, neked-iring is sengeandew zà wey is nengkelibu he tuig su ziyà te kandin meg̵aan dà utew haazà is dezuwa.

Kunaan te zuma ke edlanganlangan is Nengazen su maan is kenè din edtumanen is pesarig din he edlikù sikandin. Kenà sikandin edlanganlangan, kekenà, utew sikandin mepelevayen keniyu su kenè din egkesuatan he zuen minsan sevaha he kenà egkelibri te silut. Egkesuatan din he meiniyug̵i te langun is menge ulaula zan he mezaat.

Ne minsan pa zutun, edtumanen gihapun te Megbevayà is kedlimasa zin te kelibutan. Egketik-awan is menusiyà he iring te kegketik-awi kandan te tekawen. Dutun he andew egkezineg is kerekatak ne egkehanew is langit. Egkeg̵evà ne egkeamin egketutung is minsan hengkey. Egkevinsulan is tivuuk he kelibutan wey is langun he tag̵ù din.
Ne g̵eina te zuen andew keuzemà he zutun egkehanew is langun te iring kayi, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew is kedsunud tew te Megbevayà para wazà igkesewayi kenitew.

Su edteg̵azan ta is andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te kelibutan. Edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meg̵aan metuman. Dutun he andew egkeamin egketutung is langit, wey egkengetunew is langun te utew meinit.
Iyan, sikitew mulà, ebperetengen ta is beg̵u en he tanà wey langit he impenaad kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan dà ebpekeubpà dutun is memetazeng is ulaula zan.

Na menge suled, geina te kemulu tew pa edteg̵azi haazà is andew, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew edtengkai is menge ulaula tew su wey wazà igkesewayi kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melinew is kedepità te uman sevaha kenitew ziyà te kandin.

Kenè niw lipati he iyan ibpelevaya te Megbevayà kenitew su wey melibri ki te silut din. Iyan daan heini impesavut keniyu te emig̵u tew he si Pablo zutun te surat he impeuwit din keniyu. Impinted heini kandin te Megbevayà.

Ibpenurù din layun is andew te kedlimas diyà te langun he menge surat din. Duen daan ibpenurù ni Pablo he mereg̵en he edsevuten ne is menge etew he kenà edsavut te hustu wey wazà meheg̵et is kedtuu zan, edhelinen dan haazà is memereg̵en ne nesayep is kedseysaya zan duen iring te nesayep daan is kedseysaya zan te zuma he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, geina te netuenan niw en heini he zaan, andam kew su wey kenè kew meketuu te menge tarù he ibpenurù te menge lalung he etew ne egkelipatan niw is tutuu he tuluuwen he midtuuwan niw.

Kinahanglan he pinaag̵i te kegkeg̵eg̵awi keniyu te Nengazen tew wey Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu, med-iseg is kedsevuta niw te ibpesavut din. Berakat he iyan sikandin edelig̵en guntaan wey te wazà pidtemanan.

Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu mehitenged ki Kristu. Migeraran sikandin te Lalag he ebpekeveg̵ey te wazà pidtemanan he untung. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa tukuza is kelibutan. Ne minsan pa zutun neehè dey sikandin ne nekepemineg key te migkag̵i zin. Neehè dey ne neg̵ewezan dey sikandin.

Hein mibulus dini te kelibutan heini is puunà te untung, neehè dey ne tenged dutun egkeg̵iyen dey keniyu is neehè dey. Edseyseyen dey keniyu is migeraran te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Daan sikandin he zuma te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne zutun mibpeg̵awag̵awa kenami zini te kelibutan.
Edtudtulen ku en keniyu haazà is neehè dey wey nezineg dey ziyà te kandin su wey kew mebpekid-upakat kenami su nekid-upakat key zaan te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne tenged dutun ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te iring kayi su wey meheg̵et is kelipey tew.
Ibpesavut ku keniyu is impesavut kenami te Anak te Megbevayà he is Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te kerayag ne wazà minsan hengkey he merusirem diyà te kandin.
Emun egkag̵i ki he nekid-upakat ki te Megbevayà, iyan, diyè ki pa te kerusireman,
Emun merayag mulà is ibayè tew iring te merayag is Megbevayà,
Emun egkag̵i ki he wazè ta salà, tarù is ebpetuuwan ta te g̵ehinawa ta ne kenè ki ves edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Emun idtug-an ta ziyà te Megbevayà is menge salè ta, kenà egkehimu he kenè ki zin ebpeseyluwen su metazeng sikandin ne metinumanen te pesarig din. Edlumpiyuwan ki zin te langun he menge ulaula ta he kenà metazeng.
Iyan, ke egkag̵i ki he wazè ki mekesalà, henduen be te migkag̵i ki he teruen is Megbevayà ne wazè ki mebpezumazuma te lalag din.

Sikiyu is iring te menge anak ku, iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu is: wey meheg̵eti is kedtuu niw wey kew kenà mekesalà. Iyan, ke zuen ebpekesalà he minsan hentei kenitew, duen datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan datù tew si Jesu Kristu he utew metazeng.
Iyan sikandin impemuhat tenged kenitew wey mepalis is menge salè tew, ne kenè kenitew zà he salà is egkepalis, kekenà, is menge salà daan te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Egketuenan tew he emig̵u kiw en te Megbevayà ke edtumanen tew is menge sugù din kenitew.
Iyan, ke zuen egkag̵i te, “Emig̵u e en te Megbevayà,” ne haazà is egkag̵i, kenè din edtumanen is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, teruen sikandin. Kenà sikandin ebpezumazuma te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Ne ke zuen etew he edtumanen din is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, neheg̵et en is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin. Sikan is etew he egkag̵i he nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he metazeng is menge ulaula zin iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Jesus. Emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ta, netuenan ta he nekidsevaha ki te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, kenà beg̵u heini is idsug̵ù ku keniyu su zengan dà. Ne insug̵ù en heini keniyu hein aney kew medtuu. Ne heini he sug̵ù, ne iyan ded sikan is lalag he impesavut kenitew he mahala tew is minsan hentei he zuma tew.

Ne minsan pa te zaan heini he sug̵ù, henduen be te sikan pa isug̵ù kenitew su impaahà ni Kristu he tutuu heini is sug̵ù wey ibpeehè niw zaan g̵untaan. Egkeawè en kayi te kelibutan is kerusireman ne egketeyawan kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Ke zuen etew he egkag̵i he midteyawan te Megbevayà is isip din, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin diyà te kerusireman.
Is etew mulà he ebmahalen din is duma zin, iyan sikandin kes edteyawan is isip din te Megbevayà, ne kenè din ibpekesalà is menge ulaula zin.

Iyan, is etew he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, kemulu pa is isip din diyà te kerusireman ne mezaat pa is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te etew he kenè din egketuenan ke hendei sikandin ebpekepevayà su ziyè pa sikandin te kerusireman.
Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu, menge anak ku, su nengepesaylu en is menge salè niw tenged ki Kristu.

Sikiyu is menge meg̵urang, umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nehimu kew en he menge emig̵u ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey. Sikiyu is menge menguhed, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nezaag niw en si Setanas.

Sikiyu is menge vatà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su menge emig̵u kew en te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge meg̵urang is: tenged te emig̵u kew en ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge menguhed su mevig̵er en is kedtuu niw ne kenà egkeawà diyan te isip niw is Lalag te Megbevayà, wey nezaag niw en si Setanas.

Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dekelà dini te g̵ehinawa ta is menge ulaula te menge etew zini te kelibutan he menge kuntada te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he wazà minsan hengkey zini te kelibutan he iyan dekelà dini te g̵ehinawa ta. Su ke zuen etew he iyan dekelà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is iring dutun, kenà egkehimu he iyan mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Su is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, iring te menge mezaat he kebayà, is menge mezaat he vutang he egkeahà wey egkesuatan te menge etew wey is kebpezalig dan tenged te menge azen he nekuwa zan, kenè man heini ebpuun te Amey tew he Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan.

Egkehanew keuzemà is kelibutan wey egkehanew zaan is minsan hengkey he mezaat he egkesuatan te menge etew, iyan, sikan is edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew, kekenà, duen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Menge anak ku, meg̵aan en egketapus heini is timpu. Nezineg niw en he keuzemà duen edlepew he egeraran te Kuntada ni Kristu. Guntaan duen en mezakel he menge kuntada ni Kristu ne tenged dutun netuenan ta he meg̵aan en iyan egketapus heini is timpu.

Ne heini is menge kuntada ni Kristu, kenè tew sikandan tutuu he menge zuma su umba mid-ewaan kiw zan. Angin ke tutuu zan he zuma tew su wazè kiw zan geina ewai. Tenged te ked-awè dan egketuenan ta he kenè dan tutuu he menge zuma tew.
Sikiyu mulà, mibpeulinan kew ni Kristu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun nesavut niw te langun is tutuu he tuluuwen.

Kenè ku iyan ibpesurati keniyu is tenged te wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, tenged te nesavut niw en wey tenged te wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he ziyà ebpuun te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Hentei man is teruen? Iyan sikan is egkag̵i he kenà iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Is egkag̵i kayi, ne iyan kuntada ni Kristu su egkeg̵iyen din he kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen is Amey tew he Megbevayà ne egkeg̵iyen din daan he kenà si Kristu Anak te tutuu he Megbevayà.

Ne ke zuen etew he kenè din edewaten is Anak te Megbevayà, kenè din daan edewaten is Amey tew he Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan ke zuen etew he midawat din en is Anak te Megbevayà, nezawat din en daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Is tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu hein aney kew medtuu, kinahanglan he edhemenan niw su emun edhemenan niw kenà egkehimu he kenè kew layun egkesevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
Su iyan impenaad kenitew ni Kristu is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey kew med-andam su zuen menge etew he tarù is ibpetuuwan dan pezem keniyu.

Iyan, sikiyu, wazà kinahanglan he zuen selakew pa he ebpenurù keniyu su mibpeulinan kew en ni Kristu te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Pinaag̵i zutun egkesavut niw is langun he ibpesavut keniyu ni Kristu. Tutuu mulà ne kenà tarù haazà is ibpesavut din keniyu umba kinahanglan he hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw kandin sumalà is impenurù en keniyu.
Ne tenged kayi te langun, menge anak ku, hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu su wey kenè kew mahandek ne kenè kew egkeeled keuzemà dutun te kedlikù din.
Netuenan te en he metazeng si Kristu. Netuenan ta zaan he minsan hentei he metazeng is menge ulaula zin, nehimu en sikandin he anak te Megbevayà.

Utew kiw mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa te Amey tew he Megbevayà su ahaa niw man migngezanan kiw zin en he menge anak din ne menge anak kiw zin en iyan. Is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenè kiw zan egkekilala he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà su kenè dan daan egkekilala ke hentei sikandin.

Menge minahal ku he menge emig̵u, menge anak kiw en te Megbevayà ne kenè tew pa egketuenan ke hengkey is egketemanan te kegkeenaka kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan, netuenan tew he ke edlikù si Kristu, egkehimu zutun is kenitew he zagwey he iring te kandin he zagwey su zutun egkeehè tew human is tutuu he zagwey zin.
Is minsan hentei he ebperateng te kedlikù ni Kristu, layun din ebpurungi is menge ulaula zin su wey wazà mezaat iring te wazà daan mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu.
Ke zuen nekesalà, nesupak din is kesug̵uan te Megbevayà su is ulaula he egngezanan te salà ne iyan is minsan hengkey he ulaula he supak te kesug̵uan te Megbevayà.
Netuenan niw en he umba mibpeetew si Kristu su wey zin maawà is menge salè tew. Ne netuenan niw zaan he wazà minsan sevaha he salà he nehimu zin wey egkehimu zin.

Ne tenged dutun is minsan hentei he edhemenan din is kebpekidsevaha zin ki Kristu, kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat. Sikan is etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat, wazè din metueni ke hentei si Kristu ne wazè din tuuwi sikandin.

Menge anak ku, kinahanglan he kenè niw pemineg̵a is minsan hentei he teruen he ebpenurù pezem keniyu. Iyan tutuu is: ke zuen etew he ed-ulaula te hustu ne iyan sikandin metazeng he etew iring te metazeng si Kristu.

Ke zuen etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat ne sakup sikandin ni Setanas su layun daan si Setanas ed-ulaula te mezaat puun pa te kedlimbag̵a te kelibutan. Umba midhendini te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà su wey zin ikeawà is gehem te menge ulaula ni Setanas.

Is minsan hentei he nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà, kenè en sikandin egkesuat he ed-ulaula te mezaat su midsempù en man te Megbevayà. Geina te iyan Amey zin is Megbevayà kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat.

Ne ke zuen etew he kenà metazeng is menge ulaula zin, tuus heini he kenà sikandin anak te Megbevayà. Ne kenà daan anak te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenè din ebmahalen is duma zin. Pinaag̵i kayi egketuusan ta ke hentei is menge anak te Megbevayà wey ke hentei is menge sakup ni Setanas.
Kinahanglan he ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew. Iyan heini impenurù kenitew hein aney kiw meketuu.
Kenè tew ed-iringan si Kain su sakup sikandin ni Setanas ne mibunù din is hazi zin. Umba mibunù din su mezaat is kandin he ulaula ne metazeng mulà is menge ulaula te hazi zin.
Menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu emun ebpekigkuntada keniyu is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.

Netuenan tew he zengan iyan egkeperateng tew is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Ne netuenan tew zaan he g̵untaan duen tew en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Umba netuenan tew heini su utew en mahal zini te g̵ehinawa tew is menge zuma tew. Is minsan hentei he kenà mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is menge zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin ebpekeperateng te kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.

Is minsan hentei he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he iring te teremunù; ne netuenan ta he ke zuen etew he egkesuat he ebunù wazè pa sikandin mekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Umba netuenan tew en he utew zekelà is kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin su mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu he elili kenitew. Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he edtevangan tew is menge zuma tew he tumutuu minsan ke ibpatey ta haazà is kedtavang.
Ke zuen minsan hentei kenitew he egkehimu he edtevangan din is duma zin he edlised, iyan, kenè din edtevangan, kenà egkehimu he mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
Menge mahal ku he anak, kinahanglan he kenà menge lalag dà is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta, kekenà, kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kebmahala ta kandan pinaag̵i te menge ulaula ta.
Su emun ed-ul-ulahan tew heini, egketuenan tew he menge anak kiw iyan te tutuu he Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun kenè en kinahanglan he egkeeled ki ziyà te etuvangan din
minsan pa te iyan diyà te isip ta is: dait ki he edsilutan. Umba kenè ki egkeeled su iyan lavew he egkeserig̵an is hukum te Megbevayà, kenà is hukum te isip ta su netuenan din is minsan hengkey.
Ne emun netuenan ta he wazè en igkesiluti zin kenita, egkehimu en he zekelà is kedsarig ta ke ed-ampù ki ziyà te kandin.
Ibeg̵ey zin kenita is ebuyuen ta su edtumanen ta is menge sug̵ù din wey ed-ul-ulahan ta is egkesuatan din.
Ne iyan insug̵ù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he edtuuwan tew is Anak din he si Jesu Kristu wey ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew sumalà is insug̵ù daan dengan ni Jesus.

Is minsan hentei he edtuman te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà, nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà. Egketuenan ta he zini te kenita ed-ubpà is Megbevayà su mid-ulinan ki te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw petuluy tuuwi is etew he egkag̵i he mid-ulinan sikandin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Gezami niw zè pa wey niw metueni ke ebpuun be te Megbevayà is ed-ulin kandin. Umba egkeg̵iyen ku heini su mezakel en is menge ebpenurù te tarù he midlepew zini te kelibutan he mid-ulinan sikandan te teruen he mulin-ulin.

Is minsan hentei he mulin-ulin he egkag̵i he mibpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, ne ziyà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin te Megbevayà. Pinaag̵i kayi egketuusan niw is mulin-ulin he ebpuun te Megbevayà.

Iyan, ke zuen mulin-ulin he egkag̵i he wazà mebpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà, ne kenà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin diyà te Megbevayà, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Nezineg niw en he zuen edlepew he mulin-ulin he ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Ne egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu he zini en guntaan haazà te kelibutan.

Sikiyu, menge anak ku, gaked kew en te Megbevayà ne nezaag niw en is menge teruen he mulin-ulin su lavew pa he mekeg̵eg̵ehem is Megbevayà he ziyà ed-ubpà te kenitew, kenà si Setanas he ziyà ed-ubpà te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.

Haazà is menge etew he mid-ulinan te teruen he menge mulin-ulin, kuntada man sikandan te Megbevayà wey supak te Megbevayà is ibpenurù dan. Ne tenged dutun ebpemineg̵en sikandan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada zaan te Megbevayà.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, gaked kiw te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew is minsan hentei he emig̵u te Megbevayà. Iyan, is minsan hentei he kenà gaked te Megbevayà, kenà ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew. Pinaag̵i kayi egketuusan tew ke hentei is mid-ulinan te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ebpenurù te tutuu wey ke hentei is mid-ulinan te teruen he mulin-ulin.

Minahal ku he menge suled, kinahanglan he ebpurung kiw egig̵ineg̵awè su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is gag̵ew. Is minsan hentei he zekelà is gag̵ew zin te menge zuma zin, ne iyan nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà wey emig̵u te Megbevayà.
Is minsan hentei he wazè din gag̵ew te menge zuma zin, wazè din hanew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà su is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te g̵ag̵ew zin.
Impehendini te Megbevayà is sebsevaha zà he Anak din te kelibutan su wey pinaag̵i kandin mekeangken kiw te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iyan haazà kebpaahaa zin te g̵ag̵ew zin kenitew.

Is tutuu he g̵ag̵ew, kenà iyan is kebmahala tew te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan is kebmahala zin kenitew wey is kebpehendiniya zin te Anak din su wey pinaag̵i te kebpehimatey zin mepesaylu is menge salè tew.
Menge minahal ku he suled, geina te iring dutun is utew zekelà he g̵ag̵ew kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he utew zaan dekelà is gag̵ew te kada sevaha kenitew ziyà te menge zuma zin.
Wazè pa etew he nekeahà te Megbevayà, iyan, emun egig̵ineg̵awè kiw, ed-ubpà dini te kenitew is Megbevayà, ne egkeheg̵et is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà dini te g̵ehinawa ta.
Mibpeulinan ki zin te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun egketuusan ta he nekidsevaha ki kandin wey impeubpè din dini te kenita is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.
Sikami is menge epustul, netuenan dey he impehendini te Megbevayà is Anak din su wey melibri is menusiyà te silut. Umba netuenan dey su neehè dey sikandin ne edtudtulen dey is neehè dey.
Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he egkag̵i he edtuuwan din he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, diyà ed-ubpà te kandin is Megbevayà ne nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged dutun nesavut tew en he utew zekelà is gagew kenitew te Megbevayà ne umba ebpekesarig kiw. Is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te g̵agew zin. Is minsan hentei he layun dekelà is gagew zin te menge zuma zin, meheg̵et is kebpekidsevaha zin te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà.

Edheg̵etan din is kebmahala tew kandin dini te g̵ehinawa tew su wey wazè tew kehandek keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin te nengeulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Umba kenè kiw egkehandek su iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Kristu, metazeng daan is kenitew he ulaula zini te kelibutan.

Ne is minsan hentei he ebmahalen te Megbevayà, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne g̵eina te wazà kurang te kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà in-awè din en is kegkehandek tew kandin. Umba egkehandek is etew su egkeperateng din is silut kandin te Megbevayà, iyan, sikan is etew he egkehandek te Megbevayà, wazè pa meheg̵et diyà te isip din is kebmahala kandin te Megbevayà.
Umba utew en mahal sikandin dini te g̵ehinawa tew su nehuna kiw zin he mibmahal ziyà te kandin he g̵ehinawa.

Ke zuen minsan hentei he egkag̵i he utew mahal ziyà te g̵ehinawa zin is Megbevayà, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, teruen sikandin. Su kenà egkehimu he ebmahalen din is Megbevayà he wazè din maahà ke kenè din daan ebmahalen is duma zin he neehè din en mulà.
Su insug̵ù kenitew te Megbevayà he is minsan hentei he tutuu is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he ebmahalen din is duma zin.

Anak en te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he edtuu he iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne emun ebmahalen din diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà ebmahalen din daan is menge zuma zin he anak te Megbevayà.
Emun hustu is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà wey is kedtumana ta te menge sug̵ù din, egketuenan ta he hustu zaan is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta he anak te Megbevayà.
Is hustu he kebmahala ta te Megbevayà, ne iyan is kedtumana ta te menge sug̵ù din. Ne kenà mereg̵en he edtumanen is menge sug̵ù din
su sikitew is langun he nehimu en he menge anak te Megbevayà, egkezaag tew en si Setanas he iyan ebayàbayà dini te kelibutan; ne iyan ibpekezaag tew kandin is kedtuu tew ki Jesus.
Hentei is ebpekezaag ki Setanas? Iyan dà sikan is midtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus.
Iyan si Jesu Kristu sikan is midsug̵ù te Amey zin dini te kelibutan. Egketuusan heini pinaag̵i te wahig wey lengesa. Kenà heini egketuusan pinaag̵i zà te wahig
Tetelu is ebpenistig̵us mehitenged ki Jesu Kristu.
Is sevaha, ne iyan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin; is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kebewtismuwi ki Jesu Kristu, ne is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kedtig̵is te lengesa zin. Ne neuyun is kedtistig̵us kayi te tetelu.
Egkevenaran ki te kebpenistig̵us te menge etew zà duen, iyan, lavew pa he mezesen is kebpenistig̵us te Megbevayà ne midtistig̵usan din he Anak din si Jesus.

Is minsan hentei he edtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, nevenaran sikandin te kebpenistig̵us te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he kenà edtuu te kebpenistig̵us te Megbevayà, ed-isipen din he teruen is Megbevayà su wazè din tuuwi is kebpenistig̵us te Megbevayà mehitenged te Anak din he si Jesus.
Is Megbevayà, imbeg̵ey zin kenitew is untung he wazà pidtemanan; ne ziyà ebpuun heini is untung te Anak din he si Jesus. Iyan heini sikan is kebpenistig̵us kenitew te Megbevayà.
Is minsan hentei he nekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, duen din en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Is minsan hentei he wazà mebpekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, wazè din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Sikiyu is nemeketuu en te Anak te Megbevayà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey niw metueni he zuen niw en untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Sikitew is nemeketuu, dekelà is kebpekesarig tew ke ed-ampù kiw ziyà te Megbevayà. Netuenan tew he ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen tew he kenà supak te egkesuatan din, ibeg̵ey zin kenitew.
Layun sikandin ebpemineg kenitew ke ed-ampù kiw ne tenged dutun netuenan tew zaan he ibeg̵ey zin is ebuyuen tew.

Ke zuen minsan hentei he neehè din he nekesalà is duma zin, iyan, is rimeg̵as dutun te salà, ne kenà kemetayen, ne kinahanglan he iampù din ne is Megbevayà, ibeg̵ey zin is untung he wazà pidtemanan dutun te nekesalà. Iyan egkeg̵iyen ku kayi is etew he nekesalà he kenà kemetayen is rimeg̵as dutun te salè din. Duen salà he iyan rimeg̵as dutun is kemetayen. Kenè ku iyan egkeg̵iyen he id-ampù tew is etew he nekesalà te iring dutun.
Salà is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan, ne zuen salà he kenà iyan rimeg̵as dutun is kemetayen.
Netuenan tew he wazà minsan hentei he nehimu he anak te Megbevayà he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat su edlig-enan sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkehilevetan ni Setanas.
Netuenan tew he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà, iyan, is langun he menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ebeyveyaan sikandan ni Setanas.

Netuenan tew zaan he midhendini en te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà ne imbeg̵ey zin kenitew is kedsavut wey kiw mehimu he menge emig̵u te tutuu he Megbevayà. Nekidsevaha kiw te tutuu he Megbevayà su nekidsevaha kiw te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Menge anak ku, likayi niw is ked-ezapa te minsan hengkey he kenà iyan is tutuu he Megbevayà.

Siak is meg̵urang, ebpesuratan ku sikew is bahi he pinilì te Megbevayà wey is menge anak nu. Utew kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku ne kenà dini zà te kedì he g̵ehinawa, kekenà, mahal kew zaan diyà te langun he neketuu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Umba minahal zey sikiyu su g̵eina te midhamen kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen ne heini is tutuu he tuluuwen, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew te wazà pidtemanan.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu he Anak din, berakat he meg̵eg̵awi zan kenitew, ikehizu kiw zan, ne veg̵ayi kiw zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Egkehimu heini su midhamen kiw te tutuu he tuluuwen wey ebmahalen tew is menge zuma tew.
Nelipey ad utew su zuen menge anak nu he edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen sumalà is insug̵ù kenitew te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Ne tenged dutun, Bayi, edhengyuen ku he egig̵ineg̵awè kiw. Kenà beg̵u heini he sug̵ù is idsurat ku kayi, su zaan heini zuen te aney tew en kedtuu.
Su emun egig̵ineg̵awè kiw, egketuman tew is menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà. Su iyan sug̵ù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he egig̵ineg̵awè kiw.

Mezakel is nemenlepew he ebpenurù te tarù dini te kelibutan. Egkeg̵iyen dan he si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, wazà sikandin mehimu he etew. Is minsan hentei he iyan haazà egkeg̵iyen dan, teruen sikandin wey kuntada ni Kristu.
Andam kew wey kenà maawà diyan te keniyu is midheg̵uan niw su wey kenà meterini keuzemà is suhul te Megbevayà keniyu.

Ke zuen etew he ed-engkezan din is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu su iyan edhemenan din is tarù he tuluuwen he in-uman din dutun, wazà sikandin mebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he edhemenan din is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan sikandin mibpekidsevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Anak din.

Ke zuen ebpekeuma he minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tuluuwen ne kenè din iyan ibpenurù is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu, kenè niw ipepemenahik diyan te valey niw. Kenè niw zaan igalewg̵alew sikandin.
Su minsan ke igalewg̵alew niw zà sikandin, egketevangan niw sikandin dutun te ulaula zin he mezaat.
Mezakel pezem is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat. Egkesuatan ku he ebpenumbaley a ziyan wey kiw mekedlelalag ne wey meheg̵et is kelipey tew.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge anak te suled nu he vahi zini he pinilì daan te Megbevayà.
Siak is meg̵urang, ebpesuratan ku sikew, Gayu, is emig̵u ku he utew ku minahal.
Minahal ku he suled, id-ampù ku sikew ziyà te Megbevayà he mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk nu wey iveg̵ey kenikew is meupiya he lawa iring te imbeg̵ey zin daan kenikew is mezesen he kedtuu.
Nelipey a utew zutun te kebpekeuma zini te menge suled tew he ebpuun diyan su midtudtulan e zan he utew meheg̵et is kedhemeni nu te tutuu he tuluuwen wey uyun kun daan dutun is menge ulaula nu.
Iyan utew ku igkelipey is kegkezineg ku te tudtul he edtuman en te tutuu he tuluuwen is menge anak ku te kedtuu.
Minahal ku he suled, utew ka velig̵eg̵awen su mibpurungan nu is menge suled tew he midtuluy ziyan minsan te sikan nu pa sikandan mekilala.

Mibpenudtul zan te menge tumutuu zini hein midtig̵um key he utew zekelà is gag̵ew nu kandan. Emun ed-uman dan edtuluy ziyan tevangi nu en maan sikandan te paag̵i he egkesuatan te Megbevayà wey zan mekelaus dutun te kedhipanew zan.
Su midhipanew zan wey zan mekesangyew te impenurù ni Kristu, iyan, kenè dan ebpetavang te kenà menge tumutuu.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he iyan ki is tumutuu ebeg̵ey ziyà te kandan su wey ki meketavang dutun te kedsengyawa zan te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Mibpesuratan ku is menge tumutuu ziyan, iyan, si Diyutripis, kenè din ebpemineg̵en is menge sug̵ù ku. Iyan egkesuatan din is: iyan dà sikandin ebayàbayà.

Emun ebpekehendiyan a, edseyseyen ku keniyu is langun he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan din, su kenà tutuu is menge memezaat he lalag din he ebpemekesug̵at kenami. Ne kenà duen dà taman su kenè din ed-elimahan is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ke ebpekeuma zan. Ne kenè din daan idtug̵ut he ed-elimahan sikandan te menge zuma zin he tumutuu ziyan. Is ed-elima mulà kandan, kenè din idtug̵ut he edtampu zan te kedsimba niw.

Minahal ku he suled, kenè ta iyan ed-iringan is mezaat he ulaula he iring dutun, kekenà, iyan ta ed-iringan is meupiya he ulaula. Is minsan hentei he meupiya is menge ulaula zin, neg̵aked sikandin te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he mezaat is ulaula zin, wazà diyà te g̵ehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
Nezelig̵an si Dimitriyu te langun he menge etew. Egkeehè dan pinaag̵i te menge ulaula zin he edtumanen din is tutuu he tuluuwen. Edelig̵en dey zaan sikandin ne netuenan nu he tutuu is egkeg̵iyen dey.
Mezakel pa pezem is egkeg̵iyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat.
Egkesuatan ku he kenè en utew egkeug̵et edhendiyan a ne human ki ebpekedlalag.
Berakat he melinawen is kebpekesavuk niw ziyan. Is menge emig̵u nu zini, ebpengemusta zan kenikew. Ipengemusta a zaan te langun he menge emig̵u ta ziyan.

Siak si Hudas is suled ni Santiago wey is sulug̵uen ni Jesu Kristu. Sikiyu is midhimu te Amey tew he Megbevayà he menge tumutuu he menge minahal zin he midlig-enan ni Jesu Kristu, iyan kew ebpesuratan ku.
Berakat he mehizuwi kew, mebmelinawen kew, wey ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iyan aney he egkesuatan ku is ebaal a te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan wey ku ikeseysey ziyan te keniyu is kedlibriya kenitew te Megbevayà, iyan, utew en guntaan epiki he ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey ku sikiyu mesembag̵i. Kinahanglan, menge suled, he pekezesen kew sukul te menge etew he edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen he imbeg̵ey te Megbevayà. Haazà is tuluuwen, imbeg̵ey zin kenitew te menge g̵aked din ne kinahanglan he kenè en ed-umanan te minsan hentei.

Umba kinahanglan he egkeg̵iyen ku heini su zuen menge etew he nekeamur keniyu, iyan, id-eles dan he kenà hustu is edtuuwan dan. Wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà; edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen su ibpenurù dan he egkehimu ke ed-ul-ulahan tew is meremerik su utew kun belig̵eg̵awen is Megbevayà ne ebpeseyluwen kiw zin gihapun. Kenè dan edtuu he si Jesu Kristu, iyan dà egalen tew wey Nengazen tew. Dengan dà isurat te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ke hengkey is silut kandan.

Netuenan niw en is egkeg̵iyen ku, iyan, ed-umanan ku pa egkeg̵iya ziyan te keniyu wey niw kenà melipati. Dengan midlibri te Megbevayà is menge pinilì din he etew ne impeg̵uwè din sikandan diyà te g̵inhedian he Ihiptu, iyan, dutun te nekeg̵uwè dan en, mibpenhimetayan din is duma kandan he wazà medsarig kandin.

Isipa niw zaan is menge velinsug̵uen din dengan diyà te langit. Mid-engkezan dan is ketengdanan he imbeg̵ey zin kandan ne mid-ewaan dan is hustu he ed-ubpaan dan. Tenged dutun mibpirisu zin sikandan diyà te utew merusirem. Mibakus din te kedina he kenà egkezeetan te wazà pidtemanan su idtag̵ad sikandan taman te kenè pa egkeuma is andew keuzemà te kedsiluti zin kandan.

Isipa niw zaan is menge meg̵inged dutun te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura wey is menge inged he uvey zutun. Neiringan dan haazà is menge velinsug̵uen su utew subra is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Is menge maama zutun, ne kenà iyan dà is menge vahi midhilevetan dan, kekenà, neked-eerig̵è dan is pudu menge maama ne tenged dutun midsilutan sikandan te hapuy ne nehimu haazà he petizaan te Megbevayà te langun keuzemà he edsilutan din te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan.

Ne iring din ded daan haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Edtumanen dan is meremerik he ulaula he egkeg̵iyen dan he impenurù kandan pinaag̵i te teg̵einep. Kenè dan ebpesakup te Megbevayà ne edsumpeliten dan is menge kedesenan diyà te langit.

Ne minsan si Miguel, sikan is lavew he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin ed-ulaula te iring dutun su hein minatey zengan si Moises, mibpelewanà si Miguel wey si Setanas ke hentei is ebpekeangken te lawa ni Moises. Ne wazà mekeg̵ehem si Miguel he edsulà ki Setanas. Iyan dà lalag din kandin is: “Iyan edsawey kenikew is Megbevayà.”

Iyan, haazà is menge etew mulà he ebpenurù te tarù, edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Iring sikandan te menge leew he langgam he kenà ebpekeisip-isip su is ulaula he egkesuatan te lawa zan, iyan edtumanen dan ne iyan haazà ebpekezezaat kandan.

Kehizu zan! Mid-iringan dan is mid-ulaula zengan ni Kain. Mid-iringan dan is paag̵i ni Belaam he utew sayep su minsan netuenan dan he mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan dan, ed-ul-ulahan dan gihapun su susuaten sikandan te selapì. Iring te midsukul si Kuri te Mebevayà, midsukul zan daan ne edsilutan sikandan iring te midsilutan daan si Kuri.

Ebpekezezaat sikandan te zengeg niw ke edtampu zan te keemuran niw su kenè dan mulà egkeeled dutun te kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan ke ebpekidtug̵en dan keniyu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Wazè dan menge pulus; iring sikandan te menge g̵apun he wazà duen uzan he mibpagwis te keramag. Iring sikandan te menge kayu he kenà ebpemeg̵as minsan pa te iyan en pezem timpu te kebpemeg̵as. Ne umba kenà ebpekepemeg̵as su nepiley en ne neg̵angu.

Iring daan sikandan te utew zezekelà he vag̵el ziyà te zag̵at ke zuen bagyu su iring is menge mekeeled-eled he ulaula zan te meremerik he vuràburà he ebpenlepew ziyà te veyvey. Iring sikandan te menge vituen he nekesuwey te hustu he nesevukan dan su kenè en egkeserig̵an is ibpenurù dan. Midteg̵ana te Megbevayà is utew merusirem he egkeubpaan dan te wazà pidtemanan.

Si Inuk, sikan is ikepitu he lapis he kevuwazan ni Adan, netagnè din dengan haazà is menge etew su migkag̵i sikandin te, “Keuzemà ebpekeuma is Nengazen he edumahan te liblibuwen he menge velinsug̵uen din

su edsusiyen din is nengeulaula te minsan hentei he etew. Edsilutan din is minsan hentei he lalung he wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà tenged te menge kelelalung he mid-ulaula zan wey tenged te kedsumpelita zan te Megbevayà.”

Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnà ni Inuk, menge perelivak wey perevasul sikandan. Iyan dan edtumanen is menge memezaat he kebayè dan. Memepelevawen dan, iyan, edigdig̵en dan is menge zuma he etew su wey zan melimbungi.
Tentenuzi niw, menge suled, is netagnà dengan te menge epustul he midsug̵ù te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ke sikandan te, “Keuzemà te ketepusan he menge andew ebpenlepew is menge etew he edsumpalit keniyu. Iyan edtumanen dan is menge kebayè dan he supak te Megbevayà.”
Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnè dan, iyan igkevahinbahin niw te menge tumutuu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is egkesuatan dan dini te kelibutan ne wazà diyà te kandan is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Ne sikiyu mulà, menge minahal ku he suled, peniguduwi niw is kebpetebtevangè niw su wey meheg̵et is kedtuu niw te tuluuwen he impetuuwan kenitew te Megbevayà. Pekezesen kew ampù pinaag̵i te g̵ehem he ibeg̵ey te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin.

Layun niw isipa is utew zekelà he g̵ag̵ew keniyu te Megbevayà dutun te kedteg̵azi niw te timpu keuzemà he zutun ibpaahà kenitew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu is dekelà he hizu zin su zutun kenè kiw zin edsuwayan te wazà pidtemanan.
Is menge etew he zuwazuwa pa is kedtuu zan, ipeehè niw kandan is hizu niw kandan.

Tevangi niw sikandan wey zan melibri te silut, iring te kedsekelawa niw ziyà te hapuy te egketutung. Is menge zuma he utew zekelà is salè dan, ipeehè niw zaan kandan is hizu niw, iyan, andam kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan pinaag̵i te meremerik he ulaula zan.

Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà. Iyan metau he edtavang kenitew su wey kenè kiw mekesuwey ziyà te kandin. Iyan metau he id-etuvang kiw keuzemà kandin diyà te vulawan he ed-ulian he wazà igkesewayi kenitew he utew zekelà dutun is kelipey tew.

Edelig̵en tew sikandin su iyan dà sikandin Megbevayà; iyan sikandin Menluluwas tew pinaag̵i te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin egkevantug; iyan sikandin hadì; iyan sikandin mekeg̵eg̵ehem; iyan sikandin ebayàbayà dengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey, wey g̵untaan, wey keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan.

Iyan heini kedtudtula te impezayag ni Jesu Kristu. Insarig heini kandin te Megbevayà wey zin daan ikepesavut diyà te menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayà ke hengkey is meg̵aan en he egkengeulaula. Impesavut heini ni Kristu pinaag̵i te kedsug̵ua zin te velinsug̵uen din diyà te kediey te sulug̵uen din he si Juan.
Ne siak, id-amin ku idsurat is langun he neehè ku. Is migkag̵i te Megbevayà wey is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut kediey ni Jesu Kristu, idsurat ku kayi.
Edtuvazan te Megbevayà is ebasa kayi te libru wey edtuvazan din daan is ebpemineg te kebesaha kayi ne edtuman te insug̵ù kayi. Su utew en meg̵aan is kegketuman te langun kayi te netagnà.
Siak si Juan, ne ebpesuratan ku is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te prubinsya he Asya.

Ibpengumew-umew ku he ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Megbevayà, wey te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin, wey ni Jesu Kristu, ne iveg̵ey zan daan keniyu is melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Is Megbevayà, daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey; kemulu pa sikandin guntaan wey kenà sikandin egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan. Is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he ziyà ed-ubpà te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne pitu is gehem din. Si Jesu Kristu, iyan egkeserig̵an is lalag din. Iyan sikandin kes nehuna he zuen din beg̵u en he untung pinaag̵i te kegkevenhawa kandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge hadì dini te kelibutan.
Dekelà is gehinawa zin kenitew. Midlibri kiw zin te silut te menge salè tew pinaag̵i te kebpaag̵as din te lengesa zin.
Midhimu zin he iyan kiw edhedian din wey iyan kiw memumuhat he iyan kebpemuhat tew is ked-ezapa tew te Megbevayà he Amey zin. Tehuza sikandin wey medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan!

Ebpekeuma si Jesu Kristu he ziyà egkeahà te menge g̵apun. Egkeahà sikandin te tivuuk he menusiyà ragkes is menge etew he mibpilak kandin dengan. Ne is langun he kelasi te menusiyà dini te kelibutan, ebpekesineg̵ew zan tenged kandin su egkehandek dan te silut. Metuman heini is langun.
