Is Nengazen tew he Megbevayà he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he zaan en te wazè pa limbag̵a is minsan hengkey, iyan ded sikandin guntaan wey minsan keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan. Ke sikandin te, “Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kes puunà wey egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey.”

Iyan a si Juan is sevaha he suled niw tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesus. Iring keniyu nekeantus a zaan te menge kemeresayan su sakup a zaan te g̵inhedian din. Tenged te ingkepauk te gubirnu is kebpenudtul ku te Lalag te Megbevayà wey is kebpenurù ku te impesavut ni Jesus, impesivey a ne ziyà a ibpeubpà te sengepupulu he egngezanan te Patmus.

Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Duminggu, utew mezesen is ked-uwita kedì te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin ne zuen impeehè din kedì. Diyà te egkeiniyug̵an ku nezineg ku is egkag̵i he iring te vudyung su utew mezag̵ing,

ne ke sikandin te, “Is egkeehè nu, isurat nu ne ibpeuwit nu ziyà te pitu he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te menge inged he Ipisu, Ismirna, Pirgemu, Tiyetira, Sardis, Piledilpya, wey ziyà daan te inged he Leudisiya.”
Ne midlilingey ku wey ku maahà ke hentei is egkag̵i ne neehè ku is pitu he sulù he vulawan.
Ne ziyà te teliwazà dutun te menge sulù, duen neehè ku he henduen be te etew. Melug̵ayad is kumbalè din ne mibevanda te vulawan.
Is ulu zin wey vulvul zin, ne utew meputì su iring te manggad he meputì. Is mata zin, ne henduen be te egkeregreg.
Ne is menge paa zin, ne henduen be te g̵alang he midlangga he midlimbasan. Ne is lag̵eng din, ne henduen be te zeg̵urus te utew mezakel he menge wahig.

Ne ziyà te kewanan din migewezan din is pitu he vituen. Ne edlepew ziyà te vèbè din is sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meg̵arang. Ne is buked din, henduen te edsig̵a he andew he utew merayag.

Ne hein neehè ku sikandin, nekelangkeb a ziyà te etuvangan din ne henduen a te minatey. Ne indampè din kediey is kewanan he palad din ne ke sikandin te, “Kenè ka mahandek su iyan a sikan is puunà wey kes egkepengkusan te langun.
Iyan a kes Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Mibpehimatey a ne g̵untaan kenà ad maan ebpatey te minsan keenu. Iyan a ebayàbayà te menge minatey, ne zuen ku zaan keg̵ehem diyà te Iveyaan.
Isurat nu is ibpeehè ku kenikew, is egkeehè nu he egkeulaula g̵untaan wey is egkeulaula pa keuzemà.

Ibpesavut ku kenikew is in-eles dengan he kehulug̵an kayi te pitu he vituen he neehè nu he egewezan ku te kewanan he velad ku wey is kehulug̵an kayi te pitu he sulù he vulawan. Is pitu he vituen, iyan alung te pitu he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey te pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu. Ne heini is pitu he sulù, ne iyan sikan is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu.”

Ne impelaus din is lalag din te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Ipisu, ne isurat nu is menge lalag ku ziyà, ke sikew te, ‘Siak si Jesus is egawed te pitu he vituen diyà te kewanan ku he velad ne iyan a zaan edhipanew kayi te teliwazà te pitu he sulù.

Netuenan ku is langun he menge ulaula niw; netuenan ku he edhag̵ù kew ne meinentusen kew te kemereg̵enan tenged te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku zaan he kenè niw idtug̵ut he zuen menge lalung he etew he menge zuma niw, su sikan is menge etew he migkag̵i he menge epustul sikandan ni Jesus, migezaman niw ne zutun netuenan niw he kenà tutuu he menge epustul sikandan.
Netuenan ku he ed-antus kew te mereg̵en tenged te kedtuu niw kediey ne minsan pa zutun kenè niw ed-isipen he ed-engkezan niw is kedtumana niw te menge sug̵ù ku.
Iyan, duen netuenan ku he ulaula niw he kenà meupiya su hein aney kew meketuu, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey, ne g̵untaan malù en edeisek is gehinawa niw kediey.

Tentenuzi niw sikan is kedekelaa niw zengan kediey ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw; iniyug̵i niw is mezaat he ulaula ne ul-ulaha niw is meupiya he mid-ulaula niw zengan su emun kenà, ebeyaan ku sikiyu. Ne id-awè ku is sulù niw ziyà te selevukè din emun kenè niw edlikuan is daan he ulaula niw.
Duen daan egkesuatan ku he ulaula niw su igkepauk niw is menge mezaat he ulaula te menge Nikuleyta he igkepauk ku zaan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu!
Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edtug̵utan ku he mekekaan sikandin te veg̵as te kayu he iyan puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan he ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà.’ ”

Ne ke sikandin maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Ismirna, ke sikew te, ‘Iyan heini menge lalag ku te puunà te langun ne egkepengkusan daan te langun. Minatey a ne nevanhew.

Netuenan ku is kegkeantus niw te kemeresayan; netuenan ku he egkengeayuayu kew. Ne minsan pa zutun sepian kew utew pinaag̵i te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku he kenà benar is id-ituk keniyu te menge etew he egkag̵i he menge Hudiyu zan, iyan, kenà sikandan tutuu he Hudiyu su mibpekid-upakat dan ki Setanas.

Kenè kew mahandek te meg̵aan niw en igkerasey. Si Setanas, meg̵aan din en ibpepirisu is duma keniyu su ebpenulayen kew zin. Ne seled te sepulù he andew ebpekeantus kew te kemereg̵enan. Mebmetinumanen kew te menge sug̵ù ku taman te kemetayen su ebeg̵ayan ku sikiyu te kuruna he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.
Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, kenè en egkeragkes te silut he iyan is ikezuwa he kemetayen.’ ”

Ne ke sikandin maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Pirgemu, ke sikew te, ‘Siak si Jesus is egkag̵i; iyan a sikan is duen din sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he meg̵arang utew.

Netuenan ku he sakup ni Setanas is inged niw. Ne minsan pa zutun midhemenan niw is kedtuu niw kedì ne wazè niw engkezi is menge penurù ku minsan dutun te kedhimetayi ki Entipas dengan. Metinumanen sikandin he ebpenudtul te menge lalag ku, ne midhimetayan sikandin diyan te inged niw he nesakup ni Setanas.

Duen nepipira he menge ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan, su zuen duma keniyu he edsunuzen dan is impenurù dengan ni Belaam. Su si Belaam, impenurù din dengan ki Balak is paag̵i wey mepenulayi is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Iyan is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te kenà tutuu he megbevayà wey is kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa.
Ne zuen daan duma keniyu he edtuuwan dan is menge penurù te menge etew he Nikuleyta.
Iniyug̵i niw heini is mezaat he ulaula su emun kenà, meg̵aan ku en sikiyu ebeyai ne edtebeken ku heini is menge etew. Iyan gumaan ku heini is sundang dini te vèbè ku
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.

Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ebeg̵ayan ku sikandin te in-eles ku pa he egkeenen he mana he ziyà ebpuun te langit. Ne ibeg̵ey ku zaan kandin is meputì he vatu he insurat dutun is beg̵u en he ngazan. Iyan dà egkesayud te ngazan dutun is ebeg̵ayan.’ ”

Ne ke sikandin maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Tiyetira. Ke sikew te, ‘Siak is egkag̵i, ne Anak a te Megbevayà; is menge mata ku, ne henduen be te egkeregreg, ne is menge paa ku, ne henduen be te g̵alang he midlimbasan.

Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey. Mezesen is kedtuu niw. Metinumanen kew te menge sug̵ù ku wey meinentusen kew te mereg̵en. Netuenan ku zaan he edhuna he mezakel is menge ulaula niw he meupiya g̵untaan kenà te mid-ulaula niw he meupiya zengan te aney kew en meketuu.

Ne minsan pa zutun, duen ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan su sikan is bahi he si Hisibil he egkeg̵iyen din he ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà, idtug̵ut niw he ibpenurù din is mezaat he ulaula ziyà te menge sulug̵uen ku. Egkag̵i sikandin he kenà supak te Megbevayà is kedhilavet te kenè niw esawa wey is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te menge kenà tutuu he megbevayà.
Neug̵et en is ked-entusa ku kandin wey zin meiniyug̵i is ulaula zin he mezaat, iyan, kenè din ed-iniyug̵an.

Ne g̵untaan, ibpehizeg̵è ku su ebpigedahan ku sikandin te zaru. Ne sikiyu is edtampu kandin te memahawag he vaal, ebpigedahan ku zaan sikiyu te kemeresayan he utew mepait emun kenè niw ed-iniyug̵an haazà is menge ulaula zutun te vahi.

Ne is menge sumusundan din, edhimetayan ku. Is menge tumutuu ziyan te langun he menge inged, egketuenan dan he iyan a nesayud ke hengkey is diyà te isip wey g̵ehinawa te etew. Ibeg̵ey ku ziyà te kada sevaha is engayan he igkeveg̵ey kandin sumalà te menge ulaula zin.

Ne sikiyu is duma ziyan te Tiyetira he wazà mekezawat te penurù dutun te vahi, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, wazè niw zewata is egngezanan te menge mezalem he penurù ni Setanas, wazè en duma pa he ebpeveelan ku keniyu.
Iyan dà is: hemeni niw is netuenan niw en taman te ebpekeuma a.

Sikiyu is ebpekezaag ki Setanas wey edtuman te egkesuatan ku taman te kemetayen, is keg̵ehem he insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà, idsarig ku zaan keniyu. Ebpeveyveyaan ku keniyu is langun he menge inged diyan te kelibutan. Utew mezesen is ked-uwita niw kandan; egkengezaag niw is menge inged ne wazà ebpekesukul keniyu.
Ibeg̵ey ku zaan keniyu is mekevugwas.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.’ ”

Ne ke sikandin maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Sardis. Ke sikew te, ‘Iyan a si Jesu Kristu is egkag̵i; iyan a ebayàbayà te Wagas he Mulin-ulin he pitu is gehem din. Ne iyan a zaan egawed te pitu he vituen. Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw. Mezakel is egkag̵i he zuen niw en untung he wazà pidtemanan, iyan, kenè kew en edsunud kediey.
Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, lig-eni niw is egkesamà he zesen te kedtuu niw su henduen be te egkeawè en. Netuenan ku he utew zekelà is kurang niw su is menge ulaula niw, kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Kenè niw lipati is impenurù keniyu he midawat niw zengan, kekenà, hemeni niw ne ewaa niw ziyà te g̵ehinawa niw is kenè niw kedtuu. Su emun kenè niw ed-iniyug̵an is menge ulaula niw he mezaat, ebeyaan ku sikiyu zutun te timpu he kenà a keniyu ebpeebuten su iring te tekawen is kebpekeuma ku.
Deisey kew zà diyan te Sardis is wazà mevuringi is bisti zin,

Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edsun-uzan sikandin te meputì ne kenè ku ebpenasen is ngazan din diyà te libru he zutun isurat is menge ngazan te ebeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne ziyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he Megbevayà wey is menge velinsug̵uen din, ed-engkenen ku sikandin he g̵aked ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu ku!’ ”

Ne ke sikandin en maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyan te inged he Piledilpya. Ne ke sikew te, ‘Siak si Jesus is egkag̵i; iyan a sikan is egkeserig̵an he mibpilì te Megbevayà. Imbeg̵ey kedì is keg̵ehem te kedhadì te g̵inhedian ku iring te kedhadì dengan ni Hadì David. Ne emun duen ebpuwasan ku

Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw. Ne minsan pa te pirapira kew zà he leg̵as, metinumanen kew te menge lalag ku ne wazè niw engkezi is kedtuu niw kediey. Umba, is gemawan he ibayè niw, mibpuwasan ku en ne kenè en egkelekevan te minsan hentei,

Ne haazà is menge etew he egkag̵i he menge Hudiyu sikandan, tarù is egkeg̵iyen dan su menge sakup sikandan ni Setanas. Edhimuwen ku he mekeluhud sikandan diyan te etuvangan niw. Ne zutun egketuenan dan he iyan kew mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku.
Ne tenged te metinumanen kew te sug̵ù ku he med-antus kew, ebentayan ku sikiyu wey kew kenè en ebpekesag̵ad te limas he egkeantus te tivuuk he menusiyà he ibpenggezam kandan.
Meg̵aan e en ebpekeuma. Hemeni niw is tutuu he tuluuwen he netuenan niw su wey kenà igkeveg̵ey ziyà te zuma is suhul he ibeg̵ey keniyu ke ebpekezaag kew ki Setanas.

Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edhimuwen ku sikandin he metahud su edhimuwen ku sikandin he iring te tukud diyà te valey ziyà te langit he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayè ku ne kenà haazà is tukud igkeawà dutun. Ne idsurat ku ziyà te kandin is ngazan te Megbevayè ku wey is ngazan te inged te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is inged he veg̵u he Hiruselim he ebpenaug he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit wey elin daan idsurat ku ziyà te kandin is beg̵u he ngazan ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.’ ”

Ne ke sikandin maan te, “Pesurati nu is belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya, ne ke sikew te, ‘Siak si Jesus is egkag̵i; migeraran a te Metinumanen wey Egkeserig̵an su venar is egkeg̵iyen ku. Pinaag̵i kedì midlimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey.
Nesayud a te langun he menge ulaula niw. Kenè kew meinit ne kenè kew zaan meg̵enew,
Angin pezem ke meinit kew ne emun kenà, ne meg̵enew kew, iyan, geina te meg̵elimendew kew zà, idrepu ku sikiyu.

Egkag̵i kew te, “Sepian kiw ne meupiya is kebpekesavuk tew ne wazè tew en kurang te minsan hengkey.” Ne minsan pa zutun, wazè niw metueni he mekehizuhizu kew utew su egkengeayuayu kew te kedtuu; nengelakap is isip niw wey nengelevasan kew su wazè niw menge metazeng he ulaula.
Umba, edsembag̵an ku sikiyu he pemesaha niw zini te kediey is wag̵as he vulawan he migezaman diyà te hapuy,
Is langun he menge etew he mahal zini te g̵ehinawa ku, edsewayan ku wey edsilutan ku su wey mepenurù sikandan. Ne tenged dutun purungi niw is ulaula niw wey iniyug̵i niw is ulaula niw he mezaat.
Pemineg kew su zini ad te g̵emawan niw is ebpenelehuzan. Ke zuen etew he ebpekezineg kediey ne ebpuwasan e zin, edseled a ne egkaan a zuma kandin, ne egkaan daan sikandin duma kediey.
Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ibeg̵ey ku kandin is ketenged te kebpinuu he zurug kedì diyà te pinuuwè ku te kedhadì iring te nekezaag a zaan ki Setanas ne mibpinuu a he zurug te Amey ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeg̵iyen te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyan te menge tumutuu,’ ” ke sikandin.

Ne zutun selakew en maan is impaahà kediey te Nengazen. Neehè ku is gemawan diyà te langit he nepuwasan. Ne zuen dutun egkag̵i ziyà te kediey ne haazà is egkag̵i ne iyan ded sikan is nezineg ku hein aney he henduen is kezag̵ing din te vudyung he edag̵ing. Ne ke sikandin te, “Hendini ka te zivavew ne ibpeehè ku kenikew is kinahanglan he egkeulaula keuzemà.”
Ne zutun impehendiyà a te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. Ne hein diyè e en te langit, neehè ku is pinuuwà te edhadì ne zuen ebpimpinuu zutun.
Ed-ilak-ilak is paras din ne henduen be te menge mahal he vatu he haspi wey kurnalina. Ne mid-elingkus dutun te pinuuwà is belugtu he meilem he utew merayag su iring te mahal he vatu he ismiralda.

Ne zuen daan dutun keluwaan wey heepat he pinuuwà he nekeelingkus dutun te pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne zutun ebpememinuu is keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeg̵urangen. Meputì is bisti zan ne zuen insuup diyà te ulu zan he menge kuruna he vulawan.

Ne haazà is pinuuwà te edhadì, egkeserasab is kilat dutun ne henduen te edsendag̵en is beransì. Ne ziyà te etuvangan dutun te pinuuwà is pitu he sulù he meregreg he iyan sikan is pitu he g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he edsug̵uen te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun daan te etuvangan te pinuuwà neehè ku is henduen be te meluag he zag̵at he iring te ispihu su utew metingew.
Ne ziyà te teliwazà, iyan, ebpekeelingkus daan dutun te pinuuwà, duen heepat he linimbag he kedesenan he neeneb te mata is menge lawa zan diyà te egkesineruwan wey egkeiniyug̵an.
Is sevaha zutun te linimbag, ne iring te erimaung; is ikezuwa ne iring te vaka; is iketelu ne iring te etew is paras din; ne is ikeepat, ne iring te vanug he edlayang.

Ne heini is heepat he linimbag, heenem is pakpak te uman sevaha kandan. Neeneb te mata is lawa zan wey is diyà te zizalem te pakpak dan. Ne te maandew wey mezukilem, iyan dà baal zan is kenè en egkepangkus he kegkanta. Ke sikandan te,
“Wag̵as, wag̵as, wag̵as is Megbevayà.
Nengazen sikandin he ebpekehimu te minsan hengkey.
Iyan sikandin sikan is Megbevayà he zengan, guntaan, wey keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne haazà is heepat he linimbag, emun ebentug̵en dan wey edtehuzen dan wey ebpeselematan dan is wazà pidtemanan he Megbevayà he ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwà te edhadì, edlangkeb sikan is

keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeg̵urangen diyà te etuvangan din ne ed-ezapen dan is wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Ne haazà is menge kuruna zan, idsavuk dan dutun te etuvangan te pinuuwà su ibeg̵ey zan diyà te Megbevayà. Ne zutun te kedsevuka zan dutun, edhabet dan egkag̵i te,
“He Nengazen dey he Megbevayà, dait ka he edelig̵en, dait ka he edtehuzen.
Mekeg̵eg̵ehem ka su nenlimbag ka te minsan hengkey.
Nesuat ka he edlimbag ne pinaag̵i kayi nehimu is langun.”

Ne haazà is ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì, neehè ku he egewezan din diyà te kewanan he velad din is midlulun he velesahan. Midsuratan is pesiziveluyà dutun te velesahan ne zuen pitu he tiyap he impezeket dutun su wey kenà meebriyi.

Ne zutun neehè ku is utew mezesen he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà ne mibensag sikandin he egkag̵i te, “Hentei is dait he ed-abri kayi te velesahan? Hentei is dait he id-awè din heini is menge tiyap su wey mevasa heini?”
Ne wazà naahà diyà te langit, dini te tanà, wey ziyà te zizalem te tanà he zait he ed-abri zutun te velesahan wey ebasa zutun.
Umba mibmesakit is gehinawa ku ne midsineg̵ew a su wazà naahà he zait he ed-abri wey ebasa zutun te velesahan.

Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan a te sevaha zutun te menge meg̵urang. Ke sikandin te, “Kenè ka sineg̵ew su si Jesus, sikan is migeraran he erimaung he kevuwazan ni Huda wey kevuwazan ni Hadì David, iyan sikandin nekezaag ki Setanas, umba zuen din ketenged te ked-abri te velesahan wey te ked-ewaa te pitu he menge tiyap dutun.”

Ne zutun duen neehè ku zutun te teliwazà te pinuuwà te edhadì wey te heepat he menge linimbag he kedesenan wey te menge ebmeg̵urangen. Iyan neehè ku zutun is: duen edhithitindeg he nati he kerehidu ne neehè ku zaan dutun te lawa zin is menge tulak te palì din te kedhimetayi kandin dengan. Pitu is sungey zin wey pitu zaan is mata zin he iyan is pitu he g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin he edsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ibpeeneb din te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Ne haazà is nati he kerehidu, mid-uvey ne migkuwa zin sikan is belesahan he ziyà te kewanan he velad te ebpimpinuu zutun.

Ne hein nekuwa zin en haazà is belesahan, sikan is menge heepat he linimbag wey is menge keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeg̵urangen, midlangkeb dan diyà te etuvangan dutun te nati he kerehidu su ed-ezapen dan. Ne zuen arpa te uman sevaha zutun te menge ebmeg̵urangen ne zuen egewezan dan he menge lediyà he vulawan he nepenù te veyewà he edtutungen su wey zuen mehemut he evel ne iyan kehulug̵an dutun is menge ked-ampù te menge etew he g̵aked te Megbevayà.
Ne egkanta zan te veg̵u en he kentahan, ke sikandan te,
“Dait ka he egkuwa te velesahan wey ed-awà te menge tiyap din su mibpehimatey ka ne imbelukas nu is lengesa nu te menge etew wey maangken sikandan te Megbevayà.
Ebpemuun sikandan diyà te minsan hengkey he kepuun wey kineg̵iyan wey tribu wey g̵inhedian.
Midhimu nu he iyan dan edhedian nu;
ne midhimu nu zaan he menge memumuhat sikandan he iyan kebpemuhat dan is ked-ezapa zan te Megbevayà tew.
Ne ibpahadì nu sikandan diyà te kelibutan.”

Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu a ne nezineg ku is kegkanta te menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà. Utew zan mezakel su edliblibuwen. Ne zutun dan mebpemenhitindeg te nekeelingkus dutun te pinuuwà te edhadì duma sikan is menge linimbag wey menge ebmeg̵urangen.
Ne migkanta zan is langun ne utew mezag̵ing is kegkanta zan. Ke sikandan te,
“Is nati he kerehidu he mibpehimatey,
dait sikandin he edelig̵en su dekelà is gehem din,
dekelà is naazen din,
dekelà is ketau zin,
dekelà is desen din.
Ebentug̵en dey,
edtehuzen dey wey edelig̵en dey sikandin!”

Ne zutun nezineg ku is kegkanta te langun he menge linimbag he ziyà te langit, dini te tanà wey ziyà daan te zizalem te tanà wey ziyà te zag̵at. Ne migkanta is langun he linimbag he ziyà te minsan hendei. Ke sikandan te,
“Is ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì wey is nati he kerehidu,
delig̵a sikandan, tehuza sikandan,
wey ventug̵a sikandan te wazà pidtemanan su iyan dan mekeg̵eg̵ehem!”
Ne zutun midtavak sikan is heepat he linimbag, ke sikandan te, “Metuman heini.” Ne zutun midlangkeb en maan haazà is menge ebmeg̵urangen ne mid-azap dan.

Ne zutun mibantey a ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is egkehuna zutun te pitu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, ne nezineg ku is migkag̵i te sevaha zutun te heepat he linimbag, ke sikandin te, “Na, genat ke en!” Ne iring te beransì is dag̵ing dutun te kegkag̵i zin.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te etuvangan ku is kudà he meputì he midlepew ne is ed-untud dutun, duen egewezan din he panà. Ne mibeg̵ayan sikandin te kuruna he tuus te kebpekezaag din. Ne zutun midhipanew haazà su ebpenulitu te menusiyà.
Ne zutun in-awà te nati he kerehidu is ikezuwa he tiyap dutun te velesahan, ne nezineg ku he migkag̵i haazà is ikezuwa he linimbag, ke sikandin te, “Genat ke en!”

Ne zutun midlepew is sevaha pa he kudà he utew merig̵à. Is ed-untud dutun, intug̵ut kandin he mehimu zin he mekedtetebek is tivuuk he menusiyà su wey mekebpepetayà is menge etew. Ne zuen imbeg̵ey kandin he melayat he sundang.

Ne hein in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is iketelu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, nezineg ku he migkag̵i is iketelu he linimbag, ke sikandin te, “Genat ke en!” Ne neehè ku zutun he midlepew is kudà he meitem ne zuen timbangan he igkulang te ed-untud dutun.

Ne zutun henduen be te zuen migkag̵i ziyà te teliwazà duen te heepat he menge linimbag. Ke sikandin te, “Tetelu zà he salmun te veg̵as he trigu is egkepemasa te inendawen te sengeetew. Ne sengeg̵antang dà wey tetelu he salmun te veg̵as he sibada is egkepemasa te inendawen daan te sengeetew, iyan, kenè nu helina is bali te lana wey vinu.”
Ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu is ikeepat he tiyap dutun te velesahan ne nezineg ku he egkag̵i is ikeepat he linimbag, ke sikandin te, “Genat ke en!”

Ne mid-ehè ku ne midlepew zutun is kudà he meputìputì is kekelawag din. Si Kemetayen is ngazan te ed-untud dutun ne si Impirnu is ngazan dutun te edtinundug kandin. Ne imbeg̵ey kandan te zezuwa is kebayàbayà dutun te ikeepat he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà wey zan mehimetayi pinaag̵i te gira wey vitil wey ebpenhalin he zaru wey ebpemekekaid he menge langgam.

Ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is ikelima en he tiyap dutun te velesahan. Ne neehè ku zutun te zizalem te vangkù he pemuhatà is menge g̵imukud te menge etew he midhimetayan tenged te kedtuu zan te Lalag te Megbevayà wey tenged daan te kedsengyawa zan dutun te lalag.

Ne mibpekezag̵ing dan is edhangyù, ke sikandan te, “Sikew is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen, wag̵as ka wey metinumanen ka! Sengemenu kelug̵ayad is kebpeketag̵ad dey taman te kenè nu pa ebelesan te silut is menge etew ziyà te kelibutan tenged te kedhimetayi zan kenami?”

Ne zutun impemeg̵ey ziyà te uman sevaha kandan is meputì he kumbalà. Ne migkeg̵iyan sikandan te Nengazen he medhimeley zan dè pa taman te egkeamin egkevunù is menge zuma zan daan he sulug̵uen te Megbevayà he edhimetayan daan iring kandan.

Ne neehè ku he id-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu is ikeenem he tiyap dutun te velesahan. Ne zutun midlinug he utew mezesen ne mibmeitem is andew ne henduen be te manggad he saku he meitem utew. Ne mibmerig̵à is bulan he iring te lengesa.
Ne nengeulug dini te tanà is menge vituen he iring te menge mehilew he veg̵as te kayu he igira emun egkesug̵at te keramag ne egkengeulug.
Ne zutun nahanew is langit iring te velesahan he edlulunen ne is uman buntud wey is uman pulu ziyà te zag̵at, naawà dutun te nesevukan dan.

Ne zutun, is minsan hentei he etew, is menge hadì diyà te kelibutan, is menge velentug̵en he etew, is menge egalen te menge sundaru, is menge sepian wey is menge zekelà is keg̵ehem din, wey minsan daan is menge uripen wey kenà uripen, mid-eles dan diyà te menge vudsi wey ziyà te zizalem te menge zekelà he vatu ziyà te menge vuntud.

Ne mibpemengulahì dan diyà te menge vuntud wey menge vatu. Ke sikandan te, “Lilizi key su wey key kenà maahà te ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì he ziyà te langit ne wey key zaan kenà meumahi te pauk te nati he kerehidu.
Su neuma en is timpu te kedsiluti zan kenami te menusiyà ne wazà ebpekesukul kandan.”

Neipus haazà neehè ku is heepat he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà. Ebpemenhitindeg is kada sevaha kandan diyà te heepat he pesag̵ì te kelibutan ne ed-elangan dan is heepat he keramag diyà te kelibutan su wey kenà mekeremag̵i is tanà wey is dag̵at wey is menge kayu.

Ne zutun neehè ku zaan is sevaha pa he velinsug̵uen he ziyà ebpuun te zapit te edsilaan ne igkulang din is tiyap te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Ne haazà is heepat he velinsug̵uen he insarig kandan is kedèdeeti te tanà wey zag̵at, migkeg̵iyan din sikandan.
Mezag̵ing is kegkag̵i zin te, “Kenè niw pa pendèdeeti is tanà wey zag̵at wey menge kayu taman te kenè dey pa egkesevukan te tiyap is menge vuked te menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayè tew.”

Ne nezineg ku zutun is kezakel te menge etew he edsevukan te tiyap, ne nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu sikandan langun. Ne ebpemuun sikandan diyà te sepulù wey zezuwa he kepuun te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Huda, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu sikandan is midtiyapan.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Rubin, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Gad, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Asir, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Neptali, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Menasis, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Simeon, ne sepulù daan wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Levi, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu zaan.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Isekar, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Sebulun, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Jose, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Benjamin, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu is midtiyapan daan.

Ne neipus haazà ne neehè ku is utew medmezakel he menge etew he kenè en egkevilang tuus te utew mezakel. Diyè dan ebpuun te minsan hendei he g̵inhedian wey tribu wey kepuun wey minsan hengkey he kineg̵iyan. Diyè dan ebpemenhitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà wey ziyà te etuvangan te nati he kerehidu. Midsun-uzan sikandan te meputì ne ebpemengulangkulang dan te zehunen he menge subpang.
Mibpekezag̵ing dan is egkag̵i te, “Delig̵a is Megbevayè tew he mibpinuu ziyà te pinuuwè din te kedhadì wey zelig̵a zaan is nati he kerehidu su nelibri kiw zan te silut!”

Ne zutun daan ebpemenhithitindeg is langun he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà. Neelingkusan dan haazà is pinuuwà te edhadì wey te menge ebmeg̵urangen wey te heepat he linimbag. Ne heini is menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà, midlangkeb dan dutun te etuvangan te pinuuwà te edhadì su ed-ezapen dan is Megbevayà.

Ne migkag̵i zan te, “Benar iyan su zait is Megbevayè tew he edelig̵en wey ebentug̵en wey edtehuzen wey ebpeselematan su iyan dà sikandin lavew he metau, iyan sikandin mekeg̵eg̵ehem wey mezesen; delig̵a sikandin te wazà pidtemanan!”
Ne zutun migkeg̵iyan a te sevaha zutun te menge ebmeg̵urangen, ke sikandin te, “Hentei heini is mibpenun-uzan te meputì wey hendei zan ebpememuun?”

Ne midtavak a te, “Iyan ka nesayud.” Ne ke sikandin te, “Heini is menge etew, ebpemekeuma sikandan he ebpuun dutun te zekelà he kemeresayan diyà te lumpad te kelibutan. Mibpemìpian dan is menge bisti zan diyà te lengesa te nati he kerehidu wey zan mehimu he meputì,

Umba, diyè dan edhitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà. Andew wey mezukilem ne ziyè dan te simbahan te Megbevayà ne edtumanen dan dutun is egkesuatan din. Ne is Megbevayà he ziyà ebpimpinuu te pinuuwè din te kedhadì, iyan edlingahaan dan.
Kenè dan en egkengevitil; ne kenè dan en egkengemezahan; kenè dan en daan egkengetutung te andew wey minsan hengkey he utew meinit.

Su is nati he kerehidu he ziyà te teliwazà te pinuuwà te edhadì, iyan sikandin ed-elima kandan. Ibpeturedu zin kandan is ebpuunan te menge wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne is Megbevayà, id-awè din en is keseengan kayi te menge etew,” ke sikandin.
Ne hein in-awà te nati he kerehidu kes ikepitu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, naawà is egkengezineg diyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit seled te liwazà te uras.
Ne zutun neehè ku sikan is pitu he menge velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebpemenhitindeg diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, ne mibeg̵ayan is kada sevaha kandan te vudyung.

Ne zuen pa zutun selakew he velinsug̵uen he zuen din bulawan he lediyà ne mid-uvey ne midhitindeg dutun te uvey te vangkù he pemuhatà. Dekelà is mehemut he veyewà he imbeg̵ey kandin dutun wey zin ikeamut dutun te menge ampù te menge tumutuu ziyà te vulawan he pemuhatà.

Ne is evel zutun te veyewà he midtutung he in-amut te menge ampù te menge tumutuu, midhendiyà te zivavew he ebpuun dutun te lediyà he egewezan te velinsug̵uen he ebpemenhitindeg diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun, sikan is belinsug̵uen, mibpenù din is lediyè din te menge vag̵a he ebpuun dutun te pemuhatà ne intimbag din haazà is lediyà diyà te tanà puun dutun te langit. Ne zutun mibpemeransì, ne zuen utew memezag̵ing, ne egkeserasab is kilat, ne midlinug.
Ne zutun mid-andam haazà is pitu he menge velinsug̵uen su edhiyupen dan en is menge vudyung dan.

Ne is egkehuna zutun te menge velinsug̵uen, midhiyup din is budyung din. Ne zutun, giyew wey hapuy he nesahug te lengesa is nengeulug diyà te tanà. Ne netutung dutun is iketelu he vahin te kelibutan. Netutung is iketelu he vahin te menge kayu wey naamin metutung is menge sagbet.
Ne zutun, midhiyup te ikezuwa he velinsug̵uen haazà is kandin he vudyung, ne zuen intimbag diyà te zag̵at he henduen be te zekelà he vuntud he neregreg.

Ne mibaluy he lengesa is iketelu he vahin te zag̵at. Ne neg̵erà is iketelu he vahin te minsan hengkey he linimbag he egeg̵ehinawa ziyà te zag̵at. Ne nahanew zaan is iketelu he vahin te langun he menge ed-untuzan diyà te zag̵at.

Ne zutun midhiyup te iketelu he velinsug̵uen is kandin he vudyung ne ebpuun te langit neulug is dekelà he vituen he egkeregreg he iring te sulù ne ziyà meketanà haazà te iketelu he vahin te menge wahig wey ziyà te iketelu he vahin te menge kalut.
Is ngazan dutun te vituen ne Mepait. Ne mibmepait is iketelu he vahin te menge wahig diyà te kelibutan. Ne mibpatey is mezakel he menge etew tenged dutun te wahig su mibmepait utew.

Ne zutun midhiyup te ikeepat he velinsug̵uen is budyung din. Ne nesug̵at is iketelu he vahin te andew, wey is iketelu he vahin te vulan, wey is iketelu he vahin te menge vituen. Ne tenged kayi naawà is kerayag te iketelu he vahin te menge vituen. Ne seled te iketelu he vahin te timpu te kada andew, mibmerusirem utew. Ne iring din ded daan seled te iketelu he vahin te timpu te kada kezukileman.

Ne zutun te kemulu ku pa kebantey nezineg ku is egkeg̵iyen te vanug he edlayang he utew mibpeketikang diyà te udtuwan. Ne ketetelu sikandin megkag̵i te mezag̵ing he lalag, ke sikandin te, “Kehizu utew te menge meg̵inged diyà te kelibutan.” Ne mid-uman sikandin megkag̵i te, “Utew mekehandekhandek is egkeulaula su meg̵aan en edhiyupa te tetelu pa he velinsug̵uen is menge vudyung dan!”
Ne midhiyup dutun te ikelima he velinsug̵uen is budyung din ne zutun neehè ku is bituen,

Ne mibpuwasan din haazà is bitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem ne zutun midlepew is evel he iring te evel te utew zekelà he selsalan ne mibmerusirem is tanà wey neelangan is kedsilà te andew tenged te evel he zutun ebpuun te vitu.
Ne zutun te evel nenlepew is menge terapan ne midlatun dan diyà te tanà. Ne imbeg̵ey kandan is bisa te kegkag̵at dan he iring te visa te kegkag̵at te venayew.
Intelaan kandan he kenè dan dèdeeti is sagbet wey is minsan hengkey he edtuvù wey is menge kayu, kekenà, iyan dan dà edèdeetan is menge etew he wazà metiyapi is buked dan te tiyap te Megbevayà.
Intug̵ut kandan is kedresaya zan te menge etew seled te lelima he vulan, iyan, wazà itug̵ut kandan is kedhimatey. Is kedresaya zan te menge etew, ne iring te kesakit te egkeg̵aten te venayew.
Ne zutun he timpu egkesuat is menge etew he mebpatey sikandan, iyan, kenà egkehimu. Utew zekelà is gustu zan he mebpatey, iyan, dutun, kenè dan en ebpatey.
Is menge terapan, henduen te menge kudà he ed-untuzan te ebpekidtebek. Ne zutun te menge ulu zan duen henduen be te menge kalù he vulawan. Ne iring te vuked te etew is buked dan.
Ne is bulvul zan, ne henduen be te vulvul te vahi. Ne is menge ngipen dan, ne henduen be te ngipen te erimaung.

Duen menge hun-ap dan he iring te limbutung he putew. Ne is dag̵ing te pakpak dan emun edlayang dan, ne henduen be te zag̵ing te mezakel he menge kelisa he eguyuzen te kudà he ebpelumpat emun ebpehendiyà te edtebekan.
Is ikug dan, ne iring te ikug te venayew su edhereg ne pinaag̵i te ikug dan egkerasey zan is menge etew te seled te lelima he vulan.

Duen hadì he ebayàbayà kandan, iyan sikan is belinsug̵uen he mibpuwas duen te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din. Ne ziyà te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen iyan ngazan din si Ebedun, ne ziyà te Gerisyahanen, si Epeliyun,
Ne neipus haazà is nehuna he nehitavù he mekehandekhandek; dezuwa pa zutun is wazè pa mehitavù.
Ne zutun midhiyup te ikeenem he velinsug̵uen is budyung din. Ne nezineg ku is egkag̵i he ziyà ebpuun te heepat he sungey he ziyà te vulawan he pemuhatà he zutun te etuvangan te Megbevayà.
Ke sikandin diyà te ikeenem he velinsug̵uen te, “Ipaawè en is heepat he velinsug̵uen he mibpusasan diyà te zekelà he Wahig he Yupratis!”

Ne zutun impaawè en haazà is heepat he velinsug̵uen. In-andam sikandan he zaan ne impetag̵ad sikandan taman kayi he uras, wey andew, wey vulan, wey tuig. Umba in-andam sikandan su wey zan mehimetayi is iketelu he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Intazem diyà te kediey is kezakel zutun te menge sundaru zan he egkukudà. Menge zezuwa he g̵atus he libu he libu sikandan.

Ne zutun te impaahà kediey, neehè ku is menge sundaru wey menge kudà. Nelimbutungan haazà is egkukudà te merig̵à he iring te hapuy, wey meilem wey mekelawag daan he iring te esupri. Is menge ulu zutun te menge kudè dan, ne iring te ulu te erimaung. Ne is menge vèbè dan, ne edlepawan te hapuy wey evel wey esupri.
Ne pinaag̵i zutun te hapuy, wey evel, wey esupri he edlepew zutun te vèbè te menge kudà, migerè dan is iketelu he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Su zutun te vèbè te menge kudà is gehem dan te kedhimatey wey ziyà daan te menge ikug dan su is menge ikug dan, ne iring te menge uled su zuen ulu zutun, ne ebpekekaid te menge etew haazà is ikug.

Ne is nesamà dutun te menge etew, langun te sikandan he wazà mepatey zutun te ebpemekekaid he menge kudà, wazè dan engkezi is ked-ezapa zan te mibeelan dan he menge ledawan he vulawan, wey selapì wey g̵alang wey vatu wey kayu. Heini is menge ledawan, ne kenà ebpekeahà, kenà ebpekezineg ne kenà daan ebpekehipanew. Wazà daan engkezi zutun te menge etew is ked-ezapa zan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne wazè dan daan iniyug̵i is kebpemumunù, kinaagman, meremerik he ulaula, wey is kebpenakew zan.

Ne zutun neehè ku is sevaha pa he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he velinsug̵uen he ebpenaug he ebpuun te langit. Midtaved diyà te kandin is gapun ne mibpeyungan is ulu zin te velugtu. Iring te kedsig̵a te andew is buked din ne is menge paa zin, ne henduen be te menge tukud he regreg.
Ne ziyà te velad din egewezan din is nevekar en he zeisek he velesahan. Is kewanan he paa zin, ne ziyè din ig̵iek te lawed te zag̵at ne is givang, ne ziyà te tanà.
Ne mibpekezag̵ing sikandin is ed-umew ne is kezag̵ing te egkeg̵iyen din ne henduen te hinig̵er te erimaung. Ne zutun te ked-umew zin, mibales te pitu he veransì he utew mezag̵ing.
Ne zutun te kebales te veransì, idsurat ku pezem is nezineg ku, iyan, nezineg ku is egkag̵i ziyà te langit te, “Ieles nu is ibpesavut kayi te pitu he veransì ne kenè nu isurat.”
Ne zutun, sikan is belinsug̵uen he neehè ku he edhithitindeg he ziyà is sevaha he paa zin te tanà ne is sevaha ziyà te zag̵at, imbayew zin diyà te langit is kewanan he velad din.

Ne impepirmahan din is egkeg̵iyen din te wazà kemetayen he Megbevayà he nenlimbag te langit wey tanà wey zag̵at wey nenlimbag daan te langun he tag̵ù kayi. Ke sikandin te, “Kenè en heini ebpekesendud!

Ne emun edhiyupen dutun te ikepitu he velinsug̵uen is budyung din, ne human dutun ed-ul-ulaha te Megbevayà is tuyù he in-eles din sumalà is migkag̵i zin dengan diyà te menge ebpeneuven din he menge sulug̵uen din.”

Ne zutun mid-uman megkag̵i zini te kediey sikan is nezineg ku he egkag̵i ziyà te langit. Ke sikandin te, “Hendutun ka te velinsug̵uen he ziyà egiek is sevaha he paa zin te tanà ne is sevaha ziyà te zag̵at. Ne kuwaa nu is belesahan he igkulang din he neebriyan en.”

Ne midhendutun a te velinsug̵uen ne mibuyù ku haazà is deisek he velesahan. Ne migkeg̵iyan e zin te, “Kuwaa nu ne keena nu. Meemis utew he iring te teneb diyà te vèbè nu, iyan, emun diyè en te g̵etek nu ne utew mepezes.”
Ne migkuwa ku haazà is deisek he velesahan diyà te velad din, ne migkaan ku ne meemis iyan diyà te vèbè ku su iring te teneb, iyan, hein neeveleng ku, ne mibmepezes utew ziyà te g̵etek ku.

Ne zutun duen migkag̵i zini te kediey, ke sikandin te, “Kinahanglan he iuman nu ipenudtul is ibpepenudtul kenikew te Megbevayà he egkeulaula te mezakel he menge hadì wey menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he g̵inhedian wey minsan hengkey he kineg̵iyan.”

Ne zutun, imbeg̵ey kedì is idsukud he iring te tuked, ne zuen migkag̵i kediey te, “Hendiyè ka ne sukuza nu is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà wey is bangkù he pemuhatà dutun, ne vilanga nu is menge etew he edsimba zutun.

Iyan, is lama he ziyà te g̵awas te valey, kenè nu sukuza su imbeg̵ey haazà diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne edtekutakan dan is inged he Hiruselim he zutun edsimbaha is Megbevayà. Ne seled te kepatan wey zezuwa he vulan is kedtekutaki zan dutun.

Ne edsug̵uen ku zutun is dezuwa he ibpewali ku. Egkukumbalà sikandan te manggad he saku ne ebpenudtulen dan is ibpekag̵i kandan te Megbevayà seled te nengkelibu wey zezuwa he g̵atus wey keneman he andew.”

Ne haazà is dezuwa he etew he menwewali, iyan sikan is netagnà dengan he zezuwa he etew he iring te zezuwa he kayu he ulivu wey zezuwa he sulù he ziyà mekesavuk te etuvangan te Nengazen he ebayàbayà te tivuuk he kelibutan.

Ne heini is dezuwa, ke zuen ebpesipala kandan, diyà te vèbè dan edlepew is hapuy ne egkeamin egketutung is menge kuntada zan. Ne pinaag̵i kayi edhimetayan dan is minsan hentei he egezam kandan ebpesipala.

Ebeg̵ayan sikandan te g̵ehem su wey zan kenà ikepevayà is menge g̵apun su wey kenà ebpekeuzan dutun te timpu te kebpenudtula zan te Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne zuen daan gehem dan wey zan mehimu he lengesa is wahig diyà te menge kalut. Ne zuen daan gehem dan wey zan mesiluti is menge etew pinaag̵i te minsan hengkey he vangkit te minsan keenu he timpu he egkesuatan dan.

Ne heini is dezuwa he menwewali, emun egketapus dan is kebpenudtula zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edtebeken sikandan te langgam he ziyà ebpuun te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din. Ne egkezaag sikandan dutun te langgam, ne edhimetayan din sikandan.
Ne ziyà ibperey-as haazà is lawa zan te kersada ziyà te zekelà he inged he zutun iransang te krus is Nengazen dan. Ne zuen insempità he menge ngazan dutun te inged, ne iyan is Suduma wey Ihiptu.

Is langun he kelasi te menge etew te minsan hengkey he kineg̵iyan wey kepuun wey g̵inhedian, ne ed-ehaan dan is menge lawa zutun te zezuwa seled te tetelu wey liwazà he andew ne kenè dan idtug̵ut he ikeleveng haazà is dezuwa.

Utew igkelipey te menge etew is kedhimetayi zutun ne edsilibrahan dan ne ebpevegbeg̵ayà is kada sevaha kandan te menge g̵asa. Umba edsilibrahan dan su haazà is dezuwa he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, mibeelan dan is ingkengerasey te menge etew ziyà te kelibutan.

Ne zutun hein neipus haazà is tetelu wey liwazà he andew, haazà is dezuwa he menwewali, mibeg̵ayan sikandan te Megbevayà te g̵ehinawa ne nevanhew ne midhitindeg dan. Ne utew nengehandek is langun he nekeahà dutun.

Ne zutun nezineg dutun te zezuwa he menwewali is mezag̵ing he egkag̵i ziyà te langit he edhenduen te, “Hendini kew en te langit.” Ne zutun mibatun sikandan pehendiyà te langit he nevukusan sikandan te g̵apun. Ne nengeahà haazà te menge kuntada zan dutun.

Ne segugunà midlinug te utew mezesen. Ne nengerundus is ikesepulù he vahin te menge valey zutun te inged. Ne neg̵erà zutun te linug is pitu he libu he menge etew. Ne utew nengehandek dutun is menge etew he naawas dutun te linug ne midalig dan is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Ne zutun neipus haazà is ikezuwa he mekehandekhandek he hitavù, iyan, meg̵aan ebpekesunud dutun is iketelu.

Ne zutun midhiyup te ikepitu he velinsug̵uen is budyung din ne ziyà te langit nezineg is memezag̵ing he lag̵eng he edhenduen te, “Is kedhedii te tivuuk he menusiyà, ne ziyè en guntaan te Nengazen tew wey ziyà te hadì he mibpilì din. Ne heini he hadì, ebpekehadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.”
Ne zutun, haazà is keluwaan wey heepat he menge ebmeg̵urangen he ebpimpinuu zutun te etuvangan te Megbevayà, mibpemenlangkeb sikandan ne mid-azap dan is Megbevayà,
ne ke sikandan te,
“Sikew is Megbevayè dey wey Nengazen dey,
iyan ka ebayàbayà te langun.
Megbevayè ka zengan wey g̵untaan.
Ebpeselematan dey sikew su migamit nu is dekelà he g̵ehem nu ne g̵untaan mibpuunan nu en is kedhadì nu ziyà te kelibutan.
Utew nengepauk kenikew is menge kuntada nu,
iyan, netuman en is andew te kedsiluti nu kandan
wey is andew te kedsusiya nu te nengeulaula te nemematey en.
Iyan en heini timpu te kedsuhuli nu te menge sulug̵uen nu he menge ebpeneuven wey kedsuhuli nu zaan te langun he menge g̵aked nu he etew,
se zekelà is pid-etawan din,
se zeisek is pid-etawan din,
is langun he edtahud kenikew.
Iyan heini zaan timpu te kedèdeeti nu te langun he menge etew he midezaat te kelibutan!”

Ne ziyà te langit mibpuwasan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne naahà dutun te seled is kavan he midteg̵uan duen te insurat he menge pesarig te Megbevayà. Ne zutun neserasab is kilat, ne zuen utew memezag̵ing, ne mibpemeransì, ne midlinug, ne mibpenggiyew te utew zezekelà.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te langit is kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Neehè ku is bahi he midsun-uzan te andew ne ziyà te zizalem te paa zin is bulan, ne insuup diyà te ulu zin is kuruna he sepulù wey zezuwa he vituen.
Meg̵ingey sikandin ne ed-anak en ne ebpekeerang su ebeliliten.

Ne zutun duen pa impaahà kedì diyà te langit he kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Duen utew zekelà he merig̵à he uled he egngezanan te deragun he iyan si Setanas. Pitu is ulu zin ne sepulù is sungey zin. Ne zuen kuruna ziyà te kada sevaha zutun te pitu he ulu zin.

Ne pinaag̵i te ikug din neg̵uyud din is iketelu he vahin te menge vituen diyà te langit ne nemeketimbag haazà diyà te tanà. Ne zutun edhithitindeg haazà is uled te etuvangan dutun te vahi he ed-anak su emun idlusad en haazà is id-anak din, ne egkeenen dutun te uled.

Ne zutun inlusad is batà he maama. Ne haazà is batà, edhedian din keuzemà is langun he menge g̵inhedian dini te kelibutan ne wazà ebpekesukul kandin dutun te kedhadì din. Ne haazà is batà, midsekelew te Megbevayà ne mibatun din diyà te langit, diyà te pinuuwà te kedhadì din.

Ne haazà is bahi, nekepelag̵uy pehendiyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew, diyà te ed-eputan he mid-andam he zaan te Megbevayà. Ne zutun ed-elimahan te Megbevayà haazà is bahi seled te nengkelibu wey zezuwa he g̵atus wey keneman he andew he repeng te tetelu wey liwazà he tuig.

Ne zutun he timpu zuen gira ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit. Si Miguel, is sevaha he velinsug̵uen te Megbevayà wey is menge sakup din he velinsug̵uen, edtebeken dan sikan is dekelà he uled he egngezanan te deragun. Ne haazà is uled wey is menge velinsug̵uen din, mibpekidtebek dan daan,
iyan, nezaag haazà is uled ne sikandin wey is menge velinsug̵uen din, wazè en tug̵uti te Megbevayà he mekeseled dan pa maan diyà te langit, umba,

midsegseg haazà is dekelà he uled puun te langit. Ne haazà he deragun, iyan si Setanas, sikan is mezaat he mulin-ulin he mid-ekalan din is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne sikandin wey is langun he menge velinsug̵uen din, intimbag sikandan pehendini te tanà.

Ne zutun, nezineg ku is utew mezag̵ing he egkag̵i ziyà te langit he edhenduen te, “Guntaan egketuman en is kedlibriya te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Impeehè en te Megbevayà is keg̵ehem din te kedhadì. Is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, impeehè din en is ketenged din te kedhadì. Su midsegseg en pehendiyà te tanà si Setanas, is edsumbung te menge suled tew. Iyan sikandin midsumbung kandan diyà te Megbevayà tew te maandew wey te mezukilem.

Heini is menge suled tew, nezaag dan en si Setanas tenged te kedtig̵is te lengesa te migeraran he impemuhat he nati he kerehidu, wey tenged te insangyew zan is tutuu he tuluuwen, wey tenged daan te wazè dan iyan menug̵uni is untung dan, kekenà, mibpehimatey zan tenged te kedtuu zan.

Sikiyu is menge meg̵inged diyà te langit, medlipey kew. Iyan, sikiyu is diyan te tanà wey ziyan te zag̵at, kehizu niw! Su kes mezaat he mulin-ulin he si Setanas, mibpenaug en diyan te keniyu. Ne utew sikandin nererengiti su netuenan din he mevavè dà utew is nesamè din he timpu te kedlalunglalung.”
Ne hein netuenan dutun te deragun he zini sikandin itimbag te tanà, midtelukunan din sikan is bahi he iney zuen te vatà he maama.

Ne haazà is bahi, mibeg̵ayan te Megbevayà te zezuwa he pakpak te zekelà he vanug su wey mekelayang wey mekeaput diyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew, ne zutun ed-elimahan sikandin seled te tetelu wey liwazà he tuig ne zutun kenè en egkekeizan dutun te uled.
Ne zutun, haazà is uled, impelepew zin diyà te vèbè din is dekelà he wahig su wey maanud haazà is bahi,
iyan, midtevangan te tanà haazà is bahi ne mibeka is tanà ne nehimu is dekelà he vitu ne zutun mekeahuk haazà is wahig he ebpuun dutun te vèbè te uled he deragun.

Ne zutun utew nepeuki te deragun haazà is bahi, ne mibeyaan din is menge zuma he anak dutun te vahi su edtebeken din sikandan. Iyan sikandan is langun he metinumanen te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà wey metinumanen daan te tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus.
Ne zutun diyà mekehitindeg haazà is deragun te veyvey te zag̵at.

Ne zutun neehè ku is mekehandekhandek he langgam he egaun puun diyà te zag̵at. Sepulù is sungey zin wey pitu is ulu zin. Ne zuen kuruna he insuup diyà te kada sevaha he menge sungey zin, ne ziyà te kada ulu zin ne zuen insurat he ngazan he idsupak din te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is langgam he neehè ku, ne iring te liyupardu; ne is menge paa zin ne iring te paa te biyir, ne is bèbè din ne iring te vèbè te erimaung. Ne is gehem te deragun wey is kebpekehadì din, wey is keg̵ehem din te kebayàbayà, ne imbeg̵ey zin dutun te langgam.

Nepelian is sevaha he ulu zutun te langgam ne henduen be te midhimetayan dengan haazà is ulu, iyan, neulian en haazà is gerabi he palì dutun ne uuyag en maan haazà is ulu. Ne tenged dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà, midsundanan dan haazà is langgam su utew zan ingkeinuinu.

Ne is tivuuk he menusiyà, ed-ezapen dan haazà is deragun tenged te kebeg̵aya zin te keg̵ehem din dutun te langgam he utew mekehandekhandek. Ne mid-azap dan daan haazà is langgam, ne ke sikandan te, “Wazà ebpekelavew te langgam; ne wazà daan ebpekesukul kandin.”

Ne mibpesagdan te Megbevayà haazà is langgam he mekekag̵i sikandin te utew memezaat he ibpegalbu he menge lalag he ebpekesumpalit te Megbevayà. Ne midtug̵utan daan sikandin he mekevayàbayà seled te kepatan wey zezuwa he vulan.
Ne ebpengeg̵iyen din is menge lalag he utew memezaat he idsumpalit din te Megbevayà wey ebpekesupak te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit wey ebpekesupak daan te menge meg̵inged diyà te langit.

Ne midtug̵utan daan haazà is langgam he tebeka zin is menge etew he g̵aked te Megbevayà ne nezaag din dè pa sikandan. Ne imbeg̵ey kandin is kebayàbayà diyà te minsan hengkey he tribu wey minsan hengkey he kepuun, wey menge etew he minsan hengkey is kineg̵iyan dan, wey is minsan hengkey he g̵inhedian.

Ed-ezapen haazà is langgam te langun he menge etew zini te kelibutan he wazà ikesurat is ngazan dan diyà te libru he zutun ilista is menge etew he ebeg̵ayan te untung. Iyan haazà kes libru zuen te nati he kerehidu he zengan dà imbanglis is kebpehimatey zin te wazè pa tukuza is kelibutan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi!
Is menge etew he imbanglis kandan is kebpirisuwa kandan ne siguradu egkepirisu sikandan. Ne is menge etew he imbanglis kandan he g̵umaan is idhimatey kandan, gumaan iyan is idhimatey kandan.
Kinahanglan he sikitew is menge tumutuu te Nengazen, edsarig kiw kandin wey ed-antus kiw te kemereg̵enan.

Ne zutun selakew en maan he langgam is neehè ku. Midlepew haazà he ebpuun diyà te zizalem te tanà. Dezuwa is sungey zin su iring te nati he kerehidu, iyan, emun egkag̵i, ne is kegkag̵i zin ne iring te kegkag̵i zuen te utew zekelà he uled he egngezanan te deragun.

Ne haazà he langgam, iyan kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas ne migamit din is gehem duen te nehuna he langgam he iyan midsug̵ù kandin. Ne mibpeg̵es din is tivuuk he menusiyà he ezapa zan sikan is nehuna he langgam he neulian duen te palì din he hapit din ibpatey.
Utew zekelà is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan dutun te langgam he ikezuwa su minsan hapuy he ebpuun te langit, impepenaug din wey maahà te menge etew.

Ne pinaag̵i te menge egkein-inuwan he intug̵ut kandin he ibpeulaula ziyà te etuvangan dutun te nehuna he langgam, ed-ekalan din is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan. Ne zutun edsug̵uen din is menge etew he veeli zan is ledawan dutun te nehuna he langgam ne ezapa zan. Haazà is nehuna he langgam, midtibas duen te sundang, iyan, wazà mebpatey.

Ne intug̵ut daan he mehimu zutun te ikezuwa he langgam he mekeg̵eg̵ehinawa haazà is ledawan dutun te nehuna he langgam ne tenged dutun ebpekekag̵i haazà is ledawan ne egkepatey zin daan is minsan hentei he kenà ed-azap kandin.
Ne is langun he menge etew, lavew se kenà lavew, sepian se kenà sepian, uripen se kenà uripen, mibpeg̵es din sikandan merkahi ziyà te kewanan he velad dan ne emun kenà ne ziyà te vuked dan.
Ne is minsan hentei he kenà ebpemarka zutun te marka he iyan ngazan dutun te nehuna he langgam wey lumiru te ngazan din, kenè dan ebpekepemasa ne kenè dan daan ebpekepemelegyà.

Iyan dà ebpekesavut dutun is etew he mibeg̵ayan te Megbevayà te ketau. Sikan is uluwanen, egkesavut din is kehulug̵an dutun te lumiru te langgam su lumiru haazà te menusiyà. Ne haazà is lumiru, ne heenem he g̵atus wey keneman wey heenem.

Ne zutun neehè ku is buntud he Siyun ne zutun edhithitindeg sikan is nati he kerehidu ne zuma zin daan dutun is nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu he menge etew. Ne haazà is menge etew, insurat diyà te menge vuked dan is ngazan dutun te nati wey is ngazan daan te Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkag̵i ziyà te langit ne is kegkag̵i zin, henduen be te zeg̵urus te utew mezakel he menge wahig wey iring te utew mezag̵ing he veransì. Haazà is egkag̵i he nezineg ku, ne henduen be zaan te menge zag̵ing te utew mezakel he ebpemen-arpa.

Ne haazà is menge etew, diyè dan te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà wey te etuvangan duen te heepat he menge linimbag he kedesenan wey te menge ebmeg̵urangen. Ne migkanta zan dutun is beg̵u he kentahan. Iyan dà netau zutun he egkanta te kentahan, haazà is nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu he etew he mibelukasan dini te lumpad te kelibutan duen te nati he kerehidu.

Iyan haazà he menge maama he wazè dan mekesalà pinaag̵i te kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa su utew lumpiyu is menge ulaula zan ne wazè dan suwayi sikan is nati he kerehidu te minsan hendei sikandin ebpevayà. Mibelukasan sikandan puun duen te perayan he iyan is tivuuk he menusiyà wey zan mehimu he iyan nepengilizan dutun wey ikeveg̵ey sikandan diyà te Megbevayà wey ziyà te nati he kerehidu.
Ne wazà minsan keenu sikandan mezineg he edtarùtarù ne wazà neveelan dan he minsan hengkey he mezaat.

Ne zutun neehè ku en maan is selakew en maan he velinsug̵uen he edlayang he utew mibpeketikang diyà te udtuwan. Ibpesavut din dutun is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he kenà egkehanew te minsan keenu. Impesavut din haazà te tivuuk he menusiyà, diyà te menge etew te minsan hengkey he kineg̵iyan wey minsan hendei he g̵inhedian, wey tribu, wey kepuun.

Ne mibpekezag̵ing is egkag̵i te, “Tehuza niw is Megbevayà wey ventug̵a sikandin su neuma en is timpu te kedsusi zin te menge ulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà! Ezapa niw is Megbevayà he iyan nenlimbag te langit wey tanà wey zag̵at wey menge puunà te wahig!”

Ne zuen daan ikezuwa he velinsug̵uen he nekesunud dutun te nehuna ne migkag̵i sikandin te, “Na, nezeetan en! Utew nezeeti is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya! Midlangut din te vinu zin is tivuuk he menusiyà,

Ne midlepew is iketelu he velinsug̵uen he midsunud dutun te nehuna he zezuwa ne mibpekezag̵ing is egkag̵i te, “Is minsan hentei he etew he ed-ezapen din haazà is langgam wey ledawan duen te langgam, ne ebpemarka sikandin diyà te vuked din, ne emun kenà, ne ziyà te velad din,
ne ibpeinum kandin is binu te pauk te Megbevayà,

Ne haazà is hapuy he idrasey kandan, ed-evel te wazà pidtemanan ne te maandew wey mezukilem kenà egkeengked is kedresaya kandan su ed-ezapen dan kes langgam wey kes ledawan duen te langgam ne ebpemarka sikandan te tuus duen te ngazan te langgam.”
Ne tenged dutun, sikan is menge etew he neg̵aked te Megbevayà, sikan is ebpememineg te menge sug̵ù te Megbevayà wey edtuman te menge lalag ni Jesus, kinahanglan he med-antus sikandan.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkag̵i ziyà te langit te, “Isurat nu heini: Utew mulà meupiya is egkengeulaula te menge etew he ebpatey ke menge tumutuu sikandan te Nengazen.” “Benar iyan,” egkag̵i is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin. “Utew zan en egkengelipey su wazè en igkehag̵ù dan ne ebpekehimeley sikandan. Ne zutun edsuhulan sikandan tenged te menge meupiya he menge vaal zan.”

Ne zutun neehè ku is gapun he utew meputì, ne zutun te g̵apun duen ebpimpinuu he henduen be te iyan sikan is Kakey te Menusiyà. Duen bulawan he kuruna he insuup diyà te ulu zin ne egawed te g̵arab he utew meg̵arang.

Ne zutun duen selakew he velinsug̵uen he migawas dutun te simbahan diyà te langit. Mibpekezag̵ing sikandin is egkag̵i ziyà te ebpimpinuu ziyà te g̵apun, ke sikandin te, “Gemita nu en is garab nu su iyan en heini timpu te kegarab su is kelibutan, iring te kamet he nelutuan en is pinemula zuen!”
Ne zutun, haazà is ebpimpinuu zutun te g̵apun, migamit din haazà is garab din, ne midrag̵un ziyà te kelibutan.
Ne zutun neehè ku is selakew en maan he velinsug̵uen he migawas dutun te simbahan he ziyà te langit ne zuen daan kandin he egewezan he meg̵arang he g̵arab.

Ne ziyà te pemuhatà he ziyà te simbahan, migawas is selakew pa he velinsug̵uen. Iyan sikandin belinsug̵uen he impevantey te hapuy zutun. Ne mibpekezag̵ing sikandin is egkag̵i ziyà te nesunuzan din he velinsug̵uen he zuen din meg̵arang he g̵arab. Ke sikandin te, “Gemita nu en heeyan is garab nu ne reg̵una nu is menge paras diyà te pemuleey he iyan is kelibutan su nengelutuan en is menge paras dutun.”
Ne zutun migamit haazà is belinsug̵uen te g̵arab din dini te lumpad te kelibutan ne midrag̵un din is menge paras,

Ne migunas haazà is beg̵as te paras dutun te vudsi he g̵awas te inged ne ebpuun dutun te vudsi midtudà is lengesa taman te tetelu he g̵atus wey keluwaan he kilumitru is netudaan ne sengemitrus wey tengà is kezalem din.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te langit is selakew pa he utew zekelà he egkein-inuwan he iyan kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Duen pitu he velinsug̵uen ne is kada sevaha kandan, ne egkulangan te idrasey zin te menusiyà. Ne emun egkeulaula en heini ne egketapus en is idsilut kandan te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan.

Ne neehè ku zutun is henduen be te zag̵at he ispihu he nesahug te hapuy. Ne neehè ku zaan is menge etew he nemekezaag te mekehandekhandek he langgam su wazè dan sikandin ezapa. Wazè dan med-azap dutun te ledawan din ne wazè dan daan mebpemarka te lumiru te ngazan din. Dutun dan ebpemenhithitindeg te uvey te zag̵at he ispihu. Ne zuen egewezan dan he menge arpa he imbeg̵ey kandan te Megbevayà.
Ne egkentahan dan is kentahan duen te sulug̵uen te Megbevayà he si Moises he iyan sikan is kentahan he idalig dutun te nati he kerehidu. Ke sikandan te,
“Sikew is Megbevayà,
mekeg̵eg̵ehem ka he Nengazen te langun.
Utew zekelà wey utew egkein-inuwi is langun he menge vaal nu!
Hadì ka te langun he menge g̵inhedian.
Metazeng wey tutuu is menge ulaula nu!
Ne edtehuzen ka te langun he menge etew
ne ebentug̵en dan is ngazan nu te Nengazen.
Su iyan ke zà wag̵as he Megbevayà.
Edhendiyà te kenikew is langun he menge etew te minsan hendei he g̵inhedian ne ed-ezapen ke zan su nevantug en is menge vaal nu he memetazeng.”
Ne neipus haazà, neehè ku he nepuwasan is simbahan diyà te langit ne ziyà te seled din, neehè ku is rug̵u he zutun is tuus te g̵ehem te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te simbahan migawas sikan is pitu he velinsug̵uen he egkulangan te pitu he menge ibpenrasey te menusiyà. Midsun-uzan sikandan te manggad he utew meputì ne vevakes sikandan te vulawan.
Ne is sevaha zutun te heepat he linimbag he kedesenan, imbeg̵ey zin dutun te pitu he velinsug̵uen is pitu he menge vulawan he lediyà he nepenù te pauk te wazè din pidtemanan he Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nepenù is simbahan te evel he ebpuun te anlag wey g̵ehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun wazà ebpekeseled dutun te simbahan taman te kenè pa egketapus haazà is kepipitu he kedresaya te menusiyà he ibpaag̵i te pitu he velinsug̵uen.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is ebensag diyà te simbahan diyà te langit ne ke sikandin dutun te pitu he menge velinsug̵uen te, “Kuwaa niw en ne iitis niw ziyà te lumpad te kelibutan is tag̵ù keniyan te pitu he lediyà he iyan is pauk te Megbevayà!”

Ne haazà is egkehuna he velinsug̵uen, mid-ulaan din dini te kelibutan is lediyà he ziyà te kandin. Ne zutun, is menge etew he mibpemarka te tuus duen te langgam wey mid-azap dan haazà is ledawan dutun te langgam, midtuvuan sikandan te menge memahù wey utew memesakit he menge vekukang.

Ne haazà is ikezuwa he velinsug̵uen, mid-ulaan din diyà te zag̵at is lediyè he ziyà te kandin ne mibaluy is dag̵at he lengesa he iring te lengesa te etew he minatey. Ne zutun mibpematey is minsan hengkey ziyà te zag̵at he zuen din gehinawa.
Ne haazà is iketelu he velinsug̵uen, is lediyà he ziyà te kandin, mid-ulaan din diyà te menge wahig wey ebpuunan te menge wahig ne mibaluy he lengesa haazà is menge wahig.
Ne nezineg ku zutun is belinsug̵uen he impevantey te menge wahig, ke sikandin te,
“Sikew is wag̵as he Megbevayà he zengan wey g̵untaan,
metazeng heini is kedsiluti nu te menusiyà
su mibpenhimetayan dan is menge tumutuu kenikew wey menge ebpeneuven dengan
ne g̵untaan ibpeinum nu kandan is lengesa
su iyan hustu he ibales nu kandan!”
Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkag̵i ziyà te pemuhatà he edhenduen te,
“Sikew is mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun,
benar iyan he metazeng wey hustu is kedsiluti nu te menusiyà!”
Ne zutun haazà is ikeepat he velinsug̵uen, mid-ulaan din diyà te andew is lediyà he ziyà te kandin. Ne haazà, nehimu is andew he ebpeketutung te menusiyà.

Ne g̵eina te nengetutung is menge etew zutun te utew meinit, midsumpalit dan is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin ebayàbayà dutun te kedresaya kandan, iyan, wazè dan iniyug̵i is memezaat he ulaula zan ne wazè dan daan bentug̵a is Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is ikelima he velinsug̵uen, is lediyà he ziyà te kandin, mid-ulaan din diyà te pinuuwà te kedhadì te mekehandekhandek he langgam. Ne mibmerusirem utew is ginhedian dutun te langgam. Ne tuus te utew merasey is silut te menge etew, egkesepè dan en is dilè dan tenged te utew mesakit.
Ne minsan pa zutun wazè dan iniyug̵i is memezaat he menge ulaula zan, kekenà, midsumpalit dan nasì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit tenged dutun te utew mesakit he menge vekukang.

Ne haazà is ikeenem he velinsug̵uen, mid-ulaan din is lediyà he ziyà te kandin diyà te zekelà he wahig he egngezanan te Yupratis ne nemezahan dutun haazà is wahig su wey maandam is ibayà te menge hadì he ziyà ebpuun te zapit te edsilaan.

Ne neehè ku zutun is tetelu he menge utew memekehandekhandek he mezaat he mulin-ulin he henduen be te vakbak. Midlepew is sevaha he ebpuun duen te vèbà te zekelà he deragun he iyan si Setanas, ne is sevaha, diyà medlepew puun te vèbà duen te langgam, wey is sevaha zuen medlepew te vèbà te ebpeneuven ni Setanas.

Menge mezaat he mulin-ulin haazà he zuen dan gehem te kebaal te egkengein-inuwan. Midsug̵ù sikandan su ibpetig̵um kandan is menge sundaru te langun he menge hadì dini te kelibutan su zutun te egkevantug he andew te kedsilut, egkengezaag sikandan te Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun.

Ne zutun nengetig̵um te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is menge hadì wey is menge sundaru zan diyà te tanà he migngezanan te Ermegidun te kineg̵iyan he Hibriyuhanen. “Purungi niw pemineg̵a heini,” ke si Jesu Kristu, “su iring te kebpekeuma te tekawen is kedlikù ku. Is etew he kenà edlipezeng ne ed-endamen din is bisti zin, he

Ne zutun, is ikepitu he velinsug̵uen, mid-ulaan din diyà te keramag is lediyà he ziyà te kandin ne nezineg ku is egkag̵i he ziyà ebpuun te pinuuwà te edhadì he ziyà te simbahan, ke sikandin te, “Netapus en!”
Ne zutun nezineg ku is utew memezag̵ing ne neserasab is kilat ne mibpemeransì ne midlinug te utew mezesen. Sikan pa meseg̵azi te etew haazà is linug he utew mezesen he iring dutun!

Ne kes dekelà he inged he Bebilunya, neg̵evà te tetelu he vahin ne nengerundus is langun he menge inged diyà te minsan hendei he g̵inhedian. Ne wazà dutun melipati te Megbevayà is inged he Bebilunya he impeinum din te menge meg̵inged dutun is binu he ziyà te tasa zin, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, impeg̵ezaman din kandan is utew mekelimlimezang he pauk din.
Ne nengehanew is langun he menge pulu ziyà te zag̵at. Ne nengehanew zaan is langun he menge vuntud.

Ne mid-uzanan te utew zekelà he g̵iyew is menge etew. Is keveg̵at te kada sevaha zutun te g̵iyew, ne menge kelimahan he kilu. Ne is menge etew, midsumpalit dan is Megbevayà tenged dutun te g̵iyew he insilut din kandan su utew nerasey sikandan dutun.

Ne migkeg̵iyan a te sevaha zutun te pitu he menge velinsug̵uen he egkulang dutun te pitu he menge lediyà, ke sikandin te, “Hendini ka su ibpeehè ku kenikew is kedsiluti zuen te nevantug he vahi he ebpelelevag he ebpinuu ziyà te mezakel he menge wahig.
Nekehilavet kandin is menge hadì diyà te kelibutan. Ne is binu zin, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, is ked-ezapa zin te menge ledawan, ingkelangut te menge meg̵inged diyà te kelibutan.”

Ne zutun pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin mid-uwit a zuen te velinsug̵uen diyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew ne neehè ku zutun kes bahi. Ed-untud sikandin diyà te langgam he merig̵à. Ne haazà is langgam, insurat diyà te lawa zin is mezakel he menge gerar he utew supak te Megbevayà. Ne pitu is ulu zutun te langgam wey sepulù is sungey zin.

Ne haazà is bahi, ne midsun-uzan te utew mahal su merig̵à wey merudtem he manggad. Ne mideyzeyanan is lawa zin te vulawan wey menge mahal he vatu wey menge pirlas. Ne zutun te velad din is bulawan he tasa he nepenù te vinu he iyan is menge memahawag wey memeremerik he ulaula zin dutun te kebpelelevag din.

Ne zuen insurat dutun te vuked din he ngazan he in-eles is kehulug̵an din he edhenduen te, “Kes nevantug he inged he Bebilunya he iyan iney, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, puunà te minsan hentei he vahi he ebpelelevag wey minsan hengkey he mahawag he meremerik he ulaula zini te lumpad te kelibutan.”
Ne neehè ku he nelangut haazà is bahi te lengesa te menge tumutuu he midhimetayan din tenged te kedtuu zan ki Jesus.
Ne utew a neinuinu te kegkeahaa ku zutun te vahi.

Iyan, migkeg̵iyan a zutun te velinsug̵uen, ke sikandin te, “Maan is egkeinuinu ka? Ibpesavut ku kenikew is in-eles he kehulug̵an mehitenged keniyan te vahi wey keniyan te langgam he pitu is ulu zin ne sepulù is sungey zin he ed-untuzan keniyan te vahi.

Heeyan is langgam he egkeehè nu, ne zini sikandin te kelibutan dengan, iyan, wazè en guntaan. Ne meg̵aan en maan edlepew he ebpuun te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din, ne zutun te kedlepew zin, id-agbur sikandin diyà te Impirnu su edsilutan. Ne is langun he menge etew he zengan te wazè pa limbag̵a is kelibutan, wazà isurat is menge ngazan dan diyà te libru he zutun ilista is langun he ebeg̵ayan te untung, utew zan egkengeinuinu zutun te ked-ehè dan te langgam. Iyan igkengeinuinu zan su haazà is langgam, dengan uuyag ne minatey en guntaan, iyan, egkevanhew zed.
Egkesavut heini te etew he uluwanen. Is kehulug̵an duen te pitu he ulu zutun te langgam, ne pitu he menge vuvungan he zutun ebpinuu haazà is bahi,
Minatey en is lelima zutun te menge hadì, ne edhadì pa g̵untaan is sevaha, ne wazè pa medhadì is sevaha, iyan, emun edhadì en haazà ne meg̵aan dà utew is kedhadì din ne egkeawè en.
Ne is kehulug̵an dutun te langgam he zengan uuyag ne g̵untaan minatey, ne ikewalu sikandin he hadì he edsunud dutun te pitu he hadì. Ne edsilutan sikandin daan keuzemà diyà te Impirnu.
Ne haazà is sepulù he sungey, ne iyan kehulug̵an dutun is sepulù pa he hadì he wazè pa medhadì. Haazà is sepulù he hadì wey haazà is langgam, ebeg̵ayan sikandan te keg̵ehem te kedhadì te meg̵aan dà.
Sevaha zà is tuyù dutun te sepulù he hadì ne edtevangan dan is langgam pinaag̵i te zesen dan wey keg̵ehem dan te kedhadì.

Edtebeken dan sikan is nati he kerehidu ne egkezaag sikandan dutun te nati su egalen sikandin te minsan hentei he egalen wey hadì te minsan hentei he hadì. Ne is menge etew he edumahan dutun te nati, ne migeraran sikandan te menge impetuu wey menge pinilì, wey menge metinumanen he menge sumusundan te Megbevayà.”

Ne zutun mid-uman megkag̵i haazà is belinsug̵uen diyà te kedì, ke sikandin te, “Haazà is menge wahig he neehè nu he zutun ebpinuu sikan is bahi, ne iyan kehulug̵an dutun is menge g̵inhedian wey kepuun wey utew medmezakel he menge etew he kenà ed-iring-iring is kineg̵iyan dan.

Ne haazà is neehè nu he sepulù he sungey wey haazà is langgam, ne egkuntedehan dan haazà is bahi he ebpelelevag ne ed-eg̵awen dan is menge azen din ne edlevasan dan sikandin ne egkeenen dan is sapù din ne ebinsulan dan sikandin.

Umba ed-ul-ulahan dan haazà su is Megbevayà, midhimu zin he egkesuatan dan te edtuman is tuyù te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun sevaha zà is egkeisip dan ne idtavang dan te langgam is keg̵ehem dan te kedhadì taman te egkengetuman is nengetagnà he menge Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is bahi he egkeehè nu, ne iyan kehulug̵an din sikan is nevantug he inged he edlingahaan te menge hadì diyà te lumpad te kelibutan.”

Ne hein nepasad dutun te velinsug̵uen is egkeg̵iyen din, neehè ku is selakew pa he velinsug̵uen he ebpenaug pehendiyà te tanà he ebpuun te langit ne utew zekelà is keg̵ehem din. Ne utew merayag is ked-anlag din ne neenlag̵an din is minsan hendei zini te lumpad te kelibutan.

Ne mibpekezag̵ing is egkag̵i te, “Neg̵erè en. Nepurung mezeeti is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya! Ne nehimu en guntaan he ubpeey te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin wey menge mezaat he kedesenan. Egkeubpaan haazà is inged te minsan hengkey he mezaat wey meremerik he tagbis.

Umba neulaula heini su is bahi he iyan is inged he Bebilunya, impeinum din te langun he menge etew ziyà te langun he menge g̵inhedian is binu he iyan is ked-ezapa zin te menge ledawan. Is menge hadì diyà te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne midtampu zan dutun te memahawag he menge vaal zin. Ne is menge ebpemetig̵ayun diyà te kelibutan, midsepian dan pinaag̵i te suat dutun te vahi te menge utew mahal!”
Ne zutun nezineg ku is selakew pa he egkag̵i ziyà te langit, ke sikandin te,
“Sikiyu is menge g̵aked ku he etew,
awè kew en keniyan te inged!
Kenè kew medtampu te menge ulaula he mezaat keniyan te vahi su kela ke mekeragkes kew te menge silut ku kandin.
Su emun idtambù is menge salè din ne ebpekesungkul ziyà te langit tenged te utew medmezakel,
ne wazà melipati te Megbevayà is menge vetasan din he utew mezaat.
Is mid-ulaula zin keniyu he pesipala,
iyan daan ul-ulaha niw kandin asal kezezuwa niw tekepa is menge vales niw kandin.
Teg̵ayi niw is tasa zin te pauk te Megbevayà he ibpeinum kandin he kezezuwa edtekepa is kebpekelangut din kenà te impeinum din keniyu.
Utew subra is kebpurungi zin te kebpekesavuk din ne g̵untaan iyan bales kandin is kegkeseeng wey is merasey he kebpekesavuk.
Su kenà sikandin ed-engked he ebpegalbu, ke sikandin diyà te isip din te, ‘Bai a ne kenà a valu.
Kenà egkehimu he egkeumahan a te kemereg̵enan.’
Ne tenged te iyan haazà neisip din,
ne zutun te sengeandew,
egkeumahan sikandin te kemeresayan.
Su edsilutan sikandin te zaru, vitil, wey kemetayen;
ne egkepurung sikandin egketutung su is Megbevayà he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen te langun,
iyan edsilut kandin.”
Ne is menge hadì dini te kelibutan he midtampu zutun te mezaat he ulaula zin

Ne ebpekeziyù dan is ebpantew su egkehandek dan su kela ke meragkes sikandan dutun te kedèdeeti zutun te inged. Ne ke sikandan te, “Kehizu nu, sikew is utew zekelà he inged he Bebilunya su seled te sengeuras neumahan ka te silut!”
Ne is menge ebpemetig̵ayun dini te kelibutan, ebpemekesineg̵ew zan daan ne edlelendag dan tenged dutun te inged su wazè en ebpememasa te menge ibelegyè dan.

Wazè en ebpekepemasa te ibpemelegyè dan he vulawan, pelata, menge mahal he vatu wey pirlas, meupiya he manggad he meputì wey merig̵à wey manggad he sida, menge mehemut he kayu, menge vutang he mibeelan te mahal he kayu, wey vatu wey g̵alang wey putew, wey marpil, wey vatu he marmul,

menge perehemut he egkekaan wey edtutungen, menge mehemut he sulù, menge vinu, lana, erina, wey parey he trigu, menge vaka, menge kerehidu, menge kudà, wey menge kelisa, wey minsan menge etew he uripen.

Ne is menge ebpemetig̵ayun, egkag̵i zan dutun te vahi he iyan is inged he Bebilunya, ke sikandan te, “Nepurung mezeeti is langun he menge meupiya he ed-engkenen nu pezem. Ne nezeetan en daan is ketig̵eyunan nu wey igkelipey nu, ne haazà, kenè nu en maan egkeahà,” ke sikandan.

Ne haazà is menge ebpemetig̵ayun he insepian dan is kebpemetig̵ayun dan dutun te inged, ebpekeziyù dan daan is ebpantew su egkehandek dan su kela ke meragkes dan dutun te kedèdeeti zutun he inged. Ebpekesineg̵ew zan ne edlelendag dan.

Ne ke sikandan te, “Kenug̵un utew te zekelà he inged! Is menge meg̵inged dutun, ne nebistiyan te mahal he manggad he meputì wey merig̵à wey merudtem. Ne mideyzeyanan dan is lawa zan te vulawan wey menge mahal he vatu wey pirlas.
Iyan, seled te sengeuras dà, naamin mezeeti is langun he ketig̵eyunan dan!” ke sikandan.

Ne is menge kepitan te barku wey is menge pesehiru wey menge edterebahu zutun te menge barku wey is langun he ebpemetig̵ayun pinaag̵i te zag̵at, ne ebpekeziyù dan is ebpantew ne emun egkeehè dan is evel zutun te kebinsuli zutun te inged,
ebpekezag̵ing dan is egkag̵i te, “Wazè pa inged he ebpekelavew keniyan te zekelà he inged!”

Ne tuus te utew ebmesakit is gehinawa zan, ebukbukan dan te eliyavuk is ulu zan. Ne edsineg̵ew zan ne edlelendag dan ne ke sikandan te, “Kenug̵un utew te zekelà he inged! Su insepian is ketig̵eyunan din te langun he teg̵ig̵aked te menge barku ziyà te zag̵at. Ne g̵untaan, seled dà te sengeuras, nepurung mezeeti is langun he menge valey zutun!” ke sikandan.

Ne sikiyu is menge meg̵inged diyà te langit, lipey kew tenged te limas kayi te zekelà he inged. Lipey kew zaan is menge tumutuu wey menge epustul wey ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su midsilutan te Megbevayà haazà is inged tenged te menge pesipala zin keniyu!

Ne zutun duen belinsug̵uen he mekeg̵eg̵ehem ne mibitbit din is batu he iring kezekelà te g̵elingan ne intimbag din diyà te zag̵at. Ne ke sikandin te, “Iring kayi is kegkepurung kegkezeeti te zekelà he inged he Bebilunya ne kenè en maan egkeahà te minsan hentei.

Kenè en maan egkezineg kayi te inged is ebpememulalà wey ebpememudyung wey ebpemeng-arpa. Ne kenè en maan egkeahà kayi is minsan hengkey he pandey. Ne is dag̵ing te ebpenggaling ne kenè en maan egkezineg kayi.

Ne kenè en maan egketeyawan heini is inged te minsan hengkey he sulù. Ne is kegkag̵ikag̵i te vahi wey maama he sikan pa meked-esawa, ne kenè en maan egkezineg kayi te inged. Utew nengevantug diyà te tivuuk he kelibutan is menge ebpemetig̵ayun kayi ne mid-ekalan is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge g̵inhedian pinaag̵i te kinaagman te menge veyilan dutun.”

Midsilutan is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya su zutun mid-ag̵as is lengesa te menge etew he g̵aked wey ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Ne is langun he nevunù dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne pinaag̵i zaan kayi te inged.

Ne nepasad haazà, nezineg ku ziyà te langit is utew meg̵urub he henduen be te utew mezakel he menge etew he egkag̵i te, “Delig̵a is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin mekeg̵eg̵ehem, iyan sikandin dekelà is bentug̵an din, iyan sikandin Menluluwas.

Metazeng wey hustu is kukuman din su midsilutan din haazà is nevantug he ebpelelevag he vahi he pinaag̵i te meremerik he vaal zin, neeneb is tivuuk he kelibutan te ked-ezapa te menge ledawan. Midsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà su midhimetayan din is menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayà.”
Ne mid-uman dan megkag̵i te, “Delig̵a is Megbevayà! Haazà is inged, kenà egkeawà te minsan keenu is ked-evel zutun te inged.”

Ne zutun nemenlangkeb haazà is keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeg̵urangen wey haazà is heepat he linimbag he kedesenan, ne mid-azap dan is Megbevayà he ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwè din te kedhadì. Ne ke sikandan te, “Benar! Delig̵a is Megbevayà!”

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkag̵i he henduen be te ebpuun dutun te pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne ke sikandin te, “Sikiyu is menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayè tew, wey sikiyu is edtahud kandin, deisek is pid-etawan se zekelà is pid-etawan, delig̵a niw is Megbevayà!”

Ne nezineg ku is kegkag̵i zutun te utew medmezakel he menge etew he iring te zeg̵urus te utew zekelà he evag̵a wey henduen daan te egkengelilid he rug̵ung. Ke sikandan te, “Delig̵a is Megbevayà su is Megbevayè tew he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazen, ne iyan sikandin edhadì!
Edlilipey kiw utew ne edelig̵en tew sikandin tenged te zekelà he g̵ehem din! Su iyan en heini timpu he kegketuman te eseweey te nati he kerehidu. Is ed-esewaan te nati, ne mibistiyan en.

Ne is esawa te nati, mibeg̵ayan te ketenged te kebisti te manggad he meputì he merayag utew.” (Ne haazà is meputì he manggad, ne iyan kehulug̵an din is menge metazeng he ulaula te menge etew he g̵aked te Megbevayà.)

Ne migkeg̵iyan a zutun te velinsug̵uen, ke sikandin te, “Isurat nu heini: Utew zeyzey is langun he ibpemetelavuk dutun te eseweey te nati he kerehidu.” Ne impelaus din haazà is lalag din te, “Iyan heini tutuu he menge Lalag te Megbevayà!”

Ne zutun midlangkeb a ziyà te etuvangan din su ed-ezapen ku pezem, iyan, mibensag̵an e zin te, “Kenà a kenikew ezapa su siak wey sikew wey is langun he menge zuma nu he edtuu te tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus, neked-iiring kiw zà he menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayà. Iyan nu zà ezapa is Megbevayà!”
Umba migkag̵i zin haazà su sikan is ibpekag̵i te Megbevayà dutun te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, ne iyan sikan is tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus.

Ne zutun neehè ku is langit he nepuwasan ne zuen dutun kudà he meputì ne egkeserig̵an wey metinumanen is ed-untud dutun. Metazeng is kedhukum din ne metazeng daan is kebpekidtebek din te menge kuntada zin.

Is menge mata zin, ne henduen be te egkeregreg. Ne mezakel is menge kuruna he insuup diyà te ulu zin. Ne zuen ngazan he insurat diyà te kandin he iyan dà sikandin nesayud ke hengkey is kehulug̵an dutun.
Ne is kumbalè din ne henduen be te intereb diyà te lengesa. Ne migeraran sikandin he “Lalag te Megbevayà.”
Ne ebpemeninundug kandin is utew medmezakel he menge sundaru he ebpuun diyà te langit. Ebpemen-untud dan daan te meputì he menge kudà ne nengesun-uzan dan te meputì he manggad he utew lumpiyu.

Ne midlepew ziyà te vèbè din is sundang he utew meg̵arang ne egemiten din haazà te kedsulituwa zin te langun he menge g̵inhedian dini te lumpad te kelibutan. Utew mezesen is kebayàbayè din kandan ne ibpeehè din is rerangit kandan te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Megbevayà. Henduen sikandin te egkeres te menge kuntada zin, su ke và dà beg̵as te paras is menge etew ne henduen sikandin te egkeres te veg̵as te paras.
Diyà te kumbalè din wey ziyà te vuvun din ne zuen insurat he g̵erar he iyan is: “Hadì te langun he menge hadì wey Egalen te langun he menge egalen.”

Ne zutun neehè ku is belinsug̵uen he ziyà edhithitindeg te teliwazà te andew ne mibpekezag̵ing sikandin is ed-umew te langun he menge tagbis he ziyà edlayang te zivavew, ne ke sikandin te, “Tig̵um kew en is menge tagbis wey kew mekekaan te idlavung he ibpekaan keniyu te Megbevayà!

Amur-amur kew wey kew mekekaan te sapù te menge hadì, menge kepitan, wey menge sundaru! Kaan kew te menge lawa te kudà wey is menge egkukudà kayi! Kaan kew te lawa te langun he menge etew, uripen se kenà uripen, dekelà is pid-etawan din se minus is pid-etawan din!” ke sikandin.

Ne zutun neehè ku sikan is mekehandekhandek he langgam wey is menge hadì dini te lumpad he edumahan te langun he medmezakel he menge sundaru zan. Mid-amur-amur zan su edtebeken dan haazà is ed-untud te meputì he kudà wey is menge sundaru zin he ebpuun te langit.

Ne midakep haazà is langgam ne midakep daan kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas, sikan is mibpaahà te menge egkein-inuwan diyà te etuvangan te langgam. (Pinaag̵i zutun te menge egkein-inuwan mid-ekalan din wey meketuu te langgam haazà is langun he menge etew he midtiyapan te tiyap duen te langgam wey mid-azap te ledawan te langgam.) Ne sikan is langgam wey kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas, intimbag sikandan he uuyag pa ziyà te ranew he egkeregreg te esupri.

Ne midhimetayan is menge sundaru zan pinaag̵i te sundang he eguwà te vèbà dutun te ed-untud te meputì he kudà. Ne haazà is menge tagbis, utew zan nengehantey zutun te menge lawa zutun te menge sundaru.
Ne zutun, neehè ku is belinsug̵uen he ebpenaug he ebpuun te langit ne igkulang din is utew zekelà he pusas wey is yawi zuen te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din.

Ne midakep din sikan is dekelà he uled he deragun he iyan ded sikan is uled dengan he iyan daan kes mezaat he mulin-ulin he si Setanas ne mibpusasan din. Ne kenà ibpaawà haazà seled te nengkelibu he tuig.

Ne intimbag din si Setanas diyà te vitu he wazà pidtemanan te kezalem din. Ne migkendeduwan din ne midtuusan din su wey kenà mepuwasi. Umba mibeelan haazà su wey kenà meekali ni Setanas is menge etew te menge g̵inhedian dini te lumpad taman te kenè pa egketapus is nengkelibu he tuig. Ne emun egketapus haazà is nengkelibu he tuig, ibpaawè dè pa si Setanas te meg̵aan dà utew he timpu.

Ne zutun neehè ku is menge pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne is ebpememinuu zutun, mibeg̵ayan sikandan te keg̵ehem te kedhukum wey kebeg̵ey te kukuman. Neehè ku zaan is menge g̵imukud te menge etew he midhimetayan tenged te insangyew zan is Lalag te Megbevayà wey is impenurù ni Jesus. Wazè dan med-azap duen te langgam wey te ledawan te langgam, ne wazè dan daan mebpetiyap te tiyap te langgam diyà te vuked dan wey ke ziyè be te velad dan. Nengevanhew sikandan ne impehadì sikandan duma ki Kristu seled te nengkelibu he tuig.

Ne haazà is kegkevenhawa kandan ne iyan sikan is egkehuna he kegkevanhew te menge minatey. (Ne haazà is samà te menge etew he minatey, kenè dan pa egkevanhew taman te kenè pa egketapus is nengkelibu he tuig.)

Utew egkengelipey wey edtuvazan te Megbevayà haazà is egkengevanhew zutun te egkehuna he kegkevanhew. Kenè dan en ebpekeragkes duen te ikezuwa he kemetayen he iyan sikan is ranew he regreg. Menge memumuhat sikandan he ed-azap te Megbevayà wey ki Kristu. Ne ebpekehadì dan duma ki Kristu seled te nengkelibu he tuig.
Ne emun egketapus haazà is nengkelibu he tuig ne ibpaawè dè pa si Setanas dutun te pirisuwan din.

Ne egawas sikandin dutun wey zin meekali is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge g̵inhedian dini te tivuuk he kelibutan. Iyan haazà sikan is migngezanan te Gug wey Magug. Edtig̵umen sikandan ni Setanas wey zan mekepekidtebek te Megbevayà. Utew zan mezakel su henduen dan te pantad diyà te veyvey te zag̵at.

Mid-eneb dan is tivuuk he lumpad te kelibutan ne midlingutan dan is inged he utew ingkesuat te Megbevayà he zutun is menge sundaru te Megbevayà he iyan is menge tumutuu kandin. Iyan, mid-ulug̵an sikandan te hapuy he ebpuun te langit ne naamin dan nengeg̵erà.
