Ne zutun, is mid-akal kandan he si Setanas, intimbag sikandin diyà te ranew he egkeregreg te esupri he zutun itimbag sikan is langgam wey kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas ne zutun edresayen sikandan te maandew wey mezukilem te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zutun neehè ku is dekelà he meputì he pinuuwà te edhadì ne neehè ku zaan is ebpimpinuu zutun. Naawà is langit wey tanà diyà te etuvangan din ne nahanew ne kenè en maan sikandan egkeahà.

Ne neehè ku is langun he menge minatey, deisey is pid-etawan din se zekelà is pid-etawan din he ziyà ebpemenhithitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne mibekar is menge libru ne mibekar zaan is libru he zutun ilista is egkengeveg̵ayan te untung. Ne mibpemekar zaan is menge zuma he menge libru he zutun isurat is mid-ulaula te menge etew hein uuyag dan pa su edhukuman sikandan tenged te mid-ulaula zan su nekesurat dutun te menge libru.
Nekelepew is menge minatey he ziyà ebpuun te zag̵at wey ziyà te tanà he ziyà is menge g̵imukud dan te Iveyaan. Ne midhukuman sikandan langun tenged te mid-ulaula zan.
Ne zutun, is langun he ebpuun te ed-ubpaan te menge minatey, in-agbur is lawa zan wey g̵imukud dan diyà te ranew he egkeregreg. (Ne haazà is ranew ne iyan kes ikezuwa he kemetayan.)
Is minsan hentei zutun he wazà ilista is ngazan din diyà te libru te untung, in-agbur zaan sikandin diyà te ranew he egkeregreg.
Ne zutun neehè ku is beg̵u en he langit wey tanà su nahanew en is nehuna he langit wey nehuna he tanà ne wazè en maan dag̵at.

Ne zutun neehè ku is inged te Megbevayà he Veg̵u he Hiruselim he idlugtanà he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit. Utew mekempet haazà is inged su is kekempet din ne iring te kekempet te vahi he ed-esewaan he nepurungan mebistiyi.

Ne nezineg ku is egkag̵i he utew mezag̵ing diyà te pinuuwà te edhadì, ne ke sikandin te, “Mid-amur en human is Megbevayà diyà te menusiyà. Ed-amur sikandin kandan ne egkehimu sikandan he menge gin-etawan din. Iyan sikandin duma zan wey ed-ezapen dan he Megbevayà.

Ebpemunasen din en is menge luhà diyà te menge mata zan ne zutun wazè en maan ebpatey, ne wazè en maan ebpekesineg̵ew wey ebpekelelendag. Ne wazè en maan minsan hengkey he ibpekeantus su nahanew en man is nehuna he kelibutan.”

Ne migkag̵i haazà is ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwà te edhadì, ke sikandin te, “Guntaan edhimuwen ku he veg̵u is minsan hengkey!” Ne ke sikandin diyà te kedì te, “Isurat nu heini is egkezineg nu; egkeserig̵an wey tutuu heini he lalag.”

Ne ke sikandin en maan te, “Netuman en heini is langun. Siak, iyan a kes alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kes puunà wey egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey. Ke zuen egkemezahan, ibpeinum ku sikandin diyà te serebseb he zutun ebpuun is wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne kenè ku sikandin ibpevayad.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ne edhimuwen ku sikandin he anak ku ne egkehimu a zaan he Megbevayè din.

Iyan, sikan is egkehandek he edsundan kedì wey is menge kenà metinumanen, is menge etew he memahawag is ulaula, is menge memumunù, wey is menge meremerik is betasan, is menge keteuwan he etew, wey menge ed-azap te kenà tutuu he Megbevayà wey is langun he teruen he menge etew, iyan egketemanan dan is id-agbur sikandan diyà te ranew he nepenù te egkeregreg he esupri he iyan ikezuwa he kemetayen,” ke sikandin.

Ne zutun mid-uvayan a te sevaha zutun te pitu he velinsug̵uen he sikan is nen-ulà te pitu he lediyà he nepenù te pitu he huziyan en he idrasey te menusiyà, ne ke sikandin te, “Duma ka kedì su ibpeehè ku kenikew is ed-esawaan te nati he kerehidu.”

Ne zutun, pinaag̵i te g̵ehem te Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin mid-ag̵ak a te velinsug̵uen pehendiyà te utew metikang he vuntud. Ne impeehè din kediey is inged te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is inged he Hiruselim he idlugtanà he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit.
Ne haazà he inged, ne utew merayag su zutun ed-anlag is gehem te Megbevayà. Edsinlang haazà is inged iring te mahal he vatu he haspi he edlahus dutun is mata ta.

Utew metikang is elavat dutun te inged ne sepulù wey zezuwa is pultahan din ne zuen belinsug̵uen te Megbevayà he ebantey zutun te kada pultahan. Ne midsuratan is menge pultahan te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he kepuun he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Heepat he pesag̵ì is elavat dutun te inged ne ziyà te kada elavat ne zuen tetelu he pultahan. Diyà te zapit te edsilaan ne tetelu he pultahan ne ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan ne tetelu zaan. Diyà te zapit te zivavà ne tetelu zaan ne ziyà te zapit te zizayà ne tetelu zaan he pultahan.

Ne is elavat dutun te inged, ne sepulù wey zezuwa is impepinuuwan dutun he zekelà he vatu. Ne midsuratan haazà is menge vatu te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul zuen te nati he kerehidu.
Ne haazà is belinsug̵uen he ebpekidlalag kedì, egkulang sikandin te vulawan he mitrusan su edsukuzan din haazà is inged wey is elavet dutun wey haazà is menge pultahan.

Ne haazà is inged, is sukud dutun te velevag̵an din ne iring te sukud te petindeg din su nepesag̵ì is kegkeveeli zin. Ne midsukud dutun te velinsug̵uen haazà is inged ne zezuwa he libu wey heepat he g̵atus he kilumitru is petindeg din. Ne iring din ded daan is belevag̵an din wey is ketikang din.
Ne midsukud din daan is ketikang dutun te elavat ne menge keneman he mitrus is ketikang din sumalà is paag̵i tew te kedsukud su iyan migamit din.
Ne haazà is elavat ne hinimu te mahal he vatu he haspi. Ne haazà is inged ne hinimu te vulawan he utew wag̵as su edlahus is mata ta zutun.

Is menge vatu he mibpepinuuwan dutun te elavat, ne mideyzeyanan te mezakel he menge memekempet he menge mahal he vatu. Haazà is nehuna he vatu ne haspi, is ikezuwa ne sepiru, is iketelu ne kelsidunya, is ikeepat ne ismiralda,

is ikelima ne serdunika, is ikeenem ne kurnelina, is ikepitu ne krisulita, is ikewalu ne birilu, is ikesiyam ne tupasyu, is ikesepulù ne krisuprasu, is ikesepulù wey sevaha ne hesintu, ne is ikesepulù wey zezuwa ne emetista.

Ne haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he pultahan, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he pirlas su is kada pultahan, ne hinimu te sevaha he pirlas, ne is kersada zutun te inged, ne vulawan he utew wag̵as su iring te ispihu he edlahus is mata ta.

Ne wazè ku naahà he valey he simbahan dutun te inged. Wazà kinahanglan is baley he simbahan dutun su is Megbevayà he mekeg̵eg̵ehem he Nengazan te langun wey is nati he kerehidu, dutun en te kandan edsimba is langun.
Ne kenè en daan kinahanglan is anlag te andew wey vulan he idtayew zutun su haazà is inged, ed-enlag̵an en te mekeg̵eg̵ehem he anlag te Megbevayà; sikan is nati he kerehidu ne iyan sulù dutun.
Ne haazà is inged, ne egketeyawan te anlag din is langun he menge etew zutun he kelibutan. Ne is menge hadì te menge g̵inhedian dutun, ed-uwiten dan dutun te inged is ketig̵eyunan dan.
Is menge pultahan dutun te inged, ne kenè en edlekevan te minsan keenu he timpu su emun maandew ne ebpuwasan, ne wazà dutun mezukilem.
Ne ed-uwiten dutun seled te inged is menge mahal he azen wey is menge ketig̵eyunan te langun he menge g̵inhedian.

Iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat wey is minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he ed-azap te ledawan he ebpekeseled dutun. Iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is menge etew he inlista is menge ngazan dan dutun te libru te nati he kerehidu he zutun idlista is ebpemeg̵ayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ne, impaahà kediey zutun te velinsug̵uen is wahig he egngezanan te Wahig he Ebpekeveg̵ey te Untung. Ne haazà is wahig ne utew metingew iring te ispihu. Ne ziyà ebpuun haazà te pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu.

Ne haazà is wahig, diyà edtudà te teliwazà te kersada zutun te inged. Ne te pesiziveluyà he veyvey zutun te wahig egkeahà is menge kayu he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung. Ne haazà is kayu, sepulù wey zezuwa he kelasi is beg̵as din ne kada vulan ebpemeg̵as te sengekelasi. Ne is dahun dutun, ne vawì he ebpekeulì te menge etew he sakup te menge g̵inhedian dini te lumpad.
Ne haazà is inged, wazà dutun minsan hengkey he midrewakan te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun is pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu. Ne ed-ezapen is Megbevayà te menge sulug̵uen din.
Egkeehè dan is paras din ne haazà is menge sulug̵uen, edsuratan is menge vuked dan te ngazan din.
Wazè en dutun mezukilem ne wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa sulù wey silà te andew su iyan sulù dan is Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun, ne edhadì sikandan te wazà pidtemanan.

Ne migkeg̵iyan a zutun te velinsug̵uen, ke sikandin te, “Heini is menge lalag he nezineg nu, utew venar ne tutuu he egkengetuman. Is Megbevayè tew he Nengazen te langun, imbeg̵ey zin is Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin diyà te ebpemeneuven din ne midsug̵ù din is belinsug̵uen din wey zan ikepaahà diyà te menge sulug̵uen din ke hengkey is meg̵aan en he egkeulaula.”
Ne egkag̵i si Jesus te, “Meg̵aan e en ebpekeuma! Utew egkengelipey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag ku he impezayag keniyu kayi te libru.”

Ne siak si Juan is nekezineg wey nekeahà te langun he insurat ku kayi. Ne hein neipus ku te ed-ahà wey ebpemineg is langun kayi, midlangkeb a zutun te etuvangan te velinsug̵uen he mibpaahà kedì kayi te langun su ed-ezapen ku pezem.

Iyan, mibensag̵an e zin, ke sikandin te, “Kenà a kenikew ezapa su siak wey sikew, wey is menge zuma nu he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà wey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag kayi te libru, neked-iiring kiw zà he menge sulug̵uen te Megbevayà. Iyan nu zà ezapa is Megbevayà,” ke sikandin.
Ne impelaus din haazà is lalag din te, “Kenè nu ieles heini is impezayag kenikew he menge lalag kayi te libru su meg̵aan en egkengetuman heini is langun.

Ne zutun he timpu,” ke sikandin, “sikan is mezaat pa is ulaula zin, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te mezaat. Ne sikan is meremerik pa is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te meremerik. Ne sikan is metazeng is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en ibpevaal te metazeng, ne haazà is etew he midhimu te Megbevayà he sakup din, ipepenigudu zutun sikandin te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà.
Pemineg kew,” ke si Jesus, “meg̵aan e en ebpekeuma ne zutun edsuhulan ku is kada sevaha sumalà is mid-ulaula zin.
Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeg̵iya, kes ebpuunan wey kes egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey,” ke si Jesus.
Utew egkengelipey haazà is langun he ebpìpian dan is ugelingen dan,

Iyan, diyè dà te meziyù is mekeeled-eled is baal zin, wey is menge keteuwan, is memeremerik is ulaula, is menge memumunù, is ebpemenimba te menge ledawan wey is langun he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he limbung is ulaula zin.

“Siak si Jesus, midsug̵ù ku ziyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu is belinsug̵uen ku wey zin metudtul heini is langun. Iyan a sikan is kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David. Iyan a sikan is iring te mekevugwas,

Ne kes Wag̵as he Mulin-ulin wey kes egkeesawa te nati he kerehidu, ed-umew zan is egkag̵i te, “Tuu kew en.” Ne sikan is nekezineg kayi, ne kinahanglan he med-umew zaan he egkag̵i te, “Tuu kew en.” Is minsan hentei keniyu he egkemezahan, wey is minsan hentei he egkesuat, dewata zin en he wazà bayad is wahig he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Siak si Juan. Ebpetizeenan ku is minsan hentei he nekezineg kayi te impezayag kediey he ibpesavut kayi te libru. Ke zuen minsan hentei he ed-umanan din te minsan hengkey heini is ibpesavut, id-uman te Megbevayà te silut kandin is menge idrasey he nekag̵i kayi te libru.

Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he id-awè din kayi te ibpesavut he impezayag kediey is minsan hengkey, id-awà daan te Megbevayà is kandin he vahin dutun te veg̵as duen te kayu he ebpekeveg̵ey te untung he nekag̵i kayi. Ne id-awà daan diyà te kandin is ketenged din te ked-ubpà dutun te inged te Megbevayà he nekag̵i kayi te libru.
Si Jesus he iyan ebpirma kayi te langun, ke sikandin te, “Benar iyan he meg̵aan e en ebpekeuma!” Ne ke siak te, “Uya, Jesus he Nengazen dey, hendini ke en!”
Sikiyu is langun he menge g̵aked te Megbevayà, ikeg̵ag̵ew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
